
-----title
临川 (出生地)

DetailSwitch("e6ff34d95f0648ee9e199e3435bdebb7");'><span id='e6ff34d95f0648ee9e199e3435bdebb7_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1043')">1042-1043年</a>，24-25岁</div><div id='e6ff34d95f0648ee9e199e3435bdebb7' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>　曾巩归抚州，有《上欧阳学士第二书》，答谢欧公爱幸之深。文。<div id='poem_1173040' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173040' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173040?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上欧阳学士第二书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173040")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173040_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173040'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173040'>学士先生执事：伏以执事好贤乐善，孜孜于道德，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>辅时</span>及物为事，方今海内未有伦比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173040_comment'></div>其文章、智谋、材力之雄伟挺特，信韩文公以来一人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173040_comment'></div>某之获幸于左右，非有一日之素、宾客之谈，率然自进于门下，而执事不以众人待之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173040_comment'></div>坐而与之言，未尝不以前古圣人之至德要道可行于当今之世者，使巩薰蒸渐渍，忽不自知其益而及于中庸之门户，受赐甚大，且感且喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173040_comment'></div>重念巩无似，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>见弃</span>于有司，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>环视</span>其中所有，颇识涯分，故报罢之初，释然不自动，岂好大哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173040_comment'></div>诚其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>材资</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/24/Comments/1")'>召取</span>之如此故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173040_comment'></div>道中来，见行有操瓢囊、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/26/Comments/2")'>负任</span>挽车、挈携老弱而东者，曰：某土之民，避旱暵饥馑与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>征赋</span>徭役之事，将徙占他郡，觊得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>水浆</span>藜糗，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>窃活</span>旦暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173040_comment'></div>行且戚戚，惧不克如愿，昼则奔走在道，夜则无所容寄焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173040_comment'></div>若是者，所见殆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>不减</span>百千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173040_comment'></div>因窃自感，幸生长四方无事时，与此民均被朝廷德泽涵养，而独不识袯襫锄耒辛苦之事，旦暮有衣食之给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173040_comment'></div>及一日有文移发召之警，则又承藉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>世德</span>，不蒙矢石，备战守，驭车仆马，数千里<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>馈饷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173040_comment'></div>自少至于长，业乃以《诗》《书》文史，其蚤暮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>思念</span>，皆道德之事，前世当今之得失，诚不能尽解，亦庶几识其一二远者大者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173040_comment'></div>今虽群进于有司，与众人偕下，名字不列于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>荐书</span>，不得比数于下士，以望主上之休光，而尚获<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>收齿</span>于大贤之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173040_comment'></div>道中来，又有鞍马<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>仆使</span>代其劳，以执事于道路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173040_comment'></div>至则可力求箪食瓢饮，以支旦暮之饥饿，比此民绰绰有馀裕，是亦足以自慰矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173040_comment'></div>此事屑屑不足为长者言，然辱爱幸之深，不敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>自外</span>于门下，故复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>陈说</span>，觊执事知巩居之何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173040_comment'></div>所深念者，执事每曰：「过吾门者百千人，独于得生为喜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173040_comment'></div>及行之日，又赠序引，不以规而以赏识其愚，又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>叹嗟</span>其去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173040_comment'></div>此巩得之于众人，尚宜感知己之深，恳恻不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173040_comment'></div>况大贤长者，海内所师表，其言一出，四方以卜其人之轻重？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173040_comment'></div>某乃得是，是宜感戴欣幸，倍万于寻常可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173040_comment'></div>然此实皆圣贤之志业，非自知其材能与力能当之者，不宜受此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173040_comment'></div>此巩既夤缘幸知少之所学，有分寸合于圣贤之道，既而又敢不自力于进修哉，日夜克苦，不敢有愧于古人之道，是亦为报之心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173040_comment'></div>然恨资性<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>短缺</span>，学出己意，无有师法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173040_comment'></div>觊南方之行李，时枉笔墨，特赐教诲，不惟增疏贱之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>光明</span>，抑实得以刻心思，铭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>肌骨</span>，而佩服矜式焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173040_comment'></div>想惟循诱之方，无所不至，曲借<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>恩力</span>，使终成人材，无所爱惜，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>穷陋</span>之迹，故不敢望于众人，而独注心于大贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173040_comment'></div>徒恨身奉甘旨，不得旦夕于几杖之侧，禀教诲，俟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1173040", 1173040, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>讲画</span>，不胜驰恋慺慺之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173040_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173040_comment'></div>巩再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1173040_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>　曾巩居抚州，会征兵,以承藉世德免征。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>　曾巩在抚州日夜苦读，并经营家事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>　抚州州掾张文叔及其内弟刘伯声从曾巩游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>　曾巩作《与抚州知州书》<div id='poem_1173046' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173046' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173046?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与抚州知州书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173046")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173046_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173046'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173046'>士有与一时之士相参错而居，其衣服食饮语默止作之节无异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173046_comment'></div>及其心有所独得者，放之天地而有馀，歛之秋毫之端而不遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173046_comment'></div>望之不见其前，蹑之不见其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173046_comment'></div>岿乎其高，浩乎其深，烨乎其光明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173046_comment'></div>非四时而信，非风雨雷电霜雪而吹嘘泽润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173046_comment'></div>声鸣严威，列之乎公卿彻官而不为泰，无匹夫之势而不为不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173046_comment'></div>天下吾赖，万世吾师，而不为大；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173046_comment'></div>天下吾违，万世吾师，而不为贬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173046_comment'></div>其然也，岂剪剪然而为洁，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173046", 1173046, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>婞婞</span>然而为谅哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173046_comment'></div>岂沾沾者所能动其意哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173046_comment'></div>其与一时之士相参错而居，岂惟衣服食饮语默止作之节无异也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173046_comment'></div>凡与人相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173046", 1173046, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>追接</span>相恩爱之道，一而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173046_comment'></div>若夫食于人之境，而出入于其里，进焉而见其邦之大人，亦人之所同也，安得而不同哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173046_comment'></div>不然，则立异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173046_comment'></div>剪剪然而已矣，剪剪然而已矣，岂其所汲汲为哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173046_comment'></div>巩方慎此以自得也，于执事之至，而始也自疑于其进焉，既而释然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173046_comment'></div>故具道其本末，而为进见之资，伏惟少赐省察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173046_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173046_comment'></div>巩再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1173046_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年5月</a>　王安石至家省亲，因谒曾巩。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　曾巩听王安石道孙正之道德学问。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　曾巩请王安石为其祖父作墓志铭。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　曾巩与王安石诸兄弟游，尝拜王安石祖母谢氏于堂上。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　曾巩作《酬介甫还自舅家书所感》<div id='poem_220302' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220302' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220302?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬介甫还自舅家书所感</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220302")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220302_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220302'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220302'>旱气满原野，子行归旧庐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220302_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220302'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220302", 220302, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>吁天</span>高未动，望岁了何如。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220302_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220302'>荒土欲生火，涸溪容过车。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220302_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220302'>民期得霖雨，吾岂灌园蔬。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220302_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220302'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220302_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　抚州司法参军张彦博时从曾巩问道学文，请王安石为其父张保雍撰诗序，请曾巩为其父撰神道碑，曾巩有《刑部郎中张府君神道碑》<div id='poem_1173323' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173323' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173323?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刑部郎中张府君神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173323")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173323_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173323'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173323'>府君讳保雍，字粹之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173323_comment'></div>景德二年举进士，中甲科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173323_comment'></div>授山阴主簿，有能名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173323_comment'></div>提点刑狱皇甫选上其状，拜大理评事，监尉氏酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173323_comment'></div>逾年，知三泉，用故事，得假五品服专达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173323_comment'></div>既至，叹曰：「吾常所欲为此，几可试也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173323_comment'></div>县以治闻，就改寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173323_comment'></div>久之，通判齐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173323_comment'></div>李丞相迪镇永兴，扳府君自赞，遂通判其军府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173323_comment'></div>李公去，寇莱公代之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173323_comment'></div>诏易府君凤翔，莱公雅知其贤，因奏留之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173323_comment'></div>事有利害，未尝不争，听乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173323_comment'></div>玺书奖之，迁殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173323_comment'></div>钱思公惟演、李三司士衡荐任佐益州，避亲嫌不拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173323_comment'></div>授鄜州，迁太常博士，寻换晋州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173323_comment'></div>今上即位，以屯田员外郎、绯衣银鱼知汉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173323_comment'></div>夜中四卒叩府，告禁兵两营变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173323_comment'></div>佐吏骇，辈入府，府君徐出，独械四卒掠之，趋作诬状，徇两营以安之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173323_comment'></div>至明，鞫得实，乃四卒与伍中谋，幸受己甲，捕两营，因自以为叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173323_comment'></div>遂弃之市，及谋者九人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173323_comment'></div>因奏言：蜀戍兵久合，往往叛，可因使臣去来番代之，行之至今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173323_comment'></div>擢拜都官，还朝，庄献太后面嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173323_comment'></div>联拜职方度支判官、契丹国信使、荆湖北路转运，章服金紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173323_comment'></div>有冯异以化黄金干太后，得奉职监鄂州税，知州欧阳颖事之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173323", 1173323, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>曲恭</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173323_comment'></div>武昌置场中市民炭，常时吏先署入抄文为足，而实尚留民家不入，比漕发，乃直取载之，以为故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173323_comment'></div>颖暴，又欲资异谋，使按之，坐盗死者十八人，当论，府君自荆南乘单船，六日夜入鄂，直之，笞守吏数人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173323_comment'></div>同时，汉阳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1173323", 1173323, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>俚民</span>贩茶，得知军骆与京诬民忤巡检，应首死者二十人，随者百馀人，与京暴甚颖，人莫敢相曲直，府君遂乱江往虑之，二十人者得不死，随者皆贳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173323_comment'></div>汉阳距江为城，潦至堤辄毁，岁调薪石，发民完之，工四千人，两县以病，府君身自护作，省工费半，堤完至今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173323_comment'></div>迁祠部郎中，满岁，更两浙转运使，加刑部，行部至婺，刺得其守罪，留治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173323_comment'></div>未既，疾作，遂不起，明道二年九月五日也，享年五十九岁，以景祐二年八月壬申葬汝南宣猷乡之先茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173323_comment'></div>张氏世为显姓，府君先居齐之禹城，及考讳制，官至库部员外郎，赠吏部侍郎，过蔡州，乐之，家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173323_comment'></div>府君娶彭城刘氏，枢密直学士师道之侄，封本县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173323_comment'></div>子定、察、彦博，仕有治声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173323_comment'></div>最少彦辅未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173323_comment'></div>府君之丧，朝廷以察为鄂州推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173323_comment'></div>府君甚爱考城刘待制，刘亦厚结之，子娶府君女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173323_comment'></div>庆历三年，彦博为抚州司法，为予言：府君平生端重不忲，燕閒未尝见其懈容，为治威严，不擿细事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173323_comment'></div>为汉州，民赵昌以画名，府君迄代不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173323_comment'></div>至剑门，昌追献画二幅曰：「前太守举从昌取，又应朝贵人求汲汲，昌以技尝自苦，德公不扰，敢献」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173323_comment'></div>府君强受之而归之直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173323_comment'></div>其使吴越，吴越匠巧天下，未尝致一器一物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173323_comment'></div>历问其治己，虽小者如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173323_comment'></div>又称其官次施设状如前，而曰今史馆修撰王质铭其德于圹中，校书郎王安石又序其诗，惟所以显章于墓道之左者，其辞不立，惧无以畀四方人视听，请予文张之于碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173323_comment'></div>予不让，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1173323'>为天下之道，本诸得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173323_comment'></div>公卿内庸，诸侯部使者外治，其体两重也，易知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173323_comment'></div>今常患材难，不足布此位，故不能推其功惠及民，岂世所谓贤，天固啬邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173323_comment'></div>抑其求弗切耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173323_comment'></div>盖宜放而登，当取而遗，其施为缪然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173323_comment'></div>如府君钟材甚美，而进也得其时，自守及使，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1173323", 1173323, "Clauses/186/Comments/0")'>绪行</span>既卓矣，使极其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1173323", 1173323, "Clauses/187/Comments/0")'>设修</span>，可胜言耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173323_comment'></div>而止于斯，其可嗟也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173323_comment'></div>方今敝郡彫部相望，如府君其又可思也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173323_comment'></div>则凡蔡里之耋龀，恶得不严其墓耶？</div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1173323_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='82b0949533ad4c82a59dc3d585f78ded_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("82b0949533ad4c82a59dc3d585f78ded");'><span id='82b0949533ad4c82a59dc3d585f78ded_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1046')">1043-1046年</a>，25-28岁</div><div id='82b0949533ad4c82a59dc3d585f78ded' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　曾巩作《怀友一首寄介卿》作品：《怀友一首寄介甫》<div id='poem_1173078' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173078' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173078?labeling=true' target='_blank'>怀友一首寄介卿</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173078")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173078_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173078'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173078'>圣人之于道，非思得之，而勉及之，其间于贤大远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173078_comment'></div>然圣人者不专己以自蔽也，或师焉，或友焉，参相求以广其道而辅其成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173078_comment'></div>故孔子之师或老聃、郯子云，其友或子产、晏婴云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173078_comment'></div>师友之重也，圣人然尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173078_comment'></div>不及圣人者，不师而传，不友而居，无悔也希矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173078_comment'></div>予少而学，不得师友，焦思焉而不中，勉勉焉而不及，抑其望圣人之中庸而未能至者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173078_comment'></div>尝欲得行古法度士与之居或游，孜孜为考予之失而切劘之，庶于几而后已，予亦有以资之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173078_comment'></div>皇皇四海，求若人而不获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173078_comment'></div>自得介卿，然后始有周旋侥恳摘予之过而接之以道者，使予幡然其勉者有中，释然其思者有得矣，望中庸之域其可以策而及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173078_comment'></div>使得久相从居与游，予知免于悔矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173078_comment'></div>而介卿官于扬，予穷居极南，其合之日少而离别之日多，切劘之效浅而愚无知易懈，其可怀且忧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173078_comment'></div>思而不释，已而叙之，相慰且相警也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173078_comment'></div>介卿居今世、行古道，其文章称其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173078_comment'></div>今之人盖希古之人，固未易有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173078_comment'></div>为作《怀友》书两通，一自藏，一纳介卿家。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1173078_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　东明刘希声从曾巩游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　曾巩作《分宁县云峰院记》<div id='poem_1173276' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173276' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173276?labeling=true' target='_blank'>分宁县云峰院记<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历三年九月二十八日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173276")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173276_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173276'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173276'>分宁人勤生而啬施，薄义而喜争，其土俗然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173276_comment'></div>自府来抵其县五百里，在山谷穷处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173276_comment'></div>其人修农桑之务，率数口之家，留一人守舍行馌，其外尽在田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173276_comment'></div>田高下硗腴，随所宜杂殖五谷，无废壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173276_comment'></div>女妇蚕杼，无懈人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173276_comment'></div>茶盐蜜纸竹箭材苇之货，无有纤钜，治咸尽其身力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173276_comment'></div>其勤如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173276_comment'></div>富者兼田千亩，廪实藏钱，至累岁不发，然视捐一钱，可以易死，宁死无所捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173276_comment'></div>其于施何如也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173276_comment'></div>其间利害不能以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173276", 1173276, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>稊米</span>，父子、兄弟、夫妇，相去若弈棋然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173276_comment'></div>于其亲固然，于义厚薄可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173276_comment'></div>长少族坐里闾，相讲语以法律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173276_comment'></div>意向<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173276", 1173276, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>小戾</span>，则相告讦，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173276", 1173276, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>结党</span>诈张，事关节以动视听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173276_comment'></div>甚者画刻金木为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173276", 1173276, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>章印</span>，摹文书以绐吏，立县庭下，变伪一日百千出，虽笞扑徙死交迹，不以属心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173276_comment'></div>其喜争讼，岂比他州县哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173276_comment'></div>民虽勤而习如是，渐涵入骨髓，故贤令长佐吏比肩，常病其未易治教使移也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173276_comment'></div>云峰院在县极西界，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173276", 1173276, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>籍图</span>，不知自何时立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173276_comment'></div>景德三年，邑僧道常治其院而侈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173276_comment'></div>门闼靓深，殿寝言言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173276_comment'></div>栖客之庐，斋庖库庾，序列两傍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173276_comment'></div>浮图所用铙鼓鱼螺钟磬之编，百器<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173276", 1173276, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>备完</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173276_comment'></div>吾闻道常气质伟然，虽索其学，其归未能当于义，然治生事不废，其勤亦称其土俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173276_comment'></div>至有馀辄斥散之，不为黍累计惜，乐淡泊无累，则又若能独胜其啬施喜争之心，可言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173276_comment'></div>或曰，使其人不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173276", 1173276, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>汩溺</span>其所学，其归一当于义，则杰然视邑人者，必道常乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173276_comment'></div>此予未敢必也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173276_comment'></div>庆历三年九月，与其徒谋曰：「吾排蓬藋治是院，不自意成就如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173276_comment'></div>今老矣，恐泯泯无声畀来人，相与图文字，买石刻之，使永永与是院俱传，可不可也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173276_comment'></div>咸曰：「然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173276_comment'></div>推其徒子思来请记，遂来，予不让，为申其可言者宠嘉之，使刻示邑人，其有激也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173276_comment'></div>二十八日，南丰曾巩记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1173276_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年10月</a>　曾巩居临川，作《秃秃记》<div id='poem_1173278' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173278' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173278?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秃秃记<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历三年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173278")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173278_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173278'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173278'>秃秃，高密孙齐儿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173278_comment'></div>齐明法，得嘉州司法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173278_comment'></div>先娶杜氏，留高密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173278_comment'></div>更绐娶周氏，与抵蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173278_comment'></div>罢归，周氏恚齐绐，告县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173278_comment'></div>齐赀谢得释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173278_comment'></div>授歙州休宁县尉，与杜氏俱迎之官，再期，得告归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173278_comment'></div>周氏复恚，求绝，齐急曰：「为若出杜氏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173278_comment'></div>祝发以誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173278_comment'></div>周氏可之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173278_comment'></div>齐独之休宁，得娼陈氏，又纳之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173278_comment'></div>代受抚州司法，归间周氏，不复见，使人窃取其所产子，合杜氏、陈氏，载之抚州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173278_comment'></div>明道二年正月至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173278_comment'></div>是月，周氏亦与其弟来，欲入据其署，吏遮以告齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173278_comment'></div>齐在宝应佛寺受租米，趋归，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173278", 1173278, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>捽挽</span>置庑下，出伪券曰：「若佣也，何敢尔」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173278_comment'></div>辨于州，不直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173278_comment'></div>周氏诉于江西转运使，不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173278_comment'></div>久之，以布衣书里姓联诉事，行道上乞食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173278_comment'></div>萧贯守饶州，驰告贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173278_comment'></div>饶州，江东也，不当受诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173278_comment'></div>贯受不拒，转运使始遣吏祝应言为覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173278_comment'></div>周氏引产子为据，齐惧子见事得，即送匿旁方政舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173278_comment'></div>又惧，则收以归，扼其咽，不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173278_comment'></div>陈氏从旁引儿足，倒持之，抑其首瓮水中乃死，秃秃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173278_comment'></div>召役者邓旺，穿寝后垣下为坎，深四尺，瘗其中，生五岁云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173278_comment'></div>狱上更赦，犹停齐官，徙濠州，八月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173278_comment'></div>庆历三年十月二十二日，司法张彦博改作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1173278", 1173278, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>寝庐</span>，治地得坎中死儿，验问知状者，小吏熊简对如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173278_comment'></div>又召邓旺诘之，合狱辞，留州者皆是，惟杀秃秃状盖不见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173278_comment'></div>与予言而悲之，遂以棺服敛之，设酒脯奠焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173278_comment'></div>以钱与浮图人升伦，买砖为圹，城南五里张氏林下瘗之，治地后十日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173278_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173278_comment'></div>人固择于禽兽夷狄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173278_comment'></div>禽兽夷狄于其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1173278", 1173278, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>配合</span>孕养，知不相祸也，相祸则其类绝也久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173278_comment'></div>如齐何议焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173278_comment'></div>买石刻其事，纳之圹中，以慰秃秃，且有警也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173278_comment'></div>事始末，惟杜氏一无忌言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173278_comment'></div>二十九日，南丰曾巩作。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1173278_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《兜率院记》<div id='poem_1173289' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173289' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173289?labeling=true' target='_blank'>兜率院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173289")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173289_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173289'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173289'>古者为治有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173289", 1173289, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>常道</span>，生民有常业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173289_comment'></div>若夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173289", 1173289, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>祝除</span>发毛，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173289", 1173289, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>禁弃</span>冠环带裘，不抚耞耒机盎，至他器械，水土之物，其时节经营，皆不自践，君臣、父子、兄弟、夫妇皆不为其所当然，而曰其法能为人祸福者，质之于圣人无有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173289_comment'></div>其始自汉魏，传挟其言者浸淫四出，抵今为尤盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173289_comment'></div>百里之县，为其徒者，少几千人，多至万以上，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173289", 1173289, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>宫庐</span>百十，大抵穹墉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173289", 1173289, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>奥屋</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173289", 1173289, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>文衣</span>精食，舆马之华，封君不如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173289_comment'></div>古百里之国，封君一人，然而力殆不轻得足也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173289_comment'></div>今地方百里，过封君者累百十，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173289", 1173289, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>飞奇钩货</span>以病民，民往往嚬呻而为涂中瘠者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173289_comment'></div>以此治教信让，奚而得行也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173289_comment'></div>而天下若是者，盖几宫几人乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173289_comment'></div>有司常锢百货之利，细若蓬芒，一无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173289", 1173289, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>漏失</span>，仆仆然其劳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173289_comment'></div>而至于浮图，人虽费如此，皆置<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173289", 1173289, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>不问</span>，反倾府空藏而弃与之，岂不识其非古之制邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173289_comment'></div>抑识不可然且固存之耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173289_comment'></div>愚不能释也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173289_comment'></div>分宁县郭内外，名为宫者百八十馀所，兜率院在治之西十里，其徒尤相率悉力以侈之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173289_comment'></div>其构兴端原，有邑人黄庠所为记，其后院主僧某，又治其故而大之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173289_comment'></div>殿舍中严，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173289", 1173289, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>斋宫</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173289", 1173289, "Clauses/55/Comments/1")'>宿庐</span>庖湢之房，布列两序，厩园囷仓，以固以密，资所以奉养之物，无一而外求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173289_comment'></div>疏其事而来请记者，其徒省怀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173289_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173289_comment'></div>子之法，四方人奔走<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173289", 1173289, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>附集</span>者，衎衎施施，未有止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173289_comment'></div>予无力以拒之者，独介然于心，而掇其尤切者，为是说以与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173289_comment'></div>其使子之徒，知己之享利也多，而人蒙病已甚，且以告有司，而谂其终何如焉？</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1173289_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript:
