id='poem_sentence_8_220339_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《上王转运》<div id='poem_1173071' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173071' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173071?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上王转运书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173071")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173071_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173071'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173071'>某启：伏念某所守朴愚，与时不对，力求圣人之道，苦心并日夜，每见义理之所当然，则推而行之，未尝求信于人，亦诚无以使人见信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173071_comment'></div>所为益久，处身益穷，亦不自悔于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173071_comment'></div>家贫，亲老食口仅三十，四海之大，无寸土狭庐可以自立，诚世之穷人，其状可谓有不堪之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173071_comment'></div>伏处草茅，非敢望人之顾己也，不谓执事视听之远，得其姓名，收召抚循，诚意备到，每临而见之，未尝不优为之礼，非今彻官之于贱士、前进之于后辈所常行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173071_comment'></div>其爱之也，汲汲乎忧其衣食之不足以事亲，则谋振之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173071_comment'></div>勤勤乎欲成就其材，则昌言于朝以发之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173071_comment'></div>凡赐之可以及某者，无不为焉，顾何足以当之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173071_comment'></div>夫人之怀道德者果于自守，不肯妄干于人，与人虽知之而非其意，亦诚不肯就之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173071_comment'></div>而世之言相知者，皆以自衒饰为能，勤候伺请谢为宜，其去于自守而不肯妄干于人也远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173071_comment'></div>幸人之一顾，则仆仆然而逢之，唯恐不当其心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173071_comment'></div>剪剪然而奔走之，惟恐其后时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173071_comment'></div>其去于非其意而不肯就之也亦远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173071_comment'></div>然世之言相知者得其所比肩，而怀道德者得其所无几人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173071_comment'></div>今执事之所部三州四军之地，四面各数千里，为属吏者累百人，韦布之士，负抱其业于门下者，衣裾相属，足迹相践也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173071_comment'></div>彼孰不欲彻其能于执事，而执事未有及之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173071_comment'></div>独某辱先及之，其迹亦未尝素一造门下，其材未尝自衒饰，其礼未尝为候伺谢请，其可谓不失其所以自守之操矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173071_comment'></div>至于进退之也，又一当于义，使之不拂挠其心而负其所学，其可谓无非其意者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173071_comment'></div>夫然则某之进于道德也虽浅，然称之于四方，曰执事之遇曾某也以道，曾某受执事之遇无所非其道，其可以无愧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173071_comment'></div>四方之人闻之者曰：「如某且然，况深于道德者如何哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173071_comment'></div>则其为补于世岂少欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173071_comment'></div>则其章明执事之心公于进善，信其所职守孜孜于国家，岂不盛欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173071_comment'></div>而某也，图所以为报之心，敢不称其遇之之义欤！</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1173071_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　曾巩居临川，作杂文七篇《号令辨》、《时俗辨》、《论贫》、《书虏事》、《书与客言》、《书唐欧阳詹集》、《讲周礼疏》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年冬</a>　曾巩居临川，作《寄王介甫》<div id='poem_220269' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220269' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220269?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄王荆公介甫</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220269")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220269_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220269'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220269'>数病门稀出，常贫客少过。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220269_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220269'>经纶知龃龉，耕钓亦蹉跎。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220269_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220269'>两事艰难极，孤心感慨多。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220269_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220269'>素交千里远，谁听此时歌。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220269_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220269'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220269_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　欧阳修作《送杨辟秀才》，称誉曾巩才能。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩与刘伯声游已三年，始别。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩作《上齐工部书》，请入学临川。<div id='poem_1173045' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173045' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173045?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上齐工部书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173045")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173045_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173045'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173045'>巩尝谓县比而听于州，州比而听于部使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173045_comment'></div>以大较言之，县之民以万家，州数倍于县，部使者之所治十倍于州，则部使者数十万家之命也，岂轻也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173045_comment'></div>部使者之门，授天子之令者之焉，凡民之平曲直者之焉，辨利害者之焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173045_comment'></div>为吏者相与就而质其为吏之事也，为士者相与就而质其为士之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173045_comment'></div>三省邻部之政相闻、书相移者，又未尝閒焉，其亦烦矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173045_comment'></div>执事为部使者于江西，巩也幸齿于执事之所部，其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173045", 1173045, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>饰容</span>而进谒也，敢质其为士之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173045_comment'></div>巩世家南丰，及大人谪官以还，无屋庐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173045", 1173045, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>田园</span>于南丰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173045_comment'></div>祖母年九十馀，诸姑之归人者多在临川，故祖母乐居临川也，居临川者久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173045_comment'></div>遇学之制，凡入学者，不三百日则不得举于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173045_comment'></div>而巩也与诸弟循侨居之，又欲学于临川，虽已疏于州而见许矣，然不得执事一言，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173045", 1173045, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>转牒</span>而明之，有司或有所疑，学者或有所缘以相嫉，私心未敢安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173045_comment'></div>来此者数日矣，欲请于门下，未敢进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173045_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173045", 1173045, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>同进</span>章适来言曰：「进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173045_comment'></div>执事礼以俟士，明以伸法令之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173045_comment'></div>适也<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173045", 1173045, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>寓籍</span>于此，既往而受赐矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173045_comment'></div>尚自思曰：巩材鄙而性野，其敢进也欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173045_comment'></div>又自解曰：执事之所以然，伸法令之疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173045_comment'></div>伸法令之疑者，不为一人行，不为一人废，为天下公也，虽愚且野可进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173045_comment'></div>是以敢具书而布其心焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173045_comment'></div>伏惟不罪其以为烦而察之，赐之一言而进之，则幸甚幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1173045_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年5月</a>　曾巩作《上蔡学士书》，论谏官之制，并向蔡襄荐王安石。<div id='poem_1173042' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173042' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173042?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上蔡学士书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173042")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173042_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173042'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173042'>庆历四年五月日，南丰曾巩谨再拜上书谏院学士执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173042_comment'></div>朝廷自更两府谏官来，言事者皆为天下贺得人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173042_comment'></div>贺之诚当也，顾不贺则不可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173042_comment'></div>巩尝静思天下之事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173042_comment'></div>以天子而行圣贤之道，不古圣贤然者否也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173042_comment'></div>然而古今难之者，岂无异焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173042_comment'></div>邪人以不己利也，则怨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173042_comment'></div>庸人以己不及也，则忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173042_comment'></div>怨且忌，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173042", 1173042, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>造饰</span>以行其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173042_comment'></div>人主不寤其然，则贤者必疏而殆矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173042_comment'></div>故圣贤之道，往往而不行也，东汉之末是已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173042_comment'></div>今主上至圣，虽有庸人、邪人，将不入其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173042_comment'></div>然今日两府谏官之所陈，上已尽白而信邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173042_comment'></div>抑未然邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173042_comment'></div>其已尽白而信也，尚惧其造之未深，临事而差也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173042_comment'></div>其未尽白而信也，则当屡进而陈之，待其尽白而信，造之深，临事而不差而后已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173042_comment'></div>成此美者，其不在于谏官乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173042_comment'></div>古之制善矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173042_comment'></div>夫天子所尊而听者宰相也，然接之有时，不得数且久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173042_comment'></div>惟谏官随宰相入奏事，奏已，宰相退归中书，盖常然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173042_comment'></div>至于谏官，出入言动相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173042", 1173042, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>缀接</span>，蚤暮相亲，未闻其当退也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173042_comment'></div>如此，则事之得失，蚤思之不待暮而以言可也，暮思之不待越宿而以言可也，不谕则极辨之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173042_comment'></div>屡进而陈之，宜莫若此之详且实也，虽有邪人、庸人，不得而间焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173042_comment'></div>故曰：成此美者，其不在于谏官乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173042_comment'></div>今谏官之见也有间矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173042_comment'></div>其不能朝夕上下议亦明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173042_comment'></div>禁中之与居，女妇而已尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173042_comment'></div>舍是则寺人而已尔，庸者、邪者而已尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173042_comment'></div>其于冥冥之间，议论之际，岂不易行其间哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173042_comment'></div>如此，则巩见今日两府谏官之危，而未见国家天下之安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173042_comment'></div>度执事亦已念之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173042_comment'></div>茍念之，则在使谏官侍臣复其职而已，安有不得其职而在其位者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173042_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173042_comment'></div>自汉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1173042", 1173042, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>降戾</span>后世，士之盛未有若唐太宗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173042_comment'></div>自唐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1173042", 1173042, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>降戾</span>后世，士之盛亦未有若今也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173042_comment'></div>唐太宗有士之盛而能成治功，今有士之盛，能行其道，则前数百年之弊无不除也，否则后数百年之患，将又兴也，可不为深念乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173042_comment'></div>巩生于远，厄于无衣食以事亲，今又将集于乡学，当圣贤之时，不得抵京师而一言，故敢布于执事，并书所作通论杂文一编以献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173042_comment'></div>伏惟执事，庄士也，不拒人之言者也，愿赐观览，以其意少施焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173042_comment'></div>巩之友王安石者，文甚古，行称其文，虽已得科名，然居今知安石者尚少也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173042_comment'></div>彼诚自重，不愿知于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173042_comment'></div>然如此人，古今不常有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173042_comment'></div>如今时所急，虽无常人千万不害也，顾如安石，此不可失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173042_comment'></div>执事傥进之于朝廷，其有补于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173042_comment'></div>亦书其所为文一编进左右，庶知巩之非妄也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1173042_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　范仲淹于羁旅中见曾巩，欲收曾巩为门生，曾巩作《上范资政书》<div id='poem_1173044' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173044' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173044?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上范资政书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173044")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173044_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173044'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173044'>资政给事：夫学者之于道，非处其大要之难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173044_comment'></div>至其晦明消长、弛张用舍之际，而事之有委曲几微，欲其取之于心而无疑，发之于行而无择，推而通之则万变而不穷，合而言之则一致而已，是难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173044_comment'></div>难如是，故古之人有断其志，虽各合于义，极其分，以谓备圣人之道，则未可者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173044_comment'></div>自伊尹、伯夷、展禽之徒所不免如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173044_comment'></div>而孔子之称其门人，曰德行、文学、政事、言语，亦各殊科，彼其材于天下之选，可谓盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173044_comment'></div>然独至于颜氏之子，乃曰：「用之则行，舍之则藏，唯我与尔有是夫」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173044_comment'></div>是所谓难者久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173044_comment'></div>故圣人之所教人者，至其晦明消长、弛张用舍之际，极大之为无穷，极小之为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173044", 1173044, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>至隐</span>，虽他经靡不同其意，然尤委曲其变于《易》，而重复显著其义于卦爻彖象系辞之文，欲人之可得诸心而惟所用之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173044_comment'></div>然有《易》以来，自孔子之时，以至于今，得此者颜氏而已尔，孟氏而已尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173044_comment'></div>二氏而下，孰为得之者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173044_comment'></div>甚矣，其难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173044_comment'></div>若巩之鄙，有志于学，常惧乎其明之不远，其力之不强，而事之有不得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173044_comment'></div>既自求之，又欲交天下之贤以辅而进，繇其磨砻灌溉以持其志、养其气者有矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173044_comment'></div>其临事而忘、其自反而馁者，岂得已哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173044_comment'></div>则又惧乎陷溺其心，以至于老而无所庶几也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173044_comment'></div>尝閒而论天下之士，豪杰不世出之材，数百年之间未有盛于斯时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173044_comment'></div>而造于道，尤可谓宏且深，更天下之事，尤可谓详且博者，未有过阁下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173044_comment'></div>故阁下尝履天下之任矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173044_comment'></div>事之有天下非之，君子非之，而阁下独曰是者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173044_comment'></div>天下是之，君子是之，而阁下独曰非者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173044_comment'></div>及其既也，君子皆自以为不及，天下亦曰范公之守是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173044_comment'></div>则阁下之于道何如哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173044_comment'></div>当其至于事之几微，而讲之以《易》之变化，其岂有未尽者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173044_comment'></div>夫贤乎天下者，天下之所慕也，况若巩者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173044_comment'></div>故愿闻议论之详，而观所以应于万事者之无穷，庶几<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173044", 1173044, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>自寤</span>以得其所难得者，此巩之心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173044_comment'></div>然阁下之位可谓贵矣，士之愿附者可谓众矣，使巩也不自别于其间，岂独非巩之志哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173044_comment'></div>亦阁下之所贱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173044_comment'></div>故巩不敢为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173044_comment'></div>不意阁下欲收之而教焉，而辱召之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173044_comment'></div>巩虽自守，岂敢固于一邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173044_comment'></div>故进于门下，而因自叙其所愿与所志，以献左右，伏惟赐省察焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1173044_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　南丰兴学，曾巩代父作《南丰县兴学记》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《代人上石允书》<div id='poem_1173075' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173075' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173075?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代人上石中允书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173075")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173075_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173075'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173075'>人之去教化，不为盗也其几矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173075_comment'></div>数十百年，公卿大夫无完人，即材与艺，或薄于自修；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173075_comment'></div>即今之所谓自修，或薄于材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173075_comment'></div>细谨细忠，今之所谓自修也，大节大行不如是其已也，而能者止于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173075_comment'></div>故自朝廷至于四方无治官，上虽有善意善令不能行，民之穷滨于死无所告，天下之未治无他焉，由是而已耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173075_comment'></div>群下相渐，靡靡成俗，所为戾道，过计者乃取士于是焉，其无得也明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173075_comment'></div>一有骇而动之者，不比而盗也其几矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173075_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173075_comment'></div>可怪也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173075_comment'></div>可惧也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173075_comment'></div>今者更贡举法，善矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173075_comment'></div>人相从观诏书，戾者矍然有意于惧，怠者幡然自强矣，数百年来未有此举也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173075_comment'></div>然吏趣修其文耳，未有能力行者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173075_comment'></div>士趣强其外耳，未有能心通者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173075_comment'></div>不心通，赏罚一不振焉，必解矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173075_comment'></div>有圣人作，不易是法矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173075_comment'></div>然而云尔何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173075_comment'></div>圣人之为教，以己为之先，以法制之助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173075_comment'></div>不以己为之先，虽有善制，圣人不能行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173075_comment'></div>今能为之先，不在于吾君与吾民之所耳目者，吾君固能为之先矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173075_comment'></div>吾民之所耳目者，朝则公卿大夫，外则长若师，然而可法者殆少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173075_comment'></div>太学，化枢也，得执事为之先，蔡学士过此，言太学之行渐行矣，诚甚盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173075_comment'></div>不识通之于心者为谁，而能广之于朝廷天下乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173075_comment'></div>某四年时太学生也，今者欲往而依执事，会学之令，不五百日，则不得举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173075_comment'></div>某贫，父母待某然后养，不蚤得往也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173075_comment'></div>今欲往焉，则恐后时不得举，则望旦夕而事亲者，毋所图焉，遂未能依执事而学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173075_comment'></div>某之所就亦鄙矣，所不足于心亦大矣，某岂肯屑然哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173075_comment'></div>顾诚有不得已，谨书所作通论杂文一编以献，并叙太学得执事之盛，以为天下望。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1173075_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173075'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷五二。又见黄希宪刻本卷一六。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173075_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《听琴序》<div id='poem_1173310' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173310' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173310?labeling=true' target='_blank'>听琴序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173310")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173310_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173310'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173310'>凡有贵于物者，岂特物不能胜之欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173310_comment'></div>抑亦无所待于物故也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173310_comment'></div>世之有学者名占一艺，苟不期于徇物，则亦足贵矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173310_comment'></div>然以自售，然后人得而贱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173310_comment'></div>故工于艺者，常恐人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173310", 1173310, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>羞薄</span>，则往往拂人之好，而自要其简重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173310_comment'></div>虽求之者愈勤，而拒之者愈坚，然不知人亦愈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173310", 1173310, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>羞薄</span>之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173310_comment'></div>琴之为艺，虽圣人所不废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173310_comment'></div>其制作之意，盖有所寓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173310_comment'></div>而至其所闻者，不出乎几席之间，而所感者常在乎沧浪之滨，崔嵬之颠，亦已至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173310_comment'></div>虽然，声自外入也，使闻于彼而应于此者犹且如此，况不自外入者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173310_comment'></div>故乐之实不在于器，而至于鼓之以尽神，则乐由中也明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173310_comment'></div>故闻其乐可以知其德，而德之有见于乐者，岂系于器哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173310_comment'></div>惟其未离于器也，故习之有曲，以至于有数，推之则将以得其志，又中于得其人，则器之所不及矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173310_comment'></div>故乐作而喜，曲终而悲，岂能易吾于须臾哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173310_comment'></div>若夫吾之心在于雁门，吾之目在于鸿鹄，则虽九奏于吾之前，犹不闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173310_comment'></div>故琴之作，有厌乎人之耳者，岂非自外入，无有久而不倦者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173310_comment'></div>虽然，吾尝学琴于师矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173310_comment'></div>反宫于脾，而圣亦不废也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173310_comment'></div>反商于肺，而义亦不废也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173310_comment'></div>反角于肝，而仁亦不废也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173310_comment'></div>反徵于心，而礼亦不废也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173310_comment'></div>反羽于肾，而智亦不废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173310_comment'></div>方其时也，非春也，求之于律则不中夹钟，物安得而生哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173310_comment'></div>非夏也，求之于律则不中蕤宾，物安得而长哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173310_comment'></div>非秋也，求之于律则不中南吕，物安得而敛哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173310_comment'></div>非冬也，求之于律则不中应钟，物安得而藏哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173310_comment'></div>故无出无内，无缓无急，无修无短，巧历不能尽其数，岂止于十九八六而已耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173310_comment'></div>故闻者无闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173310_comment'></div>其神之游，东不极于碣石，南不极于北户，西不极于流沙沈羽，北不极于令正之谷，则鸟何从而舞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173310_comment'></div>鱼何从而跃？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173310_comment'></div>六马何从而仰秣？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173310_comment'></div>景风何从而翔？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173310_comment'></div>庆云何从而浮？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173310_comment'></div>甘露何从而降？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173310_comment'></div>醴泉何从而出？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173310_comment'></div>吾之琴如是，则有耳者无所用其听，尚何厌之有哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173310_comment'></div>则凡贵者，且不足贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173310_comment'></div>故在郑则不淫也，在宋则不溺也，在卫则不烦也，在齐则不骄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173310_comment'></div>用之于祭祀，则鬼神亦莅乎其所矣，尚何烦于知音哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173310_comment'></div>若乃当春而叩商，及秋而叩角，当夏而叩羽，当冬而叩徵，虽知四时之行，在我未免乎有手动弦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173310_comment'></div>某人尝与巩适抚之金溪，因以琴称，而不知吾之琴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173310_comment'></div>某人茍知所存不在弦，所志不在声，然后吾之琴可得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173310_comment'></div>虽然，他日祭酒之堂，樽俎之宴，追三代之遗风，想舞雩之咏叹，使闻者若有所得，则庶几不愧于古人矣，尚何恨于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1173310", 1173310, "Clauses/125/Comments/0")'>羞薄</span>哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1173310_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《东津归催吴秀才寄酒》<div id='poem_220352' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220352' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220352?labeling=true' target='_blank'>东津归催吴秀才寄酒</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220352")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220352_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220352'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220352'>荒城懒出门常掩，春气欲归寒不敛。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220352_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220352'>东邻咫尺犹不到，况乃傍溪潭石险。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220352_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220352'>风光得暖才几日，不觉溪山碧于染。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220352_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220352'>欣然与客到溪岸，衣帻不避尘泥点。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220352_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220352'>谷花洲草各萌芽，高下迸生如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_220352", 220352, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>刻剡</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220352_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220352'>梅花开早今已满，若洗新妆竞妖脸。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220352_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220352'>柳条前日尚憔悴，时节与催还荏苒。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220352_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220352'>沙禽翅羽亦已好，争趁午暄浮翠潋。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220352_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220352'>从今物物已可爱，有酒便醉情何慊。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220352_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220352'>君厨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_220352", 220352, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>山杏</span>旧所识，速致百壶须滟滟。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220352_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220352'>心知万事难<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_220352", 220352, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>刻画</span>，惟有醉眠知不忝。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220352_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220352'>预愁酩酊苦太热，已令洒屋铺风簟。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220352_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220352'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_220352_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《上欧阳舍人书》，言当世之务。<div id='poem_1173041' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173041' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173041?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上欧阳舍人书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173041")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173041_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173041'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173041'>舍人先生：当世之急有三：一曰急听贤之为事，二曰急<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>裕民</span>之为事，三曰急力行之为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173041_comment'></div>一曰急听贤之为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173041_comment'></div>夫主之于贤，知之未可以已也，进之未可以已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173041_comment'></div>听其言，行其道于天下，然后可以已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173041_comment'></div>能听其言，行其道于天下，在其心之通且果也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173041_comment'></div>不得其通且果，未可以有为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173041_comment'></div>苟有为，犹膏肓之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>不治</span>，譬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>癃痹</span>之老也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173041_comment'></div>以古今治乱成败之理入告之，不解则极论之，其心既通也，以事之利害是非，请试择之，能择之，试请行之，其心既果也，然后可以有为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173041_comment'></div>其为计虽迟，其成大效于天下必速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173041_comment'></div>欲其如此，莫若朝夕出入在左右，而不使邪人、庸人近之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173041_comment'></div>朝夕出入在左右，侍臣之任也，议复之其可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173041_comment'></div>一不听，则再进而议之，再犹未也，则日进而议之，待其听而后已可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173041_comment'></div>置此虽有他事，未可以议也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173041_comment'></div>昔汉杀萧望之，是亦有罪焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173041_comment'></div>宣帝使之傅太子，其不以圣人之道导之邪，则何贤乎望之也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173041_comment'></div>其导之未信而止也，则望之不得无罪焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173041_comment'></div>为太子责备于师傅，不任其责也，则责备于侍臣而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173041_comment'></div>虽艰而勤，其可以已也欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173041_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>今世</span>贤士，上已知而进之矣，然未免于庸人、邪人杂然而处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173041_comment'></div>于事之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>益损</span>张弛有戾焉，不辨之则道不明，肆力而与之辨，未必全也，不全，则人之望已矣，是未易可忽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173041_comment'></div>就其所能而为之，则如勿为而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173041_comment'></div>如是者，非主心通且果，则言未可望听，道未可望行于天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173041_comment'></div>寻其本，不如愚人之云尔，不可以有成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173041_comment'></div>二曰急<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>裕民</span>之为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173041_comment'></div>夫古以来可质也，未有民富且安而乱者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173041_comment'></div>其乱者，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>率常</span>民贫而且不安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173041_comment'></div>天下为一，殆八、九十年矣，靡靡然食民之食者，兵佛老也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173041_comment'></div>或曰削之则怨且戾，是以执事望风惮言所以救之之策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173041_comment'></div>今募民之集而为兵者，择旷土而使之耕，暇而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>肄武</span>，递入而为卫，因弛旧兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173041_comment'></div>佛老也，止今之为者，旧徒之尽也不日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173041_comment'></div>是不召怨与戾而易行者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173041_comment'></div>则又量上之用而去其浮，是大费可从而减也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173041_comment'></div>推而行之，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>末利</span>可弛，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>本务</span>可兴，富且安可几而待也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173041_comment'></div>不然，恐今之民一二岁而为盗者，莫之能御也，可不为大忧乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173041_comment'></div>他议纷纷，非救民之务也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173041_comment'></div>求救民之务，莫大于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173041_comment'></div>不谋此，能致富且安乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173041_comment'></div>否也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173041_comment'></div>三曰急力行之为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173041_comment'></div>夫臣民、父子、兄弟、夫妇、朋友，皆不为其所宜乱之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173041_comment'></div>今之士悖理甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173041_comment'></div>故官之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>不治</span>不易而使能，则国家虽有善制不行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173041_comment'></div>欲易而使能，则一之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173041_comment'></div>以士之如此，而况民之没没，与一有骇而动之者，欲其效死而不为非，不得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173041_comment'></div>今者更贡举法数十百年弊，可谓盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173041_comment'></div>书下之日，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>戾夫</span>惧，怠夫自励，近世未有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173041_comment'></div>然此尚不过强之于耳目而已，未能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/132/Comments/0")'>心化</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173041_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>心化</span>，赏罚一不振焉，必解矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173041_comment'></div>欲洽之于其心，则顾上与大臣之所力行如何尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173041_comment'></div>不求之本，斯已矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173041_comment'></div>求之本，斯不可不急也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173041_comment'></div>或曰适时而已耳，是不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173041_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/144/Comments/0")'>今时</span>谓之耻且格焉，不急其本可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173041_comment'></div>不如是，未见适于时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173041_comment'></div>凡此三务，是其最急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173041_comment'></div>又有号令之不一，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/151/Comments/0")'>任责</span>之不明，当亦速变者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1173041_comment'></div>至于学者策之经义当矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1173041_comment'></div>然九经言数十万馀，注义累倍之，旁又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/156/Comments/0")'>贯联</span>他书，学而记之乎，虽明者不能尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1173041_comment'></div>今欲通策之，责人之所必不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1173041_comment'></div>茍然，则学者必不精，而得人必滥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1173041_comment'></div>欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/164/Comments/0")'>反之</span>，则莫若使之人占一经也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1173041_comment'></div>夫经于天地人事，无不备者也，患不能通，岂患通之而少邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1173041_comment'></div>况诗赋论兼出于他经，世务待子史而后明，是学者亦无所不习也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1173041_comment'></div>此数者，近皆为蔡学士道之，蔡君深信，望先生共成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1173041_comment'></div>孟子称：乡邻斗，被发缨冠而往救之则惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1173041_comment'></div>然观孟子周行天下，欲以其道及人，至其不从而去，犹曰：王庶几改之，则必召予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1173041_comment'></div>此其心汲汲何如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1173041_comment'></div>何独孟子然？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1173041_comment'></div>孔子亦然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1173041_comment'></div>而云云者，盖以谓颜子既不得位，不可以不任天下之事责之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1173041_comment'></div>故曰：「禹、稷、颜子易地则皆然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1173041_comment'></div>是也，不得位则止乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1173041_comment'></div>不止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1173041_comment'></div>其止者，盖止于极也，非谓士者固若狙猿然，无意于物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1173041_comment'></div>况巩于先生，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/202/Comments/0")'>师仰</span>已久，不宜有间，是以忘其贱而言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1173041_comment'></div>愿赐之采择，以其意少而施焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1173041_comment'></div>巩闲居江南，所为文无愧于四年时，所欲施于事者，亦有待矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1173041_comment'></div>然亲在忧患中，祖母日愈老，细弟妹多，无以资衣食，恐不能就其学，况欲行其他耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1173041_comment'></div>今者欲奉亲数千里而归先生，会须就<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/218/Comments/0")'>州学</span>，欲入太学，则日已迫，遂弃而不顾，则望以充父母养者，无所勉从，此岂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/224/Comments/0")'>得已</span>哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1173041_comment'></div>韩吏部云：诚使屈原、孟轲、扬雄、司马迁、相如进于是选，仆知其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/227/Comments/0")'>怀惭</span>，乃不自进而已尔，此言可念也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1173041_comment'></div>失贤师长之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/230/Comments/0")'>镌切</span>，而与众人处，其不陷于小人也其几矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1173041_comment'></div>早而兴，夜而息，欲须臾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/235/Comments/0")'>惬然</span>于心不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1173041_comment'></div>先生方用于主上，日入谋议天下，日夜待为相，其无意于巩乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1173041_comment'></div>故附所作通论杂文一编、先祖述文一卷以献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1173041_comment'></div>先祖困以殁，其行事非先生传之不显，愿假辞刻之神道碑，敢自抚州佣仆夫往伺于门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1173041_comment'></div>伏惟不罪其愚而许之，以永赉其子孙，则幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1173041_comment'></div>巩之友王安石，文甚古，行甚称文，虽已得科名，居今知安石者尚少也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1173041_comment'></div>彼诚自重，不愿知于人，尝与巩言：「非先生无足知我也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1173041_comment'></div>如此人古今不常有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1173041_comment'></div>如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1173041", 1173041, "Clauses/258/Comments/0")'>今时</span>所急，虽无常人千万不害也，顾如安石不可失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1173041_comment'></div>先生傥言焉，进之于朝廷，其有补于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1173041_comment'></div>亦书其所为文一编，进左右，幸观之，庶知巩之非妄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1173041_comment'></div>鄙心惓惓，其大抵虽如此，其详可得而具邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1173041_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1173041_comment'></div>巩再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_94_1173041_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩欲奉亲归欧阳修，会须就州学，欲入太学，遂罢。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩向欧阳修献所作通论杂文一编，先祖述文一卷，并请欧阳修撰祖父曾致尧神道碑文。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩再向欧阳修荐王安石，并书王安石所为文一编献上。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《路中对月》<div id='poem_220512' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220512' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220512?labeling=true' target='_blank'>路中对月</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220512")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220512_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220512'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220512'>山川困游人，而不断归梦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220512'>其馀惟日月，朝夕南北共。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220512'>日光驱人身，扰扰逐群动。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220512'>乡思须暂忘，世事那止重。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220512'>岂如月可喜，露坐息倥偬。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220512'>清明入襟怀，万里绝纤霿。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220512'>爱之不能飧，但以目睛送。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220512'>想知吾在庐，皎皎上修栋。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220512'>慈亲坐高堂，切切儿女众。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220512'>怜其到吾前，不使降帷幪。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220512'>岂不映时节，荏苒更季仲。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220512'>而我去方急，其能计归鞚。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220512'>我非土木为，耳目异聋瞢。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220512'>念之曷由安，肠胃百忧中。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220512'>何言月可喜，喜意亦有用。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220512'>为其同此时，水木光可弄。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_220512'>犹胜梦中事，记之聊一诵。<div id='poem_sentence_16_220512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_220512'></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_220512_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩居临川，作杂议十篇《太学》、《议茶》、《议酒》、《财用》、《兵乘一》、《议钱上》、《议钱下》、《议仓》、《废官》、《黄河》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《麻姑山送南城尉罗君》<div id='poem_220492' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220492' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220492?labeling=true' target='_blank'>麻姑山送南城尉罗君</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220492")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220492_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220492'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220492'>麻姑之路摩青天，苍苔白石松风寒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220492'>峭壁直上无攀援，悬磴十步九屈盘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220492'>上有锦绣百顷之平田，山中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_220492", 220492, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>遗人</span>耕紫烟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220492'>又有白玉万仞之飞泉，喷崖直泻蛟龙渊。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220492'>丰堂广殿何言言，阶脚插入斗牛间。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220492'>樛枝古木不记年，空槎枵然卧道边。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220492'>幽花自婵娟，林深为谁妍？<div id='poem_sentence_6_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220492'>但见尘消境静翔白鹤，吟清猿，雏禽乳鹿往往嗥荒颠。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220492'>却视来径如缘絙，千重万叠穷岩峦。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220492'>下有荆吴粟粒之群山，又有瓯闽一发之平川。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220492'>弈棋纵衡远近布城郭，鱼鳞参差高下分冈原。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220492'>千奇万异可意得，墨笔尽秃谁能传？<div id='poem_sentence_11_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220492'>丈夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_220492", 220492, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>舒卷</span>要<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_220492", 220492, "Clauses/25/Comments/1")'>宏达</span>，世路<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_220492", 220492, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>俯仰</span>多拘牵。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220492'>偶来到此醒心目，便欲洗耳辞嚣喧。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220492'>罗夫子，一日远补东南官。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220492'>爱此层崖峻壑之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_220492", 220492, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>秀发</span>，开轩把酒可纵观。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_220492'>喜此披霄插汉之夐起，出门举足得往还。<div id='poem_sentence_16_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_220492'>罗夫子，一尉龙蛇方屈蟠。<div id='poem_sentence_17_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_220492'>此邦人人衣食足，阖境年年枹鼓闲。<div id='poem_sentence_18_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_220492'>几案<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_220492", 220492, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>剸裁</span>得休暇，山水登蹑遗纷烦。<div id='poem_sentence_19_220492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_220492'>我行送之思故园，引领南望心长悬。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_220492_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩在抚城中香楠峰兴鲁书院讲学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《代上皇帝表》<div id='poem_1172984' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172984' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172984?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代上皇帝表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172984")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172984_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172984'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172984'>右臣窃以上圣之心遍应万物，至公之道无隐人情，是以惓惓之私，辄敢疏露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172984_comment'></div>伏念臣在郎官中，尝持使节，参省计，皆陛下选于众流，拔而授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172984_comment'></div>寻值潭州阙人，圣恩以臣出守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172984_comment'></div>及在任一年有馀，蒙差龙图阁直学士刘某为代，未赴朝参，就移今所领郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172984_comment'></div>臣于两处治所，奉承陛下宽仁之化，拊循吏民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172984_comment'></div>凡辨狱讼，未尝专信掾属，必经心手，得情应法，乃敢区处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172984_comment'></div>至于督赋租、定徭使，一一又与簿书期会无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172984_comment'></div>在潭州日，阅买茶荈调，计金帛佐大农之用，前后累万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172984_comment'></div>今任之中，建置场冶，采取金货，亦及二千馀两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172984_comment'></div>漕发久岁积粟，数过二十万石，出当郡高源，水路至洪州，便于转输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172984_comment'></div>又于营屯，甲兵之备皆使缮修，无有愆阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172984_comment'></div>计谋虽拙，为效亦勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172984_comment'></div>而伏思臣前所领潭州，于三湘之地为一都会，朝廷择守，不与三司判官、转运使差遣相视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172984_comment'></div>今于临川，乃江外支郡，与旧任顿殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172984_comment'></div>在臣之心，岂敢有所不足？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172984_comment'></div>然当陛下至治之朝，未尝轻退一士，是以曾形奏述，上渎宸慈，乞以臣两任，庆历二年五月知潭州，至今任，通计参于日月，就移荆湖北一路，一次差遣，或赐臣除替，许至阙廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172984_comment'></div>蝼蚁之诚，未蒙省答，辄敢再干旒扆，傥非陛下哀而念之，虽没齿何望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172984_comment'></div>且臣赋性颛蒙，能行无异，自束发为吏，至今三十四年，惟以清苦自守，忠勤自勉，未尝须臾敢懈，亦无毫发之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172984_comment'></div>故在班列之中，实为众议以此见称，非敢诬罔天听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172984_comment'></div>傥若得允所乞，复效惰志，则草茅之质，万死为足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172984_comment'></div>伏惟陛下日星之照，下饰幽微；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172984_comment'></div>天地之仁，平施万汇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172984_comment'></div>即其言而观其意，必当察而怜之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1172984_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《雪咏》<div id='poem_220490' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220490' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220490?labeling=true' target='_blank'>雪咏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220490")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220490_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220490'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220490'>雪花好洁白，不待咏说知。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220490'>区区取相似，今古同一辞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220490'>薛能比众作，小去笔墨畦。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220490'>谁能出千载，为雪立传碑？<div id='poem_sentence_3_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220490'>四座且勿歌，听我白雪诗。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220490'>天地于降雪，其功大艰难。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220490'>去年暖风日，冬在春已还。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220490'>山屏尽深碧，危溜声亦潺。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220490'>草萌各已动，梅花开最繁。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220490'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_220490", 220490, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>炉火</span>殆可谢，衣絮谁复言？<div id='poem_sentence_9_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220490'>推排臈已过，一变天更寒。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220490'>飘风动木石，激射难出关。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220490'>深房拥高燎，领肘曾不温。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220490'>仰视云压叠，垂欲藉屋山。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220490'>元气不复呵，飞鸟折羽翰。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220490'>谁排河汉流，欲堕莽苍间。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_220490'>道为黑风遮，凝冻无住著。<div id='poem_sentence_16_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_220490'>纷纷成片缕，六出非刻削。<div id='poem_sentence_17_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_220490'>初时漏馀滴，杂雨犹可恶。<div id='poem_sentence_18_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_220490'>迤逦纵飞洒，态状不可名。<div id='poem_sentence_19_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_220490'>或稀若有待，或密似相萦。<div id='poem_sentence_20_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_220490'>或弱久宛转，或狂自轩腾。<div id='poem_sentence_21_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_220490'>群来信汗漫，孤飘亦零丁。<div id='poem_sentence_22_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_220490'>屋角初渐斑，瓦沟忽皆平。<div id='poem_sentence_23_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_220490'>坳洼一已满，茅茨压将倾。<div id='poem_sentence_24_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_220490'>树木遍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_220490", 220490, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>封裹</span>，冈山助峥嵘。<div id='poem_sentence_25_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_220490'>阶除断纤秽，池台有馀清。<div id='poem_sentence_26_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_220490'>流尘寂已掩，物象窅皆明。<div id='poem_sentence_27_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_220490'>厨烟或中镵，里表仍孤擎。<div id='poem_sentence_28_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_220490'>啄草鸟雀踪，篆字遗纵横。<div id='poem_sentence_31_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_220490'>引望谁倚楼，秀色乱目睛。<div id='poem_sentence_33_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_220490'>柔茵坐中堂，谁问公与卿。<div id='poem_sentence_36_220490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220508_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220508'>伯益于文敏且颛，字向纸上生戈鋋。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220508_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
