ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　范仲淹有书及绢致曾巩，曾巩作《答范资政书》致谢。<div id='poem_1173050' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173050' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173050?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答范资政书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173050")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173050_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173050'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173050'>巩启：王寺丞至，蒙赐手书及绢等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173050_comment'></div>伏以阁下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173050", 1173050, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>贤德</span>之盛，而所施为在于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173050_comment'></div>巩虽不熟于门，然于阁下之事，或可以知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173050_comment'></div>若巩之鄙，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173050", 1173050, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>窃伏</span>草茅，阁下于羁旅之中，一见而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173050_comment'></div>令巩有所自得者，尚未可以致阁下之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173050_comment'></div>况巩学不足以明先圣之意，识古今之变，材不足以任中人之事，行不足以无愧悔于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173050_comment'></div>而流落寄寓，无田畴屋庐匹夫之业，有奉养<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173050", 1173050, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>嫁送</span>百事之役，非可以责思虑之精，诏道德之进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173050_comment'></div>是皆无以致阁下之知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173050_comment'></div>而拜别期年之间，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173050", 1173050, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>相去</span>数千里之远，不意阁下犹记其人，而不为年辈爵德之间有以存之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173050_comment'></div>此盖阁下乐得天下之英材，异于世俗之常见，而如巩者亦不欲弃之，故以及此，幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173050_comment'></div>夫古之人，以王公之势而下贫贱之士者，盖惟其常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173050_comment'></div>而今之布衣之交，及其穷达毫发之殊，然相弃者有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173050_comment'></div>则士之愚且贱，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173050", 1173050, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>积素</span>之义，而为当世有大<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173050", 1173050, "Clauses/41/Comments/1")'>贤德</span>、大名位君子先之以礼，是岂不于衰薄之中，为有激于天下哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173050_comment'></div>则其感服，固宜如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173050_comment'></div>仰望门下，不任区区之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1173050_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年5月4日</a>　刘伯声归东明，曾巩作《送刘希声序》赠之。<div id='poem_1173132' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173132' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173132?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送刘希声序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年5月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173132")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173132_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173132'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173132'>东明刘希声来临川，见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173132_comment'></div>其貌勉于礼，其言勉于义，其行亦然，其久亦坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173132_comment'></div>其读书为辞章日盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173132_comment'></div>从予游三年，予爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173132_comment'></div>今年庆历五年，还其乡，过予别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173132_comment'></div>与之言曰：东明，汴邑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173132_comment'></div>子之行，问道之所向者，以告子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173132_comment'></div>子也一趋焉而不息，至乎尔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173132_comment'></div>茍为一从焉，一违焉，虽不息，决不至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173132_comment'></div>子也好问，圣人之道，亦如是而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173132_comment'></div>五月四日序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173132_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年5月</a>　曾巩得蔡襄书，蔡襄对曾巩奖爱重叠。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　欧阳修等既去，曾巩感愤作《忆昨诗》一篇，献之欧、蔡。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　欧阳修等既去，曾巩作《杂说》三篇，献之欧、蔡。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　欧阳修等既去，曾巩作《上欧蔡书》，献之欧、蔡。<div id='poem_1173068' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173068' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173068?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上欧蔡书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173068")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173068_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173068'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173068'>巩少读《唐书》及《贞观政要》，见魏郑公、王圭之徒在太宗左右，事之小大，无不议论谏诤，当时邪人庸人相参者少，虽有如封伦、李义府辈，太宗又能识而疏之，故其言无不信听，卒能成贞观太平，刑置<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173068", 1173068, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>不以</span>，居成、康上，未尝不反复欣慕，继以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173068", 1173068, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>嗟唶</span>，以谓三代君臣不知曾有如此周旋议论否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173068_comment'></div>虽皋陶、禹、稷与唐舜上下谋谟载于书者，亦未有若此委曲备具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173068_comment'></div>颇意三代唐舜去今时远，其时虽有谋议如贞观间，或尚过之，而其史不尽存，故于今无所闻见，是不可知，所不敢臆定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173068_comment'></div>繇汉以降至于陈、隋，复繇高宗以降至于五代，其史甚完，其君臣无如此谋议决也，故其治皆出贞观下，理势然尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173068_comment'></div>窃自恨不幸不生于其时，亲见其事，歌颂推说，以饱足其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173068_comment'></div>又恨不得升降进退于其间，与之往复议论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173068_comment'></div>自长以来，则好问当世事，所见闻士大夫不少，人人惟一以茍且畏慎阴拱默处为故，未尝有一人见当世事仅若毛发而肯以身任之，不为回避计惜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173068_comment'></div>况所系安危治乱有未可立睹，计谋有未可立效者，其谁肯奋然迎为之虑而己当之邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173068_comment'></div>则又谓所欣慕者已矣，数千百年间，不可复及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173068_comment'></div>昨者天子赫然独见于万世之表，既更两府，复引二公为谏官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173068_comment'></div>见所条下及四方人所传道，知二公在上左右，为上论治乱得失，群臣忠邪，小大无所隐，不为锱铢计惜，以避怨忌毁骂谗构之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173068_comment'></div>窃又奋起，以谓从古以来，有言责者自任其事，未知有如此周详悃至，议论未知有如此之多者否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173068_comment'></div>虽郑公、王圭又能过是耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173068_comment'></div>今事虽不合，亦足暴之万世，而使邪者惧，懦者有所树矣，况合乎否，未可必也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173068_comment'></div>不知所谓数百千年已矣不可复有者，今幸遇而见之，其心欢喜震动，不可比说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173068_comment'></div>日夜庶几，虽有邪人、庸人如封、李者，上必斥而远之，惟二公之听，致今日之治居贞观之上，令巩小者得歌颂推说以饱足其心，大者得出于其间，吐片言片辞以托名于千万世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173068_comment'></div>是所望于古者不负，且令后世闻今之盛，疑唐舜、三代不及远甚，与今之疑唐太宗时无异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173068_comment'></div>虽然，亦未尝不忧一日有于冥冥之中、议论之际而行谤者，使二公之道未尽用，故前以书献二公，先举是为言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173068_comment'></div>已而果然，二公相次出，两府亦更改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173068_comment'></div>而怨忌毁骂谗构之患，一日俱发，翕翕万状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173068_comment'></div>至于乘女子之隙，造非常之谤，而欲加之天下之大贤，不顾四方人议论，不畏天地鬼神之临己，公然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173068", 1173068, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>欺诬</span>，骇天下之耳目，令人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173068", 1173068, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>感愤</span>痛切，废食与寝，不知所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173068_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173068_comment'></div>二公之不幸，实疾首蹙额之民之不幸也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173068_comment'></div>虽然，君子之于道也，既得诸内，汲汲焉而务施之于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173068_comment'></div>汲汲焉务施之于外，在我者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173068_comment'></div>务施之于外而有可有不可，在彼者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173068_comment'></div>在我者，姑肆力焉至于其极而后已也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173068_comment'></div>在彼者，则不可必得吾志焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173068_comment'></div>然君子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173068", 1173068, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>不以</span>必得之难而废其肆力者，故孔子之所说而聘者七十国，而孟子亦区区于梁、齐、滕、邾之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173068_comment'></div>为孔子者，聘六十九国尚未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173068_comment'></div>而孟子亦之梁、之齐二大国，不可，则犹俯而与邾、滕之君谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173068_comment'></div>其去齐也，迟迟而后出昼，其言曰：「王庶几改之，则必召予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173068_comment'></div>如用予，则岂惟齐民安，天下之民举安」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173068_comment'></div>观其心若是，岂以一不合而止哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173068_comment'></div>诚不若是，亦无以为孔孟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173068_comment'></div>今二公固一不合者也，其心岂不曰「天子庶几召我而用之」，如孟子之所云乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173068_comment'></div>肆力焉于其所在我者，而任其所在彼者，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1173068", 1173068, "Clauses/146/Comments/0")'>不以</span>必得之难而已，莫大于斯时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173068_comment'></div>况今天子仁恕聪明，求治之心未尝怠，天下一归，四方诸侯承号令奔走之不暇，二公之言，如朝得于上，则夕被于四海，夕得于上，则不越宿而被于四海，岂与聘七十国、游梁、齐、邾、滕之区区难艰比耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173068_comment'></div>姑有待而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173068_comment'></div>此非独巩之望，乃天下之望，而二公所宜自任者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173068_comment'></div>岂不谓然乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173068_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1173068", 1173068, "Clauses/163/Comments/0")'>感愤</span>之不已，谨成《忆昨诗》一篇，《杂说》三篇，粗道其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173068_comment'></div>后二篇并他事，因亦写寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173068_comment'></div>此皆人所厌闻，不宜为二公道，然欲启告觉悟天下之可告者，使明知二公志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173068_comment'></div>次亦使邪者庸者见之，知世有断然自守者，不从己于邪，则又庶几发于天子视听，有所开益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173068_comment'></div>使二公之道行，则天下之嗷嗷者，举被其赐，是亦为天下计，不独于二公发也，则二公之道何如哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173068_comment'></div>尝窃思更贡举法，责之累日于学，使学者不待乎按天下之籍，而盛须土著以待举行，悖者不能籍以进，此历代之思虑所未及，善乎，莫与为善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173068_comment'></div>故诗中善学尤具，伏惟赐省察焉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1173068_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年夏</a>　曾巩得疾，至冬益甚。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　曾巩葬祖母、亡母于南丰，王安石撰《曾公夫人万年太君黄氏墓志铭》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《之南丰道上寄介甫》<div id='poem_220340' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220340' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220340?labeling=true' target='_blank'>之南丰道上寄介甫</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220340")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220340_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220340'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220340'>应逮冒烦暑，驱驰山水间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220340'>泥泉沃渴肺，沙风吹汗颜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220340'>疲骖喘沫白，殆仆负肩殷。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220340'>仰嗟旱云高，俯爱芳陂潺。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220340'>空邮降尘榻，净馆排霞关。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220340'>城隍壮形势，冈谷来回环。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220340'>红芰姹相照，翠树郁可攀。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220340'>野苗杂青黄，雨露施尚悭。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220340'>巫觋谒群望，箫鼓鸣空山。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220340'>忧农非吾职，望岁窃所叹。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220340'>憩当午日烈，行瞻月初弯。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220340'>星斗弄光彩，罗络灶火斑。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220340'>跋履虽云倦，桑梓得暂还。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220340'>林僧授馆舍，田客攀鞍镮。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220340'>吾心本皎皎，彼诟徒㘖㘖。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220340'>方投定鉴照，即使征马班。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_220340'>相期木兰楫，荡漾穷川湾。<div id='poem_sentence_16_220340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_220340'></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_220340_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　王安石作《答子固南丰道中所寄》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《秋怀》<div id='poem_220442' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220442' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220442?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秋怀</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220442")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220442_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220442'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220442'>天地四时谁主张，纵使群阴入风日。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220442'>日光在天已苍凉，风气吹人更憀慄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220442'>树木惨惨颜色衰，燕雀啾啾群侣失。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220442'>我有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_220442", 220442, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>愁轮</span>行我肠，颠倒回环不能律。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220442'>我本孜孜学《诗》、《书》，《诗》、《书》与今岂同术？<div id='poem_sentence_4_220442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220442'>智虑过人祇自雠，闻见于时未裨一。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220442'>片心皎皎事乖背，众醉冥冥势淩突。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220442'>出门<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_220442", 220442, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>榛棘</span>不可行，终岁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_220442", 220442, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>蒿藜</span>尚谁恤？<div id='poem_sentence_7_220442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220442'>远梦频迷忆故人，客被初寒卧沉疾。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220442'>将相公侯虽不为，消长穷通岂须诘？<div id='poem_sentence_9_220442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220442'>圣贤穰穰力可攀，安能俯心为苟屈？<div id='poem_sentence_10_220442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220442'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_220442_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年秋</a>　曾巩居临川，作《答蔡正言》<div id='poem_1173070' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173070' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173070?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答蔡正言书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173070")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173070_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173070'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173070'>某顿首再拜启：孟秋犹热，伏惟知府正言学士尊体动止万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173070_comment'></div>五月中，伏奉所赐手教，奖爱重叠，且日策之不已，必至乎世马之所不能至者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173070_comment'></div>某材性下下，不能任此，实恐期之大过，不知其为愧且惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173070_comment'></div>执事自言在闽，于身无不如意，诚如来谕，然执事之素所自任与人之望执事，则固异此，此愚心之所以惓惓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173070_comment'></div>卒曰：作州以来，自以食其食者空厥职，蚤夜以之，诚理之所当尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173070_comment'></div>夫古之以道事君者，不可则去之，假如于鲁，则去而之卫，于卫则去而之晋、之秦无不可也，不去其国则归焉可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173070_comment'></div>今之以道事君者，不可则去而无所之，归而无所托也，使贤者曷所向乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173070_comment'></div>去朝廷则州郡矣，在州郡亦各守其守，不空食其食，是亦自处之宜也，与古之云其大任者其迹虽不同，其理岂异耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173070_comment'></div>故曰诚理之所当尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173070_comment'></div>自南出者，亦人人赞执事之治，以为莫及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173070_comment'></div>此固不足论，彼知之施于此之宜，不知施于天下之无不宜，此无牵制难行，故难见也，则彼之不知也宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173070_comment'></div>况此岂能尽无牵制以出执事之所有哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173070_comment'></div>直就文法而为之耳，已足出一世，矧极执事之意耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173070_comment'></div>是固无如之何，徒使憔悴者日企而望焉尔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1173070_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　欧阳修有书与曾巩论氏族，并复去岁请撰次碑文事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　曾巩居临川，吴景初来视，因追为其兄太初哀辞。作品：《吴太初哀辞》<div id='poem_1173411' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173411' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173411?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吴太初哀辞<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历六年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173411")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173411_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173411'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173411'>吴太初象先，今为单州单父人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173411_comment'></div>父祐之，从事广州，勤事死州外瘴沴地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173411_comment'></div>象先以丧至州下，亦死，年三十一岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173411_comment'></div>三试于礼部，不中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173411_comment'></div>余与之善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173411_comment'></div>后七年，其弟景初来，视余于临川，庆历六年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173411_comment'></div>余思象先，如初失之，为之追考其为人，为辞以哀之曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1173411'>越山如鳞兮远海而穷，势阻以偏兮毒潜其中，子之自重兮卒与此逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173411_comment'></div>我知子初兮其父之从，为其子孤兮吾未之恫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173411_comment'></div>孰神之苛兮又速子终，嗟嗟乎然兮维戚吾衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173411_comment'></div>维子之生兮顺祥于宫，父母之欢兮兄弟以雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173411_comment'></div>出与人游兮有守有容，其材甚良兮剞劂又工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173411_comment'></div>一日而弃兮卒偶蒿蓬，云谁不死兮万古一空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173411_comment'></div>吾辞传子兮无有春冬，子夭且屈兮犹寿而隆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1173411_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年春</a>　曾巩与赵宏游，是时肺病更恶，作《代书寄赵宏》<div id='poem_220353' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220353' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220353?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代书寄赵宏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220353")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220353_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220353'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220353'>忆承昨岁致书召，遂入江城同一笑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220353'>羸奴小马君所借，出犯朝寒鞅频掉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220353'>从来万事固已拙，况乃病敦颜不少。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220353'>去随众后已自枉，更苦世情非可料。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220353'>一心耿耿浪诚直，百口<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_220353", 220353, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>幡幡</span>竞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_220353", 220353, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>诃诮</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220353'>独君踊跃于我顾，譬于真玉火空烧。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220353'>别来未几岁云换，杨柳得春还窈窕。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220353'>东溪最好水已渌，桃李万株红白照。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220353'>当时病卧不能出，日倚东风想同调。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220353'>逡巡红白委地休，新叶可书阴可钓。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220353'>君持<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_220353", 220353, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>使传</span>入南师，忽领貔貅过蓬藋。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220353'>僧堂取酒就君饮，不觉乘欢盏频釂。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220353'>屋西明月过帘白，帘角有时飞熠耀。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220353'>明闻钲鼓催军发，共上高楼看旗旐。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220353'>日高行忽又别君，从此闭门谁可啸？<div id='poem_sentence_14_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220353'>秋风已尽始得书，喜听车轮返穷徼。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_220353'>身欲追随病未能，目断珊瑚遮海峤。<div id='poem_sentence_16_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_220353'>是时肺气壮更恶，日以沉冥忧不疗。<div id='poem_sentence_17_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_220353'>岂其艰苦天所悯，晚节幸值<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_220353", 220353, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>巫彭</span>妙。<div id='poem_sentence_18_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_220353'>放心已保性命在，握手犹惊骨骸峭。<div id='poem_sentence_19_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_220353'>今年霜霰虽未重，室冷尚无薪可燎。<div id='poem_sentence_20_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_220353'>一亩酸寒岂易言，局促不殊鱼在罩。<div id='poem_sentence_21_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_220353'>劳君书札数问讯，深愧薄材无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_220353", 220353, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>象肖</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_22_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_220353'>君心卓荦众未识，安得辨口闻廊庙。<div id='poem_sentence_23_220353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_220353'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_220353_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年春</a>　曾巩作《上欧阳龙图》，并奉祖母、亡母墓志一本，冀欧阳修垂览。<div id='poem_1173069' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173069' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173069?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上欧阳龙图书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173069")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173069_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173069'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173069'>某顿首再拜启：拜别后，其心焦然如渴饥不见饮食，于今三年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173069_comment'></div>得前年秋所赐教，后寻闻外补，欲寓一书以布惓惓之意，而其罪衅招祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173069_comment'></div>其冬祖母弃馆舍，哀摧之馀，仅存微息，至去秋复奉祖母、亡母葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173069_comment'></div>南丰贫贱也，乞丐以供事，故常奔走于道路，无须臾之暇能果其所欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173069_comment'></div>即又欲葬祖母后一至执事之侧，少慰其心，而自去夏属疾，至冬益甚，抵今未尽平复，未堪远役，又未能成其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173069_comment'></div>蹇拙之人，谋事多然，况欲行其它耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173069_comment'></div>然其心亦未尝去门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173069_comment'></div>岂独以愚蒙之质、动作语默与俗多违，而忌且怨谤之者多，而独大贤知遇之最深，欲成其区区乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173069_comment'></div>诚以素颇有志于古君子之道，忘其力之不足而趋之，求今有古君子之道而可为依归，舍门下安往哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173069_comment'></div>是以未尝一日而不在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173069_comment'></div>不识赐见亮否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173069_comment'></div>春暖，伏惟尊候万福，慎起居饮食以终福禄，此嗷嗷之民之望，而愚陋慕仰之愿，不胜至到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173069_comment'></div>祖母、亡母墓志，辄往一本，幸垂览焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1173069_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　曾巩屡得王安石书，王安石向曾巩称誉王回、王向，以为“有道君子”<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　曾巩作《再与欧阳舍人书》，荐王回、王向。<div id='poem_1173048' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173048' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173048?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再与欧阳舍人书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173048")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173048_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173048'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173048'>巩顷尝以王安石之文进左右，而以书论之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173048_comment'></div>其略曰：「巩之友有王安石者，文甚古，行称其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173048_comment'></div>虽已得科名，然居今知安石者尚少也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173048_comment'></div>彼诚自重，不愿知于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173048_comment'></div>然如此人，古今不常有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173048_comment'></div>如今时所急，虽无常人千万不害也，顾如安石，此不可失也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173048_comment'></div>书既达，而先生使河北，不复得报，然心未尝忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173048_comment'></div>近复有王回者、王向者，父平为御史，居京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173048_comment'></div>安石于京师得而友之，称之曰「有道君子也」，以书来言者三四，犹恨巩之不即见之也，则寓其文以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173048_comment'></div>巩与安石友，相信甚至，自谓无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173048", 1173048, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>愧负</span>于古之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173048_comment'></div>览二子之文，而思安石之所称，于是知二子者，必魁闳绝特之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173048_comment'></div>不待见而信之已至，怀不能隐，辄复闻于执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173048_comment'></div>三子者卓卓如此，树立自有法度，其心非苟求闻于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173048_comment'></div>而巩汲汲言者，非为三子者计也，盖喜得天下之材，而任圣人之道，与世之务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173048_comment'></div>复思若巩之浅狭滞拙，而先生遇之甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173048_comment'></div>惧己之不称，则欲得天下之材，尽出于先生之门，以为报之一端耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173048_comment'></div>伏惟垂意而察之，还以一言，使之是非有定焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173048_comment'></div>回、向文三篇，如别录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173048_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173048_comment'></div>巩再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1173048_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年5月</a>　潭州民反，赵宏护抚兵赴潭，曾巩作《送赵宏序》<div id='poem_1173134' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173134' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173134?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送赵宏序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173134")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173134_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173134'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173134'>荆民与蛮合为寇，潭旁数州被其害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173134_comment'></div>天子、宰相以潭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173134", 1173134, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>重镇</span>，守臣不胜任，为改用人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173134_comment'></div>又不胜，复改之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173134_comment'></div>守至，上书乞益兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173134_comment'></div>诏与抚兵三百，殿直天水赵君希道实护以往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173134_comment'></div>希道雅与予接，閒过予道潭之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173134_comment'></div>予曰：潭山川甲兵如何，食几何，贼众寡强弱如何，予不能知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173134_comment'></div>能知书，书之载，若潭事多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173134_comment'></div>或合数道之兵以数万，绝山谷而进，其势非不众且健也，然而卒歼焉者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173134_comment'></div>或单车独行，然而以克者相踵焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173134_comment'></div>顾其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173134", 1173134, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>义信</span>如何耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173134_comment'></div>致吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173134", 1173134, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>义信</span>，虽单车独行，寇可以为无事，龚遂、张纲、祝良之类是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173134_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173134", 1173134, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>义信</span>不足以致之，虽合数道之兵以数万，卒歼焉，适重寇耳，况致平邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173134_comment'></div>阳旻、裴行立之类是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173134_comment'></div>则兵不能致平，致平者，在太守身也明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173134_comment'></div>前之守者果能此，天子、宰相乌用易之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173134_comment'></div>必易之，为前之守者不能此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173134_comment'></div>今往者复曰：「乞益兵」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173134_comment'></div>何其与书之云者异邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173134_comment'></div>予忧潭民之重困也，寇之益张也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173134_comment'></div>往时潭吏与旁近郡蕲力胜贼者，暴骸者、戮降者有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173134_comment'></div>今之往者将特不为是而已邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173134_comment'></div>抑犹不免乎为是也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173134_comment'></div>天子、宰相任之之意其然邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173134_comment'></div>潭守近侍臣，使抚觇潭者，郎吏、御史、博士相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173134_comment'></div>为我谂其贤者曰：今之言古书往往曰迂，然书之事乃已试者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173134_comment'></div>事已试而施诸治，与时人之自用，孰为得失耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173134_comment'></div>愚言倘可以乎，潭之患，今虽细，然大中、咸通之间，南方之忧常剧矣，夫岂阶于大哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173134_comment'></div>为近臣、郎吏、御史、博士者，独得而不思也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173134_comment'></div>希道固喜事者，因其行，遂次第其语以送之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173134_comment'></div>庆历六年五月□日，曾巩序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1173134_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_7_220503'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_220503_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年8月</a>　王希辞而之京师，曾巩作《送王希字潜之序》赠之。<div id='poem_1173135' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173135' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173135?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送王希<span class='inlineComment2'>（字潜之）</span>序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173135")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173135_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173135'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173135'>巩庆历三年遇潜之于江西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173135_comment'></div>始其色接吾目，已其言接吾耳，久其行接吾心，不见其非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173135_comment'></div>吾爱也，从之游，四年间，巩于江西，三至焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173135_comment'></div>与之上滕王阁，泛东湖，酌马跑泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173135_comment'></div>最数游而久乃去者，大梵寺秋屏阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173135_comment'></div>阁之下百步为龙沙，沙之涯为章水，水之西涯横出为西山，皆江西之胜处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173135_comment'></div>江西之州中，凡游观之可望者，多西山之见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173135_comment'></div>见西山最正且尽者，唯此阁而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173135_comment'></div>使览登之美穷于此，乐乎，莫与为乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173135_comment'></div>况龙沙章水，水涯之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173135", 1173135, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>陆陵</span>，人家园林之属于山者莫不见，可见者不特西山而已，其为乐可胜道邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173135_comment'></div>故吾与潜之游其间，虽数且久不厌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173135_comment'></div>其计于心曰：奚独吾游之不厌也，将奉吾亲、托吾家于是州，而游于是，以欢吾亲之心而自慰焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173135_comment'></div>未能自致也，独其情旦而作，夜而息，无顷焉忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173135_comment'></div>病不游者期月矣，而潜之又遽去，其能不怃然邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173135_comment'></div>潜之之将去，以书来曰：子能不言于吾行邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173135_comment'></div>使吾道潜之之美也，岂潜之相望意也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173135_comment'></div>使以言相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173135", 1173135, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>镌切</span>邪，视吾言不足进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173135_comment'></div>视可进者，莫若道素与游之乐而惜其去，亦情之所不克已也，故云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173135_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173135_comment'></div>潜之之去而之京师，人知其将光显也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173135_comment'></div>光显者之心，于山水或薄，其异日肯尚从吾游于此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173135_comment'></div>其岂使吾独也乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173135_comment'></div>六年八月日序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1173135_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年8月</a>　曾巩居临川，作《仙都观三门记》<div id='poem_1173277' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173277' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173277?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仙都观三门记<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历六年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173277")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173277_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173277'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173277'>门之作，取备豫而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173277_comment'></div>然天子、诸侯、大夫各有制度，加于度则讥之，见于《易》、《礼记》、《春秋》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173277_comment'></div>其旁三门，门三涂，惟王城为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173277_comment'></div>老子之教行天下，其宫视天子或过焉，其门亦三之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173277_comment'></div>其备豫之意，盖本于《易》，其加于度，则知《礼》者所不能损，知《春秋》者所太息而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173277_comment'></div>甚矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173277_comment'></div>其法之蕃昌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173277_comment'></div>建昌军南城县麻姑山仙都观，世传麻姑于此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173277", 1173277, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>仙去</span>，故立祠在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173277_comment'></div>距城六七里，由绝岭而上，至其处，地反平宽衍沃，可宫可田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173277_comment'></div>其穫之多，与他壤倍，水旱之所不能灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173277_comment'></div>予尝视而叹曰：「岂天遗此以安且食其众，使世之衎衎施施，趋之者不已欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173277_comment'></div>不然，安有是邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173277_comment'></div>则其法之蕃昌，人力固如之何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173277_comment'></div>其田入既饶，则其宫从而侈也宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173277_comment'></div>庆历六年，观主道士淩齐晔相其室无不修而门独庳，曰：「是不足以称吾法与吾力」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173277_comment'></div>遂大之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173277_comment'></div>既成，托予记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173277_comment'></div>予与齐晔，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173277", 1173277, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>里人</span>也，不能辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173277_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173277_comment'></div>为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173277", 1173277, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>里人</span>而与之记，人之情也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173277_comment'></div>以《礼》、《春秋》之义告之，天下之公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173277_comment'></div>不以人之情易天下之公，齐晔之取予文，岂不得所欲也夫？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173277_comment'></div>岂以予言为厉已也夫？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173277_comment'></div>八月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1173277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173277'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷一七。又见《曾文定公集》卷九，《曾子固集》卷二六，《南丰曾先生文粹》卷五，《皇朝文鉴》卷七九，《文章正宗》续集卷一五，正德《建昌志》卷一八，《文章辨体汇选》卷五九二，《八代文钞》第三二册，《名山胜概记》卷二五，《麻姑洞天志》卷六，《古今图书集成》职方典卷八八四、神异典卷二八一。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173277_comment'></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='17daf80c8a6a44dea1e105c6df54a41c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("17daf80c8a6a44dea1e105c6df54a41c");'><span id='17daf80c8a6a44dea1e105c6df54a41c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　曾巩作《全真庵》<div id='poem_1173315' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173315' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173315?labeling=true' target='_blank'>全真庵记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173315")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173315_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173315'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173315'>九牧献金，夏禹铸以为鼎，九州山川草木百怪之象，莫不在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173315_comment'></div>其历乎万世，有时而隐，有时而显，其隐也莫知所去，其见也莫知所来，世以为神鼎云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173315_comment'></div>人神其鼎，而鼎不知其神，此其所以为神也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173315_comment'></div>人视其鼎，欷歔咨嗟，有爱其鼎之为器而不精察其鼎之文象者，有爱其鼎之文象而不究其鼎之全质者，皆非善观鼎者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173315_comment'></div>且文象百变，其为鼎象则一也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173315_comment'></div>文象虽假，其为金则真也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173315_comment'></div>一变而百，百归乎一，假不异真，真不异假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173315_comment'></div>知乎此者，其亦庶乎善观鼎者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173315_comment'></div>惟善观鼎者，然后可以议乎全真矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173315_comment'></div>夫六合内外，万物洪纤，有形无形，有识无识，生死去来，喜怒哀乐，皆一真之所融也，亦犹神鼎之上，一山一川，一草一木，一鸟一兽，莫非一金之所为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173315_comment'></div>视一象则可知一鼎之全质矣，视一法则可知一真之全体矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173315_comment'></div>故鼎金常一而无象可择，真理常全而无法可除，极六合内外，尽万物洪纤，孰非全哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173315_comment'></div>孰非真哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173315_comment'></div>江西老人结草庵乎福山，太守黄公题曰「全真」，命某以文，故叙而铭之曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1173315'>其行徐徐，其觉于于。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173315_comment'></div>渴焉而饮，饥焉而哺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173315_comment'></div>全真庵乎，达者以为籧庐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1173315_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　曾巩作《泝河》<div id='poem_220510' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220510' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220510?labeling=true' target='_blank'>溯河</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220510")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220510_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220510'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220510'>客舟溯河西北行，日夜似与河流争。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220510'>不知汹汹竟何为，怒意彼此何时平。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220510'>但疑天地送秋至，恶雨疾风相触声。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220510'>我病入寒饶睡思，归梦正美还遭惊。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220510'>东南水乡我所住，杨花散时春水生。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220510'>湖江渺邈不见岸，汩汩自流无可憎。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220510'>石泉百丈落山觜，此纵有声清可听。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220510'>莫如此水极<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_220510", 220510, id='poem_sentence_7_220510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220510'>吁嗟造化何厚薄，恶物受禀无由更。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220510'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_220510_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　曾巩作《靖安县幽谷亭》<div id='poem_220519' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220519' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220519?labeling=true' target='_blank'>靖安县幽谷亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220519")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220519_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220519'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220519'>横江舍轻楫，对面见青山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220519'>行尽车马尘，豁见水石寰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220519'>地气方以洁，崖声落潺潺。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220519'>虽为千家县，正在清华间。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220519'>风烟凛人心，世虑自可删。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220519'>况无讼诉嚣，得有觞咏闲。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220519'>常疑此中吏，白首岂思还。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220519'>人情贵公卿，烨烨就玉班。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220519'>光华虽一时，忧悸或满颜。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220519'>鸡鸣已争驰，骅骝振镳镮。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220519'>岂如此中吏，日高未开关。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220519'>一不谨所守，名声别妖奸。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220519'>岂如此中吏，一官老无瘝。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220519'>愔愔谟谟消，汩汩气象孱。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220519'>岂如此中吏，明心慑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_220519", 220519, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>强顽</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220519'>况云此中居，一亭众峰环。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_220519'>崖声梦犹闻，谷秀坐可攀。<div id='poem_sentence_16_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_220519'>倚天巉岩姿，青苍云斑斓。<div id='poem_sentence_17_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_220519'>对之精神恬，可谢世网艰。<div id='poem_sentence_18_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_220519'>人生慕虚荣，敛收意常悭。<div id='poem_sentence_19_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_220519'>诚思此忧愉，自应喜榛菅。<div id='poem_sentence_20_220519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_220519'></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_220519_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　曾巩作《洪州》<div id='poem_220439' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220439' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220439?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洪州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220439")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220439_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220439'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220439'>洪州城中荒且远，每到弱马常驱驰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220439_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220458?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送欧阳员外归觐滁州舍人</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220458'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220458'>病卧不出门，非关避尘土。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220458'>足音固可喜，况久捉松麈。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220458'>子生何其祥，家庭坐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_220458", 220458, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>轲愈</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220458'>顾我齿诸生，渐磨苦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_220458", 220458, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>顽鲁</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220458'>有如仰天潢，势岂识津渚。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220458'>又若马牛然，安能望熊虎。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220458'>空摇在门心，常若风中羽。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220458'>羡子筋骨轻，归飞得其所。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220458'>从今梦无南，随子渡江橹。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220458'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_220458_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　曾巩三妹适王安国（字平甫）<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　曾巩得欧阳修復书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　曾巩作《王君俞哀辞》<div id='poem_1173412' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173412' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173412?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王君俞哀辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173412")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173412_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173412'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173412'>京师多尊官要人，能引重后辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173412_comment'></div>公卿家子，有宾客亲党之助，略识文书章句，辄出与寒士较<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173412", 1173412, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>重轻</span>，由此名称多归之，而主<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173412", 1173412, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>升绌</span>者，因得与大位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173412_comment'></div>君俞在京北门外，不交人事，读书慕知圣人微言大法之归趣，孜孜忘昼夜寒暑之变，其为辞章可道，耻出较<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173412", 1173412, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>重轻</span>，漠然自如，由此名与位未充也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173412_comment'></div>庆历元年，予入太学，始相识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173412_comment'></div>馆余于家，居数月，相与讲学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173412_comment'></div>会余归，遂别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173412_comment'></div>常爱君俞气貌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173412", 1173412, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>端然</span>，虽燕休未尝慢，在众中恂恂，或不知其为朝士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173412_comment'></div>至相与言天下士，白黑无所隐，其方且勇亦少及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173412_comment'></div>太夫人素严，君俞怡怡奉子职，退事寡嫂无閒言，蓄妻子不骄，为家不问田宅，平居无亵私流侈之好，以某年某月疾，遂不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173412_comment'></div>始，丞相冀文穆公无主祀，扳君俞以托其后，君俞亦尽诚奉之，兹可以不坠矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173412_comment'></div>今太夫人年高，而天夺君俞之命，是于君俞之心不为大恨欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173412_comment'></div>夫为人如前之云，而不卒于贵且寿，曾未少施其所学，又负其所承之心，是于众人之情不能泯哀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173412_comment'></div>况重以相知，其悲塞可胜乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173412_comment'></div>作辞以泄其哀，且系曰：君俞姓王氏，讳寅亮，官至殿中丞，年二十六云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173412_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1173412'>维相其初兮择嗣于宗，君提而秀兮乃立于宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173412_comment'></div>庙门有戟兮祭祀以时，相不失托兮君无坠恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173412_comment'></div>庭闱乐康兮妻子不骄，又事寡嫂兮端其服容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173412_comment'></div>众人剪剪兮趋慕要津，我躬处方兮不夸以从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173412_comment'></div>《诗》《书》百家兮甚博而殽，我讲其疑兮往趋于中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173412_comment'></div>虽裕于实兮不耀其华，维文则信兮其位未充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173412_comment'></div>方期显行兮羽仪于世，孰尸变化兮亟畀之凶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173412_comment'></div>沕穆无端兮莫致责辞，维旧及知兮哀搅余胸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173412_comment'></div>老母无抚兮少妇失依，赖有息子兮可望其隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173412_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉兮予悲曷胜，托辞于牍兮恨与天终。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1173412_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　曾巩借孙都官书以观，作《答孙都官书》以致谢。<div id='poem_1173058' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173058' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173058?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答孙都官书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173058")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173058_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173058'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173058'>提刑都官阁下：伏承赐书，及示<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173058", 1173058, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>盛制</span>六编，凡三千首，盛矣哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173058_comment'></div>文之多，工之深，且专以久也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173058_comment'></div>其于君臣、父子、兄弟、夫妇、朋友、天地、三辰、鬼神、山川、地理、四夷、中国、风俗、万物、治乱、善恶、通塞、离合、忧欢、怨怼，无不毕载，而其语则博而精，丽而不浮，其归要不离于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173058_comment'></div>视昔以文名于天下者，夫岂易至于是邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173058_comment'></div>巩之愚且懒，且为事物疾病所侵，以不专而且未久于学也，使之观，若于海不见其涯涘，于深山长谷不见其形势之所极，而敢议其大小高下邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173058_comment'></div>而阁下不以其所深且专以久者励巩，博而精、丽而不浮、其归本于道者教巩，乃告之曰：「其详择而去其非是者焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173058_comment'></div>巩诚怪阁下自处之过，而为以赐巩者，乃所以怠且蔽之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173058_comment'></div>凡巩之学，盖将以学乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173058", 1173058, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>为身</span>，以至于可以为人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173058_comment'></div>方愚且懒，且不专，以久之病也，惟阁下之仁，岂欲怠且蔽之也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173058_comment'></div>其欲使知阁下之贵而长，其业之富而成，而犹不止如是，能下于后辈如是，是所以教之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173058_comment'></div>孟子曰：「吾不屑之教诲，是亦教诲之而已矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173058_comment'></div>敢不拜赐也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173058_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173058", 1173058, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>盛编</span>尚且借观，而先以此谢，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173058", 1173058, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>惶恐</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173058", 1173058, "Clauses/48/Comments/1")'>惶恐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173058_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173058_comment'></div>巩再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1173058_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　曾巩时受王逵奖励，作《上王刑部》<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_4_220403'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220403_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　临川蔡元振任从事之职于汀，曾巩作《送蔡元振序》赠别。<div id='poem_1173137' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173137' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173137?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送蔡元振序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173137")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173137_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173137'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173137'>古之州从事，皆自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173137", 1173137, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>辟士</span>，士亦择所从，故宾主相得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173137_comment'></div>如不得其志，去之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173137_comment'></div>今之州从事，皆命于朝，非惟守不得择士，士亦不得择所从，宾主岂尽相得哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173137_comment'></div>如不得其志，未可以辄去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173137_comment'></div>故守之治，从事无为可也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173137_comment'></div>守之不治，从事举其政，亦势然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173137_comment'></div>议者不原其势，以为州之政当一出于守，从事举其政，则为立异，为侵官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173137_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173137_comment'></div>从事可否其州事，职也，不惟其同守之同，则舍己之是而求与之同，可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173137_comment'></div>不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173137_comment'></div>州为不治矣，守不自任其责，己亦莫之任也，可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173137_comment'></div>不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173137_comment'></div>则举其政，其孰为立异邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173137_comment'></div>其孰为侵官邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173137_comment'></div>议者未之思也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173137_comment'></div>虽然，迹其所以然，岂士之所喜然哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173137_comment'></div>故曰亦势然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173137_comment'></div>今四方之从事，惟其守之同者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173137_comment'></div>幸而材，从事视其政之缺，不过室于叹、途于议而已，脱然莫以为己事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173137_comment'></div>反是焉则激，激亦奚以为也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173137_comment'></div>求能自任其责者少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173137_comment'></div>为从事乃尔，为公卿大夫士于朝，不尔者其几邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173137_comment'></div>临川蔡君从事于汀，始试其为政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173137_comment'></div>汀诚为治州也，蔡君可拱而坐也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173137_comment'></div>诚未治也，人皆观君也，无激也，无同也，惟其义而已矣，蔡君之任也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173137_comment'></div>其异日官于朝，一于是而已矣，亦蔡君之任也，可不懋欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173137_comment'></div>其行也，来求吾文，故序以送之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1173137_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　金溪尉汪遘建饮归亭，既成求记，曾巩作《饮归亭记》<div id='poem_1173290' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173290' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173290?labeling=true' target='_blank'>饮归亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173290")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173290_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173290'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173290'>金溪尉汪君名遘，为尉之三月，斥其四垣为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173290", 1173290, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>射亭</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173290_comment'></div>既成，教士于其间，而名之曰饮归之亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173290_comment'></div>以书走临川，请记于予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173290_comment'></div>请数反不止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173290_comment'></div>予之言何可取？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173290_comment'></div>汪君徒深望予也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173290_comment'></div>既不得辞，乃记之曰：射之用事已远，其先之以礼乐以辨德，《记》之所谓「宾燕乡饮大射」之射是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173290_comment'></div>其贵力而尚技以立武，《记》之所谓「四时教士贯革」之射是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173290_comment'></div>古者海内<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173290", 1173290, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>洽和</span>，则先礼射，而弓矢以立武，亦不废于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173290_comment'></div>及三代衰，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173290", 1173290, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>王政</span>缺，礼乐之事相属而尽坏，揖让之射滋亦熄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173290_comment'></div>至其后，天下尝集，国家尝閒暇矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173290_comment'></div>先王之礼，其节文皆在，其行之不难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173290_comment'></div>然自秦汉以来千有馀岁，衰微<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173290", 1173290, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>绌塞</span>，空见于六艺之文，而莫有从事者，由世之茍简者胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173290_comment'></div>争夺兴而战禽攻取之党奋，则强弓疾矢巧技之出不得而废，其不以势哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173290_comment'></div>今尉之教射，不比乎礼乐而贵乎技力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173290_comment'></div>其众虽小，然而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173290", 1173290, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>旗旄</span>镯鼓，五兵之器，便习之利，与夫行止步趋迟速之节，皆宜有法，则其所教亦非独射也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173290_comment'></div>其幸而在乎无事之时，则得以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173290", 1173290, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>自休</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173290", 1173290, "Clauses/50/Comments/1")'>守境</span>而填卫百姓；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173290_comment'></div>其不幸杀越<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173290", 1173290, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>剽攻</span>，骇惊闾巷，而并逐于大山长谷之间，则将犯晨夜，蒙雾露，蹈阨驰危，不避矢石之患，汤火之难，出入千里，而与之有事，则士其可以不素教哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173290_comment'></div>今亭之作所以教士，汪君又谓古者师还必饮至于庙，以纪军实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173290_comment'></div>今庙废不设，亦欲士胜而归则饮之于此，遂以名其亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173290_comment'></div>汪君之志，与其职可谓协矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173290_comment'></div>或谓汪君儒生，尉文吏，以礼义禁盗宜可止，顾乃习斗而喜胜，其是与？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173290_comment'></div>夫治固不可以不兼文武，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173290", 1173290, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>施泽</span>于堂庙之上，服冕搢笏，使士民化、奸宄息者，固亦在彼而不在此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173290_comment'></div>然而天下之事能大者固可以兼小，未有小<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173290", 1173290, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>不治</span>而能大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173290_comment'></div>故汪君之汲汲于斯，不忽乎任小，其非所谓有志者邪？</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1173290_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《喜似赠黄生序》<div id='poem_1173139' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173139' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173139?labeling=true' target='_blank'>喜似赠黄生序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173139")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173139_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173139'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173139'>五年时，某送别介卿于洪州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173139_comment'></div>黄生年十四五，在舟中出入吾二人之间，与众童子无异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173139_comment'></div>其时从介卿于淮南，至者独言黄生敏且勤，自此黄生之能浸浸闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173139_comment'></div>至介卿之门者归，莫不爱其为人，而异其业之进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173139_comment'></div>介卿以书抵黄生之亲，亦骤称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173139_comment'></div>于是黄生之里人皆叹其善自致，而畏且慕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173139_comment'></div>其大父虽已老，其母虽久寡居，闻黄生之进如此，虽在千里之外，犹朝夕侍其旁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173139_comment'></div>虽书信岁不过三四至，犹朝夕与之上下语也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173139_comment'></div>非特如是也，其喜殆甚于朝夕侍其旁，朝夕与之上下语也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173139_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173139_comment'></div>黄生在其家，无以异于众童子，一出而得大贤为之依归，遂以能闻于人，为其大父与母者，其独能勿喜乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173139_comment'></div>其不愈于朝夕侍其旁，朝夕与之上下语乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173139_comment'></div>予闻之亦喜甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173139_comment'></div>而予自洪州归，虽其身去介卿之侧，其心焦然，食息坐作，无顷焉不在介卿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173139_comment'></div>人有至自介卿之门者，虽奴隶贱人，未尝不从之委曲反复问介卿起居状与其行事，得其所施为，虽小事皆识之，以自警且自慰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173139_comment'></div>初如此，时以谓介卿虽系职于扬，不可以来视我，我幸布衣，有兄弟以养，可去而视介卿，或一年或二年，当复见之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173139_comment'></div>既别之明年，则欲经营家事而后去，不幸祖母病不起，遂不果行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173139_comment'></div>明年返葬祖母于南丰，行事益以阔，而未之南丰时，予已病，虽病犹谓旦夕且愈，南丰归，可必于行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173139_comment'></div>既归，病几不可治，至于今且三年，虽幸可治，然气闭胸中，既食则不可坐，不可骑，而介卿方为县于鄞，自抚之鄞，不可以舟通行，事愈未合也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173139_comment'></div>然日孜孜念之，凡询介卿之事于人，虽奴隶贱人加详焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173139_comment'></div>于奴隶贱人犹然，况衣冠降登，絜然为士者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173139_comment'></div>况吾介卿朝夕所与居，教诲而称之者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173139_comment'></div>故闻黄生之归也，日企而望之，庶乎其来视我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173139_comment'></div>居一日，黄生来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173139_comment'></div>望其表，其步趋之节，揖让之容，固有似乎介卿者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173139_comment'></div>入而视其色，听其言，其气愉愉而其音淳淳，不似乎介卿者少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173139_comment'></div>其学其归，得之乎介卿何多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173139_comment'></div>间而省其书，则又如出诸介卿之手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173139_comment'></div>问介卿之事，皆能道其远者大者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173139_comment'></div>甚矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173139_comment'></div>黄生之似吾介卿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173139_comment'></div>吾得之，废食与寝而从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173139_comment'></div>吾喜也，惟恐其去我，而尚恨其来之不早也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173139_comment'></div>庄生言见似人者而喜矣，信然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173139_comment'></div>嗟乎黄生，岂特一时慰我也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173139_comment'></div>于是知介卿之德，入人之深、化人之速也如此，使得其志于天下，何如哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173139_comment'></div>以从介卿于淮南者数人较之，不人人皆然，而黄生独然，则又知黄生之所自致者亦荦荦绝众，使坚且久，其所至如何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173139_comment'></div>因介卿之教诲、黄生之自致而思乎人莫不欲有立，然而有贤父兄之渐泽，而卒不入于善者，其自反于心如何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173139_comment'></div>亦思介卿之道德，于今为大备，而黄生为日进，独予断然不一二备而不尺寸进，比其少之时缺且忘者众矣，其自愧于心如何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173139_comment'></div>以心之愧也，则欲重警戒自修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173139_comment'></div>是介卿之教不独裕于黄生，黄生之自致不独裕于己，而皆有以及予也，其喜不又多乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173139_comment'></div>黄生勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173139_comment'></div>如介卿者，方驾周孔之道行乎百代之下，而迫于百代之上者也，生之似介卿，宜求至乎是而止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173139_comment'></div>若予者，将从事于左右焉，介卿与生也，其能勿助乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173139_comment'></div>因其然也，故历道之，作《喜似赠黄生》而示介卿，且将自省焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1173139_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《疏山》<div id='poem_220151' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220151' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220151?labeling=true' target='_blank'>疏山</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220151")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_220151_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220151'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220151'>一见云山病眼清，野僧勤动水边迎。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220151'>苍松翠竹东南道，乱石峰前踏月行。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220151'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_220151_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《哭尹师鲁》<div id='poem_220349' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220349' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220349?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭尹师鲁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220349")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220349_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220349'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220349'>众人生死如尘泥，一贤废死千载悲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220349'>汉初董生不大用，厥政自此惭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220349", 220349, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>隆姬</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220349'>至今董生没虽久，语者为汉常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_220349", 220349, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>嗟欷</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220349'>尹公素志任天下，众亦共望齐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_220349", 220349, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>皋伊</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220349'>文章气节盖当世，尚在功德如豪氂。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220349'>安知蔓草蔽原野，雪霰先折青松枝。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220349'>百身可赎世岂惜，讣告四至人犹疑。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220349'>悲公尚至千载后，况复悲者同其时。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
