id='poem_sentence_9_220349_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　王安石知鄞县，曾巩作《一昼千万思》<div id='poem_220329' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220329' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220329?labeling=true' target='_blank'>一昼千万思</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220329")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220329_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220329'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220329'>一昼千万思，一夜千万愁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220329_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220329'>昼思复夜愁，昼夜千万秋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220329_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220329'>故人远为县，海边勾践州。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220329_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220329'>故人道何如，不间孔与周。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220329_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220329'>我如道边尘，安能望嵩丘？<div id='poem_sentence_4_220329_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220329'>又若涧与溪，敢比沧海流。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220329_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220329'>景山与学海，汲汲强自谋。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220329_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220329'>愁思虽尔勤，故人得知不？<div id='poem_sentence_7_220329_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220329'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_220329_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《上人》诗。<div id='poem_220338' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220338' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220338?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上人</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220338")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220338_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220338'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220338'>金节横光<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_220338", 220338, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>马珂</span>闹，瑞鹘宫袍腰玉绕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220338'>烟沙轣辘高轩过，路上千人瞻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220338", 220338, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>羽纛</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220338'>瑶魁精彩浮苍龙，江城四面生春风。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220338'>城中坏屋书签碧，有客苦吟连旦夕。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220338'>麻衣尘暗抱书泣，岁暮黄粱不供食。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220338'>白日曈昽望龙阪，坐上一言寒可暖。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220338'>西入天关洒霖雨，须惜穷鳞在泥土。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220338'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_220338_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《初夏有感》<div id='poem_220396' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220396' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220396?labeling=true' target='_blank'>初夏有感</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220396")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220396_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220396'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220396'>我从得病卧闾巷，三见夏物争滋荣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220396'>红英紫萼逐风尽，高干密叶还阴成。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220396'>山亭水馆处处好，朱碧万实相骈擎。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220396'>林乌梁燕各生子，翅羽已足争飞腾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220396'>雉鸡五色绣新翮，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_220396", 220396, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>鷕鷕</span>慕匹相随鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220396'>穴蜂露蝶亦有类，歘往复聚何翾轻。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220396'>箔蚕满室事方盛，茧缀下上如连星。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220396'>麦芒秧颖错杂出，高垄大泽填黄青。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220396'>物从草木及虫鸟，无一不自盈其情。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220396'>嗟我独病不如彼，胸气卧立常怦怦。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220396'>筋酸骨楚头目眩，强食岂得肌肤盈。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220396'>我身今虽落众后，我志素欲希<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_220396", 220396, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>轲卿</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220396'>十年万事常坎𡒄，奔走未足供藜羹。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220396'>愁勤未老鬓先白，多学只自为身兵。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220396'>自然感疾惫形体，后日虽复应伶俜。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220396'>非同世俗顾颜色，所慕少壮成功名。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_220396'>但令命在尚可勉，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_220396", 220396, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>屑细</span>讵足伤吾平。<div id='poem_sentence_16_220396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_220396'></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_220396_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　曾巩居临川，作《寄欧阳舍人书》，答谢欧阳修为祖父作墓志铭。<div id='poem_1173052' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173052' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173052?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄欧阳舍人书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173052")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173052_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173052'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173052'>巩顿首再拜舍人先生：去秋人还，蒙赐书及所撰先大父墓碑铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173052_comment'></div>反覆观诵，感与惭并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173052_comment'></div>夫铭志之著于世，义近于史，而亦有与史异者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173052_comment'></div>盖史之于善恶无所不书，而铭者，盖古之人有功德材行志义之美者，惧后世之不知，则必铭而见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173052_comment'></div>或纳于庙，或存于墓，一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173052_comment'></div>茍其人之恶，则于铭乎何有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173052_comment'></div>此其所以与史异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173052_comment'></div>其辞之作，所以使死者无有所憾，生者得致其严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173052_comment'></div>而善人喜于见传，则勇于自立；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173052_comment'></div>恶人无有所纪，则以愧而惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173052_comment'></div>至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>通材达识</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>义烈</span>节士，嘉言善状，皆见于篇，则足为后法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173052_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>警劝</span>之道，非近乎史，其将安近？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173052_comment'></div>及世之衰，为人之子孙者，一欲褒扬其亲而不本乎理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173052_comment'></div>故虽恶人，皆务勒铭以誇后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173052_comment'></div>立言者既莫之拒而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>不为</span>，又以其子孙之所请也，书其恶焉，则人情之所不得，于是乎铭始不实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173052_comment'></div>后之作铭者，常观其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173052_comment'></div>茍托之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>非人</span>，则书之非公与是，则不足以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>行世</span>而传后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173052_comment'></div>故千百年来，公卿大夫至于里巷之士，莫不有铭，而传者盖少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173052_comment'></div>其故非他，托之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>非人</span>，书之非公与是故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173052_comment'></div>然则孰为其人而能尽公与是欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173052_comment'></div>非畜道德而能文章者无以为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173052_comment'></div>盖有道德者之于恶人，则不受而铭之，于众人则能辨焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173052_comment'></div>而人之行，有情善而迹非，有意奸而外淑，有善恶相悬而不可以实指，有实大于名，有名侈于实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173052_comment'></div>犹之用人，非畜道德者恶能辨之不惑，议之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>不徇</span>？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173052_comment'></div>不惑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>不徇</span>，则公且是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173052_comment'></div>而其辞之不工，则世犹不传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173052_comment'></div>于是又在其文章兼胜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173052_comment'></div>故曰非畜道德而能文章者无以为也，岂非然哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173052_comment'></div>然畜道德而能文章者，虽或并世而有，亦或数十年或一二百年而有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173052_comment'></div>其传之难如此，其遇之难又如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173052_comment'></div>若先生之道德文章，固所谓数百年而有者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173052_comment'></div>先祖之言行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>卓卓</span>，幸遇而得铭其公与是，其传世行后无疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173052_comment'></div>而世之学者，每观记传所书古人之事，至其所可感，则往往<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>衋然</span>不知涕之流落也，况其子孙也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173052_comment'></div>况巩也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173052_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>追睎</span>祖德而思所以传之之繇，则知先生推一赐于巩而及其三世，其感与报，宜若何而图之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173052_comment'></div>抑又思若巩之浅薄滞拙，而先生进之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173052_comment'></div>先祖之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>屯蹶否塞</span>以死，而先生显之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173052_comment'></div>则世之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>魁闳</span>豪杰不世出之士，其谁不愿进于门？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173052_comment'></div>潜遁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>幽抑</span>之士，其谁不有望于世？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173052_comment'></div>善谁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>不为</span>？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173052_comment'></div>而恶谁不愧以惧？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173052_comment'></div>为人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>父祖</span>者，孰不欲教其子孙？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173052_comment'></div>为人之子孙者，孰不欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>宠荣</span>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1173052", 1173052, "Clauses/110/Comments/1")'>父祖</span>？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173052_comment'></div>此数美者，一归于先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173052_comment'></div>既拜赐之辱，且敢进其所以然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173052_comment'></div>所谕世族之次，敢不承教而加详焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173052_comment'></div>幸甚，不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173052_comment'></div>巩再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1173052_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　曾巩先后托吴彦弼、黄九致书王安石。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年6月</a>　曾巩父曾易占奉召入京，曾巩抱病侍父北上。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='18e7cad4476847cca1d7500093ad56e5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("18e7cad4476847cca1d7500093ad56e5");'><span id='18e7cad4476847cca1d7500093ad56e5_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1048')">1047-1048年</a>，29-30岁</div><div id='18e7cad4476847cca1d7500093ad56e5' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，知府刘沆周济之，使受田以获安。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《答所劝灸》<div id='poem_220299' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220299' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220299?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答所劝灸</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220299")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220299_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220299'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220299'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_220299", 220299, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>灸灼</span>君所劝，感君书上辞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220299_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220299'>勿难<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220299", 220299, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>火艾</span>痛，要使功名垂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220299_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220299'>我道世所背，君知馀有谁？<div id='poem_sentence_2_220299_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220299'>筋骸倘且健，学行肯教隳。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220299_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220299'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220299_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年秋</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《上王刑部》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年10月</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《繁昌县兴造记》<div id='poem_1173280' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173280' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173280?labeling=true' target='_blank'>繁昌县兴造记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173280")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173280_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173280'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173280'>太宗二年，取宣之三县为太平州，而繁昌在籍中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173280_comment'></div>繁昌者，故南陵地，唐昭宗始以为县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173280_comment'></div>县百四十馀年，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173280", 1173280, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>城垣</span>而滨大江，常编竹为障以自固，岁辄更之，用材与力一取于民，出入无门关，宾至无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173280", 1173280, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>舍馆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173280_comment'></div>今治所虽有屋，而庳逼破露，至听讼于庑下，案牍簿书，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173280", 1173280, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>栖列</span>无所，往往散乱不可省，而狱讼、赋役失其平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173280_comment'></div>历七代，为令者不知几人，恬不知改革，日入于坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173280_comment'></div>故世指繁昌为陋县，而仕者不肯来，行旅者不肯游，政事愈以疵，市区愈以索寞，为乡老吏民者羞且憾之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173280_comment'></div>事之穷必变，故今有能令出，因民之所欲为，悉破去竹障，而垣其故基，为门以通道往来，而屋以取固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173280_comment'></div>即门之东北，构亭瞰江，以纳四方之宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173280_comment'></div>既又自大其治所，为重门<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173280", 1173280, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>步廊</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173280_comment'></div>门之上为楼，敛敕书置其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173280_comment'></div>廊之两旁，为群吏之舍，视事之厅，便坐之斋，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173280", 1173280, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>寝庐</span>庖湢，各以序为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173280_comment'></div>厅之东西隅，凡案牍簿书，室而藏之，于是乎在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173280_comment'></div>自门至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173280", 1173280, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>寝庐</span>，总为屋凡若干区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173280_comment'></div>自计材至于用工，总为日凡二千三百九十六日而落成焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173280_comment'></div>夏希道太初，此令之姓名字也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173280_comment'></div>庆历七年十月二十三日，此成之年月日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173280_comment'></div>始繁昌为县，止三千户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173280_comment'></div>九十年间，四圣之德泽，覆露生养，今几至万家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173280_comment'></div>田利之入倍他壤有馀，鱼、虾、竹、苇、柿、栗之货，足以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173280", 1173280, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>自资</span>，而无贫民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173280_comment'></div>其江山又天下之胜处，可乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173280_comment'></div>今复得能令，为树立如此，使得无岁费而有巨防，宾至不惟得以休，而耳目尚有以之为观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173280_comment'></div>令居不惟得以安，而民吏之出入仰望者，益知尊且畏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173280_comment'></div>狱讼、赋役之书悉完，则是非倚而可定也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173280_comment'></div>予知县之去陋名，而仕者争欲来，行旅者争欲游，昔之疵者日以减去，而索寞者日以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173280", 1173280, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>富蕃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173280_comment'></div>称其县之名，其必自此始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173280_comment'></div>夏令用荐者为是县，至二十七日，而计材以至于落成，不惟兴利除弊可法也，而其变因循，就功效，独何其果且速与！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173280_comment'></div>昔孟子讥子产惠而不知为政，呜呼，如夏令者，庶几所谓知为政者与！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173280_comment'></div>于是过子产矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173280_comment'></div>凡县之得能令为难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173280_comment'></div>幸而得能令，而兴事尤难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173280_comment'></div>幸而事兴，而得后人不废坏之又难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173280_comment'></div>今繁昌民既幸得其所难得，而令又幸无不便己者，得卒兴其所尤难，皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1173280", 1173280, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>可喜</span>无憾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173280_comment'></div>惟其欲后人不废坏之，未可必得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173280_comment'></div>故属予记，其不特以著其成，其亦有以警也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173280_comment'></div>某月日，南丰曾巩记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1173280_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年4月</a>　曾巩居临川居父忧，作《菜园院佛殿记》<div id='poem_1173282' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173282' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173282?labeling=true' target='_blank'>菜园院佛殿记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173282")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173282_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173282'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173282'>庆历八年四月，抚州菜园僧可栖，得州之人高庆、王明、饶杰相与率民钱为殿于其院，成，以佛之像置其中，而来乞予文以为记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173282_comment'></div>初，菜园有籍于尚书，有地于城南五里，而草木生之，牛羊践之，求屋室居人焉，无有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173282_comment'></div>可栖至，则喜曰：「是天下之废地也，人不争，吾得之以老，斯足矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173282_comment'></div>遂以医取资于人，而即其处立寝庐、讲堂、重门、斋庖之房、栖客之舍，而合其徒入而居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173282_comment'></div>独殿之役最大，自度其力不能为，乃使庆、明、杰持簿乞民间，有得辄记之，微细无不受，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173282", 1173282, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>浸渐</span>积累，期月而用以足，役以既。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173282_comment'></div>自可栖之来居至于此，盖十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173282_comment'></div>吾观佛之徒，凡有所兴作，其人皆用力也勤，刻意也专，不肯茍成，不求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173282", 1173282, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>速效</span>，故善以小致大，以难致易，而其所为，无一不如其志者，岂独其说足以动人哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173282_comment'></div>其中亦有智然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173282_comment'></div>若可栖之披攘经营，捃摭纤悉，忘十年之久，以及其志之成，其所以自致者，岂不近是哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173282_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173282_comment'></div>佛之法固方重于天下，而其学者又善殖之如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173282_comment'></div>至于世儒，习圣人之道，既自以为至矣，及其任天下之事，则未尝有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173282", 1173282, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>勤行</span>之意，坚持之操，少长相与语曰：「茍一时之利耳，安能必世百年，为教化之渐，而待迟久之功哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173282_comment'></div>相薰以此，故历千馀载，虽有贤者作，未可以得志于其间也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173282_comment'></div>由是观之，反不及佛之学者远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173282_comment'></div>则彼之所以盛，不由此之所自守者衰欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173282_comment'></div>与之记，不独以著其能，亦以愧吾道之不行也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173282_comment'></div>曾巩记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1173282_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《鹅湖院佛殿记》<div id='poem_1173287' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173287' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173287?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鹅湖院佛殿记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173287")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173287_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173287'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173287'>庆历某年某月日，信州铅山县鹅湖院佛殿成，僧绍元来请记，遂为之记曰：自西方用兵，天子宰相与士大夫劳于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173287", 1173287, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>议谋</span>，材武之士劳于力，农工商之民劳于赋敛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173287_comment'></div>而天子尝减乘舆掖庭诸费，大臣亦往往辞赐钱，士大夫或暴露其身，材武之士或秉义而死，农工商之民或失其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173287_comment'></div>惟学佛之人不劳于谋议，不用其力，不出赋敛，食与寝自如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173287_comment'></div>资其宫之侈，非国则民力焉，而天下皆以为当然，予不知其何以然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173287_comment'></div>今是殿之费，十万不已，必百万也，百万不已，必千万也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173287_comment'></div>或累累而千万之不可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173287_comment'></div>其费如是广，欲勿记其日时，其得邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173287_comment'></div>而请予文者，又绍元也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173287_comment'></div>故云尔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1173287_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《寄子进弟》<div id='poem_220481' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220481' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_220481'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220481'>忆子去家日，南风始吹衣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220481'>今来日未几，蝇蚊已群飞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220481'>思子兼昼夜，何啻如渴饥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220481'>喜闻远客至，手自排荆扉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220481'>客送书一纸，翰墨子所挥。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220481'>上言山居恶，梦寐接庭闱。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220481'>次言服畎亩，禾黍膴已肥。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220481'>其馀业文字，颇测幽与微。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220481'>题诗在纸尾，语老意不非。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220481'>我喜何所似，大似客得归。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220481'>我与子事亲，未饱藿与薇。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220481'>常苦去左右，辛勤治鞍鞿。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220481'>子行何时反，我眼日已睎。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220481_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《李节推亭子》<div id='poem_220399' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220399")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220399_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220399'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220399'>旴江郭东门，江水湛虚碧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220399'>东南望群峰，连延倚天壁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220399'>长林相蔽亏，苍翠浮日夕。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220399'>青冥窗户寒，居者非咫尺。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220399'>子初得从谁，有此烟雾宅。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220399'>燕坐远世喧，及门无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_220399", 220399, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>尘客</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220399'>筑亭更求深，缓带聊自适。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220399'>家酿熟新樽，欢言命良席。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年9月12日</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《墨池记》<div id='poem_1173281' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173281' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173281?labeling=true' target='_blank'>墨池记<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历八年九月十二日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年9月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173281")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173281_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173281'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173281'>临川之城东，有地隐然而高，以临于溪，曰新城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173281_comment'></div>新城之上，有池<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173281", 1173281, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>洼然</span>而方以长，曰王羲之之墨池者，荀伯子《临川记》云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173281_comment'></div>羲之尝慕张芝，临池<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173281", 1173281, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>学书</span>，池水尽黑，此为其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173281", 1173281, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>故迹</span>，岂信然邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173281_comment'></div>方羲之之不可强以仕，而尝极东方，出沧海，以娱其意于山水之间，岂其徜徉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173281", 1173281, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>肆恣</span>，而又尝自休于此邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173281_comment'></div>羲之之书晚乃善，则其所能，盖亦以精力<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173281", 1173281, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>自致</span>者，非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173281", 1173281, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>天成</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173281_comment'></div>然后世未有能及者，岂其学不如彼邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173281_comment'></div>则学固岂可以少哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173281_comment'></div>况欲深造道德者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173281_comment'></div>墨池之上，今为州学舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173281_comment'></div>教授王君盛恐其不章也，书「晋王右军墨池」之六字于楹间以揭之，又告于巩曰：「愿有记」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173281_comment'></div>推王君之心，岂爱人之善，虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173281", 1173281, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>一能</span>不以废，而因以及乎其迹邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173281_comment'></div>其亦欲推其事以勉学者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173281_comment'></div>夫人之有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173281", 1173281, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>一能</span>，而使后人尚之如此，况仁人庄士之遗风馀思，被于来世者如何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173281_comment'></div>庆历八年九月十二日，曾巩记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1173281_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　王安石作《先大夫述》送呈曾巩，请为其父铭，曾巩撰《尚书都官员外郎王公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173347' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173347' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173347?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书都官员外郎王公墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历八年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173347")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173347_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173347'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173347'>王氏其先太原人，世久迁徙，而今家抚州之临川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173347_comment'></div>公讳益，字舜良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173347_comment'></div>曾祖讳某，不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173347_comment'></div>祖讳某，以子故赠尚书职方员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173347_comment'></div>考讳某，以公故，即其家拜卫尉寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173347_comment'></div>公祥符八年举进士及第，初为建安主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173347_comment'></div>时尚少，县人颇易之，及观公所为，乃皆大<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173347", 1173347, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>畏服</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173347_comment'></div>其督赋税，未尝急贫民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173347_comment'></div>或有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173347", 1173347, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>笞罚</span>，唯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173347", 1173347, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>豪剧</span>吏耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173347_comment'></div>以故建安人尤爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173347_comment'></div>尝病，阖县为祠祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173347_comment'></div>改临江军判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173347_comment'></div>军多诸豪大姓之家，以财力自肆，而二千石亦有所挟为不法，吏乘其然，乾没无所忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173347_comment'></div>公至，以义折正二千石，使不能有所纵，以明惮吏，使不敢动摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173347_comment'></div>居顷之，部中肃然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173347_comment'></div>诸豪大吏见公皆侧目而视，至以鄙言目公曰：「是不可欺也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173347_comment'></div>卒不得已，以他计出公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173347_comment'></div>领新淦县，县以治闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173347_comment'></div>去，改大理寺丞，知庐陵县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173347_comment'></div>又改殿中丞，知新繁县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173347_comment'></div>县有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173347", 1173347, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>宿奸</span>数人，公既绳以法，其馀一以恩信遇之，尝逾月不笞一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173347_comment'></div>还知韶州，改太常博士、尚书屯田员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173347_comment'></div>岭以南素习于夷，无男女之别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173347_comment'></div>日浸月滋，为吏者师耳目，谓俗止如此，凡奸事虽得，有可已者，皆不究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173347_comment'></div>公曰：「夫所谓因其俗者，岂谓是邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173347_comment'></div>居郡，求奸事最急，茍有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173347", 1173347, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>萌孽</span>，一切<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173347", 1173347, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>擿发</span>穷治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173347_comment'></div>属县翁源多虎，公教捕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173347_comment'></div>令欲媚公，言虎自死者五，舆之致州，为颂以献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173347_comment'></div>公使归之曰：「政在德不在异」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173347_comment'></div>州有屯兵五百人，代者久不至，欲谋为变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173347_comment'></div>事觉，一郡皆骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173347_comment'></div>公不为动，独取其首五人，即日断流之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173347_comment'></div>或请以付狱，公不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173347_comment'></div>既而闻其徒曰：「若五人者系狱，当夜劫之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173347_comment'></div>然后众乃服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173347_comment'></div>韶居南方，虽小州，然狱讼最多，号难治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173347_comment'></div>公既以才能治之有馀，遂以无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173347_comment'></div>又因民之暇时，为之理营驿，表坊市道巷，使皆可以久远为后利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173347_comment'></div>归丁卫尉府君忧，服除，通判江宁府，改都官员外郎，二千石常以事倚公，公亦为之尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173347_comment'></div>宝元元年二月二十三日以疾卒于官，享年四十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173347_comment'></div>母谢氏，封永安县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173347_comment'></div>娶徐氏，又娶吴氏，封长寿县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173347_comment'></div>子男七人，曰安仁，曰安道，曰安石，曰安国，曰安世，曰安礼，曰安上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173347_comment'></div>女一人嫁张氏，处者二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173347_comment'></div>安石今为大理评事，知鄞县，庆历七年十一月上书乞告葬公，明年某月诏曰「可」，遂以某月某日与其昆弟奉公之丧，葬江宁府之某县某处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173347_comment'></div>吾尝闻乡里长老言，公为人倜傥有大志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173347_comment'></div>在外当事辄可否，矫矫不可挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173347_comment'></div>及退归其家，歛色下气，致孝于父母，致爱于族人之间，委曲顺承，一以恩自克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173347_comment'></div>位不满其志，故在外之所施用者，见于小而已，今吾所书是也，其大可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173347_comment'></div>则家行最笃已，先人尝从公游，其言亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173347_comment'></div>而吾又与安石友，故得知公事最详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173347_comment'></div>其将葬也，使者以安石之述与书来请铭，遂为之铭其尤可哀者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173347_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_1173347'>公堂有母，老不觉衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173347_comment'></div>公庭有子，仁孝而才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173347_comment'></div>世所可喜，公两弃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173347_comment'></div>莫不皆死，公有馀悲。</div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1173347_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《祭王都官文》<div id='poem_1173399' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173399' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173399?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭王都官文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173399")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173399_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173399'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173399'>维公材敏而宏，志视万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173399_comment'></div>高辞大篇，出仕天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173399_comment'></div>主簿于闽，声驾其长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173399_comment'></div>清江之谋，矫矫逾壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173399_comment'></div>于韶于升，条教出己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173399_comment'></div>伺公所为，万目齐视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173399_comment'></div>夺奸于幽，耋吏丧胆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173399_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173399", 1173399, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>悍党</span>睢睢，根柢卒斩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173399_comment'></div>里讴户歌，惟茕寡独。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173399_comment'></div>在右惟监，在下惟属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173399_comment'></div>在侧惟僚，相讲戴服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173399_comment'></div>将起将昌，俞考以难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173399_comment'></div>曷赴曷归，忽殒无还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173399_comment'></div>公于先人，实欢实厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173399_comment'></div>至公诸子，巩辱亲友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173399_comment'></div>于公家行，表里洞知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173399_comment'></div>于党不校，于尊不违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173399_comment'></div>出升公堂，不挠毫发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173399_comment'></div>退从其私，婉婉曲折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173399_comment'></div>钟山峥嵘，下惟江水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173399_comment'></div>昔公此临，委蛇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173399", 1173399, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>舄履</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173399_comment'></div>今子六人，葬公于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173399_comment'></div>铭巩之为，辞贫事韪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173399_comment'></div>千里寄诚，以兹一簋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173399_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1173399_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《祭王益都官》<div id='poem_1173405' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173405' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173405?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭王益都官</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173405")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173405_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173405'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173405'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173405_comment'></div>钟山南下，百里平野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173405_comment'></div>江流渰渰，从此东泻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173405_comment'></div>昔公来临，诸侯是监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173405_comment'></div>何荒不耕？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173405_comment'></div>何莠不芟？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173405_comment'></div>人乐公德，公乐其和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173405_comment'></div>公与邦人，从容笑歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173405_comment'></div>今公之谢，伤怀孔多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173405_comment'></div>即起幽宅，其封坡坨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173405_comment'></div>公灵不忘，岂去而他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173405_comment'></div>公退于家，自克以宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173405_comment'></div>人谁如公，内外行完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173405_comment'></div>人皆望公，寿考而贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173405_comment'></div>若可以谐，而止于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173405_comment'></div>公卿穰穰，十百为辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173405_comment'></div>朝门一开，巷满车盖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173405_comment'></div>可耻之事，多于所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173405_comment'></div>公不为彼，其又何戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173405_comment'></div>维公有子，实天启之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173405_comment'></div>文可为法，行可为师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173405_comment'></div>某之不肖，辱遇山交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173405_comment'></div>相从于今，古道是守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173405_comment'></div>公之方葬，某在哀荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173405_comment'></div>执事不获，寓荐一觞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1173405_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《送江任序》<div id='poem_1173131' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173131' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173131?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送江任序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173131")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173131_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173131'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173131'>均之为吏，或中州之人，用于荒边侧境、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173131", 1173131, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>山区</span>海聚之间，蛮夷异域之处，或燕荆越蜀、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173131", 1173131, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>海外</span>万里之人，用于中州，以至<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173131", 1173131, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>四遐</span>之乡，相易而往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173131_comment'></div>其山行水涉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173131", 1173131, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>沙莽</span>之驰，往往则风霜冰雪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173131", 1173131, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>瘴雾</span>之毒之所侵加，蛟龙虺蜴虎豹之群之所抵触，冲波急洑隤崖落石之所覆压。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173131_comment'></div>其进也，莫不籯粮举药，选舟易马，力兵曹伍而后动；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173131_comment'></div>戒朝奔夜，变更寒暑而后至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173131_comment'></div>至则宫庐器械被服饮食之具、土风气候之宜，与夫人民谣俗语言习尚之务，其变难遵，而其情难得也，则多愁居惕处，叹息而思归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173131_comment'></div>及其久也，所习已安，所蔽已解，则岁月有期，可引而去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173131_comment'></div>故不得专一精思修治具，以宣布天子及下之仁，而为后世可守之法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173131_comment'></div>或九州之人，各用于其土，不在西封，在东境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173131_comment'></div>士不必勤，舟车舆马不必力，而已传其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173131", 1173131, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>邑都</span>，坐其堂奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173131_comment'></div>道途所次，升降之倦，凌冒之虞，无有接于其形，动于其虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173131_comment'></div>至则耳目口鼻百体之所养，如不出乎其家；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173131_comment'></div>父兄六亲故旧之人，朝夕相见，如不出乎其里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173131_comment'></div>山川之形，土田市井风谣习俗辞说之变，利害得失善恶之条贯，非其童子之所闻，则其少长之所游览；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173131_comment'></div>非其自得，则其乡之先生老者之所告也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173131_comment'></div>所居已安，所有事之宜，皆已习熟，如此故能专虑致劳职事，以宣上恩，而修百姓之急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173131_comment'></div>其施为先后，不待<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173131", 1173131, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>旁咨</span>久察，而与夺损益之几已断于胸中矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173131_comment'></div>岂累夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173131", 1173131, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>孤客</span>远寓之忧，而以茍且决事哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173131_comment'></div>临川江君任为洪之丰城，此两县者，牛羊之牧相交，树木果蔬五谷之垄相入也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173131_comment'></div>所谓九州之人各用于其土者，孰近于此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173131_comment'></div>既已得其所处之乐，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173131", 1173131, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>厌闻饫听</span>其人民之事，而江君又有聪明敏给之材、廉洁之行以行其政，吾知其不去图书讲论之适，宾客之好，而所为有馀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173131_comment'></div>盖县之治，则民自得于大山深谷之中，而州以无为于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173131_comment'></div>吾将见江西之幕府，无南向而虑者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173131_comment'></div>于其行，遂书以送之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173131_comment'></div>南丰曾巩序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1173131_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《与刘沆龙图启》以示谢意。<div id='poem_1173084' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173084' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173084?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与刘沆龙图启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173084")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173084_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173084'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173084'>右巩启：伏念巩方抱忧哀，且多疾病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173084_comment'></div>贫不得已，则俗事皆当自谋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173084_comment'></div>旅无所容，则世人谁肯见恤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173084_comment'></div>今者伏遇知府龙图给事，恺悌成德，劝勉为怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173084_comment'></div>忘后进之至微，假温颜而与接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173084_comment'></div>知其孤立，念其数奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173084_comment'></div>谓其有诗书之勤，则曲加于奖待；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173084_comment'></div>谓其有衣食之累，则特甚于矜怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173084_comment'></div>且使受田之获安，实由为地之至大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173084_comment'></div>在甘旨有毫发之助，于子弟乃丘山之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173084_comment'></div>况此馀庥，可均敝族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173084_comment'></div>虽远台坐，常注愚心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173084_comment'></div>复得交游之传，愈知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173084", 1173084, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>意爱</span>之厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173084_comment'></div>自非土石，岂不激昂？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173084_comment'></div>粗知古今，可胜感励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173084_comment'></div>恨当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173084", 1173084, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>迷塞</span>，曷用报偿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173084_comment'></div>而方先人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173084", 1173084, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>葬送</span>未成，偏亲之奉养多乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173084_comment'></div>四弟怀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173084", 1173084, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>仰哺</span>之托，九妹有待年之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173084_comment'></div>凡縻敝于秋毫，皆经营于方寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173084_comment'></div>顾惟私计，当议远游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173084_comment'></div>世俗险艰，岂谙尝之不熟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173084_comment'></div>性灵疏拙，实龃龉之可忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173084_comment'></div>未卜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173084", 1173084, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>趋承</span>，更增慕恋。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1173084_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《宿尊胜院》<div id='poem_220480' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220480' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220480?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宿尊胜院</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220480")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220480_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220480'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220480'>朝寒陟山砠，宵雨集僧堂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220480'>蔽衣盖苦短，客卧梦不长。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220480'>鸣风木间起，枯槁吹欲僵。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220480'>向来雪云端，叶下百仞隍。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220480'>起攀苍崖望，正受万虑戕。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220480'>岁运忽当尔，我颜安得芳。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220480'>传闻羡门仙，飞身憩苍苍。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220480'>谁能乞其灵，相与超八方。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220480'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_220480_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《里舍》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《代上蒋密学书》<div id='poem_1173074' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173074' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173074?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代上蒋密学书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173074")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173074_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173074'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173074'>夫蜀之奢闻天下，蜀之守前后相望，皆遂其俗而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173074_comment'></div>岂以俭为不美耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173074_comment'></div>盖蜀之守既贵重，而奢者人情之所便也，遂其俗者蜀人悦，而美名之所归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173074_comment'></div>彼席贵重之势，行所便而得美名，盖常人之所奔走也，夫谁肯舍而为俭哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173074_comment'></div>然不知夫推理而行俭者亦乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173074_comment'></div>变其俗而治，其始也，民虽疑且恐，且指目以谤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173074_comment'></div>其终也，必化以服，则美名安得而不归哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173074_comment'></div>是其为美名也，君子之所名，穷万世而不灭者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173074_comment'></div>然世不推其所以然，而相与立论曰：「蜀易恐以动，俗既久以固，其不可以更也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173074_comment'></div>是大不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173074_comment'></div>夫不知民之难与虑始也，当事之更也必怨，岂惟蜀？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173074_comment'></div>子产之治郑也，三年，郑人有欲杀子产者，夫非怨哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173074_comment'></div>然郑卒以大治，戴子产卒以如父母，其终也，化且服云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173074_comment'></div>此其效尤章章者也，岂患其易动哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173074_comment'></div>蜀也，皆天下之人也，一而治之，安有不同乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173074_comment'></div>至于俗也，有不变而治者，有变而治者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173074_comment'></div>所宜所尚，不变而治者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173074_comment'></div>非礼义之归，变而治者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173074_comment'></div>若蜀之奢，岂礼义之归乎，奚而不变也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173074_comment'></div>必也久且固焉，则遂之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173074_comment'></div>世之事入于乱者众矣，去治古远矣，举将遂之耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173074_comment'></div>必不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173074_comment'></div>然世所以莫或为与或为之而无其效者，是亦有二说，非如向之所云者一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173074_comment'></div>今之为吏者，势不得专且久，不专则谤易行，不久则化且服不可以俟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173074_comment'></div>是其所以莫或为与或为之而无其效也，可为太息也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173074_comment'></div>及昨者执事之入蜀也，独欲出数百年之表，修之于躬而化其俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173074_comment'></div>某闻之喜且慕，不知其至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173074_comment'></div>既而卒以不专则谤易行，不久则化且服不可以俟也而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173074_comment'></div>天下之望者，至今以为过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173074_comment'></div>某闻之嗟且恨，亦不知其至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173074_comment'></div>虽然，执事之推是心也，好古而非俗之愿也可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173074_comment'></div>夫好古而非俗之愿者，行于此亦必均于彼，推于一亦必应于万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173074_comment'></div>今执事之来馀杭也，其由是心欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173074_comment'></div>某也仰声义之旧，而其心有所迫切者，常人既不可以语，是以千里为近，以险途畏暑为广厦清凉，而自致于执事之门，以归计焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173074_comment'></div>岂惟以执事好古而非俗之愿为可望也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173074_comment'></div>抑亦以某人尝望辉光被收纳，有一日之素，而藉口以来，伏惟少垂听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173074_comment'></div>某之家本穷空，迨某人而始得禄，不十年而某人没，没之日赖于友以葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173074_comment'></div>既葬，而其孥流离于乡，数期之间，疾疠死丧，十口之所存者，惟老母与某也二而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173074_comment'></div>无田而耕也，无货与技以为商与工也，无力以佣也，无屋庐以居也，奉老母而寓食于人者，迨十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173074_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173074_comment'></div>是诚子之不孝者也，人之天穷者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173074_comment'></div>每观古人啜菽饮水亦养之说，而己尚不得有此，则昼而行，夜而卧，矍然而思，衋然而不知涕之交颐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173074_comment'></div>在上之君子闻是言也，知是人也，其哀之乎，抑不哀也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173074_comment'></div>不哀之而曰仁可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173074_comment'></div>哀之而不救之可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173074_comment'></div>今某也得有屋庐以居，十数亩之田以业，老农女之妻以爨，而身耕于外，以觊得菽水之资，而奉老母，给祭祀，则志愿足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173074_comment'></div>其为事至细，其为求至易与也，不过执事一器一会之所费而足济之矣，其忍有惜欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173074_comment'></div>十年而无可告者，今也遇执事，好古而非俗之愿者也，有一日之素者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173074_comment'></div>若告而又不见哀，哀而又不见振焉，则斯人也卒穷而死耳，岂有望于此哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173074_comment'></div>伏惟少留意而念焉<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1173074_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173074'><span class='label'>按：</span>《曾子固集》题作「代人上蒋密学」。<br /><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_49_1173074_0'>⑴ 《元丰类稿》卷五二。又见黄希宪刻本卷一六，《曾文定公集》卷五，《曾子固集》卷一七，安刻《南丰曾先生文粹》卷四，《圣宋文选》卷一四。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1173074_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《代人上永叔书》<div id='poem_1173076' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173076' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173076?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代人上永叔书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173076")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173076_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173076'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173076'>大有为之时不世得，众贤既已遭遇其时，方夙夜唯道深微之际，明王体，断国论，建万世之长策，佐明主于唐虞之盛，非阘茸曲士所能仰望其辉光也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173076_comment'></div>然使百姓人衍户格，四夷轨道，上下礼义粲然，此时于用材亦无遗弃者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173076_comment'></div>夫制阖运辟，尺枢之力耳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173076_comment'></div>夷荒植善，五寸之铁耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173076_comment'></div>二者皆微，有以用之，则人之兴居、天之长养待之然后安而有成，譬之偏材薄技，亦宜有所用之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173076_comment'></div>某撇虚颛蒙，不晓于义，国家幸以世德之故，引之仕籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173076_comment'></div>伏自思念，可以自效，唯首公营职，故朝而出，暮而归，让易即烦，有知必为，图所以展报而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173076_comment'></div>而州之守倅，部之使者，皆过引其长，而形之荐书，岂某之敢望？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173076_comment'></div>众君子成就之使然耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173076_comment'></div>执事旦夕辅天子，居庙堂，其有意于偏材薄技耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173076_comment'></div>幸有意，则某愿先出于门下，然非敢望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173076_comment'></div>傥以伯氏昔年京洛之旧，以庇其衰绪而振其子弟，则某不宜自后焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1173076_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《厄台记》<div id='poem_1173311' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173311' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173311?labeling=true' target='_blank'>厄台记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173311")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173311_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173311'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173311'>淮阳之南，地名曰厄台，询其父老，曰：夫子绝粮之所也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173311_comment'></div>夫天地欲泰而先否，日月欲明而先晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173311_comment'></div>天地不否，万物岂知大德乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173311_comment'></div>日月不晦，万物岂知大明乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173311_comment'></div>天下至圣者，尧、舜、禹、汤、文、武、周公、孔子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173311_comment'></div>尧有洪水之灾，舜有井禀之苦，禹有殛鲧之祸，汤有大旱之厄，文王有羑里之囚，周公有管、蔡之谤，孔子有绝粮之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173311_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173311_comment'></div>圣人承万古之美，岂以一身为贵乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173311_comment'></div>是知合天地之德，不能逃天地之数；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173311_comment'></div>齐日月之明，不能违日月之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173311_comment'></div>泰而不否，岂见圣人之志乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173311_comment'></div>明而不晦，岂见圣人之道乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173311_comment'></div>故孔子在陈也，讲诵弦歌，不改常性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173311_comment'></div>及犯围之出，列从而行，怡然而言，美之为幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173311_comment'></div>又曰：君子不困，不成王业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173311_comment'></div>果哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173311_comment'></div>身没之后，圣日皎然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173311_comment'></div>文明之君，封祀不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173311_comment'></div>有开必先，信其然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173311_comment'></div>于戏！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173311_comment'></div>先师夫子聘于时，民不否；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173311_comment'></div>迍于世，民不泰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173311_comment'></div>否则否于一时，泰则泰于万世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173311_comment'></div>是使后之王者知我先师之道，舍之则后，因之则昌，习之则贵，败之则亡，道之美此，孰为厄乎？</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1173311_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《代人上州牧》<div id='poem_1173077' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173077' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173077?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代人上州牧书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173077")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173077_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173077'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173077'>阁下之来，政事之行固有日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173077_comment'></div>某与州民食息耕蓺，凡有赖于上者，皆阁下之赐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173077_comment'></div>而某又于此时亡以自叙于铨，必得州檄为之明据，然后可以取信于公而得禄于家，至于文移屡干视听，是则居部属不为不幸，烦庇覆不谓不深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173077_comment'></div>然未尝敢造屏户之间、望几筵之末者，岂以怠堕而致旷阙？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173077_comment'></div>盖罪废之久，未敢自预于士大夫之行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173077_comment'></div>孤危之中，固颇不追人事之好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173077_comment'></div>其于退伏，祇欲自省而补其将来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173077_comment'></div>所赖至仁照以馀光，而恕其不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173077_comment'></div>今者忽以岁尽，迫将西行，而公檄未临，理当自请，故不复避尘渎之咎，而因辄自叙恳悃之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173077_comment'></div>伏惟抚临四民重失一物，宽其慢弛之罪，怜其屯踬之情，于符移不惜其行，于刺谒不求其至，既终公议，亦尉私怀。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1173077_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《代上张学士》<span class='inlineComment2'>（张学士疑为张方平。）</span><div id='poem_1173105' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173105' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173105?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代上张学士启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173105")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173105_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173105'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173105'>天下共论阁下之才、谅直之节形于朝廷，而廉退之行加于上下，为日旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173105_comment'></div>及拥节旄，分一面而使，当国家经费之广，而诸路争出计策以求馀财而自为功之时，阁下方悼百姓之穷，恶俗吏之薄，以出入期会之常奉贡赋之事，而以兼吏博爱之政被于绵地数千里之人，其明于轻重之间、利害之际，而其心岂近也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173105_comment'></div>故天下之士不远江海山陆之涂，不顾自进之嫌，而以争归阁下为事，诚以义之所在，则天下之所向也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173105_comment'></div>况于十州十县之地，百执事之人以身得察于左右者，其欣附复何如哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173105_comment'></div>而阁下又方不以位势之尊，不难诎降于人，以以四面进之，故自归者之日众，欣附者之日倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173105_comment'></div>夫何繇哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173105_comment'></div>理则然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173105_comment'></div>夫去小恶则大恶惧，举小善则众善兴，此非由他，盖人之情，谓上之人于善恶之别，且不遗其小者，而况于其远大者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173105_comment'></div>虽然，去恶以止恶，不若举善以励善，使人自趋，则不为恶，可以止恶之愈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173105_comment'></div>今使者之务宜无意于此者，而吴越之大，吏可谓有小善之资在可举之势者，岂无人哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173105_comment'></div>若某之微闇者，得以姓名彻阁下，而所以致其心力之劳过，蒙执系者之见识，尝赐之一言之奖，亦已久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173105_comment'></div>某者不敏于事，徒以先世之故，得有禄食之赐，又用举者之言且方窃邑于此，夙夜之所自励于此，邑之人曲直损益、沮劝废置之宜，而至于赋税发召、出入要会之故，未尝敢不尽其心焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173105_comment'></div>理之所在，惟其不达，茍达焉，未尝敢不循也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173105_comment'></div>理之所去，惟其不达，茍达焉，未尝敢不避也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173105_comment'></div>若此自强，虽不足谓美，然始终庶几无大旷，自亦蒙鄙之分所竭之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173105_comment'></div>伏惟执事者之贵听览之远，在其事亦已察矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173105_comment'></div>而某之不偶，一来为吏，饥寒骏奔十馀岁中，虽数枉有司之荐，而其穷固未动也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173105_comment'></div>今者幸遇阁下之仁，尝蒙一顾之重，若不进而言焉，则有自弃而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173105_comment'></div>诚以阁下之材德，天下以谓宜大用于朝，而不宜淹此一方也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173105_comment'></div>如一日去而坐廊庙之上，方当于天下之治，图其大者，则某之贱，或有所未暇及焉，是某之穷，无振之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173105_comment'></div>伏惟采其倾附之情，察其自竭之效，而矜其地势之若此，成以一言之奖，许以小善之进，则岂独孤陋之幸，亦所以使四方闻之，谓如某者且不弃于门下，则众善之劝必自此始焉，惟阁下留意。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1173105_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　曾巩居临川丁父忧，作《与王向书》<div id='poem_1173064' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173064' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173064?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与王向书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173064")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173064_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173064'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173064'>巩启：比得吕南公，爱其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173064_comment'></div>南公数称吾子，然恨未相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173064_comment'></div>及至南丰，又得黄曦，复爱其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173064_comment'></div>而吾子亦来，以文见贶，实可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173064", 1173064, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>叹爱</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173064_comment'></div>吾子与吕南公、黄曦皆秀出吾乡，一时之俊，私心喜慰，何可胜言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173064_comment'></div>惟强于自立，使可爱者，非特文词而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173064_comment'></div>此鄙劣所望于三君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173064_comment'></div>道中匆匆奉启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173064_comment'></div>不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1173064_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

如皋

-----title
玉山
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='d82564ae66844e4797e81abff3ca8d4b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d82564ae66844e4797e81abff3ca8d4b");'><span id='d82564ae66844e4797e81abff3ca8d4b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1036&endYear=1036')">1036年</a>，18岁</div><div id='d82564ae66844e4797e81abff3ca8d4b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1036&endYear=1036')">1036年5月</a>　曾巩与叔父易丰，兄曾斝、曾绎,弟曾牟、曾宰同游信州玉山小岩，作《游信州玉山小岩记》<div id='poem_1173317' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173317' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173317?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游信州玉山小岩记</a><span class='authorDate'>（景祐三年五月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173317")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173317_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173317'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173317'>去县所东南二十五里，有山秀特卓诡，介然出于群峰之表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173317_comment'></div>治下有浮图，幽邃冲静，栋宇朴约，无彩饰刻镂，而与俗绝远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173317_comment'></div>游其间，真若排阊阖，登阆风，追伯侨、羡门而与之驰骋，翩翩然有超忽荒萧烟外之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173317_comment'></div>景祐二年，家尊受诏为是邑宰，仆侍偕来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173317_comment'></div>至未周岁，居甚无事，思有以远览，为尘外之乐者，得是小岩焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173317_comment'></div>其状略曰：距寺西南隅四十步有奇，逾小桥，西北至于岩下，隆然而有门，初若隘局不可通者，入其中，辟而益广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173317_comment'></div>其道盘屈崄嶬而无光明，隆超俯降，登陟艰难甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173317_comment'></div>乃命仆人秉烛，破其晻翳昧默，群而入焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173317_comment'></div>其石之异，有重碧耸翠，崛然本于下而起者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173317_comment'></div>有势依理合，峨然覆于空而存者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173317_comment'></div>有鳞累羽缀，委其旁而列者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173317_comment'></div>有壁峭刃攒，缭其隅而倚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173317_comment'></div>森然巍然，瑰玮奇怪，与珉瑊其远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173317_comment'></div>控其穴，犬牙交峙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173317_comment'></div>视其形，若圭璧联植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173317_comment'></div>致若瞻浮云，枝匽叶丽，错置旁列乎空旷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173317_comment'></div>骇若窥武库，巉然见戈甲丛委，并拥乎王府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173317_comment'></div>行十馀步，上下有水声潺然，若急鸣玉而趋者，非丝竹也，而听之者心平气舒，吁乎韶濩之奏，有忘形绝累之趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173317_comment'></div>益知轩冕而荣者为其外，恬静而居者为其内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173317_comment'></div>又行二十馀步，至于西北隅，有若架危构虚成宫殿而宅浮图之像者，上蔽下承，中旷然甚夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173317_comment'></div>其下有钟乳，围五六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173317_comment'></div>凝而欲滴者，若檐溜垂空，合而外结；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173317_comment'></div>积而广者，若聚雪委平厓，侧崇而未浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173317_comment'></div>腻如酥凝，分如爪形，垂如盖张，色若海波，风聚而沫，食之咁吻津舌，异若蔗浆露蕊焉，殚乎美味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173317_comment'></div>说者云：可以安躬辅气，颐精休神，为不死之药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173317_comment'></div>自始通至于其深，飙发众窍，当之怆然体清，歘振忽怒，反炀为冷，幽虫伏蛇，往往鸣息其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173317_comment'></div>又行三十馀步，状益奇诡，而石上俛压乃可前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173317_comment'></div>人甚疲，而恐惧者益众，仆固求穷其终而不我从，遂相与复还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173317_comment'></div>噫嘻！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173317_comment'></div>使我遗泉石之胜而不得远骋周视，良可惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173317_comment'></div>是日之会者，叔父易丰伯洪，伯氏斝成之、绎世昌，仲氏牟子进、宰元辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173317_comment'></div>其名皆以书于石矣，惧其远而翰墨剥缺也，复使仆实其事，为记以诒永久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173317_comment'></div>乌乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173317_comment'></div>自古述山水者多矣，见其瑰美幽丽而多诿之神明之为者，其言怪诞迂谲，非戴縰垂绅而游者所宜尚，予不敢知也，故于是而独无取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173317_comment'></div>若夫觞豆之丰约，弦革之嘲轰，皆羁于流俗而不有异，非书岩石之本，辄复略其辞焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173317_comment'></div>是时景祐三年仲夏五月戊子日也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1173317_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
赣州

<div class='label1' id='57f11d4ae5a34725b5f9f3499e55cc23_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("57f11d4ae5a34725b5f9f3499e55cc23");'><span id='57f11d4ae5a34725b5f9f3499e55cc23_link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_220357", 220357, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>龙潭</span>瀑布入胸臆，叹息但谢宗与雷。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220357'>著书岂即遽有补，天下自古无能才。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_220357'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_220357_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　南城王无咎请字，曾巩作《王无咎字序》<div id='poem_1173136' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173136' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173136?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王无咎字序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173136")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173136_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173136'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173136'>名字者，人之所假借以自称道，亦使人假借以称道己之辞也，非若行然，不可以假借云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173136_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173136_comment'></div>问其名曰忠与义，其字亦然，则人无有求其信然者，责其不然者，知其假借云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173136_comment'></div>问其行曰忠与义，则人皆求其信然者，责其不然者，其可以假借云乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173136_comment'></div>然而人无贵贱愚良，一欲善其名字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173136_comment'></div>夫欲善其名字者非他，亦曰爱其身而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173136_comment'></div>爱其身而不善充之，犹曰姑以圣贤之道假借其身而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173136_comment'></div>不诚乎身莫大焉，岂爱其身也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173136_comment'></div>不若于名字乎勿求胜焉，于行乎汲汲尔以爱其身，是以圣贤之道归诸其身也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173136_comment'></div>以为爱其身非至，夫然，而人一皆善其名字，未尝一皆善其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173136_comment'></div>有爱其身之心，而于其身反尔其薄也，可嗟也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173136_comment'></div>南城王无咎来请字，余思夫字虽不必求胜也，然古之人重冠，于冠重字，字则亦未可忽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173136_comment'></div>今冠礼废，字亦非其时，古礼之不行也甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173136_comment'></div>无咎之请也，虽非时之当，然庶几存其礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173136_comment'></div>予欲拒，安得而拒也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173136_comment'></div>取《易》所谓无咎者，善补过者也，为之字曰补之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173136_comment'></div>夫勉焉而补其所不至，颜子之所以为学者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173136_comment'></div>补之明经术，为古文辞，其材卓然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173136", 1173136, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>可畏</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173136_comment'></div>以颜子之所以为学者期乎己，余之所望于补之也，假借乎己而已矣，岂予之所望于补之哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1173136_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end
