开封
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='1f1e0d34f8724544a5c4c469ad43736b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1f1e0d34f8724544a5c4c469ad43736b");'><span id='1f1e0d34f8724544a5c4c469ad43736b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1042')">1041-1042年</a>，23-24岁</div><div id='1f1e0d34f8724544a5c4c469ad43736b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　曾巩入太学，与王君俞相识、定交，相与讲学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年秋</a>　曾巩与王安石相识、定交，客庖共食。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　曾巩在京师避兄而舍，遭人谤议。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　曾巩谒欧阳修，有《上欧阳学士第一书》，并献杂文时务策两编。<div id='poem_1173039' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173039' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173039?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上欧阳学士第一书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173039")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173039_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173039'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173039'>学士执事：夫世之所谓大贤者，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173039_comment'></div>以其明圣人之心于百世之上，明圣人之心于百世之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173039_comment'></div>其口讲之，身行之，以其馀者，又书存之，三者必相表里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173039_comment'></div>其仁与义，磊磊然横天地，冠古今，不穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173039_comment'></div>其闻与实，卓卓然轩士林，犹雷霆震而风飙驰，不浮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173039_comment'></div>则其谓之大贤，与穹壤等高大，与《诗》《书》所称无间宜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173039_comment'></div>夫道之难全也，周公之政不可见，而仲尼生于干戈之间，无时无位，存帝王之法于天下，俾学者有所依归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173039_comment'></div>仲尼既没，析辨诡词，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>骊驾</span>塞路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173039_comment'></div>观圣人之道者，宜莫如于孟、荀、扬、韩四君子之书也，舍是醨矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173039_comment'></div>退之既没，骤登其域，广开其辞，使圣人之道复明于世，亦难矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173039_comment'></div>近世学士，饰藻缋以誇诩，增刑法以趋向，析<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>财利</span>以拘曲者，则有闻矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173039_comment'></div>仁义礼乐之道，则为民之师表者，尚不识其所为，而况百姓之蚩蚩乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173039_comment'></div>圣人之道泯泯没没，其不绝若一发之系千钧也，耗矣哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173039_comment'></div>非命世大贤，以仁义为己任者，畴能救而振之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173039_comment'></div>巩自成童闻执事之名，及长得执事之文章，口诵而心记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173039_comment'></div>观其根极理要，拨正邪僻，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>掎挈</span>当世，张皇大中，其深纯温厚，与孟子、韩吏部之书为相唱和，无半言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>片辞</span>舛驳于其间，真六经之羽翼，道义之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>师祖</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173039_comment'></div>既有志于学，于时事，万亦识其一焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173039_comment'></div>则又闻执事之行事，不顾流俗之态，卓然以体道扶教为己务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173039_comment'></div>往者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>推吐</span>赤心，敷建大论，不与高明，独援摧缩，俾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>蹈正</span>者有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/75/Comments/1")'>禀法</span>，怀疑者有所问执，义益坚而德益高，出乎外者合乎内，推于人者诚于己，信所谓能言之，能行之，既有德而且有言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173039_comment'></div>韩退之没，观圣人之道者，固在执事之门矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173039_comment'></div>天下学士，有志于圣人者，莫不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>攘袂引领</span>，愿受指教，听诲谕，宜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173039_comment'></div>窃计将明圣人之心于百世之下者，亦不以语言退托而拒学者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173039_comment'></div>巩性朴陋，无所能似，家世为儒，故不业他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173039_comment'></div>自幼逮长，努力文字间，其心之所得庶不凡近，尝自谓于圣人之道，有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>丝发</span>之见焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173039_comment'></div>周游当世，常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>斐然</span>有扶衰救缺之心，非徒嗜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>皮肤</span>，随<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>波流</span>，搴枝叶而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173039_comment'></div>惟其寡与俗人合也，于公卿之门未尝有姓名，亦无达者之车回顾其疏贱，抱道而无所与论，心常愤愤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>悱悱</span>，恨不得发也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173039_comment'></div>今者乃敢因简墨布腹心于执事，茍得望执事之门而入，则圣人之堂奥室家，巩自知亦可以少分万一于其间也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173039_comment'></div>执事将推仁义之道，横天地，冠古今，则宜取奇伟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>闳通</span>之士，使趋理不避荣辱利害，以共争先王之教于衰灭之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173039_comment'></div>谓执事无意焉，则巩不信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173039_comment'></div>若巩者，亦粗可以为多士先矣，执事其亦受之而不拒乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173039_comment'></div>伏惟不以己长退人，察<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>愚言</span>而矜怜之，知巩非茍慕执事者，慕观圣人之道于执事者也，是其存心亦不凡近矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173039_comment'></div>若其以庸众待之，寻常拒之，则巩之望于世者愈狭，而执事之循诱亦未广矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173039_comment'></div>窃料有心于圣人者，固不如是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173039_comment'></div>觊少垂意而图之，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>谨献</span>杂文时务策两编，其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/142/Comments/0")'>传缮</span>不谨，其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/143/Comments/0")'>简帙</span>大小不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/143/Comments/1")'>均齐</span>，巩贫故也，观其内而略其外可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173039_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/146/Comments/0")'>干浼</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1173039", 1173039, "Clauses/146/Comments/1")'>清重</span>，悚仄悚仄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173039_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173039_comment'></div>巩再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1173039_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　曾巩屡受欧阳修称誉。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　曾巩长妹嫁关景晖。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　田况为谏官，曾巩上书讽之使言，有《上田正言书》<div id='poem_1173067' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173067' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173067?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上田正言书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173067")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173067_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173067'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173067'>伏闻诏书以执事直谏院，不胜喜贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173067_comment'></div>夫以执事蓄才美，知古今，力学，善论得失法度，朝廷固以公卿待执事，不止为谏官也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173067_comment'></div>然巩区区致喜贺者，亦有云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173067_comment'></div>方今内外居位之士以千数，贵者贱者举措趋向一本于茍且，天下没没，日就衰缺，虑终不可更兴起，四方每见用一伟人，则皆曰：「是人也，天子特达用之，其能使古道庶几可复见乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173067_comment'></div>群臣颙颙，思见其为国家兴太平也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173067_comment'></div>天下既以此望之，而又为公卿大夫侍从司计谋、持纪纲之臣，是宜朝拜职而夕建言，使四方闻之，皆曰：「天子明于知人，而群君子不负天子之知、天下之望矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173067_comment'></div>其久而默默而自欺也，岂国家用贤者意适然哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173067_comment'></div>四方有司论而疑，且叹息者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173067_comment'></div>始者执事为天下主军画在外，朝之士大夫每禁林台阁有虚位，则人人皆意执事宜为之，至今而乃为谏官，非大位，然论议一皆司之，则非大位，乃大任也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173067_comment'></div>谏官<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173067", 1173067, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>刚果</span>有气节，不浮沉，则得失利病，上无不闻，下无不达也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173067_comment'></div>谏官与时俯仰，则天下之事，上欲闻而不悉，下欲言而不通矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173067_comment'></div>非直如此，又且导其恶闻下之言，畏言上之事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173067_comment'></div>历观前世之得失，而察当时谏官有言与否，则为谏官贤不肖立定是则：凡居其职者，固以一人之身而系天下之得失，当万世之是非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173067_comment'></div>其重较然者，于内外之利病，主虽力行之，其事不可，则宜争而舍之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173067_comment'></div>主虽力止之，其事当然，则论而行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173067_comment'></div>不听，则继言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173067_comment'></div>又不听，至于再三，则释其位而去矣可也，固非谓从时重而乡背者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173067_comment'></div>今世有为谏官者，设曰：「吾某日言某事，吾塞责矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173067_comment'></div>及章下而省其言，不过趑趄簿书畦陇閒浅事，一纸之中尚十七八避就时人喜怒，不然则迂僻诞幻而不可世用者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173067_comment'></div>又有居其位而不听，又不引去者，天下以为是非固不论而易明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173067_comment'></div>今如执事者，始自举曰贤而能谏诤，天子以为然而遂用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173067_comment'></div>今用矣，虽欲因循畏避自同于众人，固不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173067_comment'></div>然世傥有不顾其不可而为之者，则执事岂曰：「是人也，是徒以一时文字声名倾四海而取进耳，乃世之以浮道相悦附而蹈利者之所为，非有志者所忍肆也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173067_comment'></div>昔汉有公孙、杜钦、邺、谷永，皆贤良选用，计其一时之名迹，不减于今世也，其才岂尽不及今人哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173067_comment'></div>当时既得名位，而终于无所开陈，以至于泯泯其始于人而以为安矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173067_comment'></div>由今观之，则谀之迹固不可掩也，后人已见其如此，又忍循其邪径乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173067_comment'></div>窃计须自择也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173067_comment'></div>天下自唐天宝以来，上下汲汲，以谋相倾，材力相长，雄兵相制伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173067_comment'></div>百姓靡靡，日入于困穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173067_comment'></div>生于困穷，欲勿为罪戾，不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173067_comment'></div>今刑日烦而民愈薄，利愈竭而用不足，人益困而敛未休，可为太息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173067_comment'></div>执事既居得言之任，将终为身谋而已，则巩言虽切何用？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173067_comment'></div>若欲兴太平，报国家，则愿无容容而随俗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173067_comment'></div>矧执事计当世之得失已详矣，忿世俗之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1173067", 1173067, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>垢玩</span>有素矣，士君子用舍、去就、轻重之分，又岂不尽知而熟晓也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173067_comment'></div>巩是以闻成命而不觉喜，且以为贺也，想日夕当有言，故陈区区，少助思虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173067_comment'></div>今世布衣多不谈治道，巩未尝一造而辄吐情实，诚有所发愤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173067_comment'></div>伏惟不甚怪怒而省察之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1173067_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>　曾巩由太学选拔参加礼部试落第。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>　曾巩将归江西，欧阳修作《送曾巩秀才序》送之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年春</a>　曾巩将归江西，别王安石。作品：《寄王介卿》<div id='poem_220482' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220482' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220482?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄王介卿</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220482")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220482_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220482'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220482'>忆昨走京尘，衡门始相识。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220482'>疏帘挂秋日，客庖留共食。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220482'>纷纷说古今，洞不置藩域。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220482'>有司甄栋干，度量弃樗栎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220482'>振辔行尚早，分首学堧北。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220482'>初冬憩海昏，夜坐探书策。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220482'>始得读君文，大匠谢刀尺。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220482'>周孔日已远，遗经窜墙壁。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220482'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_220482", 220482, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>倡佯</span>百怪起，冠裾稔回慝。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220482'>君材信<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_220482", 220482, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>魁崛</span>，议论恣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_220482", 220482, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>排辟</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220482'>如川流浑浑，东海为委积。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220482'>如跻极高望，万物著春色。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220482'>寥寥孟韩后，斯文大难得。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220482'>嗟予见之晚，反复不能释。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220482'>胡然蕴环堵，不救谋者惑。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220482'>明朝渡江还，念念非可抑。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_220482'>如酲冒炎暑，每进意愈塞。<div id='poem_sentence_16_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_220482'>维时南风薰，木叶晃繁碧。<div id='poem_sentence_17_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_220482'>颓云走石濑，逆阪上文艗。<div id='poem_sentence_18_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_220482'>欣闻被檄来，穷阎驻镳轼。<div id='poem_sentence_19_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_220482'>促榻叩其言，咸池播纯绎。<div id='poem_sentence_20_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_220482'>行身抗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_220482", 220482, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>渊损</span>，及物窥龙稷。<div id='poem_sentence_21_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_220482'>绸缪指疵病，攻砭甚针石。<div id='poem_sentence_22_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_220482'>浅沚有停沙，亦可洗珠璧。<div id='poem_sentence_23_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_220482'>论忧或共嚬，遇惬每同赥。<div id='poem_sentence_24_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_220482'>正值祝融横，金隅未提职。<div id='poem_sentence_25_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_220482'>高楼豁可望，命载屡攀陟。<div id='poem_sentence_26_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_220482'>一不罗俗嬉，怡然治纨墨。<div id='poem_sentence_27_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_220482'>露注尚忘疲，更待蟾蜍昃。<div id='poem_sentence_28_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_220482'>雅爱张与余，挽之置茵席。<div id='poem_sentence_29_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_220482'>群儿困不酬，吽嚬聚讥谪。<div id='poem_sentence_30_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_220482'>仁义殊龃龉，昧者尊恶<span class='inlineComment2'>（音乌）</span>砳<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作蹠）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_31_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_220482'>雾草变衰黄，吟蛩闹朝夕。<div id='poem_sentence_32_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_220482'>君子畏简书，薄言返行役。<div id='poem_sentence_33_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_220482'>商歌孺子别，失泪染衣襋。<div id='poem_sentence_34_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_220482'>自从促棹去，会此隆冬逼。<div id='poem_sentence_35_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_220482'>何神鼓阴韛，万窍动<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_220482", 220482, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>謞激</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_36_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_220482'>城颠睨江浪，蛟怪助<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_220482", 220482, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>掀射</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_37_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_220482'>仁贤保无恙，所想挂惊惕。<div id='poem_sentence_38_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_220482'>烨烨多隶从，良已匮藜齸。<div id='poem_sentence_39_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_220482'>迨兹尺书至，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_220482", 220482, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>疑念</span>始冰析。<div id='poem_sentence_40_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_220482'>兰𣺫沓慈祥，筠梧肆谐适。<div id='poem_sentence_41_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_220482'>缤纷众胥士，署垒各嬉息。<div id='poem_sentence_42_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_220482'>其馀书牍背，粟密缕机织。<div id='poem_sentence_43_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_220482'>卷书劳来干，寸怀良自怿。<div id='poem_sentence_44_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_220482'>野泊转平绿，梅梢弄繁白。<div id='poem_sentence_45_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_220482'>金绦引柳荑，芳气满原泽。<div id='poem_sentence_46_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_220482'>出门无所抵，归卧四楹寂。<div id='poem_sentence_47_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_220482'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_220482", 220482, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>术学</span>颇思讲，人事多可恻。<div id='poem_sentence_48_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_220482'>含意不得发，百愤注微臆。<div id='poem_sentence_49_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_220482'>摇摇咏颜色，企足关途隔。<div id='poem_sentence_50_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_220482'>自惭儿女情，宛转抱凄戚。<div id='poem_sentence_51_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_220482'>吾念非吾私，何当托云翼。<div id='poem_sentence_52_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_220482'>奇偶转如轮，终期援<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_220482", 220482, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>焦溺</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_53_220482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　曾巩与其长兄同往应试，均不中。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='9a71cee148cc400b9d286605030cb0a0_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9a71cee148cc400b9d286605030cb0a0");'><span id='9a71cee148cc400b9d286605030cb0a0_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1057')">1056-1057年</a>，38-39岁</div><div id='9a71cee148cc400b9d286605030cb0a0' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　曾巩在太学，曾听李觏讲学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩及弟赠牟、曾布、从弟曾阜、妹婿王无咎、王彦深，俱中进士第。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩作《刑赏论》<div id='poem_1173187' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173187' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173187?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刑赏论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173187")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173187_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173187'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173187'>《书》记皋陶之说曰：「罪疑惟轻，功疑惟重」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173187_comment'></div>释者曰：刑疑附轻，赏疑从重，忠厚之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173187_comment'></div>夫有大罪者，其刑薄则不必当罪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173187_comment'></div>有细功者，其赏厚则不必当功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173187_comment'></div>然所以为忠厚之至者，何以论之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173187_comment'></div>夫圣人之治也，自闺门、乡党至于朝廷皆有教，以率天下之善，则有罪者易以寡也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173187_comment'></div>自小者、近者至于远大皆有法，以成天下之务，则有功者易以众也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173187_comment'></div>以圣神渊懿之德而为君于上，以道德修明之士而为其公卿百官于下，以上下交修而尽天下之谋虑，以公听并观而尽天下之情伪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173187_comment'></div>当是之时，人之有罪与功也，为有司者推其本末以考其迹，核其虚实以审其情，然后告之于朝而加其罚、出其赏焉，则其于得失岂有不尽也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173187_comment'></div>然及其罪丽于罚、功丽于赏之可以疑也，以其君臣之材非不足于天下之智，以其谋虑非不通于天下之理，以其观听非不周于天下之故，以其有司非不尽于天下之明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173187_comment'></div>然有其智而不敢以为果有其通，与周与明而不敢以为察也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173187_comment'></div>必曰罪疑矣而过刑，则无罪者不必免也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173187_comment'></div>功疑矣而失赏，则有功者不必酬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173187_comment'></div>于是其刑之也，宁薄而不敢使之过；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173187_comment'></div>其赏之也，宁厚而不敢使之失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173187_comment'></div>夫先之以成教以率之矣，及其有罪也，而加恕如此焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173187_comment'></div>先之以成法以导之矣，及其不功也，而加隆如此焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173187_comment'></div>可谓尽其心以爱人，尽其道以待物矣，非忠厚之至则能然乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173187_comment'></div>皋陶以是称舜，舜以是治其天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173187_comment'></div>故刑不必察，察当其罪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173187_comment'></div>赏不必予，予当其功，而天下化其忠，服其厚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173187_comment'></div>故曰：「与其杀不辜，宁失不经，好生之德洽于民心」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173187_comment'></div>言圣人之德至于民者，不在乎其他也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173187_comment'></div>及周之治，亦为三宥三赦之法，不敢果其疑，而至其政之成也，则忠厚之教行于牛羊而及于草木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173187_comment'></div>汉文亦推是意以薄刑，而其流也，风俗亦归厚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173187_comment'></div>盖其行之有深浅，而其见效有小大也，如此，《书》之意岂虚云乎哉？</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1173187_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩撰《故朝散大夫尚书刑部侍郎中充天章阁待制兼侍读上轻车都尉赐紫金鱼袋孙公行状》<div id='poem_1173320' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173320' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173320?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故朝散大夫尚书刑部郎中充天章阁待制兼侍读上轻车都尉赐紫金鱼袋孙公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年正月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173320")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173320_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173320'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173320'>曾祖恕，皇任博州堂邑县主簿，赠太子中舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173320_comment'></div>祖贲，皇任尚书库部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173320_comment'></div>父从革，皇赠尚书职方员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173320_comment'></div>公讳甫，字之翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173320_comment'></div>天圣五年同学究出身，为蔡州汝阳县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173320_comment'></div>八年进士及第，为华州观察推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173320_comment'></div>华州仓粟恶，吏当负钱数百万，转运使李纮以吏属公，公令取斗粟舂之，可弃者十才居一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173320_comment'></div>又试之亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173320_comment'></div>吏遂得弛，负钱数十万而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173320_comment'></div>纮以此多公，荐之，迁大理寺丞、知绛州翼城县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173320_comment'></div>枢密直学士杜公衍奏知永兴军司录，迁殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173320_comment'></div>枢密直学士张公逸奏监益州交子务，迁太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173320_comment'></div>庆历二年，杜公为枢密副使，又荐之，得试为秘阁校理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173320_comment'></div>三年改右正言，知谏院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173320_comment'></div>因灾异，言应天所以谴告之意者，在诚其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173320_comment'></div>有其诚矣，所以顺天者，在爱其民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173320_comment'></div>于是遂请斥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173320", 1173320, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>浮费</span>，出宫女，除别库之私以宽赋敛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173320_comment'></div>初，李元昊反河西，契丹亦以兵近边，谋弃约，任事者于西方益禁兵二十万，北方益土兵亦二十万，又益禁兵四十指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173320_comment'></div>及群盗张海、郭邈山等劫京西，江淮之间皆警，是时已更用大臣矣，又令天下益禁兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173320_comment'></div>公言曰：「天下所以大困者，在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173320", 1173320, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>浮费</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173320_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173320", 1173320, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>浮费</span>之广者，兵为甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173320_comment'></div>今不能损，又何益之邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173320_comment'></div>且兵已百万矣，不能止盗，而但欲多兵，岂可谓知所先后哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173320_comment'></div>不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173320_comment'></div>于是极论古今养兵多少之利害以闻，语诋大臣尤切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173320_comment'></div>既而保州有兵变，朝廷赏先言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173320_comment'></div>公以谓有先言者，而枢密院不以时下，不可以无责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173320_comment'></div>天子曰：「某，吾方倚以治也，不可使去位」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173320_comment'></div>公犹固请议其罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173320_comment'></div>边将刘沪谋立水洛城，与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1173320", 1173320, "Clauses/79/Comments/1")'>部署</span>狄青、尹洙议不合，沪违其节度，遂立之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173320_comment'></div>青等械系沪以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173320_comment'></div>公言曰：「城之所以蔽秦，而通秦、渭之援，宜不废其功，而赦沪之辄」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173320_comment'></div>遂从公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173320_comment'></div>燕王薨，大臣谓用不足，欲缓葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173320_comment'></div>公言曰：「燕王，上之叔父，葬不可以不如礼」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173320_comment'></div>又言后宫事，又言宰相罪当罢，皆行其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173320_comment'></div>上既罢宰相，而用某为参知政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173320_comment'></div>又言某不可任以政，天子难之，因求为外官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173320_comment'></div>而是时，朋党之议亦已起，大臣相次去位，公上书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1173320", 1173320, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>论争</span>，语尤切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173320_comment'></div>已而奉使契丹，还，迁右司谏、知邓州，徙安州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173320_comment'></div>又徙江南东路转运使，又徙两浙，迁起居舍人、尚书兵部员外郎，改直史馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173320_comment'></div>知陕府，简厨传之费，陕人安之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173320_comment'></div>邻州岁时以酒相庆问，公命储别藏，备官用，一不归于己，至今遂为法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173320_comment'></div>徙晋州，近臣过晋，夜半叩城欲入，公曰：「城有法，吾不得独私」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173320_comment'></div>终不为开门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173320_comment'></div>徙河东转运使，赐金紫服，入为三司度支副使，输物非土有者，公为变其法，使之代输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173320_comment'></div>至和三年，迁刑部郎中，入天章阁为待制，遂为河北都转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173320_comment'></div>疾不行，又兼侍读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173320_comment'></div>嘉祐二年正月二十一日卒于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173320_comment'></div>公博学强记，其气温，其貌如不能自持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173320_comment'></div>及与人言，反覆经史，上下千有馀年，贯穿通洽，不可窥其际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173320_comment'></div>而退视其家，初未尝蓄书，盖既读之，终身多不忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173320_comment'></div>其居官，于其大者既可知已，于其小者，亦皆尽其意云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173320_comment'></div>虽贵而衣食薄，无妾媵，不饰玩好，不与酣乐，泊如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173320_comment'></div>时从当世处士讲评，以为遂其好，而客或造其席者，与之言终日，不能以势利及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173320_comment'></div>其于人少合，亦不求其详，所与之合，亦不阿其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1173320_comment'></div>盖公与河南尹洙相友善，而尤为杜丞相所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1173320_comment'></div>庆历之间，二三大臣又与公同心任事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1173320_comment'></div>然至于论保州之变，则所指者盖杜公；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1173320_comment'></div>非益兵之议，则所诋者盖二三大臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1173320_comment'></div>至于城水洛也，又绌尹洙而申刘沪，其不偏于所好如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1173320_comment'></div>然已而朋党之议起，大臣多被逐，公之争论尤切，亦不自以为疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1173320_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1173320_comment'></div>可谓自信独立矣，可以观公之行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1173320_comment'></div>所著《唐史记》七十五篇，以谓己之学、治乱得失之说具于此，可以观公之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1173320_comment'></div>公殁，有诏求其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1173320_comment'></div>公享年六十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1173320_comment'></div>其先开封扶沟人，至公之祖，徙许之阳翟，今为阳翟人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1173320_comment'></div>母李氏，长安县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1173320_comment'></div>妻某氏，某县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1173320_comment'></div>子宜，滑州观察推官，实、寘皆将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1173320_comment'></div>宜等以状来属巩，谨序次其实可传于后世者如右，谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_71_1173320_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩见刘伯声。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩与王深父别。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩观梅尧臣堂前石榴花。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩与梅尧臣别，梅尧臣作《送曾子固苏轼》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　梅尧臣作《重送曾子固》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩及第后将归，欧阳修、梅尧臣、王安石为之饯行。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩及第将归，刘敞亦觞之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩作《谢解启》<div id='poem_1173085' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173085' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173085?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢解启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173085")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173085_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173085'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173085'>伏睹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173085", 1173085, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>解文</span>，首蒙举选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173085_comment'></div>伏念巩才非卓越，识匪该通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173085_comment'></div>素志慕乎古人，故时情之所背；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173085_comment'></div>虚名闻于当世，故众忌之所排。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173085_comment'></div>患难艰危，流离<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173085", 1173085, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>顿挫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173085_comment'></div>孰有至孤之迹，敢萌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173085", 1173085, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>希进</span>之心？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173085_comment'></div>顾生理之难周，迫私衷之可念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173085_comment'></div>学而干禄，诚匪素怀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173085_comment'></div>仕以为贫，窃将自比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173085_comment'></div>是以闻诏之出，负笈以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173085_comment'></div>岂意片文，首尘高选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173085_comment'></div>以至天伦之薄陋，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173085", 1173085, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>子党</span>之空疏，皆自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173085", 1173085, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>单平</span>，得蒙收齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173085_comment'></div>退惟会合，亦有端原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173085_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官崇奖士伦，助成世教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173085_comment'></div>以虹蜺之光而被饰，以律吕之气而吹嘘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173085_comment'></div>致此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173085", 1173085, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>屯穷</span>，阶于振发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173085_comment'></div>敢不勉增素学，益励前修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173085_comment'></div>庶全必胜之名，以答至公之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173085_comment'></div>谨奉启陈谢。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1173085_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='5342a148d2b4496cad02abe27aac8176_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5342a148d2b4496cad02abe27aac8176");'><span id='5342a148d2b4496cad02abe27aac8176_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1069')">1060-1069年</a>，42-51岁</div><div id='5342a148d2b4496cad02abe27aac8176' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　曾巩作《送吴秀才》<span class='inlineComment2'>（疑曾巩已在京师。）</span><div id='poem_220454' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220454' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220454?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送吴秀才</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_220454_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220454'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220454'>一年<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_1_220454'>春来远近不可问，冷碧先归在流水。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220454_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220454'>梅花向今独已繁，<span class='link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　曾巩撰《双君夫人刑氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173364' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173364' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173364?labeling=true' target='_blank'>双君夫人邢氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐六年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173364")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173364_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173364'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173364'>夫人邢氏，无为军巢人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173364_comment'></div>嫁为赠大理寺丞姓双氏讳华之妻，封万年县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173364_comment'></div>子男三人：曰渐，为尚书屯田员外郎、通判吉州军州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173364_comment'></div>馀未名，皆早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173364_comment'></div>夫人年八十有六，嘉祐四年九月二十七日卒于宣州之官舍，六年十二月二十七日葬于无为军巢县无为乡恽良里之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173364_comment'></div>方大理府君之在隐约，屯田始就书学，夫人能经理其家，使无内忧，以卒就其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173364_comment'></div>及屯田有列于朝，夫人食其禄养，就封大县，实受成报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173364_comment'></div>天之施与善人，岂非信哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173364_comment'></div>夫人之在疾也，屯田之配长寿县君陈氏，供养营救，有过人之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173364_comment'></div>州上其事，天子闻而嘉之，敕州使致粟帛赐其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173364_comment'></div>于是人知夫人之善，不独能成其子，又能化其家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173364_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1173364'>允淑夫人，秉是壸彝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173364_comment'></div>有韡车服，维宠嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173364_comment'></div>葬有卜壤，其吉在斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173364_comment'></div>推求美实，视此铭辞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1173364_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　曾巩编校史馆书籍，任馆阁校勘。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年3月</a>　妻晁文柔卒。<br /><a id='poem_content_220369'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220369'>孺人舍我亡，稚子未堪役。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220369_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_220369", 220369, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>煎熬</span>需日力。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220369_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='/Writing/220445?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秋夜</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220445")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220445_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220445'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220445'>秋露随节至，宵零在幽篁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220445'>灏气入我牖，萧然衾簟凉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220445'>念往不能寐，枕书嗟漏长。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220445'>平生肺腑友，一诀馀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_220445", 220445, id='poem_sentence_4_220445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220445'>偕老遂不可，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_220445", 220445, id='poem_sentence_8_220445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220445'>诚知百无益，恩义故难忘。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220445'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_220445_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年11月5日</a>　曾巩撰《清心亭记》<div id='poem_1173294' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173294' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173294?labeling=true' target='_blank'>清心亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐七年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173294")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173294_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173294'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173294'>嘉祐六年，尚书虞部员外郎梅君为徐之萧县，改作其治所之东亭，以为燕息之所，而名之曰清心之亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173294_comment'></div>是岁秋冬，来请记于京师，属余有亡妹殇女之悲，不果为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173294_comment'></div>明年春又来请，属余有悼亡之悲，又不果为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173294_comment'></div>而其请犹不止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173294_comment'></div>至冬乃为之记曰：夫人之所以神明其德，与天地同其变化者，夫岂远哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173294_comment'></div>生于心而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173294_comment'></div>若夫极天下之知，以穷天下之理，于夫性之在我者，能尽之，命之在彼者，能安之，则万物之自外至者，安能累我哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173294_comment'></div>此君子之所以虚其心也，万物不累我矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173294_comment'></div>而应乎万物，与民同其吉凶者，亦未尝废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173294_comment'></div>于是有法诫之设，邪僻之防，此君子之所以斋其心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173294_comment'></div>虚其心者，极乎精微，所以入神也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173294_comment'></div>斋其心者，由乎中庸，所以致用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173294_comment'></div>然则君子之欲修其身，治其国家天下者，可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173294_comment'></div>今梅君之为是亭，曰不敢以为游观之美，盖所以推本为治之意，而且将清心于此，其所存者，亦可谓能知其要矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173294_comment'></div>乃为之记，而道予之所闻者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173294_comment'></div>十一月五日，南丰曾巩记<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173294_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1173294'>原无「之」字，据元刻本、《读书记》、顾校本、章校本、吴校本、傅校本、《文粹》补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1173294_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173294'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_1173294_0'>⑴ 《元丰类稿》卷一八。又见《曾文定公集》卷九，《南丰曾先生文粹》卷六，《八代文钞》第三二册，《名山胜概记》卷七，《古今图书集成》学行典卷一一三、考工典卷一○七，民国《萧山志稿》卷一五，同治《徐州府志》卷一八中，《宋元学案补遗》卷四。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1173294_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　曾巩撰《秘书丞知成都府双流县事周君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173340' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173340' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173340?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秘书丞知成都府双流县事周君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173340")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173340_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173340'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173340'>君姓周氏，讳旻，字梦臣，衢州江山人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173340_comment'></div>曾祖汉规，祖德厚，父干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173340_comment'></div>君以进士及第，历南剑州之将乐、建昌军之南城主簿，监虔州雩都银场，又为泰州司户参军，用荐者为秘书省著作佐郎，知宣州南陵县事，迁秘书丞，知成都府双流县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173340_comment'></div>嘉祐六年正月某甲子至江陵，卒于舟中，年五十有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173340_comment'></div>母某氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173340_comment'></div>先娶毛氏，又娶祝氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173340_comment'></div>子男三人：曰某，曰某，曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173340_comment'></div>女四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173340_comment'></div>君之卒，某始七岁，清江李中为之具丧事所须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173340_comment'></div>某年某月某甲子，君之弟皓葬君于某州某县某里之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173340_comment'></div>君少孤力学，不问生业，事母以孝称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173340_comment'></div>其在仕也，嫁姊之贫者，君常分月俸三之一以奉之，馀以与诸弟，君与妻子或止食<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173340", 1173340, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>馆券</span>而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173340_comment'></div>为人和平<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173340", 1173340, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>质简</span>，其施于为政亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173340_comment'></div>及至有所必行，人亦多所不能及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173340_comment'></div>其为南城、雩都，取豪猾尤难治者三人，皆绳以法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173340_comment'></div>君既见恶果于绳而去之，故其馀皆歛迹不敢犯君法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173340_comment'></div>此君之行己居官已试者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173340_comment'></div>所试者大，将岂止于是欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173340_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1173340'>婉婉为人，嶷嶷为吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173340_comment'></div>此有爱慕，彼无怨议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173340_comment'></div>孰厚其有，孰艰厥施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173340_comment'></div>维铭昭之，以谂来裔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1173340_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年冬</a>　冬，梁、陈等书稍稍集于馆阁，曾巩与同馆校之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　妹婿关景晖中进士第，曾巩撰《郓州平阴县主簿关君妻曾氏墓表》<div id='poem_1173324' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173324' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173324?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郓州平阴县主簿关君妻曾氏墓表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173324")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173324_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173324'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173324'>郓州平阴县主簿关君景晖妻，姓曾氏，建昌南丰人，尚书水部员外郎讳某之曾孙，尚书户部郎中、直史馆、赠右谏议大夫讳某之孙，太常博士讳某之女，而巩之长妹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173324_comment'></div>始，吾妹为儿时，育于祖夫人，已不好戏弄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173324_comment'></div>及长，喜读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173324_comment'></div>于女工之事，不教而自能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173324_comment'></div>为人进退容止皆有法度，人罕见其喜愠之色，内外属皆严重之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173324_comment'></div>性俭素，于纷华盛丽之际无所好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173324_comment'></div>其在父母及夫之家，或蔬食不给，处之晏然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173324_comment'></div>其推之于人，虽资身之物，不为秋毫顾惜计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173324_comment'></div>其治女事尤勤，虽劳不厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173324_comment'></div>治<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173324", 1173324, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>家人</span>之业，虽烦细皆有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173324", 1173324, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>条理</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173324_comment'></div>养父母姑舅皆至孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173324_comment'></div>姑久疾，昼夜候省，未尝须臾去其侧，药食非亲调不以进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173324_comment'></div>其于内外属，亲疏皆尽恩意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173324_comment'></div>人皆以为宜富贵寿考，而卒不得至其所宜有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173324_comment'></div>呜呼，其岂非命也欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173324_comment'></div>嘉祐二年，巩与二弟得进士第南归，而吾妹从景晖视余于淮南，至真州得疾，七月某日，卒于余之舟中，年三十有二矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173324_comment'></div>有女一人，曰某，始五岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173324_comment'></div>景晖以其丧归，六年十月丁酉，葬于杭州钱塘县履泰乡龙井原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173324_comment'></div>景晖之王考讳某，考讳某，皆尚书职方员外郎，而越之山阴人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173324_comment'></div>吾妹既殁之六年，景晖得进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173324_comment'></div>于是时，余被命校史馆书籍，皆会京师，而余于其间再哭妹，又哭女与哭妻，忧患之接于余者，可谓多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173324_comment'></div>景晖之始葬吾妹也，来请铭不及，余与之皆恨焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173324_comment'></div>而其会京师以归也，乃为之书吾妹之事以遗之，而使表之于其墓上。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1173324_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　曾巩作《七月十四日韩持国直庐同观<山海经>》<div id='poem_220333' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220333' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220333?labeling=true' target='_blank'>七月十四日韩持国直庐同观山海经</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220333_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220333'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220333'>高阁在清禁，长轩凭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_220333", 220333, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>广虚</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220333'>御幄閟图像，依然临幸馀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220333'>翠甓布天路，黄帘分直庐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220333'>一雨清景早，稍凉秋兴初。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220333'>解带就君坐，临床窥素书。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220333'>山海所错出，飞潜类纷如。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220333'>此语果虚实，遗编空卷舒。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220333'>君材合远用，就此固已疏。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220333'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_220333_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年3月</a>　曾巩撰《仁宗皇帝挽词三首》<div id='poem_220169' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220169' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220169?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仁宗皇帝挽词三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_220169_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220169'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220169'>纳谏终无忤，知人久更明。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220169'>恩波通四海，寿域载群生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220169'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220169_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_220168' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220168' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220168?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年3月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220168_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220168'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220168'>日转归人外，天移入画中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220168_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220168'>冕旒馀泽在，惊跸旧仪空。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220168_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220168'>卜宅三川绕，方丧万里通。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220168_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220168'>初寒石门路，松桧飒悲风。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220168_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220168'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220168_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_220167' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220167' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220167?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年3月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220167_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220167'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220167'>沧海难回日，青云如送春。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220167_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220167'>服丧三月遍，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220167", 220167, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>遏乐</span>四夷均。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220167_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220167'>感格英灵在，褒扬大号新。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220167_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220167'>依然社稷计，王业付真人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220167_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220167'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220167_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年7月</a>　曾巩校定《陈书》上之，作《<陈书>目录序》<div id='poem_1173146' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173146' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173146?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈书目录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173146")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173146_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173146'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173146'>《陈书》六本纪，三十列传，凡三十六篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173146_comment'></div>唐散骑常侍姚思廉撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173146_comment'></div>始，思廉父察，梁陈之史官也，录二代之事，未就而陈亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173146_comment'></div>隋文帝见察，甚重之，每就察访梁陈故事，察因以所论载，每一篇成辄奏之，而文帝亦遣虞世基就察求其书，又未就而察死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173146_comment'></div>察之将死，属思廉以继其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173146_comment'></div>唐兴，武德五年，高祖以自魏以来二百馀岁，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173146", 1173146, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>世统</span>数更，史事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173146", 1173146, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>放逸</span>，乃诏论次，而思廉遂受诏为《陈书》，久之犹不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173146_comment'></div>贞观三年，遂诏论撰于秘书省，十年正月壬子始上之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173146_comment'></div>观察等之为此书，历三世，传父子，更数十岁而后乃成，盖其难如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173146_comment'></div>然及其既成，与宋、魏、齐、梁等书，世亦传之者少，故学者于其行事之迹，亦罕得而详也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173146_comment'></div>而其书亦以罕传，则自秘府所藏，往往脱误，嘉祐六年八月始诏校雠，使可镂版，行之天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173146_comment'></div>而臣等言梁、陈等书缺，独馆阁所藏，恐不足以定著，愿诏京师及州县藏书之家，使悉上之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173146_comment'></div>先皇帝为下其事，至七年冬稍稍始集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173146_comment'></div>臣等以相校，至八年七月，《陈书》三十六篇者始校定，可传之学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173146_comment'></div>其疑者亦不敢损益，特各疏于篇末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173146_comment'></div>其书旧无目录，列传名氏多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173146", 1173146, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>阙谬</span>，因别为目录一篇，使览者得详焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173146_comment'></div>夫陈之为陈，盖偷为一切之计，非有先王经纪礼义风俗之美、制治之法可章示后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173146_comment'></div>然而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173146", 1173146, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>兼权尚计</span>，明于任使，恭俭爱人，则其始之所以兴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173146_comment'></div>惑于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173146", 1173146, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>邪臣</span>，溺于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173146", 1173146, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>嬖妾</span>，忘患纵欲，则其终之所以亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173146_comment'></div>兴亡之端，莫非自己致者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173146_comment'></div>至于有所因造，以为号令、威刑、职官、州郡之制，虽其事已浅，然亦各施于一时，皆学者之所不可不考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173146_comment'></div>而当时之士，争夺诈伪，茍得偷合之徒，尚不得不列以为世戒，而况于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173146", 1173146, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>坏乱</span>之中，仓皇之际，士之安贫乐义，取舍去就，不为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173146", 1173146, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>患祸</span>势利动其心者，亦不绝于其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173146_comment'></div>若此人者，可谓笃于善矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173146_comment'></div>盖古人之所思见而不可得，《风雨》之诗所为作者也，安可使之泯泯不少概见于天下哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173146_comment'></div>则陈之史其可废乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173146_comment'></div>盖此书成之既难，其后又久不显，及宋兴已百年，古文遗事靡不毕讲，而始得盛行于天下，列于学者，其传之之难又如此，岂非遭遇固自有时也哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1173146_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　曾巩作《王子直文集序》<div id='poem_1173155' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173155' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173155?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王子直文集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173155")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173155_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173155'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173155'>至治之极，教化既成，道德同而风俗一，言理者虽异人殊世，未尝不同其指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173155_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173155_comment'></div>理当故无二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173155_comment'></div>是以《诗》《书》之文，自唐虞以来，至秦鲁之际，其相去千馀岁，其作者非一人，至于其间尝更衰乱，然学者尚蒙馀泽，虽其文数万，而其所发明，更相表里，如一人之说，不知时世之远，作者之众也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173155_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173155_comment'></div>上下之间，渐磨陶冶，至于如此，岂非盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173155_comment'></div>自三代教养之法废，先王之泽熄，学者人人异见，而诸子各自为家，岂其固相反哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173155_comment'></div>不当于理，故不能一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173155_comment'></div>由汉以来，益远于治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173155_comment'></div>故学者虽有魁奇拔出之材，而其文能驰骋上下，伟丽可喜者甚众，然是非取舍，不当于圣人之意者亦已多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173155_comment'></div>故其说未尝一，而圣人之道未尝明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173155_comment'></div>士之生于是时，其言能当于理者，亦可谓难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173155_comment'></div>由是观之，则文章之得失，岂不系于治乱哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173155_comment'></div>长乐王向字子直，自少已著文数万言，与其兄弟俱名闻天下，可谓魁奇拔出之材，而其文能驰骋上下，伟丽可喜者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173155_comment'></div>读其书，知其与汉以来名能文者，俱列于作者之林，未知其孰先孰后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173155_comment'></div>考其意，不当于理者亦少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173155_comment'></div>然子直晚自以为不足，而悔其少作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173155_comment'></div>更欲穷探力取，极圣人之指要，盛行则欲发而见之事业，穷居则欲推而托之于文章，将与《诗》《书》之作者并，而又未知孰先孰后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173155_comment'></div>然不幸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173155", 1173155, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>蚤世</span>，故虽有难得之材，独立之志，而不得及其成就，此吾徒与子直之兄回字深父所以深恨于斯人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173155_comment'></div>子直官世行治，深父已为之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173155_comment'></div>而书其数万言者，属予为叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173155_comment'></div>予观子直之所自见者，已足暴于世矣，故特为之序其志云<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173155_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1173155'>「秦」，章校本作「邹」，疑是。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1173155_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173155'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_21_1173155_0'>⑴ 《元丰类稿》卷一二。又见《曾文定公集》卷六，《曾子固集》卷二二，《南丰曾先生文粹》卷三，《文献通考》经籍考卷六二，《永乐大典》卷二二五三六，《文章辨体汇选》卷三○六，《八代文钞》第三二册，《古今图书集成》经籍典卷四七五、四八二，道光《福建通志》卷六八，道光《阜阳县志》卷二○，《宋元学案补遗》卷四。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1173155_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　曾巩撰《仁寿县太君吴氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173355' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173355' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173355?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仁寿县太君吴氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐八年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173355")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173355_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173355'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173355'>仁寿县太君、抚州金溪吴氏，尚书都官员外郎、赠尚书刑部侍郎、抚州临川王公讳益之夫人，卫尉寺丞讳用之之妇，年六十有六，嘉祐八年八月辛巳卒于京师，十月乙酉葬于江宁府之蒋山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173355_comment'></div>夫人好学强记，老而不倦，其取舍是非，有人所不能及者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173355_comment'></div>然好问自下，于事未尝有所专也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173355_comment'></div>其平生养舅姑甚孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173355_comment'></div>盖侍郎七子，而少子五人，吴氏出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173355_comment'></div>然夫人之爱其长子，甚于少子，曰：「吾爱之甚于吾子，然后家人爱之能不异于吾子也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173355_comment'></div>故其子孙已壮大，有不知为异母者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173355_comment'></div>居久之，二长子前死，夫人已老矣，每遇其嫠妇异甚，而身为字其孤儿，忘其力之惫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173355_comment'></div>其处内外亲疏之际，一主于恩，有谗讪踞骂己者，数困苦，常置之，不以动声色，亦未尝有所含怒于后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173355_comment'></div>有以穷归己者，急或分衣食，不为秋毫计惜，以其故至不能自给，然亦未尝不自若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173355_comment'></div>其嫁三从之孤女如己女，而待长子之母族如己族，盖笃行如此，而天性之所有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173355_comment'></div>其自奉养，未尝择衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173355_comment'></div>其视世俗之好，无足<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173355", 1173355, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>累心</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173355_comment'></div>方其隐约穷匮之时，朝廷尝选用其子，坚让至于数十，或谓可强起之，夫人曰：「此非吾所以教子也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173355_comment'></div>卒不强之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173355_comment'></div>及处显矣，其子尝有归志，而以不足于养为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173355_comment'></div>夫人曰：「吾岂不安于命哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173355_comment'></div>安于命者，非有待于外也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173355_comment'></div>其子为知制诰，故事，其母得封郡太君，夫人不许言，故卒不及封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173355_comment'></div>此夫人之德见于行事之迹，而余以通家，故熟于耳目者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173355_comment'></div>夫人之考讳畋，畋之配黄氏，两人者皆有善行，乡里称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173355_comment'></div>而黄氏兼喜阴阳数术学，故夫人亦通于其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173355_comment'></div>七子者，曰安仁、安道、安石、安国、安世、安礼、安上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173355_comment'></div>安仁宣州司户参军，安石尚书工部郎中、知制诰，安世太平州当涂县主簿，安礼大名府莘县主簿，馀未仕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173355_comment'></div>女三人，长适尚书虞部员外郎、沙县张奎，次适前衢州西安县令、天长朱明之，次适扬州沈季长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173355_comment'></div>孙男九人，曰雱、敷、旁、瓬、𣃚、防、斿、旂、放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173355_comment'></div>孙女九人，长适解州安邑县主簿徐公翊，次许嫁太庙斋郎吴安持，馀尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173355_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1173355'>嗟若人兮，洵好善兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173355_comment'></div>始终一德，仁七子兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173355_comment'></div>遗弃细故，笃九族兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173355_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1173355", 1173355, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>脱珥</span>推食，光惠施兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173355_comment'></div>以义易利，能无累兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173355_comment'></div>纵心委命，志弥邵兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173355_comment'></div>谓宜百岁，奄忽逝兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173355_comment'></div>风有《采蘋》，经所首兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173355_comment'></div>原念美实，辑此辞兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173355_comment'></div>庶几德音，与古对兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1173355_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　曾巩论郭祥正诗。<br /><a href="javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220398")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220398_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220398'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220398'>丞相事唐室，独驰三绝名。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220398'>家世在图史，诗书传后生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220398'>即位逮流泽，出令箴辈惊。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220398'>岁暮营燕坐，高居遗世情。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220398'>翠竹带书幌，青山临酒觥。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220398'>已使襟韵适，况闻吟诵声。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220398'>自可化乡里，岂唯门户荣。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220398'>抱璞已三献，惊人当一鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220398'>风义故常在，兹堂非偶成。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220398'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_220398_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　曾巩作《秋声》<div id='poem_220441' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_7_220441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220441'>八荒同一鸣，静里安得在？<div id='poem_sentence_8_220441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220441_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　曾巩作《戏书》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　曾巩作《郊祀庆成并进状》<div id='poem_220323' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220323' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220323?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郊祀庆成并进状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220323")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_220323_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_220323'>右，臣伏以皇帝陛下嗣位之初，郊见上帝，圣意重慎，斋洁谨严。始就帷宫，则独先群臣，宵兴待事。及至坛场，则陟降陛级，彻去裀藉。至于荐献之际，则又端立以须，不肯即安，退就便次。所以至诚兢兢如此，故得天地祖宗眷顾临飨，华夷蛮貊观听欣喜。惟初积阴，久而未解。及辂车既驾，则天宇湛然，日光明润，可谓能得使之主祭而百神享之，福合于天且不违之圣，宜有歌颂，被于声律。臣与在馆阁，以文字为职，不敢以菲薄自止，谨作五言郊祀庆成诗一首，凡一百二十字。干冒宸严，臣无任惶恐激切屏营之至。谨随状上进以闻。</div><div id='poem_preface_220323_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220323'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220323'>即祚讴歌后，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_220323", 220323, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>钦柴</span>礼数新。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220323'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220323", 220323, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>盛容</span>超旷代，乐贡尽殊邻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220323'>宿戒临行殿，宵兴绝众臣。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220323'>立须空便次，步进却柔裀。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220323'>外物虽多品，天心在一纯。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220323'>高灵终享德，群望亦依仁。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220323'>暗蔼如无间，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_220323", 220323, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>迟延</span>若可亲。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220323'>欲知精意答，预睹太和臻。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220323'>积曀沉遥甸，浮阳上绮闉。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220323'>霱云生斐亹，爱景驻逡巡。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220323'>厚庆归清庙，馀釐及兆人。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220323'>还宫动前跸，喜气入韶钧。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220323'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_220323_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年5月30日</a>　曾巩撰《祭亡妻晁氏文》<div id='poem_1173391' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173391' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173391?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭亡妻晁氏文</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平元年五月三十日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173391")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173391_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173391'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173391'>子有仁孝之行，勤俭之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173391_comment'></div>宏裕端庄，聪明静默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173391_comment'></div>穷达能安，死生不惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173391_comment'></div>可以齐古淑人，为世常则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173391_comment'></div>归我之昔，明年始笄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173391_comment'></div>言无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173391", 1173391, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>疵悔</span>，动应衡规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173391_comment'></div>亲疏悦慕，稚艾嗟咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173391_comment'></div>事姑之礼，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173391", 1173391, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>左右</span>无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173391_comment'></div>服难体顺，惟日孜孜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173391_comment'></div>谐我属人，又笃以私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173391_comment'></div>有犯不校，有劳不施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173391_comment'></div>人隆己约，乃以为宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173391_comment'></div>衣有穿弊，珥无光辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173391_comment'></div>曰顺吾性，馀复何为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173391_comment'></div>纷纶世务，偪仄群疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173391_comment'></div>子陈得失，效若蓍龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173391_comment'></div>及其既退，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173391", 1173391, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>婉婉</span>其仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173391_comment'></div>不矜以色，不伐以辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173391_comment'></div>幽閒深谧，度量谁窥？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173391_comment'></div>吾贫口众，智不继资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173391_comment'></div>脱粟藜藿，且无盐醯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173391_comment'></div>人不堪忧，子独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173391", 1173391, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>怡怡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173391_comment'></div>绾综虽爱，不偏以慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173391_comment'></div>训诲惟谨，曰宜幼时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173391_comment'></div>我扶我翼，共处<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173391", 1173391, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>穷羁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173391_comment'></div>锄荒补漏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173391", 1173391, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>细大无遗</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173391_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173391_comment'></div>天祸我家，降集凶厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173391_comment'></div>始来京师，辛丑之岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173391_comment'></div>子之方壮，疾疹中伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173391_comment'></div>孰云此日，一女先亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173391_comment'></div>子虽自达，病岂宜然？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173391_comment'></div>自秋至春，有益无痊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173391_comment'></div>迎医市药，我力为殚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173391_comment'></div>术宁非善？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173391_comment'></div>不胜于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173391_comment'></div>将逝之夕，逆知其期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173391_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1173391", 1173391, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>语论</span>自若，精神不衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173391_comment'></div>遍召室人，告以长归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173391_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173391_comment'></div>父失贤女，姑亡孝妇，子丧严师，吾亏益友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173391_comment'></div>岁时虽往，悲酸则新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173391_comment'></div>禫月之终，奠此一尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173391_comment'></div>教养二子，期获子心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173391_comment'></div>时良返子，托葬先林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173391_comment'></div>言如不复，谁谓我人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173391_comment'></div>长号叙哀，寓以斯文。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1173391_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年9月</a>　曾巩外叔祖母戴氏卒，曾巩撰《知处州青田县朱君夫人戴氏墓志铭》作品：《知处州青田县朱君夫人戴氏墓志铭表》<div id='poem_1173374' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173374' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173374?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知处州青田县朱君夫人戴氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173374")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173374_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173374'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173374'>知处州青田县事、天长朱君讳某之夫人曰高邮戴氏，年七十有七，治平元年九月庚午，以疾卒于楚州监仓之官舍，某年某月某甲子葬于天长之某乡某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173374_comment'></div>夫人之考讳奎，娶徐氏女，夫妇皆有善行，闻于其乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173374_comment'></div>夫人受教于始笄，从事于既嫁，少而行修于身，老而教行于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173374_comment'></div>故父母曰「不遗吾忧」，舅姑曰「能顺吾志」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173374_comment'></div>夫受其助，子赖以成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173374_comment'></div>其平居深静有仪法，不妄笑言，就之色庄而气仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173374_comment'></div>居贫，自薄衣食，而厚于施与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173374_comment'></div>属人之孤女为收嫁者，盖二人云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173374_comment'></div>既老矣，女事不废，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173374", 1173374, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>妇容</span>益恭，虽少者有不及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173374_comment'></div>有子四人，曰某，曰某，曰某，早卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173374_comment'></div>某，某州录事参军，监楚州装卸米仓；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173374_comment'></div>某，衢州西安县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173374_comment'></div>皆及进士第，好古而有文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173374_comment'></div>夫人于某，外叔祖母也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173374_comment'></div>故舅氏属以铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173374_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1173374'>淑哉戴氏，青田之助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173374_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173374", 1173374, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>允直</span>且仁，蓄德于身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173374_comment'></div>为下肃祗，为上惠慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173374_comment'></div>安意处贫，薄己裕人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173374_comment'></div>其承有子，以文起仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173374_comment'></div>秀发垂领，享有多庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173374_comment'></div>卜壤之良，乃兆新堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173374_comment'></div>刻此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173374", 1173374, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>幽文</span>，美实长存。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1173374_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　曾巩娶继室李氏。<br /><a href="javascript: href='/Writing/471725?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秋夜露坐偶作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_471725")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_471725_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_471725'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_471725'>白云飞尚低，清露泫犹早。<div id='poem_sentence_0_471725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_471725'>风来亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_471725", 471725, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>依微</span>，浊暑焉得扫？<div id='poem_sentence_1_471725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_471725'>客堂虚四楹，洒水恨枯槁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_471725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
