ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　曾巩作《谢司理字序》<div id='poem_1173193' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173193' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173193?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢司理字序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173193")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173193_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173193'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173193'>君子之于德泽谊行，大有为者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173193_comment'></div>于为之也，有明而易知者，有不示其用者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173193_comment'></div>若乃数度号令，因造损益，淳杂出入，则所谓明而易知者，使人靡靡然化之，不绝于动作趣舍之际耳，无深关复键<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173193", 1173193, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>穹墉</span>奥屋为之掩覆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173193_comment'></div>泊然莫能知其所以发而至者，则所谓不示其用者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173193_comment'></div>《易》曰「知微知彰」，彰显之微，不显之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173193_comment'></div>又曰「几事不密则害成」、「退藏于密」者，皆不显之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173193_comment'></div>陈郡谢君名缜，缜，密也，而取字乃本诸此，而字曰通微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173193_comment'></div>以谢君之材，其向道也，茍为无画，无不至者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173193_comment'></div>可以有为者也，能见其事业者也，能不表其迹者也，亦在懋之而已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1173193_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　曾巩作《送韩玉汝使两浙》<div id='poem_220466' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220466' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220466?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送韩玉汝使两浙</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220466")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220466_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>鸣弦</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220466_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220466'>仁声又向新年入，惠泽犹为故老传。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220466_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220466'>翠巘烟云生席上，沧溟风雨到樽前。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220466_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220466'>经营智略多馀暇，赏燕谁酬白雪篇？<div id='poem_sentence_3_220466_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220466'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220466_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　曾巩作《送韩玉汝》<div id='poem_220465' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220465' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220465?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送韩玉汝<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220465")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220465_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_220465_0'>① 春日，城东送韩玉汝赴两浙转运，以“池塘生春草，园柳变鸣禽”为韵，得“生”字。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220465'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220465'>野岸涨流水，名园纷杂英。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220465_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220465'>旭景冠盖集，清谈樽酒倾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220465_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220465'>重此台省秀，驾言江海行。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220465_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220465'>已喜怀抱粹，况推材实精。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220465_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220465'>众许极高远，时方藉经营。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220465_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220465'>讵止富中廪，固将泽东氓。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220465_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220465'>还当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_220465", 220465, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>本朝</span>用，不待芳岁更。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220465_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220465'>功名自兹始，勿叹华发生。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220465_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220465'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_220465_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　曾巩校《鲍溶诗集》，作《<鲍溶诗集>目录序》<div id='poem_1173151' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173151' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173151?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鲍溶诗集目录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173151")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173151_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173151'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173151'>《鲍溶诗集》六卷，史馆书旧题云《鲍防集》五卷，《崇文总目》叙别集亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173151_comment'></div>知制诰宋敏求为臣言，此集诗见《文粹》、《唐诗类选》者，皆称鲍溶作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173151_comment'></div>又防之《杂感》诗最显，而此集无之，知此诗非防作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173151_comment'></div>臣以《文粹》、《类选》及防《杂感》诗考之，敏求言皆是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173151_comment'></div>又得参知政事欧阳修所藏《鲍溶集》，与此集同，然后知为溶集决也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173151_comment'></div>史馆书五卷，总二百篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173151_comment'></div>欧阳氏书无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173151", 1173151, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>卷第</span>，才百馀篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173151_comment'></div>然其三十三篇，史馆书所无，今别为一卷，附于后，而总题曰《鲍溶诗集》六卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173151_comment'></div>盖自先王之泽熄而诗亡，晚周以来，作者嗜文辞，抒情思而已，然亦往往有可采者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173151_comment'></div>溶诗尤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173151", 1173151, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>清约</span>谨严，而违理者少，亦近世之能言者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173151_comment'></div>故既正其误谬，又著其大旨以传焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173151_comment'></div>臣巩谨序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1173151_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　曾巩考次李白诗，作《<李白诗集>后序》<div id='poem_1173152' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173152' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173152?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李白诗集后叙</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173152")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173152_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173152'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173152'>《李白诗集》二十卷，旧七百七十六篇，今千有一篇，杂著六十篇者，知制诰常山宋敏求字次道之所广也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173152_comment'></div>次道既以类广白诗，自为序，而未考次其作之先后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173152_comment'></div>余得其书，乃考其先后而次第之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173152_comment'></div>盖白蜀郡人，初隐岷山，出居襄汉之间，南游江淮，至楚观云梦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173152_comment'></div>云梦许氏者，高宗时宰相圉师之家也，以女妻白，因留云梦者三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173152_comment'></div>去，之齐鲁，居徂徕山竹溪，入吴，至长安，明皇闻其名，召见以为翰林供奉，顷之不合去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173152_comment'></div>北抵赵、魏、燕、晋，西涉岐邠，历商于，至洛阳，游梁最久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173152_comment'></div>复之齐、鲁，南浮淮、泗，再入吴，转徙金陵，上秋浦浔阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173152_comment'></div>天宝十四载，安禄山反，明年明皇在蜀，永王璘节度东南，白时卧庐山，璘迫致之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173152_comment'></div>璘军败丹阳，白奔亡至宿松，坐系浔阳狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173152_comment'></div>宣抚大使崔涣与御史中丞宋若思验治白，以为罪薄宜贳，而若思军赴河南，遂释白囚，使谋其军事，上书肃宗，荐白材可用，不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173152_comment'></div>是时白年五十有七矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173152_comment'></div>乾元元年，终以污璘事长流夜郎，遂泛洞庭，上峡江，至巫山，以赦得释，憩岳阳、江夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173152_comment'></div>久之复如浔阳，过金陵，徘徊于历阳、宣城二郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173152_comment'></div>其族人阳冰为当涂令，白过之，以病卒，年六十有四，是时宝应元年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173152_comment'></div>其始终所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173152", 1173152, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>更涉</span>如此，此白之诗书所自叙可考者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173152_comment'></div>范传正为白墓志，称白「偶乘扁舟，一日千里，或遇胜景，终年不移」，则见于白之自叙者，盖亦其略也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173152_comment'></div>《旧史》称白山东人，为翰林待诏，又称永王璘节度扬州，白在宣城谒见，遂辟为从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173152_comment'></div>而《新书》又称白流夜郎，还浔阳，坐事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173152", 1173152, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>下狱</span>，宋若思释之者，皆不合于白之自叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173152_comment'></div>盖史误也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173152_comment'></div>白之诗连类引义，虽中于法度者寡，然其辞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173152", 1173152, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>闳肆</span>隽伟，殆骚人所不及，近民所未有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173152_comment'></div>《旧史》称白有逸才，志气宏放，飘然有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173152", 1173152, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>超世</span>之心，余以为实录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173152_comment'></div>而《新书》不著其语，故录之，使览者得详焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1173152_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　曾巩作《为人后议》<div id='poem_1173188' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173188' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173188?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为人后议</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173188")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173188_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173188'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173188'>《礼》，大宗无子，则族人以支子为之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173188_comment'></div>为之后者，为所后服斩衰三年，而降其父母期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173188_comment'></div>《礼》之所以如此者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173188_comment'></div>以谓人之所知者近，则知亲爱其父母而已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173188_comment'></div>所知者远，则知有严父之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173188_comment'></div>知有严父之义，则知尊祖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173188_comment'></div>知尊祖，则知大宗者上以继祖，下以收族，不可以绝，故有以支子为之后者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173188_comment'></div>为之后者，以受重于斯人，故不得不以尊服服之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173188_comment'></div>以尊服服之而不为之降己亲之服，则犹恐未足以明所后者之重也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173188_comment'></div>以尊服服之，又为之降己亲之服，然后以谓可以明所后者之重，而继祖之道尽，此圣人制礼之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173188_comment'></div>夫所谓收族者，《记》称与族人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/30/Comments/2")'>合食</span>，序以昭穆，别以礼义之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173188_comment'></div>是特诸侯别子之大宗，而严之如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173188_comment'></div>况如《礼》所称天子及其始祖之所自出者，此天子之大宗，是为天地、宗庙、百神祭祀之主，族人万世之所依归，而可以不明其至尊至重哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173188_comment'></div>故前世人主有以支子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>继立</span>而崇其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/40/Comments/1")'>本亲</span>，加以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>号位</span>，立庙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>奉祀</span>者，皆见非于古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173188_comment'></div>诚由所知者近，不能割弃私爱，节之以礼，故失所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/47/Comments/1")'>奉承</span>正统、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/47/Comments/2")'>尊无二上</span>之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173188_comment'></div>若于所后者以尊服服之，又为之降己亲之服，而退于己亲，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>号位</span>不敢以非礼有加也，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>庙祀</span>不敢以非礼有奉也，则为至恩大义，固已备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173188_comment'></div>而或谓又当易其父母之名，从所后者为属，是未知考于《礼》也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173188_comment'></div>《礼》，「为人后者，为所后者之祖父母、父母、妻、妻之父母、昆弟、昆弟之子若子」者，此其服为所后者而非为己也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173188_comment'></div>为其父母期，为其昆弟大功，为其姊妹适人者小功，皆降本服一等者，此其服为己而非为所后者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173188_comment'></div>使于其父母，服则为己，名则为所后者，则是名与实相违，服与恩相戾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173188_comment'></div>圣人制礼，不如是之舛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173188_comment'></div>且自古为人后者，不必皆亲昆弟之子，族人之同宗者皆可为之，则有以大功、小功昆弟之子而为之者矣，有以缌麻、袒免、无服昆弟之子而为之者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173188_comment'></div>若当从所后者为属，则亦当从所后者为服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173188_comment'></div>从所后者为服，则于其父母，有宜为大功、为小功、为缌麻、为袒免、为无服者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173188_comment'></div>而圣人制礼，皆为其父母期，使足以明所后者重而已，非遂以谓当变其亲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173188_comment'></div>亲非变则名固不得而易矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173188_comment'></div>戴德、王肃《丧记》曰：为人后者，为其父母降一等，服齐衰期，其服之节、居倚庐、言语、饮食，与父在为母同，其异者不祥、不禫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173188_comment'></div>虽除服，心丧三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173188_comment'></div>故至于今，著于服令，未之有改也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173188_comment'></div>岂有制服之重如此，而其名遂可以绝乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173188_comment'></div>又崔凯《丧服驳》曰：「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/104/Comments/1")'>本亲</span>有自然之恩，降一等」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173188_comment'></div>则足以明所后者为重，无缘乃绝之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173188_comment'></div>夫未尝以谓可以绝其亲，而辄谓可以绝其名，是亦惑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173188_comment'></div>且支子所以后大宗者，为推其严父之心以尊祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173188_comment'></div>顾以尊祖之故，而不父其父，岂本其恩之所由生，而先王教天下之意哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173188_comment'></div>又《礼》「适子不可为人后」者，以其传重也，「支子可以为人后」者，以非传重也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173188_comment'></div>使传重者后己宗，非传重者后大宗，其意可谓即乎人心而使之两义俱安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173188_comment'></div>今若使为人后者以降其父母之服一等，而遂变革其名，不以为父母，则非使之两义俱安，而不即乎人心莫大乎如是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173188_comment'></div>夫人道之于大宗，至尊至重，不可以绝，尊尊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173188_comment'></div>人子之于父母，亦至尊至重，不可以绝，亲亲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173188_comment'></div>尊尊、亲亲，其义一也，未有可废其一者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173188_comment'></div>故为人后者，为之降其父母之服，《礼》则有之矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173188_comment'></div>为之绝其父母之名，则《礼》未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173188_comment'></div>或以谓欲绝其名者，盖恶其为二，而欲使之为一，所以使为人后者之道尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173188_comment'></div>夫迹其实，则有谓之所后，有谓之所生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173188_comment'></div>制其服，则有为己而非为所后者，有为所后而非为己者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173188_comment'></div>皆知不可以恶其为二，而强使之为一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173188_comment'></div>至于名者，盖生于实也，乃不知其不可以恶其为二而欲强使之为一，是亦过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173188_comment'></div>藉使其名可以强使之为一，而迹其实之非一，制其服之非一者，终不可以易，则恶在乎欲绝其名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173188_comment'></div>故古之圣人知不可以恶其为二而强使之为一，而能使其属之疏者相与为重，亲之厚者相与为轻，则以礼义而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173188_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173188_comment'></div>使为人后者，于其所后，非己亲也，而为之服斩衰三年，为其祭主，是以义引之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173188_comment'></div>于其所生，实己亲也，而降服齐衰期，不得与其祭，是以礼厌之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173188_comment'></div>以义引之，则属之疏者相与为重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173188_comment'></div>以礼厌之，则亲之厚者相与为轻，而为人后之道尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173188_comment'></div>然则欲为人后之道尽者，在以礼义明其内，而不在于恶其为二而强易其名于外也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1173188_comment'></div>故《礼·丧服》「齐衰不杖期」章曰：「为人后者为其父母服」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1173188_comment'></div>此见于经「为人后者于其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/192/Comments/2")'>本亲</span>称父母」之明文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1173188_comment'></div>汉蔡义以谓宣帝亲谥宜曰悼，魏相以谓宜称尊号曰皇考，立庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1173188_comment'></div>后世议者皆以其称皇立庙为非，至于称亲、称考，则未尝有以为非者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1173188_comment'></div>其后魏明帝尤恶为人后者厚其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/199/Comments/0")'>本亲</span>，故非汉宣加悼考以皇号，又谓后嗣有由诸侯入继正统者，皆不得谓考为皇，称妣为后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1173188_comment'></div>盖亦但禁其猥加非正之号，而未尝废其考妣之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1173188_comment'></div>此见于前世议论为人后者于其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/206/Comments/0")'>本亲</span>称考妣之明文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1173188_comment'></div>又晋王坦之《丧服议》曰：「罔极之重，非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/209/Comments/0")'>制教</span>之所裁，昔日之名，非一朝之所去」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1173188_comment'></div>此出后之身所以有服<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/212/Comments/0")'>本亲</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1173188_comment'></div>又曰：「情不可夺，名不可废，崇本叙恩，所以为降」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1173188_comment'></div>则知为人后者未有去其所出父母之名，此古今之常理，故坦之引以为制服之證。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1173188_comment'></div>此又见于前世议论「为人后者于其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/221/Comments/2")'>本亲</span>称父母」之明文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1173188_comment'></div>是则为人后者之亲，见于经，见于前世议论，谓之父母，谓之考妣者，其大义如此，明文如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1173188_comment'></div>至见于他书及史官之记，亦谓之父母，谓之考妣，谓之私考妣，谓之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/233/Comments/0")'>本亲</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1173188_comment'></div>谓之亲者，则不可一二数，而以为世父、叔父者，则不特《礼》未之有，载籍已来固未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1173188_comment'></div>今欲使从所后者为属，而变革其父母之名，此非常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/241/Comments/0")'>异义</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1173188_comment'></div>不从经文与前世数千载之议论，亦非常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/243/Comments/0")'>异义</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1173188_comment'></div>而无所考据以持其说，将何以示天下乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1173188_comment'></div>且中国之所以为贵者，以有父子之道，又有六经与前世数千载之议论以治之故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1173188_comment'></div>今忽欲弃之而伸其无所考据之说，岂非误哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1173188_comment'></div>或谓为人后者，于其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/252/Comments/0")'>本亲</span>称父母，则为两统二父，其可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1173188_comment'></div>夫两统二父者，谓加考以皇号，立庙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/257/Comments/0")'>奉祀</span>，是不一于正统，怀贰于所后，所以著其非，而非谓不变革其父母之名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1173188_comment'></div>然则加考以皇号与《礼》及世之称皇考者有异乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1173188_comment'></div>曰：皇考一名而为说有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1173188_comment'></div>《礼》曰：曰考庙，曰王考庙，曰皇考庙，曰显考庙，曰祖考庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1173188_comment'></div>是则以皇考为曾祖之庙号也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1173188_comment'></div>魏相谓汉宣帝父宜称尊号曰皇考，既非《礼》之曾祖之称，又有尊号之文，故魏明帝非其加悼考以皇号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1173188_comment'></div>至于光武亦于南顿君称皇考庙，义出于此，是以加皇号为事考之尊称也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1173188_comment'></div>屈原称：「朕皇考曰伯庸」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1173188_comment'></div>又晋司马机《为燕王告祢庙文》，称：「敢昭告于皇考清惠亭侯」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1173188_comment'></div>是又达于群下，以皇考为父殁之通称也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1173188_comment'></div>以为曾祖之庙号者，于古用之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1173188_comment'></div>以为事考之尊称者，于汉用之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1173188_comment'></div>以为父殁之通称者，至今用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1173188_comment'></div>然则称之亦有可有不可者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1173188_comment'></div>曰：以加皇号为事考之尊称者，施于为人后之义，是干正统，此求之于《礼》而不可者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1173188_comment'></div>达于群下以皇考为父殁之通称者，施于为人后之义，非干正统，此求之于《礼》而可者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1173188_comment'></div>然则以为父殁之通称者，其不可如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1173188_comment'></div>曰：若汉哀帝之亲，称尊号曰恭皇，安帝之亲，称尊号曰孝德皇，是又求之于《礼》而不可者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1173188_comment'></div>且《礼》，父为士，子为天子，祭以天子，其尸服以士服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1173188_comment'></div>子无爵父之义，尊父母也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1173188_comment'></div>前世失礼之君崇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_97_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/317/Comments/0")'>本亲</span>以位号者，岂独失为人后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_97_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/318/Comments/1")'>奉祀</span>正统、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_97_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/318/Comments/2")'>尊无二上</span>之意哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1173188_comment'></div>是以子爵父，以卑命尊，亦非所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/321/Comments/0")'>尊厚</span>其亲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1173188_comment'></div>前世崇饰非正之号者，其失如此，而后世又谓宜如期亲故事增官广国者，亦可谓皆不合于《礼》矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1173188_comment'></div>夫考者，父殁之称，然施于礼者，有朝廷典册之文，有宗庙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_100_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/330/Comments/0")'>祝祭</span>之辞而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1173188_comment'></div>若不加位号，则无典册之文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1173188_comment'></div>不立庙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_102_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/333/Comments/0")'>奉祀</span>，则无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_102_1173188", 1173188, "Clauses/334/Comments/0")'>祝祭</span>之辞，则虽正其名，岂有施于事者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1173188_comment'></div>顾言之不可不顺而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1173188_comment'></div>此前世未尝以为可疑者，以《礼》甚明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1173188_comment'></div>今世议者纷纷，至于旷日累时，不知所决者，盖由不考于《礼》，而率其私见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1173188_comment'></div>故采于经，列其旨意，庶得以商榷焉。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_106_1173188'></div><div id='poem_sentence_106_1173188_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　曾巩作《回李清臣范百禄谢中贤良启》<div id='poem_1173086' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173086' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173086?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回李清臣范百禄谢中贤良启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173086")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173086_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173086'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173086'>右巩启：窃以设科以求特起之材，发策以访可行之论，是惟高选，果得异能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173086_comment'></div>伏以贤良某官，志敏以强，词严而赡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173086_comment'></div>迹前世之事，而博极群书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173086_comment'></div>议当今之宜，而常引大体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173086_comment'></div>及亲承于圣问，遂绝出于时髦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173086_comment'></div>方喜闻风，遽蒙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173086", 1173086, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>枉记</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173086_comment'></div>仰惟谦抑之过，第积感铭之深。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1173086_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　继室李氏生女兴老。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　曾巩母朱氏来京师。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　曾巩作《王深父文集序》<div id='poem_1173154' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173154' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173154?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王深父文集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173154")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173154_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173154'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173154'>深父，吾友也，姓王氏，讳回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173154_comment'></div>当先王之迹熄，六艺残缺，道术衰微，天下学者无所折衷，深父于是时奋然独起，因先王之遗文以求其意，得之于心，行之于己，其动止语默必考于法度，而穷达得丧不易其志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173154_comment'></div>文集二十卷，其辞反复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173154", 1173154, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>辨达</span>，有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173154", 1173154, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>开阐</span>，其卒盖将归于简也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173154_comment'></div>其破去百家传注，推<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173154", 1173154, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>散缺</span>不全之经，以明圣人之道于千载之后，所以振斯文于将坠，回学者于既溺，可谓道德之要言，非世之别集而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173154_comment'></div>后之潜心于圣人者，将必由是而有得，则其于世教，岂小补之而已哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173154_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173154_comment'></div>深父其志方强，其德方进，而不幸死矣，故其泽不加于天下，而其言止于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173154_comment'></div>然观其所可考者，岂非孟子所谓名世者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173154_comment'></div>其文有片言半简非大义所存，皆附而不去者，所以明深父之于其细行，皆可传于世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173154_comment'></div>深父，福州侯官县人，今家于颍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173154_comment'></div>尝举进士，中其科，为亳州卫真县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173154_comment'></div>未一岁弃去，遂不复仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173154_comment'></div>卒于治平二年之七月二十八日，年四十有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173154_comment'></div>天子尝以某军节度推官知陈州南顿县事，就其家命之，而深父既卒矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1173154_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　曾巩撰《夫人周氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173358' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173358' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173358?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夫人周氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173358")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173358_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173358'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173358'>夫人讳琬，字东玉，姓周氏，父兄皆举明经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173358_comment'></div>夫人独喜图史，好为文章，日夜不倦，如学士大夫，从其舅邢起学为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173358_comment'></div>既嫁，无舅姑，顺夫慈子，严馈祀，谐属人，行其素学，皆应仪矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173358_comment'></div>有诗七百篇，其文静而正，柔而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173358", 1173358, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>不屈</span>，约于言而谨于礼者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173358_comment'></div>昔先王之教，非独行于士大夫也，盖亦有妇教焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173358_comment'></div>故女子必有师傅，言动必以《礼》，养其德必以《乐》，歌其行，劝其志，与夫使之可以托微而见意，必以《诗》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173358_comment'></div>此非学不能，故教成于内外，而其俗易美，其治易洽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173358_comment'></div>兹道废，若夫人之学出于天性，而言行不失法度，是可贤也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173358_comment'></div>其夫来乞铭，予与之亲且旧，故为之序而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173358_comment'></div>盖夫人之王父讳协，为尚书刑部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173358_comment'></div>父约，今为尚书虞部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173358_comment'></div>青州益都人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173358_comment'></div>夫人嫁关氏，为徐州丰县令景仁之妻，为尚书职方员外郎、赠尚书都官郎中讳鲁之子妇，生一男二女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173358_comment'></div>年二十有六，卒于治平二年之九月某甲子，葬于杭州钱塘县履泰乡葛松原，实某年某月某甲子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173358_comment'></div>关氏钱塘人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173358_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1173358'>女有图史，传于师氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173358_comment'></div>其劝以乐，其康以礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173358_comment'></div>能此非他，由学而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173358_comment'></div>王政之兴，盖自此始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173358_comment'></div>今孰登兹？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173358_comment'></div>维周之媛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173358_comment'></div>学由自好，终之不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173358_comment'></div>言循于矩，行循于典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173358_comment'></div>尚配古人，辉光日远。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1173358_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　曾巩撰《池州贵池县主簿沈君夫人元氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173363' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173363' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173363?labeling=true' target='_blank'>池州贵池县主簿沈君夫人元氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平二年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173363")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173363_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173363'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173363'>夫人姓元氏，钱塘人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173363_comment'></div>祖讳德昭，事吴越国王钱氏，宋兴，赠太保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173363_comment'></div>考讳好文，尚书比部员外郎，赠某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173363_comment'></div>嫁吴兴沈氏，其舅为尚书屯田郎中讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173363_comment'></div>其夫为池州贵池县主簿讳播。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173363_comment'></div>夫人在父母家，内外上下、亲疏长幼皆宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173363_comment'></div>年十有七而嫁，既嫁，如在父母家时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173363_comment'></div>贵池君早世，无兄弟，太夫人春秋高，诸子尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173363_comment'></div>夫人年三十馀，于羁旅单独之中，阖门事姑，能尽其孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173363_comment'></div>教养诸子，至其后皆为成材，能世其先人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173363_comment'></div>方其忧戚艰厄之时，人恐其不能堪，夫人既奋厉经理，以保有其家，又退能自安，不乱其志，是人之所难，而其后世之不可以无述者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173363_comment'></div>夫人年七十，以治平二年某月某日卒，卒之若干日，葬真州扬子县甘泉乡三城里北山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173363_comment'></div>子男四人皆进士：曰伯庄，未仕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173363_comment'></div>曰季长，越州司法参军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173363_comment'></div>曰叔通，秘书省著作佐郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173363_comment'></div>曰次通，试将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173363_comment'></div>贵池君于先人为同年友，而诸子又与余游，故为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173363_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1173363'>元出于危，于东得姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173363_comment'></div>有保有郎，重世之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173363_comment'></div>允淑夫人，集享家庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173363_comment'></div>来嫔沈宗，作德维令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173363_comment'></div>处平不盈，在险能正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173363_comment'></div>姑曰微妇，余老谁据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173363_comment'></div>子曰微母，余幼谁怙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173363_comment'></div>自振单弱，卒持艰急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173363_comment'></div>老肆而安，幼强以立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173363_comment'></div>实保沈宗，自替而昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173363_comment'></div>有烈如此，何愧烝尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173363_comment'></div>后世原美，孰可无述？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173363_comment'></div>刻辞幽宫，庶几不没<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173363_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1173363'>危：《读书记》、顾校本、傅校本注疑作「魏」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173363_comment'></div>章校本作「魏」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1173363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173363'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_29_1173363_0'>⑴ 《元丰类稿》卷四五。又见《曾文定公集》卷一五，道光《仪徵县志》卷八。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1173363_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年冬</a>　冬，曾巩作《与王介甫第三书》<div id='poem_1173055' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173055' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173055?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与王介甫第三书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173055")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173055_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173055'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173055'>巩启：八月中，承太夫人大祥，于邮中寓书奉慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173055_comment'></div>十月梅厚秀才行，又寓书，不审皆到否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173055_comment'></div>昨日忽被来问，良慰积日之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173055_comment'></div>深父<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173055", 1173055, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>殂背</span>，痛毒同之，前书已具道矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173055_comment'></div>示及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173055", 1173055, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>志铭</span>，反复不能去手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173055_comment'></div>所云「令深父而有合乎彼，则不能同乎此矣」，是道也，过千岁以来，至于吾徒，其智始能及之，欲相与守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173055_comment'></div>然今天下同志者，不过三数人尔，则于深父之殁，尤为可痛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173055_comment'></div>而介甫于此，独能发明其志，读之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173055", 1173055, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>满足</span>人心，可谓能言人之所不能言者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173055_comment'></div>顾犹见使商榷所未安，观介甫此作，大抵哀斯人之不寿，不得成其材，使或可以泽今，或可以觉后，是介甫之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173055_comment'></div>而其首则云「深父书足以致其言」，是乃称深父以未成之材而著书，与夫本意违矣，愿更详之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173055_comment'></div>《孟子》之书，韩愈以谓非轲自作，理恐当然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173055_comment'></div>则所云「幸能著书者」，亦惟更详之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173055_comment'></div>如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173055_comment'></div>幸复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173055", 1173055, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>见谕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173055_comment'></div>所云「读《礼》，因欲有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173055", 1173055, "Clauses/48/Comments/1")'>论著</span>」，顷尝为介甫言，亦有此意，顾不能自强，又无所考质，故莫能就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173055_comment'></div>今介甫既意及于此，愿遂成之，就令未可为书，亦可因得商榷矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173055_comment'></div>相别数年，巩在此全纯愚以静俟，庶无大悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173055_comment'></div>顾苟禄以弃时日，为可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173055", 1173055, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>怅惜</span>，未知何日得相从讲学，以勖其所未及，尽其所可乐于衰莫之岁乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173055_comment'></div>此日夜所惓惓往来于心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173055_comment'></div>示谕溲血，比良已否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173055_comment'></div>即日不审寝食如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173055_comment'></div>上奏当称前某官，十数日前，见刘琮言已报去，承见问，故更此及之尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173055_comment'></div>今介甫果以何时此来乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173055_comment'></div>不惜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173055", 1173055, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>见谕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173055_comment'></div>子进弟奄丧，已易三时矣，悲苦何可以堪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173055_comment'></div>二侄年可教者，近已随老亲到此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173055_comment'></div>二尤小者，六舍弟尚且留在怀仁，视此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1173055", 1173055, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>痛割</span>，何可以言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173055_comment'></div>承介甫有女弟之悲，亦已屡更时序，窃计哀戚何以自胜，馀惟强食自爱，不惜时以一二字见及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173055_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173055_comment'></div>巩启上。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1173055'></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1173055_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　曾巩作《上巳日瑞圣园锡燕呈诸同舍》<div id='poem_220160' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220160' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220160?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上巳日瑞圣园锡燕呈诸同舍</a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_220160'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220160'>北上郊原一据鞭，华林清集缀儒冠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220160_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220160'>方塘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220160", 220160, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>渰渰</span>春先渌，密竹娟娟午更寒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220160_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220160'>流渚酒浮金凿落，照庭花并玉阑干。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220160_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220160'>君恩倍觉丘山重，长日从容笑语欢。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220160_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220160'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220160_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　曾巩作《集贤殿春宴呈诸同舍》<div id='poem_220292' id='poem_sentence_8_220464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220464'>三吴月出照<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_220464", 220464, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_220464", 220464, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>羽钗</span>绝艳舞回雪，宝剑诸儒谈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_220464", 220464, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>炙輠</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220464'>一尊放意受天籁，万累回头真土苴。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220464'>我思飞步缀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_220464", 220464, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>登蹑</span>，又欲生绡乞图写。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220464'>身縻东观愿虽阻，日注漳门心岂舍。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220464'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_220464", 220464, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>过临</span>有幸破<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_220464", 220464, "Clauses/28/Comments/1")'>氛雾</span>，奋厉方欣入陶冶。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220464'>斋航又自日边去，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_220464", 220464, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>信节</span>初从天上假。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_220464'>旧邦往靖寄挥麈，新谷来输付<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_220464", 220464, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>流马</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_220464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_220464'>遥知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_220464", 220464, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>素誉</span>在民口，已有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_220464", 220464, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>欢声</span>腾里社。<div id='poem_sentence_17_220464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_220464'>却寻泉石引幽士，想忆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_220464", 220464, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>沙尘</span>笑劳者。<div id='poem_sentence_18_220464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_220464'>何当一解豫章榻，强赋土风令中雅。<div id='poem_sentence_19_220464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_220464'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_220464_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年夏</a>　夏，曾巩与同舍之士丁宝臣（字元珍）、郑穆（字闳中）、孙觉（字莘老）、林希（字子中）于相国寺听洪规（字方叔）弹琴，曾巩作《相国寺维摩院听琴序》<div id='poem_1173274' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173274' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173274?labeling=true' target='_blank'>相国寺维摩院听琴序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年夏）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173274")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173274_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173274'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173274'>古者学士之于六艺，射能弧矢之事矣，又当善其揖让之节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173274_comment'></div>御能车马之事矣，又当善其驱驰之节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173274_comment'></div>书非能肆笔而已，又当辨其体而皆通其意，数非能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173274", 1173274, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>布策</span>而已，又当知其用而各尽其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173274_comment'></div>而五礼之威仪，至于三千，六乐之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173274", 1173274, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>节文</span>，可谓微且多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173274_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173274_comment'></div>何其烦且劳如是！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173274_comment'></div>然古之学者必能此，亦可谓难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173274_comment'></div>然习其射御于礼，习其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173274", 1173274, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>干戈</span>于乐，则少于学，长于朝，其于武备固修矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173274_comment'></div>其于家有塾，于党有庠，于乡有序，于国有学，于教有师，于视听言动有其容，于衣冠饮食有其度，几杖有铭，盘杆有戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173274_comment'></div>在舆有和鸾之声，行步有佩玉之音，燕处有《雅》、《颂》之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173274_comment'></div>而非其故，琴瑟未尝去于前也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173274_comment'></div>盖其出入进退，俯仰左右，接于耳目，动于四体，达于其心者，所以养之至如此其详且密也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173274_comment'></div>虽然，此尚为有待于外者耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173274_comment'></div>若夫三才万物之理，性命之际，力学以求之，深思以索之，使知其要，识其微，而斋戒以守之，以尽其才，成其德，至合于天地而后已者，又当得之于心，夫岂非难哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173274_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173274_comment'></div>古之学者，其役之于内外以持其心、养其性者，至于如此，此君子所以爱日而自强不息，以求至乎极也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173274_comment'></div>然其习之有素，闲之有具如此，则求其放心，伐其邪气，而成文武之材，就道德之实者，可谓易矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173274_comment'></div>孔子曰：「兴于《诗》，立于《礼》，成于《乐》」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173274_comment'></div>盖乐者，所以感人之心，而使之化，故曰「成于《乐》」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173274_comment'></div>昔舜命夔典乐，教胄子，曰：「直而温，宽而栗，刚而无虐，简而无傲」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173274_comment'></div>则乐者非独去邪，又所以救其性之偏而纳之中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173274_comment'></div>故和鸾、佩玉、《雅》《颂》琴瑟之音，非其故不去于前，岂虚也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173274_comment'></div>今学士大夫之于持其身、养其性，凡有待于外者，皆不能具，得之于内者，又皆略其事，可谓简且易矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173274_comment'></div>然所以求其放心，伐其邪气，而成文武之材，就道德之实者，岂不难哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173274_comment'></div>此予所以惧不至于君子而入于小人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173274_comment'></div>夫有待于外者，余既力不足，而于琴窃有志焉久矣，然患其莫余授也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173274_comment'></div>治平三年夏，得洪君于京师，始合<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1173274", 1173274, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>同舍</span>之士，听其琴于相国寺之维摩院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173274_comment'></div>洪君之于琴，非特能其音，又能其意者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173274_comment'></div>予将就学焉，故道予之所慕于古者，庶乎其有以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173274", 1173274, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>自发</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173274_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1173274", 1173274, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>同舍</span>之士，丁宝臣元珍、郑穆闳中、孙觉莘老、林希子中，而予曾巩子固也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173274_comment'></div>洪君名规，字方叔，以文学吏事称于世云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1173274_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　曾巩撰《试秘书省校书郎李君妻太原王氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173362' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173362' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173362?labeling=true' target='_blank'>试秘书省校书郎李君妻太原王氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平三年四月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173362")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173362_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173362'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173362'>夫人姓王氏，太原人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173362_comment'></div>嫁赵郡李氏，为磁州邯郸令、赠太子少傅讳谭之冢妇，试秘书省校书郎讳迂之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173362_comment'></div>为人明识强记，博览图籍，子孙受学，皆自为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173362", 1173362, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>先生</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173362_comment'></div>其行仁孝慈恕，始于为女，中于为妇，终于为母，无不尽其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173362_comment'></div>享年八十，大中祥符三年庚戌十二月己巳，卒于虢州卢氏县其子之官舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173362_comment'></div>子曰昌震，建州松溪令，赠尚书驾部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173362_comment'></div>驾部子曰汉卿，令为诸王府侍讲、尚书虞部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173362_comment'></div>虞部尝为李氏九世谱，甚博而详，多夫人之所为言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173362_comment'></div>治平三年丙午四月丁酉，虞部以夫人之丧，从校书君葬于开封府开封县保安乡永宁里之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173362_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1173362'>呜呼夫人！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173362_comment'></div>既有其质，又肆尔力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173362_comment'></div>古有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173362", 1173362, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>遗辞</span>，罔不采获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173362_comment'></div>克践以躬，亦畀尔息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173362_comment'></div>维瘗有铭，尚以载德。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1173362_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　曾巩撰《试秘书省校书郎李君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173361' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173361' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173361?labeling=true' target='_blank'>试秘书省校书郎李君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平三年四月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173361")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173361_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173361'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173361'>君讳迂，字明远，姓李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173361_comment'></div>为人孝友慈恕，读书务大旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173361_comment'></div>生五代之际，再试明经，不合，退居楚丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173361_comment'></div>有田百馀顷，皆推与其族人，独留五顷而已，曰：「无令子孙以财自累也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173361_comment'></div>宋初，秘书监彭君荐其行义，诏以为试秘书省校书郎，而君终不肯强起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173361_comment'></div>淳化三年壬辰九月二十一日，以疾卒于家，享年八十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173361_comment'></div>维李氏远出于皋陶，而其后李耳之孙昙为秦司徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173361_comment'></div>昙子玑，玑子牧，事赵，始家赵郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173361_comment'></div>牧子泊，泊子左车，于赵号广武君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173361_comment'></div>广武君子遐，涿郡太守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173361_comment'></div>遐子岳，谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173361_comment'></div>岳子秉，颍川太守，又徙家颍川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173361_comment'></div>秉七世子膺，河南尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173361_comment'></div>膺子瑾，复家赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173361_comment'></div>瑾曾孙楷，晋治书侍御史，有子五人，曰辑、晃、芬、劲、睿，以所居巷东西自别，故劲称西祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173361_comment'></div>劲子隆，后魏阜城令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173361_comment'></div>隆后九世栖筠，唐御史大夫赞皇文献公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173361_comment'></div>文献公子吉甫相宪宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173361_comment'></div>吉甫子德修，楚州刺史；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173361_comment'></div>德裕相文宗、武宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173361_comment'></div>楚州子煴，宋州宋城令，君曾祖也，又徙家宋之楚丘，故今为楚丘人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173361_comment'></div>宋城子确，莱州胶水令，君祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173361_comment'></div>胶水子谭，磁州邯郸令，君考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173361_comment'></div>邯郸之少子运，为太常少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173361_comment'></div>有子曰昌龄，太宗、真宗时为尚书户部侍郎、参知政事，故胶水赠太子少保，邯郸赠太子少傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173361_comment'></div>君娶丁氏、王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173361_comment'></div>王氏有子曰昌震，为建州松溪令，赠尚书驾部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173361_comment'></div>驾部有子曰汉卿，今为诸王府侍讲、尚书虞部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173361_comment'></div>虞部有子曰彦龙，彦龙复有子四人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173361_comment'></div>君卒后七十四年，治平三年丙午四月某甲子，虞部葬君于开封府开封县保安乡永宁里之原，以王夫人从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173361_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1173361'>不累于物，全吾质兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173361_comment'></div>不羁于世，遂吾志兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173361_comment'></div>作宅新原，维孝孙兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173361_comment'></div>纳铭幽扃，永淑声兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1173361_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　曾巩作《苏明允哀辞》<div id='poem_1173410' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173410' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173410?labeling=true' target='_blank'>苏明允哀辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173410")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173410_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173410'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173410'>明允姓苏氏，讳洵，眉州眉山人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173410_comment'></div>始举进士，又举茂材异等，皆不中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173410_comment'></div>归，焚其所为文，闭户读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173410_comment'></div>居五六年，所有既富矣，乃始复为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173410_comment'></div>盖少或百字，多或千言，其指事析理，引物托喻，侈能尽之约，远能见之近，大能使之微，小能使之著，烦能不乱，肆能不流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173410_comment'></div>其雄壮俊伟，若决江河而下也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173410_comment'></div>其辉光明白，若引星辰而上也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173410_comment'></div>其略如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173410_comment'></div>以余之所言，于余之所不言，可推而知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173410_comment'></div>明允每于其穷达得丧，忧叹哀乐，念有所属，必发之于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173410_comment'></div>于古今治乱兴坏，是非可否之际，意有所择，亦必发之于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173410_comment'></div>于应接酬酢万事之变者，虽错出于外，而用心于内者，未尝不在此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173410_comment'></div>嘉祐初，始与其二子轼、辙复去蜀，游京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173410_comment'></div>今参知政事欧阳公修为翰林学士，得其文而异之，以献于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173410_comment'></div>既而欧阳公为礼部，又得其二子之文，擢之高等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173410_comment'></div>于是三人之文章盛传于世，得而读之者皆为之惊，或叹不可及，或慕而效之，自京师至于海隅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173410", 1173410, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>障徼</span>，学士大夫莫不人知其名，家有其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173410_comment'></div>既而明允召试舍人院，不至，特用为秘书省校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173410_comment'></div>顷之，以为霸州文安县主簿，编纂太常礼书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173410_comment'></div>而轼、辙又以贤良方正策入等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173410_comment'></div>于是三人者尤见于当时，而其名益重于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173410_comment'></div>治平三年春，明允上其礼书，未报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173410_comment'></div>四月戊申以疾卒，享年五十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173410_comment'></div>自天子辅臣至闾巷之士，皆闻而哀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173410_comment'></div>明允所为文，有集二十卷行于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173410_comment'></div>所集《太常因革礼》者一百卷，更定《谥法》二卷，藏于有司，又为《易传》未成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173410_comment'></div>读其书者，则其人之所存可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173410_comment'></div>明允为人聪明辨智，遇人气和而色温，而好为策谋，务一出己见，不肯蹑故迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173410_comment'></div>颇喜言兵，慨然有志于功名者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173410_comment'></div>二子，轼为殿中丞直史馆，辙为大名府推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173410_comment'></div>其年，以明允之丧归葬于蜀也，既请欧阳公为其铭，又请予为辞以哀之，曰：铭将纳之于圹中，而辞将刻之于冢上也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173410_comment'></div>余辞不得已，乃为其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173410_comment'></div>曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1173410'>嗟明允兮邦之良，气甚夷兮志则强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173410_comment'></div>阅今古兮辨兴亡，惊一世兮擅文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173410_comment'></div>御六马兮驰无疆，决大河兮齧浮桑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173410_comment'></div>粲星斗兮射精光，众伏玩兮雕肺肠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173410_comment'></div>自京师兮洎幽荒，矧二子兮与翱翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173410_comment'></div>唱律吕兮和宫商，羽峨峨兮势方飏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173410_comment'></div>孰云命兮变不常，奄忽逝兮汴之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173410_comment'></div>维自著兮炜煌煌，在后人兮庆弥长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173410_comment'></div>嗟明允兮庸何伤！</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1173410_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　曾巩作《回傅侍讲启》<div id='poem_1173082' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173082' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173082?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回傅侍讲启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173082")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173082_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173082'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173082'>巩启：伏审祗膺诏检，入奉经筵，伏惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173082", 1173082, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>庆慰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173082_comment'></div>伏以某官秉德粹冲，受材闳廓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173082_comment'></div>遘盛辰而开迹，席膴仕以升华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173082_comment'></div>善政流风，已推行于民上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173082_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173082", 1173082, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>高文</span>大策，久耸动于朝端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173082_comment'></div>果允佥言，特膺迅用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173082_comment'></div>从容帝幕，方演畅于微言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173082_comment'></div>密勿禁林，伫裁成于明命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173082_comment'></div>自聆拜宠，方念腾书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173082_comment'></div>辱见奖于旧游，遽先流于华问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173082_comment'></div>欣愉感幸，交集悃诚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173082_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　曾巩撰《筠州学记》<div id='poem_1173298' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173298' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173298?labeling=true' target='_blank'>筠州学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平三年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173298")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173298_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173298'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173298'>周衰，先王之迹熄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173298_comment'></div>至汉，六艺出于秦火之馀，士学于百家之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173298_comment'></div>言道德者，矜高远而遗世用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173298_comment'></div>语政理者，务<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>卑近</span>而非师古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173298_comment'></div>刑名兵家之术，则狃于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>暴诈</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173298_comment'></div>惟知经者为善矣，又争为章句训诂之学，以其私见，妄穿凿为说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173298_comment'></div>故先王之道不明，而学者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>靡然</span>溺于所习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173298_comment'></div>当是时，能明先王之道者，扬雄而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173298_comment'></div>而雄之书，世未知好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173298_comment'></div>然士之出于其时者，皆勇于自立，无苟简之心，其取予进退去就，必度于礼义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173298_comment'></div>及其已衰，而搢绅之徒，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>抗志</span>于强暴之间，至于废锢杀戮，而其操愈厉者，相望于先后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173298_comment'></div>故虽有不轨之臣，犹低佪没世，不敢遂其篡夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173298_comment'></div>自此至于魏晋以来，其风俗之弊，人材之乏久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173298_comment'></div>以迄于今，士乃有特起于千载之外，明先王之道，以寤后之学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173298_comment'></div>世虽不能皆知其意，而往往好之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173298_comment'></div>故习其说者，论道德之旨，而知应务之非近；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173298_comment'></div>议从政之体，而知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>法古</span>之非迂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173298_comment'></div>不乱于百家，不蔽于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>传疏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173298_comment'></div>其所知者若此，此汉之士所不能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173298_comment'></div>然能尊而守之者，则未必众也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173298_comment'></div>故乐易<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>惇朴</span>之俗微，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>诡欺</span>薄恶之习胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173298_comment'></div>其于贫富贵贱之地，则养廉远耻之意少，而偷合茍得之行多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173298_comment'></div>此俗化之美，所以未及于汉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173298_comment'></div>夫所闻或浅，而其义甚高，与所知有馀，而其守不足者，其故何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173298_comment'></div>由汉之士察举于乡闾，故不能不笃于自修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173298_comment'></div>至于渐磨之久，则果于义者，非强而能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173298_comment'></div>今之士选用于文章，故不得不笃于所学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173298_comment'></div>至于循习之深，则得于心者，亦不自知其至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173298_comment'></div>由是观之，则上所好，下必有甚者焉，岂非信欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173298_comment'></div>令汉与今有教化开导之方，有庠序<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>养成</span>之法，则士于学行，岂有彼此之偏，先后之过乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173298_comment'></div>夫《大学》之道，将欲诚意正心修身，以治其国家天下，而必本于先致其知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173298_comment'></div>则知者固善之端，而人之所难至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173298_comment'></div>以今之士，于人所难至者既几矣，则上之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>施化</span>，莫易于斯时，顾所以导之如何尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173298_comment'></div>筠为州，在大江之西，其地<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>僻绝</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173298_comment'></div>当庆历之初，诏天下立学，而筠独不能应诏，州之士以为病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173298_comment'></div>至治平三平，盖二十有三年矣，始告于知州事、尚书都官郎中董君仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173298_comment'></div>董君乃与通判州事国子博士郑君茜相州之东南，得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>亢爽</span>之地，筑宫于其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173298_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>斋祭</span>之室，诵讲之堂，休宿之庐，至于庖湢库厩，各以序为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173298_comment'></div>经始于其春，而落成于八月之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173298_comment'></div>既而来学者常数十百人，二君乃以书走京师，请记于予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173298_comment'></div>予谓二君之于政，可谓知所务矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173298_comment'></div>使筠之士相与升降乎其中，讲先王之遗文，以致其知，其贤者超然自信而独立，其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>中材</span>勉焉以待上之教化，则是宫之作，非独使夫来者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1173298", 1173298, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>玩思</span>于空言，以干世取禄而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173298_comment'></div>故为之著予之所闻者以为记，而使归刻焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1173298_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　曾巩撰《都官员外郎胥君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173333' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173333' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173333?labeling=true' target='_blank'>都官员外郎胥君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平三年八月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173333")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173333_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173333'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173333'>君姓胥氏，讳元衡，字平叔，长沙人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173333_comment'></div>皇考讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173333_comment'></div>王考讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173333_comment'></div>考讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173333_comment'></div>王考赠尚书工部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173333_comment'></div>考为翰林学士、尚书工部郎中，赠尚书吏部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173333_comment'></div>君少以荫为将作监主簿，六迁为殿中丞，赐绯鱼袋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173333_comment'></div>锁厅应进士举，得出身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173333_comment'></div>又三迁为尚书都官员外郎，历监在京染院内衣库、皮角库，佥书河南府判官公事，通判湖州，又通判海州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173333_comment'></div>治平三年四月壬寅以疾卒于泗州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173333_comment'></div>其年八月庚寅葬于许州阳翟县三封原翰林君之茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173333_comment'></div>君初娶李氏，太子少傅若谷之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173333_comment'></div>再娶韩氏，封成安县君，尚书刑部员外郎知制诰综之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173333_comment'></div>子男二人，曰茂谌，太庙室长，次尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173333_comment'></div>女二人，长早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173333_comment'></div>君少孤，能自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173333", 1173333, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>奋厉</span>，力学问，工为文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173333_comment'></div>又谨畏洁廉，慕善而不自放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173333_comment'></div>居官虽小，法未尝不慎，而不为察察，于人有所能容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173333_comment'></div>其大意如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173333_comment'></div>故所至，士大夫爱其修，而百姓归其恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173333_comment'></div>其在染院二库，虽尚少，已有能名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173333_comment'></div>及为通判判官，而能益显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173333_comment'></div>盖所试者大，将岂可胜数哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173333_comment'></div>始，大臣荐其文章，宜在馆阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173333_comment'></div>近臣又荐其修洁，宜任御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173333_comment'></div>朝廷方向用之，以为江西转运判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173333_comment'></div>命始下，而君盖已死矣，死时年三十有九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173333_comment'></div>闻其丧者，识与不识皆哀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173333_comment'></div>盖天圣之间，翰林君方处显，好收奖天下之士，而名能知人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173333_comment'></div>士之出于其时，有盛名于天下者，多翰林君发之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173333_comment'></div>及其后，君既壮大，所与游士大夫，亦皆一时之隽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173333_comment'></div>然自天圣至于今才四十年，翰林君之门下士多至大官，富贵尊宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173333_comment'></div>君所与游士大夫亦多重于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173333_comment'></div>而翰林君弃宾客已久，君又蚤世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173333_comment'></div>独翰林君之夫人、建康郡太君刁氏年七十，与君之孥羁旅于闾巷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173333_comment'></div>君之丧，合众人之赙，乃克葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173333_comment'></div>其盛衰之际如此，固所谓命者非邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173333_comment'></div>君之葬，秘阁校理裴煜以茂谌之疏来请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173333_comment'></div>予与君皆嘉祐二年进士，故不得辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173333_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1173333'>维艰而勚，以敏其继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173333_comment'></div>维平而畏，以笃其乂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173333_comment'></div>考已无违，在人有赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173333_comment'></div>我志之良，孰曰非遂？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173333_comment'></div>我材之尤，谁曰非试？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173333_comment'></div>不申其期，不扩其施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173333_comment'></div>有命则然，其又何悲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173333_comment'></div>尚告后世，知者之辞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1173333_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年9月</a>　女兴老殇，曾巩时锁宿景德寺，试国子监进士，不得临视。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　曾巩为封弥官，得曹秀才、方造、孟起之辞而读之，以谓宜在高选。<br /><a href="javascript:
