ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　曾巩收到苏轼来信，请为祖父作墓志铭。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　曾巩作《赠黎安二生序》<div id='poem_1173128' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173128' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173128?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠黎安二生序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173128")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173128_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173128'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173128'>赵郡苏轼，余之同年友也，自蜀以书至京师遗余，称蜀之士曰黎生、安生者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173128_comment'></div>既而黎生携其文数十万言，安生携其文亦数千言，辱以顾余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173128_comment'></div>读其文，诚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173128", 1173128, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>闳壮</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173128", 1173128, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>隽伟</span>，善反复驰骋，穷尽事理，而其才力之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173128", 1173128, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>放纵</span>，若不可极者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173128_comment'></div>二生固可谓魁奇特起之士，而苏君固可谓善<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173128", 1173128, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>知人</span>者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173128_comment'></div>顷之，黎生补江陵府司法参军，将行，请予言以为赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173128_comment'></div>余曰：「余之知生，既得之于心矣，乃将以言相求于外邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173128_comment'></div>黎生曰：「生与安生之学于斯文，里之人皆笑以为迂阔，今求子之言，盖将解惑于里人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173128_comment'></div>余闻之，自顾而笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173128_comment'></div>夫世之迂阔，孰有甚于予乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173128_comment'></div>知信乎古而不知合乎世，知志乎道而不知同乎俗，此余所以困于今而不自知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173128_comment'></div>世之迂阔，孰有甚于予乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173128_comment'></div>今生之迂，特以文不近俗，迂之小者耳，患为笑于里之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173128_comment'></div>若余之迂大矣，使生持吾言而归，且重得罪，庸讵止于笑乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173128_comment'></div>然则若余之于生，将何言哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173128_comment'></div>谓余之迂为善，则其患若此；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173128_comment'></div>谓为不善，则有以合乎世，必违乎古，有以同乎俗，必离乎道矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173128_comment'></div>生其无急于解里人之惑，则于是焉，必能择而取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173128_comment'></div>遂书以赠二生，并示苏君，以为何如也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1173128_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　曾巩撰《天长县君黄氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173354' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173354' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173354?labeling=true' target='_blank'>天长县君黄氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173354")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173354_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173354'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173354'>夫人姓黄氏，福州福清县人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173354_comment'></div>祖讳某，考讳伦，皆仕闽越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173354_comment'></div>夫人嫁同县林氏，为殿中丞讳某之冢妇，尚书屯田员外郎讳某之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173354_comment'></div>有子曰槩，为太常博士、集贤校理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173354_comment'></div>有孙八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173354_comment'></div>曰希，宣州泾县主簿，编校集贤院书籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173354_comment'></div>曰旦，明州象山县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173354_comment'></div>曰邵，杭州南新县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173354_comment'></div>曰颜，许州临川县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173354_comment'></div>曰稽，曰雄，未仕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173354_comment'></div>其二人早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173354_comment'></div>有曾孙十有一人，曰睿、虙、虞、虡、虔、肤、据、处，其三人亦早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173354_comment'></div>夫人年七十有七，治平四年正月癸丑卒于京师之昭化坊，累封嘉兴、天长二县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173354_comment'></div>始，殿中府君与其配福清县太君郑氏皆春秋高，安其乡里不肯出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173354_comment'></div>屯田府君乃从事漳州、泉州、兴化军，逾二十年，终养而后去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173354_comment'></div>夫人能尽其力，治饮食、衣服以进，及丧，能尽其哀，皆如其夫之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173354_comment'></div>其子既就学，夫人常夜治丝枱，居其旁以勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173354_comment'></div>至其后，其子遂以文学名天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173354_comment'></div>既而其子不克寿，屯田府君亦卒于官，诸孙皆幼，夫人已老矣，乃栖吴郡，斥卖簪珥以经理其家，丝蓄粒聚，至有田以食，有宅以居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173354_comment'></div>平居日夜课诸孙以学，有不中程，辄扑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173354_comment'></div>及长，遂多知名，连以进士中其科，泾县复校书集贤，世其父职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173354_comment'></div>夫人乃顾诸孙谓曰：「吾始得事祖姑，今得弄曾孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173354_comment'></div>遂保有汝家起于既坠，吾老且死，不恨矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173354_comment'></div>泾县既服夫人之丧，以其柩归吴郡宝华山，某年某月某日，祔屯田府君之兆，而属余铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173354_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1173354'>女职在宫，行止于柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173354_comment'></div>扶微救厄，则匪我谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173354_comment'></div>势有孔棘，义不得宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173354_comment'></div>任重于己，振坏为兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173354_comment'></div>我储我积，乃续烝尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173354_comment'></div>我字我饬，乃袭印章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173354_comment'></div>苍颠秀眉，燕其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1173354", 1173354, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>作止</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173354_comment'></div>其燕伊何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173354_comment'></div>维终受祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173354_comment'></div>莫仁且智，畴济登兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173354_comment'></div>播告无极，视此铭辞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1173354_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　曾巩作《回人谢馆职启》<div id='poem_1173087' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173087' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173087?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回人谢馆职启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173087")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173087_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173087'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173087'>伏审试艺禁林，升华儒馆，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173087_comment'></div>伏以都官学士英材杰出，玉璞混成，遘时运之光华，奋文章之温雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173087_comment'></div>第<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173087", 1173087, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>荣科</span>于秘殿，蚤迈等伦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173087_comment'></div>升膴仕于本朝，荐腾誉望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173087_comment'></div>较雕龙之丽藻，利架鳌之秘扃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173087_comment'></div>果被明缗，式符舆颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173087_comment'></div>方展<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173087", 1173087, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>腾书</span>之好，遽蒙削牍之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173087_comment'></div>仰服谦撝，退深感戢。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1173087_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　曾巩作《送抚州钱郎中》<div id='poem_220244' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220244' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220244?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送抚州钱郎中</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220244")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220244_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220244'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220244'>名郎元是足风流，得郡东南地更优。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220244_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220244'>翠幕管弦三市晚，画堂烟雨五峰秋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220244_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220244'>黄柑巧缀星垂槛，香稻匀翻雪满瓯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220244_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220244'>应与谢公资健笔，邦人才薄讵能酬？<div id='poem_sentence_3_220244_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220244'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220244_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　曾巩作《<新序>目录序》<div id='poem_1173141' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173141' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173141?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新序目录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173141")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173141_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173141'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173141'>刘向所集次《新序》三十篇，目录一篇，隋唐之世尚为全书，今可见者十篇而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173141_comment'></div>臣既考正其文字，因为其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173141", 1173141, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>序论</span>曰：古之治天下者，一道德，同风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173141_comment'></div>盖九州之广，万民之众，千岁之远，其教已明，其习已成之后，所守者一道，所传者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173141", 1173141, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>一说</span>而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173141_comment'></div>故《诗》《书》之文，历世数十，作者非一，而其言未尝不相为终始，化之如此其至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173141_comment'></div>当是之时，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173141", 1173141, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>异行</span>者有诛，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173141", 1173141, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>异言</span>者有禁，防之又如此其备也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173141_comment'></div>故二帝三王之际，及其中间尝更<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173141", 1173141, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>衰乱</span>、而馀泽未熄之时，百家众说未有能出于其间者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173141_comment'></div>及周之末世，先王之教化法度既废，馀泽既熄，世之治方术者，各得其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173141", 1173141, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>一偏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173141_comment'></div>故人奋其私智，家尚其私学者，蜂起于中国，皆明其所长而昧其短，矜其所得而讳其失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173141_comment'></div>天下之士各自为方而不能相通，世之人不复知夫学之有统、道之有归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173141_comment'></div>先王之遗文虽在，皆绌而不讲，况至于秦为世之所大禁哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173141_comment'></div>汉兴，六艺皆得于断绝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173141", 1173141, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>残脱</span>之馀，世复无明先王之道以一之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173141_comment'></div>诸儒茍见传记百家之言，皆悦而向之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173141_comment'></div>故先王之道为众说之所蔽，暗而不明，郁而不发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173141_comment'></div>而怪奇可喜之论，各师异见，皆自名家者，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173141", 1173141, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>诞漫</span>于中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173141_comment'></div>一切不异于周之末世，其弊至于今尚在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173141_comment'></div>自斯以来，天下学者知折衷于圣人，而能纯于道德之美者，扬雄氏而止耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173141_comment'></div>如向之徒，皆不免乎为众说之所蔽，而不知有所折衷者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173141_comment'></div>孟子曰：待文王而兴者，凡民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173141_comment'></div>豪杰之士，虽无文王犹兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173141_comment'></div>汉之士岂特无明先王之道以一之者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173141_comment'></div>亦其出于是时者，豪杰之士少，故不能特起于流俗之中、绝学之后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173141_comment'></div>盖向之序此书，于今为最近古，虽不能无失，然远至舜禹，而次及于周秦以来，古人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173141", 1173141, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>嘉言善行</span>，亦往往而在也，要在慎取之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173141_comment'></div>故臣既惜其不可见者，而校其可见者特详焉，亦足以知臣之攻其失者，岂好辩哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173141_comment'></div>臣之所不得已也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1173141_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　曾巩作《<梁书>目录序》<div id='poem_1173142' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173142' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173142?labeling=true' target='_blank'>梁书目录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173142")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173142_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173142'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173142'>《梁书》六本纪、五十列传，合五十六篇，唐贞观三年诏右散骑常侍姚思廉撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173142_comment'></div>思廉者，梁史官察之子，推其父意，又颇采诸儒谢、吴等所纪，以成此书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173142_comment'></div>臣等即校正其文字，又集次为目录一篇，而叙之曰：自先王之道不明，百家并起，佛最晚出，为中国之患，而在梁为尤甚，故不得而不论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173142_comment'></div>盖佛之徒，自以为吾之所得者内，而世之论佛者皆外也，故不可诎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173142_comment'></div>虽然，彼恶睹圣人之内哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173142_comment'></div>《书》曰「思曰睿，睿作圣」，盖思者所以致其知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173142_comment'></div>能致其知者，察三才之道，辨万物之理，小大精粗，无不尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173142_comment'></div>此之谓穷理，知之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173142_comment'></div>知至矣，则在我者之足贵，在彼者之不足玩，未有不能明之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173142_comment'></div>有知之之明而不能好之，未可也，故加之诚心以好之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173142_comment'></div>有好之之心而不能乐之，未可也，故加之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173142", 1173142, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>至意</span>以乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173142_comment'></div>能乐之则能安之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173142_comment'></div>如是则万物之自外至者，安能累我哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173142_comment'></div>万物之所不能累，故吾之所以尽其性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173142_comment'></div>能尽其性，则诚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173142_comment'></div>诚者，成也，不惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173142_comment'></div>既诚矣，必充之，使可大焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173142_comment'></div>既大矣，必推之，使可化焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173142_comment'></div>能化矣，则含智之民，肖翘之物，有待于我者，莫不由之以全其性，遂其宜，而吾之用与天地参矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173142_comment'></div>德如此其至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173142_comment'></div>而应乎外者，未尝不与人同，此吾之道所以为天下之通道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173142_comment'></div>故与之为衣冠饮食、冠婚丧祭之具，而由之以教，其为君臣父子兄弟夫妇者，莫不一出乎人情；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173142_comment'></div>与之同其吉凶而防其忧患者，莫不一出乎人理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173142_comment'></div>故与之处而安且治之所集也，危且乱之所去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173142_comment'></div>与之处者其具如此，使之化者其德如彼，可不谓圣矣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173142_comment'></div>既圣矣，则无思也，其至者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173142", 1173142, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>循理</span>而已，无为也，其动者应物而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173142_comment'></div>是以覆露乎万物，鼓舞乎群众，而未有能测之者也，可不谓神矣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173142_comment'></div>神也者，至妙而不息者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173142_comment'></div>此圣人之内也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173142_comment'></div>圣人者，道之极也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173142_comment'></div>佛之说，其有以易此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173142_comment'></div>求其有以易此者，故其所以为失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173142_comment'></div>夫得于内者，未有不可行于外也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173142_comment'></div>有不可行于外者，斯不得于内矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173142_comment'></div>《易》曰：智周乎万物而道济乎天下，故不过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173142_comment'></div>此圣人所以两得之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173142_comment'></div>知足以知一偏，而不足以尽万事之理，道足以为一方，而不足以适天下之用，此百家之所以两失之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173142_comment'></div>佛之失，其不以此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173142_comment'></div>则佛之徒，自以谓得诸内者，亦可谓妄矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173142_comment'></div>夫学史者将以明一代之得失也，臣等故因梁之事，而为著圣人之所以得及佛之所以失以传之者，使知君子之所以距佛者，非外而有志于内者，庶不以此而易彼也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1173142_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　曾巩作《<列女传>目录序》<div id='poem_1173143' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173143' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173143?labeling=true' target='_blank'>列女传目录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173143")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173143_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173143'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173143'>刘向所叙《列女传》，凡八篇，事具《汉书》向列传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173143_comment'></div>而《隋书》及《崇文总目》皆称向《列女传》十五篇，曹大家注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173143_comment'></div>以《颂义》考之，盖大家所注，离其七篇为十四，与《颂义》凡十五篇，而益以陈婴母及东汉以来凡十六事，非向书本然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173143_comment'></div>盖向旧书之亡久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173143_comment'></div>嘉祐中，集贤校理苏颂始以《颂义》为篇次，复定其书为八篇，与十五篇者并藏于馆阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173143_comment'></div>而《隋书》以《颂义》为刘歆作，与向列传不合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173143_comment'></div>今验《颂义》之文，盖向之自叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173143_comment'></div>又《艺文志》有向《列女传颂图》，明非歆作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173143_comment'></div>自唐之乱，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173143", 1173143, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>古书</span>之在者少矣，而《唐志》录《列女传》凡十六家，至大家注十五篇者，亦无录，然其书今在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173143_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173143", 1173143, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>古书</span>之或有录而亡，或无录而在者，亦众矣，非可惜哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173143_comment'></div>今校雠其八篇及其十五篇者已定，可缮写。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173143_comment'></div>初，汉承秦之敝，风俗已大坏矣，而成帝后宫，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173143", 1173143, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>赵卫</span>之属尤自放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173143_comment'></div>向<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173143", 1173143, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>以谓</span>王政必自内始，故列古女善恶所以致兴亡者以戒天子，此向述作之大意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173143_comment'></div>其言大任之娠文王也，目不视<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173143", 1173143, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>恶色</span>，耳不听淫声，口不出敖言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173143_comment'></div>又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173143", 1173143, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>以谓</span>古之人胎教者皆如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173143_comment'></div>夫能正其视听言动者，此大人之事，而有道者之所畏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173143_comment'></div>顾令天下之女子能之，何其盛也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173143_comment'></div>以臣所闻，盖为之师傅保姆之助，《诗》《书》图史之戒，珩璜琚瑀之节，威仪动作之度，其教之者虽有此具，然古之君子，未尝不以身化也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173143_comment'></div>故《家人》之义归于反身，《二南》之业本于文王，夫岂自外至哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173143_comment'></div>世皆知文王之所以兴，能得内助，而不知其所以然者，盖本于文王之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173143", 1173143, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>躬化</span>，故内则后妃有《关雎》之行，外则群臣有《二南》之美，与之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173143", 1173143, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>相成</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173143_comment'></div>其推而及远，则商辛之昏俗，江汉之小国，兔罝之野人，莫不好善而不自知，此所谓身修故国家天下治者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173143_comment'></div>后世自学问之士，多徇于外物而不安其守，其家室既不见可法，故竞于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173143", 1173143, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>邪侈</span>，岂独无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173143", 1173143, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>相成</span>之道哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173143_comment'></div>士之茍于自恕，顾利冒耻而不知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173143", 1173143, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>反己</span>者，往往以家自累故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173143_comment'></div>故曰「身不行道，不行于妻子」，信哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173143_comment'></div>如此人者，非素处显也，然去《二南》之风，亦已远矣，况于南乡天下之主哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173143_comment'></div>向之所述，劝戒之意，可谓笃矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173143_comment'></div>然向号博极群书，而此传称《诗·芣苢》、《柏舟》、《大车》之类，与今序《诗》者之说尤乖异，盖不可考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173143_comment'></div>至于《式微》之一篇，又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1173143", 1173143, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>以谓</span>二人之作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173143_comment'></div>岂其所取者博，故不能无失欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173143_comment'></div>其言象计谋杀舜及舜所以自脱者，颇合于《孟子》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173143_comment'></div>然此传或有之，而《孟子》所不道者，盖亦不足道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173143_comment'></div>凡后世诸儒之言经传者，固多如此，览者采其有补，而择其是非可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173143_comment'></div>故为之叙论以发其端云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1173143_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　曾巩作《<礼阁新仪>目录序》<div id='poem_1173144' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173144' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173144?labeling=true' target='_blank'>礼阁新仪目录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173144")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173144_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173144'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173144'>《礼阁新仪》三十篇，韦公肃撰，记开元以后至元和之变礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173144_comment'></div>史馆、秘阁及臣书皆三十篇，集贤院书二十篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173144_comment'></div>以参相校雠，史馆、秘阁及臣书多复重，其篇少者八，集贤院书独具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173144_comment'></div>然臣书有目录一篇，以考其次序，盖此书本三十篇，则集贤院书虽具，然其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173144", 1173144, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>篇次</span>亦乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173144_comment'></div>既正其脱谬，因定著从目录，而《礼阁新仪》三十篇复完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173144_comment'></div>夫礼者，其本在于养人之性，而其用在于言动视听之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173144_comment'></div>使人之言动视听一于礼，则安有放其邪心而穷于外物哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173144_comment'></div>不放其邪心，不穷于外物，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173144", 1173144, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>祸乱</span>可息，而财用可充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173144_comment'></div>其立意微，其为法远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173144_comment'></div>故设其器，制其物，为其数，立其文，以待其有事者，皆人之起居、出入、吉凶、哀乐之具，所谓其用在乎言动视听之间者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173144_comment'></div>然而古今之变不同，而俗之便习亦异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173144_comment'></div>则法制<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173144", 1173144, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>数度</span>，其久而不能无弊者，势固然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173144_comment'></div>故为礼者，其始莫不宜于当世，而其后多失而难遵，亦其理然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173144_comment'></div>失则必改制以求其当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173144_comment'></div>故羲、农以来，至于三代，礼未尝同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173144_comment'></div>后世去三代，盖千有馀岁，其所遭之变，所习之便不同，固已远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173144_comment'></div>而议者不原圣人制作之方，乃谓设其器，制其物，为其数，立其文，以待其有事，而为其起居、出入、吉凶、哀乐之具者，当一二以追先王之迹，然后礼可得而兴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173144_comment'></div>至其说之不可求，其制之不可考，或不宜于人，不合于用，则宁至于漠然而不敢为，使人之言动视听之间，荡然莫之为节，至患夫为罪者之不止，则繁于为法以御之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173144_comment'></div>故法至于不胜其繁，而犯者亦至于不胜其众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173144_comment'></div>岂不惑哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173144_comment'></div>盖上世圣人，有为耒耜者，或不为宫室；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173144_comment'></div>为舟车者，或不为棺椁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173144_comment'></div>岂其智不足为哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173144_comment'></div>以谓人之所未病者，不必改也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173144_comment'></div>至于后圣有为宫室者，不以土处为不可变也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173144_comment'></div>为棺椁者，不以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173144", 1173144, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>葛沟</span>为不可易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173144_comment'></div>岂好为相反哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173144_comment'></div>以谓人之所既病者不可因也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173144_comment'></div>又至于后圣，则有设两观而更采椽之质，攻文梓而易瓦棺之素，岂不能从俭哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173144_comment'></div>以谓人情之所好者能为之节，而不能变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173144_comment'></div>由是观之，古今之变不同，而俗之便习亦异，则亦屡变其法以宜之，何必一二以追先王之迹哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173144_comment'></div>其要在于养民之性，防民之欲者，本末先后能合乎先王之意而已，此制作之方也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173144_comment'></div>故瓦樽之尚而薄酒之用，大羹之先而庶羞之饱，一以为贵本，一以为亲用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173144_comment'></div>则知有圣人作而为后世之礼者，必贵俎豆，而今之器用不废也，先弁冕，而今之衣服不禁也，其推之皆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173144_comment'></div>然后其所改易更革，不至乎拂天下之势，骇天下之情，而固已合乎先王之意矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173144_comment'></div>是以羲、农以来，至于三代，礼未尝同，而制作之如此者，亦未尝异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173144_comment'></div>后世不推其如此，而或至于不敢为，或为之者特出于其势之不得已，故茍简而不能备，希阔而不常行，又不过用之于上，而未有加之于民者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173144_comment'></div>故其礼本在于养人之性，而其用在于言动视听之间者，历千馀岁，民未尝得接于耳目，况于服习而安之者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173144_comment'></div>至其陷于罪戾，则繁于为法以御之，其亦不仁也哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173144_comment'></div>此书所纪，虽其事已浅，然凡世之记礼者，亦皆有所本，而一时之得失具焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173144_comment'></div>昔孔子于告朔，爱其礼之存，况于一代之典籍哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173144_comment'></div>故其书不得不贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173144_comment'></div>因为之定著，以俟夫论礼者考而择焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1173144_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　曾巩作《<战国策>目录序》<div id='poem_1173145' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173145' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173145?labeling=true' target='_blank'>战国策目录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173145")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173145_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173145'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173145'>刘向所定《战国策》三十三篇，《崇文总目》称第十一篇者阙，臣访之士大夫家，始尽得其书，正其误谬而疑其不可考者，然后《战国策》三十三篇复完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173145_comment'></div>叙曰：向叙此书，言「周之先，明教化，修法度，所以大治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173145_comment'></div>及其后，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173145", 1173145, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>谋诈</span>用，而仁义之路塞，所以大乱」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173145_comment'></div>其说既美矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173145_comment'></div>卒以谓「此书战国之谋士度时君之所能行，不得不然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173145_comment'></div>则可谓惑于流俗，而不笃于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173145", 1173145, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>自信</span>者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173145_comment'></div>夫孔孟之时，去周之初已数百岁，其旧法已亡，旧俗已熄久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173145_comment'></div>二子乃独明先王之道，以谓不可改者，岂将强天下之主以后世之所不可为哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173145_comment'></div>亦将因其所遇之时、所遭之变而为当世之法，使不失乎先王之意而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173145_comment'></div>二帝三王之治，其变固殊，其法固异，而其为国家天下之意，本末先后，未尝不同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173145_comment'></div>二子之道，如是而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173145_comment'></div>盖法者所以适变也，不必尽同；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173145_comment'></div>道者所以立本也，不可不一，此理之不易者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173145_comment'></div>故二子者守此，岂好为异论哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173145_comment'></div>能勿苟而已矣，可谓不惑乎流俗而笃于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173145", 1173145, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>自信</span>者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173145_comment'></div>战国之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173145", 1173145, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>游士</span>则不然，不知道之可信，而乐于说之易合，其设心注意，偷为一切之计而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173145_comment'></div>故论诈之便而讳其败，言战之善而蔽其患，其相率而为之者，莫不有利焉，而不胜其害也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173145_comment'></div>有得焉，而不胜其失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173145_comment'></div>卒至苏秦、商鞅、孙膑、吴起、李斯之徒以亡其身，而诸侯及秦用之者亦灭其国，其为世之大祸明矣，而俗犹莫之寤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173145_comment'></div>惟先王之道，因时适变，为法不同，而考之无疵，用之无弊，故古之圣贤，未有以此而易彼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173145_comment'></div>或曰：「邪说之害正也，宜放而绝之，则此书之不泯其可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173145_comment'></div>对曰：君子之禁邪说也，固将明其说于天下，使当世之人皆知其说之不可从，然后以禁，则齐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173145_comment'></div>使后世之人皆知其说之不可为，然后以戒，则明，岂必灭其籍哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173145_comment'></div>放而绝之，莫善于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173145_comment'></div>是以孟子之书，有为神农之言者，有为墨子之言者，皆著而非之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173145_comment'></div>至于此书之作，则上继春秋，下至楚汉之起，二百四五十年之间，载其行事，固不可得而废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173145_comment'></div>此书有高诱注者二十一篇，或曰三十二篇，《崇文总目》存者八篇，今存者十篇云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1173145_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　曾巩作《<南齐书>目录序》<div id='poem_1173147' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173147' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173147?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南齐书目录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173147")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173147_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173147'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173147'>《南齐书》八纪，十一志，四十列传，合五十九篇，梁萧子显撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173147_comment'></div>始，江淹已为《十志》，沈约又为《齐纪》，而子显自表武帝，别为此书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173147_comment'></div>臣等因校正其讹谬，而叙其篇目曰：将以是非得失兴坏理乱之故而为法戒，则必得其所托，而后能传于久，此史之所以作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173147_comment'></div>然而所托不得其人，则或失其意，或乱其实，或析理之不通，或设辞之不善，故虽有殊功<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173147", 1173147, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>韪德</span>非常之迹，将暗而不章，郁而不发，而梼杌嵬琐奸回凶慝之形，可幸而掩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173147_comment'></div>尝试论之，古之所谓良史者，其明必足以周万事之理，其道必足以适天下之用，其智必足以通难知之意，其文必足以发难显之情，然后其任可得而称也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173147_comment'></div>何以知其然也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173147_comment'></div>昔者唐虞有神明之性，有微妙之德，使由之者不能知，知之者不能名，以为治天下之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173147_comment'></div>号令之所布，法度之所设，其言至约，其体至备，以为治天下之具，而为二典者推而明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173147_comment'></div>所记者岂独其迹也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173147_comment'></div>并与其深微之意而传之，大小精粗无不尽也，本末先后无不白也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173147_comment'></div>使诵其说者如出乎其时，求其旨者如即乎其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173147_comment'></div>是可不谓明足以周万事之理，道足以适天下之用，知足以通难知之意，文足以发难显之情者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173147_comment'></div>则方是之时，岂特任政者皆天下之士哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173147_comment'></div>盖执简操笔而随者，亦皆圣人之徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173147_comment'></div>两汉以来，为史者去之远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173147_comment'></div>司马迁从五帝三王既没数千载之后，秦火之馀，因<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173147", 1173147, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>散绝</span>残脱之经，以及传记百家之说，区区掇拾，以集著其善恶之迹、兴废之端，又创己意，以为本纪、世家、八书、列传之文，斯亦可谓奇矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173147_comment'></div>然而蔽害天下之圣法，是非颠倒而采摭谬乱者，亦岂少哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173147_comment'></div>是岂可不谓明不足以周万事之理，道不足以适天下之用，智不足以通难知之意，文不足以发难显之情者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173147_comment'></div>夫自三代以后，为史者如迁之文，亦不可不谓隽伟拔出之才、非常之士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173147_comment'></div>然顾以谓明不足以周万事之理，道不足以适天下之用，智不足以通难知之意，文不足以发难显之情者，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173147_comment'></div>盖圣贤之高致，迁固有不能纯达其情，而见之于后者矣，故不得而与之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173147_comment'></div>迁之得失如此，况其他邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173147_comment'></div>至于宋、齐、梁、陈、后魏、后周之书，盖无以议为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173147_comment'></div>子显之于斯文，喜自驰骋，其更改<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173147", 1173147, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>破析</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173147", 1173147, "Clauses/95/Comments/1")'>刻雕</span>藻缋之变尤多，而其文益下，岂夫材固不可以强而有邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173147_comment'></div>数世之史既然，故其事迹暧昧，虽有随世以就功名之君，相与合谋之臣，未有赫然得倾动天下之耳目，播天下之口者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173147_comment'></div>而一时偷夺倾危、悖礼反义之人，亦幸而不暴著于世，岂非所托不得其人故也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173147_comment'></div>可不惜哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173147_comment'></div>盖史者所以明夫治天下之道也，故为之者亦必天下之材，然后其任可得而称也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173147_comment'></div>岂可忽哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173147_comment'></div>岂可忽哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1173147_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　曾巩作《<唐令>目录序》<div id='poem_1173148' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173148' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173148?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐令目录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173148")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173148_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173148'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173148'>《唐令》三十篇，以常员定职官之任，以府卫设师徒之备，以口分永业为授田之法，以租庸调为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173148", 1173148, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>敛财</span>役民之制，虽未及三代之政，然亦庶几乎先王之意矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173148_comment'></div>后世从事者多率其私见，故圣贤之道废而苟简之术用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173148_comment'></div>太宗能超然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173148", 1173148, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>远览</span>，绌封伦而纳郑公之议，其为天下国家之意，故能及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173148_comment'></div>而当是之时，遂成太平之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173148_comment'></div>使能推其类，尽其道，则唐之治，岂难至于三代之盛哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173148_comment'></div>读其书，嘉其制度有庶几于古者，而惜其不复行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173148_comment'></div>故掇其大要可纪者，论之于此焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1173148_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　曾巩作《徐幹<中论>目录序》<div id='poem_1173149' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173149' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173149?labeling=true' target='_blank'>徐干中论目录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173149")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173149_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173149'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173149'>臣始见馆阁及世所有徐干《中论》二十篇，以谓尽于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173149_comment'></div>及观《贞观政要》，怪太宗称尝见干《中论·复三年丧》篇，而今书此篇阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173149_comment'></div>因考之《魏志》，见文帝称干著《中论》二十馀篇，于是知馆阁及世所有干《中论》二十篇者，非全书也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173149_comment'></div>干字伟长，北海人，生于汉魏之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173149_comment'></div>魏文帝称干「怀文抱质，恬淡寡欲，有箕山之志」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173149_comment'></div>而《先贤行状》亦称干「笃行体道，不耽世荣，魏太祖特<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173149", 1173149, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>旌命</span>之，辞疾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173149", 1173149, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>不就</span>，后以为上艾长，又以疾不行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173149_comment'></div>盖汉承周衰及秦灭学之馀，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173149", 1173149, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>百氏</span>杂家与圣人之道并传，学者罕能独观于道德之要，而不牵于俗儒之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173149_comment'></div>至于治心养性、去就语默之际，能不悖于理者，固希矣，况至于魏之浊世哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173149_comment'></div>干独能考六艺，推仲尼、孟轲之旨，述而论之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173149_comment'></div>求其辞，时若有小失者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173149_comment'></div>要其归，不合于道者少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173149_comment'></div>其所得于内者，又能信而充之，逡巡浊世，有去就显晦之大节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173149_comment'></div>臣始读其书，察其意而贤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173149_comment'></div>因其书以求其为人，又知其行之可贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173149_comment'></div>惜其有补于世，而识之者少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173149_comment'></div>盖迹其言行之所至，而以世俗好恶观之，彼恶足以知其意哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173149_comment'></div>顾臣之力，岂足以重其书，使学者尊而信之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173149_comment'></div>因校其脱谬，而序其大略，盖所以致臣之意焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1173149_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　曾巩作《<说苑>目录序》<div id='poem_1173150' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173150' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173150?labeling=true' target='_blank'>说苑目录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173150")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173150_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173150'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173150'>刘向所序《说苑》二十篇，《崇文总目》云：「今存者五篇，馀皆亡」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173150_comment'></div>臣从士大夫间得之者十有三篇，与旧为十有八篇，正其脱谬，疑者阙之，而叙其篇目曰：向采传记、百家所载行事之迹，以为此书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173150_comment'></div>奏之欲以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173150", 1173150, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>法戒</span>，然其所取，往往不当于理，故不得而不论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173150_comment'></div>夫学者之于道，非知其大略之难也，知其精微之际固难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173150_comment'></div>孔子之徒三千，其显者七十二人，皆高世之材也，然独称颜氏之子，其殆庶几乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173150_comment'></div>及回死，又以谓无好学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173150_comment'></div>而回亦称夫子曰：「仰之弥高，钻之弥坚」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173150_comment'></div>子贡又以谓夫子之言性与天道，不可得而闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173150_comment'></div>则其精微之际，固难知久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173150_comment'></div>是以取舍不能无失于其间也，故曰「学然后知不足」，岂虚言哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173150_comment'></div>向之学博矣，其著书及建言，尤欲有为于世，忘其枉己而为之者有矣，何其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173150", 1173150, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>徇物</span>者多而自为者少也，盖古之圣贤非不欲有为也，然而曰求之有道，得之有命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173150_comment'></div>故孔子所至之邦，必闻其政，而子贡以谓非夫子之求之也，岂不求之有道哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173150_comment'></div>子曰：「道之将行也与，命也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173150_comment'></div>道之将废也与，命也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173150_comment'></div>岂不得之有命哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173150_comment'></div>令向之出此，安于行止，以彼其志，能择其所学，以尽乎精微，则其所至未可量也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173150_comment'></div>是以孔子称古之学者为己，孟子称君子欲其自得之，自得之，则取之左右逢其原，岂汲汲于外哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173150_comment'></div>向之得失如此，亦学者之戒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173150_comment'></div>故见之叙论，令读其书者，知考而择之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173150_comment'></div>然向数困于谗而不改其操，与夫患失之者异矣，可谓有志者也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1173150_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　胡宿卒，曾巩撰《胡太傅挽词二首》<div id='poem_220236' id='poem_sentence_0_220236'>谠言留简册，恭德载<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_220236", 220236, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>闺门</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220236_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220236'>福履三朝盛，官仪一品尊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220236_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220235' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220235?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220235_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220235'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220235'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_220235", 220235, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>远略</span>参基命，雄文入典章。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220235_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220235'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220235", 220235,
