id='poem_sentence_2_220235_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220235'>惟应九原上，松桧日苍苍。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220235_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220235'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220235_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　曾巩在京师编校史馆书籍，为集贤校理，兼判官告院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　曾巩作《代曾侍中辞转官札子》<div id='poem_1173006' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173006' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173006?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代曾侍中辞转官劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173006")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173006_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173006'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173006'>臣蒙恩转官，已曾面陈，及具劄子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173006", 1173006, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>辞免</span>，恳诚虽切，志愿未谐，夙夜省循，不遑宁处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173006_comment'></div>是用再干旒扆，伏望必赐允从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173006_comment'></div>臣以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173006", 1173006, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>谫才</span>，当陛下即政之初，励精思治，与在庙堂，首当大任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173006_comment'></div>所宜佐陛下循守法度，重惜名器，使恩无误施，官不虚授，四方观听，知朝廷庆赏得宜，则众情必皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173006", 1173006, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>劝慕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173006_comment'></div>欲正其本，当始于臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173006_comment'></div>今若首玷宠荣，不知固避，使朝野窃议，上亏政理，则是欲清其流而先浊其源，致弊之由，乃自臣始，岂陛下所以属任微臣之意，愚情所以图报万一之心？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173006_comment'></div>况祖宗以来，进官之法，或以岁月，或以功勤，今于斯二者，实无其一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173006_comment'></div>又于执政之内，不为以事当迁，欲贪厚恩，何义而可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173006_comment'></div>伏望特回圣慈，俯怜悃愊，速赐德音，遂其所乞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173006_comment'></div>至于国公户邑，则臣更不敢辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173006_comment'></div>谨具劄子奏陈，无任赤心恳激之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173006_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1173006_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年1月</a>　曾巩作《代曾侍中乞退札子》<div id='poem_1173007' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173007' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173007?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代曾侍中乞退劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173007")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173007_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173007'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173007'>臣近三上表，及再进劄子，以阴阳不调，雨雪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173007", 1173007, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>愆候</span>，乞欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173007", 1173007, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>免黜</span>，蒙面谕不允，仍降批答，令断来章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173007_comment'></div>臣仰惟宠遇之厚，恩旨之严，固欲强颜趣于顺命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173007_comment'></div>然信宿以来，旱气转甚，臣夙夜震惕，职思其忧，所以不避<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173007", 1173007, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>冒烦</span>，至于五六，敢祈仁圣必赐矜从，此臣区区之愚，义不得止者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173007_comment'></div>盖宰相职调阴阳，灾异即当罢免，行之已久，故事甚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173007_comment'></div>今亢阳为沴，经涉冬春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173007_comment'></div>陇亩之间，焦枯日甚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173007_comment'></div>闾巷之内，疾疠将兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173007_comment'></div>天戒丁宁，咎自臣始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173007_comment'></div>陛下侧身思变，发于恳诚，忘己忧人，见于颜色，以至询访周于列位，请祷遍于群神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173007_comment'></div>圣心焦劳，中外<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173007", 1173007, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>嗟仰</span>，岂臣之分，尚得晏然？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173007_comment'></div>虽陛下大恩，欲终覆护，而四方观听，责当谓何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173007_comment'></div>且臣少壮之时，尚虞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173007", 1173007, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>不职</span>，今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173007", 1173007, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>齿发</span>已暮，理当乞身，欲贪宠私，何义而可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173007_comment'></div>伏望察臣素守，体臣至诚，早回圣慈，许从罢黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173007_comment'></div>矧今旧德之老，新进之贤，求于朝廷，所在森列，取以代臣，必致休徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173007_comment'></div>使臣得避贤者路，退守丘园，岂惟上厌天心，下塞人望，亦所以全陛下始终之恩，成老臣去就之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173007_comment'></div>况应天感人，惟在诚实，臣既知当退，岂敢矫诬？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173007_comment'></div>所望睿明，审加详择，臣无任血诚迫切之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173007_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1173007_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年1月</a>　正月，诏修《英宗实录》，曾巩与孙觉充检讨官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　曾巩作《谢实录院赐研纸笔墨表》<div id='poem_1172974' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172974' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172974?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢实录院赐研纸笔墨表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172974")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172974_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172974'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172974'>阴山坚石之璞，易水芳松之烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172974_comment'></div>妍妙辉光，水苔之质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172974_comment'></div>圆和正直，秋兔之毫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172974_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1172974_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　曾巩作《英宗实录院谢赐御筵表》<div id='poem_1172973' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172973' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172973?labeling=true' target='_blank'>英宗实录院谢赐御筵表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172973")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172973_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172973'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172973'>伏蒙圣慈，以臣等编修《英宗皇帝实录》，今月十四日开局，赐臣等御筵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172973_comment'></div>方次旧闻，已叨优礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172973_comment'></div>省循非称，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1172973", 1172973, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>惭负</span>失容<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172973_comment'></div>伏以先帝功德之殊，将传后世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172973_comment'></div>儒者文章之用，正在此时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172973_comment'></div>猥以空疏，误当属任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172973_comment'></div>甫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1172973", 1172973, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>磨铅</span>而就职，遽置醴以均恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172973_comment'></div>宠异群司，幸逾素望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172973_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下永怀先烈，务广<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1172973", 1172973, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>孝思</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172973_comment'></div>故因始于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1172973", 1172973, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>信书</span>，俾特丰于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1172973", 1172973, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>燕豆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172973_comment'></div>所惧不能名乾坤之至德，摹日月之大明，上以副陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1172973", 1172973, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>显亲</span>之心，下以尽愚臣归美之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172973_comment'></div>惟粗明于书法，庶少补于素餐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172973_comment'></div>臣等无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1172973_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1172973'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷二八。又见《曾文定公集》卷一○，清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷四○。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1172973_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　曾巩作《英宗实录院申请札子》<div id='poem_1173008' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173008' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173008?labeling=true' target='_blank'>英宗实录院申请劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173008")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173008_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173008'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173008'>奉敕修撰英宗皇帝一朝实录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173008_comment'></div>伏以先帝功德之美，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>覆被</span>天下，宜载方策，传之无穷，而未有日历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173008_comment'></div>至于时政记、起居注，亦皆未备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173008_comment'></div>今此论次，实忧疏略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173008_comment'></div>其于搜访事迹以备撰述，尤在广博，使无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>阙遗</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173008_comment'></div>今取到修撰仁宗皇帝实录院行迹案卷看详，彼处累次陈情，乞搜采取借，应于合要照證文字前后条件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173008_comment'></div>本院亦合如此施行，参详类次，作一并申请，具下项：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1173008'>一、文臣少卿、监以上，武臣正刺史以上，或虽官品未至，而事业勋绩可书，及丘园之士，曾经朝廷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>奖遇</span>，凡在先朝薨卒者，例合于实录内立传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173008_comment'></div>欲乞朝廷特降指挥，下钤辖诸道进奏院，遍行指挥，仍劄付御史台、开封府，及审官院、三班院、流内铨、入内内侍省、阁门出榜晓示，应系英宗朝亡殁臣僚，合立传者，并令供给行状、神道碑、墓志等，仰本家亲属限日近修写，疾速附递缴纳，赴实录院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1173008'>一、应先朝曾历两府两制杂学士、待制、台谏官，及正任刺史、阁门使，已上臣僚，或因赐对，亲闻圣语，或有司奏事，特出宸断，可书简册者，并乞付中书遍劄送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173008_comment'></div>已上臣僚，委令逐人速具实封供报，务要详悉，仍乞指挥进奏院，遍行指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173008_comment'></div>应曾在先朝任上件官位，已经亡殁臣僚之家，亦许亲族<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>编录</span>，经所在官司缴进，不得虚饰事节，候到日并降付本院，以凭看详编修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173008_comment'></div>所贵书成之日，免致疏略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1173008'>一、乞下中书、枢密院，自嘉祐八年四月至治平四年正月已前，应有臣僚进献文字，曾送史馆，或留在中书，刬刷名件，及下史馆，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>尽底</span>检寻，降付本院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173008_comment'></div>并宰臣与文武百僚，凡有奏请称贺上表，所降批答，亦乞检寻降下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1173008'>一、乞下两省及司封、兵部、吏部、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/76/Comments/6")'>甲库</span>、学士、舍人院，据实录院所阙宣敕及诏书除目告词，如移牒暂借，使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>画时</span>检寻报应，不得稽缓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1173008'>一、乞下礼宾院，具自嘉祐八年四月至治平四年正月八日已前，凡外蕃朝贡，所记本国风俗人物、道里土产，详实供报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1173008'>一、先朝臣僚，有得罪谴谪者，乞下御史台、审刑院、刑部、大理寺，据实录院所要案牍，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>画时</span>供借。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1173008'>一、乞下司天监，自嘉祐八年四月至治平四年，逐年具历日一本，供报当院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1173008'>一、乞下三司，令自嘉祐八年四月至治平四年正月八日已前，应虫蝗水旱灾伤，及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>德音</span>赦书蠲放税赋及蠲免欠负，并具实数，供报当院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1173008'>一、乞下三司，自嘉祐八年四月至治平四年正月八日已前，应有制置钱谷税赋茶盐及榷酒等，凡干臣僚章疏论议废置事件，具录供报当院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1173008'>一、都水监河渠水利，凡有论议改更，礼部但系郡国所申祥瑞，贡院但干改更贡举条制，太常寺、礼院但干礼乐制作事，三司户部每遇户口升降，已上官司，自嘉祐八年四月至治平四年正月八日已前，令子细检寻，供报本院，不得漏略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1173008'>一、天圣元年，管勾修《真宗皇帝实录》所奏修撰官李维等公文，其间有事迹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>不圆</span>处，合系中书、枢密院、三司检寻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/120/Comments/2")'>应副</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173008_comment'></div>又缘事件不少，窃虑差去手分，不得到里面检寻，是致逐时不检，到照證事件，乞传宣中书、枢密院，据李维等合要照證修撰事迹名件，令合行手分等，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>尽底</span>检寻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/129/Comments/1")'>应副</span>，免致有妨修撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173008_comment'></div>奉御宝批，依奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173008_comment'></div>治平元年，修仁宗皇帝实录院，亦奏合于中书、枢密院检寻，合要照證事件，乞依天圣初体例施行，并乞差中书应奉国史文字堂后官魏孝先、枢密院修时政记主事刘孝先，候见当院书库官等，将到合要检寻事件，立便收接检寻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>应副</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173008_comment'></div>又曾乞差中书、枢密院编文字官，及乞于三司、审刑院、大理寺属官内选差一员，各令<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/144/Comments/0")'>应副</span>检寻文字，今来本院合要中书、枢密院检寻文字照證编修，欲乞依天圣、治平初体例施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1173008'>一、乞下管勾往来国信所，契勘嘉祐八年四月至治平四年正月末以来，所差入国接伴馆伴官等，正官借官簿等册并语录，权借赴当院，照證修纂，仍不妨彼所使用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1173008'>一、乞下玉牒所，取英宗皇帝玉牒一本照会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1173008'>一、乞下中书编机房，合要嘉祐八年四月至治平四年正月八日已前除改麻制文字照会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1173008'>一、本院但干修实录，于诸处检借文字，并须当职官员封记往还，疾速<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1173008", 1173008, "Clauses/161/Comments/0")'>应付</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173008_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1173008'>一、乞下尚书司封，疾速检借嘉祐八年四月至治平四年正月八日已前中书除改百官官位姓名敕黄，照證修纂。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1173008_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年1月</a>　曾巩作《尹公亭记》<div id='poem_1173297' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173297' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173297?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尹公亭记<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年正月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173297")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173297_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173297'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173297'>君子之于己，自得而已矣，非有待于外也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173297_comment'></div>然而曰「疾没世而名不称焉」者，所以与人同其行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173297_comment'></div>人之于君子，潜心而已矣，非有待于外也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173297_comment'></div>然而有表其闾，名其乡，欲其风声气烈暴于世之耳目而无穷者，所以与人同其好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173297_comment'></div>内有以得诸己，外有以与人同其好，此所以为先王之道，而异乎百家之说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173297_comment'></div>随为州，去京师远，其地僻绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173297_comment'></div>庆历之间，起居舍人、直龙图阁河南尹公洙以不为在势者所容谪是州，居于城东五里开元佛寺之金灯院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173297_comment'></div>尹公有行义文学，长于辨论，一时与之游者，皆世之闻人，而人人自以为不能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173297_comment'></div>于是时，尹公之名震天下，而其所学，盖不以贫富贵贱死生动其心，故其居于随，日以考图书、通古今为事，而不知其官之为谪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173297_comment'></div>尝于其居之北阜，竹柏之间，结茅为亭，以茇而嬉，岁馀乃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173297_comment'></div>既去而人不忍废坏，辄理之，因名之曰尹公之亭，州从事谢景平刻石记其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173297_comment'></div>至治平四年，司农少卿赞皇李公禹卿为是州，始因其故基，增庳益狭，斩材以易之，陶瓦以覆之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173297_comment'></div>既成，而宽深亢爽，环随之山皆在几席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173297_comment'></div>又以其旧亭峙之于北，于是随人皆喜慰其思，而又获游观之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173297_comment'></div>其冬，李公以图走京师，属予记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173297_comment'></div>盖尹公之行见于事、言见于书者，固已赫然动人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173297_comment'></div>而李公于是又侈而大之者，岂独慰随人之思于一时，而与之共其乐哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173297_comment'></div>亦将使夫荒遐僻绝之境，至于后人见闻之所不及，而传其名、览其迹者，莫不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173297", 1173297, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>低佪</span>俯仰，想尹公之风声气烈，至于愈远而弥新，是可谓与人同其好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173297_comment'></div>则李公之传于世，亦岂有已乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173297_comment'></div>故予为之书，时熙宁元年正月日也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1173297_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173297'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷一八。又见《曾文定公集》卷九，《南丰曾先生文粹》卷六，《山堂肆考》卷八一，《八代文钞》第三二册，《文章辨体汇选》卷五六五，《名山胜概记》卷二七，《古今图书集成》职方典卷二六九、考工典卷一○七。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173297_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　曾巩罢检讨之职。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年1月</a>　应苏轼之请，曾巩撰《赠职方员外郞苏君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173337' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173337' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173337?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠职方员外郎苏君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173337")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173337_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173337'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173337'>熙宁元年春，余之同年友赵郡苏轼自蜀以书至京师，谓余曰：「轼之大父行甚高，而不为世用，故不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173337", 1173337, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>自见</span>于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173337_comment'></div>然古之人亦不必皆能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173337", 1173337, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>自见</span>，而卒有传于后者，以世有发明之者耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173337_comment'></div>故轼之先人尝疏其事，盖将属铭于子，而不幸不得就其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173337_comment'></div>轼何敢废焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173337_comment'></div>子其为我铭之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173337_comment'></div>余为之记其说曰：君讳序，字仲先，眉州眉山人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173337_comment'></div>其先盖赵郡栾城人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173337_comment'></div>曾大父釿，大父祐，父杲，三世皆不仕，而行义闻于乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173337_comment'></div>祐生于唐季，而卒于周显德之间，尝以事至成都，遇道士异之，屏人谓曰：「吾术能变化百物，将以授子」祐辞不愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173337_comment'></div>道士笑曰：「是果有以过人矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173337_comment'></div>而杲始以好施显名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173337_comment'></div>君读书务知大义，为诗务达其志而已，诗多至千馀篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173337_comment'></div>为人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173337", 1173337, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>疏达</span>自信，持之以谦，轻财好施，急人之病，孜孜若不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173337_comment'></div>岁凶，卖田以赈其邻里乡党，至熟，人将偿之，君辞不受，以是至数破其业，危于饥寒，然未尝以为悔，而好施益甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173337_comment'></div>遇人无疏密，一与之，倾尽无疑碍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173337_comment'></div>或欺而侮之，君亦不变，人莫测其意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173337_comment'></div>李顺叛，攻眉州，君居围中守御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173337_comment'></div>会其父病没，君治丧执礼尽哀，退慰安其母，皆不失所宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173337_comment'></div>庆历初，诏州县立学取士，士争欲执事学中，君独戒其子孙退避，人皆服其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173337_comment'></div>蜀自五代之乱，学者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173337", 1173337, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>衰少</span>，又安其乡里，皆不愿出仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173337_comment'></div>君独教其子涣受学，所以成就之者甚备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173337_comment'></div>至涣以进士起家，蜀人荣之，意始大变，皆喜受学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173337_comment'></div>及其后，眉之学者至千馀人，盖自苏氏始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173337_comment'></div>而君之季子洵，壮犹不知书，君亦不强之，谓人曰：「是非忧其不学者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173337_comment'></div>既而洵果奋发力学，与其子轼、辙皆以文学名天下，为学者所宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173337_comment'></div>盖虽不用于世，而见于家、称于乡里者如此，是不可以无传也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173337_comment'></div>君始以子恩为大理评事，后累赠尚书职方员外郎，享年七十有五，庆历五年五月十一日终于家，八年二月某日葬于眉山县修文乡安道里先茔之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173337_comment'></div>夫人史氏，蓬莱县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173337_comment'></div>二子：曰涣，尚书都官郎中，提点利州路刑狱公事，有能名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173337_comment'></div>曰洵，霸州文安县主簿，编纂太常礼书，赠光禄寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173337_comment'></div>孙七人：位、佾、不欺、不疑、不危、轼、辙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173337_comment'></div>轼，殿中丞，直史馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173337_comment'></div>辙，商州军事推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173337_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1173337'>苏氏徂西，值蜀崩分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173337_comment'></div>三世高逝，以笃吾仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173337_comment'></div>君始不羁，劳躬以卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173337_comment'></div>孝于父母，施及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1173337", 1173337, "Clauses/124/Comments/0")'>穷嫠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173337_comment'></div>维见之卓，教其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173337_comment'></div>终化乡邦，学者诜诜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173337_comment'></div>维子若孙，同时三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173337_comment'></div>擅名文章，震动四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173337_comment'></div>乃本厥初，考祖之自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173337_comment'></div>刻诗墓石，以畀厥裔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1173337_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　曾巩作《送章婺州》<div id='poem_220463' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220463' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220463?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送章婺州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220463")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220463_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220463'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220463'>方拥使君节，驾言自东还。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220463_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220463'>又闻白丞相，怀绂出九关。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220463_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220463'>遂纵大船去，欲追讵能攀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220463_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220463'>已喜所寄径，幽寻足溪山。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220463_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220463'>仍誇越西部，迥在云林间。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220463_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220463'>屋瓦遍高下，青苍更回环。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220463_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220463'>穿路竹袅袅，鸣沙水潺潺。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220463_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220463'>曾有樽酒适，每需庭讼闲。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220463_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220463'>况席鼓琴旧，政行故非艰。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220463_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220463'>岁暮当趋召，驰归复玉班。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220463_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220463'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_220463_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　曾巩作《瞿秘校新授官还南丰》<div id='poem_220531' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220531' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220531?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瞿秘校新授官还南丰</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220531")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220531_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220531'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220531'>柳色映驰道，水声通御沟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220531'>虽喜芳物盛，未同故人游。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220531'>叩门忽去我，跃马振轻裘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220531'>佩印自兹始，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_220531", 220531, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>过家</span>当少留。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220531'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_220531", 220531, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>中园</span>何时到，薇蕨亦已柔。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220531'>山翠入幽屐，渚香浮迥舟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220531'>阡陌有还往，壶觞时献酬。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220531'>应笑天禄阁，寂寥谁见求？<div id='poem_sentence_7_220531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220531'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_220531_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年4月</a>　四月，弟曾宰卒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　陈师道谒曾巩，遂从学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　王安石在京为翰林学士，请坐讲，曾巩著《讲官议》以讽。<div id='poem_1173190' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173190' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173190?labeling=true' target='_blank'>讲官议</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173190")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173190_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173190'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173190'>孔子之语教人曰：不愤悱不启发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173190_comment'></div>举一隅不以三隅反，则不告也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173190_comment'></div>孟子之语教人曰：有答问者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173190_comment'></div>荀子之语教人曰：「不问而告谓之傲，问一而告二谓之囋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173190_comment'></div>傲，非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173190_comment'></div>囋，非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173190_comment'></div>君子如响」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173190_comment'></div>故《礼》无往教而有待问，则师之道，有问而告之者尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173190_comment'></div>世之挟书而讲者，终日言，而非有问之者也，乃不自知其强聒而欲以师自任，何其妄也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173190_comment'></div>古之教世子之法，太傅审父子君臣之道以示之，少傅奉世子以观太傅之德行而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173190", 1173190, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>审喻</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173190_comment'></div>则示之以道者，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173190", 1173190, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>审喻</span>之为浅，故不为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173190_comment'></div>况于师者，何为也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173190_comment'></div>正己而使观之者化尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173190_comment'></div>故得其行者，或不得其所以行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173190_comment'></div>得其言者，或不得其所以言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173190_comment'></div>仰之而弥高，钻之而弥坚，德如是，然后师之道尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173190_comment'></div>故天子不得而召也，诸侯不得而友也，又况得而臣之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173190_comment'></div>此伊尹、太公、子思、孟子之徒所以忘人之势，而唐虞三代大有为之君所以自忘其势也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173190_comment'></div>世之挟书而讲于禁中者，官以侍为名，则其任故可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173190_comment'></div>乃自以谓吾师道也，宜坐而讲，以为请于上，其为说曰：「必如是，然后合于古之所谓坐而论道者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173190_comment'></div>夫坐而论道，谓之王公，作而行之，谓之卿大夫，语其任之无为与有为，非以是为尊师之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173190_comment'></div>且礼于朝，王及群臣皆立，无独坐者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173190_comment'></div>于燕皆坐，无独立者，故坐未尝以为尊师之礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173190_comment'></div>昔晋平公之于亥唐，坐云则坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173190_comment'></div>曾子之侍仲尼，子曰参复坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173190_comment'></div>则坐云者，盖师之所以命学者，未有果师道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173190_comment'></div>顾仆仆然以坐自请者也，则世之为此者非妄欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173190_comment'></div>故为此议以解其惑。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1173190_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　曾巩作《瀛洲兴造记》<div id='poem_1173299' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173299' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173299?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瀛州兴造记<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173299")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173299_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173299'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173299'>熙宁元年七月甲申，河北地大震，坏城郭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>屋室</span>，瀛州为甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173299_comment'></div>是日再震，民讹言大水且至，惊欲出走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173299_comment'></div>谏议大夫李公肃之为高阳关路都总管安抚使，知瀛州事，使人分出慰晓，讹言乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173299_comment'></div>是日大雨，公私<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>暴露</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>仓储</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>库积</span>，无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>覆冒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173299_comment'></div>公开示便宜，使有攸处，遂行仓库，经营<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>盖障</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173299_comment'></div>雨止，粟以石数之，至一百三十万，兵器他物称是，无坏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173299_comment'></div>初变作，公命授兵警备，讫于既息，人无争偷，里巷安辑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173299_comment'></div>维北边自通使契丹，城壁楼橹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>御守</span>之具，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>寝弛</span>不治，习以为故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173299_comment'></div>公因<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>灾变</span>之后，以兴坏起废为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>己任</span>，知民之不可重困也，乃请于朝，力取于旁路之羡卒，费取于备河之馀材，又以钱千万市木于真定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173299_comment'></div>既集，乃筑新城，方十五里，高广坚壮，率加于旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173299_comment'></div>其上为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>敌楼</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>战屋</span>凡四千六百间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173299_comment'></div>先时，州之正门，弊在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>狭陋</span>，及是始斥而大之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173299_comment'></div>其馀凡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>圮坏</span>之屋，莫不缮理，复其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>故常</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173299_comment'></div>周而览之，听断有所，燕休有次，食有高廪，货有深藏，宾属士吏，各有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>宁宇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173299_comment'></div>又以其馀力为南北甬道若干里，人去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>污淖</span>，即于夷涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173299_comment'></div>自七月庚子始事，至十月己未落成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173299_comment'></div>其用人之力，积若干万若干千若干百工；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173299_comment'></div>其竹苇木瓦之用，积若干万若干千若干百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173299_comment'></div>盖遭变之初，财匮民流，此邦之人，以谓役钜用艰，不累数稔，城垒室屋未可以复也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173299_comment'></div>至于始作逾时，功以告具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173299_comment'></div>盖公经理劝督，内尽其心，外尽其力，故能易坏为成，如是之敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173299_comment'></div>事闻，有诏嘉奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173299_comment'></div>昔郑火，子产救灾补败，得宜当理，史实书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173299_comment'></div>卫有狄人之难，文公治其城市宫室，合于时制，诗人歌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173299_comment'></div>今瀛地震之所摧败，与郑之火灾、卫之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/94/Comments/1")'>寇难</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/94/Comments/2")'>无异</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173299_comment'></div>公御备<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173299", 1173299, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>构筑</span>不失其方，亦犹古也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173299_comment'></div>故瀛之士大夫皆欲刻石著公之功，而予之从父兄适与军政，在公幕府，乃以书来，属予记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173299_comment'></div>予不得辞，故为之记，尚俾来世知公之尝勤于是邦也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1173299_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年冬</a>　曾巩作《广德军重修鼓角楼记》<div id='poem_1173300' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173300' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173300?labeling=true' target='_blank'>广德军重修鼓角楼记<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年十二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173300")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173300_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173300'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173300'>熙宁元年冬，广德军作新门鼓角楼成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173300_comment'></div>太守合文武宾属以落之，既而以书走京师，属巩曰：「为我记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173300_comment'></div>巩辞不能，书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>反复</span>至五六，辞不获，乃为其文曰：盖广德居吴之西疆，故鄣之墟，境大壤沃，食货<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>富穰</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>人力</span>有馀，而狱讼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>赴诉</span>、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/15/Comments/2")'>财贡</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/15/Comments/3")'>输入</span>，以县附宣，道路回阻，众不便利，历世久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173300_comment'></div>太宗皇帝在位四年，乃按地图，因县立军，使得奏事专决，体如大邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173300_comment'></div>自是以来，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>田里</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/26/Comments/2")'>辨争</span>、岁时税调，始不勤远，人用宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173300_comment'></div>而门闳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>隘庳</span>，楼观弗饰，于以纳天子之命，出令行化朝夕，吏民交通四方，览示贤客，弊在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>简陋</span>，不中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>度程</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173300_comment'></div>治平四年，尚书兵部员外郎、知制诰钱公公辅守是邦，始因丰年，聚材积土，将改而新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173300_comment'></div>会尚书驾部郎中朱公寿昌来继其任，明年政成，封内无事，乃择能吏，揆时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>庀徒</span>，以畚以筑，以绳以削，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>门阿</span>是经，观阙是营，不督不期，役者自劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173300_comment'></div>自冬十月甲子始事，至十二月甲子卒功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173300_comment'></div>崇墉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>崛兴</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>复宇</span>相瞰，壮不及僭，丽不及奢，宪度政理，于是出纳，士吏宾客，于是驰走，尊施一邦，不失宜称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173300_comment'></div>至于伐鼓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>鸣角</span>，以警<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>昏昕</span>，下漏数刻，以节昼夜，则又新是四器，列而栖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173300_comment'></div>邦人士女，易其听观，莫不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>悦喜</span>，推美诵勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173300_comment'></div>夫礼有必隆，不得而杀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173300_comment'></div>政有必举，不得而废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173300_comment'></div>二公于是兼而得之，宜刻金石，以书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173300", 1173300, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>美实</span>，使是邦之人，百世之下，于二公之德，尚有考也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1173300_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年11月</a>　舅母卒，曾巩撰《沈氏夫人墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173368' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173368' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1173368'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173368'>夫人姓沈氏，其先家于越之会稽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173368_comment'></div>曾祖仁谅，令海州之朐山，徙家于和州历阳，故今为历阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173368_comment'></div>祖平，赠尚书刑部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173368_comment'></div>父立，今为右谏议大夫，判都水监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173368_comment'></div>母冯氏，濮阳县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173368_comment'></div>董氏，仁寿郡君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173368_comment'></div>夫人年二十有二，嫁扬州进士朱延之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173368_comment'></div>有子三人，寅、万、广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173368_comment'></div>女五人，尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173368_comment'></div>夫人年四十有五，卒于熙宁元年十一月之庚辰，葬于某年某月之某甲子，其墓在扬州天长之秦兰里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173368_comment'></div>夫人为人柔闲静专，事父母尽子道，事姑长兴县太君贾氏尽妇道，事夫尽妻道，为母及与内外属人接，一皆尽其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173368_comment'></div>故其处也，爱于其家；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173368_comment'></div>其嫁也，夫之属人上下远近皆爱之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173368_comment'></div>而其殁也，哭之者皆哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173368_comment'></div>是不宜无铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173368_comment'></div>而朱君，余舅也，属余铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173368_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1173368'>媛维沈女，经德以身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173368_comment'></div><span "Clauses/44/Comments/1")'>静简</span>，孚于属人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173368_comment'></div>维祉在后，有子诜诜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173368_comment'></div>瑑诗告美，愈远弥新。</div><div class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220178")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220178_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220178'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220178'>圣贤性分良难并，好恶情怀岂得同。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220178'>荀子书犹非孟子，召公心未悦周公。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220178'>况令树立追高远，而使裁量属闇蒙。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220178'>举世不知何足怪，力行无顾是豪雄。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220178'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220178_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　曾巩作《救灾议》<div id='poem_1173191' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173191' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173191?labeling=true' target='_blank'>救灾议</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173191")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173191_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173191'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173191'>河北地震、水灾，隳城郭，坏庐舍，百姓暴露乏食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173191_comment'></div>主上忧悯，下缓刑之令，遣拊循之使，恩甚厚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173191_comment'></div>然百姓患于暴露，非钱不可以立屋庐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173191_comment'></div>患于乏食，非粟不可以饱，二者不易之理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173191_comment'></div>非得此二者，虽主上忧劳于上，使者旁午于下，无以救其患、塞其求也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173191_comment'></div>有司<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>建言</span>，请发仓廪与之粟，壮者人日二升，幼者人日一升，主上不旋日而许之，赐之可谓大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173191_comment'></div>然有司之所言，特常行之法，非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>审计</span>终始，见于众人之所未见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173191_comment'></div>今河北地震、水灾所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/27/Comments/1")'>毁败</span>者甚众，可谓非常之变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173191_comment'></div>遭非常之变者，亦必有非常之恩，然后可以振之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173191_comment'></div>今百姓暴露乏食，已废其业矣，使之相率日待二升之廪于上，则其势必不暇乎他为，是农不复得修其畎亩，商不复得治其货贿，工不复得利其器用，閒民不复得转移执事，一切弃百事，而专意于待升合之食以偷为性命之计，是直以饿殍之养养之而已，非深思远虑为百姓长计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173191_comment'></div>以中户计之，户为十人，壮者六人，月当受粟三石六斗，幼者四人，月当受粟一石二斗，率一户，月当受粟五石，难可以久行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173191_comment'></div>不久行，则百姓何以赡其后？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173191_comment'></div>久行之，则被水之地，既无秋成之望，非至来岁麦熟，赈之未可以罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173191_comment'></div>自今至于来岁麦熟，凡十月，一户当受粟五十石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173191_comment'></div>今被灾者十馀州，州以二万户计之，中户以上及非灾害所被、不仰食县官者去其半，则仰食县官者为十万户，食之不遍，则为施不均，而民犹有无告者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173191_comment'></div>食之遍，则当用粟五百万石而足，何以办此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173191_comment'></div>又非深思远虑为公家长计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173191_comment'></div>至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>给授</span>之际，有淹速，有均否，有真伪，有会集之扰，有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>辨察</span>之烦，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>厝置</span>一差，皆足致弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173191_comment'></div>又群而处之，气久蒸薄，必生疾疠，此皆必至之害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173191_comment'></div>且此不过能使之得旦暮之食耳，其于屋庐构筑之费将安取哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173191_comment'></div>屋庐构筑之费既无所取，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>就食</span>于州县，必相率而去其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>故居</span>，虽有颓墙坏屋之尚可完者，故材旧瓦之尚可因者，什器众物之尚可赖者，必弃之而不暇顾，甚则杀牛马而去者有之，伐桑枣而去者有之，其害又可谓甚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173191_comment'></div>今秋气已半，霜露方始，而民<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>露处</span>，不知所蔽，盖流亡者亦已众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173191_comment'></div>如是不可止，则将空近塞之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173191_comment'></div>空近塞之地，失战斗之民，此众士大夫之所虑而不可谓无患者也，空近塞之地，失耕桑之民，此众士大夫所未虑而患之尤甚者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173191_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173191_comment'></div>失战斗之民，异时有警，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>边戍</span>不可以不增尔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173191_comment'></div>失耕桑之民，异时无事，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>边籴</span>不可以不贵矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173191_comment'></div>二者皆可不深念欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173191_comment'></div>万一或出于无俚之计，有窥仓库，盗一囊之粟、一束之帛者，彼知已负有司之禁，则必<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>鸟骇鼠窜</span>，窃弄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/124/Comments/0")'>锄梃</span>于草茅之中，以捍游徼之吏，强者既嚣而动，则弱者必随而聚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173191_comment'></div>不幸或连一二城之地，有枹鼓之警，国家胡能晏然而已乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173191_comment'></div>况夫外有夷狄之可虑，内有郊祀之将行，安得不防之于未然，销之于未萌也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173191_comment'></div>然则为今之策，下方纸之诏，赐之以钱五十万贯，贷之以粟一百万石，而事足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173191_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173191_comment'></div>令被灾之州为十万户，如一户得粟十石，得钱五千，下户常产之赀，平日未有及此者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173191_comment'></div>彼得钱以完其居，得粟以给其食，则农得修其畎亩，商得治其货贿，工得利其器用，閒民得转移执事，一切得复其业，而不失其常生之计，与专意以待二升之廪于上而势不暇乎他为，岂不远哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173191_comment'></div>此可谓深思远虑，为百姓长计者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173191_comment'></div>由有司之说，则用十月之费，为粟五百万石；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173191_comment'></div>由今之说，则用两月之费，为粟一百万石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173191_comment'></div>况贷之于今而收之于后，足以赈其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/165/Comments/0")'>艰乏</span>，而终无损于储偫之实，所实费者，钱五钜万贯而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173191_comment'></div>此可谓深思远虑，为公家长计者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173191_comment'></div>又无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/171/Comments/1")'>给授</span>之弊、疾疠之忧，民不必去其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/172/Comments/0")'>故居</span>，茍有颓墙坏屋之尚可完者，故材旧瓦之尚可因者，什器众物之尚可赖者，皆得而不失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173191_comment'></div>况于全牛马，保桑枣，其利又可谓甚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173191_comment'></div>虽寒气方始，而无暴露之患；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173191_comment'></div>民安居足食，则有乐生自重之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173191_comment'></div>各复其业，则势不暇乎他为，虽驱之不去，诱之不为盗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173191_comment'></div>夫饥岁聚饿殍之民，而与之升合之食，无益于救灾补败之数，此常行之弊法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173191_comment'></div>今破去常行之弊法，以钱与粟一举而赈之，足以救其患，复其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173191_comment'></div>河北之民，闻诏令之出，必皆喜上之足赖，而自安于畎亩之中，负钱与粟而归，与其父母妻子脱于流转死亡之祸，则戴上之施，而怀欲报之心，岂有已哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173191_comment'></div>天下之民，闻国家<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/206/Comments/0")'>厝置</span>如此恩泽之厚，其孰不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/207/Comments/0")'>震动</span>感激，悦主上之义于无穷乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173191_comment'></div>如是而人和不可致、天意不可悦者，未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173191_comment'></div>人和洽于下，天意悦于上，然后玉辂徐动，就阳而郊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173191_comment'></div>荒夷殊陬，奉币来享；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173191_comment'></div>疆内<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/217/Comments/0")'>安辑</span>，里无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/218/Comments/0")'>嚣声</span>，岂不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/219/Comments/0")'>适变</span>于可为之时，消患于无形之内乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173191_comment'></div>此所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/221/Comments/0")'>审计</span>终始，见于众人之所未见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173191_comment'></div>不早出此，或至于一有枹鼓之警，则虽欲为之，将不及矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173191_comment'></div>或谓方今钱粟恐不足以办此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1173191_comment'></div>夫王者之富，藏之于民，有馀则取，不足则与，此理之不易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1173191_comment'></div>故曰：「百姓足，君孰与不足？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1173191_comment'></div>百姓不足，君孰与足」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1173191_comment'></div>盖百姓富实而国独贫，与百姓饿殍而上独能保其富者，自古及今，未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1173191_comment'></div>故又曰「不患贫而患不安」，此古今之至戒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1173191_comment'></div>是故古者二十七年耕，有九年之畜，足以备水旱之灾，然后谓之王政之成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1173191_comment'></div>唐水汤旱而民无捐瘠者，以是故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1173191_comment'></div>今国家仓库之积，固不独为公家之费而已，凡以为民也，虽仓无馀粟，库无馀财，至于救灾补败，尚不可以已，况今仓库之积，尚可以用，独安可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/259/Comments/0")'>过忧</span>将来之不足，而立视夫民之死乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1173191_comment'></div>古人有言曰：「剪爪宜及肤，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/263/Comments/1")'>割发</span>宜及体」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1173191_comment'></div>先王之于救灾，发肤尚无所爱，况<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1173191", 1173191, "Clauses/266/Comments/0")'>外物</span>乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1173191_comment'></div>且今河北州军凡三十七，灾害所被十馀州军而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1173191_comment'></div>他州之田，秋嫁足望，今有司于籴粟常价斗增一二十钱，非独足以利农，其于增籴一百万石易矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1173191_comment'></div>斗增一二十钱，吾权一时之事，有以为之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1173191_comment'></div>以实钱给其常价，以茶荈香药之类佐其虚估，不过捐茶荈香药之类，为钱数钜万贯，而其费已足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1173191_comment'></div>茶荈香药之类，与百姓之命孰为可惜，不待议而可知者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1173191_comment'></div>夫费钱五钜万贯，又捐茶荈香药之类，为钱数钜万贯，而足以救一时之患，为天下之计，利害轻重，又非难明者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1173191_comment'></div>顾吾之有司能越拘挛之见，破常行之法，与否而已，此时事之急也，故述斯议焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1173191_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　曾巩作《类要序》<div id='poem_1173162' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173162' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173162?labeling=true' target='_blank'>类要序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173162")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173162_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173162'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173162'>晏元献公出东南，起童子，入秘阁读书，遂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173162", 1173162, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>赞名</span>，命入翰林为学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173162_comment'></div>真宗特宠待之，每进见劳问，及所以任属之者，群臣莫能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173162_comment'></div>皇太子就书学，公以选入侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173162_comment'></div>太子即皇帝位，是为仁宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173162_comment'></div>公遂管国枢要，任政事，位宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173162_comment'></div>其在朝廷五十馀年，常以文学谋议为任，所为赋、颂、铭、碑、制、诏、册、命、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173162", 1173162, "Clauses/18/Comments/11")'>书、奏</span>、议、论之文传天下，尤长于诗，天下皆吟诵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173162_comment'></div>当真宗之世，天下无事，方辑福应，推功德，修封禅，及后土、山川、老子诸祠，以报礼上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173162_comment'></div>左右前后之臣，非工儒学，妙于语言，能讨论古今，润色太平之业者，不能称其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173162_comment'></div>公于是时为学者宗，天下慕其声名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173162_comment'></div>人见公应于外者之不穷，而不知公之得于内者深也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173162_comment'></div>及得公所为《类要》上中下帙，总七十四篇，凡若干门，皆公所手抄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173162_comment'></div>乃知公于六艺、太史、百家之言，骚人墨客之文章，至于地志、族谱、佛老、方伎之众说，旁及九州之外，蛮夷荒忽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173162", 1173162, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>诡变</span>奇迹之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173162", 1173162, "Clauses/46/Comments/1")'>序录</span>，皆披寻䌷绎，而于三才万物变化情伪，是非兴坏之理，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173162", 1173162, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>显隐</span>细钜之委曲，莫不究尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173162_comment'></div>公之得于内者在此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173162_comment'></div>公之所以光显于世者，有以哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173162_comment'></div>观公之所自致者如此，则知士不素学而处从官大臣之列，备文儒道德之任，其能不馁且病乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173162_comment'></div>此公之书所以为可传也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173162_comment'></div>公之子知止，能守其家者也，以书属余序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173162_comment'></div>余与公仕不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173162", 1173162, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>并时</span>，然皆临川人，故为之论次，以为公书诸首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1173162_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　曾巩作《地动》<div id='poem_220370' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220370' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220370?labeling=true' target='_blank'>地动</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220370")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220370_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220370'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220370'>吾闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_220370", 220370, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>元气</span>判为二，升降相辅非相伤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220370'>今者无端越<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220370", 220370, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>疆畔</span>，阴气焰焰侵于阳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220370'>阳收刚明避其势，阴负捷胜尤倡佯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220370'>地乘是气亢于下，震荡裂坼乖其常。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220370'>齐秦晋代及荆楚，千百其堵崩连墙。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220370'>隆丘桀屋不自定，翩若猛吹摇旌幢。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220370'>生民汹汹避无所，如寄厥命于湖江。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220370'>有声四出嘻可怕，谁击万鼓何雷硠？<div id='poem_sentence_7_220370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220370'>阴为气静乃如此，天意<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_220370", 220370, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>昧密</span>宁能详。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220370'>或云蛮夷尚侵轶，己事岂必垂灾祥。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220242'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220242_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　曾巩撰《戚元鲁墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173326' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173326' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173326?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戚元鲁墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173326")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173326_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173326'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173326'>戚氏宋人，为宋之世家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173326_comment'></div>当五代之际，有抗志不仕、以德行化其乡里、远近学者皆归之者，曰同文，号正素先生，赠尚书兵部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173326_comment'></div>有子当太宗、真宗时为名臣，以论事激切至今传之者，曰纶，为枢密直学士，赠太尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173326_comment'></div>有子恭谨恂恂、不妄言动、能守其家法、葬宋之北原、余为之志其墓者，曰舜臣，为尚书虞部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173326_comment'></div>元鲁其子也，名师道，字元鲁，为人孝友忠信，质厚而气和，好学不倦，能似其先人者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173326_comment'></div>盖自五代至今百有六十馀年矣，戚氏传绪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173326", 1173326, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>寖远</span>，虽其位不大，而行应礼义，世世不绝如此，故余以谓宋之世家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173326_comment'></div>元鲁自少有大志，聪明<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173326", 1173326, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>敏达</span>，好论当世事，能通其得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173326_comment'></div>其好恶有异于流俗，故一时与之游者，多天下闻人，皆以谓元鲁之于学行，进而未止，意其且寿，必能成其材，不有见于当世，必有见于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173326_comment'></div>孰谓不幸而今死矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173326_comment'></div>故其死也，无远近亲疏，凡知其为人者，皆为之悲，而至今言者尚为之慨然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173326_comment'></div>元鲁初以父任为建州崇安县尉，不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173326_comment'></div>以进士中其科，为亳州永城县主簿，以亲嫌为楚州山阳县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173326_comment'></div>嘉祐六年三月二十九日，以疾卒于官，年三十有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173326_comment'></div>娶陈氏，内殿承制习之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173326_comment'></div>再娶王氏，参知政事文宪公尧臣之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173326_comment'></div>有子一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173326_comment'></div>皆先元鲁死，而元鲁盖无兄弟，呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173326_comment'></div>天之报施于斯人如此，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173326_comment'></div>元鲁且死时，属其僚赵师陟乞铭于余，师陟以书来告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173326_comment'></div>余悲元鲁不得就其志，而欲因余文以见于后，故不得辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173326_comment'></div>以熙宁元年某月某甲子，葬元鲁于其父之墓侧，以其配陈氏、王氏祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173326_comment'></div>将葬，其从兄遵道以状来速铭，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1173326'>行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173326", 1173326, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>足以</span>象其先人，材<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173326", 1173326, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>足以</span>施于世用，而于元鲁未见所止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173326_comment'></div>生既不得就其志，死又无以传其绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173326_comment'></div>曷以告哀？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173326_comment'></div>纳铭于墓。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1173326_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年12月17日</a>　曾巩作《张文叔文集序》<div id='poem_1173163' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173163' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173163?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张文叔文集序<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年十二月十七日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年12月17日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173163")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173163_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173163'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173163'>文叔姓张氏，讳彦博，蔡州汝阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173163_comment'></div>庆历三年，为抚州司法参军，余为之铭其父碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173163_comment'></div>文叔又治其寝，得婴儿秃秃之遗骸葬之，余为之志其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173163_comment'></div>是时文叔年未三十，喜从余问<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173163", 1173163, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>道理</span>，学为文章，因与之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173163_comment'></div>至其为司法代去，其后又三遇焉，至今二十有六年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173163_comment'></div>文叔为袁州判官以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173163_comment'></div>其子仲伟集其遗文为四十卷，自蕲春走京师，属余序之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173163_comment'></div>余读其书，知文叔虽久穷，而讲道益明，属文益工，其辞精深<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173163", 1173163, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>雅赡</span>，有过人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173163_comment'></div>而比三遇之，盖未尝为余出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173163_comment'></div>又知文叔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173163", 1173163, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>自进</span>为甚强，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173163", 1173163, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>自待</span>为甚重，皆可喜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173163_comment'></div>虽其遇于命者不至于富贵，然比于富贵而功德不足以堪之，姑为说以自恕者，则文叔虽久穷亦何限哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173163_comment'></div>仲伟居抚时，八九岁，未丱，始读书就笔砚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173163_comment'></div>今仪观甚伟，文辞甚工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173163_comment'></div>有子复能读书就笔砚矣，则余其能不老乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173163_comment'></div>既为之评其文而序之，又历道其父子事反复如此者，所以致余情于故旧，而又以见余之老也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173163_comment'></div>熙宁元年十二月十七日序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1173163_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　曾巩为英宗实录检讨官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　曾巩作《闻言事谪官者》，金君卿有和诗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　曾巩罢英宗实录检讨，出通判越州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　曾巩将通判越州，馆阁同舍饯送，众人分韵作诗，苏轼作《送曾子固倅越得燕子》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　曾巩作《公族议》<div id='poem_1173189' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173189' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173189?labeling=true' target='_blank'>公族议</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173189")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173189_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173189'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173189'>天子之适子继世以为天子，其别子皆为诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173189_comment'></div>诸侯之适子继世以为诸侯，其别子各为其国之卿大夫，皆有采地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173189_comment'></div>别子之适子继世以食其采地，其族人百世宗之，此之谓大宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173189_comment'></div>其别子亦各仕于其国为卿大夫，其适子兄弟宗之，五世而止，此之谓小宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173189_comment'></div>盖天子之适子继世以为天子，其别子世为诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173189_comment'></div>诸侯之适子继世以为诸侯，其别子各为其国之卿大夫，世食采地，皆传于无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173189_comment'></div>夫岂有服尽而绝其禄位，衣食嫁娶使之自谋者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173189_comment'></div>非特如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173189_comment'></div>昔周公兼制天下，立七十一国，姬姓居五十三人，盖兄弟之国者十有五人，姬姓之国者四十人，其可见者，则管、蔡、郕、霍、鲁、卫、毛、聃、郜、雍、曹、滕、毕、原、酆、郇、邗、晋、应、韩、凡、蒋、邢、茅、胙、祭之属是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173189_comment'></div>其称兄弟之国者十有五人，则周之近属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173189_comment'></div>其称姬姓之国者四十人，则周之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173189", 1173189, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>同姓</span>而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173189_comment'></div>其爵命之，使传国至于无穷，夫岂以服为断乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173189_comment'></div>至于宗庙之数，天子七，诸侯五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173189_comment'></div>而祭法，虞、夏、商、周褅郊祖宗，远或至于数十世之上，亦皆未尝以服为断也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173189_comment'></div>其推而上之，报本于祖宗，至不可为数，推而下之，广骨肉之恩，至于无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173189_comment'></div>盖其积厚者其流泽远，有天下之功者受天下之报，其理势次序固然也，是岂可以拘于常见，议于锱铢之内乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173189_comment'></div>故服尽而戚单者，所以节人之常情，而为大宗小宗之数，安可以论帝者之功德，而为广亲亲之法乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173189_comment'></div>昔武王克商，未及下车而封黄帝、唐虞之后，下车而封夏、商之后，其在异代，尚特显之，其急如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173189_comment'></div>况受重于祖宗，推原功德之所自出，其可以天下之大，而俭于骨肉之恩，以不满足海内之望乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173189_comment'></div>孟子曰：「仁人之于兄弟也，亲爱之而已矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173189_comment'></div>亲之欲其贵也，爱之欲其富也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173189_comment'></div>先王推是心以及于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173189", 1173189, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>同姓</span>之间，故有土分之，有民分之，有宝玉分之，有宝器分之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173189_comment'></div>成王、康王之言曰：「吾无专享文武之功，是皆无所不尽其厚，未有从夫略者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173189_comment'></div>盖《诗》「裳裳者华」，刺时弃贤者之类，绝功臣之世，而传栾、郤、胥、原、狐、续、庆、伯，陪臣之族耳，其降在皂隶，叔向亦以为晋国之忧，况于帝者之功德与天地等，而可使七八世之子孙夷于闾巷之凡民乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173189_comment'></div>后世公族无封国采地之制，而有列于朝，有赐于府，是亦亲而贵之、爱而富之之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173189_comment'></div>其名书于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173189", 1173189, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>宗籍</span>者，繁衍盛大，实国家之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173189_comment'></div>有司虽费，非多于天下之国七十有一，而姬姓独居者五十三人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173189_comment'></div>其亦求中以节之而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173189_comment'></div>顾令袒免以外毋与官，衣食嫁娶使之自谋，是亦不考于古矣，何其野于礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173189_comment'></div>以世莫能辨，故作《公族议》，使好学者得详焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1173189_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　曾巩作《熙宁转封疏》<div id='poem_1172985' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172985' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172985?labeling=true' target='_blank'>熙宁转对疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172985")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172985_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172985'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172985'>准御史台告报臣寮朝辞日具转对，臣愚浅薄，恐言不足采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172985_comment'></div>然臣窃观唐太宗即位之初，延群臣与图天下之事，而能绌封伦，用魏郑公之说，所以成贞观之治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172985_comment'></div>周世宗初即位，亦延群臣，使陈当世之务，而能知王朴之可用，故显德之政，亦独能变五代之因循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172985_comment'></div>夫当众说之驰骋，而以独见之言，陈未形之得失，此听者之所难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172985_comment'></div>然二君能辨之于群众之中而用之，以收一时之效，此后世之士，所以常感知言之少，而颂二君之明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172985_comment'></div>今陛下始承天序，亦诏群臣，使以次对，然且将岁馀，未闻取一人，得一言，岂当世固乏人，不足以当陛下之意与？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172985_comment'></div>抑所以延问者，特用累世之故事，而不必求其实欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172985_comment'></div>臣愚窃计，殆进言者未有以当陛下之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172985_comment'></div>陛下明智大略，固将比迹于唐虞三代之盛，如太宗、世宗之所至，恐不足以望陛下，故臣之所言，亦不敢效二臣之卑近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172985_comment'></div>伏惟陛下超然独观于世俗之表，详思臣言而择其中，则二君之明，岂足道于后世，而士之怀抱忠义者，岂复感知言之少乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172985_comment'></div>臣所言如左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172985_comment'></div>臣伏以陛下恭俭慈仁，有能承祖宗之德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172985_comment'></div>聪明睿知，有能任天下之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172985_comment'></div>即位以来，早朝晏罢，广问兼听，有更制<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1172985", 1172985, "Clauses/56/Comments/1")'>变俗</span>、比迹唐虞之志，此非群臣之所能及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172985_comment'></div>然而所遇之时，在天则有日食星变之异，在地则有震动<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1172985", 1172985, "Clauses/60/Comments/1")'>陷裂</span>、水泉涌溢之灾，在人则有饥馑流亡、讹言相惊之患，三者皆非常之变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172985_comment'></div>及从而察今之天下，则风俗日以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1172985", 1172985, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>薄恶</span>，纪纲日以弛坏，百司庶务，一切文具而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172985_comment'></div>内外之任，则不足于人材；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172985_comment'></div>公私之计，则不足于食货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172985_comment'></div>近则不能不以盗贼为虑，远则不能不以夷狄为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172985_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1172985", 1172985, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>海内</span>智谋之士，常恐天下之势不得以久安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172985_comment'></div>以陛下之明，而所遇之时如此，陛下有更制<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1172985", 1172985, "Clauses/78/Comments/1")'>变俗</span>、比迹唐虞之志，则亦在正其本而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172985_comment'></div>《易》曰：「正其本，万事理」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172985_comment'></div>臣以谓正其本者，在陛下得之于心而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172985_comment'></div>臣观《洪范》所以和同天人之际，使之无閒，而要其所以为始者，思也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172985_comment'></div>《大学》所以诚意正心修身，治其国家天下，而要其所以为始者，致其知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1172985_comment'></div>故臣以谓正其本者，在得之于心而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1172985_comment'></div>得之于心者，其术非他，学焉而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1172985_comment'></div>此致其知所以为大学之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1172985_comment'></div>古之圣人，舜禹成汤文武，未有不由学而成，而傅说、周公之辅其君，未尝不勉之以学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1172985_comment'></div>故孟子以谓学焉而后有为，则汤以王，齐桓公以霸，皆不劳而能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1172985_comment'></div>盖学所以成人主之功德如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1172985_comment'></div>诚能磨砻长养，至于有以自得，则天下之事在于理者，未有不能尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1172985_comment'></div>能尽天下之理，则天下之事物接于我者，无以累其内；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1172985_comment'></div>天下之以言语接于我者，无以蔽其外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1172985_comment'></div>夫然，则循理而已矣，邪情之所不能入也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1172985_comment'></div>从善而已矣，邪说之所不能乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1172985_comment'></div>如是而用之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1172985", 1172985, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>持久</span>，资之以不息，则积其小者必至于大，积其微者必至于显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1172985_comment'></div>古之人自可欲之善，而充之至于不可知之神，自十五之学，而积之至于从心之不逾矩，岂他道哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1172985_comment'></div>由是而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1172985_comment'></div>故曰：「念终始典于学」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1172985_comment'></div>又曰：「学然后知不足」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1172985_comment'></div>孔子亦曰：「吾学不厌」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1172985_comment'></div>盖如此者，孔子之所不能已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1172985_comment'></div>夫能使事物之接于我者不能累其内，所以治内也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1172985_comment'></div>言语之接于我者不能蔽其外，所以应外也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1172985_comment'></div>有以治内，此所以成德化也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1172985_comment'></div>有以应外，此所以成法度也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1172985_comment'></div>德化法度既成，所以发育万物，而和同天人之际也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1172985_comment'></div>自周衰以来，道术不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1172985_comment'></div>为人君者，莫知学先王之道以明其心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1172985_comment'></div>为人臣者，莫知引其君以及先王之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1172985_comment'></div>一切茍简，溺于流俗末世之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1172985", 1172985, "Clauses/159/Comments/0")'>卑浅</span>，以先王之道为迂远而难遵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1172985_comment'></div>人主虽有聪明敏达之质，而无磨砻长养之具，至于不能有以自得，则天下之事，在于理者有所不能尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1172985_comment'></div>不能尽天下之理，则天下之以事物接于我者，足以累其内；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1172985_comment'></div>天下之以言语接于我者，足以蔽其外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1172985_comment'></div>夫然，故欲循理而邪情足以害之，欲从善而邪说足以乱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1172985_comment'></div>如是而用之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1172985", 1172985, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>持久</span>，则愈甚无补；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1172985_comment'></div>行之以不息，则不能见效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1172985_comment'></div>其弊则至于邪情胜而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1172985", 1172985, "Clauses/178/Comments/0")'>正理</span>灭，邪说长而正论消，天下之所以不治而有至于乱者，以是而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1172985_comment'></div>此周衰以来，人主之所以可传于后世者少也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1172985_comment'></div>可传于后世者，若汉之文帝、宣帝，唐之太宗，皆可谓有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1172985", 1172985, "Clauses/187/Comments/0")'>美质</span>矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1172985_comment'></div>由其学不能远而所知者陋，故足以贤于近世之庸主矣，若夫议唐虞三代之盛德，则彼乌足以云乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1172985_comment'></div>由其如此，故自周衰以来，千有馀年，天下之言理者，亦皆卑近浅陋，以趋世主之所便，而言先王之道者，皆绌而不省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1172985_comment'></div>故以孔子之圣，孟子之贤，而犹不遇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1172985_comment'></div>今去孔孟之时又远矣，臣之所言，乃周衰以来千有馀年，所谓迂远而难遵者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1172985_comment'></div>然臣敢献之于陛下者，臣观先王之所已试，其言最近而非远，其用最要而非迂，故不敢不以告者，此臣所以事陛下区区之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1172985_comment'></div>伏惟陛下有自然之圣质，而渐渍于道义之日又不为不久，然臣以谓陛下有更制<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1172985", 1172985, "Clauses/215/Comments/1")'>变俗</span>、比迹唐虞之志，则在得之于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1172985_comment'></div>得之于心，则在学焉而已者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1172985_comment'></div>臣愚以谓陛下宜观《洪范》、《大学》之所陈，知治道之所本不在于他；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1172985_comment'></div>观傅说、周公之所戒，知学者非明主之所宜已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1172985_comment'></div>陛下有更制<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1172985", 1172985, "Clauses/223/Comments/1")'>变俗</span>、比迹唐虞之志，则当恳诚恻怛，以讲明旧学而推广之，务当于道德之体要，不取乎口耳之小知，不急乎朝夕之近效，复之熟之，使圣心之所存，从容于自得之地，则万事之在于理者，未有不能尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1172985_comment'></div>能尽万事之理，则内不累于天下之物，外不累于天下之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1172985_comment'></div>然后明先王之道而行之，邪情之所不能入也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1172985_comment'></div>合天下之正论而用之，邪说之所不能乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1172985_comment'></div>如是而用之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1172985", 1172985, "Clauses/241/Comments/0")'>持久</span>，资之以不息，则虽细必巨，虽微必显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1172985_comment'></div>以陛下之聪明，而充之以至于不可知之神；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1172985_comment'></div>以陛下之睿知，而积之以至于从心所欲之不逾矩，夫岂远哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1172985_comment'></div>顾勉强如何耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1172985_comment'></div>夫然，故内成德化，外成法度，以发育万物，而和同天人之际，甚易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1172985_comment'></div>若夫移风俗之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1172985", 1172985, "Clauses/257/Comments/0")'>薄恶</span>，振纪纲之弛坏，变百司庶务之文具，厉天下之士使称其位，理天下之财使赡其用，近者使之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1172985", 1172985,
