id='poem_sentence_13_1173133_comment'></div>其物产之美，果有荔子、龙眼、蕉、柑、橄榄，花有素馨、山丹、含笑之属，食有海之百物，累岁之酒醋，皆绝于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173133_comment'></div>人少斗讼，喜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173133", 1173133, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>嬉乐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173133_comment'></div>吏者唯其无久居之心，故谓之不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173133_comment'></div>如其有久居之心，奚不可邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173133_comment'></div>古之人为一乡一县，其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173133", 1173133, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>德义</span>惠爱尚足以薰蒸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173133", 1173133, "Clauses/47/Comments/1")'>渐泽</span>，今大者专一州，岂当小其官而不事邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173133_comment'></div>令其得吾说而思之，人咸有久居之心，又不小其官，为越人涤其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173133", 1173133, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>陋俗</span>而驱于治，居闽蜀上，无不幸之叹，其事出千馀年之表，则其美之巨细可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173133_comment'></div>然非其材之颖然迈于众人者不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173133_comment'></div>官于南者多矣，予知其材之颖然迈于众人能行吾说者，李材叔而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173133_comment'></div>材叔又与其兄公翊仕同年，同用荐者为县，入秘书省，为著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173133_comment'></div>今材叔为柳州，公翊为象州，皆同时，材又相若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173133_comment'></div>则二州交相致其政，其施之速、势之便，可胜道也夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173133_comment'></div>其越之人幸也夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173133_comment'></div>其可贺也夫！</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1173133_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　曾巩作《请改官制前预选官习行逐司事务札子》<div id='poem_1172994' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172994' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172994?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请改官制前预选官习行逐司事务劄子<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰四年八月八日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172994")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172994_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172994'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172994'>臣伏以陛下稽古正名，修定官制，今百工庶务，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1172994", 1172994, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>类别</span>以明，其于讲求经画，皆出圣虑，弥纶之体，固已详尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172994_comment'></div>然推行之始，去故取新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172994_comment'></div>窃恐百执事之人，素未谕于其心，习于其耳目，一日之间，或未尽知其任；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172994_comment'></div>群吏万民，听治于上者，或未尽知所趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172994_comment'></div>待夫问而后辨，推而后通，则必有烦阻之患、留滞之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172994_comment'></div>若图之于早，定之于素，则一日之间，官号法制，一新于上，而彝伦庶政，叙行于下，内外远近，虽易视改听，而持循安习，无异于常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172994_comment'></div>此臣所以区区之愚，庶有补于万一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172994_comment'></div>今百司庶务，既已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1172994", 1172994, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>类别</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172994_comment'></div>若以所分之职、所总之务，因今日之有司，择可属以事者，使之区处，自位叙名分，宪令版图，文移案牍，讼诉期会，总领循行，举明钩考，有革有因，有损有益，有举诸此而施诸彼，有舍诸彼而受诸此，有当警于官，有当布于众者，自一事已上，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1172994", 1172994, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>本末</span>次第，使更制之前，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1172994", 1172994, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>习勒</span>已定，则命出之日，但在奉行而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172994_comment'></div>盖吏部于尚书，为六官之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172994_comment'></div>试即而言之，其所总者选事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172994_comment'></div>流内铨、三班、东西审官之任，皆当归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172994_comment'></div>诚因今日之有司，择可属以事者，使之区处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172994_comment'></div>自令、仆射、尚书、侍郎、郎、员外郎，以其位之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1172994", 1172994, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>升降</span>，为其任之烦简，使省书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1172994", 1172994, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>审决</span>，某当属郎、员外郎，某当属尚书、侍郎，某当属令、仆射，各以其所属，预为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1172994", 1172994, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>科别</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172994_comment'></div>如此，则新命之官，不烦而知其任矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172994_comment'></div>曹局吏员，如三班诸房十有六，诸吏六十有四，其所别之司，所隶之人，不必尽易，惟当合者合之，当析者析之，当损者损之，当益者益之，使诸曹所主，因其旧习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172994_comment'></div>如此，则新补之吏，不谕而知其守矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172994_comment'></div>宪令版图，文移案牍，讼诉期会，总领循行，举明钩考，其因革损益之不同，与有举诸此而施诸彼，有舍诸彼而受诸此，有当警于官、布于众者，皆前事之期，莫不考定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172994_comment'></div>如此，则新出之政，不戒而知其叙矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172994_comment'></div>夫新命之官，不烦而知其任；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172994_comment'></div>新补之吏，不谕而知其守；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172994_comment'></div>新出之政，不戒而知其叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172994_comment'></div>则推行之始，去故取新，所以待之者备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172994_comment'></div>其于选事如此，旁至于司封、司勋、考功当隶之者，内服外服、庶工万事当归之者，皆推此以通彼，则吏部之任，不待政出之日问而后辨、推而后通也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172994_comment'></div>推吏部之事，以通于百工庶职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1172994_comment'></div>如此，则体虽至大，而操之有要；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1172994_comment'></div>事虽一变，而处之有素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1172994_comment'></div>一日之间，官号法制，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1172994", 1172994, "Clauses/132/Comments/0")'>鼎新</span>于上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1172994_comment'></div>而彝伦庶政，叙行于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1172994_comment'></div>内外远近，虽改视易听，而持循安习，无异于常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1172994_comment'></div>区区之愚，庶有补于万一者在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1172994_comment'></div>而臣愚浅薄，不知治体，贪于倾尽，而不知其言之妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1172994_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1172994", 1172994, "Clauses/145/Comments/0")'>采掇</span>增损，实待圣断，惟陛下之所裁幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1172994_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1172994_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　曾巩作《请改官制前预令诸司次比整齐架阁版籍等事札子》<div id='poem_1172995' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172995' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172995?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请改官制前预令诸司次比整齐架阁版籍等事劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172995")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172995_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172995'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172995'>臣伏以陛下发德音，正<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1172995", 1172995, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>官号</span>，法制度数，皆易以新书，太平之原，实在于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172995_comment'></div>今论次已定，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1172995", 1172995, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>宣布</span>有期，四方颙颙，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1172995", 1172995, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>跂足</span>而望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172995_comment'></div>臣窃恐施行之际，新旧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1172995", 1172995, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>代易</span>之初，庶工之间，或吏属因循，或簿书缘绝，其于督察漏略，检防<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1172995", 1172995, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>散逸</span>弥纶之体，不可不早有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1172995", 1172995, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>饬戒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172995_comment'></div>欲乞明谕有司，架阁有未备者备之，版籍有未正者正之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172995_comment'></div>凡宪令图牒、簿书案牍，皆当次比整齐，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1172995", 1172995, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>敛藏</span>识别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172995_comment'></div>以至于官寺什器，凡物之属公上者，亦皆当钩考，详于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1172995", 1172995, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>簿录</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172995_comment'></div>庶于新旧更易之间，得无漏略<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1172995", 1172995, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>散逸</span>之敝，非独儆当今典领之懈，且以绝异时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1172995", 1172995, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>追究</span>之烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172995_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1172995_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　弟曾布知陈州，母欲与俱行，曾巩因之上《乞出知颍州状》<div id='poem_1173029' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173029' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173029?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞出知颍州状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173029")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173029_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173029'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173029'>右，臣愚不自揆，怀犬马之情，敢昧万死以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173029_comment'></div>不敏之诛，所不敢逭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173029_comment'></div>伏念臣性行迂拙，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173029", 1173029, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>立朝</span>无所阿附，有见嫉之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173029", 1173029, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>积毁</span>，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173029", 1173029, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>借誉</span>之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173029", 1173029, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>私援</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173029_comment'></div>在外十有二年，更历七郡，虽有爱君向国之心，托势疏远，无路自通，期于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173029", 1173029, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>抱志</span>没齿而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173029_comment'></div>陛下居法宫之深，临万官之众，而臣以单外之迹，一介之微，陛下廓四聪之广，出独见之卓，不由臣之衒鬻，不因人之党助，收怜拊慰，劳问褒嘉，语重意殊，可谓非常之遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173029_comment'></div>士之有大过人之材者，殆未足以致此，岂臣之鄙所当冒得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173029_comment'></div>日夜思念，臣以庸下之器，在隐约之中，而独为圣主所知如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173029_comment'></div>蝼蚁之躯，知死不足以图报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173029_comment'></div>今还朝以来，甫及数月，未有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173029", 1173029, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>丝忽</span>自效之勤，而辄以私诚上陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173029_comment'></div>臣之妄庸，虽受诛绝之刑，不足以塞责，惟陛下察而哀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173029_comment'></div>臣母年七十有一，比婴疾疹，举动步履，日更艰难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173029_comment'></div>陛下处臣京师，臣幸得侍庭闱，以便医药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173029_comment'></div>圣泽至厚，常恐不能克堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173029_comment'></div>今臣弟布得守陈州，臣母怜其久别，欲与俱行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173029_comment'></div>顾臣之宜，惟得旁郡，庶可奉亲往来，以供子职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173029_comment'></div>而抱疾之亲，陆行非便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173029_comment'></div>今与陈比境，许、蔡、亳州及南京，皆不通水路，惟颍可以沿流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173029_comment'></div>臣诚不自揆，不讳万死之责，敢昧冒以请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173029_comment'></div>伏望圣慈，差臣知颍州一任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173029_comment'></div>窃恐顾临到任未久，无例为臣移易；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173029_comment'></div>缘若候顾临满阙，则臣弟布陈州却已满任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173029_comment'></div>欲望特出圣恩，许臣不候顾临任满交割。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173029_comment'></div>臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173029", 1173029, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>憃冥</span>寒陋，蒙陛下特异之知，未有锱铢之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173029_comment'></div>而顾迫子母之恩，规私择便，仰烦圣聪，当伏斧锧，以须罪戾，惟陛下哀怜听察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173029_comment'></div>干犯天威，臣不任云云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1173029_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年8月</a>　八月，曾巩奉敕充史馆修撰，又奉旨专典史事，合编《五朝国史》<div id='poem_1173037' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173037' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173037?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟辞免修五朝国史状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173037")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173037_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173037'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173037'>右，臣去年八月伏奉敕命，充史馆修撰，又奉圣旨专典史事，且将三朝国史先加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>考详</span>，候两朝史了日，一处修定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173037_comment'></div>又于延和殿伏蒙面谕所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>任属</span>臣之意，臣是以祗服圣恩，不敢辞避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173037_comment'></div>天下皆知臣居此职，出自主知，以为荣遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173037_comment'></div>况臣以至孤至远之迹，出深忌积毁之馀，独蒙明主知而用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173037_comment'></div>且自古以来，天下之士不遇者多矣，如臣遭遇者无几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173037_comment'></div>则臣捐草茅之躯，以报天地之德，固其分也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173037_comment'></div>至于效其区区之愚，岂足为陛下道哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173037_comment'></div>况以文字薄技，得因圣宋之大典，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>托名</span>万世，学士大夫莫不愿备其任，而独臣之愚，幸预采择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173037_comment'></div>此臣所以穷日夜，惫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>精思</span>，不敢忘须臾，志在于斯文，惟恐不称其任，以负陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>任属</span>之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173037_comment'></div>自到局以来，仰遵圣训，且将三朝国史，先加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>考详</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173037_comment'></div>伏见祖宗以来，神功圣德，巍巍之烈，至于历世将相，文武士吏，言行声实，殊尤之迹，至高至大，已非愚臣所能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>究尽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173037_comment'></div>况两朝国史，臣所未见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173037_comment'></div>窃惟五世百有馀年，圣贤事业，本末闳大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173037_comment'></div>臣之浅薄，加以齿发衰晚，诚恐不能发明论次，以称陛下显扬褒大之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173037_comment'></div>虚食大官，汗青无日，以负陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>任属</span>之意，此臣之所大惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173037_comment'></div>况五朝旧史，皆累世公相卿士、道德文学、朝廷宗工所共<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/63/Comments/2")'>准裁</span>，既已勒成，为国大典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173037_comment'></div>臣以至孤至远之迹，出深忌积毁之馀，材质驽下，岂宜辄议损益？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173037_comment'></div>使臣仰恃日月之照，不知自任之妄，贪慕恩待，趣之以就事，诚恐黑白不当，律吕失次，方于旧史有失无得，以负陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>任属</span>之意，此又臣之所大惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173037_comment'></div>若不早具上陈，自求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>罢退</span>，至于岁月<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>寖久</span>，不职之罪已不可逃，虽欲乞身，已无可及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173037_comment'></div>是以不避万死之责，敢干圣听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173037_comment'></div>伏望出自圣慈，察臣悃愊，罢臣史事，别与臣一差遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173037_comment'></div>臣之昏愚不肖，固已尽在陛下听察之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173037_comment'></div>如蒙终赐收怜，别加驱策，顾臣之鄙，奉令承诏，可幸无罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173037_comment'></div>则碎首捐躯，固臣之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173037_comment'></div>以此明臣之志在于量能知分，非敢茍且避事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173037_comment'></div>伏惟陛下天地父母，哀而怜之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1173037_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　曾巩管勾编修院，判太常寺，兼礼仪事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　曾巩作《回人贺授史馆修撰状》<div id='poem_1173126' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173126' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173126?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回人贺授史馆修撰状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173126")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173126_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173126'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173126'>右巩启：误被上恩，进专史事，顾惭孤陋，曷称选抡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173126_comment'></div>伏念巩齿发蚤衰，材资素薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173126_comment'></div>差池一纪，久流落于风波；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173126_comment'></div>推徙七州，寖沉迷于簿领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173126_comment'></div>讵期皓首，获奉清光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173126_comment'></div>拔于多士之中，宠以非常之遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173126_comment'></div>惟累朝之盛典，垂列圣之鸿名，宜得异能，使之实录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173126_comment'></div>岂伊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173126", 1173126, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>鄙钝</span>，可尽形容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173126_comment'></div>惧莫副于简求，方内怀于兢愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173126_comment'></div>敢意<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173126", 1173126, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>眷私</span>之厚，特迂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173126", 1173126, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>庆问</span>之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173126_comment'></div>矧奖饰之逾涯，俾夤缘而借重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173126_comment'></div>其为感幸，难既敷陈。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1173126_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　曾巩充史馆修撰，入谢，神宗谕以自择其属，遂荐邢恕以为史馆检讨，又荐陈师道，朝廷以白衣难之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　曾巩在朝曾与神宗论王安石。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　曾巩作《送元厚之资政致政归苏州》<div id='poem_220237' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220237' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220237?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送元厚之资政致仕归苏州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220237")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220237_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220237'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220237'>笑指家园是五湖，画船东下载图书。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220237_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220237'>收功玉铉丹青后，得老铜楼羽翼初。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220237_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220237'>醒醉放怀从野服，登临乘兴属安车<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220237_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220237'>都门饮饯光华盛，不独当年有二疏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220237_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220237'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220237_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_220237'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_220237_0'>⑴ 一作舆。公既谢事，即日野服安舆，优游从适。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_220237_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　曾巩作《请以近更官制如周官六典为书札子》<div id='poem_1172996' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172996' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172996?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请以近更官制如周官六典为书劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172996")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172996_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172996'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172996'>臣窃以周制六卿，各率其属，皆有分职，见于《礼》经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172996_comment'></div>至唐，自三省而下，分命庶官，亦各以其职事，见于《六典》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172996_comment'></div>今陛下讲求化原，更定官制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172996_comment'></div>盖作宪垂法，由古以来，其于大体有不可易者，虽唐虞三代未尝易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172996_comment'></div>至于缘人情，因世故，斟酌损益，有不可不易者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172996_comment'></div>故虽唐虞之际极盛之时，凡巡守四方，则皆修五礼，而周人治象之法，亦岁有更革，况于时异事殊，而可以胶于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1172996", 1172996, "Clauses/25/Comments/1")'>一方</span>之说、泥于一偏之迹哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172996_comment'></div>故陛下更制改作，其弥纶大意，则远体《周官》，而近因唐制，此所谓于其大体，有不可易者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172996_comment'></div>至于从宜应变，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1172996", 1172996, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>解纵</span>拘挛，独出圣谋，不牵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1172996", 1172996, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>常算</span>，此谓斟酌损益，有不可不易者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172996_comment'></div>夫能审其不可易者而因之，断其不可不易者而更之，惟当而已，然后可谓明制作之体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172996_comment'></div>惟陛下圣性之卓，故能处之无疑，此非群臣之所能望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172996_comment'></div>今更定官制，其所先者，在于使群臣庶位皆明知其职分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172996_comment'></div>职分既明，然后在事者得各因其名，以效其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172996_comment'></div>而考察者欲核其实，则必推其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172996_comment'></div>此作法之大要，所谓不可易者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172996_comment'></div>今庶尹百工，分位<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1172996", 1172996, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>既定</span>，宜有新书如《周官》、《六典》明白之文，使内外上下，晓然究悉，以熙庶绩而康万事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172996_comment'></div>臣适典明命，亦得各以百执事所分之职，载于训词，以饬戒在列，以称陛下董正治官、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1172996", 1172996, "Clauses/65/Comments/1")'>循名责实</span>之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172996_comment'></div>其书宜以时颁布，以幸天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172996_comment'></div>如体重事巨，其不可不易者，文字论次尚有未周，则百司所守，小大之务，亦宜先有条具，委曲章明，施于列位，使人人皆知其任，劝于赴功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172996_comment'></div>而臣亦得讨论演畅，见于王者之训，以副圣君励精求治、为世作则之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172996_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1172996_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年8月</a>　曾巩作《申中书乞不看详会要状》<div id='poem_1173031' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173031' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173031?labeling=true' target='_blank'>申中书乞不看详会要状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173031")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173031_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173031'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173031'>右，伏以自来修撰国史，皆妙选众材，共当寄任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173031_comment'></div>今通修五朝大典，属巩专领，已是一人而冒众材之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173031_comment'></div>顾巩衰拙，惧不克堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173031_comment'></div>其今来所修《会要》，计三百卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173031_comment'></div>修纂以来，经涉十有馀年，编修等官，已更六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173031_comment'></div>限至秋季末成书，即今已是八月中旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173031_comment'></div>某若依限修进，不惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173031", 1173031, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>须合</span>考求首尾，参详得失，仍更并须检寻文字，照据其间，恐合更有更改损益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173031_comment'></div>不独于巩以旬月而求就十有馀年之功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173031_comment'></div>又复于巩已于国史，是以一人而冒众材之任，惧不克堪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173031_comment'></div>而更益以《会要》，一人而兼数人之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173031_comment'></div>纵使容巩添展期限，缘累朝典章，本末闳大，不同小小文字，自顾材力，实不能兼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173031_comment'></div>况今来进本装写并已了毕，伏乞更赐敷奏，取自朝廷详酌，别赐指挥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1173031_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年10月11日</a>　曾巩作《进太祖皇帝总序并状》<div id='poem_1173140' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173140' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173140?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进太祖皇帝总序<span class='inlineComment2'>（并状）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年10月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173140")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173140_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173140'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173140'>右，臣误被圣恩，付以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>史事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173140_comment'></div>今月三日，延和殿伏蒙面谕所以任属臣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173140_comment'></div>臣愚不肖，不知所处，是以蚤夜一心极虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173140_comment'></div>惟祖宗积累功德非可形容，矧臣之鄙，岂能拟议仿佛？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173140_comment'></div>将无以使列圣巍巍之韪迹焜耀昭彻，布在方策，此臣之所惴惴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173140_comment'></div>窃惟前世原大推功，必始于受命之君，以明王迹之所自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173140_comment'></div>故《商颂》所纪，繇汤上至于契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173140_comment'></div>周诗《生民》、《清庙》，本于后稷、文王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173140_comment'></div>宋兴，太祖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>开建</span>鸿业，更立三才，为帝者首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173140_comment'></div>陛下所以命臣显扬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>褒大</span>之意，固以谓太祖雄才大略，千载以来特起之主，国家所繇兴，无前之烈，宜明白<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>暴见</span>，以觉悟万世，传之无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173140_comment'></div>臣窃考旧闻，伏念旬月次辑太祖行事，揆其指意所出，终始之际，论著于篇，敢缮写上尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173140_comment'></div>臣内自省，大惧智不足以窥测高远，文不足以推阐精微，使先帝成功盛德，晦昧不章，不能满足陛下仁孝继述之心，仰负恩待，无以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>自赎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173140_comment'></div>伏惟陛下聪明睿智不世之姿，非群臣所能望，如赐裁定，使臣获受成法，更去纰缪，存其可采，系于《太祖本纪》篇末，以为国史书首，以称<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>明诏</span>万分之一，臣不胜大愿，惟陛下留意万幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173140_comment'></div>臣未敢请对，谨具状，以所论著随状上进以闻，伏候敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173140_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1173140'>盖唐之敝，自天宝已后，纪纲寖坏，不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>自振</span>，以至于失天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173140_comment'></div>五代兴起，五十馀年之间，更八姓十有四君，危亡之变数矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173140_comment'></div>其尤甚也，契丹遂入中国，擅立名号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173140_comment'></div>当是时，天地五行人事之理<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>反易</span>缪乱，不同夷狄者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>亡几</span>耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173140_comment'></div>太祖为天下所戴，践<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>尊位</span>，以生民为任，故劝农桑，薄赋敛，缓刑罚，除旧政之不便民者，诏令勉核相属，推其心，无一日不在百姓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173140_comment'></div>知方镇之病民也，故设通判之员，使敛以绳墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173140_comment'></div>忧吏之不良也，故数使在位举其所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173140_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/92/Comments/1")'>患吏</span>或受赇、或不奉法也，故罪至死徙，一无所贷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173140_comment'></div>原其意，盖以谓遭世大衰，不如是，吏不知禁，不能救民于焚溺之中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173140_comment'></div>征伐既下诸国，必先已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>逋欠</span>，涤烦苛，赒乏绝，雪冤滞，惠农民，拔人才，申命郡邑，反复不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173140_comment'></div>或遇水旱，辄蔬食请祷，欲移灾于己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173140_comment'></div>其于群臣，有恩旧，有劳能，待之各尽其分，以位贵之，以财富之，有男使尚主，有女使嫁宗室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173140_comment'></div>其予人之周也如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173140_comment'></div>即材可用，虽雠不废；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173140_comment'></div>不可用，虽光显矣，不处以势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173140_comment'></div>其有罪多纵贷之，或赐之使自愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173140_comment'></div>及至坚明约束以整齐天下者，亦使之不能逾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173140_comment'></div>强僭之国，皆接以恩礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173140_comment'></div>商贾往来不禁，有出境犯其令者，乃为之置市<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>边邑</span>，使两利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173140_comment'></div>有所乏少，常赈助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173140_comment'></div>征伐所加，必其罪暴著，师出未尝不以义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173140_comment'></div>其君长已降，及就<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/142/Comments/0")'>俘执</span>，道路劳问迎致，使者相望，既至，罪不数辱之，优假秩禄，及其宗亲吏属，赐以田宅，使子孙世守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173140_comment'></div>拥护保全，皆得以寿考终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173140_comment'></div>自晋既覆灭，契丹寖大，中国<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/155/Comments/0")'>惴畏</span>不敢当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173140_comment'></div>太祖拔用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/156/Comments/0")'>材武</span>护西北边，宠以非常之恩，任属专，听信明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173140_comment'></div>常遣戍卒，戒之曰：「我犹赦汝，郭进杀汝矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173140_comment'></div>有讼进者，谓曰：「进军政严，此必犯进法」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173140_comment'></div>送进，使杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173140_comment'></div>关市租赋，诸将得恣用，不问出入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173140_comment'></div>以其故，士附，斗者尽力，谍者尽情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173140_comment'></div>边臣可诿者，皆十馀年不易其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173140_comment'></div>然位不过巡检使，众不过三五千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173140_comment'></div>盖任专则势便，位不极则士励，兵少则用约，御将亦多术矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173140_comment'></div>总其所长，能兼用之，故能省费息民，振新集之众，屈凭陵之虏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173140_comment'></div>盖太祖笃于孝友，有天下之行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173140_comment'></div>聪明智勇，有天下之材；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173140_comment'></div>仁心爱人，有天下之志；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173140_comment'></div>包含<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/196/Comments/0")'>遍覆</span>，有天下之量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173140_comment'></div>守之以勤俭恭慎，虚心纳谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173140_comment'></div>鉴于粤、蜀，以奢侈为戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173140_comment'></div>思天下之重，不复游畋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173140_comment'></div>封拜诸子，务自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/205/Comments/0")'>约损</span>，不尽循<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/206/Comments/0")'>故典</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1173140_comment'></div>收纳学士大夫，用之不求其备；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1173140_comment'></div>或守难进之节，亦不夺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1173140_comment'></div>晚喜读书，劝诸将以学，曰：「欲使之知治道也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1173140_comment'></div>兼覆夷夏，从容以德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1173140_comment'></div>江南平，览<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/218/Comments/0")'>捷书</span>而泣曰：「师征不义，而顾令吾民死兵，彼何负哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1173140_comment'></div>秦州已入，尚波于之地，却而不受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1173140_comment'></div>钱俶来朝，复归之越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1173140_comment'></div>契丹愿听盟约，逡巡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/228/Comments/0")'>退抑</span>，不自矜伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1173140_comment'></div>天下大势连数十城之镇，割其故地，以小其力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1173140_comment'></div>易动难畜之兵，敛置怀服，以消其难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1173140_comment'></div>至于举贤良，崇孝弟，缀礼乐，明考课，虽宇内初辑，然庶政大体，弥纶备具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1173140_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/243/Comments/0")'>遗文</span>故事，施于后世，皆可为法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1173140_comment'></div>民于是时，从死更生，室家相保；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1173140_comment'></div>士农工贾，各还其职；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1173140_comment'></div>鸟兽草木，亦莫不遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1173140_comment'></div>前世<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/253/Comments/0")'>旧臣</span>，备将相、处腹心爪牙之任者，一旦回心奉令北乡，如素委质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1173140_comment'></div>天下广都通邑，兼地千里，德怀二三之臣，负众自用，令之不从、召之不至者尚数十，皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/262/Comments/0")'>束衽</span>来庭，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/263/Comments/0")'>代易</span>奔走，如水凑下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1173140_comment'></div>粤、蜀、吴、楚、瓯闽之君，分天下为八九，曰帝与王，传子及孙，更数十岁者，编名囚虏，并聚阙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1173140_comment'></div>四海之内，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/273/Comments/0")'>混齐</span>为一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1173140_comment'></div>海东之国高丽，极南交阯，西戎吐蕃、回纥，北狄契丹，皆请吏奉贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1173140_comment'></div>天地所养，通途之属，莫不内附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1173140_comment'></div>当是时，更立天下，与民为始，天地五行人事之理，乱而复正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1173140_comment'></div>盖太祖之于受命，非如前世之君，图众以智，图柄以力，其处心积虑，非一夕一日在于取天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1173140_comment'></div>其在天者历数，在人者群臣万民、三军之士不归周，归太祖，未有知其所以然者，所谓天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1173140_comment'></div>及其传天下也，舍子属弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1173140_comment'></div>是则太祖之受天下，与舜受之尧，禹受之舜，其揆一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1173140_comment'></div>其传天下，与尧传之舜，舜传之禹，其揆一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1173140_comment'></div>受天下及传天下，视天与人而已，非其心未尝有天下，岂能如是哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1173140_comment'></div>世以为太祖不世出之主，与汉高祖同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1173140_comment'></div>盖太祖为人有大度，意豁如也，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/316/Comments/0")'>知人善任</span>使，与汉高祖同，固然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1173140_comment'></div>太祖承自天宝以后、更五代二百馀年<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/319/Comments/1")'>极敝</span>之天下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1173140_comment'></div>汉祖承<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/320/Comments/0")'>全盛</span>之秦，二世之末，天下始乱，所因之势既殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1173140_comment'></div>太祖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/324/Comments/0")'>开建</span>帝业，作则垂宪，后常可行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1173140_comment'></div>汉祖粗定海内而已，不及一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1173140_comment'></div>太祖立折杖法，脱民榜笞死祸，定著常刑，一本宽大；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1173140_comment'></div>汉祖虽约法三章，然肉刑三族之诛，至孝文始去，不及二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1173140_comment'></div>太祖功臣，皆故等夷，及位定，上下相安，始终一意；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1173140_comment'></div>汉祖疑间诸将，夷灭其家，不及三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1173140_comment'></div>太祖削大弱强，藩臣遵职；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1173140_comment'></div>汉祖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_95_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/347/Comments/0")'>封国</span>过制，反者更起，累世乃定，不及四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1173140_comment'></div>太祖征伐必克；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1173140_comment'></div>汉祖数战辄北，不及五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1173140_comment'></div>太祖文武<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/354/Comments/0")'>自出</span>，群臣莫及；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1173140_comment'></div>汉祖非得三杰之助，不得无失，不及六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1173140_comment'></div>开宝之初，南海先下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1173140_comment'></div>赵陀分越而帝，汉祖不能禁，不及七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1173140_comment'></div>太祖不用兵革，契丹自附；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1173140_comment'></div>汉祖折厄白登，身仅免祸，不及八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1173140_comment'></div>太祖后宫二百，问愿归者，复去四之一；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1173140_comment'></div>汉祖溷于衽席，女祸及宗，不及九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1173140_comment'></div>太祖明于大计，以属天下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1173140_comment'></div>汉祖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_107_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/377/Comments/0")'>择嗣</span>不审，几坠厥世，不及十也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1173140_comment'></div>汉祖所不能及，其大者如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1173140_comment'></div>是自三代以来，拨乱之主，未有及太祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1173140_comment'></div>三代盛矣，然禹之孙太康失国，汤之孙太甲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/387/Comments/0")'>放废</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1173140_comment'></div>文、武之后三四传，昭王不返于楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1173140_comment'></div>繇汉以下，变故之密，盖不可胜道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1173140_comment'></div>太祖经始大基，流风馀泽，所被者远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1173140_comment'></div>五圣遵业，至今百有二十馀年，上下和乐，无变容动色之虑接于耳目，治安久长，自三代以来所未有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1173140_comment'></div>维太祖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_115_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/402/Comments/0")'>创始</span>传后，比迹尧舜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1173140_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_116_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/404/Comments/0")'>纲理</span>天下，轶于汉祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1173140_comment'></div>太平之业，施于无穷，三代所不及，成功盛德，其至矣哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1173140_comment'></div>盖唐天宝十四年，天下户八百九十一万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1173140_comment'></div>太祖元年，户九十六万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1173140_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_120_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/415/Comments/0")'>末年</span>，天下既定，户三百九万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1173140_comment'></div>今上元丰二年，户一千三百九十一万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1173140_comment'></div>六圣之德泽，覆露生养，斯其所以盛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1173140_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_123_1173140", 1173140, "Clauses/423/Comments/0")'>本原</span>事实，其所繇致此，有自也哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_123_1173140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173140'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷一○。又见《曾文定公集》卷六，宋刻《南丰曾先生文粹》卷二，《东莱集注类编观澜文》乙集卷一六（仅有进状）。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173140_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年10月28日</a>　曾巩乞收采名臣高士事迹遗文，诏从之，曾巩作《史馆申请三道札子》<div id='poem_1172997' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172997' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172997?labeling=true' target='_blank'>史馆申请三道劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年10月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172997")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172997_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172997'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172997'>臣修定国史，止依司马迁以下编年体式，至于书事随便，今略具条目进呈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172997_comment'></div>其馀文义曲折，难预为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1172997", 1172997, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>定例</span>者，须候著撰之际，徐更随宜，候书成日，为逐篇述传，系于末卷，以见论次之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172997_comment'></div>盖若预为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1172997", 1172997, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>定例</span>，恐于文义须至拘牵，就例或有所妨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172997_comment'></div>其书事随便，今略具条目如左：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1172997'>一、群臣拜罢，见于百官表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172997_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1172997'>一、刑法、食货、五行、天文、灾祥之类，各见于逐志<span class='inlineComment2'>（已上更不于本纪载述之类。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172997_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1172997'>一、名位虽崇，而事迹无可纪者，更不必传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172997_comment'></div>或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1172997", 1172997, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>善恶</span>有可见者，则附见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172997_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1172997'>一、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1172997", 1172997, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>善恶</span>可劝戒，是非后世当考者，书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172997_comment'></div>其细故常行，更不备书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172997_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1172997'>右取进止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172997_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1172997'>臣修定五朝国史，有合申请事，具下项：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1172997'>一、自宋兴以来，名臣良士或曾有名位，或素在丘园，其有嘉言善行、历官行事、军国勋劳，或有贡献封章，或有著撰文字，或本家有碑志、行状、纪述之文，或他人为作传记之类，今来所修国史，须合收采<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1172997", 1172997, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>载述</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172997_comment'></div>恐虑旧书访寻之初，有所未尽，至今岁月已远，耳目所及者少，或至漏略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172997_comment'></div>欲乞京畿委开封知府及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1172997", 1172997, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>畿县</span>知县，在外委逐路监司、州县长吏，博加求访。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172997_comment'></div>有子孙者，延致询问，谕以朝廷之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172997_comment'></div>欲使名臣良士言行功实传之不朽，为人子孙者亦宜知父祖善状，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1172997", 1172997, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>合要</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1172997", 1172997, "Clauses/58/Comments/1")'>显扬</span>，使得见于国史，以称为人后嗣之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172997_comment'></div>各令以其所有事迹或文字，尽因郡府，纳于史局，以备论次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172997_comment'></div>或文字稍多，其家无力缮写，即官为委官，以官用佣写字人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1172997", 1172997, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>书写</span>校正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172997_comment'></div>其曾任两府、两制、台谏之家，须逐家一一询访，无令漏略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172997_comment'></div>各限自指挥到日，一月内取到文字，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1172997", 1172997, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>发送</span>史局，其逐路监司、州府、逐县长吏，各具无漏略<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1172997", 1172997, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>文状</span>连申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172997_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1172997'>一、申中书，向来编集累朝文字，本局不见，得从初名目，及枢密院有编集机要文字，并两处有录得累朝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1172997", 1172997, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>御札</span>手诏副本文字，欲乞令检送本局，以备讨论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172997_comment'></div>取进止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172997_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1172997'>臣修定五朝国史，据旧书及更加采摭以备纪录外，窃虑五圣临御之日，德音行事，外廷有所未闻，及自来更有纪述、发明文字藏在宫禁者，欲乞特赐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1172997", 1172997, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>颁示</span>，以凭论次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172997_comment'></div>所贵祖宗功德，传布方册，得以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1172997", 1172997, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>周尽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172997_comment'></div>右取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1172997_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年11月</a>　废编院入史馆，不须勾当，仍任史馆修撰。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　友李丕之子仲熊自山阳抵京师，为其父请铭，曾巩撰《尚书比部员外郎李君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173335' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173335' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173335?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书比部员外郎李君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰三年十一月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173335")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173335_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173335'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173335'>康定初，先人寓南康，与李君居并舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173335_comment'></div>是时君年未四十，游余父子间，相好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173335_comment'></div>后十馀岁，君为临安，遇余于浙西，道旧故，喜甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173335_comment'></div>又十馀岁，君已退而家居，复见之山阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173335_comment'></div>又九岁，而君年七十有一以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173335_comment'></div>明年，其孤仲熊自山阳抵京师，拜且泣曰：「愿得铭也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173335_comment'></div>余惟君游余父子间四十年矣，铭其可辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173335_comment'></div>君姓李氏，讳丕，字子京，初名真卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173335_comment'></div>曾大父讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173335_comment'></div>大父讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173335_comment'></div>考讳某，赠光禄卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173335_comment'></div>母丁氏，仙源县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173335_comment'></div>继母王氏，仁寿县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173335_comment'></div>君海州朐山人，家故寒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173335_comment'></div>学为士，自君始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173335_comment'></div>出举进士，中其科，得主楚之淮阴簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173335_comment'></div>岁凶，转运使调军食，用君主宿州籴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173335_comment'></div>他州皆强赋，民犹不足，君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173335", 1173335, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>随便</span>开诱，粜者悦趋，籴最他州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173335_comment'></div>去为处州司法参军，能随用见，声出众上，荐者十四人，不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173335_comment'></div>迁宁国军节度，掌书记，转运使属君市翎毛，君优致如主籴，所市以赤，数之至十万，复最他州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173335_comment'></div>又属君主作院，君考校程度，所作兵器总一万一千三百二十有四，皆精且利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173335_comment'></div>他军州事，有不能决者，多属君，君所决者三十有八事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173335_comment'></div>盖复太平州囚管寿活之，明通判歙州林瑀无罪释之，类如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173335_comment'></div>于是能益白，荐者十三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173335_comment'></div>迁秘书省著作佐郎，用荐者监兴元府税，急吏宽商，课赢十有七万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173335_comment'></div>岁中，以岁次迁秘书丞，以课迁太常博士，以覃恩迁尚书屯田员外郎，知杭州临安县，召为审刑院详议官，赐绯衣银鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173335_comment'></div>迁尚书都官员外郎，通判蜀州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173335_comment'></div>蜀少事，然他州讼有积岁不能决者，转运使以属君，君所决八事，民信服之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173335_comment'></div>迁尚书职方员外郎，监在京内衣库，枢密使田况奏用君删定马军司条贯，既成，诏加赏赉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173335_comment'></div>滨州有狱久不能决，辞连大臣家子，遣吏治之辄辞，诏遣君乃决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173335_comment'></div>累迁尚书职方郎中，以母老出通判杭州，坐法免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173335_comment'></div>复为尚书比部郎中，监沂州承县盐酒税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173335_comment'></div>未逾月，自罢归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173335_comment'></div>又监陕州集津垛盐务，不行，以本官致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173335_comment'></div>元丰三年九月己卯以疾卒山阳之私第，十一月甲寅葬安乐乡之杨兴里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173335_comment'></div>君娶葛氏，仙居县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173335_comment'></div>再娶乔氏，寿安县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173335_comment'></div>子男七人：曰仲熊，卫州军事推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173335_comment'></div>曰仲谟，以进士再试礼部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173335_comment'></div>曰仲将，曰仲杰，曰仲倩，曰仲昌，皆未仕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173335_comment'></div>女六人，嫁吴好礼、于锐，皆奉议郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173335_comment'></div>马察、于镗，皆进士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173335_comment'></div>馀幼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173335_comment'></div>君既自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1173335", 1173335, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>奋拔</span>，立其家，盖仕四方，惟蜀去其亲，其事兄抚孤弟侄，皆尽恩意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173335_comment'></div>其为吏不独能自任其官，盖他吏之不能任其事者，或属君兼任之，办其裕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173335_comment'></div>不幸一跌，世无力振达之者，故以坎𡒄终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173335_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1173335'>海区氏李，有启厥世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173335_comment'></div>富辞与能，自约而侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173335_comment'></div>曰父与子，郎官卿士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173335_comment'></div>曰妻及母，翟衣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1173335", 1173335, "Clauses/154/Comments/0")'>象揥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173335_comment'></div>谓势方利，孰轠以毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173335_comment'></div>施不尽有，故也则喟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173335_comment'></div>尚祐尔裔，以追厥始。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1173335_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　九妹德操葬于扬州江都县东兴乡，曾巩撰《仙源县君曾氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173384' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173384' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173384?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仙源县君曾氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰四年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173384")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173384_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173384'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173384'>吾妹十人，其一蚤夭，吾既孤而贫，有妹九人皆未嫁，大惧失其时，又惧不得其所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173384_comment'></div>赖先人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173384", 1173384, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>遗休</span>，嫁之皆以时，所嫁之者皆良士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173384_comment'></div>谓宜皆寿而昌，以延光荣于父母家也，而十馀年间，死者四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173384_comment'></div>先人之盛德也，吾妹之懿也，曾不章显于世而夭，吾故不知夫哭之之恸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173384_comment'></div>讳德操字淑文者，吾之第九妹也，嫁江都王氏，为殿中丞、赠尚书屯田员外郎讳某之子妇，殿中丞几之妻，封仙源县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173384_comment'></div>为人柔嫕静颛，动止以仪度，平居温温，一言笑不妄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173384_comment'></div>与人群居，自处者常取其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173384_comment'></div>与人共衣食，自与者常取其薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173384_comment'></div>王氏故贫，垢衣菲食，未尝以为歉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173384_comment'></div>恭大慈小，辅其夫以义，无不得其宜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173384_comment'></div>不幸年三十有一以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173384_comment'></div>有子男二人，曰某，曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173384_comment'></div>女二人，皆幼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173384_comment'></div>曾氏其先鲁人，今家建昌军之南丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173384_comment'></div>吾妹为尚书户部郎中、直史馆、赠右谏议大夫讳某之孙女，太常博士、赠尚书都官郎中讳某之女，卒于熙宁七年三月庚子，葬于扬州江都县东兴乡，元丰四年某月某甲子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173384_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1173384'>既艰其生，又不介之寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173384_comment'></div>维笃于仁，尚克臧厥后。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1173384_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　曾巩作《议边防给赐士卒只支头子》<div id='poem_1173002' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173002' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173002?labeling=true' target='_blank'>议边防给赐士卒只支头子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173002")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173002_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173002'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173002'>臣伏见真宗议封泰山，问三司使丁谓：「随驾兵士，或遇泥雨，支赐鞋钱，动须五七万贯，如何有备」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173002_comment'></div>谓奏：「随驾之士，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173002", 1173002, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>披带</span>已重，若有支赐，如何将行？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173002_comment'></div>欲令殿前都指挥使曹璨先问军士，路中或有支赐，置随驾便钱一司，各与头子支，便于兵士住营处，或指定州军，各使骨肉请领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173002_comment'></div>一则便于兵士请领，二则随驾兵士骨肉在营，得便到特支钱物，甚安人心」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173002_comment'></div>曹璨寻问诸军，皆曰：「随驾请得何用？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173002_comment'></div>兼难以将行，若如此，皆感圣恩」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173002_comment'></div>遂定东封之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173002_comment'></div>车驾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173002", 1173002, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>往回</span>，略无阙误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173002_comment'></div>臣窃以为边防给赐士卒，可推此行之，在公可省辇运，在私可无负致营护之劳，而士卒之家，又速得钱物<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173002", 1173002, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>济用</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173002_comment'></div>伏乞详酌，如有可采，出自圣意施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173002_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173002_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　曾巩作《请减军士营教札子》<div id='poem_1173005' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173005' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173005?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请减军士营教劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173005")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173005_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173005'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173005'>臣伏见诸军教阅之法，并只合早教一次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173005_comment'></div>旧例有晚教者，即更晚教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173005_comment'></div>向来教阅之法，初行之时，诸军欲要训练早得精熟，是以早晚教外，诸营更有营教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173005_comment'></div>今来训练日久，各以精熟，甚有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173005", 1173005, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>踏硬</span>出格之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173005_comment'></div>诸军事艺，见今分作三等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173005_comment'></div>欲乞相度其事艺，在第三等者，与免营教一日；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173005_comment'></div>在第二等者，与免营教二日；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173005_comment'></div>在第一等，与免营教三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173005_comment'></div>所贵人情悦慕升进，得事艺者多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173005_comment'></div>乞赐详酌指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173005_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173005_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩作《正月十一日迎驾呈诸同舍》<div id='poem_220180' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220180' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_220180'>俗眼望来犹眩日，天颜回处自生春。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220180_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220180'>行齐鹓鹭常随仗，步稳骅骝不起尘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220180_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220180'>归路青云喧鼓吹，乐游从此属都人<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220217_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220217'>龙衔烛抱金门出，鳌负山趋玉座来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220217_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220217'>砀极戏添夷客喜<span class='inlineComment2'>（汉飨四夷之客作海中之戏。）</span>，柏梁篇较从臣材。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220217_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
