class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173394' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173394?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝中祭钱纯老文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173394")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173394_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173394'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173394'>呜呼公乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173394_comment'></div>穷经及史，旁兼百氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173394_comment'></div>废寝与食，不虚寸晷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173394_comment'></div>笃好无倦，华颠愈励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173394_comment'></div>强记多识，箱输屋偫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173394_comment'></div>阔议崇论，河垂海委。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173394_comment'></div>诗赋讲说，射策三科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173394_comment'></div>金马玉堂，经帷三职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173394_comment'></div>寒苦自至，无冯与翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173394_comment'></div>铨综再试，士曰子归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173394_comment'></div>尹正三岁，众曰子依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173394_comment'></div>公于所闻，维学之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173394_comment'></div>公于所知，则维自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173394_comment'></div>利害之际，人鲜能安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173394_comment'></div>彼为惴惴，公独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173394", 1173394, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>桓桓</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173394_comment'></div>爱恶之情，人鲜自克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173394_comment'></div>彼有赘亏，公为衡石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173394_comment'></div>世所并逐，公有不求，彼嚣我静，则莫我尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173394_comment'></div>曾不三事，位云未究；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173394_comment'></div>曾不百年，数云非寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173394_comment'></div>歼国之良，在列嗟咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173394_comment'></div>隤民之望，耋艾歔欷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173394_comment'></div>天子闻丧，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173394", 1173394, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>驰使</span>临视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173394_comment'></div>劳恤茕孤，赒怜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173394", 1173394, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>乏匮</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173394_comment'></div>凡我同朝，矧曰同志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173394_comment'></div>哀由感触，孰知失涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173394_comment'></div>寓马在庭，荐羞在几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173394_comment'></div>公乎来哉，寄诚兹诔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1173394_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩作《代翰林侍读学士钱藻遗表》<div id='poem_1172981' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172981' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172981?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代翰林侍读学士钱藻遗表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172981")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172981_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172981'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172981'>犬马之质，难驻于颓龄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172981_comment'></div>日月之光，尚攀于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1172981", 1172981, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>爱景</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172981_comment'></div>臣藻诚悲诚哽，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172981_comment'></div>伏念臣出于悴族，进以謏材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172981_comment'></div>文辞讲说制策之科，众称<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1172981", 1172981, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>华选</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172981_comment'></div>儒馆掖垣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1172981", 1172981, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>经帷</span>之职，世谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1172981", 1172981, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>清涂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172981_comment'></div>独遍窃于美名，盖亲逢于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1172981", 1172981, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>亨运</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172981_comment'></div>至于总铨衡之要剧，领京邑之浩烦，蔑有劳能，可论报称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172981_comment'></div>冒宠灵而过厚，致<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1172981", 1172981, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>灾疚</span>以交攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172981_comment'></div>迫霜露之所侵，且将澌尽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172981_comment'></div>幸发肤之无毁，得以全归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172981_comment'></div>方去阙廷，长投泉壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172981_comment'></div>辄陈遗志，犹及能言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172981_comment'></div>伏愿皇帝陛下御六气之和，慎调兴止；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172981_comment'></div>享万年之祚，永庇华夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172981_comment'></div>再念臣偷残息之仅存，觊馀恩之可丐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172981_comment'></div>敢祈仁睿，终赐矜怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172981_comment'></div>臣有男进士󰛡，孙男某，亲堂弟茂，共出寒乡，稍亲薄技。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172981_comment'></div>葑菲不弃，傥微禄之获沾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172981_comment'></div>鱼菽可供，庶游魂之未馁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172981_comment'></div>伏望圣慈，并于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1172981", 1172981, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>文资</span>内安排。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172981_comment'></div>妄兹干泽，愧在忘廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172981_comment'></div>保存殁之孤踪，托始终之大赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172981_comment'></div>生而无益，曾莫及于衔环；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172981_comment'></div>死或有知，犹庶几于结草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1172981_comment'></div>仰望旒扆，臣不任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云。）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1172981_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩撰《故翰林侍读学士钱公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173328' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173328' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173328?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故翰林侍读学士钱公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173328")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173328_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173328'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173328'>公钱氏也，故为王家，有吴越之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173328_comment'></div>五世祖镠，号武肃王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173328_comment'></div>高祖元瓘，文穆王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173328_comment'></div>曾祖俨，昭化军节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173328_comment'></div>祖昭慈，赠左卫将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173328_comment'></div>考顺之，左侍禁、閤门祗候，赠尚书刑部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173328_comment'></div>公应说书进士、贤良方正能直言极谏，皆中其科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173328_comment'></div>历宣州旌德县尉、大理寺丞、殿中丞、太常博士，尚书祠部、度支、司封员外郎，工部郎中，换朝奉大夫，充国子监直讲、编校集贤院书籍，迁秘阁校理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173328_comment'></div>选为修英宗实录院检讨官，直舍人院，同修起居注，遂知制诰，直学士院，迁枢密直学士、翰林侍读学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173328_comment'></div>尝通判秀州，知婺州，入判尚书考功，改开封府判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173328_comment'></div>出知邓州，入判尚书吏部流内铨，兼判集贤院，又兼判礼部，权知开封府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173328_comment'></div>数请去，得知审官东院，兼判军器监，兼提举司天监公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173328_comment'></div>公幼孤，家贫母嫁，既长，还依其族之大人，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173328", 1173328, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>刻励</span>就学，并日夜，忘寝食，于书无所不治，已通其大旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173328_comment'></div>至于分章别句、类数辨名、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173328", 1173328, "Clauses/50/Comments/2")'>丛细</span>委曲，无不究尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173328_comment'></div>其见于文辞，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173328", 1173328, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>闳放</span>隽伟，故出而与天下之士挟其所有，较于有司，常出众上，以其故名动一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173328_comment'></div>其为尉，及为秀、婺、邓州，皆有治行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173328_comment'></div>秀州击奸仆强，果于力行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173328_comment'></div>婺、邓更革弛坏，理具设张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173328_comment'></div>为直讲，以能教诱，学者归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173328_comment'></div>为校理，属英宗之初，慈圣光献皇后听政，公三上书请还政天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173328_comment'></div>为吏部，谨绳墨，选者称其平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173328_comment'></div>为开封，以慈恕简静为体，不求智名，以投世取显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173328_comment'></div>为公属者，有不与公合，然公遇之未尝有厚薄意，士以此多公，而为公属者，后卒亦心服也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173328_comment'></div>公于众不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173328", 1173328, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>矫矫</span>为异，亦不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173328", 1173328, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>翕翕</span>为同，以其故，人莫能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173328", 1173328, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>亲疏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173328_comment'></div>至于利势之际，人所竞逐，公方陨然，迹与众远，故虽有夸者，亦不以公为可忌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173328_comment'></div>公之为判官也，府尝有狱，或探大臣意，谓欲有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173328", 1173328, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>附致</span>，公不为动，徐论其意而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173328_comment'></div>公平居乐易，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1173328", 1173328, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>崖岸</span>，及至有所特立，人固有所不能及者，类如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173328_comment'></div>公为人谨畏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1173328", 1173328, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>清约</span>，与人交淡然，久而后知其笃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173328_comment'></div>公之先，既藉疆土归天子，其后至昭化，守和州，十有八年以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173328_comment'></div>诏葬和州，子孙因家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173328_comment'></div>至公，始葬其母于苏州吴县龙冈村之天平山，故今又为苏州人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173328_comment'></div>公讳藻，字纯老，封仁和县开国伯，赐服金紫，年六十有一，元丰五年正月庚寅卒于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173328_comment'></div>某年某月某甲子葬天平山，从其母永嘉郡太君丁氏之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173328_comment'></div>公妻孙氏，泰兴县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173328_comment'></div>男曰某、曰某，蚤世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173328_comment'></div>曰皞，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173328_comment'></div>孙曰某，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173328_comment'></div>公卒，上驰使临视其家，知其贫，特赐钱五十万，而官其弟若子孙凡三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173328_comment'></div>公与余尝为僚，相善，其且殁，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1173328", 1173328, "Clauses/143/Comments/0")'>遗事</span>属余，而其家因来乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173328_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1173328'>钱姓武王，五世之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173328_comment'></div>开迹东南，以学以文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173328_comment'></div>学则知经，文则能赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173328_comment'></div>矧曰方闻，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1173328", 1173328, "Clauses/153/Comments/0")'>扬声</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1173328", 1173328, "Clauses/153/Comments/1")'>天路</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173328_comment'></div>乃校中书，乃掌帝制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173328_comment'></div>乃列禁林，从容讽议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173328_comment'></div>治己伊何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173328_comment'></div>维直而清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173328_comment'></div>治人伊何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173328_comment'></div>维简而平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173328_comment'></div>人以怒迁，公能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1173328", 1173328, "Clauses/163/Comments/0")'>自克</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173328_comment'></div>人以利回，公能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1173328", 1173328, "Clauses/165/Comments/0")'>不惑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173328_comment'></div>士夫所望，天子所器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173328_comment'></div>胡不百年，胡不三事！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173328_comment'></div>龙冈之宅，考卜维新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173328_comment'></div>公安于此，尚利后人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1173328_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩在史馆夙夜讨论，将《三朝国史》先加考详。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩作《拟辞免修<五朝国史>状》<div id='poem_1173037' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173037' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173037?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟辞免修五朝国史状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173037")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173037_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173037'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173037'>右，臣去年八月伏奉敕命，充史馆修撰，又奉圣旨专典史事，且将三朝国史先加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>考详</span>，候两朝史了日，一处修定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173037_comment'></div>又于延和殿伏蒙面谕所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>任属</span>臣之意，臣是以祗服圣恩，不敢辞避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173037_comment'></div>天下皆知臣居此职，出自主知，以为荣遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173037_comment'></div>况臣以至孤至远之迹，出深忌积毁之馀，独蒙明主知而用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173037_comment'></div>且自古以来，天下之士不遇者多矣，如臣遭遇者无几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173037_comment'></div>则臣捐草茅之躯，以报天地之德，固其分也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173037_comment'></div>至于效其区区之愚，岂足为陛下道哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173037_comment'></div>况以文字薄技，得因圣宋之大典，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>托名</span>万世，学士大夫莫不愿备其任，而独臣之愚，幸预采择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173037_comment'></div>此臣所以穷日夜，惫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>精思</span>，不敢忘须臾，志在于斯文，惟恐不称其任，以负陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>任属</span>之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173037_comment'></div>自到局以来，仰遵圣训，且将三朝国史，先加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>考详</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173037_comment'></div>伏见祖宗以来，神功圣德，巍巍之烈，至于历世将相，文武士吏，言行声实，殊尤之迹，至高至大，已非愚臣所能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>究尽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173037_comment'></div>况两朝国史，臣所未见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173037_comment'></div>窃惟五世百有馀年，圣贤事业，本末闳大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173037_comment'></div>臣之浅薄，加以齿发衰晚，诚恐不能发明论次，以称陛下显扬褒大之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173037_comment'></div>虚食大官，汗青无日，以负陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>任属</span>之意，此臣之所大惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173037_comment'></div>况五朝旧史，皆累世公相卿士、道德文学、朝廷宗工所共<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/63/Comments/2")'>准裁</span>，既已勒成，为国大典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173037_comment'></div>臣以至孤至远之迹，出深忌积毁之馀，材质驽下，岂宜辄议损益？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173037_comment'></div>使臣仰恃日月之照，不知自任之妄，贪慕恩待，趣之以就事，诚恐黑白不当，律吕失次，方于旧史有失无得，以负陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>任属</span>之意，此又臣之所大惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173037_comment'></div>若不早具上陈，自求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>罢退</span>，至于岁月<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173037", 1173037, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>寖久</span>，不职之罪已不可逃，虽欲乞身，已无可及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173037_comment'></div>是以不避万死之责，敢干圣听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173037_comment'></div>伏望出自圣慈，察臣悃愊，罢臣史事，别与臣一差遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173037_comment'></div>臣之昏愚不肖，固已尽在陛下听察之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173037_comment'></div>如蒙终赐收怜，别加驱策，顾臣之鄙，奉令承诏，可幸无罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173037_comment'></div>则碎首捐躯，固臣之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173037_comment'></div>以此明臣之志在于量能知分，非敢茍且避事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173037_comment'></div>伏惟陛下天地父母，哀而怜之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1173037_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩草创《隆平集》二十卷。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年4月</a>　曾巩擢试中书舍人，赐服金紫，不使入谢，使谕就职。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩作《辞中书舍人状》<div id='poem_1173032' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173032' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173032?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞中书舍人状<span class='inlineComment2'>（閤门告报有旨更不得辞免，不曾上）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173032")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173032_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173032'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173032'>右，臣准閤门告报，蒙恩授臣中书舍人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173032_comment'></div>窃以唐虞三代之君，兴造政事，爵德官能之际，所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173032", 1173032, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>播告</span>天下，训齐百工，必有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173032", 1173032, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>诏号</span>令命之文，达其施为建立之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173032_comment'></div>皆择当世聪明<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173032", 1173032, "Clauses/10/Comments/1")'>隽乂</span>、工于言语文学之臣，使之敷扬演畅，被于简册，以行之四方，垂之万世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173032_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173032", 1173032, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>理化</span>所出，其具在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173032_comment'></div>至其已久，而谋谟访问，三《盘》五《诰》誓命之书，列之为经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173032_comment'></div>后世学者得而宗之，师生相传，为载籍首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173032_comment'></div>吟诵寻绎，以求其归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173032_comment'></div>一有发明，皆为世教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173032_comment'></div>盖其大体所系如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173032_comment'></div>逮至汉兴，虽不能比迹三代致治之隆，而诰令下者，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173032", 1173032, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>典正</span>谨严，尚为近古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173032_comment'></div>自斯已后，岂独彝伦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173032", 1173032, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>秕斁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173032_comment'></div>其推而行之，载于名命，亦皆文字浅陋，无可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173032", 1173032, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>观采</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173032_comment'></div>唐之文章尝盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173032_comment'></div>当时之士，若常衮、杨炎、元稹之属，号能为训辞，今其文尚存，亦未有远过人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173032_comment'></div>然则号令文采，自汉而降，未有及古，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173032", 1173032, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>理化</span>之具，不其阙欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173032_comment'></div>伏惟陛下以天纵之圣，阐明道术，所以作则垂宪，纪官正名，皆上追三王，下陋汉唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173032_comment'></div>至于出口肆笔，发为德音，固已独造精微，不可穷测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173032_comment'></div>则于代言之任，岂易属人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173032_comment'></div>臣浅薄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173032", 1173032, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>闇瞀</span>，学朽材下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173032_comment'></div>误蒙陛下知之于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173032", 1173032, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>摈排</span>忌疾之中，收之于弃捐流落之地，属之史事，已惧瘝官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173032_comment'></div>至于推度圣意，讨论润色，以次为谟训，彰示海内，兹事至大，岂臣所堪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173032_comment'></div>况侍从之官，实备顾问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173032_comment'></div>而臣齿发已衰，心志<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173032", 1173032, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>昏塞</span>，岂独施于翰墨，惧非其任，至于谋猷献纳，尤不逮人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173032_comment'></div>伏望博选于朝，旁及疏远，必有殊绝特出之材，能副圣神奖拔之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173032_comment'></div>所有授臣恩命，乞赐寝罢。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1173032_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩作《授中书舍人举刘攽自代状》<div id='poem_1173033' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173033' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173033?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授中书舍人举刘攽自代状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173033")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173033_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173033'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173033'>蒙恩授前件官，准编敕节文，知杂御史已上授讫，许举官自代者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173033_comment'></div>右谨具如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173033_comment'></div>臣伏见朝奉大夫、充集贤校理、知亳州刘攽，广览载籍，强记洽闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173033_comment'></div>求之辈流，罕有伦比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173033_comment'></div>臣窃以谓引拔众材，弥纶世务，至于博学之士，固宜用在朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173033_comment'></div>况今圣质高明，究极今古，凡在左右当备顾问之臣，尤须多识前载，然后能称其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173033_comment'></div>如攽所长，实允兹选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173033_comment'></div>况攽累历州郡，治行可称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173033_comment'></div>至于文辞，亦足观采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173033_comment'></div>兼此众美，臣实不如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173033_comment'></div>今举自代，谨具状奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173033_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩作《回人贺授舍人状》<div id='poem_1173127' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173127' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173127?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回人贺授舍人状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173127")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173127_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173127'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173127'>右巩启：叨奉制恩，进登词掖，误蒙任属，私积兢惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173127_comment'></div>巩器识少通，性资多蔽，非有为人之学，徒坚好古之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173127_comment'></div>矧齿发之已衰，困风波而且久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173127_comment'></div>晚逢真主，独赐重知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173127_comment'></div>取于寡与之中，假以逾涯之宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173127_comment'></div>甫专史笔，遂掌训辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173127_comment'></div>惟清切之近班，实论思之要地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173127_comment'></div>方惊冒处，良用㥏颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173127_comment'></div>未遑削牍之勤，遽辱腾书之贶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173127_comment'></div>其为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173127", 1173127, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>感佩</span>，曷罄敷陈。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1173127_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩为制辞，辞约义尽，神宗数称其典雅。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩作《朝退即事呈大尹正仲龙图》<div id='poem_220287' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220287' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220287?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝退即事呈大尹正仲龙图</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220287")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220287_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220287'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220287'>六街尘断早凉生，细葛含风体更清。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220287'>官府吏闲时乐易，市廛人喜政和平。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220287'>挥金蔌蔌宫槐蕊，鸣玉淙淙御水声。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220287'>观阙渐迎初日上，马头还傍绿阴行。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220287'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220287_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩为中书舍人，性矜汰，多於傲忽。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　秦观就学于曾巩。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩有制诰拟词二百三十二首，诏四首，策三首。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩草韩维诰词，不称神宗意，神宗令改命词。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩作《论中书录黄画黄舍人不书检札子》<div id='poem_1173000' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173000' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173000?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论中书录黄画黄舍人不书检劄子<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰五年七月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173000")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173000_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173000'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173000'>臣初掌书命，中书吏以录黄画黄并检赴臣签书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173000_comment'></div>其检，中书舍人称臣书名，而侍郎押字，至录黄画黄，然后侍郎舍人皆称臣书名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173000_comment'></div>臣曾巡厅，言检草舍人称臣书名，而侍郎押字，恐于理尚有未尽，且录黄画黄并检，一体相须而成，当书之官，未有可以一书一否也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173000_comment'></div>况录黄画黄，侍郎、舍人皆称臣书名者，事君之体固然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173000_comment'></div>其检，舍人不书，欲以为别异执政乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173000_comment'></div>则录黄画黄并检，一体相须而成，事君之体，于例当一，一书之间，方其严上，则未有可以复伸下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173000_comment'></div>伏寻故事，中书舍人分押尚书六曹，天下众务无不关决，其各执所见，谓之五花判事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173000_comment'></div>故唐太宗尝谓侍臣曰：「中书、门下，机要之司，诏敕有不便者，皆须执论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173000_comment'></div>比来遂无一言驳论，若惟书诏敕、行文书而已，人谁不堪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173000_comment'></div>今舍人不押六曹，惟掌书命，而事干书命者，又不书检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173000_comment'></div>窃寻故事，未有可据而然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173000_comment'></div>或谓事干书命者，有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173000", 1173000, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>除改</span>行遣因依，故舍人不当书检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173000_comment'></div>然向来书检已连<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173000", 1173000, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>除改</span>因依，况<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173000", 1173000, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>除改</span>因依，参于典故，即无舍人不得预闻之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173000_comment'></div>臣详本朝之制，官司佐属，盖有得书检而不得书行移文字者，未有得书行移文字而不得书检者，此又于理可疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173000_comment'></div>臣固非欲书检也，顾缘职分，不敢茍止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173000_comment'></div>伏乞考详理体，断自圣裁，令臣得以遵守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173000_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1173000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173000'><span class='label'>按：</span>元丰五年七月。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173000_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩作《代皇子免延安郡王第一表》<div id='poem_1172975' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172975' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172975?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代皇子免延安郡王第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172975")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172975_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172975'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172975'>伏奉制命，蒙恩特授臣检校太尉、开府仪同三司、充彰武军节度使、进封延安郡王者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172975_comment'></div>宠逾于德，愧甚于荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172975_comment'></div>辄露危诚，仰干睿听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172975_comment'></div>臣某诚惶诚恐，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172975_comment'></div>窃以衮衣备物，礼均<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1172975", 1172975, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>上宰</span>之崇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172975_comment'></div>土宇分封，位列真王之贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172975_comment'></div>非智能足以谋国，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1172975", 1172975, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>劳烈</span>足以及人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172975_comment'></div>属在休明，讵容<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1172975", 1172975, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>玷冒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172975_comment'></div>若臣者侗然固陋，眇尔稚蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172975_comment'></div>虽甫逮胜衣，习为容于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1172975", 1172975, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>趋拜</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172975_comment'></div>而方思就傅，赖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1172975", 1172975, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>齿学</span>之渐磨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172975_comment'></div>庶几识古今之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1172975", 1172975, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>通方</span>，知国家之大体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172975_comment'></div>施于为己，可以持循；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172975_comment'></div>必也当官，觊无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1172975", 1172975, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>违旷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172975_comment'></div>已叨分于将钺，复误假于公圭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172975_comment'></div>虚冒鸿私，未伸薄效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172975_comment'></div>敢图<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1172975", 1172975, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>奖渥</span>，荐及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1172975", 1172975, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>谫微</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172975_comment'></div>视<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1172975", 1172975, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>仪数</span>于三台，超爵名于五等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172975_comment'></div>既加真食，仍益爰田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172975_comment'></div>固非录善而量能，又异校劳而数最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172975_comment'></div>将安称此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172975_comment'></div>自顾缺然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172975_comment'></div>而况皇帝陛下处父子之间，常先<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1172975", 1172975, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>义训</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172975_comment'></div>在君臣之际，每徇公言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172975_comment'></div>伏望察臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1172975", 1172975, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>精恳</span>之由衷，不顾小嫌之反汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1172975_comment'></div>许还新命，俯遂微情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1172975_comment'></div>使臣得奉定省于晨昏，稍安幼志；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1172975_comment'></div>报生成于天地，更待壮年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1172975_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1172975_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩作《代皇子免延安郡王第二表》<div id='poem_1172976' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172976' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172976?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代皇子免延安郡王第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172976")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172976_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172976'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172976'>伏蒙圣慈，以臣所上表陈乞，蒙恩授臣检校太尉、开府仪同三司、充彰武军节度使、进封延安郡王，特赐批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172976_comment'></div>辄布愚衷，未回宸听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172976_comment'></div>仰窥诲谕，弥集兢惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172976_comment'></div>臣某诚惶诚恐，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172976_comment'></div>窃以明德懿亲，在天功而有助；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172976_comment'></div>隆名重器，为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1172976", 1172976, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>国论</span>之所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172976_comment'></div>然后材位不浮，望实相称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172976_comment'></div>若臣者夙依<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1172976", 1172976, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>煦育</span>，生处深严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172976_comment'></div>虽无好弄之心，甫逮垂髫之齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172976_comment'></div>方图讲学，知臣子之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1172976", 1172976, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>大方</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172976_comment'></div>庶得周旋，奉君亲之素教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172976_comment'></div>敢意靡缘绩用，荐被宠灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172976_comment'></div>遂兼将相之荣，仍极王公之贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172976_comment'></div>虽参诸邦典，或故事之可循；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172976_comment'></div>而质以人情，实烦言之可畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172976_comment'></div>顾兹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1172976", 1172976, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>冲昧</span>，尤积震惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172976_comment'></div>伏况皇帝陛下新一代之彝章，革千年之流弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172976_comment'></div>方循名而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1172976", 1172976, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>责课</span>，以官方而任人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172976_comment'></div>其于明信赏之科，必先于近；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172976_comment'></div>然则推至公之谊，宜始于臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172976_comment'></div>惟特寝于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1172976", 1172976, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>误恩</span>，可曲全于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1172976", 1172976, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>拙分</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172976_comment'></div>使乾坤之施，不累于私亲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172976_comment'></div>则尘露之微，庶几于报上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172976_comment'></div>臣不任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1172976_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩作《代皇子延安郡王谢表》<div id='poem_1172977' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172977' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172977?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代皇子延安郡王谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172977")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172977_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172977'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172977'>伏奉制命，除授臣检校太尉、开府仪同三司、充彰武军节度使、进封延安郡王，再奉表陈乞，蒙赐批答不允，仍断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172977_comment'></div>祗膺诏版，弥积腼颜，盖崇大于宗藩，以盛强于帝室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172977_comment'></div>岂伊奖渥，可假幼冲<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172977_comment'></div>伏念臣器匪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1172977", 1172977, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>夙成</span>，材无特异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172977_comment'></div>徒归依于鞠育，每亲炙于高明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172977_comment'></div>欲善在身，忘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1172977", 1172977, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>髧髦</span>之至弱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172977_comment'></div>知书可学，慕佔毕之相从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172977_comment'></div>庶繇受教于童蒙，觊获成能于壮大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172977_comment'></div>敢意揽攸司之密启，循历世之彝章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172977_comment'></div>宠以官仪，体均于丞弼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172977_comment'></div>殊其爵列，秩右于公侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172977_comment'></div>揣称何堪，逾涯已甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172977_comment'></div>知隆名之难冒，迫大号之既行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172977_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1172977", 1172977, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>控避</span>莫从，震惶滋集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172977_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下心潜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1172977", 1172977, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>高厚</span>，智极精微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172977_comment'></div>推广爱之仁，以隆于父子；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172977_comment'></div>尽大公之义，以笃于君臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172977_comment'></div>故旧典之当行，虽至亲而莫间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172977_comment'></div>致兹异数，猥及谫能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172977_comment'></div>臣敢不仰体圣怀，勤遵慈训？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172977_comment'></div>省躬择术，庶不蹈于匪彝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172977_comment'></div>临事知方，或可收于近用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172977_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1172977_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: href='/Writing/1172978?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代皇子延安郡王谢皇太后表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1172978'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172978'>伏奉制命，除授臣检校太尉、开府仪同三司、充彰武军节度使、进封延安郡王，再奉表陈免，蒙赐批答不允，仍断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172978_comment'></div>窃以盛威仪于宰路，以重朝廷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172978_comment'></div>强形势于宗藩，用临方夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172978_comment'></div>宜兼奖渥，属在亲贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172978_comment'></div>误及幼冲，倍深兢㥏<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172978_comment'></div>伏念臣蒙休宸极，托荫慈闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172978_comment'></div>未窥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1172978", 1172978, class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172978_comment'></div>已尘高位，愧乏微劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172978_comment'></div>讵意仁恩，更崇命秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172978_comment'></div>抗等威于元宰，跻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1172978", 1172978, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>爵列</span>于真王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172978_comment'></div>自顾空疏，将安报称？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172978_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇太后殿下辅成世教，阴厚人伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172978_comment'></div>均至爱于诸孙，假馀光于稚齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172978_comment'></div>致兹异数，猥被谫能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172978_comment'></div>敢不自励童蒙，向慕日新之益；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172978_comment'></div>庶几壮大，仰酬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1172978", 1172978, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>坤育</span>之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172978_comment'></div>臣不任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1172979_comment'></div>假是幼冲，惧非宜称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172979_comment'></div>臣某以感以惧，叩头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172979_comment'></div>而臣无可录之劳能，冒非常之礼秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172979_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇后殿下弥纶内治，则象坤元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172979_comment'></div>敢不尽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1172979", 1172979, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>子职</span>之微勤，无忘砥砺；<div class='inline' href='/Writing/1173001?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请给中书舍人印及合与不合通签中书外省事劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173001")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173001_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173001'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173001'>臣检会中书外省，昨准门下省连到详定官制所状内事件，有合申明下项：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173001'>一、检会官制所元丰四年十月七日上殿劄子，元拟门下省印、给事中印，奉圣旨，门下省印、尚书省印、门下给事中印、中书舍人之印，尚书列曹，别具考定取旨，馀两省官并省务，并用给舍印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173001_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1173001'>臣今看详，通进司文字，既隶给事中，合使门下给事中印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173001_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1173001'>一、给事中厅状勘会，请到门下外省印，未委合于何处收掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173001_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1173001'>臣今看详，上件印，合系散骑常侍收掌，如阙，则以次官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173001_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1173001'>一、给事中厅状，四月二十九日准详定官制所发到状二件，为分拨人吏并院子事，各系申门下外省，今来未审系是何官书判施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173001_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1173001'>臣今看详，应申门下外省文字，合系本省散骑常侍以下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173001", 1173001, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>通签</span>书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173001_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1173001'>一、状后门下外省批已施行外，五月六日送中书外省施行讫，即却<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173001", 1173001, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>缴送</span>合属去处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173001_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1173001'>臣今看详，逐项事件，并只是指挥门下外省及给事中厅，其中书外省，虽准批送施行，即未有定制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173001_comment'></div>中书外省及舍人厅事务明降指挥，兼官制所状内一项，称两省官并省务并用给舍印<span class='inlineComment2'>（〔一〕）</span>，又一项称门下外省印，合系散骑常侍收掌，如阙，即以次官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173001_comment'></div>是则中书舍人及中书外省，各合有印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173001_comment'></div>今来已有中书外省印，其中书舍人之印，即未给到，未应得官制所状内元定指挥及右省官，除逐厅各有分职外，其外省事务，见今中书舍人与起居舍人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173001", 1173001, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>通签</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173001_comment'></div>若将来常侍以下至正言员足，消与未消，逐一<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173001", 1173001, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>通签</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173001_comment'></div>如不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173001", 1173001, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>通签</span>，即未审合系是何官书判施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173001_comment'></div>如合<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173001", 1173001, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>通签</span>，亦乞明降指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173001_comment'></div>右取进止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173001_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1173001'>〔贴黄〕今后因逐司申明立法，有与别司事体相同者，乞令便据逐司事务立条责免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173001_comment'></div>更有申请，重烦圣听，兼免逐司事体相同，施行不一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173001_comment'></div>如允臣所奏，乞立此条，令今后应干修条处并依此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173001_comment'></div>又舍人、谏官，旧各有印，盖缘本职文字，虑有事干机密，难就别官用印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173001_comment'></div>故事，中书舍人判省杂务。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1173001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173001'><span class='label'>《读书记》云：</span>「务」下疑尚有脱文。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173001_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　释道潜赠曾巩诗。作品：《赠子固舍人》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩在职百余日病。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　曾巩方復蔫陈师道，会以忧去，遂寝。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年9月</a>　曾巩丁母忧。<br /></div>
-----end

onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1172953", 1172953, "Clauses/10/Comments/3")'>玩思</span>《诗》《书》，无出伦之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1172953", 1172953, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>涉俗</span>之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1172953", 1172953, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>尘言</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172953_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1172953", 1172953, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>窃食</span>累朝，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1172953", 1172953, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>备官</span>儒馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172953_comment'></div>智非早悟，曾不习于人情；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172953_comment'></div>学匪兼通，固难堪于世用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172953_comment'></div>兹缘私请，得假善藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172953_comment'></div>惟八换于岁期，已四临于外服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172953_comment'></div>幸遇非常之主，未奉燕閒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172953_comment'></div>实当难得之时，独无称效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172953_comment'></div>傥获伸于肝膈，冀少益于毫分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172953_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下恭俭爱人，聪明好古，卑汉唐之近事，慕尧舜之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1172953", 1172953, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>远图</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172953_comment'></div>臣敢不上体圣心，勤修民政？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172953_comment'></div>奉行宽大，方尽瘁于兹时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172953_comment'></div>补助高深，庶纳忠于来日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172953_comment'></div>仰望旒扆，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173093_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173093'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173093'>伏念巩天与朴愚，众知凡近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173093_comment'></div>材不堪于施设，动辄乖宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173093_comment'></div>学多失于变通，理难<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173093", 1173093, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>应用</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173093_comment'></div>久与游于儒馆，仍有列于朝绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173093_comment'></div>适当千载之期，曾乏一毫之助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173093_comment'></div>既不能明国家远大之体，为上建言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173093_comment'></div>又未知究乡闾委曲之情，与民兴利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173093_comment'></div>七移岁序，四易外官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173093_comment'></div>坐尸禄廪之优，寂无称效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173093_comment'></div>幸属章程之备，得以持循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173093_comment'></div>兹蒙补郡之恩，俾遂便亲之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173093_comment'></div>望故乡而接壤，与仲弟以连城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173093_comment'></div>及是忝逾，出于假借。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173093_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官心存博爱，量极兼容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173093_comment'></div>簪履之微，未忘于旧物；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173093_comment'></div>陶钧之大，不间于孤生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173093_comment'></div>曲致公言，俾谐私计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173093_comment'></div>惟尽承流之分，庶裨造物之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173093_comment'></div>过此已还，未知所措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173093_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1173093_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　曾巩作《到任谢职司诸官员状》<div id='poem_1173121' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173121' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173121?labeling=true' target='_blank'>到任谢职司诸官员状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173121")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173121_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173121'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173121'>右巩启：比者祗命守邦，涓辰视事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173121_comment'></div>惟是孤蒙之质，幸依<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173121", 1173121, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>庇冒</span>之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173121_comment'></div>窃念巩才不逮人，学多泥古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173121_comment'></div>久备官于册府，徒窃食于累朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173121_comment'></div>兹假便藩，实缘私请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173121_comment'></div>伏遇某官<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173121", 1173121, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>体仁</span>为任，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173121", 1173121, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>充美</span>在躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173121_comment'></div>素自结于主知，方出宣于使指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173121_comment'></div>敛时利泽，播在东南；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173121_comment'></div>籍甚休声，洽于中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173121_comment'></div>顾忝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173121", 1173121, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>属城</span>之任，实谐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173121", 1173121, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>德宇</span>之依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173121_comment'></div>尚阻参承，但深欣忭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173121_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a id='poem_content_1173017'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173017'>右，臣伏奉敕命，就差权知洪州军州事、充江南西路兵马都钤辖，已发来赴任次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173017_comment'></div>今睹吕升卿授江西转运副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173017_comment'></div>伏缘臣先任齐州，得替后，吕升卿为京东路察访，于齐州多端非理，求臣过失，赖臣无可捃拾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173017_comment'></div>兼臣弟布与吕惠卿又有嫌隙，二事皆中外共知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173017_comment'></div>今升卿任江西监司，洪州在其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173017", 1173017, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>统属</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173017", 1173017, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>须至</span>陈乞回避，伏乞指挥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173017", 1173017, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>检会</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173017_comment'></div>臣先奏乞移洪州，或宣州，或东南一般州郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173017_comment'></div>臣为母亲见在饶州，迤逦前去饶州，伺候朝旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1173017_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172971")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172971_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172971'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172971'>观天察变，杓衡肇运于东方；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172971_comment'></div>颂朔授民，寰宇咸归于正统。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172971_comment'></div>臣诚欢诚庆，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172971_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下轸宪于俗，求端自天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172971_comment'></div>验厥麟经，重体元而居正；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172971_comment'></div>质诸牺《易》，贵治历以明时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172971_comment'></div>纵观精祲之原，密步盈虚之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172971_comment'></div>将布和于魏阙，顿颁令于侯邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172971_comment'></div>日月星辰，式谨四时之会；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172971_comment'></div>教条正朔，庶同万国之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172971_comment'></div>惟是遐封，亦被宠赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172971_comment'></div>敢不奉将天意，钦若人时，告诸庙而为号令之资，示于民而为农桑之务，用酬洪造，庶免旷官。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1172971_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173448_comment'></div>实繄慧荫，感慰舆情。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1173448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173448'><span
