href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　曾巩与王安石会于南昌，安石嗜佛书，欲讽之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　岁大疫，曾巩为储药物饮食，授病者，人赖以生。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　师出安南，道江西者，诏为万人备。曾巩前期而办，皆以条理，不以烦民。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　曾巩与弟曾布、曾肇聚会于洪州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　曾巩撰《寿安县君钱氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173353' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173353' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173353?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寿安县君钱氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁九年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173353")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173353_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173353'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173353'>刘凝之仕既龃龉，退处庐山之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173353_comment'></div>初无一亩之宅、一廛之田，而凝之嚣嚣然乐若有馀者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173353_comment'></div>岂独凝之能以义自胜哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173353_comment'></div>亦其妻能安于理，不戚戚于贫贱，有以相之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173353_comment'></div>凝之晚有宅于彭蠡之上，有田于西涧之滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173353_comment'></div>子进于朝廷，荐于乡闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173353_comment'></div>凝之夫妇，康宁寿考，自肆于山川之间，白发皤然，体不知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173353", 1173353, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>驾乘</span>之劳，心不知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173353", 1173353, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>机擭</span>之畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173353_comment'></div>世人之所慕者无慊焉，世人之有所不能及者独得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173353_comment'></div>其夫妇如此，可不谓贤哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173353_comment'></div>熙宁九年，凝之年七十有七，哭其妻之丧，自为状，次其妻之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173353", 1173353, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>世出</span>行事来乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173353_comment'></div>予为之因其言而识之曰：夫人姓钱氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173353_comment'></div>考内殿崇班穆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173353_comment'></div>祖考内园使昭晟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173353_comment'></div>曾祖考宣德军节度使，同中书门下平章事湛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173353_comment'></div>高祖考吴越文穆王元瓘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173353_comment'></div>夫人色庄气仁，言动不失绳墨，居族人长幼亲疏间尽其宜，事夫能成其忠，教子能成其孝，是皆可传者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173353_comment'></div>夫人年七十有三，卒于四月之庚子，而葬于其岁某月某甲子，墓在南康军西城之某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173353_comment'></div>初以凝之恩封寿光县君，再以子恕恩封寿安县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173353_comment'></div>有子曰恕，秘书丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173353_comment'></div>曰格，乡贡进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173353_comment'></div>皆以文学显于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173353_comment'></div>女嫁进士徐彦伯、太子中允黄廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173353_comment'></div>孙某、某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173353_comment'></div>凝之名涣，筠州某人，今为尚书屯田员外郎致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173353_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1173353'>仕不茍合，安于贱贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173353_comment'></div>其难其豫，由媲有人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173353_comment'></div>维不终窭，又寿以康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173353_comment'></div>有续孔辰，既庶而臧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173353_comment'></div>世迫而求，独优以取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173353_comment'></div>世一以处，独肆而有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173353_comment'></div>士也则然，女实作辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173353_comment'></div>考则钱媛，尚配于古。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1173353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173353'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷四五。又见江西省博物馆藏拓片。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173353_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年6月</a>　六月，王安石子王雱卒，曾巩撰《祭王元泽文》<div id='poem_1173406' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173406' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173406?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭王元泽文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173406")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173406_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173406'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173406'>自周为秦，六艺散亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173406_comment'></div>泯泯纷纷，更汉终唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173406_comment'></div>诐行淫辞，悖离经常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173406_comment'></div>天生相君，典领斯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173406_comment'></div>笃生我公，达观博闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173406_comment'></div>左右元后，遂迪天民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173406_comment'></div>皇帝曰咨！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173406_comment'></div>汝实大器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173406_comment'></div>方见相君，汝嗣讲求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173406_comment'></div>辅训厥遗，以悟后觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173406_comment'></div>三年书成，赐在太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173406_comment'></div>皇帝曰俞，道废千年，乃昭于今，亦推汝贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173406_comment'></div>汝登龙图，以对文功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173406_comment'></div>公孙不居，道则弥冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173406_comment'></div>昔者孔孟，子实克嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173406_comment'></div>韶向被凿，自为问异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173406_comment'></div>问时述作，惟我公是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173406_comment'></div>道德之泽，遂及后然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173406_comment'></div>呜呼公才，其得自天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173406_comment'></div>不自彫携，其中塞渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173406_comment'></div>湛然清明，毁文言不惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173406_comment'></div>出没纵横，渊默雷声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173406_comment'></div>我意彼天，以继有为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173406_comment'></div>命难谌哉，而不耆之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173406_comment'></div>己酉讣闻，皇帝曰吁！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173406_comment'></div>天与汝能，圣女衡枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173406_comment'></div>今其亡矣，人孰助予？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173406_comment'></div>吾岂能忘，赠谏大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173406_comment'></div>相君白首，陨涕悲创。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173406_comment'></div>归公朝夕，曰予天丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173406_comment'></div>某等备数胶庠，辱赐则深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173406_comment'></div>闻问恻然，疾首薰心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173406_comment'></div>循祭以辞，其或来归。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1173406_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　曾巩撰《太子宾客致仕陈公神道碑铭》<div id='poem_1173321' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173321' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173321?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太子宾客致仕陈公神道碑铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁九年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173321")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173321_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173321'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173321'>太子宾客致仕陈公既葬，其孤聃与其宗亲属人谋曰：公殁，所以原大追功，既有太史之状，幽宅之铭，维墓道有碑，可以明著公之休德遗泽，章视万世，以假宠陈氏之子孙于无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173321_comment'></div>而其辞未立，于谊谓何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173321_comment'></div>乃相与来请于余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173321_comment'></div>余辞不能，既不获，乃论具公胄出位序行治之实，以为碑辞，而属之以铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173321_comment'></div>其辞曰：惟陈氏，其先虞舜之后，封于陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173321_comment'></div>春秋时陈灭入楚，其子孙以国为氏，世为显姓，见于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173321", 1173321, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>记录</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173321_comment'></div>至公之先，始家南康军之星子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173321_comment'></div>至公，又家江州之德化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173321_comment'></div>曰知脱三字，公曾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173321", 1173321, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>祖考</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173321_comment'></div>曰彦璩，公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173321", 1173321, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>祖考</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173321_comment'></div>曰累赠礼部尚书俊，公考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173321_comment'></div>公讳巽，字公顺，祥符八年进士及第，历常州团练推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173321_comment'></div>盗有弃财走者，公以谓不应死，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173321", 1173321, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>通判</span>不肯用公言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173321_comment'></div>是时，公起家少年，及遇事坚争，不可夺其守，老吏皆惊，盗卒得不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173321_comment'></div>以尚书忧去位，服除，补武安军节度推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173321_comment'></div>侍御史李偕守武安，事倚公决，州赖以治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173321_comment'></div>转运使陈从易以公为材，狱有久不决者，皆属公治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173321_comment'></div>凡治二十四狱，人皆服其平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173321_comment'></div>以皇妣嘉兴郡太君冯氏忧去位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173321_comment'></div>服除，补岳州军事判官，举监潭州茶米仓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173321_comment'></div>天圣初，潭州茶课视景德亏十之六，公谨于绳吏，而果于去民之所素不便者，茶视旧课岁增九百万斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173321_comment'></div>用荐者改秘书省著作佐郎、知吉州庐陵县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173321_comment'></div>庐陵人喜斗讼，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173321", 1173321, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>械系</span>常充县庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173321_comment'></div>公除其害政者，人心大变，月馀，囹圄空虚，而人自得田里之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173321_comment'></div>枢密副使姜遵尝为庐陵，民便之，至是，有「前姜后陈」之谚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173321_comment'></div>移知资州资阳县，迁秘书丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173321_comment'></div>用荐者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1173321", 1173321, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>通判</span>戎州，州将武人，以州任属公，民夷允附，政以大和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173321_comment'></div>迁太常博士、尚书屯田员外郎，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1173321", 1173321, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>通判</span>潭州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173321_comment'></div>溪洞诸蛮犯约，知州事刘夔、刘沆继出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173321", 1173321, "Clauses/91/Comments/1")'>行边</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173321_comment'></div>公实总州任，内修民事，外奉师费，凡输粟帛金钱四十有八万，兵械称之，用足于军，而赋役不加于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173321_comment'></div>沆及荆南王居白、岳州滕宗谅与湖南北部使，凡十有二人，请即用公为转运判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173321_comment'></div>会转运判官废，故不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173321_comment'></div>迁都官员外郎，知抚州，恩信行部中，奸强扰服，贫细得其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173321_comment'></div>迁职方员外郎，明堂恩迁屯田郎中，赐服金紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173321_comment'></div>去，知安州，以宽静顺其俗，教民通沟洫，趋农桑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173321_comment'></div>迁都官郎中，知蜀州，大兴学校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173321_comment'></div>迁职方郎中、太常少卿、知蕲州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173321_comment'></div>居半岁，以目疾请老，迁光禄卿致仕，始家江州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173321_comment'></div>英宗即位，迁秘书监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173321_comment'></div>今上即位，迁太子宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173321_comment'></div>公少长闾巷，能自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1173321", 1173321, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>感发</span>，强志力学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173321_comment'></div>为进士，一出遂收其科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173321_comment'></div>为吏明悟敏捷，见义敢为，不少屈以求合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173321_comment'></div>盖从事于州郡，久之不进，而其志弥厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173321_comment'></div>其治，于恶人无所贷，至其过失，则无所不容，而于善人，惟恐失其所也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173321_comment'></div>遇人豁然，不为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1173321", 1173321, "Clauses/147/Comments/0")'>畦疃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173321_comment'></div>于其所长，未尝不荐藉成就之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173321_comment'></div>于其急难与贫不能自存者，未尝不赈而助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173321_comment'></div>公既好学，至于声音星历之伎，无所不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173321_comment'></div>及退而自休，日使家人诵书，常数千言，危坐听之，未尝有倦色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173321_comment'></div>江于东南为水陆之冲，宾客日凑，公广于招纳，与之酾酒高会，弹琴赋诗，曰：「是足以佚吾老也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173321_comment'></div>及间而言天下之事，于其是非得失之际，慨然奋励，少者有所不能及，闻其言者，莫不壮其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173321_comment'></div>少客京师，有欲教公以化黄金者，公辞不受，教公以寡欲，乃受而行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173321_comment'></div>盖出事天子四十有八年，退老于家又十有五年，年八十馀，饮食倍人，仪状甚伟，声音满堂，进拜公于前者，不知其已老也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173321_comment'></div>前终十馀年，自为冢于南康军星子县白鹿原，距尚书之兆千有八百步，棺椁衣衾，皆豫自制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173321_comment'></div>属疾至终，容止如常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1173321_comment'></div>遗言里中亲疏，各尽其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1173321_comment'></div>享年八十有五，殁于熙宁九年五月壬申，葬以是年八月壬寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1173321_comment'></div>累阶至朝散大夫，勋至上柱国，封至颍川郡开国侯，食邑至一千二百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1173321_comment'></div>娶张氏，尚书屯田员外郎诩之女，封清河县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1173321_comment'></div>再娶王氏，尚书都官员外郎告之女，封同安郡君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1173321_comment'></div>子男二人，曰耆，太庙室长，有易疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1173321_comment'></div>次即聃也，守江州瑞昌县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1173321_comment'></div>女五人，嫁太常博士文劝、进士吴骘、光禄寺丞曾轸、进士陶舜仪、吉州庐陵县主簿薛缝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1173321_comment'></div>孙男一人，曰瑰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1173321_comment'></div>女三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1173321_comment'></div>聃承德袭教，能世其家者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1173321_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_67_1173321'>允穆陈公，学繇自力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1173321_comment'></div>收科于少，其髦维特。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1173321_comment'></div>于陪于贰，懿其壮画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1173321_comment'></div>于附于颛，焯其伟绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1173321_comment'></div>驱之磔之，于其蝥贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1173321_comment'></div>膏之妪之，于其黍稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1173321_comment'></div>彼疾而驰，我徐不亟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1173321_comment'></div>宁无尔谐，不渝我则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1173321_comment'></div>于郎于卿，进皆以序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1173321_comment'></div>疾集于微，乃谢而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1173321_comment'></div>乃长书省，乃宾宫朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1173321_comment'></div>宠则日跻，身焉逍遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1173321_comment'></div>世狠而争，公裕有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1173321_comment'></div>世惴而持，公恬处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1173321_comment'></div>公有宾事，鼓瑟吹竽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1173321_comment'></div>公退燕私，左《诗》右《书》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1173321_comment'></div>年则大耄，气盖坐人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1173321_comment'></div>笑谈待终，曾不嚬呻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1173321_comment'></div>有岿墓隧，丰碑螭首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1173321_comment'></div>勒辞告休，尚慰尔后。</div><div id='poem_sentence_86_1173321_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　曾巩作《送英州苏秘丞》<div id='poem_220249' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220249' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220249?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送英州苏秘丞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220249")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220249_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220249'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220249'>远民歌舞戴升平，碧阁朱楼照眼明。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220249_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220249'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220249", 220249, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>乡馔</span>雨馀收白蕈，客樽秋后对红英。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220249_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220249'>泷鸣浈水遥通海，路入南山不隔城。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220249_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220249'>材术如君有馀暇，出游应数拥双旌。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220249_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220249'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220249_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年10月</a>　十月从兄曾庠卒，十一月葬，曾巩撰《秘书省著作佐郎致仕曾君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173379' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173379' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173379?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秘书省著作佐郎致仕曾君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁九年十一月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173379")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173379_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173379'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173379'>君姓曾氏，讳庠，字明升，建昌军南丰县人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173379_comment'></div>曾祖讳某，尚书水部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173379_comment'></div>祖讳某，尚书户部郎中、直史馆、赠右谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173379_comment'></div>考讳某，舒州军事推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173379_comment'></div>君进士及第，历邵州司理参军，用荐者为衡州常宁县令、福州福清县丞，以疾自陈，迁秘书省著作佐郎致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173379_comment'></div>卒于熙宁九年十月某甲子，年五十有九，以其年十一月某甲子葬南丰龙池乡之源头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173379_comment'></div>母吴氏，妻黄氏、朱氏，有子曰扩，曰某，曰某，女四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173379_comment'></div>君少孤，自感励好学，能文章，为人聪明敏达，喜事有大志，不肯少屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173379_comment'></div>为吏以材称，治狱能尽其情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173379_comment'></div>为令丞，易敝兴坏，纲纪具修，吏不敢犯，而民安之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173379_comment'></div>有声显闻，荐者自许得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173379_comment'></div>不幸不寿，不克尽其用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173379_comment'></div>将葬，扩来告曰：「愿有纪也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173379_comment'></div>乃为其铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1173379'>发其华，见于文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173379_comment'></div>收其实，见于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173379_comment'></div>于其小，绰有闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173379_comment'></div>于其卓，屈不试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173379_comment'></div>尚不没，慰后昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173379_comment'></div>矢以辞，列幽隧。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1173379_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　曾巩撰《王容季墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173332' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173332' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173332?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王容季墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173332")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173332_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173332'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173332'>容季王氏，讳囧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173332_comment'></div>其先太原人，中徙河南，其后自光州之固始徙福州之侯官，徙侯官者五世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173332_comment'></div>曾大父讳廷铭，仕闽王为安远军使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173332_comment'></div>大父讳居政，赠秘书丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173332_comment'></div>考讳平，为侍御史，葬颍州之汝阴，故今为汝阴人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173332_comment'></div>容季嘉祐六年进士及第，主蔡州之新蔡簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173332_comment'></div>治平某年某月某甲子卒于家，年三十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173332_comment'></div>熙宁某年某月某甲子，葬汝阴旌义乡众乂营侍御府君之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173332_comment'></div>母曾氏，金华县君，尚书刑部郎中、集贤殿修撰、赠太师、中书令兼尚书令、某国公某之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173332_comment'></div>妻贾氏，尚书司门郎中昌期之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173332_comment'></div>男女二人，男曰某，始若干岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173332_comment'></div>容季孝悌纯笃，尤能刻意学问，自少已能为文章，尤长于叙事，其所为文，出辄惊人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173332_comment'></div>为人自重，不驰骋衒鬻，亦不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173332", 1173332, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>孑孑</span>为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173332_comment'></div>日与其兄讲唐虞孔子之道，以求其内，言行出处，常择义而动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173332_comment'></div>其磨砻涵养而不止者，吾未能量其所至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173332_comment'></div>不幸其志未就，其材未试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173332_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173332", 1173332, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>短命</span>死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173332_comment'></div>初，容季之伯兄回深甫，以道义文学退而家居，学者所崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173332_comment'></div>而仲兄向子直亦以文学器识名闻当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173332_comment'></div>容季又所立如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173332_comment'></div>学士大夫以谓此三人者皆世不常有，藉令有之，或出于燕，或出于越，又不可以得之一乡一国也，未有同时并出，出于一家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173332_comment'></div>如此之盛，若将使之有为也，而不幸辄死，皆不得至于寿考，以尽其材，是有命矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173332_comment'></div>而命之至于如此，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173332_comment'></div>初，子直之遗文，深甫属予序之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173332_comment'></div>数年，又叙深甫之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173332_comment'></div>复数年耳，而容季葬有日，其仲兄固子坚又属予铭其墓，而且将叙其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173332_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173332_comment'></div>非其可哀也夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173332_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1173332'>学足以求其内，辞足以达其外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173332_comment'></div>守之用刚，养之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1173332", 1173332, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>用晦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173332_comment'></div>如泉之进，如木之升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173332_comment'></div>奄焉以止，不究其成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173332_comment'></div>维友作诗，以永厥声。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1173332_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　曾巩作《王容季文集序》》<div id='poem_1173156' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173156' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173156?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王容季文集序<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁九年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173156")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173156_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173156'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173156'>叙事莫如《书》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173156_comment'></div>其在《尧典》，述命羲和宅土，测日晷星候气，揆民缓急，兼蛮夷鸟兽，其财成辅相，备三才万物之理，以治百官，授万民，兴众功，可谓博矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173156_comment'></div>然其言不过数十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173156_comment'></div>其于《舜典》则曰：「在璿玑玉衡，以齐七政」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173156_comment'></div>盖尧之时，观天以历象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173156_comment'></div>至舜，又察之以玑衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173156_comment'></div>圣人之法，至后世益备也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173156_comment'></div>曰七者，则日月五星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173156_comment'></div>曰政者，则羲和之所治，无不在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173156_comment'></div>其体至大，盖一言而尽，可谓微矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173156_comment'></div>其言微，故学者所不得不尽心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173156_comment'></div>能尽心，然后能自得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173156_comment'></div>此所以为经，而历千馀年，盖能得之者少也，《易》、《诗》、《礼》、《春秋》、《论语》皆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173156_comment'></div>其曰测之而益深，穷之而益远，信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173156_comment'></div>世既衰，能言者益少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173156_comment'></div>承孔子者，孟子而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173156_comment'></div>承孟子者，扬子而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173156_comment'></div>扬子之称孟子曰：「知言之要，知德之奥」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173156_comment'></div>若扬子则亦足以几乎此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173156_comment'></div>其次能叙事，使可行于远者，若子夏、左丘明、司马迁、韩愈，亦可谓拔出之材，其言庶乎有益者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173156_comment'></div>吾友王氏兄弟，曰回深父，曰向子直，曰囧容季，皆善属文，长于叙事，深父尤深，而子直、容季，盖能称其兄者也，皆可谓拔出之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173156_comment'></div>令其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173156", 1173156, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>克寿</span>，得就其志，则将绍六艺之遗言，其可御哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173156_comment'></div>予尝叙深父、子直之文，铭容季之墓，而容季之兄固子坚，又集容季之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173156", 1173156, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>遗稿</span>，属予序之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173156_comment'></div>予悯俗之媮，朋友故旧道缺，不自知其不能，强次是说，以为容季文集序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173156_comment'></div>熙宁九年冬南昌郡斋。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1173156_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　曾巩建徐孺子祠堂，作《徐孺子祠堂记》<div id='poem_1173305' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173305' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173305?labeling=true' target='_blank'>徐孺子祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173305")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173305_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173305'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173305'>汉元兴以后，政出宦者，小人挟其威福，相煽为恶，中材顾望，不知所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173305_comment'></div>汉既失其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173305", 1173305, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>操柄</span>，纪纲大坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173305_comment'></div>然在位公卿大夫，多豪杰特起之士，相与发愤同心，直道正言，分别是非白黑，不少屈其意，至于不容，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173305", 1173305, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>织罗</span>钩党之狱起，其执弥坚，而其行弥励，志虽不就而忠有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173305_comment'></div>故及其既殁，而汉亦以亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173305_comment'></div>当是之时，天下闻其风、慕其义者，人人感慨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173305", 1173305, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>奋激</span>，至于解印绶，弃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173305", 1173305, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>家族</span>，骨肉相勉，趋死而不避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173305_comment'></div>百馀年间，擅强大，觊非望者相属，皆逡巡而不敢发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173305_comment'></div>汉能以亡为存，盖其力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173305_comment'></div>孺子于时，豫章太守陈蕃、太尉黄琼辟皆不就，举<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173305", 1173305, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>有道</span>，拜太原太守，安车备礼召，皆不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173305_comment'></div>盖忘己以为人，与独善于隐约，其操虽殊，其志于仁一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173305_comment'></div>在位士大夫，抗其节于乱世，不以死生动其心，异于怀禄之臣远矣，然而不屑去者，义在于济物故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173305_comment'></div>孺子尝谓郭林宗曰：「大木将颠，非一绳所维，何为栖栖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173305", 1173305, "Clauses/53/Comments/1")'>不皇</span>宁处」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173305_comment'></div>此其意亦非自足于丘壑，遗世而不顾者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173305_comment'></div>孔子称颜回：「用之则行，舍之则藏，惟我与尔有是夫」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173305_comment'></div>孟子亦称孔子：「可以进则进，可以止则止」，「乃所愿则学孔子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173305_comment'></div>而《易》于君子小人消长进退，择所宜处，未尝不惟其时则见，其不可而止，此孺子之所以未能以此而易彼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173305_comment'></div>孺子姓徐名稚，孺子其字也，豫章南昌人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173305_comment'></div>按《图记》：「章水北径南昌城，西历白社，其西有孺子墓；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173305_comment'></div>又北历南塘，其东为湖，湖南小洲上有孺子宅，号孺子台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173305_comment'></div>吴嘉禾中，太守徐熙于孺子墓隧种松，太守谢景于墓侧立碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173305_comment'></div>晋永安中，太守夏侯嵩于碑旁立思贤亭，世世修治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173305_comment'></div>至拓跋魏时，谓之聘君亭」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173305_comment'></div>今亭尚存，而湖南小洲，世不知其尝为孺子宅，又尝为台也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173305_comment'></div>予为太守之明年，始即其处，结茅为堂，图孺子像，祠以中牢，率州之宾属拜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173305_comment'></div>汉至今且千岁，富贵堙灭者不可称数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173305_comment'></div>孺子不出闾巷，独称思至今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173305_comment'></div>则世之欲以智力取胜者，非惑欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173305_comment'></div>孺子墓失其地，而台幸可考而知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173305_comment'></div>祠之，所以示邦人以尚德，故并采其出处之意为记焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1173305_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173305'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷一九。又见《曾文定公集》卷九，《曾子固集》卷二五，《南丰曾先生文粹》卷六，《圣宋文选》卷一四，《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》宋刻本卷九六、四库本卷一○六、清抄本一四六。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173305_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　曾巩作《洪渥传》<div id='poem_1173319' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173319' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1173319'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173319'>洪渥，抚州临川人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173319_comment'></div>为人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173319", 1173319, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>和平</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173319_comment'></div>与人游，初不甚欢，久而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173319", 1173319, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>有味</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173319_comment'></div>家贫，以进士从乡举，有能赋名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173319_comment'></div>初进于有司，辄连黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173319_comment'></div>久之乃得官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173319_comment'></div>官不自驰骋，又久不进，卒监黄州麻城之茶场以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173319_comment'></div>死不能归葬，亦不能还其孥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173319_comment'></div>渥里中人闻渥死，无贤愚皆恨失之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173319_comment'></div>予少与渥相识，而不深知其为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173319_comment'></div>渥死，乃闻有兄年七十馀，渥得官时，兄已老，不可与俱行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173319_comment'></div>渥至官，量口用俸，掇其馀以归，买田百亩居其兄，复去而之官，则心安焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173319_comment'></div>渥既死，兄无子，数使人至麻城抚其孥，欲返之而居以其田，而孥盖弱力不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173319", 1173319, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>自致</span>，其兄益已老矣，无可奈何，则念辄悲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173319_comment'></div>其经营之犹不已，忘其老也，渥兄弟如此无愧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173319_comment'></div>渥平居若不可任以事，及至赴人之急，早夜不少懈，其与人真有恩者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173319_comment'></div>予观古今豪杰士传，论人行义，不列于史者，往往务摭奇以动俗，亦或事高而不可为继，或伸一人之善而诬天下以不及，虽归之辅教警世，然考之《中庸》或过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173319_comment'></div>如渥之所存，盖人之所易到，故载之云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1173319_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173166_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173166'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173166'>臣巩言：世称麟凤龟龙，王者之嘉瑞，则盖不常出，而德有不能致者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173166_comment'></div>又称麟凤龟龙四灵以为畜，则至治之世，盖可狎而扰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173166_comment'></div>故官有豢龙，而刘累以善其职事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173166_comment'></div>至夏之衰，乃不能驯，而或漦于庭，至周卒为女祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173166_comment'></div>盖龙之为祥异，通于治乱如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173166_comment'></div>伏惟陛下仁圣之德达于渊泉，故龙实来慕，若可扰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173166_comment'></div>其自今以往，盛德日跻，则必有游于宫沼，或负图出河，而且将领在有司，群于庶物，故臣敢刻敕书祝辞于石以俟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173166_comment'></div>臣巩谨序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1173166_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　曾巩作《江西石幢记》<div id='poem_1173179' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173179' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173179?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江西石幢记跋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173179")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173179_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173179'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173179'>《江西石幢记》，观察支使、试左武卫兵曹参军来择撰，大和二年建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173179_comment'></div>自采访使班景倩兼知黔中道为始，判官已下皆列次姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173179_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1173179'>《后石幢记》，都团练判官、试太常寺协律郎李方玄撰，大和七年建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173179_comment'></div>自使检校、右散骑常侍兼侍御史中丞裴谊为始，副使已下皆列次姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173179_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1173179'>《续石幢记》，节度掌书记陈象撰，光化三年建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173179_comment'></div>自使开府仪同三司、检校太保兼侍中、颍川郡钟某为始，列副使已下如后记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173179_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1173179'>《续立石柱题名记》，知节度判官胡顺之撰，天圣元年建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173179_comment'></div>自太平兴国元年，自殿中丞、通判军州事李斡为始，至熙宁九年祠部郎中、集贤校理叶均。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1173179_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_content_1173179'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173179'>《江西石幢记》，观察支使、试左武卫兵曹参军来择撰，大和二年建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173179_comment'></div>自采访使班景倩兼知黔中道为始，判官已下皆列次姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173179_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1173179'>《后石幢记》，都团练判官、试太常寺协律郎李方玄撰，大和七年建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173179_comment'></div>自使检校、右散骑常侍兼侍御史中丞裴谊为始，副使已下皆列次姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173179_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1173179'>《续石幢记》，节度掌书记陈象撰，光化三年建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173179_comment'></div>自使开府仪同三司、检校太保兼侍中、颍川郡钟某为始，列副使已下如后记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173179_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1173179'>《续立石柱题名记》，知节度判官胡顺之撰，天圣元年建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173179_comment'></div>自太平兴国元年，自殿中丞、通判军州事李斡为始，至熙宁九年祠部郎中、集贤校理叶均。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1173179_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　曾巩作《续石幢记》<div id='poem_1173179' class='_poem'><div id='poem_content_220432'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220432'>促促为物役，区区迫世情。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220432_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220432'>但嗟束缚急，未觉章绶荣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220432_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220432'>奈此两鬓白，顾无一廛耕。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220432_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220432'>所求亦云几，脱粟与藜羹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220432_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220432'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220432_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　曾巩作《鸿雁》<div id='poem_220491' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220491' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220491?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鸿雁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220491")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220491_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220491'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220491'>江南岸边江水平，水荇青青渚蒲绿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220491_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220491'>鸿雁此时俦侣多，乱下沙汀恣栖宿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220491_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220491'>群依<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_220491", 220491, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>青荇</span>唼且鸣，煖浴蒲根戏相逐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220491_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220491'>长无矰缴意自闲，不饱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_220491", 220491, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>稻粱</span>心亦足。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220491_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220491'>性殊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_220491", 220491, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>凡鸟</span>自知时，飞不乱行聊渐陆。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220491_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220491'>岂同白鹭空<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_220491", 220491, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>洁白</span>，俯啄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_220491", 220491, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>腥污</span>期满腹。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220491_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220491'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_220491_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　洪州东门故而弊，曾巩易而新之，作《洪州东门记》<div id='poem_1173307' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173307' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173307?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洪州东门记<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰二年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173307")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173307_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173307'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173307'>南昌于《禹贡》为扬州之野，于地志为吴分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173307_comment'></div>其部所领八州，其境属于荆闽南粤，方数千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173307_comment'></div>其田宜粳稌，其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>赋粟</span>输于京师，为天下最，在江湖之间，东南一都会也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173307_comment'></div>其城之西为大江，江之外为西山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173307_comment'></div>州治所，因城之面势，为门东西出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173307_comment'></div>其西门既新，而东门独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>故弊</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173307_comment'></div>熙宁九年，余为是州，将易而新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173307_comment'></div>明年，会移福州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173307_comment'></div>又明年，自福州被召还京师，过南昌，视其东门，则今守元侯既撤而易之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173307_comment'></div>元侯以余为有旧于是州，来请曰：「愿有识」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173307_comment'></div>余<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>辞谢</span>不能，而其请不懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173307_comment'></div>盖天子诸侯之门制，见于经者不明，学礼者以谓诸侯之制，有皋、应、路门，天子之门加库、雉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173307_comment'></div>然见于《春秋》者，鲁有库门，有雉门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173307_comment'></div>见于《孔子家语》者，卫有库门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173307_comment'></div>或以谓褒周公、康叔，非诸侯常制，其果然欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173307_comment'></div>盖莫得而考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173307_comment'></div>在《雅》之《绵》，古公亶父徙宅于岐，作为宫室，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>门墉</span>得宜应礼，后世原大推功，述而歌之，其辞曰：「乃立皋门，皋门有伉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173307_comment'></div>释者曰：伉，言其高也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173307_comment'></div>又曰：「乃立应门，应门将将」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173307_comment'></div>释者曰：将将，言其严正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173307_comment'></div>则诸侯之门，维高且严，固诗人之所善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173307_comment'></div>圣人定诗，取而列之，所以为后世法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173307_comment'></div>今元侯于其东门革陋兴坏，不违于礼，是可书也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173307_comment'></div>将予之识，会予未至京师，易守明州，元侯则使人于途，于明州，速予文不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173307_comment'></div>按南昌之东门，作于淳化五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173307_comment'></div>识于其栋间者曰：皇第六子、镇南节度、洪州管内观察处置等使徐国公元偓，尚书户部郎中、知洪州军州事陈象舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173307_comment'></div>以籍考之，徐国公后封密王，太宗第六子，受命保兹南土，实留京师，则作门者盖象舆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173307_comment'></div>至门之改作，凡八十有九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173307_comment'></div>元侯之于是役，其本取于地之不在民者，其工取于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>役卒</span>之羡者，其瓦甓金石<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>髹彤</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/95/Comments/1")'>黝垩</span>之费，取于库钱之常入者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173307_comment'></div>自七月戊子始事，至十月壬子而毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173307_comment'></div>既成，而南北之广十寻，东南之深半之，而高如其广，于以出政令，谨禁限，时启闭，通往来，称其于东南为一都会者，而役盖不及民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173307_comment'></div>元侯名积中云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173307_comment'></div>又明年，实元丰二年，尚书度支员外郎、直龙图阁曾巩记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1173307_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　柳子玉卒，曾巩撰《祭柳子玉文》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　刘弇上书曾巩。作品：《上知府曾内翰书子固》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　陈襄荐曾巩供文翰之职。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年春</a>　曾巩作《谢熙宁十年历日表》<div id='poem_1172968' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172968' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172968?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢熙宁十年历日表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172968")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172968_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172968'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172968'>进奏院递到宣头一道，熙宁十年历日一卷赐臣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172968_comment'></div>窃以推行岁时，天道所以化育；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172968_comment'></div>考正历度，人事所以财成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172968_comment'></div>故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1172968", 1172968, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>颁朔</span>之旧章，为守邦之先务<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172968_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下德兼载焘，仁及昆虫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172968_comment'></div>体履中和，叙九畴而开物；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172968_comment'></div>钦明象数，齐七政以导民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172968_comment'></div>臣获奉王正，亲承圣诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172968_comment'></div>念阙廷之方远，藐然江上之身；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172968_comment'></div>感<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1172968", 1172968, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>星晷</span>之屡新，尚叹《周南》之滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172968_comment'></div>仰望旒扆，臣不任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172968_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1172968_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《贺熙宁十年南郊礼毕大赦表》<div id='poem_1172959' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172959' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172959?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺熙宁十年南郊礼毕大赦表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172959")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172959_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172959'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172959'>今月初七日，递到赦书一道，以十一月二十七日南郊礼毕，大赦天下者，臣已集军府官吏将校军民等宣读讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172959_comment'></div>伏以人之所归者莫如德，天之所享者在于诚，其惟圣王，克有全美<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172959_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下聪明稽古，承继祖宗，慈惠爱人，抚临邦国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172959_comment'></div>有遍覆并容之大度，有防微慎独之小心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172959_comment'></div>不从游畋，不近声色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172959_comment'></div>无纷华盛丽之好，无便僻侧媚之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172959_comment'></div>岁时吉蠲，以承七庙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172959_comment'></div>左右顺适，以奉两宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172959_comment'></div>其功施于人，效见于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172959_comment'></div>则宅仁由义，缙绅之徒成材于学校；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172959_comment'></div>超距蹋鞠，熊罴之旅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1172959", 1172959, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>养勇</span>于营屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172959_comment'></div>瓯窭污邪之收，充于仓廪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172959_comment'></div>关通<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1172959", 1172959, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>和钧</span>之利，阜于市廛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172959_comment'></div>家有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1172959", 1172959, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>豫乐</span>之声，人无愁怨之色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172959_comment'></div>协气所召，休应自殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172959_comment'></div>钩陈太微，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1172959", 1172959, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>星纬</span>咸若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172959_comment'></div>昆崙渤澥，波涛不惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172959_comment'></div>近则金石之声，鸟兽欣蹈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172959_comment'></div>远则干羽之舞，蛮夷骏奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172959_comment'></div>象齿旅于阙庭，龙媒纳于闲厩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172959_comment'></div>是谓六府三事，皆可以歌；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172959_comment'></div>四海九州，罔不率俾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172959_comment'></div>盖巍巍而特起，非琐琐之能窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172959_comment'></div>前世议泰山之封，谋梁甫之禅者，度崇比大，畴克登兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172959_comment'></div>陛下抑而不图，谦以自牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1172959_comment'></div>以谓先后创业垂统，其功莫得而名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1172959_comment'></div>上帝隤祉发祥，其德无可以称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1172959_comment'></div>思所以报，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1172959", 1172959, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>一本</span>于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1172959_comment'></div>故寅畏严恭，积之有素；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1172959_comment'></div>而齐明薰祓，进而益虔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1172959_comment'></div>在于物者不取其烦，尽诸己者必求其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1172959_comment'></div>是以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1172959", 1172959, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>萧光</span>之烈，奏于宗祊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1172959_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1172959", 1172959, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>柴燎</span>之蒸，焜于郊兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1172959_comment'></div>幽隐昭答，神灵顾怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1172959_comment'></div>无疆惟休，方寖昌于万世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1172959_comment'></div>不敢专享，故敷锡于群元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1172959_comment'></div>稽参典彝，定著赦令，弛张从理，同异称情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1172959_comment'></div>蠲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1172959", 1172959, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>罪眚</span>而弃瑕疵，录劳能而纵逋负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1172959_comment'></div>显晦咸暨，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1172959", 1172959, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>洪纤</span>不遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1172959_comment'></div>万国之欢，既交于冲漠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1172959_comment'></div>一人之庆，遂及于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1172959", 1172959, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>跂蠕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1172959_comment'></div>孚于上下之间，极乎帝王之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1172959_comment'></div>臣被学最旧，蒙恩寖深，莫待甘泉之祠，独叹《周南》之滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1172959_comment'></div>第从臣之嘉颂，未效薄材；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1172959_comment'></div>望属车之清尘，但驰远思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1172959_comment'></div>想仰宸扆，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1172959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1172959'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷二七。又见《曾文定公集》卷一○，《曾子固集》卷一四，《皇朝文鉴》卷六七，清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷七，《四六法海》卷三，《渊鉴类函》卷一五三，《古今图书集成》祥刑典卷一七九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1172959_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《奏乞与潘兴嗣子推恩状》<div id='poem_1173018' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173018' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173018?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏乞与潘兴嗣子推恩状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173018")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173018_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173018'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173018'>右，臣伏睹本州人试将作监主簿潘兴嗣，五岁以父任得官，二十二岁授江州德化县尉，不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173018_comment'></div>熙宁二年，朝廷察其高，以为筠州军事推官，不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173018_comment'></div>今年五十六岁，安于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173018", 1173018, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>静退</span>三十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173018_comment'></div>臣窃以康定中，徐复以处士收用，辞不就，得官其一子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173018_comment'></div>近王回、孙侔皆以幽潜见录，命下而回已死，亦得官其一子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173018_comment'></div>李觏以国子直讲退归死十年，亦得禄其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173018_comment'></div>则国家之于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173018", 1173018, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>激奖</span>廉退，既肆其所守，又恩及其世，盖有故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173018_comment'></div>今与王回同时见录之人有孙侔，而后又有兴嗣，处幽不改其操，皆已白首，然未有为上闻者，故其子独未蒙恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173018_comment'></div>窃以康定至今几四十年，士之抗志于隐约，而为朝廷所知者，止此数人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173018_comment'></div>盖枯槁沉溺，其守至难，故其人至少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173018_comment'></div>为国家者，取而显之，使天下皆知士之特立无求于世者不为上之所遗，则自重者孰不勉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173018_comment'></div>浮竞者孰不悔？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173018_comment'></div>可谓施约而劝博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173018_comment'></div>宠禄之所以励世，其实在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173018_comment'></div>臣故敢以闻，伏惟陛下幸察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173018_comment'></div>侔及兴嗣，躬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173018", 1173018, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>难进</span>之节，遭遇圣时，用王回、徐复、李觏为比，加恩其子，使斯人不卒穷于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173018", 1173018, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>闾巷</span>，足以明示天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173018_comment'></div>兴嗣有子群，年二十六岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173018_comment'></div>孙侔今家真州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173018_comment'></div>谨状奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1173018_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《酬王正仲登岳麓寺阁见寄》<div id='poem_220513' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220513' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220513?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬王正仲登岳麓寺阁见寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220513")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220513_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220513'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220513'>闻君东南使，揽辔云松间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220513'>皇华照楚甸，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220513", 220513, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>吉玉</span>投衡山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220513'>幽寻得临观，意豁穷跻攀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220513'>顾我客斗牛，三年疏往还。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220513'>低心念<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_220513", 220513, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>弱志</span>，引领望衰颜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220513'>未共尊酒乐，良嗟人事艰。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220513'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_220513", 220513, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>叱驭</span>犯冰雪，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_220513", 220513, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>回镳</span>驰九关。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220513'>何足慰离思，德音锵佩环。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220513'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_220513_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《晓出》<div id='poem_220471' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220471' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220471?labeling=true' target='_blank'>晓出</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220471")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220471_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220471'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220471'>晓出城南罗卒乘，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_220471", 220471, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>皂纛</span>朱旗密相映。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220471_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220471'>貔貅距跃良家子，鹅鹳弥缝司马令。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220471_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220471'>夺标一一飞步疾，盘槊两两翻身劲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220471_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220471'>霸上今朝且儿戏，卫青异日须天幸。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220471_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220471'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220471_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩有《汉武都太守汉阳阿阳李翕西狭颂》<div id='poem_1173181' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173181' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173181?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汉武都太守汉阳阿阳李翕西狭颂跋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173181")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173181_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173181'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173181'>《汉武都太守汉阳阿阳李翕西狭颂》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173181_comment'></div>武都太守、汉阳阿阳李翕字伯都，以郡之西狭阁道通梁、益，缘壁立之山，临不测之溪，危难<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173181", 1173181, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>阻峻</span>，数有颠覆霣坠之害，乃与功曹史李旻定策，敕衡官掾仇审治东坂，有秩李瑾治西坂，鐉烧大石，改高即平，正曲广厄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173181_comment'></div>既成，人得夷涂，可以夜涉，乃相与作颂刻石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173181_comment'></div>其文有二，其所议一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173181_comment'></div>其一立于建宁四年六月十三日壬寅，其一是年六月三十日立也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173181_comment'></div>又称翕尝令渑池，治<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173181", 1173181, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>崤嵚</span>之道，有黄龙、白鹿之瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173181_comment'></div>其后治武都，又有嘉禾、甘露、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173181", 1173181, "Clauses/25/Comments/2")'>木连理</span>之祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173181_comment'></div>皆图画其像，刻石在侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173181_comment'></div>盖嘉祐之间，晁仲约质夫为兴州，还京师，得《郙阁颂》以遗余，称析里桥郙阁，汉武都太守、阿阳李翕字伯都之所建，以去沉没之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173181_comment'></div>而「翕」字残缺不可辨得，欧阳永叔《集古录目跋尾》以为李会，余亦意其然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173181_comment'></div>及熙宁十年，马城中玉为转运判官于江西，出成州，所得此颂以视余，始知其为李翕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173181_comment'></div>永叔于学博矣，其于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173181", 1173181, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>是正</span>文字尤审，然一以其意质之，遂不能无失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173181_comment'></div>则古之人所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173181", 1173181, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>阙疑</span>，其可忽欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173181_comment'></div>近世士大夫喜藏画，自晋以来，名能画者，其笔迹有存于尺帛幅纸，盖莫知其真伪，往往皆传而贵之，而汉画则未有能得之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173181_comment'></div>及得此图，所画龙、鹿、承露人、嘉禾、连理之木，然后汉画始见于今，又皆出于石刻，可知其非伪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173181_comment'></div>汉武帝元鼎六年，以汧陇西南接于巴蜀，为武都郡，及其后始分而为兴州，为成州，成州则武都之上禄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173181_comment'></div>郙阁立于建宁五年，翕治<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173181", 1173181, "Clauses/68/Comments/2")'>崤嵚</span>、西狭、郙阁之道，有益于人，而史不传，则颂之作，所以备史之阙，是则传之亦不可以不广也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1173181_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩撰《光禄寺丞通判太平州吴君墓志铭》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《刁景纯挽歌词二章》<div id='poem_220159' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220159' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220159?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刁景纯挽歌词二章<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220159")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220159_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220159'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220159'>史观郎闱得谢归，桓桓筋力未全衰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220159'>园林笑傲笙歌拥，山水追寻几杖随。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220159'>尺牍百封虚有意，文章十帙更传谁？<div id='poem_sentence_2_220159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220159'>余花自出藏春坞<span class='inlineComment2'>（藏春坞，景纯自名其所居也。）</span>，一点青灯照繐帷<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220159'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_220159'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_220159_0'>⑴ 陈遵善书，与人尺牍，莫不藏以为荣。又云：“遵日作书数百封，亲疏各有意义。”白乐天无子，其诗云：“文章十帙官三品，身后传谁与荫谁？”景纯善作书，亦无子，故云。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_220159_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_220158' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220158' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220158?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220158_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220158'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220158'>八十登高步更轻，殷勤爱客是平生。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220158'>能临缓急敦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220158", 220158, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>风谊</span>，不向炎凉逐世情。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220158'>北岳云烟思抗志，东门冠盖羡遗荣。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220158'>可怜昨日壶觞地，呜咽唯闻薤露声。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220158'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220158_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年2月</a>　二月庚申，葬其妻于建昌军南丰县龙池乡之源头，曾巩撰《亡妻宜兴县君文柔晁氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173380' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173380' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173380?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亡妻宜兴县君文柔晁氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁十年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173380")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173380_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173380'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173380'>文柔姓晁氏，讳德仪，字文柔，年十有八嫁余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173380_comment'></div>余时苦贫，食口众，文柔食菲衣敝自若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173380_comment'></div>事姑，遇内外属人，无长少远近，各尽其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173380_comment'></div>仁孝慈恕，人有所不能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173380_comment'></div>于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173380", 1173380, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>栉珥</span>衣服，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173380", 1173380, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>亲属</span>人所无，辄推与之，不待己足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173380_comment'></div>于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173380", 1173380, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>燕私</span>，未尝见其惰容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173380_comment'></div>于与人居，未尝见其喜愠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173380_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173380", 1173380, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>折意</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173380", 1173380, "Clauses/21/Comments/1")'>降色</span>，约己以法度，学士大夫有所不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173380_comment'></div>为人聪明，于事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173380", 1173380, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>迎见</span>立解，无不尽其理，其概可见者如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173380_comment'></div>盖天畀之德而夭其年，遗以相余而夺之蚤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173380_comment'></div>余不知其所以，而又不自知其哭之之恸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173380_comment'></div>文柔以嘉祐七年三月甲子卒于京师，年二十有六，余时校史馆书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173380_comment'></div>熙宁四年追封宜兴县君，十年二月庚申葬于建昌军南丰县龙池乡之源头，余时为洪州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173380_comment'></div>文柔有子，男曰绾，太庙斋郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173380_comment'></div>曰琮，未仕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173380_comment'></div>女曰庆老，三岁而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173380_comment'></div>晁氏世家澶州清丰县，今为开封府祥符县人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173380_comment'></div>文柔曾祖佺，赠太师、中书令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173380_comment'></div>祖遘，尚书驾部员外郎，赠开府仪同三司、吏部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173380_comment'></div>考宗恪，光禄少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173380_comment'></div>余，南丰曾巩子固也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173380_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1173380'>人孰不贵？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173380_comment'></div>子逢其穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173380_comment'></div>世谁不寿？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173380_comment'></div>子罹其凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173380_comment'></div>维德日跻，生不见其止；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173380_comment'></div>维声日远，殁不见其终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173380_comment'></div>子能自得，怼者在人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173380_comment'></div>遗以辅余，曾不逡巡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173380_comment'></div>岁云其逝，予悲孔新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173380_comment'></div>其孰昭之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173380_comment'></div>瑑此幽珉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1173380_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年3月</a>　三月，曾巩假归展墓。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年3月</a>　三月庚申，葬弟曾宰于南丰龙池乡之源头，曾巩撰《亡弟湘潭主簿子翊墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173381' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173381' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173381?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亡弟湘潭县主簿子翊墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁十年三月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173381")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173381_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173381'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173381'>熙宁十年春，予蒙恩予告，葬其弟子翊于南丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173381_comment'></div>维子翊姓曾氏，讳宰，字子翊，世鲁人，今家建昌军之南丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173381_comment'></div>子翊少力学，六艺百子、史氏记、钟律地理、传注笺疏、史篇文字，目览口诵手抄，日常数千言，手抄书连榻累笥不能容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173381_comment'></div>于其是非治乱之意既已通，至于法制度数、造物立器，解名释象、声音训诂，纤悉委曲，贯穿旁罗，无不极其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173381_comment'></div>且老，未尝一日易意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173381_comment'></div>其为文驰骋反复，能传其学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173381_comment'></div>为人质直孝弟，抑畏小心，少年饮酒歌呼、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173381", 1173381, "Clauses/25/Comments/1")'>饶乐</span>放纵之事，未尝一接焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173381_comment'></div>其学行如此，于世用宜如何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173381_comment'></div>然位不过主簿，寿止于四十七，其非可哀也夫？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173381_comment'></div>子翊嘉祐六年进士及第，历舒州司户参军，潭州湘潭县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173381_comment'></div>所居官理，其去人思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173381_comment'></div>其学于古者，盖未尝试也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173381_comment'></div>有子经、绶、纯、约，女适饶州军事判官曹唐弼，次尚幼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173381_comment'></div>曾祖讳某，尚书水部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173381_comment'></div>祖讳某，尚书户部郎中，直史馆，赠右谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173381_comment'></div>考讳某，太常博士，赠尚书都官员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173381_comment'></div>先太夫人吴氏，吴兴郡太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173381_comment'></div>今太夫人朱氏，南昌郡太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173381_comment'></div>妻张氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173381_comment'></div>子翊熙宁元年四月乙巳卒于湘潭，十年三月庚申葬于南丰龙池乡之源头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173381_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1173381'>好学不倦，以及其详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173381_comment'></div>力行不已，亦蹈其常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173381_comment'></div>见于遗文，华衮之章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173381_comment'></div>含其淳德，璞玉之良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173381_comment'></div>于舒于潭，非试其有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173381_comment'></div>方强而尽，又夺其寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173381_comment'></div>畜而不施，则既已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173381_comment'></div>潜而益明，尚监于此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1173381_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年3月</a>　三月壬申，葬八妹德耀于南丰龙池乡之源头，曾巩撰《曾氏女墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173382' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173382' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173382?labeling=true' target='_blank'>曾氏女墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁十年三月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173382")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173382_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173382'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173382'>先君太常博士、赠尚书都官员外郎曾公之第八女，讳德耀，字淑明，生而慧淑，于女工不学而能，于孝爱天成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173382_comment'></div>生二十岁，许嫁大理寺丞王几，行有日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173382_comment'></div>嘉祐六年九月戊寅以疾卒于京师，熙宁十年三月壬申葬南丰之源头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173382_comment'></div>其兄巩为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1173382'>孰讹尔质，而化其成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173382_comment'></div>尚千万年，尔室之宁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1173382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173382'><span class='label'>按：</span>《曾子固集》题作「妹铭」。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173382_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年3月</a>　三月庚申，葬二女庆老、兴老于南丰龙池乡之源头，曾巩撰《二女墓志》<div id='poem_1173383' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173383' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173383?labeling=true' target='_blank'>二女墓志<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁十年三月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173383")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173383_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173383'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173383'>南丰曾氏，葬其二女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173383_comment'></div>其父巩为志曰：予校书史馆凡九年，丧女弟，丧妻晁氏及二女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173383_comment'></div>余穷居京师，无上下之交，而悲哀之数如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173383_comment'></div>二女，曰庆老，吾妻晁氏出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173383_comment'></div>生三岁而夭，实嘉祐六年十一月壬申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173383_comment'></div>方是时，吾妻晁氏病已革，庆老疾未作之夕，省其母，勉慰如成人，中夕而疾作，遂不救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173383_comment'></div>盖若与其母诀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173383_comment'></div>曰兴老，吾继室李氏出也，卒时始二岁，实治平三年九月甲寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173383_comment'></div>是时，余方锁宿景德寺，试国子监进士，不得视其疾、临其死也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173383_comment'></div>二女生而值予之穷多故，其不幸又夭以死，所谓命非邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173383_comment'></div>熙宁十年，予为洪州，始以三月庚申瘗二女于南丰之源头，同穴，庆老在右，兴老在左，是为志。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173383_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《奏乞復吴中復差遣状》<div id='poem_1173019' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173019' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173019?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏乞复吴中复差遣状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173019")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173019_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173019'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173019'>右，臣伏见提点本州玉隆观、龙图阁直学士、给事中吴中复，年六十六岁，精力未衰，志意甚壮，历事累朝，尝任谏官御史，以直道正言，能称其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173019_comment'></div>又任邦伯，理兵治民，皆有可纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173019_comment'></div>孔子曰：「如有所誉者，其有所试矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173019_comment'></div>如中复之材，有已试之效，可谓明白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173019_comment'></div>方今中外任使，尝患乏人，如中复者，岂可遂其閒逸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173019_comment'></div>欲乞召至左右，使典司献纳，或委以藩镇，使剸治烦剧，必能上副忧勤，不负<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173019", 1173019, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>寄任</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173019_comment'></div>况中复年未当退，又无疾病，处之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173019", 1173019, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>散地</span>，众谓非宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173019_comment'></div>伏望早赐收用，以称朝廷尚贤求旧之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173019_comment'></div>臣忝任<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173019", 1173019, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>州长</span>，不敢不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173019_comment'></div>谨具状奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1173019_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript:
