ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩辞不往，作《辞直龙图阁知福州状》<div id='poem_1173020' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173020' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173020?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞直龙图阁知福州状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173020")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173020_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173020'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173020'>右，臣准洪州送到敕牒一道，授臣直龙图阁、就差权知福州，交割本职公事与以次官员，发赴本任者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173020_comment'></div>孤远之臣，幸蒙收擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173020_comment'></div>圣恩深厚，谊岂敢辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173020_comment'></div>伏念臣老母年高，近岁多病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173020_comment'></div>臣弟布已移知广州，见赴本任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173020_comment'></div>臣若更适闽越，则兄弟并就远官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173020_comment'></div>犬马之志，不胜徬徨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173020_comment'></div>伏望圣慈矜悯，特寝新命，与臣一便地差遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173020_comment'></div>所有敕牒，臣未敢祗受，已牒洪州，寄军资库收管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173020_comment'></div>臣已交割本职公事与以次官员，不敢于旧任处久住，见迤逦前来，听候指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173020_comment'></div>谨具状奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173020_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　吕南公上书曾巩。作品：《上曾龙图书》<div id='poem_1173069' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173069' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173069?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上欧阳龙图书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173069")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173069_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173069'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173069'>某顿首再拜启：拜别后，其心焦然如渴饥不见饮食，于今三年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173069_comment'></div>得前年秋所赐教，后寻闻外补，欲寓一书以布惓惓之意，而其罪衅招祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173069_comment'></div>其冬祖母弃馆舍，哀摧之馀，仅存微息，至去秋复奉祖母、亡母葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173069_comment'></div>南丰贫贱也，乞丐以供事，故常奔走于道路，无须臾之暇能果其所欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173069_comment'></div>即又欲葬祖母后一至执事之侧，少慰其心，而自去夏属疾，至冬益甚，抵今未尽平复，未堪远役，又未能成其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173069_comment'></div>蹇拙之人，谋事多然，况欲行其它耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173069_comment'></div>然其心亦未尝去门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173069_comment'></div>岂独以愚蒙之质、动作语默与俗多违，而忌且怨谤之者多，而独大贤知遇之最深，欲成其区区乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173069_comment'></div>诚以素颇有志于古君子之道，忘其力之不足而趋之，求今有古君子之道而可为依归，舍门下安往哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173069_comment'></div>是以未尝一日而不在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173069_comment'></div>不识赐见亮否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173069_comment'></div>春暖，伏惟尊候万福，慎起居饮食以终福禄，此嗷嗷之民之望，而愚陋慕仰之愿，不胜至到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173069_comment'></div>祖母、亡母墓志，辄往一本，幸垂览焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1173069_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　吕南公谒见曾巩于洪州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年5月</a>　曾巩作《江州景德寺新戒坛记》<div id='poem_1173306' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173306' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173306?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江州景德寺新戒坛记<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁十年五月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173306")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173306_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173306'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173306'>江州景德寺戒坛，作于熙宁九年某月某甲子，成于十年某月某甲子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173306_comment'></div>其费出于太子宾客陈公讳巽，其主而成之，出于寺之僧智暹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173306_comment'></div>坛成，是岁同天节，度僧若干人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173306_comment'></div>初，景德寺屋坏几废，智暹慨然以经营为己任，不舍其昼夜之勤，凡二十年，为佛殿、三门、两廊、钟楼与戒坛，总为屋若干区，总费钱二十馀万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173306_comment'></div>智暹食淡衣粗，所居屋坏不自治，所得于人惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173306", 1173306, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>资治</span>其寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173306_comment'></div>以其故，人皆信服，凡所欲为无不如志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173306_comment'></div>今年六十有七矣，其经营寺事，不懈如初，而其强力盖有馀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173306_comment'></div>余嘉其意，故为之记云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173306_comment'></div>熙宁十年五月乙亥记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1173306_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《辱井铭》<div id='poem_1173180' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173180' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173180?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辱井铭跋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173180")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173180_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173180'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173180'>《辱井铭》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173180_comment'></div>辱井有篆文云：「辱井在斯，可不戒乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173180_comment'></div>并下文共十八字，在井石槛上，不知谁为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173180_comment'></div>又有《景阳楼下井铭》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173180_comment'></div>又有《陈后主叔宝辱井记》，云：「江宁县兴严寺井石槛铭，莫知谁作也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173180_comment'></div>历序隋文帝命晋王广伐陈，后主自投井中，令人取之，惊其太重，及出，乃与张贵妃、孔贵人三人同束而上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173180_comment'></div>其末云：「唐开元二十二年三月十七日，前单父县令、左转此县丞、太原王」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173180_comment'></div>已下阙。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1173180_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='5f2c2932b86e412c9e9931d89ce7da1d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5f2c2932b86e412c9e9931d89ce7da1d");'><span id='5f2c2932b86e412c9e9931d89ce7da1d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>，60岁</div><div id='5f2c2932b86e412c9e9931d89ce7da1d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　曾巩过南昌，州守元積中革陋兴坏，修洪州东门，请曾巩作记，曾巩作《洪州东门记》<div id='poem_1173307' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173307' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173307?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洪州东门记<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰二年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173307")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173307_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173307'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173307'>南昌于《禹贡》为扬州之野，于地志为吴分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173307_comment'></div>其部所领八州，其境属于荆闽南粤，方数千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173307_comment'></div>其田宜粳稌，其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>赋粟</span>输于京师，为天下最，在江湖之间，东南一都会也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173307_comment'></div>其城之西为大江，江之外为西山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173307_comment'></div>州治所，因城之面势，为门东西出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173307_comment'></div>其西门既新，而东门独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>故弊</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173307_comment'></div>熙宁九年，余为是州，将易而新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173307_comment'></div>明年，会移福州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173307_comment'></div>又明年，自福州被召还京师，过南昌，视其东门，则今守元侯既撤而易之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173307_comment'></div>元侯以余为有旧于是州，来请曰：「愿有识」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173307_comment'></div>余<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>辞谢</span>不能，而其请不懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173307_comment'></div>盖天子诸侯之门制，见于经者不明，学礼者以谓诸侯之制，有皋、应、路门，天子之门加库、雉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173307_comment'></div>然见于《春秋》者，鲁有库门，有雉门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173307_comment'></div>见于《孔子家语》者，卫有库门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173307_comment'></div>或以谓褒周公、康叔，非诸侯常制，其果然欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173307_comment'></div>盖莫得而考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173307_comment'></div>在《雅》之《绵》，古公亶父徙宅于岐，作为宫室，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>门墉</span>得宜应礼，后世原大推功，述而歌之，其辞曰：「乃立皋门，皋门有伉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173307_comment'></div>释者曰：伉，言其高也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173307_comment'></div>又曰：「乃立应门，应门将将」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173307_comment'></div>释者曰：将将，言其严正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173307_comment'></div>则诸侯之门，维高且严，固诗人之所善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173307_comment'></div>圣人定诗，取而列之，所以为后世法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173307_comment'></div>今元侯于其东门革陋兴坏，不违于礼，是可书也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173307_comment'></div>将予之识，会予未至京师，易守明州，元侯则使人于途，于明州，速予文不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173307_comment'></div>按南昌之东门，作于淳化五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173307_comment'></div>识于其栋间者曰：皇第六子、镇南节度、洪州管内观察处置等使徐国公元偓，尚书户部郎中、知洪州军州事陈象舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173307_comment'></div>以籍考之，徐国公后封密王，太宗第六子，受命保兹南土，实留京师，则作门者盖象舆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173307_comment'></div>至门之改作，凡八十有九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173307_comment'></div>元侯之于是役，其本取于地之不在民者，其工取于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>役卒</span>之羡者，其瓦甓金石<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>髹彤</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/95/Comments/1")'>黝垩</span>之费，取于库钱之常入者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173307_comment'></div>自七月戊子始事，至十月壬子而毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173307_comment'></div>既成，而南北之广十寻，东南之深半之，而高如其广，于以出政令，谨禁限，时启闭，通往来，称其于东南为一都会者，而役盖不及民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173307_comment'></div>元侯名积中云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173307_comment'></div>又明年，实元丰二年，尚书度支员外郎、直龙图阁曾巩记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1173307_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
九江

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年9月</a>　曾巩与张侨、晁仲升有庐山之游，作《游山记》<div id='poem_1173314' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173314' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173314?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游山记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173314")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173314_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173314'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173314'>余与南阳张侨、颍川晁仲升九月壬子会太平观宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173314_comment'></div>癸丑，过东、西林寺，与道士任禹恭、丁宗元、僧本全俱过化成、护国、石盆寺、宝兴岩，宿普照寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173314_comment'></div>甲寅，止峰顶、大林、天池寺、佛手岩，至定心石，还大林寺宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173314_comment'></div>乙卯乃归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173314_comment'></div>凡观游之得石有名者十：刘仙、峰顶、文殊、头陀、把针、睡魔、定心、南北石柱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173314_comment'></div>峰有名者三：峰顶、掷笔，皆至其上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173314_comment'></div>香炉，坐峰顶下视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173314_comment'></div>谷一：锦绣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173314_comment'></div>坐掷笔下视之，池四：白莲、白氏草堂、东南天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173314_comment'></div>台二：讲经、十八贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173314_comment'></div>煮茶试泉二：虎跑，石盆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173314_comment'></div>书姓名刻石二：掷笔峰、佛手岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173314_comment'></div>余既游其间，而因思慧远等十八人，相与避晋于此者，诚山水之佳处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173314_comment'></div>然十八人者，知避晋而自肆于山水之间，而不知自溺于异学，此陶令所为不取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173314_comment'></div>自文武没，君臣相得之际少，士之有道者所以难仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173314_comment'></div>若陶令者，从容于浊世，以道自守，进不受污，知时之去，隐不离正，非十八人者所能到也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173314_comment'></div>若予者虽能知其是非，而岂能仿佛及之，而徒知山水之为乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173314_comment'></div>将归，遂书之，所以使余心与后之游者有考焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1173314_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='cf5cd0c929704ce6b54a713c334d6ee7_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("cf5cd0c929704ce6b54a713c334d6ee7");'><span id='cf5cd0c929704ce6b54a713c334d6ee7_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>，29岁</div><div id='cf5cd0c929704ce6b54a713c334d6ee7' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>曾巩作《发松门寄介甫》<div id='poem_220363' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220363' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220363?labeling=true' target='_blank'>发松门寄介甫</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220363")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220363_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220363'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220363'>南风夜发吹孤舟，起视北极星辰稠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220363'>晓开征帆破长浪，挟以两橹当中流。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220363'>松门东面见庐阜，其上少日烟气浮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220363'>舟人指我极四望，黑处无底蛟龙湫。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220363'>槠溪左蠡信浩荡，两涘若粒分冈丘。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220363'>落星囷囷孰可状，清汉夜独垂牵牛。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220363'>故人曾期此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_220363", 220363, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>同载</span>，舍棹直抵云山游。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220363'>念今五载负斯语，心独动荡风中斿。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220363'>况闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_220363", 220363, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>肥遁</span>须山在，早时事力胡能谋。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220363'>所嗟亲老食未足，安得一亩操锄耰。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220363'>此言此笑吾此取，非子世孰吾相投。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220363'>今谐与子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_220363", 220363, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>脱然</span>去，亦有文字歌唐周。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
滁州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='a7201d7ef19f4abcba1600adfd0a6635_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a7201d7ef19f4abcba1600adfd0a6635");'><span id='a7201d7ef19f4abcba1600adfd0a6635_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>，29岁</div><div id='a7201d7ef19f4abcba1600adfd0a6635' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年8月</a>　曾巩自宣化渡江至滁州见欧阳修，住且二十日乃去。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年8月15日</a>　曾巩在滁州作《醒心亭记》<div id='poem_1173279' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173279' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173279?labeling=true' target='_blank'>醒心亭记<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历七年八月十五日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年8月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173279")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173279_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173279'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173279'>滁州之西南，泉水之涯，欧阳公作州之二年，构亭曰「丰乐」，自为记以见其名之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173279_comment'></div>既又直丰乐之东几百步，得山之高，构亭曰「醒心」，使巩记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173279_comment'></div>凡公与州之宾客者游焉，则必即丰乐以饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173279_comment'></div>或醉且劳矣，则必即醒心而望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173279_comment'></div>以见夫群山之相环，云烟之相滋，旷野之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173279", 1173279, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>无穷</span>，草树众而泉石嘉，使目新乎其所睹，耳新乎其所闻，则其心洒然而醒，更欲久而忘归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173279_comment'></div>故即其事之所以然而为名，取韩子退之《北湖》之诗云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173279_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173279_comment'></div>其可谓善取乐于山泉之间，而名之以见其实，又善者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173279_comment'></div>虽然，公之乐，吾能言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173279_comment'></div>吾君优游而无为于上，吾民给足而无憾于下，天下之学者皆为材且良，夷狄鸟兽草木之生者皆得其宜，公乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173279_comment'></div>一山之隅，一泉之旁，岂公乐哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173279_comment'></div>乃公所以寄意于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173279_comment'></div>若公之贤，韩子殁数百年，而始有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173279_comment'></div>今同游之宾客，尚未知公之难遇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173279_comment'></div>后百千年，有慕公之为人，而览公之迹，思欲见之，有不可及之叹，然后知公之难遇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173279_comment'></div>则凡同游于此者，其可不喜且幸欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173279_comment'></div>而巩也，又得以文词托名于公文之次，其又不喜且幸欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173279_comment'></div>庆历七年八月十五日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1173279_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_preface_220417'>先生贬守滁。滁，小州，先生为之，殆无事。环州多佳山水，最有名琅琊山。近得之曰幽谷，先生散游其间，又赋诗以乐之。巩得而赓之者，凡九章。</div><div id='poem_preface_220417_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220417'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220417'>阳冰绝艺天下称，琅琊石篆新有名。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220417'>初留泉涯俗谁顾，一日贵重繇先生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220417'>古今书法不可数，犹有字本存于经。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220417'>我于八体未曾学，虽得此字宁能评？<div id='poem_sentence_3_220417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220417'>高文老笔又所爱，欲叙仿佛辞非精。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220417'>笔端应驱鬼神聚，笔妙夐与阴阳争。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220417'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_220417", 220417, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>刻雕</span>万象出冥昧，不见刀斧曾经营。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220417'>奇形挺若耸崖巘，险势直恐生风霆。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220417'>雨来莽苍龙蛟起，秋入寥泬星斗明。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220417'>先生七言载其侧，为地自与丘山平。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220417'>先生抱材置荒郡，有若此字存岩扃。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220417'>当还先生坐廊庙，悉引万事归绳衡。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220417'>遂收此字入秘府，不使日灼莓苔萦。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220417'>高材重宝不失一，唐舜汤禹宁非朋。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220417'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_220417_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_220418' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220418' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220418?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>游琅琊山</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年8月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220418_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220418'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220418'>飞光洗积雪，南山露崔嵬。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220418'>长淮水未绿，深坞花已开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220418'>远闻山中泉，隐若冰谷摧。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220418'>初谁爱苍翠，排空结楼台？<div id='poem_sentence_3_220418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220418'>䡾䡾架梁栋，辉辉刻琼瑰。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220418'>先生鸾凤姿，未免燕雀猜。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220418'>飞鸣失其所，徘徊此山隈。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220418'>万事于人身，九州一浮埃。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220418'>所要挟道德，不愧丘与回。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220418'>先生逐二子，谁能计<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_220418", 220418, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>垠崖</span>？<div id='poem_sentence_9_220418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220418'>所怀虽未写，所适在欢咍。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220418'>为语幕下士，殷勤羞瓮醅。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220418'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_220418_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_220415' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220415' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220415?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span>幽谷晚饮</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年8月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220415_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220415'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220415'>先生卓难攀，材真帝王佐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220415'>皎皎众所病，蜿蜿龙方卧。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220415'>卷彼天下惠，赴此一郡课。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220415'>幕府既多暇，山水乃屡过。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220415'>旌旗拂蒙密，车马经坎坷。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220415'>爱此谷中泉，声响远已播。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220415'>槎横势逾急，雨点绿新破。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220415'>旁生竹相围，竦竦碧千个。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220415'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_220415", 220415, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>遥源</span>窅难窥，磐石坦如磋。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220415'>游鳞戢可数，飞鸟嘤相和。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220415'>援琴薰风后，结宇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_220415", 220415, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>寒岩</span>左。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220415'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_220415", 220415, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>觥筵</span>已得月，金纨尚围坐。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220415'>心如合逍遥，语不缀招些。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220415'>一时耸传观，千载激柔懦。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220415'>《甘棠》诗之怀，岘首泪尝堕。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220415'>况此盛德下，襦裤人所荷。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_220415'>不假碑刻垂，栋牖敢隳挫。<div id='poem_sentence_16_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_220415'>当今甲兵后，天地合<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_220415", 220415, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>轗轲</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_220415'>先生席上珍，岂忍沟中饿？<div id='poem_sentence_18_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_220415'>毋徐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_220415", 220415, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>黑轓</span>召，当驰四方贺。<div id='poem_sentence_19_220415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_220415'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_220415_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　曾巩向欧阳修示王安石文，欧阳修爱叹诵写，并有评述。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　曾巩向欧阳修示王回、王向文，欧阳修亦重之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　欧阳修编《文林》，曾巩、王安石文多编入。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　曾巩自滁返，侍父往京师，欧阳修作《与杜正献公书》荐曾巩。<br /></div>

-----title
商丘
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='37832e6f4d614706a1f35bdcae5c72e4_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("37832e6f4d614706a1f35bdcae5c72e4");'><span id='37832e6f4d614706a1f35bdcae5c72e4_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>，29岁</div><div id='37832e6f4d614706a1f35bdcae5c72e4' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年9月</a>　曾巩作《与王介甫第一书》<div id='poem_1173053' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173053' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173053?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与王介甫第一书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173053")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173053_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173053'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173053'>巩启：近托彦弼、黄九各奉书，当致矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173053_comment'></div>巩至金陵后，自宣化渡江来滁上，见欧阳先生，住且二十日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173053_comment'></div>今从泗上出，及舟船侍从以西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173053_comment'></div>欧公悉见足下之文，爱叹诵写，不胜其勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173053_comment'></div>间以王回、王向文示之，亦以书来，言此人文字可惊，世所无有，盖古之学者有，或气力不足动人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173053_comment'></div>使如此文字不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173053", 1173053, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>光耀</span>于世，吾徒可耻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173053_comment'></div>其重之如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173053_comment'></div>又尝编《文林》者，悉时人之文佳者，此文与足下文多编入矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173053_comment'></div>至此论人事甚众，恨不与足下共<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173053", 1173053, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>讲评</span>之，其恨无量，虽欧公亦然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173053_comment'></div>欧公甚欲一见足下，能作一来计否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173053_comment'></div>胸中事万万，非面不可道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173053_comment'></div>巩此行至春，方应得至京师也，时乞寓书慰区区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173053_comment'></div>疾病尚如黄九见时，未知竟何如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173053_comment'></div>心中有与足下论者，想虽未相见，足下之心潜有同者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173053_comment'></div>欧公更欲足下少<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173053", 1173053, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>开廓</span>其文，勿用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173053", 1173053, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>造语</span>及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173053", 1173053, "Clauses/41/Comments/1")'>摸拟</span>前人，请相度示及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173053_comment'></div>欧云：孟、韩文虽高，不必似之也，取其自然耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173053_comment'></div>馀俟到京作书去，不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173053_comment'></div>巩再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1173053_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　曾巩奉其父至南京，作《上杜相公书》求见。<div id='poem_1173043' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173043' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173043?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上杜相公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173043")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173043_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173043'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173043'>庆历七年九月日，南丰曾巩再拜上书致政相公阁下：巩闻夫宰相者，以己之材为天下用，则用天下而不足；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173043_comment'></div>以天下之材为天下用，则用天下而有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173043_comment'></div>古之称良宰相者无异焉，知此而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173043_comment'></div>舜尝为宰相矣，称其功则曰举八元八凯，称其德则曰无为而治者，其舜也与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173043_comment'></div>卒之为宰相者，无与舜为比也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173043_comment'></div>则宰相之体，其亦可知也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173043_comment'></div>或曰：舜大圣人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173043_comment'></div>或曰：舜远矣，不可尚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173043_comment'></div>请言近之可言者，莫若汉与唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173043_comment'></div>汉之相曰陈平，对文帝曰：「陛下即问<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173043", 1173043, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>决狱</span>，责廷尉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173043_comment'></div>问钱谷，责治粟内史」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173043_comment'></div>对周勃曰：「且陛下问长安盗贼数，又可强对邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173043_comment'></div>问平之所以为宰相者，则曰使卿大夫各得任其职也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173043_comment'></div>观平之所自任者如此，而汉之治莫盛于平为相时，则其所守者可谓当矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173043_comment'></div>降而至于唐，唐之相曰房、杜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173043_comment'></div>当房、杜之时，所与共事则长孙无忌、岑文本，主谏诤则魏郑公、王圭，振纲维则戴胄、刘洎，持宪法则张元素、孙伏伽，用兵征伐则李绩、李靖，长民守土则李大亮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173043_comment'></div>其馀为卿大夫，各任其事，则马周、温彦博、杜正伦、张行成、李纲、虞世南、褚遂良之徒，不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173043_comment'></div>夫谏诤其君，与正纲维、持宪法、用兵征伐、长民守土，皆天下之大务也，而尽付之人，又与人共宰相之任，又有他卿大夫各任其事，则房、杜者何为者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173043_comment'></div>考于其传，不过曰：闻人有善，若己有之，不以求备取人，不以己长格物，随能收叙，不隔卑贱而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173043_comment'></div>卒之称良宰相者，必先此二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173043_comment'></div>然则著于近者，宰相之体，其亦可知也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173043_comment'></div>唐以降，天下未尝无宰相也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173043_comment'></div>称良相者，不过有一二大节可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173043", 1173043, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>道语</span>而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173043_comment'></div>能以天下之材为天下用，真知宰相体者，其谁哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173043_comment'></div>数岁之前，阁下为宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173043_comment'></div>当是时，人主方急于致天下治，而当世之士，豪杰魁垒者，相继而进，杂遝于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173043_comment'></div>虽然，邪者恶之，庸者忌之，亦甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173043_comment'></div>独阁下奋然自信，乐海内之善人用于世，争出其力，以唱而助之，惟恐失其所自立，使豪杰者皆若素繇门下以出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173043_comment'></div>于是与之佐人主，立州县学，为累日之格以励学者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173043_comment'></div>课农桑，以损益之数为吏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1173043", 1173043, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>升黜</span>之法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173043_comment'></div>重<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1173043", 1173043, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>名教</span>，以矫衰弊之俗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173043_comment'></div>变茍且，以起百官众职之坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173043_comment'></div>革任子之滥，明赏罚之信，一切欲整齐法度，以立天下之本，而庶几三代之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173043_comment'></div>虽然，纷而疑且排其议者亦众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173043_comment'></div>阁下复毅然坚金石之断，周旋上下，扶持<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1173043", 1173043, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>树植</span>，欲使其有成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173043_comment'></div>及不合矣，则引身而退，与之俱否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173043_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173043_comment'></div>能以天下之材为天下用，真知宰相体者，非阁下其谁哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173043_comment'></div>使充其所树立，功德可胜道哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173043_comment'></div>虽不充其志，岂愧于二帝、三代、汉唐之为宰相者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173043_comment'></div>若巩者，诚鄙且贱，然常从事于书，而得闻古圣贤之道，每观今贤杰之士，角立并出，与三代、汉唐相侔，则未尝不叹其盛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173043_comment'></div>观阁下与之反复议而更张庶事之意，知后有圣人作，救万事之弊，不易此矣，则未尝不爱其明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173043_comment'></div>观其不合而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1173043", 1173043, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>散逐</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1173043", 1173043, "Clauses/140/Comments/1")'>消藏</span>，则未尝不恨其道之难行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173043_comment'></div>以叹其盛、爱其明、恨其道之难行之心，岂须臾忘其人哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173043_comment'></div>地之相去也千里，世之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1173043", 1173043, "Clauses/145/Comments/0")'>相后</span>也千载，尚慕而欲见之，况同其时，过其门墙之下也欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173043_comment'></div>今也过阁下之门，又当阁下释衮冕而归，非干名<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1173043", 1173043, "Clauses/151/Comments/0")'>蹈利</span>者所趋走之日，故敢道其所以然，而并书杂文一编，以为进拜之资，蒙赐之一见焉，则其愿得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173043_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173043_comment'></div>贤阁下之心，非系于见否也，而复汲汲如是者，盖其忻慕之志而已耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173043_comment'></div>伏惟幸察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173043_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173043_comment'></div>巩再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1173043_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　曾巩作《上杜相公》<div id='poem_220165' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220165' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173130_comment'></div>余为之言曰：古之士大夫倦而归者，安车几杖，膳羞被服，百物之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173130", 1173130, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173130", 1173130, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>属好</span>之交不与，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173130", 1173130, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>约居</span>而独游，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173130", 1173130, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>散弃</span>乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173130", 1173130, "Clauses/32/Comments/1")'>山墟</span>林莽陋巷穷闾之间，如此，其于长者薄也，亦曷能使其不欿然于心邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173130_comment'></div>虽然，不及乎尊事，可以委蛇其身而益闲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173130_comment'></div>不享乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173130", 1173130, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>珍好</span>，可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173130", 1173130, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>窒烦</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173130", 1173130, "Clauses/40/Comments/1")'>除薄</span>而益安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173130_comment'></div>不去乎深山长谷，岂不足以易其庠序之位；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173130_comment'></div>不居其荣，岂有患乎其辱哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173130_comment'></div>然则古之所以殷勤奉老者，皆世之任事者所自为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173130_comment'></div>于士之倦而归者，顾为烦且劳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173130_comment'></div>今之置古事者，顾有司为少耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173130_comment'></div>士之老于其家者，独得其自肆也，然则何为动其意邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173130_comment'></div>余为之言者，尚书屯田员外郎周君中复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173130_comment'></div>周君与先人俱天圣二年进士，与余旧且好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173130_comment'></div>既为之辨其不释然者，又欲其有以处而乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173130_comment'></div>读余言者，可无异周君而病今之失矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173130_comment'></div>南丰曾巩序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1173130_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　曾巩居南丰丁父忧，作《留山中诸君子见访》<div id='poem_220261' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220261' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220261?labeling=true' target='_blank'>留山中诸君子见访</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220261")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220261_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220261'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220261'>茅舍开扉胜事稠，况携佳客此中游。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220261_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220261'>妖红落后坚松在，南涧清时野潦收。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220261_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220261'>林带寒烟如水合，山含晴日似尘浮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220261_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220261'>不嫌淡薄幽人趣，欲进藜羹更少留。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220261_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220261'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220261_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　曾巩居南丰丁父忧，撰《本朝政要策》五十首。<div id='poem_1173194' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173194' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173194?labeling=true' target='_blank'>本朝政要策上<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>考课</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173194")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173194_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173194'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173194'>建隆初，始以户口增耗为州县吏岁课之升降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173194_comment'></div>兴国初，又定三等之法，以核能否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173194_comment'></div>其后遂诏郭贽、滕中正、雷德骧典其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173194_comment'></div>雍熙间，上尝阅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173194", 1173194, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>班簿</span>，欲择用人，而患不能遍知群下之材，始诏德骧以群臣功过之迹引与俱对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173194_comment'></div>淳化中，又分京朝官考课，使王沔主之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173194_comment'></div>幕职州县官考课，使张宏主之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173194_comment'></div>三班考课，使魏廷式主之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173194_comment'></div>沔既条奏其法，于是御史弋子元、郎吏张绅皆以负黜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173194_comment'></div>然沔之法，亦以烦碎无待士君子之体，物议非之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173194_comment'></div>久之，复废京朝官考课，而置审官院，以钱若水主之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173194_comment'></div>废州县官考课，归之流内铨，以苏易简主之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173194_comment'></div>唯三班无所改易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173194_comment'></div>其后，天子又尝欲自宰相修唐制书考之事，既而但欲责其称职，遂不行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173194_comment'></div>然亲书考课最之意二十馀幅，以赐若水等，盖其丁宁之意如此焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173194_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1173194'>自本文至下卷《茶》，总题为「本朝政要策五十首」，今釐为上、下二卷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1173194_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173195' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173195' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173195?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>训兵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173195_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173195'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173195'>古者四时田猎，以习武事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173195_comment'></div>孔子讥不教民战者，《周礼》司马军旅之政详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173195_comment'></div>战国至于汉唐，兵法尤具焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173195_comment'></div>自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173195", 1173195, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>府卫</span>废，而执兵者皆市人，故有天宝之败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173195_comment'></div>以至晋汉，兵虽数十万，而皆不素习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173195_comment'></div>士居閒暇，则自为生业，将乘势重，则取其课直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173195_comment'></div>至周世宗高平之退，遂收骁勇之士，命太祖习焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173195_comment'></div>取其尤者为殿前军，而禁卫之精，自此始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173195_comment'></div>宋兴，益修其法，壮锐者升其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173195", 1173195, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>军籍</span>，老懦者黜而去之，以至太宗、真宗屡自临试而蒐择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173195_comment'></div>故兴国有杨村之阅，咸平有东武之蒐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173195_comment'></div>军旅之盛，近世无比焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173195_comment'></div>然自此兵益以广，议者以动众为疑，而简练之网遂疏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173195", 1173195, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>黜废</span>之法益恕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173195_comment'></div>虽天子丁宁，欲救其敝，而群臣莫能奉其意焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1173195_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173196' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173196' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173196?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>添兵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173196_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173196'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173196'>唐罢府兵，始置神武、神策为禁兵，不过三数万人，以备天子扈从藩卫而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173196_comment'></div>故禄山之叛，驱市人以战贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173196_comment'></div>德宗蒙尘，扈驾者四百馀骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173196_comment'></div>甲兵皆散在郡国，自河朔三镇不统于京师，馀可举者，太原、青社各十万人，邠宁、宣武各六万人，潞、徐、荆、扬各五万人，襄、宣、寿、镇海各二万人，而观察、团练据要害之地者，亦各不下万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173196_comment'></div>五代之际，四方割裂，以区区中州之地，晋汉之兵尝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173196", 1173196, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>至于</span>数十万人，养之既费，教与用之又皆不得其理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173196_comment'></div>周世宗高平之退，中国兵制始修列焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173196_comment'></div>宋兴，太祖监前世之敝，益修教习之法，始黜老懦之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173196_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173196", 1173196, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>至于</span>边鄙，务在择用将帅，以折冲一方之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173196_comment'></div>故姚内斌领庆州，董遵诲领环州，二人所领之兵，才五六千而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173196_comment'></div>当是之时，举中国之兵，才十六万人，平五强国，不知兵之少也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173196_comment'></div>至太宗伐刘继元，驾前之兵盖十馀万，兵之稍稍益广自是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173196_comment'></div>其后曹彬之败祁沟关也，在行之兵实二十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173196_comment'></div>既而杨业败于陈家谷口，刘廷让败于君子馆，全军殁焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173196_comment'></div>士卒前后战死，沿边疮痍之兵不满万计，皆无斗志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173196_comment'></div>河朔震摇，悉科乡民为兵以守城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173196_comment'></div>咸平之间，又集近京诸州丁壮以为兵，而西北边臣犹请益兵不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173196_comment'></div>张齐贤请调江淮丁壮八万以益西师，天子忧之，谓吕蒙正曰：「方事之警急，升卫亦可抽减，其如卫兵，数亦不足」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173196_comment'></div>蒙正复请取河南丁壮以益兵，天子难其言，然不得已而卒听焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173196_comment'></div>其后又请济师不已，遂令刘承圭取环庆诸州役兵，升为禁兵，号振武军以益焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173196_comment'></div>自此募兵之法益广矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173196_comment'></div>天子延见近臣，屡叹兵数之倍，而思太祖之法，有减兵之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173196_comment'></div>尝曰：虽议者恐其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173196", 1173196, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>动众</span>，亦当断在必行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173196_comment'></div>然群臣莫能承上意焉。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1173196'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1173196_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173197' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173197' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173197?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span>兵器</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173197_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173197'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173197'>百工之事，皆圣人为，而其于兵械尤重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173197_comment'></div>弓矢之取诸睽，始见于经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173197_comment'></div>至于《周官·考工》所陈五兵之法，可谓详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173197_comment'></div>汉兴，言兵者十三家，其要皆以便手足，利器械，立攻守之胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173197_comment'></div>语曰：器不坚利，与徒抟同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173197_comment'></div>是兵械之不可不修也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173197_comment'></div>宋兴，太祖将平定四方，命魏丕主作，责以称职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173197_comment'></div>每造兵器，十日一进，谓之旬课，上亲阅之，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173197", 1173197, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>作治</span>之巧尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173197_comment'></div>国工署有南北作坊，岁造甲铠、贝装、鎗、剑、刀、锯、器械、箭箶簏、皮笠、弩橦、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173197", 1173197, "Clauses/26/Comments/10")'>床子弩</span>，凡三万二千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173197_comment'></div>又有弓弩院，岁造弓、弩、箭、弦、镞等，凡千六百五十馀万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173197_comment'></div>诸州岁造弓、弩、箭、剑、甲、兜鍪、甲叶、箭镞等，凡六百二十馀万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173197_comment'></div>又别造诸兵幕、甲袋、钲、鼓、炮、炒锅、䥷、行槽、锹、钁、镰、斧等，谓之什器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173197_comment'></div>凡诸兵械，置五库以贮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173197_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173197", 1173197, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>戎具</span>精劲，近古未有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173197_comment'></div>景德中，以岁造之器可支三二十年，而创作未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173197_comment'></div>天子念劳费之宜省也，因遣内都知秦翰阅武库所聚，令给用有馀，诸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173197", 1173197, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>作治</span>以权宜罢焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1173197_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173198' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173198' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173198?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span>城垒</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173198_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173198'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173198'>周世宗时，韩通筑城于李晏口，凡立十二县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173198_comment'></div>又筑束鹿，增鼓城，葺祁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173198_comment'></div>数年，又自浮阳至乾宁，补坏防，筑游口三十六，遂通瀛、莫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173198_comment'></div>宋兴，王全斌葺镇州西山堡障，刘遇筑保州、威虏、静戎、平塞、长城等五城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173198_comment'></div>太宗既平太原，以潘美守之，隳旧州，迁于榆次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173198_comment'></div>又命美镇三交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173198_comment'></div>三交在西北三百里，地号故军，溪谷险绝，为戎人之咽喉，多由此入寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173198_comment'></div>美帅师袭之，伪军使安庆以城降，因积粟屯兵以守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173198_comment'></div>久之，迁并州于三交，以美为帅焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1173198_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173199' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173199' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173199?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span>宗庙</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173199_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173199'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173199'>尧舜禹皆立二昭二穆，与始祖之庙而五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173199_comment'></div>商人祀汤与契，及昭穆之庙而六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173199_comment'></div>周人祀后稷、文、武，及亲庙而七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173199_comment'></div>汉初立庙不合古制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173199_comment'></div>至晋，采《周官》，定七庙之数，而虚太祖之室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173199_comment'></div>隋兴，但立高曾祖祢四庙而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173199_comment'></div>唐初因其制，贞观立七庙，天宝祠九室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173199_comment'></div>梁氏以来，皆立四庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173199_comment'></div>宋兴，采张昭、任彻之议，追尊僖、顺、翼、宣四祖而立其庙，用近制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173199_comment'></div>盖自祢至于高祖，亲亲之恩尽矣，故有四庙之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173199_comment'></div>前世祖有功，宗有德，不可预为其数，故有五庙、六庙、七庙之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173199_comment'></div>先儒以谓有其人则七，无其人则五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173199_comment'></div>此古今之文，损益之数昭昭可考者也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1173199_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173200' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173200' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173200?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span>边籴</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173200_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173200'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173200'>建隆元年，以河北仍岁丰稔谷贱，命高其价以籴之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1173200_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173201' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173201' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173201?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span>常平仓</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173201_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173201'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173201'>淳化二年，诏置常平仓，命常参官领之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173201_comment'></div>岁熟增价以籴，岁歉减价以粜，用赈贫民，复旧制也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1173201_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173202' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173202' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173202?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span>侦探</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173202_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173202'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173202'>淳化中，柴禹锡、赵镕掌机务，潜遣吏卒变服侦事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173202_comment'></div>卒王遂与卖书人韩玉有不平，诬玉有恶言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173202_comment'></div>禹锡等以状闻，上怒诛玉，京师人皆冤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173202_comment'></div>自是廉得他事，上不复听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173202_comment'></div>至道中，又有赵赞，性险诐捷给，专伺中书、枢密及三司事，乘间言于上，上以为忠无他肠，中外畏其口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173202_comment'></div>既而天子觉悟，卒诛赞焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1173202_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173203' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173203' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173203?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span>贡举</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173203_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173203'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173203'>贡举之制，建隆初始禁谢恩于私室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173203_comment'></div>开宝五年，召进士安守亮等三十八人对于讲武殿下，诏赐其第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173203_comment'></div>六年，又召宋准等覆试于讲武殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173203_comment'></div>殿试自此始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173203_comment'></div>自隋大业中，始设进士科，至唐以来尤盛，岁取不过三十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173203_comment'></div>咸亨、上元中，增至七八十，寻亦复故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173203_comment'></div>开成中，连岁取四十人，又复旧制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173203_comment'></div>进士外以经中科者，亦不过百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173203_comment'></div>至太宗即位，兴国二年，以郡县阙官，旬浃之间，拔士几五百，以补<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173203", 1173203, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>阙员</span>而振滞淹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173203_comment'></div>又未命官，而赐之绿袍靴笏，使解褐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173203_comment'></div>八年，进士万二百六十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173203_comment'></div>淳化二年，万七千三百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173203_comment'></div>始命知贡举苏易简等受诏即赴贡院，不更至私第，以防请托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173203_comment'></div>至殿试，又为糊名之制。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1173203_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173204' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173204' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173204?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十一 </span>军赏罚</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173204_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173204'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173204'>天宝之后，将之废置出于军，则军之骄可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173204_comment'></div>五代之际，国之兴亡出于军，则军之骄又可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173204_comment'></div>及周世宗奋然独见，诛败挠之将，而军之约束始修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173204_comment'></div>太祖之为将也，每有临阵逗挠不用命者，必斫其皮笠以志之，明日悉斩以徇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173204_comment'></div>自是人皆死战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173204_comment'></div>及太祖受天命，谓征蜀诸将曰：「所破郡县，当倾帑藏，为朕赏战士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173204_comment'></div>国家所取，惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173204", 1173204, "Clauses/20/Comments/1")'>土疆</span>尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173204_comment'></div>故人皆用命，所至成功，如席卷之易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173204_comment'></div>蜀既平，择其亲兵得百二十人，隶殿前司，谓之川班殿直，廪赐优给，与御马直等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173204_comment'></div>其后郊祀优赏，太祖特诏赏御马直，更增五十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173204_comment'></div>而川班殿直以不在此例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173204_comment'></div>击登闻鼓诉之，太祖怒，立命中使执归本营，各杖二十，明日尽戮于营中，馀八十人配诸州，遂废其班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173204_comment'></div>初，太祖尝问：「唐庄宗享国不久，何也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173204_comment'></div>飞龙使李重进对曰：「庄宗好畋，而将士<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173204", 1173204, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>骄纵</span>姑息，每出近郊，卫士必控马首曰：『儿郎辈寒，必望敕赐』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173204_comment'></div>庄宗即随所欲给之，如此者非一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173204_comment'></div>末年之祸，盖令不行而赏赉无节也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173204_comment'></div>太祖抚手叹曰：「二十年夹河战争取天下，而不能以军法约束此辈，纵其无厌之求，诚为儿戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173204_comment'></div>我今养士卒，固不吝爵赏，但犯法者，惟有剑耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173204_comment'></div>及闻川班殿直之诉，使中使谓之曰：「朕之所与，便为恩泽，又焉有例」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173204_comment'></div>故尽诛之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173204_comment'></div>世宗、太祖之驭军赏罚如此，故世宗取淮南、关南之地，太祖平五强国，如拾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173204", 1173204, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>地芥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173204_comment'></div>由是观之，军无骄否，惟所驭之术何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173204_comment'></div>若太祖之智，可谓神矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1173204_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173205' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173205' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173205?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十二 </span>雅乐</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173205_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173205'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173205'>周世宗患雅乐陵替，得王朴、窦俨考正之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173205_comment'></div>宋兴，俨定文舞为文德之舞，武舞为武功之舞，大朝会用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173205_comment'></div>又定十二曲名，以为祭祀、会朝出入之节焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173205_comment'></div>朴、俨所考正，有未备者，和岘继成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173205_comment'></div>然裁减旧乐，乃太祖之圣意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173205_comment'></div>章圣用随月之律，主上新皇祐之制，雅乐备焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1173205_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173206' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173206' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173206?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十三 </span>佛教</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173206_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173206'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173206'>建隆初，诏佛寺已废于显德中，不得复兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173206_comment'></div>开宝中，令僧尼百人许岁度一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173206_comment'></div>至道初，又令三百人岁度一人，以诵经五百纸为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173206", 1173206, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>合格</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173206_comment'></div>先是泉州奏僧尼未度者四千人，已度者万数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173206_comment'></div>天子惊骇，遂下诏曰：古者一夫耕，三人食，尚有受馁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173206_comment'></div>今一夫耕，十人食，天下安得不重困？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173206_comment'></div>水旱安得无转死之民？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173206_comment'></div>东南之俗，游惰不职者，跨村连邑，去而为僧，朕甚嫉焉，故立此制。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1173206_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173207' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173207' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173207?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十四 </span>史官</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173207_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173207'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173207'>天子，动则左史书之，《春秋》是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173207_comment'></div>言则右史书之，《尚书》是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173207_comment'></div>汉武帝有禁中起居注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173207_comment'></div>魏晋归之著作，其后亦命近臣典其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173207_comment'></div>后魏始置起居令史，行幸宴会，则在御座前记君臣酬答之语，又别置起居注二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173207_comment'></div>北齐有起居省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173207_comment'></div>隋置起居舍人二人，以掌内史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173207_comment'></div>唐起居之官隶于门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173207_comment'></div>显庆中，即与舍人分隶两省，每天子御殿，则左右夹香案，分立殿下螭头之侧，和墨濡翰，皆就螭头之坳处，有命则临陛俯听，对而书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173207_comment'></div>典礼文物、册命启奏、群臣薨免惩劝之事，悉载于起居注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173207_comment'></div>季冬终，则送于史官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173207_comment'></div>长寿中，姚璹以为帝王谟训，不可使无纪述，若不宣自宰相，史官无由而书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173207_comment'></div>请仗下所言军国政要，命宰相一人专知撰录，季终付于史官，即今之时政记也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173207_comment'></div>元和十二年，又委承旨宰相宣示左右起居注，令其缀录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173207_comment'></div>大和九年，诏郎、舍人准故事入阁，日赍纸笔，立于螭头，以记言动，故文宗实录为备焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173207_comment'></div>至后唐，明宗亦命端明殿学士、枢密直学士修日历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173207_comment'></div>世宗用陶谷之言，修明宗之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173207_comment'></div>开宝中，扈蒙为修撰，以谓内庭日历，枢密院抄录送史官所记者，不过对见辞谢而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173207_comment'></div>盖宰相虞漏泄，而史官限疏远，故莫得而具也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173207_comment'></div>请言动可书者，委宰相、参政，月录以送史官，使修日历，遂以参知政事卢多逊专其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173207_comment'></div>兴国中，诏书病史氏之漏落，又以参知政事李昉专其任，而枢密院亦令副使一人专知纂述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173207_comment'></div>昉请每月先以奏御，乃送史官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173207_comment'></div>时政记之奏御，自昉始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173207_comment'></div>淳化之间，从张佖之请，始置起居院，修左右史之职，以梁周翰掌起居郎事，李宗谔掌舍人事焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173207_comment'></div>周翰、宗谔言：「崇德殿、长春殿宣谕论列之事，时政记记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173207_comment'></div>枢密院事关机密，本院记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173207_comment'></div>馀百司封拜除改、沿革制撰之事，请悉使条送，以备论撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173207_comment'></div>月终皆送史官」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173207_comment'></div>从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173207_comment'></div>又令郎、舍人分直崇政殿，记言动，别为起居注，每月先以奏御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173207_comment'></div>起居注奏御，自周翰、宗谔始也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1173207_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173208' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173208' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173208?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十五 </span>正量衡</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173208_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173208'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173208'>建隆初，颁量衡于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173208_comment'></div>淳化中，以太府之式，不足以合信取平，守藏吏缘为奸，天下岁输者，至于破产以万数，守者更代，动必数岁计争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173208_comment'></div>于是天子诏有司，使为新法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173208_comment'></div>刘承圭、刘蒙言：「权衡之法起于黍，十黍为累，十累为铢，四十铢为两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173208_comment'></div>度之法起于忽，十忽为丝，十丝为毫，十毫为釐，十釐为分，为一累四黍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173208_comment'></div>以开元通宝钱肉好周均者校之，十分为钱，十钱为两，自分釐毫丝忽，转转十倍增之，凡一钱为十万忽，因取毫发计之，皆有准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173208_comment'></div>自一钱至半钱为衡以较之，得钱二千四百，轻重等者为十五斤，可施用，并以丝忽毫氂铢累之准」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173208_comment'></div>奏御，诏三司较之，以御书淳化三体钱二千四百，磨令与开元通宝钱轻重等，定其法为新式，颁之天下，权衡之法得焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1173208_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173209' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173209' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173209?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十六 </span>户口版图</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173209_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173209'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173209'>太祖元年，有州一百一十一，县六百三十，户九十六万七千三百五十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173209_comment'></div>末年，州二百九十七，县一千八百六，户二百五十万八千九百六十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173209_comment'></div>兴国初，有上言事以闰为限，三岁一令天下贡地图与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173209", 1173209, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>版籍</span>，上尚书省，所以周知地理之险易，户口之众寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173209_comment'></div>至道初，又令更造天下州县户口之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173209", 1173209, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>版籍</span>焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1173209_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173210' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173210' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173210?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十七 </span>任将</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173210_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173210'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173210'>太祖之置将也，隆之以恩，厚之以诚，富之以财，小其名而崇其势，略其细而求其大，久其官而责其成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173210_comment'></div>每朝必命坐，赐与优厚，抚而遣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173210_comment'></div>尝令为郭进治第，悉用𤭁瓦，有司言非亲王、公主不得用之，上曰：「郭进控扼西山十馀年，使我无北顾忧，我视进岂减儿女耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173210_comment'></div>趣作无复言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173210_comment'></div>此可谓隆之以恩矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173210_comment'></div>取董遵诲于仇雠，取姚内斌于俘虏，皆用之不惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173210_comment'></div>郭进在西山，尝有军校讼其不法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173210_comment'></div>上曰：「进驭下严，是必罪人惧进法，欲诬进以自免也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173210_comment'></div>使中人执以赐进，令诘而杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173210_comment'></div>此可谓厚之以诚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173210_comment'></div>西北边军市之租，多赐诸将，不问出入，往往赏赉又辄以千万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173210_comment'></div>李汉超守关南，属州钱七八万贯，悉以给与，又加赐赉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173210_comment'></div>汉超犹私贩榷场，规免<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173210", 1173210, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>商算</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173210_comment'></div>有以事闻者，上即诏汉超私物所在，悉免<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173210", 1173210, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>关征</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173210_comment'></div>故边将皆养士足以得死力，用閒足以得敌情，以居则安，以动则胜，此可谓富之以财矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173210_comment'></div>李汉超、郭进皆终于观察使，所居不过巡检使之名，终不以大将处之，然皆得以便宜从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173210_comment'></div>郭进在西山，上每遣戍卒，必谕之曰：「汝等谨奉法，我犹赦汝，郭进杀汝矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173210_comment'></div>其假借如此，故郭进所至，兵未尝小衄，此可谓小其名而崇其势矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173210_comment'></div>王彦升之好勇，冯继业之自伐，然用彦升守原州，继业守灵州，皆边境以安，此可谓略其小而求其大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173210_comment'></div>何继筠屯棣州二十馀年，董遵诲屯通远军四十年，其馀皆不减十馀年，边境赖之，此可谓久其官而责其成矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173210_comment'></div>夫宠之以非常之恩，则其感深；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173210_comment'></div>待之以赤心，则其志固；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173210_comment'></div>养之以关市之租，则其力足；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173210_comment'></div>小其名而不挠其权，则在位者有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173210", 1173210, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>赴功</span>之心，而勇智者得以骋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173210_comment'></div>略其过则材能进，久其任而功利悉，自古用将之术，不易于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173210_comment'></div>太祖兼用之，故以李汉超屯关南，马仁瑀守瀛州，韩令坤镇常山，贺惟忠守易州，何继筠领棣州，以防北虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173210_comment'></div>郭进控西山，武守琪戍晋州，李谦溥守隰州，李继勋镇昭义，以御太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173210_comment'></div>赵赞屯延州，姚内斌守庆州，董遵诲屯环州，王彦升守原州，冯继业守灵武，以备西戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173210_comment'></div>如姚内斌、董遵诲之徒，所领不过五六千人，而威名皆行乎戎狄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173210_comment'></div>当此之时，建隆元年六月，诛李重进，收潞州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173210_comment'></div>十一月，诛李筠，收扬州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173210_comment'></div>四年，收湖南北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173210_comment'></div>六年，收蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173210_comment'></div>十三年，收南越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173210_comment'></div>十七年，定江表之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173210_comment'></div>内则吴越、闽海岁奉贡职，外则交州丁琏、高丽王胄请吏向化，而契丹修好之使，数至于阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173210_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1173210", 1173210, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>拱挹指麾</span>，而天下一定，不知封疆之忧，盖太祖用将之术如此，故养士少而蓄力多，操术简而收功博也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1173210_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173211' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173211' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173211?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十八 </span>水灾</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173211_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173211'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173211'>周世宗尝使窦俨论<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173211", 1173211, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>水沴</span>所兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173211_comment'></div>俨以谓阴阳者水火之本，阴之主始于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173211", 1173211, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>渊献</span>，水之行纪于九六，凡千七百二十有八岁，为浩浩之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173211_comment'></div>当此之时，虽有周、唐之君，不能弭其患者，数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173211_comment'></div>若至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173211", 1173211, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>后辟</span>狂妄以自率，权臣冒昧以下专，政不明，贤不章，则苦雨数至，潦水厚积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173211_comment'></div>德宗壬申之水者，政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173211_comment'></div>汉以来言灾异者亦然，然则诚古今之通论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173211_comment'></div>宋兴，常雨之沴，间辄有之，然未尝有百川沸腾、黎民昏垫之患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173211_comment'></div>而太祖开宝之间，常以霖雨之忧，出后宫以销幽闭之感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173211_comment'></div>太宗淳化之岁，尝自七月至九月雨不止，崇明门外皆浮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173211", 1173211, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>罂筏</span>以济，壁垒庐舍多坏，人多压死，物价踊贵，秋敛用微，于是流移者众，而陈、颍、宋、亳之间，盗亦稍稍而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173211_comment'></div>太宗加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173211", 1173211, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>给复</span>之恩，赐糜淖之饷，以救其变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173211_comment'></div>此祖宗所以惧天灾、图政务之遗事也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173211_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173212' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173212' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173212?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十九 </span>汴水</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173212_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173212'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173212'>昔禹于荣泽下分大河为阴沟，出之淮泗，至浚仪西北，复分二渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173212_comment'></div>其后或曰鸿沟，始皇疏之以灌魏郡者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173212_comment'></div>或曰浪宕渠，自荥阳五池口来注鸿沟者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173212_comment'></div>或曰浚仪渠，汉明帝时，循河流故渎作渠，渠成，流注浚仪者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173212_comment'></div>或曰石门渠，灵帝时，于敖城西北累石为门，以遏渠口者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173212_comment'></div>石门渠东合济水，与河渠东注，至敖山之北，而兼汴水，又东至荥阳之北，而旃然之水，东流入汴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173212_comment'></div>荥阳之西有广武二城，汴水自二城间小涧中东流而出，济水至此乃绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173212_comment'></div>桓温将通之而不果者，晋太和之中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173212_comment'></div>刘裕浚之，始有湍流奔注，而岸善溃塞，裕更疏凿以漕运者，义熙之间也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173212_comment'></div>皇甫谊发河南丁夫百万开之，起<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173212", 1173212, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>荥泽</span>入淮，千有馀里，更名之曰通济渠者，隋大业之初也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173212_comment'></div>裴耀卿言江南租船，自淮西北，曰鸿沟，转相输，纳于河阴、含嘉、太原等仓，凡三年，运米七百万石者，唐开元之际也，后世因其利焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173212_comment'></div>太宗尝命张洎论著其兴凿漕运之本末如此，宋至道之间也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1173212_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173213' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173213' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173213?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二十 </span>刑法</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173213_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173213'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173213'>太祖始用士人治州郡之狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173213_comment'></div>太宗即位，尤重用典刑，哀矜之诏，岁辄有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173213_comment'></div>刑部设详覆之员，诸路命纠察之使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173213_comment'></div>至于淳化，又置<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173213", 1173213, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>审刑院</span>于禁中，防大理、刑部之失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173213_comment'></div>凡具狱，先上二司，然后关报审刑，事从中覆，然后下丞相府，又以闻，始命论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173213_comment'></div>盖其重慎之备如此焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1173213_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173214' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173214' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173214?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二十一 </span>管榷</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173214_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173214'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173214'>太祖知百姓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173214", 1173214, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>疾苦</span>五代之政，欲与之休息，故诏书屡下，弛盐禁于河北，实盐价于海濒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173214_comment'></div>有司尝欲重新茶之估以出于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173214_comment'></div>上曰：「是不重困吾人耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173214_comment'></div>遂置其议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173214_comment'></div>既平五强国，收天下之地，未尝不去其烦苛，与百姓更始焉，故民始得更生于水火之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173214_comment'></div>当是之时，靡敝少而用约也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173214_comment'></div>自时以来，兵籍既众，他费稍稍亦滋，锢利之法始急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173214_comment'></div>于是言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173214", 1173214, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>矾课</span>则刘熙古，深<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173214", 1173214, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>茶禁</span>则樊若水，峻酒榷则程能，变盐令则杨允恭，各骋其意，从而助之者寖广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173214_comment'></div>自此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173214", 1173214, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>山海</span>之入，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173214", 1173214, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>征榷</span>之算，古禁之尚疏者皆密焉，犹不能以为足也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1173214_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173215' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173215' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173215?labeling=true' target='_blank'>本朝政要策下<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>历</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173215")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173215_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173215'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173215'>察天时以授民事，则历象不可不谨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173215_comment'></div>唐虞以来尚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173215_comment'></div>唐高祖有戊寅之历，高宗有麟德之历，中宗有景龙之历，明皇有大衍之历，肃宗有至德之历，代宗有五纪之历，德宗有正元之历，宪宗有观象之历，穆宗有宣明之历，昭悯有崇元之历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173215_comment'></div>自时以后，至于梁唐，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173215", 1173215, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>日官</span>之任缺焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173215_comment'></div>晋高祖始用赵仁锜，有调元之历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173215_comment'></div>周世宗用王朴，有钦天之历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173215_comment'></div>当朴之成历也，王处讷谓之曰：「此历可且行，久则差矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173215_comment'></div>既而果然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173215_comment'></div>宋兴，命处讷正之，于是有应天之历，久之又差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173215_comment'></div>而苗守信等承诏论定，于是有乾元之历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173215_comment'></div>至道、淳化之间，王睿、郑昭晏之徒屡校其疏密，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173215", 1173215, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>日官</span>韩显符始定浑仪之器，杨文溢增用甲子之数，皆施行焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173215_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173216' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173216' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173216?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>钱币</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173216_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173216'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173216'>兴国初，绌江南铁钱，铸农器以给流民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173216_comment'></div>而于江东之地，始铸铜钱，民便之，自樊若水始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173216_comment'></div>其后以铅锡杂铸，虽岁增数倍，而钱始粗恶，自张齐贤始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173216_comment'></div>淳化之间，赵安易请铸大钱行于蜀，自大臣皆以为不可，而安易之辨不可屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173216_comment'></div>既铸非便，天子卒断而罢之焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1173216_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173217' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173217'
