class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173217?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>宦者</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173217_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173217'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173217'>淳化中，改黄门院为内侍省，而置昭宣使，以王延德、王继恩、杜彦钧处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173217_comment'></div>继恩收蜀有功，宰相欲以为宣徽使，天子以为宦官不可令预政事，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173217", 1173217, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>切责</span>宰相，而置宣政使以命继恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173217_comment'></div>其后张洎居翰林，请以蓝敏正为学士，裴愈副之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173217_comment'></div>上曰：「此乱政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173217_comment'></div>朕方复古道，安得踵此覆辙邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173217_comment'></div>洎惭而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173217_comment'></div>盖祖宗之明理乱、慎威福之渐如此焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1173217_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173218' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173218' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173218?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span>学校</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173218_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173218'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173218'>宋兴，承五代之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173218_comment'></div>建隆初，尝命崔颂教国子，始聚生徒讲学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173218_comment'></div>天子使使者临赐酒果，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173218", 1173218, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>宠厉</span>学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173218_comment'></div>淳化中，上始视学，命孙奭讲《说命》之篇，天子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173218", 1173218, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>嗟异</span>久之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1173218_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173219' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173219' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173219?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span>名教</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173219_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173219'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173219'>唐氏五代之乱，教化之事久缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173219_comment'></div>雍熙初，始敕群臣用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173219", 1173219, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>通丧</span>之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173219_comment'></div>至道之间，近臣有不能养者，上为赐钱，使迎其母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173219_comment'></div>而使者亦言蜀人有仕于中州，其父家居不能自存者，天子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173219", 1173219, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>惊叹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173219_comment'></div>于是诏书遂下，称<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173219", 1173219, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>人子</span>之义，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173219", 1173219, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>风晓</span>切责，而使执法举不能养者，定著于令焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1173219_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173220' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173220' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173220?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span>铨选</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173220_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173220'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173220'>建隆初，定<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173220", 1173220, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>考判</span>之制，著循资之格。</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1173220_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173221' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173221' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173221?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span>蜡祭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173221_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173221'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173221'>博士和岘言：蜡始伊耆，而三代有嘉平清祀蜡祭之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173221_comment'></div>蜡，腊之别名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173221_comment'></div>汉乘火德，以戌日为腊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173221_comment'></div>腊，接也，言新故相接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173221_comment'></div>故田猎取禽以报百神，享宗庙，旁及五祀，以致孝尽虔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173221_comment'></div>晋魏同之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173221_comment'></div>唐以土王，贞观之际，尚用前寅蜡百神，卯日祭社宫，辰日腊宗庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173221_comment'></div>至开元始定礼制，三祭皆于腊辰，以应土德，议者是之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173221_comment'></div>宋兴，推应火行，以戌日为腊，而独以前七日辛卯蜡，不应于礼，请如开元故事，蜡百神，祀社稷，享宗庙，同用戌腊，如礼便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173221_comment'></div>制曰「可」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1173221_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173222' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173222' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173222?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span>感生帝</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173222_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173222'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173222'>乾德初，用博士聂崇义之言，以赤帝为感生，每岁正月祠，用坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173222_comment'></div>其后又以正月上辛祀昊天上帝，五帝皆从祀，与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173222", 1173222, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>感生帝</span>祭同日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173222_comment'></div>既渎，且从祀礼杀，失所以致崇极意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173222_comment'></div>自此，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173222", 1173222, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>感生帝</span>始别祭，不从祀昊天。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1173222_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173223' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173223' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173223?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span>西京郊配</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173223_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173223'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173223'>太祖开宝元年，幸河南，定<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173223", 1173223, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>圆丘</span>之位，以四月郊祀上帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173223_comment'></div>将行，躬告于太庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173223_comment'></div>既行，不载主焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1173223_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173224' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173224' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173224?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span>祠太一</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173224_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173224'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173224'>兴国中，兆太一于城南，用学士张齐贤、春官正楚芝兰领祠事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173224_comment'></div>齐贤等以为太一者五帝之佐，天之贵神，祠宜半祀天之礼又小损之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173224_comment'></div>天子使加伶官百人，自昏祠至明，如汉制焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1173224_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173225' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173225' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173225?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十一 </span>郊配</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173225_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173225'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173225'>太祖已尊四祖之庙，郊祀以宣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173225", 1173225, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>祖配</span>天，宗祀以翼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173225", 1173225, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>祖配</span>帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173225_comment'></div>及太宗继大统，礼官以为王业所兴自太祖始，故兴国之初，天子再郊，皆太<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173225", 1173225, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>祖配</span>天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173225_comment'></div>及欲封泰山，扈蒙建白，以谓严父莫大于配天，宜以宣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173225", 1173225, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>祖配</span>天，太<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173225", 1173225, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>祖配</span>帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173225_comment'></div>其后封禅之礼辍，而雍熙之郊，遂用蒙议，学者病之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173225_comment'></div>至淳化之春，合祭天地于圜丘，遂以宣祖、太祖同配，如永徽故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173225_comment'></div>自此，孟春祈谷，孟冬祀神州，季秋大飨明堂，用宣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173225", 1173225, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>祖配</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173225_comment'></div>冬至祀昊天，夏至祀皇地祗，孟夏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173225", 1173225, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>雩祀</span>，用太<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173225", 1173225, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>祖配</span>，如永泰之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173225_comment'></div>皆礼仪使苏易简所定焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1173225_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173226' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173226' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173226?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十二 </span>赋税</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173226_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173226'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173226'>周世宗尝患赋税之不均，诏长吏重定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173226_comment'></div>颍州刺史王祚躬行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173226", 1173226, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>部县</span>，均其轻重，补流民<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173226", 1173226, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>逋赋</span>以万数，增其旧籍，百姓诣阙称颂焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1173226_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173227' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173227' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173227?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十三 </span>三司</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173227_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173227'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173227'>盐铁、户部、度支凡二十四案，吏千馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173227_comment'></div>乾德定考课之法，兴国增判官之员，淳化之间，或专置一使，或离为二司，已又复之为三，而副贰官属之损益视焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173227_comment'></div>天子尝召见其吏李浦等，问利害之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173227_comment'></div>浦等言七十馀事，多见听纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173227_comment'></div>于是三司使陈恕等，皆以不胜任见让，而浦遂试用显于世焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1173227_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173228' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173228' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173228?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十四 </span>俸禄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173228_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173228'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173228'>太祖哀怜元元之困，而患吏之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173228", 1173228, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>烦扰</span>，欲高吏之行以便民，于是定<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173228", 1173228, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>俸户</span>之制，修益俸之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173228_comment'></div>太祖犹以为烦民也，于是出库财以赋吏禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173228_comment'></div>诏书屡出，欲吏之有馀而无内顾之忧，然后于义德备焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173228_comment'></div>盖其任人之知所先后如此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1173228_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173229' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173229' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173229?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十五 </span>南蛮</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173229_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173229'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173229'>南蛮于四夷，为类最微，然动辄一方受其患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173229_comment'></div>至覆军杀将，与夫转饷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173229", 1173229, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>烦敝</span>之久也，则他盗亦缘而有，大中、咸通之间，安南之变是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173229_comment'></div>故为政者不得不戒焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173229_comment'></div>宋兴，尝设广捷之兵，习<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173229", 1173229, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>摽牌</span>之器，其后又益澄海之师，皆以备蛮之为疆埸害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173229_comment'></div>盖及其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173229", 1173229, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>辄动</span>，而我之所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173229", 1173229, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>威附</span>之术可得而谈者，有用兵深入，伐而克之，兴国之初，翟守素之平梅峒是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173229_comment'></div>有兵已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173229", 1173229, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>克破</span>，赦而受之，咸平之间，曹克明之收抚水是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173229_comment'></div>有计能屈之，纳以恩信，章圣之世，谢德权之靖宜州是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173229_comment'></div>盖兵不足以克，则赦不能以来；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173229_comment'></div>计不足以屈，则信不能以收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173229_comment'></div>此古今之通理，而智谋者之所易睹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173229_comment'></div>今溪洞往往为东南之忧，而议者不谋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173229", 1173229, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>威略</span>，一欲怀之以利，是见其一，未见其二也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173229_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173230' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173230' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173230?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十六 </span>契丹</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173230_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173230'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173230'>契丹既胜晋，历汉、周，为中国之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173230_comment'></div>宋兴，太祖明经纶之体，专择用将帅，以折冲一方之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173230_comment'></div>自山西关南，所属任皆天下之材，委任专而听断明，豪杰之士，得尽其智力以赴功，故养士少而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173230", 1173230, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>形势</span>强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173230_comment'></div>当此之时，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173230", 1173230, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>疆境</span>泰然，无北顾之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173230_comment'></div>间有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173230", 1173230, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>窥塞</span>之谋，虏骑六万，太祖命田钦祚以三千人破之，当世以为谚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173230_comment'></div>虏既屈服，于是叩关请吏，修<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173230", 1173230, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>书币</span>之使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173230_comment'></div>天子见群臣谦让，不自以为德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173230_comment'></div>其后向之宿将稍死，而天子伐晋，晋虏连兵，既破虏而平晋，遂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173230", 1173230, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>用事</span>于燕，不克而还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173230_comment'></div>自此，虏复为中国之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173230_comment'></div>雍熙中，曹彬以十万之众，不能举燕而退，有祁沟之败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173230_comment'></div>既而杨业败于陈家谷，刘廷让于君子馆又败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173230_comment'></div>士多失亡乘塞，疮痍之兵，至不满万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173230_comment'></div>赵魏大震，虏遂深入，陷郡县，杀官吏，执士民，将吏依壁自固，虏辄掠<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173230", 1173230, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>坰野</span>，收子女之俘，掊金帛之积而去，自邺而北，千里萧然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173230_comment'></div>天子下哀痛之诏，而边吏屡请益兵，始科河内之民以戍边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173230_comment'></div>不足，则又科河南之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173230_comment'></div>犹不足，则取役兵为振武之军以自助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173230_comment'></div>然犹不能以为足也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173230_comment'></div>咸平之间，命傅潜为大将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173230_comment'></div>虏既入塞，塞上皆飞檄请救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173230_comment'></div>潜按兵不出，将卒人人欲战，不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173230_comment'></div>天子屡使人督战，又为益发兵使进，而潜终不敢出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173230_comment'></div>虏乘其隙也，连破州邑，遂越魏犯澶，百姓骚然，天子为戎衣济河，而虏之谋臣射死，兵遂解去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173230_comment'></div>杨延钊以为乘其敝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173230", 1173230, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>痛杀</span>，幽冀可收，天子抑其言，而讲和之策遂定焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173230_comment'></div>自此边境去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173230", 1173230, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>矢石</span>之忧，天下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173230", 1173230, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>无事</span>，百姓和乐，至今馀四十年，先帝之功德博矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1173230_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173231' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173231' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173231?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十七 </span>折中仓</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173231_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173231'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173231'>折中之法，听商人入粟，而趋江淮受茶盐之给，公私便之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173231_comment'></div>或以为敝滥，既废，而岁失百万之入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173231_comment'></div>端拱初复置，以岁旱而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173231_comment'></div>淳化中遂复之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1173231_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173232' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173232' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173232?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十八 </span>榷易</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173232_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173232'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173232'>宋兴，既收南越之地，而交阯奉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173232", 1173232, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>贡职</span>，海外之国亦通关市，犀象珠玑百货之产，皆入于中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173232_comment'></div>府库既充，有司遂言宜出于民，始置榷易之场，岁收其直数十万贯，自此有加焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1173232_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173233' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173233' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173233?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十九 </span>左藏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173233_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173233'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173233'>兴国初，左藏之财既充斥，始分为三，钱与金帛皆别藏，典守者亦各异焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1173233_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173234' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173234' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173234?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二十 </span>贼盗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173234_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173234'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173234'>宋兴，既歛兵于内，盗贼辄发，而州郡无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173234", 1173234, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>武备</span>，急则吏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173234", 1173234, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>走匿</span>自存，天子常薄吏罪，而言事者以为适然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173234_comment'></div>故盗起辄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173234", 1173234, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>转劫</span>数百千里，非天子自出兵，往往不能格，愚固异焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173234_comment'></div>及览近世之迹，若宋珰守益州，张雍守梓州，秦传序守开州，何邴守象州，皆以区区一城抗贼之锋，不为不义屈，于是知天子待吏尽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173234", 1173234, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>恕道</span>矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173234_comment'></div>而吏之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173234", 1173234, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>走匿</span>自存者，何其不自力也？</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1173234_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173235' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173235' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173235?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二十一 </span>漕运</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173235_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173235'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173235'>宋兴，承周制，置集津之运，转关中之粟，以给大梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173235_comment'></div>故用侯赟典其任，而三十年间，县官之用无不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173235_comment'></div>及收东南之地，兴国初，始漕江淮粟四五百万石至汴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173235_comment'></div>至道间，杨允恭漕六百万石，自此岁增广焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1173235_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173236' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173236' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173236?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二十二 </span>文馆</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173236_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173236'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173236'>三馆之设，盛于开元之世，而衰于唐室之坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173236_comment'></div>五代高武力，虽存西馆之署，而法度卑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173236_comment'></div>宋兴，太祖急于经营，收天下之地，其于文儒之事稍集，然未能备也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173236_comment'></div>太宗始度升龙之右，设署于禁中，收旧府图籍与吴蜀之书，分六库以藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173236_comment'></div>又重<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173236", 1173236, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>亡书</span>之购，而闾巷山林之藏，稍稍益出，天下图书始复聚，而缙绅之学彬彬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173236_comment'></div>悉择当世聪明魁垒之材，处之其中，食于太官，谓之学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173236_comment'></div>其义非独使之寻文字、窥笔墨也，盖将以观天下之材，而备大臣之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173236_comment'></div>此天子所以发德音、留圣意也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1173236_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173237' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173237' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173237?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二十三 </span>屯田</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173237_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173237'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173237'>自汉昭始田张掖，赵充国耕金城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173237_comment'></div>曹操以区区之魏，力农许下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173237_comment'></div>晋用邓艾田寿春，羊祜田襄阳，杜预田荆州，荀羡田东阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173237_comment'></div>隋耕朔方之地，而唐起屯振武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173237_comment'></div>皆内益蓄积，外有守御之利，故能服夷狄，兼邻国，或定南面之业焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173237_comment'></div>宋兴，当雍熙之间，强胡屡为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173237", 1173237, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>边害</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173237_comment'></div>天子念守兵岁广，而赵魏失宁，废耕桑之务，于是方田之法自此始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173237_comment'></div>是后开易水，疏鸡距，修鲍河之利，边屯以次立矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173237_comment'></div>然中国一统，内缉百万之师，议者以为岂晏然不知兵农兼务哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173237_comment'></div>天子乃遣议臣东出宿、亳，至寿春，西出许、颍，转陈、蔡之间，至襄、邓，得田可治者二十二万顷，欲修<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173237", 1173237, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>耕屯</span>之业，度其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173237", 1173237, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>功用</span>矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173237_comment'></div>天子尤意向之，而任事者破坏其计，故功不立。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173237_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173238' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173238' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173238?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二十四 </span>水利</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173238_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173238'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173238'>自史起溉邺田，郑国凿泾水，李冰以区区之蜀，修二江之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173238_comment'></div>汉兴，文翁穿煎溲，郑当时引渭，庄熊引洛，儿宽奏凿六辅渠，而白公注泾渭，邵信臣广钳卢之浸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173238_comment'></div>自是后，王景理芍陂，马臻筑鉴湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173238_comment'></div>至晋，杜预疏荆兖之水，张闿理曲阿之塘，宋人引渒，魏人引河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173238_comment'></div>唐疏雷陂，筑句城，除堰遏之害，皆代<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173238", 1173238, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>天施</span>，长地力，衣食元元，而足公家之费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173238_comment'></div>故三代沟浍之法替，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173238", 1173238, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>赴时</span>务功，此不可不重也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173238_comment'></div>圣宋当雍熙之间。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1173238_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173239' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173239' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173239?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二十五 </span>黄河</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173239_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173239'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173239'>河自西出而南，又东折，然后北注于海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173239_comment'></div>当禹之行水，功之所施者最多，自大伾而北，既酾为二，至大陆又播为九，然后为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173239", 1173239, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>逆河</span>，以与海属，非屡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173239", 1173239, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>散裂</span>而顺导之，莫能为功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173239_comment'></div>盖其难如此，故历三代千有馀年，无河患者，以禹故迹未尝变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173239_comment'></div>至周定王之时，禹迹遂改，故河之为败自此始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173239_comment'></div>自是之后，言治河者尤众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173239_comment'></div>有欲索故迹而穿之，许商、解光之说是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173239_comment'></div>有欲出之胡中，齐人延年之说是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173239_comment'></div>有以为天事可勿理者，田鼢、谷永之说是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173239_comment'></div>有以为宜空<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173239", 1173239, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>水冲</span>以纵其决，穿漕渠以通其势者，关并、贾让之说是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173239_comment'></div>有以为宜弛灌溉之防，使水得自行者，张戎之说是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173239_comment'></div>有以为宜徙之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173239", 1173239, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>宽平</span>者，王横之说是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173239_comment'></div>有以为宜计为堤防，又以为堤防非古义者，王延世、平当之说是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173239_comment'></div>凡此数者，各乖异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173239_comment'></div>总之，堤防之起自战国，西汉以来，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173239", 1173239, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>筑作</span>者辄复败，故务壅塞居水者，最闇于用，而复二渠，则水之害去，绝屯氏之河，则害作，故言河宜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173239", 1173239, "Clauses/50/Comments/1")'>散裂</span>、仿于禹迹是当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173239_comment'></div>盛宋之隆，河数为败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173239_comment'></div>兴国之间，房村之决为甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173239_comment'></div>当此之时，劳十万之众，然后复理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173239_comment'></div>天子为赋诗比《瓠子之歌》，属者虽有商胡之忧，非曩时比也，然天子大臣讲求利害之理勤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173239_comment'></div>愚既以为堤防壅塞闇于用，仿禹之迹为可，然水之为迹，难明久矣，非深考博通，心知其详，固难以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173239", 1173239, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>臆见</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173239", 1173239, "Clauses/68/Comments/1")'>决策</span>举事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173239_comment'></div>宜博求能疏川浚河者，与之虑定，然后施功，则可以下安元元，上追<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173239", 1173239, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>禹绩</span>矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1173239_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173240' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173240' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173240?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二十六 </span>边防</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173240_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173240'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173240'>周世宗之时，筑李晏口，立县十二，又筑束鹿，增鼓城，葺祁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173240_comment'></div>遂自浮阳至乾宁之塞，补坏防，开<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173240", 1173240, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>游口</span>三十有六，瀛、莫以通，作治之功自韩通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173240_comment'></div>宋兴，葺镇州西山保障，自王全斌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173240_comment'></div>而筑保州、威虏、静戎、平塞、长城寨，自刘遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173240_comment'></div>太宗既平晋，隳旧州，迁之榆次，又迁三交，夺故军之险而守之，得胡人咽喉之地，自潘美。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1173240_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173241' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173241' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173241?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二十七 </span>平籴</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173241_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173241'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173241'>使岁穰谷不贱出，岁凶民不病食，故平籴之令自此始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173241_comment'></div>李悝修之，魏以富强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173241_comment'></div>汉兴，耿寿昌开常平之法，以至晋、齐不能废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173241_comment'></div>后魏定和籴之制，北齐筑富人之仓，隋人置监，唐人置东西市之籴，虽号名殊，其为法一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173241_comment'></div>当盛宋建隆之间，始因河内之稔，修边籴之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173241_comment'></div>至淳化，而天下之籴复大备。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1173241_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173242' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173242' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173242?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二十八 </span>义仓</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173242_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173242'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173242'>使岁穰输其馀，岁凶受而食之，故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173242", 1173242, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>义仓</span>之法自此始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173242_comment'></div>长孙平修之，隋以富足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173242_comment'></div>唐用戴胄之言，而复定著令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173242_comment'></div>高宗又开<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173242", 1173242, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>杂用</span>之禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173242_comment'></div>神龙之后，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173242", 1173242, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>纲理</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173242", 1173242, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>疏阔</span>，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173242", 1173242, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>义仓</span>遂废殆尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173242_comment'></div>至开元，自王公以下，至于商人，皆有入，故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173242", 1173242, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>义仓</span>之实至六千万以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173242_comment'></div>自是后而衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173242_comment'></div>宋兴，乾德之初，天子哀岁不登，而仓吏不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173242", 1173242, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>以时</span>出与民，于是著发粟之制，使不待诏令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173242_comment'></div>其后，又病吏之烦扰，而民罹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173242", 1173242, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>输转</span>之困，又罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173242_comment'></div>至今上而旧制复行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1173242_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173243' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173243' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173243?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二十九 </span>茶</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173243_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173243'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173243'>唐贞元初，赵赞兴茶税，而张滂继之，什取其一，以助军费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173243_comment'></div>长庆初，王播又增其数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173243_comment'></div>大中中，裴休立十二条之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173243_comment'></div>宋兴，茶盐之法屡有变易，而茶法几至大坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173243_comment'></div>景德中，尝乘边备之急，而仓卒变法，高塞下入粟之虚直，易江淮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173243", 1173243, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>茗荈</span>之实，其厚利悉归于商人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173243_comment'></div>是时，议臣请以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173243", 1173243, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>见缗</span>入中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173243_comment'></div>而天圣初，又设三说之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173243_comment'></div>入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173243", 1173243, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>见缗</span>金帛，则官虽为便，而商者不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173243_comment'></div>用三说，则官有七倍之损，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173243", 1173243, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>香象</span>之货，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173243", 1173243, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>居积</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173243", 1173243, "Clauses/28/Comments/1")'>停滞</span>，公私皆失其利焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173243_comment'></div>景祐、康定之间，又增以盐利，为四说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173243_comment'></div>虽公家亏于半，而贾贩者复壅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173243_comment'></div>至皇祐中，又用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173243", 1173243, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>见缗</span>之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173243_comment'></div>虽壅滞稍去，然调视小失，固未免于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173243", 1173243, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>乖迂</span>也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1173243_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　曾巩居南丰丁父忧，作《寄孙正之二首》<div id='poem_220272' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220272' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220272?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄孙正之二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220272")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220272_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220272'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220272'>两人怀抱喜相投，初得青山一日游。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220272_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220272'>已听高文吟太古，更开昏眼洗清流。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220272_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220272'>共寻素壁题皆遍，欲去红桥钓始休。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220272_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220272'>回首至今嘉兴在，梦魂犹拟奉觥筹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220272_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220272'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220272_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_220271' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220271' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220271?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220271_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220271'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220271'>隐似龙蛇应有待，清□冰雪更无双。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220271'>志留世外虽遗俗，文落人间或过江。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220271'>峻节但期终老学，健诗犹愧一时降。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220271'>风骚近亦思强伴，恨未高吟共北窗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220271'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220271_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　曾巩居南丰丁父忧，作《张久中墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173339' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173339' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173339?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张久中墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173339")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173339_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173339'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173339'>君姓张氏，名持，字久中，初名伯虎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173339_comment'></div>庆历三年来自曲江，入太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173339_comment'></div>当是时，天子方诏学官岁献士二人，学者以数百千人，独献君，会学散，不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173339_comment'></div>于是时，予盖未尝识君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173339_comment'></div>后二年，过予之所居临川，始识之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173339_comment'></div>君为人深沉有大度，喜气节，重交游，一时所与之游者甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173339_comment'></div>而君所尤称者，广汉张贲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173339_comment'></div>以为年少可进以学者，莆阳陈惇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173339_comment'></div>盖君之学多贲发之，而于惇以师友自处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173339_comment'></div>凡君之与人交，喜穷尽其得失，其义足以正之，而其直未尝茍止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173339_comment'></div>至其与众人接，尤温以庄，不妄与之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173339_comment'></div>与之言，必随其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173339", 1173339, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>材智</span>所到，不病以其所不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173339_comment'></div>故君之友皆惮其严，而喜其相与之尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173339_comment'></div>众人之得君游者，亦皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173339", 1173339, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>喜爱</span>而未尝有失其意者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173339_comment'></div>其语曰：「士生于今，势不足以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173339", 1173339, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>持世</span>，而游于其间，当如此也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173339_comment'></div>于临川，出其文章，因与予言古今治乱是非之理，至于为心持身得失之际，于其义，余不能损益也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173339_comment'></div>后二年死于兴国军，某月某日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173339_comment'></div>明年，其弟来江南，以力之不能，将独负君之骨以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173339_comment'></div>是时陈惇方以进士得出身，约君之弟曰：「吾忍不全归吾友邪，明年吾得补为吏，力能以君之丧归」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173339_comment'></div>其弟乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173339_comment'></div>君年若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173339_comment'></div>祖某，考某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173339_comment'></div>君幼孤，养于兄嫂，尝曰：「嫂之于吾犹母也，妇能以姑之礼事吾嫂者，可以为吾妇矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173339_comment'></div>然卒亦无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173339_comment'></div>君固难交，然不易其好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173339_comment'></div>而陈惇者，与君交尤深也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173339_comment'></div>予尝视惇与君之相从，忧穷龃龉，无不共之，其中心岂有利然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173339_comment'></div>世之交友道废久矣，其有之，或非此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173339_comment'></div>然则君之事，其有取于世教非邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173339_comment'></div>惇以某年某月某日归君之丧葬地，而属予铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173339_comment'></div>其辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1173339'>呜呼久中，不如其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173339_comment'></div>孔孟以然，何独于子？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173339_comment'></div>生而不大，天固为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173339_comment'></div>其长在人，于此观之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1173339_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年12月</a>　曾巩居南丰丁父忧，撰《宜黄县县学记》<div id='poem_1173283' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173283' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173283?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宜黄县县学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173283")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173283_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173283'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173283'>古之人，自家至于天子之国皆有学，自幼至于长，未尝去于学之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173283_comment'></div>学有《诗》《书》六艺、弦歌洗爵、俯仰之容、升降之节，以习其心体、耳目、手足之举措；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173283_comment'></div>又有祭祀、乡射、养老之礼，以习其恭让；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173283_comment'></div>进材、论狱、出兵授捷之法，以习其从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173283_comment'></div>师友以解其惑，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173283", 1173283, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>劝惩</span>以勉其进，戒其不率，其所为具如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173283_comment'></div>而其大要，则务使人人学其性，不独防其邪僻放肆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173283_comment'></div>虽有刚柔缓急之异，皆可以进之于中，而无过不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173283_comment'></div>使其识之明，气之充于其心，则用之于进退语默之际，而无不得其宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173283_comment'></div>临之以祸福死生之故，而无足动其意者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173283_comment'></div>为天下之士，为所以养其身之备如此，则又使知天地事物之变，古今治乱之理，至于损益废置、先后始终之要，无所不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173283_comment'></div>其在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173283", 1173283, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>堂户</span>之上，而四海九州之业，万世之策皆得，及出而履天下之任，列百官之中，则随所施为，无不可者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173283_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173283_comment'></div>其素所学问然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173283_comment'></div>盖凡人之起居、饮食、动作之小事，至于修身为国家天下之大体，皆自学出，而无斯须去于教也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173283_comment'></div>其动于视听四支者，必使其洽于内；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173283_comment'></div>其谨于初者，必使其要于终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173283_comment'></div>驯之以自然，而待之以积久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173283_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173283_comment'></div>何其至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173283_comment'></div>故其俗之成，则刑罚措；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173283_comment'></div>其材之成，则三公百官得其士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173283_comment'></div>其为法之永，则中材可以守；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173283_comment'></div>其入人之深，则虽更衰世而不乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173283_comment'></div>为教之极至此，鼓舞天下，而人不知其从之，岂用力也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173283_comment'></div>及三代衰，圣人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173283", 1173283, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>制作</span>尽坏，千馀年之间，学有存者，亦非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173283", 1173283, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>古法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173283_comment'></div>人之体性之举动，唯其所自肆，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173283", 1173283, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>临政</span>治人之方，固不素讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173283_comment'></div>士有聪明<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1173283", 1173283, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>朴茂</span>之质，而无教养之渐，则其材之不成，固然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173283_comment'></div>盖以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1173283", 1173283, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>不学</span>未成之材，而为天下之吏，又承衰弊之后，而治不教之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173283_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173283_comment'></div>仁政之所以不行，贼盗刑罚之所以积，其不以此也欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173283_comment'></div>宋兴几百年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173283_comment'></div>庆历三年，天子图当世之务，而以学为先，于是天下之学乃得立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173283_comment'></div>而方此之时，抚州之宜黄犹不能有学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173283_comment'></div>士之学者皆相率而寓于州，以群聚讲习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173283_comment'></div>其明年，天下之学复废，士亦皆散去，而春秋释奠之事以著于令，则常以庙祀孔氏，庙不复理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173283_comment'></div>皇祐元年，会令李君详至，始议立学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173283_comment'></div>而县之士某某与其徒皆自以谓得发愤于此，莫不相励而趋为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173283_comment'></div>故其材不赋而羡，匠不发而多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173283_comment'></div>其成也，积屋之区若干，而门序正位，讲艺之堂、栖士之舍皆足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173283_comment'></div>积器之数若干，而祀饮寝食之用皆具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173283_comment'></div>其像孔氏而下，从祭之士皆备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173283_comment'></div>其书经史百氏、翰林子墨之文章无外求者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173283_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1173283", 1173283, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>相基</span>会作之本末，总为日若干而已，何其周且速也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173283_comment'></div>当四方学废之初，有司之议，固以谓学者人情之所不乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173283_comment'></div>及观此学之作，在其废学数年之后，唯其令之一唱，而四境之内响应而图之，如恐不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173283_comment'></div>则夫言人之情不乐于学者，其果然也与？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173283_comment'></div>宜黄之学者，固多良士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173283_comment'></div>而李君之为令，威行爱立，讼清事举，其政又良也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173283_comment'></div>夫及良令之时，而顺其慕学发愤之俗，作为宫室<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1173283", 1173283, "Clauses/138/Comments/0")'>教肄</span>之所，以至图书器用之须，莫不皆有，以养其良材之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173283_comment'></div>虽古之去今远矣，然圣人之典籍皆在，其言可考，其法可求，使其相与学而明之，礼乐节文之详，固有所不得为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173283_comment'></div>若夫正心修身，为国家天下之大务，则在其进之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173283_comment'></div>使一人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1173283", 1173283, "Clauses/152/Comments/0")'>行修</span>移之于一家，一家之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1173283", 1173283, "Clauses/153/Comments/0")'>行修</span>移之于乡邻族党，则一县之风俗成，人材出矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173283_comment'></div>教化之行，道德之归，非远人也，可不勉与！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173283_comment'></div>县之士来请曰：「愿有记」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173283_comment'></div>其记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173283_comment'></div>十二月某日也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1173283_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173283'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷一七。又见《曾文定公集》卷八。《曾子固集》卷二六，《南丰曾先生文粹》卷五，《文章正宗》续集卷一二，《文章辨体汇选》卷五八九，《奇赏斋古文汇编》卷一九三，《三续古文奇赏》卷一五，《古文渊鉴》卷五三，《古今图书集成》学行典卷八七、选举典卷二一。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173283_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　曾巩居南丰丁父忧，撰《金山寺水陆堂记》<div id='poem_1173286' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173286' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173286?labeling=true' target='_blank'>金山寺水陆堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173286")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173286_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173286'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173286'>庆历八年，润之金山寺火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173286_comment'></div>明年，寺之僧瑞新来治寺事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173286_comment'></div>某月，择山之阳，亢爽之地，劝州之人某氏为水陆堂，积钱之数百三十万，积日之数若干而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173286_comment'></div>夫金山之以观游之美取胜于天下，非独据江瞰海，并楚之冲，而滨吴之要也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173286_comment'></div>盖其浮江之槛，负崖之屋，椽摩栋揭，环山而四出，亦有以夸天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173286_comment'></div>则天下之东驰，莫不顾慕者，岂特一山之好哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173286_comment'></div>而其作之完，盖非一人一日之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173286_comment'></div>及火，余固嗟夫未尝得与时之君子者游，而纵夫余心之所乐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173286_comment'></div>至于今未久也，则闻夫山之穹堂奥殿、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173286", 1173286, "Clauses/28/Comments/1")'>瑰杰</span>之观滋起矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173286_comment'></div>此非徒佛之法足以动天下，盖新者，余尝与之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173286", 1173286, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>从容</span>，彼其材且辨有以动人者，故成此不难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173286_comment'></div>夫废于一时，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173286", 1173286, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>后人</span>不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173286", 1173286, "Clauses/35/Comments/1")'>更兴</span>者，天下之事多如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173286_comment'></div>至于更千百年，委弃郁塞而不得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173286", 1173286, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>振行</span>于天下者，吾之道是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173286_comment'></div>岂独牵于势哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173286_comment'></div>盖学者之难得，而天下之材不足也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173286_comment'></div>使如此寺之坏，而有新之材，一日之作，轶于百年累世之迹，则事之废者岂足忧，而世之治可胜道哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173286_comment'></div>新方以书告某氏之世善，而其子某又业为士，因以求予记堂之始，故为之历道其兴坏之端，而并予之所感者寓焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1173286_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　曾巩居南丰丁父忧，作《咏史二首》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　曾巩居南丰丁父忧，作《江湖》<div id='poem_220190' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220190' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220190?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江湖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_220190'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220190'>江湖俗畏远，幽好自相宜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220190'>沦迹异惊众，辞嚣如避时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220190'>优游可以学，薇蕨易为私。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220190'>胡然弃回棹，霜雪有驱驰。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220190'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220190_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: href='/Writing/220437?labeling=true' target='_blank'>将之浙江延祖子山师柔会别饮散独宿空亭遂书怀别</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220437'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220437'>蜀客向何处，欲观浙江潮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220437'>舣舟吴门栅，况会故人招。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220437'>置酒吴亭上，无人吹紫箫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220437'>浩观万物变，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_220437", 220437, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>飒尔</span>生凉飙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220437'>遂恐时节晚，芳兰从此凋。<div "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>寥寥</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220437'>鸿鹄举千里，鸾凤翔九霄。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220437'>胡为蓬蒿下，日夜悲鹪鹩。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220437'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_220437_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　曾巩居南丰丁父忧，作《咏雪》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　曾巩作《谢杜相公书》<div id='poem_1173051' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173051' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173051?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢杜相公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173051")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173051_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173051'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173051'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173051", 1173051, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>伏念</span>昔者，方巩之得祸罚于河滨，去其家四千里之远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173051_comment'></div>南向而望，迅河大淮，埭堰湖江，天下之险，为其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173051", 1173051, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>阻阨</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173051_comment'></div>而以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173051", 1173051, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>孤独</span>之身，抱不测之疾，茕茕路隅，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173051", 1173051, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>攀缘</span>之亲、一见之旧，以为之托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173051_comment'></div>又无至行，上之可以感人利势，下之可以动俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173051_comment'></div>惟先人之医药与凡丧之所急，不知所以为赖，而旅榇之重大，惧无以归者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173051_comment'></div>明公独于此时，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173051", 1173051, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>闵闵</span>勤勤，营救<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173051", 1173051, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>护视</span>，亲屈车骑，临于河上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173051_comment'></div>使其方先人之病，得一意于左右，而医药之有与谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173051_comment'></div>至其既孤，无外事之夺其哀，而毫发之私，无有不如其欲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173051_comment'></div>莫大之丧，得以卒致而南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173051_comment'></div>其为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173051", 1173051, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>存全</span>之恩，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173051", 1173051, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>过越</span>之义如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173051_comment'></div>窃惟明公相天下之道，吟颂推说者穷万世，非如曲士汲汲一节之善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173051_comment'></div>而位之极，年之高，天子不敢烦以政，岂乡闾新学危苦之情、丛细之事宜以彻于视听而蒙省察？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173051_comment'></div>然明公存先人之故，而所以尽于巩之德如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173051_comment'></div>盖明公虽不可起而寄天下之政，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173051", 1173051, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>爱育</span>天下之人材，不忍一夫失其所之道，出于自然，推而行之，不以进退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173051_comment'></div>而巩独幸遭明公于此时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173051_comment'></div>在丧之日，不敢以世俗浅意<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173051", 1173051, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>越礼</span>进谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173051_comment'></div>丧除，又惟大恩之不可名，空言之不足陈，徘徊迄今，一书之未进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173051_comment'></div>顾其惭生于心，无须臾废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173051_comment'></div>伏惟明公终赐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173051", 1173051, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>亮察</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173051_comment'></div>夫明公存天下之义而无有所私，则巩之所以报于明公者，亦惟天下之义而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173051_comment'></div>誓心则然，未敢谓能也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1173051_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　曾巩娶妻晁德仪（字文柔）<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220474'>荏苒岁云几，家事已独当。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220474'>经营食众口，四方走遑遑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220474'>一身如飞云，遇风任飘扬。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220474'>山川浩无涯，险怪靡不尝。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220474'>落日号虎豹，吾未停<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_220474", 220474, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>车箱</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220474'>波涛动蛟龙，吾方进舟航。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220474'>所勤半天下，所济一毫芒。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220474'>最自忆往岁，病躯久羸尪。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220474'>呻吟千里外，苍黄值亲丧。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220474'>母弟各在远，计归恐惊惶。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220474'>凶祸甘独任，危形载孤艎。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220474'>崎岖护旅榇，缅邈投故乡。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220474'>至今惊未定，生还乃非常。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220474'>忧虑心胆耗，驰驱筋力伤。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_220474'>况已近衰境，而常犯风霜。<div id='poem_sentence_16_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_220474'>驱之久如此，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_220474", 220474, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>负疴</span>固宜长。<div id='poem_sentence_17_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_220474'>朝晡暂一饱，百回步空廊。<div id='poem_sentence_18_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_220474'>未免废坐卧，其能视<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_220474", 220474, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>缣缃</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_220474'>新知固云少，旧学亦已忘。<div id='poem_sentence_20_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_220474'>百家异旨趣，六经富文章。<div id='poem_sentence_21_220474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_220474'>其言既<span class='link' id='poem_content_1173081'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173081'>伏念巩志虽策砺，性实<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173081", 1173081, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>滞顽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173081_comment'></div>行不足比古之人，材不足适时之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173081_comment'></div>居常龃龉，动辄困穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173081_comment'></div>往以孤生而蒙收接，又遭大故而被救存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173081_comment'></div>非常之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173081", 1173081, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>恩德</span>所加，空知感激；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173081_comment'></div>无用之技能素定，曷有报偿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173081_comment'></div>至于数千里之间，三四年之后，去冬之首，方能属思以为书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173081_comment'></div>积日之勤，庶或因辞而见意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173081_comment'></div>不谓使者至门之日，正值相君失子之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173081_comment'></div>远渎高明，已难期于省览；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173081_comment'></div>况逢哀恻，岂能必于荐闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173081_comment'></div>因此复忧恳悃之诚，无由自达视听之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173081_comment'></div>虽推心之远大，宁责礼于贱微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173081_comment'></div>然义未足以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173081", 1173081, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>论酬</span>，而言又不得以叙谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173081_comment'></div>其为私计，岂敢自皇？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173081_comment'></div>伏惟相公当世表仪，本朝柱石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173081_comment'></div>许还私第，圣意虽优于大臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173081_comment'></div>召用安车，人心素望于元老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173081_comment'></div>伏祈上为邦国，善保寝兴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1173081_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　曾巩居南丰，作《食梨》<div id='poem_220470' id='poem_sentence_5_220470'>清朝起周览，映叶才八九。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220470_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220470'>闲居问时物，此说得溪叟。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220470_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220470'>贫斋分<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_220470", 220470, id='poem_sentence_8_220470_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220470'>食新恐非称，分少觉已厚。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220470_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220470'>开苞日星动，落刃冰雪剖。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220470_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220470'>烟浔择新汲，远负盈素缶。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220470_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220470'>肯视故畦瓜，宁论浊泥藕。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220470_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1052&endYear=1052')">1052年</a>　曾巩居南丰，撰《胡君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173343' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173343' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173343?labeling=true' target='_blank'>胡君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐四年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173343")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173343_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173343'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173343'>君名敏，生于天禧之戊午，卒时皇祐之辛卯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173343_comment'></div>既卒之明年，葬于其所家抚州金溪县之东某里某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173343_comment'></div>字某，姓胡氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173343_comment'></div>父名晏，教君学，已为之求师，又为之求四方善人君子与之接，致其力不敢懈，至于老以死不敢变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173343_comment'></div>君亦能奉其意，故君之为进士，其强学、其广记、其博问、其能文辞，于其业，可以谓之修；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173343_comment'></div>其事亲、其居家、其与人游，不见其缺亏，其约、其质、其不茍、其寡言，于其行，可以谓之修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173343_comment'></div>夫积其勤以至于业之修，而止荐于乡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173343_comment'></div>积其谨以至于行之修，而不克显于世，此世之所以哀君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173343_comment'></div>然君有可以慰其亲而不疚于其内，比于得其欲富贵于一时，而有愧于其心者，其得失何如，固易知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173343_comment'></div>母某氏，妻某氏，子某，弟某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173343_comment'></div>君尝学于余也，故铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173343_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1173343'>慰其亲，学也勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173343_comment'></div>短而屯，塞不伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173343_comment'></div>震无垠，瑑斯珉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1173343_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1052&endYear=1052')">1052年</a>　曾巩居南丰，作《豪杰》<div id='poem_220523' id='poem_sentence_0_220523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220523'>不顾无复问周公，可归乃独知孔子。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220321'>纷纷东汉士，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220321", 220321, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>飞鸣</span>不当辰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220321'>经营救氛沴，此志卒埃尘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_content_220449'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220449'>耕耨筋力苦，收刈田野乐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220449'>胡为此岁暮，老少颜色恶？<div id='poem_sentence_3_220449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220449'>国用有缓急，时议废量度。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220449'>内外奔气势，上下穷割剥。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220449'>今岁九夏旱，赤日万里灼。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_220449", 220449, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>迂邈</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220449'>奈何呻吟诉，卒受鞭捶却。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220449'>宁论救憔悴，反与争合龠。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220449'>问胡应驱迫，久已罹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_220449", 220449, id='poem_sentence_16_220449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_220449'>法令尚修明，此理可惊愕。<div id='poem_sentence_17_220449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_220449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_220449'>但忧值空虚，宁无挺犁钁。<div id='poem_sentence_20_220449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_220449_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年春</a>　曾巩表兄吴蕃（字彦弼）来问候。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　曾巩撰《永安县君谢氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173359' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173359' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173359?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永安县君谢氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐五年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173359")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173359_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173359'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173359'>宋故卫尉寺丞王公讳用之之夫人、尚书都官员外郎、赠尚书工部郎中讳益之母，姓谢氏，累封永安县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173359_comment'></div>其卒皇祐五年之六月十四日，其葬于抚州金溪县之某乡某原，既卒之百有五十一日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173359_comment'></div>其子曰益，曰某，皆已卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173359_comment'></div>曰某，曰某，曰孟，楚州司理参军，亦已卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173359_comment'></div>其孙曰安仁，宣州司户参军，曰安道，皆已卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173359_comment'></div>曰安石，殿中丞，通判舒州；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173359_comment'></div>曰沆，荆南府建宁县令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173359_comment'></div>曰安国，曰安礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173359_comment'></div>其曾孙曰某，曰某，曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173359_comment'></div>其墓，工部故人之子曾巩志之，曰：王氏由工部之叔父、尚书主客郎中、赠太常少卿讳观之始起家为能吏，遂追荣其父讳某为尚书职方员外郎，至于工部父子，遂皆进于朝为闻人，其世浸大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173359_comment'></div>夫人及拜其舅与夫之荣，而享其子与孙之禄，其寿至于九十，其卒于抚州之临川，安于其寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173359_comment'></div>余既与夫人之诸孙游，而尝得拜于堂上，见其色和，其容谨，闻其言俭而勤，退而闻其为妇顺，为母慈，知其所以享其福禄者，其宜也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173359_comment'></div>余观诗人之歌其后妃，至于诸侯、大夫之妻，内修法度，辅佐其夫，而其效之见，则《兔罝》之人至于《江汉》、《汝坟》之妇女，皆承其化而笃于礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173359_comment'></div>余固叹其当是之时，上下之间，内外相饬，何其至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173359_comment'></div>如夫人之资，而使出于其时，则必有歌于风而被之于无穷之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173359_comment'></div>若余之鄙，其亦曷能知其所至也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173359_comment'></div>谢氏之祖曰某，考曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173359_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1173359'>士显其施，其行易知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173359_comment'></div>女处于私，其有孰窥？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173359_comment'></div>严严秀眉，不见缺亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173359_comment'></div>曷以长之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173359_comment'></div>视此铭辞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1173359_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='412b3ef68f59442eabd2d5b350fe8e81_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("412b3ef68f59442eabd2d5b350fe8e81");'><span id='412b3ef68f59442eabd2d5b350fe8e81_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript:
