class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173047", 1173047, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>白气</span>起廷中，江水<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173047", 1173047, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>横溢</span>，司户孔宗旦以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173047", 1173047, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>兵象</span>，策智高必反，以书告其将陈拱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173047_comment'></div>拱不听，宗旦言不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173047_comment'></div>拱怒，诋之曰：「司户狂邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173047_comment'></div>四年，智高出横山，略其寨人，因其仓库而大赈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173047_comment'></div>宗旦又告曰：「事急矣，不可以不戒」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173047_comment'></div>拱又不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173047_comment'></div>凡宗旦之于拱，以书告者七，以口告者多至不可数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173047_comment'></div>度拱终不可得意，即载其家走桂州，曰：「吾有官守不得去，吾亲毋为与死此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173047_comment'></div>既行之二日，智高果反，城中皆应之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173047_comment'></div>宗旦犹力守南门，为书召邻兵，欲拒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173047_comment'></div>城亡，智高得宗旦，喜欲用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173047_comment'></div>宗旦怒曰：「贼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173047_comment'></div>汝今立死，吾岂可污邪」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173047_comment'></div>骂不绝口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173047_comment'></div>智高度终不可下，乃杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173047_comment'></div>当其初，使宗旦言不废，则邕之祸必不发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173047_comment'></div>发而吾有以待之，则必无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173047_comment'></div>使独有此一善，固不可不旌，况其死节堂堂如是，而其事未白于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173047_comment'></div>比见朝廷所宠赠南兵以来伏节死难之臣，宗旦乃独不与，此非所谓「曲突徙薪无恩泽，焦头烂额为上客」邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173047_comment'></div>使宗旦初无一言，但贼至而能死不去，固不可以无赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173047_comment'></div>盖先事以为备，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173047", 1173047, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>全城</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173047", 1173047, "Clauses/65/Comments/1")'>保民</span>者，宜责之陈拱，非宗旦事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173047_comment'></div>今猥令与陈拱同戮，既遗其言，又负其节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173047_comment'></div>为天下者，赏善而罚恶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173047_comment'></div>为君子者，乐道人之善，乐成人之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173047_comment'></div>岂当如是邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173047_comment'></div>凡南方之事，卒至于破十馀州，覆军杀将，丧元元之命，竭山海之财者，非其变发于隐伏，而起于仓卒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173047_comment'></div>内外上下有职事者，初莫不知，或隐而不言，或忽而不备，茍且<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1173047", 1173047, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>偷托</span>，以至于不可御耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173047_comment'></div>有一人先能言者，又为世所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173047", 1173047, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>侵蔽</span>，令与罪人同罚，则天下之事，其谁复言耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173047_comment'></div>闻宗旦非独以书告陈拱，当时为使者于广东西者，宗旦皆历告之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173047_comment'></div>今彼既不能用，惧重为己累，必不肯复言宗旦尝告我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173047_comment'></div>为天下者，使万事已理，天下已安，犹须力开言者之路，以防未至之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173047_comment'></div>况天下之事，其可忧者甚众，而当世之患，莫大于人不能言与不肯言，而甚者或不敢言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173047_comment'></div>则宗旦之事，岂可不汲汲载之天下视听，显扬褒大其人，以惊动当世耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173047_comment'></div>宗旦喜学《易》，所为注有可采者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173047_comment'></div>家不能有书，而人或质问以《易》，则贯穿驰骋，至数十家，皆能言其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173047_comment'></div>事祖母尽心，贫几不能自存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173047_comment'></div>好议论，喜功名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173047_comment'></div>巩尝与之接，故颇知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173047_comment'></div>则其所立，亦非一时偶然发也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173047_comment'></div>世多非其在京东时不能自重，至为世所指目，此固一眚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173047_comment'></div>今其所立，亦可赎矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173047_comment'></div>巩初闻其死之事，未敢决然信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173047_comment'></div>前后得言者甚众，又得其弟自言，而闻祖袁州在广东亦为之言，然后知其事使虽有小差，要其大概不诬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173047_comment'></div>况陈拱以下皆覆其家，而宗旦独先以其亲遁，则其有先知之效可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173047_comment'></div>以其性之喜事，则其有先言之效亦可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173047_comment'></div>以阁下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1173047", 1173047, "Clauses/147/Comments/0")'>好古</span>力学，志乐天下之善，又方使南方，以赏罚善恶为职，故敢以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173047_comment'></div>其亦何惜须臾之听，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1173047", 1173047, "Clauses/153/Comments/0")'>尺纸</span>之议，博问而极陈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173047_comment'></div>使其事白，固有补于天下，不独一时为宗旦发也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173047_comment'></div>伏惟少留意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173047_comment'></div>如有未合，愿赐还答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173047_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173047_comment'></div>巩顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1173047_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　兄曾晔卒江州，曾巩撰《亡兄墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173370' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173370' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173370?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亡兄墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐五年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173370")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173370_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173370'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173370'>君姓曾氏，讳晔，字茂叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173370_comment'></div>有智策，能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173370", 1173370, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>辨说</span>，其贯穿反复，人莫有能屈之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173370_comment'></div>身穷，为生事，或毛密，应之无留，而读书理笔墨，交宾客，又思事未至当如何，亦不废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173370_comment'></div>欢愉忧悲、疾病行役、寝食之间，书未尝去目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173370_comment'></div>故自上古以来，至今圣贤百氏、骚人材士之作，训教警戒，辨议识述，下至浮夸诡异之文章，莫不皆熟，而于治乱兴亡、是非得失之际，莫不能议焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173370_comment'></div>其文章尤宏赡瑰丽可喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173370_comment'></div>三代远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173370_comment'></div>汉以来，世有成事业、就功名之时，则贤臣、谋士、材技之人，同世并出，常若有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173370_comment'></div>至时或无所用之，则士虽往往有纪，而亦不俱见于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173370_comment'></div>盖堙穷顿委于岩墙闾巷之中者岂少哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173370_comment'></div>如君之材知辨博，又其学如此，使得用其意于事，其施设必有异焉，然卒不克见于世，盖亦岂非其命也夫？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173370_comment'></div>君年四十有五，皇祐五年以进士试于廷，不中，得疾归，卒江州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173370_comment'></div>祖讳某，尚书户部郎中，赠右谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173370_comment'></div>考讳某，故太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173370_comment'></div>娶李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173370_comment'></div>子曰觉，曰黉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173370_comment'></div>女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173370_comment'></div>卒之岁十二月某日，葬建昌军南丰县之某乡某原某里也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173370_comment'></div>弟巩为其铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1173370'>世或须人，中士为材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173370_comment'></div>有非其应，圣不能谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173370_comment'></div>故君之学于己为足，而材与世为乖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173370_comment'></div>刻铭幽石，维以告哀。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1173370_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《祭吴彦弼文》<div id='poem_1173408' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173408' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173408?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭吴彦弼文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173408")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173408_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173408'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173408'>维年月日，某谨以庶羞之奠，致祭于彦弼吴兄之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173408_comment'></div>子之为人，温良沉实，寡笑与言，不随众浮，其举轩轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173408_comment'></div>书无不讲，尤精左氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173408_comment'></div>连辞累句，浩浩能记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173408_comment'></div>秦汉至今，千载所录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173408_comment'></div>子以一心，万事渟滀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173408_comment'></div>识能议论，文可传道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173408_comment'></div>偶章刻句，独弃于子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173408_comment'></div>自皆取士，归之有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173408_comment'></div>今独不然，左绳右规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173408_comment'></div>愚庸不肖，得以达进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173408_comment'></div>优材秀行，往往而摈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173408_comment'></div>故子之生，不荐于乡，不试于位，郁塞埋藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173408_comment'></div>子于众人，意尤少可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173408_comment'></div>病写其文，独以示我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173408_comment'></div>意谓予能，可以存子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173408_comment'></div>子望则然，予岂堪此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173408_comment'></div>惟昔与子，齿于学官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173408_comment'></div>京师之旅，江南之还，离行旅食，尝同苦艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173408_comment'></div>缱绻之义，两是以亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173408_comment'></div>忆问心病，去岁之春，子形已革，谢我犹勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173408_comment'></div>谓其母妻，曰我知子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173408_comment'></div>子母吾姑，祇益其悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173408_comment'></div>江冬之仲，日絜风恬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173408_comment'></div>有弟有子，殡子居南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173408_comment'></div>我命为具，觞豆具设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173408_comment'></div>兴言涕随，长与子别。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1173408_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《拟试制科王平甫策问》<div id='poem_1172947' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172947' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172947?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟试制科王平甫策问一道</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172947")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172947_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172947'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172947'>问：盖闻至治之世，教化明而风俗美，士之处者皆笃于自治，而仕者皆能称其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172947_comment'></div>当是之时，百度修而万事理，故上下富足，百姓和乐而臻于仁寿，施及鸟兽草木，皆遂其性，至于蛮夷戎狄莫不欣欣附焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172947_comment'></div>其所繇者何术而至于斯欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172947_comment'></div>今士寡廉耻，而希合苟且之俗盛，至于举选甚弊而百职未修，上下之财不赡于用，元元匮急而轻于抵罪，鸟兽草木未尽遂其性，蛮夷戎狄至勤于御备之策焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172947_comment'></div>其不能方古者何谓欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172947_comment'></div>夫事其末而欲及其本，与泥其迹而求合其变，皆不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172947_comment'></div>然则仿于古而不迂，近于今而不卑，必有其道可得而言焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172947_comment'></div>昔孔子语为邦，曰「乘商之辂，服周之冕」，乐则曰《韶》舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172947_comment'></div>今考其事尚可复于当世欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172947_comment'></div>如不可复，则兴今之礼乐者将何说欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172947_comment'></div>子大夫其悉陈焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1172947_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《策问十四道》<div id='poem_1172948' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172948' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172948?labeling=true' target='_blank'>策问十四道</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172948")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172948_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172948'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172948'>问：孔子曰：「德之流行，速于置邮而传命」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172948_comment'></div>而孟子亦曰：「事半古之人，功必倍之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172948_comment'></div>如此则用先王之道以治国家天下，其见效岂不速哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172948_comment'></div>然而又曰：「如有王者，必世而后仁」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172948_comment'></div>「善人为邦百年，可以胜残去杀矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172948_comment'></div>如是则积德累善，旷世绵祀而后有成，又何其迂且久也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172948_comment'></div>夫憔悴之民望其恩德，与愿治之主望其治之效，期月犹且迟，而可以一世百年期哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172948_comment'></div>岂圣人之道大，施用之际难欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172948_comment'></div>抑迟速之间繇所遭之时异欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172948_comment'></div>二三子可辨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172948_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1172948'>问：官有德，爵有功，所从来尚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172948_comment'></div>今爵虚器也，凡有功者固以官赏之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172948_comment'></div>其可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172948_comment'></div>其亦有不可者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172948_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1172948'>问：「非礼勿视，非礼勿听，非礼勿言，非礼勿动」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172948_comment'></div>然而视听言动一于礼，则不合于俗者有矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172948_comment'></div>顺俗则自枉，不合于俗则怨且怒，且指目以谤者行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172948_comment'></div>谤怒非君子之所忧也，然君子之于道德非独自足而已，将以有为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172948_comment'></div>如与一世人不合不识，其能有为乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172948_comment'></div>是则其所积累者小而为害于事也大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172948_comment'></div>孟子亦曰：「枉尺而直寻者，以利言也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172948_comment'></div>如以利言，则枉寻而直尺亦可为欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172948_comment'></div>又曰：「枉己者，未有能直人者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172948_comment'></div>如孟子之意，则亦自信而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172948_comment'></div>然则君子之道，其无以纾谤怒，便于时，合于众人之心者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1172948_comment'></div>今观孔子、孟子之所以自为者，则亦从优游，不皆不合于世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1172948_comment'></div>是亦何道乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1172948_comment'></div>二子者岂无说乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1172948_comment'></div>吾子其言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1172948_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1172948'>问：钱为物，非无形而不可见者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1172948_comment'></div>不藏于国，必藏于民；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1172948_comment'></div>不在于民，必在于国；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1172948_comment'></div>出于此，必在于彼，势理然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1172948_comment'></div>今大农之钱常不足，而民间尤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1172948_comment'></div>是物也，不升天而沉泉，其安所归？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1172948_comment'></div>而孰繇致其然欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1172948_comment'></div>将欲使上下之用俱足，有无之求两通，岂无说乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1172948_comment'></div>问：《易》曰：天地之道简易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1172948_comment'></div>而于《乾》则曰：「天行健，君子以自强不息」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1172948_comment'></div>又曰：「大哉乾元，万物资始」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1172948_comment'></div>其于《坤》亦曰：「牝马地类，行地无疆」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1172948_comment'></div>又曰：「承天而时行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1172948_comment'></div>又曰：「至哉乾元，万物资生」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1172948_comment'></div>夫至健以动于上而不息，至柔以承之于下，勤孰甚焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1172948_comment'></div>始万物生万物焉，不为不烦也，其于大体，不与夫简易云者戾耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1172948_comment'></div>而孔子之云尔何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1172948_comment'></div>又曰：「易简之善配至德」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1172948_comment'></div>又曰：「易简而天下之理得矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1172948_comment'></div>其又可属之于人事邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1172948_comment'></div>愿质其所以然而见教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1172948_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_1172948'>问：三王之世，用当岁之入，其馀以御凶荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1172948_comment'></div>下而至汉，其用度亦不加少焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1172948_comment'></div>然孝文时悉弛租税与民，民与国皆有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1172948_comment'></div>今之用度视汉固若无异然，然租税之外，山泽关市之利取之殆既焉而不足，国与民平岁皆甚病，此其故何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1172948_comment'></div>其有以救乎否也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1172948_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_1172948'>问：《春秋左氏传》说晋文公之入也，利其民而欧之以礼信之教，然后用之，一战而霸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1172948_comment'></div>夫能使其民得其利而入于礼义信之教，圣人之所以为治之具岂易此耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1172948_comment'></div>然而不曰斯道也王道然也，何以哉者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1172948_comment'></div>其道固亡异而说者卑之邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1172948_comment'></div>抑不然也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1172948_comment'></div>欲释其所以然，则将孰质焉而可矣？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1172948_comment'></div>而王道之本末深浅何如也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1172948_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_1172948'>问：教之不洽于人也，曰处于位者莫为之先也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1172948_comment'></div>欲为之先则何施焉而可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1172948_comment'></div>古之道何者近于今？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1172948_comment'></div>今之所当始者何事焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1172948_comment'></div>吾子其言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1172948_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_67_1172948'>问：「移风易俗，莫善于乐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1172948_comment'></div>安上治民，莫善于礼」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1172948_comment'></div>孔子云然，其无不然也不疑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1172948_comment'></div>既然，则功美岂寡哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1172948_comment'></div>而于《记》则曰：「功成作乐，治定制礼」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1172948_comment'></div>信其如是也，则夫礼乐云者，不足以就功治耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1172948_comment'></div>不然，何功成治定矣，而始区区为也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1172948_comment'></div>无亦与孔子异意哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1172948_comment'></div>孟子又曰：「今乐犹古乐也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1172948_comment'></div>而唐太宗亦指陈声以明悲乐，柳子厚又称孟子，是则制作云者，其不必事耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1172948_comment'></div>抑虽事之而非所以为本邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1172948_comment'></div>黄帝以来孰为而不相沿袭也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1172948_comment'></div>本之要如何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1172948_comment'></div>为今议者，于吾子意孰安？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1172948_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_81_1172948'>问：周下文、武至于夷王未久也，而其治已替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1172948_comment'></div>汉与唐也，治不掩乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1172948_comment'></div>于戏！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1172948_comment'></div>天下之于治也何寡，而乱数如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1172948_comment'></div>今固承大敝之后，而所承者将缅而戾于周欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1172948_comment'></div>抑止于汉与唐也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1172948_comment'></div>汉与唐也，其治孰愈？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1172948_comment'></div>其当时之制，有合于周乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1172948_comment'></div>抑皆不合也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1172948_comment'></div>求其可以尚行于今者，傥有之乎无也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1172948_comment'></div>欲如周之盛时，其道易施而其验易见者，愿以开于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1172948_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_92_1172948'>问：乾六位，未尝有阴焉，而坤之为体，不可以为刚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1172948_comment'></div>然《系辞》则曰：「立天之道，曰阴与阳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1172948_comment'></div>立地之道，曰柔与刚」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1172948_comment'></div>信夫阴与阳、刚与柔也，天地当并用之也，则将于乾坤何合焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1172948_comment'></div>又曰「兼三才而两之」，今之人其信于天地，通乎不也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1172948_comment'></div>吾子当习于其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1172948_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_98_1172948'>问：伊尹亡夏而归汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1172948_comment'></div>汤，圣人也，知伊尹足信不疑，故以之相，而商为大治焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1172948_comment'></div>世颂汤与伊尹无穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1172948_comment'></div>令汤虽圣人，不得伊尹之助，未可以有为也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1172948_comment'></div>伊尹虽自任以天下之重，不与汤相值，亦未得志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1172948_comment'></div>下汤与伊尹，其治未尝非主与臣相值也，其乱亦未尝非主与臣相戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1172948_comment'></div>主与臣固常相须，而其合何少也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1172948_comment'></div>欲主之无不知贤足信不疑，而贤臣之必得行其道于天下，如之何而可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1172948_comment'></div>世之所以治乱之本不于是在耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1172948_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_107_1172948'>问：《论语》曰：「茍有用我者，期月而已可也，三年有成」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1172948_comment'></div>又曰：「如有王者，必世而后仁」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1172948_comment'></div>又曰：「善人为邦百年，可以胜残去杀」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1172948_comment'></div>是皆圣人之言也，圣人之言也宜壹，今其不合如此，不可考据也，岂其记者之妄欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1172948_comment'></div>抑信然也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1172948_comment'></div>信其然也，则将何质焉而可以壹也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1172948_comment'></div>古之远者难道矣，唐太宗至于今未久也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1172948_comment'></div>唐太宗之为治也，甫三年尔，人之产皆有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1172948_comment'></div>越之望陇为绝域也，其相之者，不持粮与兵而足无患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1172948_comment'></div>天下断狱，岁三十人而已，为安且治至此盛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1172948_comment'></div>「三年有成」云者，非已然欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1172948_comment'></div>今治天下以累世之渐，然而人之产皆不足，盗或袭州县，断狱岁以千数，必世、百年云者或过而几矣，然而不至于安且治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1172948_comment'></div>所贵乎学者非徒习于文而已，今其可行也，吾子盍言所以得失之繇，而通于圣人之所云尔以谂于时耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1172948_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_120_1172948'>问：李德裕曰：「正必去邪，邪必害正」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1172948_comment'></div>德裕之自道固不然也，其道邪正之势则适然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1172948_comment'></div>天下之所以治非它焉，用舍邪正是而已矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1172948_comment'></div>其不治非它焉，用舍邪正惑而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1172948_comment'></div>人主未尝不欲治，然于惑也，不终有焉，则间有焉者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1172948_comment'></div>终有焉者何议焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1172948_comment'></div>间有焉者则可谂之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1172948_comment'></div>以天下之大也，行之于国与民非一事也，群臣之多也，其言与行非一迹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1172948_comment'></div>邪正之归，何以与知而不惑也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1172948_comment'></div>可以圣与贤而不言，学者而不知乎？</div><div id='poem_sentence_129_1172948_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《策问一十道》<div id='poem_1172949' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172949' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172949?labeling=true' target='_blank'>策问一十道</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172949")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172949_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172949'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172949'>《乾》之二五皆曰「利见大人」，《屯》之二六皆曰「乘马班如」，《归妹》、《泰》之六五皆曰「帝乙归妹」，《损》之六五、《益》之六二皆曰「或益之，十朋之龟」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172949_comment'></div>《履》之六三曰「眇能视，跛能履」，而《归妹》则初九曰「跛能履」，九二曰「眇能视」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172949_comment'></div>《既济》之初九曰「曳其轮，濡其尾」，而《未济》则初六「濡其尾」，九二曰「曳其轮」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172949_comment'></div>或有《离》之象，而多曰「利用狱」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172949_comment'></div>或有《巽》之象，而多曰「利涉大川」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172949_comment'></div>凡此者，其辞或离或合，或同或异，其象各有系，其义各有所当，《易》学者之所宜尽心也，宜别白其旨，而是著于篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172949_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1172949'>问：孔子曰：「志于道，据于德，依于仁，游于艺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172949_comment'></div>老子曰：「失道而后德，失德而后仁，失仁而后义」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172949_comment'></div>韩子曰：「道与德为虚位，仁与义为定名」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172949_comment'></div>老子、韩愈亦各以其所得于圣人者自为一家之言邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172949_comment'></div>抑其有所激抗而其言不得不然邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172949_comment'></div>抑会其归不与孔子异意邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172949_comment'></div>其辩二子之得失，而推孔氏之意，凡四者之所谓如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172949_comment'></div>悉书以对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172949_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1172949'>问：二帝三王之治天下，岂出于求之材，开言路，用赏罚，明好恶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172949_comment'></div>而当时大治，后世称之至今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172949_comment'></div>今之所以别贤不肖而进退于朝廷，未尝有一士或遗于下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172949_comment'></div>广谏诤之涂而聪明视听，未尝有一言不通于上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172949_comment'></div>罚罪而赏功，以惩劝之意，未尝有一事不以其宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172949_comment'></div>好善而恶恶，以明化道之方，未尝有一事动不求当，与古之所以治天下者岂异？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172949_comment'></div>而今之治未足以迹于二帝三王之盛，其何谓邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172949_comment'></div>盍亦言焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172949_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1172949'>问：韩愈曰：「吾读孟轲书，然后知孔子之道尊，得扬雄、荀卿之书，而益尊孟子，以谓二子者皆圣人之徒」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172949_comment'></div>然今世学者好诋诎三子之说者甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172949_comment'></div>三子者诚诡于道，而愈之书又过于言乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1172949_comment'></div>抑今之学者未达于三子之说而好辩以妄议乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1172949_comment'></div>如三子之说不诡，韩愈之所谓者不过，而今之学者皆是，其不有害于世、乱于圣人之道？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1172949_comment'></div>欲使其能达于三子之说，而以其好辞妄议之心抑有达乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1172949_comment'></div>自古至今，百家之说众矣，其亦有可取者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1172949_comment'></div>抑皆无可取者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1172949_comment'></div>圣人之所以自得而不同于百家者于经何说？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1172949_comment'></div>百家之所以失而不合于圣人者于经何谓？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1172949_comment'></div>而三子之书尤恶百家之学者，又何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1172949_comment'></div>愿闻其所以。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1172949_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1172949'>问：《中庸》曰：「君子尊德性而道问学，致广大而尽精微，极高明而道中庸」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1172949_comment'></div>子学礼，能言六者之所谓，其著于篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1172949_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1172949'>问：今举天下之士，开间岁之制以收遗滞，定保行之法以革骜悖，修土著之令以息奸妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1172949_comment'></div>策问之试，使明于治乱之体者得毕其说；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1172949_comment'></div>设明经之科，使通于圣人之意者得申其学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1172949_comment'></div>子以谓如此可以得天下之贤材而变近世之风俗乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1172949_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_1172949'>问：六经之书，太极以来至于天地人神事物之变、远近小大微显之际、异同之旨无不备者，而其要则在于使学者知顺性命之理、正心修身、治国家天下、尽天地鬼神之宜、遂万物之性而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1172949_comment'></div>然其言不一，其意难知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1172949_comment'></div>今欲闻太极以来至于天地鬼神之际，与学者之所以顺性命之理而正心修身者，其要安在？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1172949_comment'></div>至于国家天下者之其本末先后如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1172949_comment'></div>尽天地鬼神之宜、遂万物之性者何方而可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1172949_comment'></div>此学者之务也，其勿务于虚词，而据经之言，以其远近大小微显之义、异同之说以对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1172949_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1172949'>问：《书》曰：命夔典乐教胄子，「直而温，宽而栗」，「柔而立，愿而恭」，「刚而无有虐，简而无有傲」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1172949_comment'></div>又曰：「神人以和」，「祖考来格」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1172949_comment'></div>又曰：「鸟兽跄跄」，「百兽率舞」，「凤皇来仪」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1172949_comment'></div>《记》曰：「国君无故不彻钟磬，士无故不彻琴瑟」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1172949_comment'></div>又曰：「功成作乐，事与时并，名与功偕」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1172949_comment'></div>又曰：「知礼乐之情者能作，识礼乐之文者能述」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1172949_comment'></div>孔子曰：「移风易俗，莫善于乐」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1172949_comment'></div>「今乐犹古乐也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1172949_comment'></div>夫礼乐刑政皆治天下之具，而有虞氏以来，教人者必本于乐，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1172949_comment'></div>其救人之性，使之直温、宽栗、柔立、愿恭，而刚简者无虐与傲，是果何以哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1172949_comment'></div>钟磬琴瑟无故则不傲，然则乐之急如是邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1172949_comment'></div>功成作乐，事与时并，名与功偕，则乐者象功德而已，其使之风移而俗易，至于动天地、感鬼神而及于飞走异类无知之物莫不皆化，是出于至治之极，所感者如此，乐者文之而已邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1172949_comment'></div>抑感之者非他，固独在于乐邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1172949_comment'></div>如欲作礼乐，则其情之可考于古者何近？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1172949_comment'></div>如欲述礼乐，则文之可用于今者何宜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1172949_comment'></div>孟子以谓今古之乐同者，其合于经邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1172949_comment'></div>生其务极其意而各以经言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1172949_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_63_1172949'>问：《诗》之序曰：太平之君子能长育人材，则天下喜乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1172949_comment'></div>而《孟子》亦曰：得天下之英材而教育之，一乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1172949_comment'></div>今之君子有长育人材之势，而又能有其志者，固少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1172949_comment'></div>有其志而以士之难知也，进以文辞而不奉于理，则浮华以乱实、险怪以乱正者将有取焉，是不害于道邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1172949_comment'></div>进之以行义而本于理，则繁礼而饰貌、好奇以诡众者将有取焉，是不害于道邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1172949_comment'></div>夫育人材者固将长育成就人之材，以劝天下而移风俗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1172949_comment'></div>今其害若是，知其溺于浮华之可患而宁进繁礼饰貌好奇之人，庶乎其有激，而幸乎其有实也，其可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1172949_comment'></div>抑其犹不可也乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1172949_comment'></div>古之君子长育人材而能本于理者，其要如宜，具书以对。</div><div id='poem_sentence_71_1172949_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《送徐竑著作知康州》<div id='poem_220461' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220461' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220461?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送徐竑著作知康州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220461")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220461_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220461'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220461'>溪蛮昔负命，杀气淩南州。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220461'>城郭涨烟火，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220461", 220461, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>堂皇</span>啸蜉蝣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220461'>被发尽冠巾，吾人反缧囚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220461'>行剽至杪忽，归载越山丘。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220461'>驱攘事虽定，收合信疮疣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220461'>不有异泽沾，何令馀患瘳。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220461'>寒风在林鸣，君马不能留。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220461'>初佩太守章，慨然任人忧。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220461'>问俗灰烬馀，咄唶令心谋。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220461'>士材为世用，因难乃知尤。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220461'>烦苛一荡涤，幽远遍怀柔。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220461'>四封鸣鸡犬，五谷被<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_220461", 220461, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>原畴</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220461'>里闾多娱宴，歌鼓震<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_220461", 220461, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>溟陬</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220461'>明义每所希，古人不难侔。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220461'>日月有常运，志士无安辀。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220461'>山川自兹始，努力千里游。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_220461'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_220461_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《送丁琰序》<div id='poem_1173138' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173138' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173138?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送丁琰序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173138")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173138_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173138'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173138'>守令之于民近且重，易知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173138_comment'></div>予尝论今之守令，有道而闻四方者，不过数人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173138_comment'></div>此数人者，非特任守令也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173138_comment'></div>过此数人，有千里者相接而无一贤守，有百里者相环而无一贤令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173138_comment'></div>至天子大臣尝患其然，则任奉法之吏，严<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173138", 1173138, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>刺察</span>之科，以绳治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173138_comment'></div>诸郡守县令以罪不任职，或黜或罢者，相继于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173138_comment'></div>于是下诏书，择<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173138", 1173138, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>廷臣</span>，使各举所知以任守令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173138_comment'></div>是天子大臣爱国与民而重守令之意，可谓无不至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173138_comment'></div>而诏虽下，举者卒不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173138_comment'></div>惟令或以旧制举，不皆循岁月而授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173138_comment'></div>每举者有姓名，得而视之，推考其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173138", 1173138, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>材行</span>能堪其举者，卒亦未见焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173138_comment'></div>举者既然矣，则以余之所见闻，阴计其人之孰可举者，卒亦未见焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173138_comment'></div>犹恐予之愚且贱，闻与见焉者少，不足以知天下之材也，则求夫贤而有名位、闻与见之博者，而从之问其人之孰可举者，卒亦未见焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173138_comment'></div>岂天下之人固可诬，而天固不生才于今哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173138_comment'></div>使天子大臣患天下之弊，则数更法以御之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173138_comment'></div>法日以愈密，而弊日以愈多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173138_comment'></div>岂今之去古也远，治天下卒无术哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173138_comment'></div>盖古人之有庠有序，有师友之游，有有司之论，而赏罚之始于乡，属于天下，为教之详至此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173138_comment'></div>士也有圣人之道，则皆得行其教；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173138_comment'></div>有可教之质，则皆可为材且良，故古之贤也多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173138_comment'></div>贤之多，则自公卿大夫，至于牛羊仓廪贱官之选咸宜焉，独千里、百里之长哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173138_comment'></div>其为道岂不约且明，其为致天下之材岂不多哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173138_comment'></div>其岂有劳于求而不得人，密于法而不胜其弊，若今之患哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173138_comment'></div>今也庠序、师友、赏罚之法非古也，士也有圣人之道，欲推而教于乡于天下，则无路焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173138_comment'></div>人愚也，则愚矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173138_comment'></div>可教而贤者，卒谁教之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173138_comment'></div>故今之贤也少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173138_comment'></div>贤之少，则自公卿大夫，至于牛羊仓廪贱官之选，常不足其人焉，独守令哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173138_comment'></div>是以其求之无不至，其法日以愈密，而不足以为治者，其原皆此之出也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173138_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173138_comment'></div>奚重而不更也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173138_comment'></div>姑苏人丁君琰佐南城，南城之政平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173138_comment'></div>予知其令，令曰：「丁君之佐我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173138_comment'></div>又知其邑人，邑人无不乐道之者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173138_comment'></div>予既患今之士，而常慕古之人，每观良吏一传，则反覆爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173138_comment'></div>如丁君之信于其邑，予于旁近邑之所未见，故爱之特深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173138_comment'></div>今为令于淮阴，上之人知其材而举用之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173138_comment'></div>于令也，得人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173138_comment'></div>使丁君一推是心以往，信于此，有不信于彼哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173138_comment'></div>求余文者多矣，拒而莫之与也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173138_comment'></div>独丁君之行也，不求余文，而余乐道其所尝论者以送之，以示重丁君，且勉之，且勉天下之凡为吏者也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1173138_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《祭袁太监文》<div id='poem_1173400' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173400' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173400?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭袁太监文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173400")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173400_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173400'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173400'>于乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173400_comment'></div>越蜀荆吴，三方万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173400_comment'></div>公马騑騑，幞印而使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173400_comment'></div>蛮墟海聚，狱无滥辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173400_comment'></div>峨峨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173400", 1173400, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>邛僰</span>，货走京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173400_comment'></div>东南之粟，风帆手笮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173400_comment'></div>岁填太仓，万艘尾错。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173400_comment'></div>遂副会府，肆其心画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173400_comment'></div>出屏于宣，以我偃侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173400_comment'></div>九卿之行，得谢以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173400_comment'></div>冕弁入里，昔时布衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173400_comment'></div>进退则然，当世所嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173400_comment'></div>不贵以骄，不富以奢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173400_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173400", 1173400, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>翼翼</span>其行，坦坦其衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173400_comment'></div>隤然顺退，长者之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173400_comment'></div>白发虽多，几杖未随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173400_comment'></div>笑言在耳，已哭于帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173400_comment'></div>著然抚我，孰如公尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173400_comment'></div>先人不幸，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173400", 1173400, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>托载</span>公舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173400_comment'></div>我生方屯，戴德莫酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173400_comment'></div>羞醪则微，以陈我悲。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1173400_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《答袁陟书》<div id='poem_1173059' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173059' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173059?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答袁陟书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173059")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173059_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173059'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173059'>巩顿首世弼足下：辱书说介甫事，或有以为矫者，而叹自信独立之难，因以教巩，以谓不仕未为非得计者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173059_comment'></div>非足下爱我之深，处我之重，不至于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173059_comment'></div>虽亲戚之于我，未有过此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173059_comment'></div>然介甫者，彼其心固有所自得，世以为矫不矫，彼必不顾之，不足论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173059_comment'></div>至于仕进之说，则以巩所考于书，常谓古之仕者，皆道德明备，己有馀力，而可以治人，非茍以治人而不足于己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173059_comment'></div>故子使漆雕开仕，对曰：「吾斯之未能信」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173059_comment'></div>子说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173059_comment'></div>然世不讲此久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173059_comment'></div>故当孔子之时，独颜子者未尝仕，而孔子称之曰「好学」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173059_comment'></div>其馀弟子见于书者，独开之言如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173059_comment'></div>若巩之愚，固己不足者，方自勉于学，岂可以言仕不仕邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173059_comment'></div>就使异日有可仕之道，而仕不仕固自有时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173059_comment'></div>古之君子，法度备于身，而有仕有不仕者是也，岂为呶呶者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173059_comment'></div>然巩不敢便自许不应举者，巩贫不得已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173059_comment'></div>亦不敢与古之所谓为贫者比，何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173059_comment'></div>彼固所谓道德明备而不遇于世者，非若巩之鄙，遽舍其学而欲谋食也，此其心愧于古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173059_comment'></div>然巩之家茍能自足，便可以处而一意于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173059_comment'></div>巩非好进而不知止者，此其心固无愧于古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173059_comment'></div>辱足下爱之深，处之重，不敢不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173059", 1173059, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>报答</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173059_comment'></div>所示诗序及答杨生书，甚善甚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173059_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173059_comment'></div>巩顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1173059_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《学舍记》<div id='poem_1173284' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173284' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173284?labeling=true' target='_blank'>学舍记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173284")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173284_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173284'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173284'>予幼则从先生受书，然是时，方乐与家人童子嬉戏上下，未知好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173284_comment'></div>十六七时，窥六经之言与古今文章，有过人者，知好之，则于是锐意欲与之并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173284_comment'></div>而是时，家事亦滋出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173284_comment'></div>自斯以来，西北则行陈、蔡、谯、苦、睢、汴、淮、泗，出于京师；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173284_comment'></div>东方则绝江舟漕河之渠，逾五湖，并封禺、会稽之山，出于东海上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173284_comment'></div>南方则载大江，临夏口而望洞庭，转彭蠡，上庾岭，繇浈阳之泷，至南海上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173284_comment'></div>此予之所涉世而奔走也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173284_comment'></div>蛟鱼汹涌湍石之川，巅崖莽林䝙虺之聚，与夫雨旸寒燠风波雾毒不测之危，此予之所单游远寓，而冒犯以勤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173284_comment'></div>衣食药物，庐舍器用，箕筥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173284", 1173284, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>碎细</span>之间，此予之所经营以养也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173284_comment'></div>天倾地坏，殊州独哭，数千里之远，抱丧而南，积时之劳，乃毕大事，此予之所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173284", 1173284, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>遘祸</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173284", 1173284, "Clauses/40/Comments/1")'>忧艰</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173284_comment'></div>太夫人所志，与夫弟婚妹嫁，四时之祠，属人外亲之问，王事之输，此予之所皇皇而不足也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173284_comment'></div>予于是力疲意耗，而又多疾，言之所序，盖其一二之粗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173284_comment'></div>得其閒时，挟书以学，于夫为身治人，世用之损益，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173284", 1173284, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>考观</span>讲解，有不能至者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173284_comment'></div>故不得专力尽思，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173284", 1173284, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>琢雕</span>文章，以载私心难见之情，而追古今之作者为并，以足予之所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173284", 1173284, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>好慕</span>，此予之所自视而嗟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173284_comment'></div>今天子至和之初，予之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173284", 1173284, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>侵扰</span>多事故益甚，予之力无以为，乃休于家，而即其旁之草舍以学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173284_comment'></div>或疾其卑，或议其隘者，予顾而笑曰：「是予之宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173284_comment'></div>予之劳心困形，以役于事者，有以为之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173284_comment'></div>予之卑巷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173284", 1173284, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>穷庐</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173284", 1173284, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>冗衣</span>砻饭，芑苋之羹，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173284", 1173284, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>隐约</span>而安者，固予之所以遂其志而有待也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173284_comment'></div>予之疾则有之，可以进于道者，学之有不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173284_comment'></div>至于文章，平生所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173284", 1173284, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>好慕</span>，为之有不暇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173284_comment'></div>若夫土坚木好高大之观，固世之聪明豪隽挟长而有恃者所得为，若予之拙，岂能易而志彼哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173284_comment'></div>遂历道其少长出处，与夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173284", 1173284, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>好慕</span>之心，以为《学舍记》。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1173284_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《南轩记》<div id='poem_1173285' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173285' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173285?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南轩记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173285")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173285_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173285'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173285'>得邻之茀地蕃之，树竹木灌蔬于其间，结茅以自休，嚣然而乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173285_comment'></div>世固有处廊庙之贵，抗万乘之富，吾不愿易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173285_comment'></div>人之性不同，于是知伏闲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173285", 1173285, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>隐隩</span>，吾性所最宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173285_comment'></div>驱之就烦，非其器所长，况使之争于势利、爱恶、毁誉之间邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173285_comment'></div>然吾亲之养无以修，吾之昆弟饭菽藿羹之无以继，吾之役于物，或田于食，或野于宿，不得常此处也，其能无燄然于心邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173285_comment'></div>少而思，凡吾之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173285", 1173285, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>拂性</span>苦形而役于物者，有以为之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173285_comment'></div>士固有所勤，有所肆识，其皆受之于天而顺之，则吾亦无处而非其乐，独何必休于是邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173285_comment'></div>顾吾之所好者远，无与处于是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173285_comment'></div>然而六艺百家史氏之籍，笺疏之书，与夫论美刺非、感微托远、山镵冢刻、浮誇诡异之文章，下至兵权、历法、星官、乐工、山农、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173285", 1173285, "Clauses/33/Comments/8")'>野圃</span>、方言、地记、佛老所传，吾悉得于此，皆伏羲以来，下更秦汉至今，圣人贤者魁杰之材，殚岁月，惫精思，日夜各推所长，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173285", 1173285, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>分辨</span>万事之说，其于天地万物，小大之际，修身理人，国家天下治乱安危存亡之致，罔不毕载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173285_comment'></div>处与吾俱，可当所谓益者之友非邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173285_comment'></div>吾窥圣人旨意所出，以去疑解蔽，贤人智者所称事引类，始终之概以自广，养吾心以忠，约守而恕行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173285_comment'></div>其过也改，趋之以勇，而至之以不止，此吾之所以求于内者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173285_comment'></div>得其时则行，守深山长谷而不出者，非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173285_comment'></div>不得其时则止，仆仆然求行其道者，亦非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173285_comment'></div>吾之不足于义，或爱而誉之者，过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173285_comment'></div>吾之足于义，或恶而毁之者，亦过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173285_comment'></div>彼何与于我哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173285_comment'></div>此吾之所任乎天与人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173285_comment'></div>然则吾之所学者虽博，而所守者可谓简；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173285_comment'></div>所言虽近而易知，而所任者可谓重也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173285_comment'></div>书之南轩之壁间，蚤夜览观焉，以自进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173285_comment'></div>南丰曾巩记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1173285_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　姑父黄君卒，曾巩作《祭黄君文》<div id='poem_1173402' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173402' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173402?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭黄君文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173402")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173402_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173402'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173402'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173402_comment'></div>宋且百年，号令万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173402_comment'></div>奸臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173402", 1173402, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>黜除</span>，尤者摈死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173402_comment'></div>岩材里秀，驱驾而使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173402_comment'></div>盖君之生，有时如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173402_comment'></div>当世之官，有微有盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173402_comment'></div>盛者庙堂，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173402", 1173402, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>斟酌</span>王命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173402_comment'></div>千隶百司，进俟退听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173402_comment'></div>出长四方，玉斧金乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173402_comment'></div>邦侯众将，传牒而令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173402_comment'></div>微者纷纷，或陪或正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173402_comment'></div>千品万名，各有操柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173402_comment'></div>人皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173402", 1173402, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>敏手</span>，捷取能并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173402_comment'></div>君独于求，以死终病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173402_comment'></div>同时之人，勤营善畜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173402_comment'></div>万籯储金，万袭藏玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173402_comment'></div>遗馀野积，不能匮椟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173402_comment'></div>君独一身，衣食常蹙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173402_comment'></div>兹非其命，曷以至兹？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173402_comment'></div>君能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173402", 1173402, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>自达</span>，可以无悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173402_comment'></div>亲戚念君，能不歔欷！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173402_comment'></div>我之老姑，归君为妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173402_comment'></div>与君历年，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173402", 1173402, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>颠沛</span>同有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173402_comment'></div>今对其孀，宁匪我伤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173402_comment'></div>来问来吊，屡至其堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173402_comment'></div>葬君南山，冬气已烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173402_comment'></div>薄醪时馐，觞豆肃设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173402_comment'></div>侑以兹文，与君一诀。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1173402_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《茅亭闲坐》<div id='poem_220423' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220423' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220423?labeling=true' target='_blank'>茅亭闲坐</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220423")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220423_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220423'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220423'>荆门常昼掩，不必云山深。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220423'>岂敢尚孤绝，自能收寸心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220423'>草萌被远径，鸟语变乔林。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220423'>散帙味新趣，鸣弦叹馀音。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220423'>脱粟幸可饱，一瓢方独斟。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220423'>颜从缅虽卓，非此谁为寻。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220423'>盛服缠紫艾，重印铸黄金。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220423'>信使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_220423", 220423, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>忧惴</span>息，讵无勤苦侵。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220423'>埃尘缁冠盖，霜露泫衣衿。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220423'>胁肩已自昔，俯首微独吟。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220423'>岂惟智所拙，曾是力难任。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220423'>为乐聊在此，焉知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_220423", 220423, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>玉山岑</span>？<div id='poem_sentence_11_220423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220423'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_220423_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《九月九日》<div id='poem_220334' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220334' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220334?labeling=true' target='_blank'>九月九日</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220334")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220334_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220334'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220334'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_220334", 220334, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>凄凄</span>风露滋，靡靡尘霭屏。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220334'>已忻庐舍清，未苦裘褐冷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220334'>眠食味尤嘉，起坐日尚永。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220334'>虚天照积水，精鉴出幽矿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220334'>石莹见山棱，林疏觉窗囧。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220334'>黄花宿蕊破，艳艳晨妆靓。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220334'>频寻远径香，每爱苍池影。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220334'>为谁佳色鲜，慰我贫斋静。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220334'>寒醅出家法，异果得他境。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220334'>甘腴馔新兔，丑怪荐修螷<span class='inlineComment2'>（蒲猛反）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220334'>幽闲重时节，老大珍物景。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220334'>献酬兴未薄，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_220334", 220334, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>比讽</span>思犹骋。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220334'>况同亲戚欢，讵匪田野幸。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220334'>俱醉任栖鸦，烛炬尚可秉。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220334'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_220334_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《咏雪》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《高松》<div id='poem_220479' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220479' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220479?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高松</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220479")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220479_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220479'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220479'>高松高干云，众木安可到？<div id='poem_sentence_0_220479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220479'>汤汤鸣寒溪，偃偃倚翠纛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220479'>侧听心神醒，仰视目睛眊。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220479'>风雨天地动，一叶不欹倒。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220479'>岂同涧中萍，上下逐流潦。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220479'>岂同墙根槐，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_220479", 220479, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>卷卷</span>秋可扫。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220479'>凤凰引众禽，此木阴可焘。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220479'>君求百常柱，星日此可造。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220479'>般匠世有无，方钟野人好。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220479'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_220479_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《咏史二首》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩与王回（深父）、王向（子直）、王冏（容季）友善。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩撰《虞吏部郎中戚公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173325' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173325' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173325?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虞部郎中戚公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐六年正月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173325")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173325_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173325'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173325'>余观三王所以教天下之士，而至于节文之者，知士之出于其时者，皆世其道德，盖有以然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173325_comment'></div>去三王千数百年之间，教法既已坏，士之学行世其家，若汉之袁氏、杨氏、陈氏，唐之柳氏，其操义风概有以厉天下、矫异世否邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173325_comment'></div>以予所闻，若宋之戚氏，其事可以次叙焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173325_comment'></div>公其世家子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173325_comment'></div>叙曰：公，宋之楚丘人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173325_comment'></div>大父讳同文，唐天祐元年生，历五代入宋，皆不仕，以文学义行为学者师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173325_comment'></div>殁，其徒相与号为正素先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173325_comment'></div>后以子贵，赠兵部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173325_comment'></div>考讳纶，事太宗、真宗，以贤能为枢密直学士，与其兄职方郎中维以友爱闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173325_comment'></div>祥符、天禧之间，学士以论天书绌，而郎中盖亦举贤良不就，以为曹国公翊善，不合去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173325_comment'></div>盖其父子、兄弟之出处如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173325_comment'></div>学士后以子贵，赠司徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173325_comment'></div>公讳舜臣，字世佐，司徒之少子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173325_comment'></div>恭谨恂恂，举错必以礼，择然后出言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173325_comment'></div>与其兄某官舜宾、某官舜举，复以友爱能帅其家，有先人之法度闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173325_comment'></div>自天祐至今，百有五十馀年，天下六易，士之名一能，守一善，或身不终，或至子孙而失者多矣，而戚氏之世德独久如此，何其盛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173325_comment'></div>然世之谈者，方多人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173325", 1173325, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>嚚子憸孙</span>，隆名极位，世世茍得者，以为能守其业，是本何理哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173325_comment'></div>公少以荫补将作监主簿，然三十犹在司徒之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173325_comment'></div>司徒终而贫，乃出监雍丘税，又监衢州酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173325_comment'></div>迁知舒州太湖县，兼提举茶场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173325_comment'></div>治有惠爱，民乞留，诏从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173325_comment'></div>复三年，乃得代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173325_comment'></div>献诗言赋茶之苛，岁用万数，愿弃勿采，以感动当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173325_comment'></div>归，监在京盐院，言盐之利宜通商，听之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173325_comment'></div>出通判泗州，能使转运使不得以暴敛侵其民，而民之养其父者得以其义贳死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173325_comment'></div>又通判濮州，当王则反于贝，濮民相惊且乱，公斩一人摇濮中者，惊乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173325_comment'></div>已而提点刑狱以为功，得改官，公不自言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173325_comment'></div>转知抚州，其治<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1173325", 1173325, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>大方</span>，务除苛去烦，州之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1173325", 1173325, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>诡祠</span>有大帝号者，祠至百馀所，公悉除之，民大化服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173325_comment'></div>徙知南安军，至，未及有所施为，而公盖已病矣，以皇祐四年六月七日卒于官，年五十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173325_comment'></div>自主簿凡十一迁，其官至尚书虞部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173325_comment'></div>公濮州之归也，以其属与公之配陈氏，凡十三丧，葬宋之北原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173325_comment'></div>皇祐六年正月八日，公之子师道遂以公从陈氏葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173325_comment'></div>戚氏者，卫之大夫孙文子，食于河上之邑曰戚，为姬姓之后，至后世失其所食邑，而更自别曰戚氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173325_comment'></div>汉有以郎从高祖封临辕侯者，曰戚鳃，鳃侯四世而失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173325_comment'></div>梁有以三礼为博士入陈卒者，曰戚衮，衮称吴郡盐官人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173325_comment'></div>侍郎之曾祖曰远，祖曰琮，父曰圭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173325_comment'></div>其谱曰：琮自长丰之戚村徙居楚丘，故今为楚丘人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173325_comment'></div>此戚氏之先后可见者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173325_comment'></div>观公之守其业者，可以知其恭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173325_comment'></div>观公之施于事者，可以知其厚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173325_comment'></div>然人亦少有能爱之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173325_comment'></div>盖世之为聪明立声威者，虽荒谖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1173325", 1173325, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>悖冒</span>无不遇于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173325_comment'></div>至恭让质直不能驰骤而遇困蹶者，独不可称数，余甚异焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173325_comment'></div>夫赴时趋务，则材者固亦重矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173325_comment'></div>而立人成俗，则洁身积行，是岂可轻也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173325_comment'></div>然时之取舍若此，亦其不幸不遇，处之各适其理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173325_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1173325'>隆隆戚宗自姬出，临辕盐官辉名实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173325_comment'></div>侍郎家梁自祖琮，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1173325", 1173325, "Clauses/156/Comments/0")'>违世</span>恬幽树儒术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173325_comment'></div>司徒郎中艺且贤，诋符绳公事魁崛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173325_comment'></div>恂恂南安得家规，庄容毖辞若遵律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173325_comment'></div>盛哉世徽后宜闻，刻铭方珉告幽室。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1173325_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩撰《杂说六篇》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩评议欧阳修所修《五代史》<div id='poem_220475' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220475' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220475?labeling=true' target='_blank'>读五代史</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_220475'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220475'>唐衰非一日，远自开元中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220475_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220475'>尚传十四帝，始告历数穷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220475_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220475'>由来根本强，暴戾岂易攻？<div id='poem_sentence_2_220475_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220475'>嗟哉梁周间，卒莫相始终。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220475_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220475'>兴无累世德，灭若烛向风。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220475_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220475'>当时积薪上，曾宁废歌钟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220475_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220475'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_220475_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《读<五代史>》<div id='poem_220475' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220475' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220475?labeling=true' target='_blank'>读五代史</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220475")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220475_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220475'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220475'>唐衰非一日，远自开元中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220475_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220475'>尚传十四帝，始告历数穷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220475_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220475'>由来根本强，暴戾岂易攻？<div id='poem_sentence_2_220475_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220475'>嗟哉梁周间，卒莫相始终。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220475_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220475'>兴无累世德，灭若烛向风。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220475_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220475'>当时积薪上，曾宁废歌钟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220475_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220475'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_220475_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《庭木》<div id='poem_220438' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220438' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220438?labeling=true' target='_blank'>庭木</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220438")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220438_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220438'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220438'>庭中有佳树，清影四面垂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220438'>往往风雨夜，蛟龙此投依。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220438'>留之待鸾凤，未许燕雀窥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220438'>谁谓乌鸟恶，安巢最高枝。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220438'>不顾白日照，直傍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_220438", 220438, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>阴虹</span>飞。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220438'>自恃栖托稳，岂忧弹射危。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220438'>三春独翱翔，百鸟敛羽仪。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220438'>凤凰不能争，况乃凫雁微。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220438'>既务志意得，都为世可欺。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220438'>白昼攫鼎肉，从容择<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_220438", 220438, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>牷牺</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220438'>近人不肯避，一怒终夜啼。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220438'>遭其瞰墙屋，祸患岂可移。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220438'>听之欲占赦，妇女固已痴。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220438'>忿害乃其所，何肯报福釐。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220438'>行路指之叹，童稚争骂讥。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220438'>鹦鹉献至尊，言语固可奇。<div id='poem_sentence_15_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_220438'>翡翠输太府，器服所取资。<div id='poem_sentence_16_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_220438'>雉鸡美文章，贽赠理亦宜。<div id='poem_sentence_17_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_220438'>鹰鹯逐恶鸟，天威得施为。<div id='poem_sentence_18_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_220438'>关雎于周室，耿洁配后妃。<div id='poem_sentence_19_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_220438'>莫如此鸟顽，饱食无所裨。<div id='poem_sentence_20_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_220438'>一善不能有，丑声日交驰。<div id='poem_sentence_21_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_220438'>但知择嘉处，巍然治其栖。<div id='poem_sentence_22_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_220438'>众怒未易忽，徼幸亦有斯。<div id='poem_sentence_23_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_220438'>安知无刀斧，崩分弃毛皮。<div id='poem_sentence_24_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_220438'>且勿引蠹虫，使树心本披。<div id='poem_sentence_25_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_220438'>亦有爱搏击，钩连枭与鸱。<div id='poem_sentence_26_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_220438'>亦勿乐顺己，窟穴藏狐狸。<div id='poem_sentence_27_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_220438'>凡能致大患，鲜不自豪𣯷。<div id='poem_sentence_28_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_220438'>未知引避去，此语足自规。<div id='poem_sentence_29_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_220438'>惜哉种树意，长与事乖违。<div id='poem_sentence_30_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_220438'>古来亦如此，壮士徒嗟悲。<div id='poem_sentence_31_220438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_220438'></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_220438_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《菊花》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《落叶》<div id='poem_220507' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220507' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220507?labeling=true' target='_blank'>落叶</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220507")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220507_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220507'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220507'>秋雨与风相喷薄，树木可能无叶落。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220507'>琅玕散漫不可收，野步满船谁扫掠。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220507'>垂杨千树旧所惜，颜色易衰由力弱。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220507'>空条尚舞不自休，物意岂能知索寞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220507'>菊花虽开能几许，新酒纵酸犹可酌。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220507'>朱颜久已𢶳销减，岂有功名堪写貌。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220507'>衣冠尘土欲更洗，其奈满堤河水浊。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220507'>花开叶落须强醉，壮士岂忧常落魄。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220507'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_220507_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《舞鹤》<div id='poem_220521' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220521' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220521?labeling=true' target='_blank'>舞鹤</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220521")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220521_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220521'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220521'>蓬瀛归未得，偃翼清溪阴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220521'>忽闻瑶琴奏，遂舞玉山岑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220521'>舞罢复嘹唳，谁知天外心？<div id='poem_sentence_2_220521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220521'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_220521_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年9月15日</a>　曾巩作《思轩诗序》<div id='poem_1173160' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173160' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173160?labeling=true' target='_blank'>思轩诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和元年九月十五日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173160")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173160_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173160'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173160'>今天子至和之初，尚书屯田员外郎林君慥通判抚州，协于上下，以修其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173160_comment'></div>于是时，蝗起京东，转入江淮之间，秋又皆旱，抚独无害灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173160_comment'></div>故君得以其閒，益疏其寝北之池，厚池之北涯，立屋其上，入而燕焉，名其轩曰思轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173160_comment'></div>士之能诗者，皆为君赋之。<div class='inline'
