id='poem_sentence_3_1173160_comment'></div>观君之蚤夜于其治，既有馀日，乃自以为不足，而深思于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173160_comment'></div>得士大夫之作，读而推之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173160_comment'></div>以察君之志，将无小大言动，万事之作止，一择其宜，则思之尽，岂独一时寄此轩之内哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173160_comment'></div>君之大父水部君，当太宗时，实通判是州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173160_comment'></div>今六十馀年，而君来世其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173160_comment'></div>众于是考于州人，以求水部之馀思<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173160", 1173160, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>遗德</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173160_comment'></div>又荣君之能业其家，而谓君之势且益显，以大其宗门，将岂止于此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173160_comment'></div>后有君子低回此轩，而迹君之思见于事者，不违于理，不坠其先人，则诗之信天下，其可蔽也哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173160_comment'></div>九月十五日序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1173160_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年12月2日</a>　曾巩作《先大夫集后序》<div id='poem_1173153' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173153' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173153?labeling=true' target='_blank'>先大夫集后序</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和元年十二月二日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173153")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173153_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173153'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173153'>公所为书，号《仙凫羽翼》者三十卷，《西陲要纪》者十卷，《清边前要》五十卷，《广中台志》八十卷，《为臣要纪》三卷，《四声韵》五卷，总一百七十八卷，皆刊行于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173153_comment'></div>今类次诗赋书奏一百二十三篇，又自为十卷，藏于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173153_comment'></div>方五代之际，儒学既摈焉，后生小子，治术业于闾巷，文多浅近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173153_comment'></div>是时公虽少，所学已皆知治乱得失兴坏之理，其为文闳深<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173153", 1173153, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>隽美</span>，而长于讽谕，今类次乐府已下是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173153_comment'></div>宋既平天下，公始出仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173153_comment'></div>当此之时，太祖、太宗已纲纪大法矣，公于是勇言当世之得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173153_comment'></div>其在朝廷，疾当事者不忠，故凡言天下之要，必本天子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173153", 1173153, "Clauses/30/Comments/1")'>忧怜</span>百姓、劳心万事之意，而推大臣从官执事之人，观望怀奸，不称天子属任之心，故治久未洽，至其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173153", 1173153, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>难言</span>，则人有所不敢言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173153_comment'></div>虽屡不合而出，而所言益切，不以利害祸福动其意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173153_comment'></div>始公尤见奇于太宗，自光禄寺丞、越州监酒税召见，以为直史馆，遂为两浙转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173153_comment'></div>未久而真宗即位，益以材见知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173153_comment'></div>初试以知制诰，及西兵起，又以为自陕以西经略判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173153_comment'></div>而公常激切论大臣，当时皆不悦，故不果用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173153_comment'></div>然真宗终感其言，故为泉州未尽一岁，拜苏州，五日，又为扬州，将复召之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173153_comment'></div>而公于是时又上书，语斥大臣尤切，故卒以龃龉终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173153_comment'></div>公之言，其大者，以自唐之衰，民穷久矣，海内既集，天子方修法度，而用事者尚多烦碎，治财利之臣又益急，公独以谓宜遵简易、罢管榷，以与民休息，塞天下望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173153_comment'></div>祥符初，四方争言符应，天子因之，遂用事泰山，祠汾阴，而道家之说亦滋甚，自京师至四方，皆大治宫观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173153_comment'></div>公益诤，以谓天命不可专任，宜绌奸臣，修人事，反复至数百千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173153_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173153_comment'></div>公之尽忠，天子之受尽言，何必古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173153_comment'></div>此非传之所谓主圣臣直者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173153_comment'></div>何其盛也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173153_comment'></div>何其盛也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173153_comment'></div>公在两浙，奏罢苛税二百三十馀条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173153_comment'></div>在京西，又与三司争论，免民租，释逋负之在民者，盖公之所试如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173153_comment'></div>所试者大，其庶几矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173153_comment'></div>公所尝言甚众，其在上前及书亡者，盖不得而集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173153_comment'></div>其或从或否，而后常可思者，与历官行事，庐陵欧阳公已铭公之碑特详焉，此故不论，论其不尽载者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173153_comment'></div>公卒以龃龉终，其功行或不得在史氏记，藉令记之，当时好公者少，史其果可信欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173153_comment'></div>后有君子欲推而考之，读公之碑与其书，及余小子之序其意者，具见其表里，其于虚实之论可核矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173153_comment'></div>公卒乃赠谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173153_comment'></div>姓曾氏，讳某，南丰人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173153_comment'></div>序其书者，公之孙巩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173153_comment'></div>至和元年十二月二日谨序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1173153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173153'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷一二。又见《曾文定公集》卷六，《南丰曾先生文粹》卷三，《文献通考》经籍考卷六一，正德《建昌志》卷八，《文章辨体汇选》卷三○六，《古文渊鉴》卷五二，《古今图书集成》官常典卷七○○、经籍典卷四八一。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173153_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《代人谢余侍郎启》<div id='poem_1173083' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173083' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173083?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代人谢余侍郎启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173083")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173083_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173083'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173083'>右某启：伏念某归而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173083", 1173083, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>闲处</span>，时所背驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173083_comment'></div>分功名之无期，嗟志意之空大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173083_comment'></div>言当世之事，惧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173083", 1173083, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>尚口</span>而更穷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173083_comment'></div>求后人之知，因著书而自见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173083_comment'></div>疏阔已甚，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173083", 1173083, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>抵弃</span>未能，辄布<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173083", 1173083, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>听闻</span>，方虞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173083", 1173083, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>诃谴</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173083_comment'></div>属小儿之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173083", 1173083, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>过拜</span>，辱馀论之见存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173083_comment'></div>指瑾掩疵，大为之地，悯穷悼屈，勤出于衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173083_comment'></div>省枯槁之姿，力乖报德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173083_comment'></div>激衰残之气，感欲忘身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173083_comment'></div>瞻风采之夐遥，役<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173083", 1173083, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>魂神</span>而飞去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173083_comment'></div>尚当益壮，以塞误知。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173083_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩撰《旌德县太君薛氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173365' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173365' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173365?labeling=true' target='_blank'>旌德县太君薛氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173365")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173365_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173365'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173365'>夫人姓薛氏，累封旌德县太君，为故太子右清道率府副率致仕、赠右监门卫将军姓段氏讳某之妻，今提点江南东路刑狱公事礼宾副使名某之母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173365_comment'></div>某州某县人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173365_comment'></div>大父讳某，当吴越钱忠懿王时，娶王女，为王国官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173365_comment'></div>父讳某，祥符初，为东头供奉官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173365_comment'></div>供奉常将屯宫门，而监门之父、右班殿直讳某者，屯三阳，二人者，以意气喜相得也，遂以夫人归段氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173365_comment'></div>夫人性柔淑，能和其属人，自佩服栉珥，凡资己者，常出于俭而有馀，好施，虽尽费不以为侈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173365_comment'></div>生男一人，礼宾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173365_comment'></div>女二人，长适开封黄思问，次适吴郡潘孝孙，皆进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173365_comment'></div>夫人年四十有三，大中祥符七年五月某甲子以疾卒于京师之敦教坊，某年某月某甲子祔其夫之柩，葬于某州之某县某乡某所之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173365_comment'></div>前葬，礼宾称夫人之行与其世序封号之详，托铭于南丰曾巩，为述而铭之曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1173365'>约乎己，厚乎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173365_comment'></div>发其积，在子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173365_comment'></div>韡兮翟，列封君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173365_comment'></div>硈兮石，瑑铭文。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1173365_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩撰《故高邮主簿朱君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173371' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173371' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173371?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故高邮主簿朱君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173371")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173371_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173371'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173371'>君讳某，字齐卿，姓朱氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173371_comment'></div>其先家于彭城，五代之乱，徙于淮南，今为淮南人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173371_comment'></div>曾祖某不仕，祖某赠刑部尚书，父某赠殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173371_comment'></div>君尝试为秘书省校书郎、苏州之长洲尉、高邮军之高邮主簿以卒，卒时乾兴元年六月十九日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173371_comment'></div>后卒之若干年，其子象之、东之、升之、延之奉君之丧，葬天长县之秦兰里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173371_comment'></div>于是时，象之某官，东之某官，以材名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173371_comment'></div>馀皆为士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173371_comment'></div>某官以书命巩曰：「子其为我铭之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173371_comment'></div>而以状言公之为人，有智计，喜施与，少从师学问，已而舍学业其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173371_comment'></div>家之食口数百，仰于君，君能资之，皆出乎衣食，嫁娶皆有馀法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173371_comment'></div>殿中之弟、工部侍郎巽，初举进士，数困，欲不复往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173371_comment'></div>君劝之曰：「第行无以废为念」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173371_comment'></div>故侍郎得曲就其志，至为达官，大其家，后卒官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173371_comment'></div>君既居官，以材称，其为身务于廉，临狱讼务为恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173371_comment'></div>母某氏，旌德县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173371_comment'></div>娶耿氏，又娶贾氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173371_comment'></div>女归太常博士吴祥，柳州马平知县陈许，池州推官李枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173371_comment'></div>其季归于曾氏，某之先君博士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173371_comment'></div>舅氏实命巩铭，其敢辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173371_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1173371'>推心于家，其爱已孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173371_comment'></div>用力于官，盖以其馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173371_comment'></div>得官于晚，寿五十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173371_comment'></div>故不太显，以极其志。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1173371_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩撰《故太常博士吴君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173373' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173373' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173373?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故太常博士吴君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173373")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173373_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173373'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173373'>君讳祥，字某，姓吴氏，事宋为太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173373_comment'></div>年六十二，某年某月某日以官卒于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173373_comment'></div>卒之若干日，葬真州扬子县之某乡某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173373_comment'></div>初，君从进士试，屡不中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173373_comment'></div>年四十馀始中第，为吉州军事推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173373_comment'></div>归，以选为开封府开封县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173373_comment'></div>大臣称其材，遂为秘书省著作佐郎，知考城县，又知河中府之龙门县，再迁为博士，知蕲州之蕲水县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173373_comment'></div>父丧除，朝京师，疾作，遂求归真州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173373_comment'></div>真州，君家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173373_comment'></div>初，君之屡斥于进士也，既自力学问，充其业，又帅其弟，务刻苦，养其亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173373_comment'></div>入其门内，尊安其卑，卑慕其尊，一时皆称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173373_comment'></div>及从事于吉州，弟已死，君夫妇痛自节衣食，遂能嫁其孤女若干人，皆不失所时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173373_comment'></div>其在开封，衣食常不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173373", 1173373, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>自足</span>，而亲戚故旧之至京师者，多以君为归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173373_comment'></div>其丧父也，以家之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173373", 1173373, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>有无</span>葬，故葬不缓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173373_comment'></div>亲戚或忧其贫，欲出钱为基址，谓君一强出，可以取其赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173373_comment'></div>君叹曰：「吾不敏，既位于朝，贫我素也，丧乃欲为利乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173373_comment'></div>平居恂恂，不与犯者校，及其自守，人亦不能移也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173373_comment'></div>官归，常僦屋以居，既卒，几不能葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173373_comment'></div>曾大父某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173373_comment'></div>大父某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173373_comment'></div>父某，以君之恩为大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173373_comment'></div>妣某氏，某县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173373_comment'></div>太君之丧，君致其哀有过人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173373_comment'></div>妻朱氏，某县君，余姨也，有助于君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173373_comment'></div>子曰某，女嫁亳州观察推官张天经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173373_comment'></div>既葬，某为碣于墓，而与天经来乞铭于巩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173373_comment'></div>天经以材名，人皆曰其尚能存君之家者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173373_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1173373'>维吾先君，太王之嫡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173373_comment'></div>禅圣图民，于东窜迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173373_comment'></div>其后孔蕃，以国为氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173373_comment'></div>君绍厥宗，其德则类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173373_comment'></div>俭著于家，勤著于身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173373_comment'></div>不苟其赢，卒死于贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173373_comment'></div>维时之人，命士大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173373_comment'></div>缟冠素盖，争利于涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173373_comment'></div>曾不君慕，顾或笑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173373_comment'></div>非彼可议，维世足欷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173373_comment'></div>较于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1173373", 1173373, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>铭章</span>，君有则多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173373_comment'></div>以遗其孥，非厚如何。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1173373_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《赏南枝》<div id='poem_220532' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220532' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220532?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赏南枝</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220532")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220532_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220532'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220532'>暮冬天地闭，正柔木冻折，瑞雪飘飞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220532'>对景见南山，岭梅露、几点清雅容姿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220532'>丹染萼、玉缀枝。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220532'>又岂是、一阳有私。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220532'>大抵是、化工独许，使占却先时。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220532'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_220532", 220532, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>霜威</span>莫苦凌持。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220532'>此花根性，想群卉争知。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220532'>贵用在和羹，三春里、不管绿是红非。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220532'>攀赏处、宜酒卮。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220532'>醉捻嗅、幽香更奇。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220532'>倚阑干、仗何人去，嘱羌管休吹。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_220532_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　曾巩作《洞庭春色》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　曾巩作《与杜相公书》<div id='poem_1173049' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173049' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173049?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与杜相公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173049")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173049_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173049'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173049'>巩启：巩多难而贫且贱，学与众违，而言行少合于世，公卿大臣之门，无可藉以进，而亦不敢辄有意于求闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173049_comment'></div>阁下致位于天子而归，始独得望舄履于门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173049_comment'></div>阁下以旧相之重，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173049", 1173049, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>元老</span>之尊，而猥自抑损，加礼于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173049", 1173049, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>草茅</span>之中，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173049", 1173049, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>孤茕</span>之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173049_comment'></div>然去门下以来，九岁于此，初不敢为书以进，比至近岁，岁不过得以一书之问荐于左右，以伺侍御者之作止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173049_comment'></div>又辄拜教之辱，是以滋不敢有意以干省察，以烦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173049", 1173049, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>贶施</span>，而自以得不韪之诛，顾未尝一日而忘拜赐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173049_comment'></div>伏以阁下朴厚清明谠直之行，乐善好义远大之心，施于朝廷而博见于天下，锐于强力而不懈于耄期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173049_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173049", 1173049, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>当今</span>内自京师，外至<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173049", 1173049, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>岩野</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173049", 1173049, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>宿师</span>硕士，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173049", 1173049, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>杰立</span>相望，必将惫精疲思，写之册书，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173049", 1173049, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>磊磊明明</span>，宣布万世，固非浅陋小生所能道说而有益毫发也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173049_comment'></div>巩年齿益长，血气益衰，疾病人事，不得以休，然用心于载籍之文，以求古人之绪言馀旨，以自乐于环堵之内，而不乱于贫贱之中，虽不足希盛德之万一，亦庶几不负其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173049_comment'></div>非自以谓能也，怀区区之心于数千里，因尺书之好，而惟所以报大君子之谊，不知所以裁，而恐欲知其趋，故辄及之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173049_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173049", 1173049, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>春暄</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173049", 1173049, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>不审</span>尊用如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173049_comment'></div>伏惟以时善保尊重，不胜鄙劣之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173049_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173049_comment'></div>巩再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1173049_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　曾巩作《为治论》<div id='poem_1173186' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173186' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173186?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为治论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173186")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173186_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173186'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173186'>夫修先王之法度，而先之以笃好力行之义以成其化，则其体虽大，四海九州虽广，其治不难至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173186_comment'></div>不先之以笃好力行之义，则虽有良法不能行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173186_comment'></div>不守之以法度之具，则虽有笃好之能，至与两者之皆废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173186_comment'></div>则其体虽小，其去人虽近，有不能集于治者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173186_comment'></div>或谓：先王之法度去今千有馀岁，不可行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173186_comment'></div>夫修先王之法度，非必服古衣冠，乘车出入，席地而坐，用俎豆之器、俪皮之聘，然后为治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173186_comment'></div>复农于田，复士于学，复官于职，复兵于耕，复佛老于无，以正民之业，制礼节用以养民之财，修仁义之施以教民之俗，先王之法度，大者不过乎此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173186_comment'></div>而因今之器，顺今之变以行之，归之乎不失其所为之本，不务其末而已，时之相去虽万岁可行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173186_comment'></div>楚汉陈隋之际，天下争于战攻，人之在者少矣，耕之废孰有甚于此时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173186_comment'></div>而文帝、太宗能养之以少求广爱之思，诱之以自然之势，则数岁之间，耕者有馀食，然则农非不可复于田也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173186_comment'></div>秦既焚书册，绌礼义，绝天下之学，未有酷于此时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173186_comment'></div>而汉武以来立学校，专之以经，励之以行，其制未可谓备也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173186_comment'></div>其中间又或存或熄，然而士皆蒸薰渐渍，至于东汉之日，怀道德、救衰微之君子皆由大学而出，然则士非不可以复于学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173186_comment'></div>秦、隋之亡，在位者皆不称其任，人才之不见，未有甚于此时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173186_comment'></div>及汉、唐受命，高祖、太宗设百职之员，充其选者皆向时之士，非借才于异世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173186_comment'></div>用变业而示之，则人人自奋，争出其才，求将相则得将相，求百执事则得百执事之才，欲除敝则敝革，欲修政则政举，无求而不得，无为而不成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173186_comment'></div>由是观之，顾所以厉之而所以用之如何耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173186_comment'></div>汉武之末，纲纪大坏矣，官之耗乱未有甚于此时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173186_comment'></div>及宣帝总核名实，信赏必罚，而公卿百官皆称其职，然则官非不可复其职而使也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173186_comment'></div>隋唐之际，无井田之法千有馀岁，兵之易农未有久于此时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173186_comment'></div>天宝之后，将立于军二百馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173186_comment'></div>而至周，天子又军中之所立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173186_comment'></div>天下之势劫于兵之骄，患于兵之不可用，未有极于此时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173186_comment'></div>而太宗能开府设卫，则兵归于田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173186_comment'></div>世宗能诛其奔军之将，则行师四方无不如其意者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173186_comment'></div>然则兵非不可复于耕而使也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173186_comment'></div>武宗之时，佛入中国千年，人之相化，家酣而户溺矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173186_comment'></div>然而一朝去之，受冠带而为民者几五十万，曾无一人之阻，然则佛、老非不可复于无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173186_comment'></div>魏、唐之际，毛玠、杨绾之势耳，然而变千岁之奢，不旋日而效，然则何患乎制礼节用之不可行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173186_comment'></div>秦、隋之后，灭廉耻，捍文网，未有如此之熟烂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173186_comment'></div>然而文帝、太宗一日变之，则人人自厚，大臣至耻言人过，百姓至不烦于刑，然则何患乎仁义之不可施、俗之不可变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173186_comment'></div>凡吾之欲行者，此各引一端，崇其所善，择之而未精，为之而未详，然而亦各随其小大深浅而如其计，见其效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173186_comment'></div>茍有大有为之心，则知明先王之法度而用之，先之以笃好力行之义以成其化，其说非迂，其道易行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173186_comment'></div>昔秦设首功之科，驱人于敌场，非伤即死，然而士皆靡然乐斗而喜战，此岂徒畏法哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173186_comment'></div>以秦之笃好力行之以移其俗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173186_comment'></div>今为治不改其业，不违其欲，所行者常礼，所为者常道，谨其节文而尊其行，养之以学校，而率之以身行，示之以所好恻怛恳诚之心，其亦孰有不从而劝者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173186_comment'></div>且民之生不见先王之法度，不闻其教而日习于今之俗，故不能无恶也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173186_comment'></div>使皆粲然日见恭俭之节、仁义之施，晓然皆知其行之易成，其物之易足，上之所好之在此也，则亦何为而不率乎古之人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173186_comment'></div>得其时、推此道以行于天下者，唐、虞、禹、汤、文、武之君，皋、夔、益、稷、伊尹、太公、周公之臣是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173186_comment'></div>不得其时，守此道以俟后世者，孔孟是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173186_comment'></div>其法已行，其效已见，告后之人使取而则之者，六经是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173186_comment'></div>然而士之欲有为者，言之欲切而反疏，行之欲通而反泥，遂若不可以为者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173186_comment'></div>昔周之衰，诸子之徒散之诸侯，管、晏、孙、吴、申、商之徒是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173186_comment'></div>诸侯用之，或伯或彊，仪、秦之说至倾覆也，亦安中国者各十馀年，彼岂不效见于一时哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173186_comment'></div>然而孔子恶其小，曾子耻其卑，至于孟子，尤独患之，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173186_comment'></div>盖以其非尽爱人之意，非极于治人之体，非醇于教人之法，非备于防人之具，为之以亟而见于事者陋，驱之以势而强于民者薄，偷合于诸侯而用，焉可也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173186_comment'></div>本之以先王之法度，推之以化导之方，则彼恶足以论乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173186_comment'></div>今其为失固已明矣，非必过人之智而后知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173186_comment'></div>天下之士固尽学于孔子矣，而欲有为者复不能自信，此亦千岁以来学者之患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173186_comment'></div>何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173186_comment'></div>世之学孔子者，读书求治乱之际，未尝不知其治由先王之道，其乱由后世之失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173186_comment'></div>欲有为于当世，莫若推其所学于孔子，而知者力行之，就其所以为治乱之故，其于公事最切，而于计最通也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173186_comment'></div>而先王之道，有非俗之所能就；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173186_comment'></div>后世之失，有非俗之所能去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173186_comment'></div>方其势牵于上下也，不能去之而不茍，一则仆仆焉而求进其说，一则乐其与之合而自小也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173186_comment'></div>于是则宁贬道而随其失，不从先王而从近世，至不胜其弊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1173186_comment'></div>欲治人之所为者反病之，欲正人而自我者反违之，其为之以亟，其驱之以薄，举其一，遗其二，急其末，忘其本，一切不异于诸子之为，又从而为说，曰近俗而易行者，尚无可奈何，安能以迂远之道为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1173186_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1173186_comment'></div>何其惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1173186_comment'></div>夫所为者得，固可以救其失，所行者大，固可以兼其小，未有所为者失而其效反得，所行者小而其至反大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1173186_comment'></div>此所谓言之欲切而反疏，行之欲通而反泥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1173186_comment'></div>为此者有原：讲之而不明，守之而不固，汲汲乎欲有为者，固不可以为者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1173186_comment'></div>使其得君矣，则先王之法度，其说非高，其具甚易，何顾而为彼乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1173186_comment'></div>孔子于周之末世，守二帝三王之道而不茍，孟子亦于其后守孔子之道而不茍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1173186_comment'></div>二子者，非不欲有为也，知不本先王之法度则不可以行，不得可为之势则不可以行，不得可为之势则不可以强通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1173186_comment'></div>故曰「用之则行，舍之则藏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1173186_comment'></div>又曰「可以进则进，可以止则止」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1173186_comment'></div>守之以终身，传之以待后之学者，此二子之见所以异于众也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1173186_comment'></div>故闾巷之匠，规矩指画不可以非，不可以茍作而妄从，虽不用于世，其法度犹存，其为技犹良者，天下之知为匠者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1173186_comment'></div>规矩指画既非矣，茍作而妄从矣，虽用于世，其法度已亡，其为技已卑者，天下之贱工也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1173186_comment'></div>天下之士亦若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1173186_comment'></div>自守而不茍者，天下之知为治者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1173186_comment'></div>乐其与之合而自小者，天下之贱士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1173186_comment'></div>天下之知为治者，有不用则非在乎人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1173186_comment'></div>天下之贱士有用有不用，非常在乎己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1173186_comment'></div>士之欲学圣人之道而仕者，得吾言而考之，其庶矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_75_1173186_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　曾巩作《书魏郑公传》<div id='poem_1173183' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173183' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173183?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书魏郑公传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173183")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173183_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173183'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173183'>余观太宗常屈己以从群臣之议，而魏郑公之徒，喜遭其时，感知己之遇，事之大小，无不谏诤，虽其忠诚所自至，亦得君以然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173183_comment'></div>则思唐之所以治，太宗之所以称贤主，而前世之君不及者，其渊源皆出于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173183_comment'></div>能知其有此者，以其书存也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173183_comment'></div>及观郑公以谏诤事付史官，而太宗怒之，薄其恩礼，失终始之义，则未尝不反覆嗟惜，恨其不思，而益知郑公之贤焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173183_comment'></div>夫君之使臣与臣之事君者何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173183_comment'></div>大公至正之道而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173183_comment'></div>大公至正之道，非灭人言以掩己过，取<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173183", 1173183, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>小亮</span>以私其君，此其不可者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173183_comment'></div>又有甚不可者，夫以谏诤为当掩，是以谏诤为非美也，则后世谁复当谏诤乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173183_comment'></div>况前代之君有纳谏之美，而后世不见，则非惟失一时之公，又将使后世之君，谓前代无谏诤之事，是启其怠且忌矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173183_comment'></div>太宗末年，群下既知此意而不言，渐不知天下之得夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173183_comment'></div>至于辽东之败，而始恨郑公不在世，未尝知其悔之萌芽出于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173183_comment'></div>夫伊尹、周公何如人也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173183_comment'></div>伊尹、周公之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173183", 1173183, "Clauses/44/Comments/1")'>谏切</span>其君者，其言至深，而其事至迫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173183_comment'></div>存之于书，未尝掩焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173183_comment'></div>至今称太甲、成王为贤君，而伊尹、周公为良相者，以其书可见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173183_comment'></div>令当时削而弃之，成区区之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173183", 1173183, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>小让</span>，则后世何所据依而谏，又何以知其贤且良与？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173183_comment'></div>桀、纣、幽、厉、始皇之亡，则其臣之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173183", 1173183, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>谏词</span>无见焉，非其史之遗，乃天下不敢言而然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173183_comment'></div>则谏诤之无传，乃此数君之所以益暴其恶于后世而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173183_comment'></div>或曰：《春秋》之法，为尊亲贤者讳，与此其戾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173183_comment'></div>夫《春秋》之所讳者，恶也，纳谏诤岂恶乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173183_comment'></div>然则焚稿者非欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173183_comment'></div>曰：焚稿者谁欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173183_comment'></div>非伊尹、周公为之也，近世取区区之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173183", 1173183, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>小亮</span>者为之耳，其事又未是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173183_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173183_comment'></div>以焚其稿为掩君之过，而使后世传之，则是使后世不见稿之是非，而必其过常在于君，美常在于己也，岂爱其君之谓欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173183_comment'></div>孔光之去其稿之所言，其在正邪，未可知也，其焚之而惑后世，庸讵知非谋己之奸计乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173183_comment'></div>或曰：「造辟而言，诡辞而出，异乎此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173183_comment'></div>曰：此非圣人之所曾言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173183_comment'></div>令万一有是理，亦谓君臣之间，议论之际，不欲漏其言于一时之人耳，岂杜其告万世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173183_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173183_comment'></div>以诚信持己而事其君，而不欺乎万世者，郑公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173183_comment'></div>益知其贤云，岂非然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173183_comment'></div>岂非然哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1173183_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　曾巩撰《殿中丞监扬州税徐君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173345' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173345' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173345?labeling=true' target='_blank'>殿中丞监扬州税徐君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173345")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173345_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173345'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173345'>唐之亡，强者分其地，为国以十数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173345_comment'></div>杨行密有淮南，称吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173345_comment'></div>海州人徐温为吴将，有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173345_comment'></div>行密死，三子相次立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173345_comment'></div>温用事贵显，温死，其养子知诰遂代杨氏，尽有江淮之地，称唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173345_comment'></div>去温所与为姓名者，姓李氏名昪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173345_comment'></div>温己子知谏，事昪为将，死，昪追以为中书令、临淄王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173345_comment'></div>知谏子逊，事昪子璟，为中书侍郎，上饶郡公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173345_comment'></div>逊子徐君，事璟子煜，为其秘书郎，赐绯鱼袋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173345_comment'></div>宋既受命平天下，俘李氏以归，徐君亦随之京师，得为太常寺太祝，不乐，弃官归江南，久之为殿中丞、监扬州税以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173345_comment'></div>子天锡为秘书丞，亦死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173345_comment'></div>女四人，其第二女与季皆嫁吕氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173345_comment'></div>徐君死祥符间，后四十馀年，嫁吕氏女有子倚，始葬徐君与徐君之母李氏、妻陆氏于扬州之某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173345_comment'></div>方徐氏之先，与杨氏俱起东南，收其土地而有之，遭行密子弱，徐氏实任其国，至昪遂代吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173345_comment'></div>而徐氏子孙，亦皆据士民之上，有王公之势，于其一时富贵之际，岂非盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173345_comment'></div>百年之后，其世凌迟，至于徐君，遂死而无以葬，葬于异姓之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173345_comment'></div>盛衰之变，何其速也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173345_comment'></div>然自前世无不皆若此，富贵之不可以久恃，亦何必异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173345_comment'></div>而世之不安其命者，方枉义挈挈以觊幸其偶得之者，又惴惴恐失之，是真可以常处也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173345_comment'></div>初，东南之地既入于有司，天子怜士民，许皆复田其故所有地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173345_comment'></div>徐君之地为尤多，多不取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173345_comment'></div>有冒徐君之地以卖之者，亦不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173345_comment'></div>是以其贫甚，而徐君独自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173345_comment'></div>徐君讳元榆，字仙材，好学，善属文，吏部贾黄中尝试其书判曰：「元、白不足多也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173345_comment'></div>尤能诗，诗数百篇，号《南归集》，大抵多慨其不得志，徐君之所以自见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173345_comment'></div>嫁吕氏女之夫名某，怜徐君之死无以葬，死以属其子倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173345_comment'></div>倚贫甚，能自力，卒葬徐君而就其父志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173345_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1173345'>富吾不争，可谓既好之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173345_comment'></div>贫吾不怼，可谓又安之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173345_comment'></div>谐归此丘，女子之为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173345_comment'></div>永昭厥声，维此铭诗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1173345_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　曾巩作《唐论》<div id='poem_1173185' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173185' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173185?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173185")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173185_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173185'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173185'>成康殁而民生不见先王之治，日入于乱，以至于秦，尽除前圣数千载之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173185_comment'></div>天下既攻秦而亡之，以归于汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173185_comment'></div>汉之为汉，更二十四君，东西再有天下，垂四百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173185_comment'></div>然大抵多用秦法，其改更秦事，亦多附己意，非放先王之法而有天下之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173185_comment'></div>有天下之志者，文帝而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173185_comment'></div>然而天下之材不足，故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173185", 1173185, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>仁闻</span>虽美矣，而当世之法度，亦不能放于三代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173185_comment'></div>汉之亡，而强者遂分天下之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173185_comment'></div>晋与隋虽能合天下于一，然而合之未久而已亡，其为不足议也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173185_comment'></div>代隋者唐，更十八君，垂三百年，其治莫盛于太宗之为君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173185_comment'></div>诎己从谏，仁心爱人，可谓有天下之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173185_comment'></div>以租庸任民，以府卫任兵，以职事任官，以材能任职，以兴义任俗，以尊本任众，赋役有定制，兵农有定业，官无虚名，职无废事，人习于善行，离于末作，使之操于上者要而不烦，取于下者寡而易供，民有农之实，而兵之备存，有兵之名，而农之利在，事之分有归，而禄之出不浮，材之品不遗，而治之体相承，其廉耻日以笃，其田野日以辟，以其法修则安且治，废则危且乱，可谓有天下之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173185_comment'></div>行之数岁，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173185", 1173185, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>粟米</span>之贱，斗至数钱，居者有馀蓄，行者有馀资，人人自厚，几致刑措，可谓有治天下之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173185_comment'></div>夫有天下之志，有天下之材，又有治天下之效，然而不得与先王并者，法度之行，拟之先王未备也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173185_comment'></div>礼乐之具，田畴之制，庠序之教，拟之先王未备也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173185_comment'></div>躬亲行阵之间，战必胜，攻必克，天下莫不以为武，而非先王之所尚也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173185_comment'></div>四夷万里，古所未及以政者，莫不服从，天下莫不以为盛，而非先王之所务也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173185_comment'></div>太宗之为政于天下者，得失如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173185_comment'></div>由唐虞之治五百馀年而有汤之治，由汤之治五百馀年而有文武之治，由文武之治千有馀年而始有太宗之为君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173185_comment'></div>有天下之志，有天下之材，又有治天下之效，然而又以其未备也，不得与先王并而称极治之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173185_comment'></div>是则人生于文武之前者，率五百馀年而一遇治世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173185_comment'></div>生于文武之后者，千有馀年而未遇极治之世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173185_comment'></div>非独民之生于是时者之不幸也，士之生于文武之前者，如舜禹之于唐，八元八凯之于舜，伊尹之于汤，太公之于文武，率五百馀年而一遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173185_comment'></div>生于文武之后千有馀年，虽孔子之圣、孟轲之贤而不遇，虽太宗之为君而未可以必得志于其时也，是亦士民之生于是时者之不幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173185_comment'></div>故述其是非得失之迹，非独为人君者可以考焉，士之有志于道而欲仕于上者可以鉴矣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1173185'></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1173185_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173185'><span class='label'>按：</span>唐代二十帝，此处云「十八君」，疑讹。<br /><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_1173185_0'>⑴ 《元丰类稿》卷九。又见《曾文定公集》卷四，《曾子固集》卷一一，《南丰曾先生文粹》卷一，《圣宋文选》卷一三，《皇朝文鉴》卷九七，《古文关键》卷二，《东莱集注类编观澜文》乙集卷九，《少微通鉴节要》卷三八，《经济类编》卷六，《荆川稗编》卷八七，《名世文宗》卷二二，《古今图书集成》皇极典卷一六五、经籍典卷三八六。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1173185_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　曾巩撰《永州军事推官孙君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173346' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173346' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173346?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永州军事推官孙君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173346")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173346_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173346'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173346'>黟县之孙氏有起进士、为尚书工部郎中、广南西路转运使以卒者，讳抗，以文学见于世，其葬在黟之上林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173346_comment'></div>有子亦起进士，为永州推官以卒，卒时年二十有八者，讳适，亦以文学见称，葬在其父之左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173346_comment'></div>将葬，其弟邈以告，而乞铭于南丰曾巩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173346_comment'></div>其序曰：孙氏世家富春，唐有徙歙之黟县者，讳师睦，始自别为黟县之孙氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173346_comment'></div>师睦生延绪，延绪生旦，旦生遂良，以子恩为尚书职方员外郎，职方生工部，工部实生君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173346_comment'></div>君年十有四，辞亲学问江东，已有闻于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173346_comment'></div>往从临川王安石<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173346", 1173346, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>受学</span>，安石称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173346_comment'></div>后主越州上虞簿，去，以父恩得永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173346_comment'></div>父卒，万里致丧，疾不忍废事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173346_comment'></div>既葬，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173346", 1173346, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>携扶</span>幼老，将就食淮南，疾益革，遂卒于池州大安镇，实至和二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173346_comment'></div>始，工部为御史，不合而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173346_comment'></div>及使南方，仆且起，遽卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173346_comment'></div>君尤自力学行，谓蕴必发，其在君，又止此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173346_comment'></div>君于学问，好其治乱得失之说，不狃近卑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173346_comment'></div>于为文，以古为归，不夸以浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173346_comment'></div>虽素羸不废书，虽进不怠以止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173346_comment'></div>既肆而通矣，而不得极其至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173346_comment'></div>其铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1173346'>孙世来黟，拔身艰故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173346_comment'></div>为世闻家，始自工部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173346_comment'></div>工部孰有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173346_comment'></div>有书百篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173346_comment'></div>永州之学，自其父传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173346_comment'></div>其果以力，其敏以明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173346_comment'></div>内有其质，外以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173346", 1173346, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>华英</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173346_comment'></div>再以不就，其后当侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173346_comment'></div>君不有子，君多兄弟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1173346_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='0972d9ee55f34748911897695f786083_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("0972d9ee55f34748911897695f786083");'><span id='0972d9ee55f34748911897695f786083_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=-100000&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>，38岁</div><div id='0972d9ee55f34748911897695f786083' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　曾巩居南丰，作《抚州颜鲁公祠堂记》<div id='poem_1173292' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173292' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173292?labeling=true' target='_blank'>抚州颜鲁公祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和三年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173292")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173292_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173292'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173292'>赠司徒鲁郡颜公，讳真卿，事唐为太子太师，与其从父兄杲卿，皆有大节以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173292_comment'></div>至今虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>小夫</span>妇人，皆知公之为烈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173292_comment'></div>初，公以忤杨国忠斥为平原太守，策安禄山必反，为之备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173292_comment'></div>禄山既举兵，公与常山太守杲卿伐其后，贼之不能直窥潼关，以公与杲卿挠其势也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173292_comment'></div>在肃宗时，数正言，宰相不悦，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>斥去</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173292_comment'></div>又为御史唐旻所构，连辄斥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173292_comment'></div>李辅国迁太上皇居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>西宫</span>，公首率百官<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>请问</span>起居，又辄斥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173292_comment'></div>代宗时，与元载<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>争论</span>是非，载欲有所壅蔽，公极论之，又辄斥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173292_comment'></div>杨炎、卢杞既相德宗，益恶公所为，连斥之，犹不满意，李希烈陷汝州，杞即以公使希烈，希烈初惭其言，后卒缢公以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173292_comment'></div>是时公年七十有七矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173292_comment'></div>天宝之际，久不见兵，禄山既反，天下莫不震动，公独以区区平原，遂折其锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173292_comment'></div>四方闻之，争奋而起，唐卒以振者，公为之倡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173292_comment'></div>当公之开土门，同日归公者十七郡，得兵二十馀万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173292_comment'></div>繇此观之，茍顺且诚，天下从之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173292_comment'></div>自此至公殁，垂三十年，小人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>继续</span>任政，天下日入于弊，大盗继起，天子辄出避之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173292_comment'></div>唐之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>在朝</span>臣，多畏怯观望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173292_comment'></div>能居其间，一忤于世，失所而不自悔者寡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173292_comment'></div>至于再三忤于世，失所而不自悔者，盖未有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173292_comment'></div>若至于起且仆，以至于七八，遂死而不自悔者，则天下一人而已，若公是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173292_comment'></div>公之学问文章，往往杂于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>神仙浮屠</span>之说，不皆合于理，及其奋然自立，能至于此者，盖天性然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173292_comment'></div>故公之能处其死，不足以观公之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173292_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>何则</span>？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173292_comment'></div>及至于势穷，义有不得不死，虽中人可勉焉，况公之自信也与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173292_comment'></div>维历忤大奸，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>颠跌</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/87/Comments/1")'>撼顿</span>，至于七八，而终始不以死生祸福为秋毫顾虑，非笃于道者不能如此，此足以观公之大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173292_comment'></div>夫世之治乱不同，而士之去就亦异，若伯夷之清，伊尹之任，孔子之时，彼各有义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173292_comment'></div>夫既自比于古之任者矣，乃欲眷顾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>回隐</span>，以市于世，其可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173292_comment'></div>故孔子恶鄙夫不可以事君，而多杀身以成仁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173292_comment'></div>若公，非孔子所谓仁者与？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173292_comment'></div>今天子至和三年，尚书都官郎中、知抚州聂君厚载，尚书屯田员外郎、通判抚州林君慥，相与慕公之烈，以公之尝为此邦也，遂为堂而祠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173292_comment'></div>既成，二君过予之家而告之曰：「愿有述」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173292_comment'></div>夫公之赫赫不可盖者，固不系于祠之有无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173292_comment'></div>盖人之向往之不足者，非祠则无以致其至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173292_comment'></div>闻其烈足以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>感人</span>，况拜其祠而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>亲炙</span>之者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173292_comment'></div>今州县之政，非法令所及者，世不复议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173292_comment'></div>二君独能追公之节，尊而祠之，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1173292", 1173292, "Clauses/126/Comments/0")'>风示</span>当世，为法令之所不及，是可谓有志者也。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1173292'></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1173292_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　曾巩居南丰，作《谢章学士书》<div id='poem_1173057' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173057' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173057?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢章学士书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173057")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173057_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173057'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173057'>巩启：巩不佞，以身得察于下执事，明公过恩，召而见之，所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>矜嗟</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/5/Comments/2")'>奖宠</span>、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/5/Comments/3")'>开慰</span>拊循之者甚备，虽至亲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>笃友</span>之爱，不隆于此已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173057_comment'></div>又收其弟兄之不肖，不谋宾客，任而举之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173057_comment'></div>明公之所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>畜幸</span>巩者，可谓厚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173057_comment'></div>巩窃自惟，求所以堪明公之意者，未知所出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173057_comment'></div>巩愚无知，不适于世用，不能收身于世俗之外，力耕于大山长谷之中，以共饘粥之养，鱼菽之祭，以其馀日考先王之遗文，窃六艺之微旨，以求其志意之所存，而足其自乐于己者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173057_comment'></div>顾反去士君子之林，而夷于皂隶之间，舍自肆之安，而践乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>迫制</span>之地，欲比于古之为贫而仕者，可谓妄矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173057_comment'></div>固有志者之所叹嗟，天下之所贱，而至亲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>笃友</span>之所弃而违之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173057_comment'></div>复安敢自通于大人之门，望知于侍御者之侧乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173057_comment'></div>明公怀使者之印，为福于东南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173057_comment'></div>以地计其广狭，则数十百城之人，待明公之畜养；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173057_comment'></div>以材计其多寡，则文武之士以百千数，待明公之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>推察</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173057_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>收拊</span>之，任而举之者，乃独在于巩与巩之少弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173057_comment'></div>此巩之所以自惟，求堪明公之意者，而未知所出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173057_comment'></div>抑巩闻之，广听博观，不遗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>污贱</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/53/Comments/1")'>厄辱</span>之士者，此所以无弃士也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173057_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>兼收并采</span>，不遗偏材一曲之人者，此所以无弃材也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173057_comment'></div>故明公之意傥在于此，而古之士出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>污贱</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>厄辱</span>之中，能成功名以报知己者，亦不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173057_comment'></div>彼皆豪杰之人，故有以自致也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173057_comment'></div>若巩之鄙，则安敢望此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173057_comment'></div>故忧不能堪明公之意，误左右之知者，此巩之所大惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173057_comment'></div>竭固陋之分，庶几不愧于偏材一曲之人者，此巩之所可至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173057_comment'></div>敢献其情而以为进谢之资，惟明公之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173057", 1173057, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>垂察</span>焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1173057_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　曾巩居南丰，作《杂识二首》<div id='poem_1173312' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173312' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173312?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杂识<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173312")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173312_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173312'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173312'>孙之翰言：庆历中，上用杜衍、范仲淹、富弼、韩琦任政事，而以欧阳修、蔡襄及甫等为谏官，欲更张庶事，致太平之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173312_comment'></div>仲淹等亦皆戮力自效，欲报人主之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173312_comment'></div>然心好同恶异，不能旷然，心无适莫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173312_comment'></div>甫尝家居，石介过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173312_comment'></div>问介适何许来，介言方过富公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173312_comment'></div>问富公何为，介曰：「富公以滕宗谅守庆州，用公使钱，坐法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173312_comment'></div>杜公必欲致宗谅重法，曰：『不然，则衍不能在此』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173312_comment'></div>范公则欲薄其罪，曰：『不然，则仲淹请去』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173312_comment'></div>富公欲抵宗谅重法，则恐违范公；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173312_comment'></div>欲薄其罪，则惧违杜公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173312_comment'></div>患是不知所决」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173312_comment'></div>甫曰：「守道以谓如何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173312_comment'></div>介曰：「介亦窃患之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173312_comment'></div>甫乃叹曰：「法者，人主之操柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173312_comment'></div>今富公患重罪宗谅，则违范公；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173312_comment'></div>薄其罪，则违杜公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173312_comment'></div>是不知有法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173312_comment'></div>守道平生好议论，自谓正直，亦安得此言乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173312_comment'></div>因曰：「甫少而好学，自度必难用于世，是以退，为《唐史记》以自见，而属为诸公牵挽，使备谏官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173312_comment'></div>亦尝与人自谋去就，而所与谋者适好进之人，遂见误在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173312_comment'></div>今诸公之言如是，甫复何望哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173312_comment'></div>自此凡月馀不能寐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173312_comment'></div>庆历之间任时事者，其后余多识之，不党而知其过如之翰者，则一人而已矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1173312_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173313' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173313' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173313?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173313_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173313'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173313'>广原州蛮侬智高以其众叛，乘南方无备，连邕、宾等七州，至广州，所至杀吏民，纵略，东南大骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173313_comment'></div>朝廷遣骁将张忠、蒋偕驰驿讨捕，至州，皆为智高所摧陷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173313_comment'></div>又遣杨畋、孙沔、余靖招抚，皆久之无功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173313_comment'></div>仁宗忧之，遂遣枢密副使狄青为宣抚使，率众击之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173313_comment'></div>翰林学士曾公亮问青所以为方略者，青初不肯言，公亮固问之，青乃曰：「比者军制不立，又自广川之败，赏罚不明，今当立军制、明赏罚而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173313_comment'></div>然恐闻青来，以谓所遣者官重，势必不得见之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173313_comment'></div>公亮又问：「贼之标牌殆不可当，如何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173313_comment'></div>青曰：「此易耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173313_comment'></div>标牌，步兵也，当骑兵则不能施矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173313_comment'></div>初，张忠、蒋偕之往，率皆自京师，六、七日驰至广州，未尝拊士卒，立行伍，一旦见贼，则疾驱使战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173313_comment'></div>又偕等所居，不知为营卫，故士卒见敌，皆望风退走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173313_comment'></div>而忠临偕居，方卧帐中，为贼所虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173313_comment'></div>杨畋、余靖又所为纷乱，不能自振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173313_comment'></div>而孙沔大受请托，所与行者，乃朱从道、郑纾、欧阳乾曜之徒，皆险薄无赖，欲有所避免，要求沔引之自从，远近莫不嗟异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173313_comment'></div>既至潭州，沔遂称疾，观望不敢进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173313_comment'></div>青之受命，有因贵望求从青行者，青延见，谓之曰：「君欲从青行，此青之所求也，何必因人言乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173313_comment'></div>然智高小寇，至遣青行，可以知事急矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173313_comment'></div>从青之士，能击贼有功，朝廷有厚赏，青不敢不为之请也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173313_comment'></div>若往而不能击贼，则军中法重，青不敢私也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173313_comment'></div>君其思之，愿行，则即奏取君矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173313_comment'></div>非独君也，君之亲戚、交游之士，幸皆以青之此言告之，茍欲行者，皆青之所求也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173313_comment'></div>于是闻者大骇，无复敢言求从青行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173313_comment'></div>其所辟取，皆青之素所与，以为可用者，人望固已归之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173313_comment'></div>及行，率众日不过一驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173313_comment'></div>所至州，辄休士一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173313_comment'></div>至潭州，遂立行伍，明约束，军行止皆成行列，至于荷钟赢粮持守御之备，皆有区处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173313_comment'></div>军人有夺逆旅菜一把者，立斩之以徇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173313_comment'></div>于是一军肃然，无敢出声气，万馀人行，未尝闻声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173313_comment'></div>每青至邮驿，四面严兵，每门皆诸司使二人守之，无一人得妄出入，而求见青者，无不即时得通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173313_comment'></div>其野宿皆成<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1173313", 1173313, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>营栅</span>，青所居，四面陈壳弓弩皆数重，所将精锐列布左右，守卫甚严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173313_comment'></div>方青之未至，诸将屡走，皆以为常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173313_comment'></div>至是，知桂州崇仪使陈曙、知英州供备库使苏缄与贼战，复败走如当时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173313_comment'></div>青至宾州，悉召陈与裨校凡三十二人，数其罪，按军法斩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173313_comment'></div>惟苏缄在某所，使械系上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173313_comment'></div>于是军中人人奋励，有死战之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173313_comment'></div>是时智高还守邕州，青惧昆崙关险阨为所据，乃下令宾州具五日粮，休士卒，贼谍知不为备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173313_comment'></div>是夜大风雨，青率众半夜时度昆崙关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173313_comment'></div>既度，喜曰：「贼不知守此，无能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173313_comment'></div>彼谓夜半风雨时吾不敢来，吾来，所以出其不意也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173313_comment'></div>已近邕州，贼方觉，逆于归仁庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173313_comment'></div>青登高望之，贼据坡上，我军薄之，裨将孙节中流矢死，青急麾军进，人人皆殊死战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173313_comment'></div>先是，青已纵蕃落马军二千人出贼后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173313_comment'></div>至是，前后合击。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173313_comment'></div>贼之标牌军为马军所冲突，皆不能驻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173313_comment'></div>军士又从马上以铁连加击之，遂皆披靡相枕藉，遂大败，智高果焚城遁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173313_comment'></div>青先为公亮言立军制，明赏罚，贼不可得见，标牌不能当骑兵，皆如其所料。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173313_comment'></div>青坐堂户上，以论数千里之外，辞约而虑明，虽古之名将何以加此，岂特一时武人崛起者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173313_comment'></div>方庆历中，葛怀敏与李元昊战于广川，怀敏败死，而诸校与士卒既败，多窜山谷间，是时以权宜招纳，皆许不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173313_comment'></div>自此军多弃其将，不肯死战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173313_comment'></div>故青云「自广川之败，赏罚不行」云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173313_comment'></div>翰林学士蔡襄亦言闻于青者如此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1173313_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　曾巩居南丰，作《寄孙之翰》<div id='poem_220483' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220483' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220483?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄孙之翰</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220483")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220483_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220483'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220483'>孙侯腹载天下书，崔嵬岂啻重百车。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220483'>伏羲以来可悉数，孰若自作何有馀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220483'>更能议论恣倾倒，万里一泻昆崙渠。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220483'>谁为胸中斡太极，元气浩浩随卷舒。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220483'>昔来谏官对天子，何秽不欲亲芟锄。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220483'>不容乃独见磊落，出走并海飘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_220483", 220483, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>长裾</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220483'>孙侯风节何所似，雪洗八荒看太虚。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220483'>亲如国忠眼不顾，旧若张禹手所除。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220483'>归来已绝褒贬笔，进用只调敖仓储。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220483'>合持《诗》《书》《白虎论》，更护日月金华居。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220483'>万世根深固社稷，百年旧叟休田闾。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220483'>素识孤生爱茅屋，久将老母求山砠。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220483'>秋归愿事九江获，夜出未倦安丰渔。<div id='poem_sentence_12_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_220483'>孔明苟欲性命遂，孟子岂病王公疏。<div id='poem_sentence_13_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_220483'>尘埃未得见此乐，太息一付西江鱼。<div id='poem_sentence_14_220483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_220483'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_220483_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　曾巩居南丰，撰《福昌孙君傅氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173367' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173367' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173367?labeling=true' target='_blank'>福昌县君傅氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和三年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173367")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173367_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173367'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173367'>福昌县君姓傅氏，会稽人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173367_comment'></div>尚书职方员外郎霖之女，同郡尚书职方员外郎关公鲁之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173367_comment'></div>后关公五年，至和三年二月丙申卒于家，年六十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173367_comment'></div>子男八人，景棻、景元、景仁、希声、杞、景山、景宣、景良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173367_comment'></div>女一人，景华，嫁著作佐郎史叔轲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173367_comment'></div>福昌君在家，为父母所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173367", 1173367, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>器异</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173367_comment'></div>既嫁而夫属无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173367", 1173367, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>退言</span>，布衣恶食，身治细微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173367_comment'></div>故关公之禄及其疏昆弟姊妹之孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173367_comment'></div>其事关公正以从，其教子慈以肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173367_comment'></div>关公起进士，为郎，为池、台两州，年八十以归，曰：「吾少得尽力于官，而老得自休于家，不以家事累吾志者，以有夫人也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173367_comment'></div>八子学行修立，景棻、希声、杞同时皆中进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173367_comment'></div>夫人之卒，景棻为江阴尉，希声宝应尉，杞和州判官，景元亦以父恩为广德尉，皆能其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173367_comment'></div>景仁而下，皆有闻于人，实受教于夫人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173367_comment'></div>始，关公既贫而孤，其仕与婚又皆后，至其终有百口，为大家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173367_comment'></div>福昌君维厚勤薄养，所以经理其微，维可否以明，行止以公，善训能使，诚恕爱人，所以使其家有节法，以有其成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173367_comment'></div>某月甲子从葬钱塘之某原，其子来属以铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173367_comment'></div>景宣，予妹婿也，宜为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173367_comment'></div>其辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1173367'>关氏爰昔，始如萌芽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173367_comment'></div>台州奋拔，垂实敷华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173367_comment'></div>进勤退佚，不恤其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173367_comment'></div>由媲有人，作其内治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173367_comment'></div>孰致其休？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173367_comment'></div>不懈于勚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173367_comment'></div>孰致其隆？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173367_comment'></div>不简于细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173367_comment'></div>高明纯约，坦坦其夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173367_comment'></div>无怨无疵，小大化之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173367_comment'></div>有容有则，妇子顺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173367_comment'></div>公为朝老，子宦以成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173367_comment'></div>象衣华轶，我止我行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173367_comment'></div>巍冠文笏，我翼我承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173367_comment'></div>公曰微子，谁据谁依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173367_comment'></div>子曰微母，莫济登兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173367_comment'></div>云谁无母，其孰无妻，为妻为母，如我谁伉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173367_comment'></div>生虽有止，存也其长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173367_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1173367", 1173367, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>鸿鸿</span>号声，垂此铭章。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1173367_comment'></div></div></div><br />年份未详　曾巩作《应举启》<div id='poem_1173080' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173080' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173080?labeling=true' target='_blank'>应举启</a><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173080")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173080_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173080'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173080'>右巩启：伏念巩材质浅陋，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173080", 1173080, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>艺学</span>荒芜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173080_comment'></div>读圣人之经，未知大义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173080_comment'></div>明当世之务，多泥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173080", 1173080, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>旧闻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173080_comment'></div>虽坚树立之心，岂适变通之用？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173080_comment'></div>矧罹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173080", 1173080, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>祸衅</span>，屡抱忧哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173080_comment'></div>是以三遇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173080", 1173080, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>文闱</span>，一逾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173080", 1173080, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>岁纪</span>，足迹不游于场屋，姓名不署于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173080", 1173080, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>乡闾</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173080_comment'></div>仆仆东南，有衣食婚嫁之累；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173080_comment'></div>拘拘蚤夜，惟米盐薪水之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173080_comment'></div>今者侧听诏书，讲求士类，顾私恩之可念，迫生理之难周，义不自皇，势当强起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173080_comment'></div>盖以出而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173080", 1173080, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>载质</span>，无他业之可为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173080_comment'></div>仕以为贫，亦古人之所处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173080_comment'></div>遇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173080", 1173080, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>高明</span>之见照，殆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173080", 1173080, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>否结</span>之将通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173080_comment'></div>伏以某官梁栋瑰材，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173080", 1173080, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>琮璜</span>茂器，发文章之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173080", 1173080, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>素蕴</span>，当仁圣之盛期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173080_comment'></div>忠言嘉谋，施之有效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173080_comment'></div>流风善治，所至可传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173080_comment'></div>嘉奖士伦，助成世教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173080_comment'></div>况亲承于著令，方序别于群材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173080_comment'></div>藐是羁孤，最为滞拙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173080_comment'></div>仰遵旧礼，敢忘桑梓之恭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173080_comment'></div>辄进曼辞，庶当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173080", 1173080, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>鸡鹜</span>之贽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173080_comment'></div>察其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173080", 1173080, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>素学</span>，采以寸长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173080_comment'></div>尽繄及物之仁，惟俟至公之赐。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1173080'></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1173080_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='64a593ef52ea4b009a7947a720508172_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("64a593ef52ea4b009a7947a720508172");'><span id='64a593ef52ea4b009a7947a720508172_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1058')">1057-1058年</a>，39-40岁</div><div id='64a593ef52ea4b009a7947a720508172' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年8月</a>　曾巩撰《拟岘台记》<div id='poem_1173291' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173291' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173291?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟岘台记</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年九月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173291")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173291_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173291'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173291'>尚书司门员外郎晋国裴君治抚之二年，因城之东隅作台以游，而命之曰拟岘台，谓其山溪之形，拟乎岘山也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173291_comment'></div>数与其属与州之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173291", 1173291, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>寄客</span>者游其间，独求记于予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173291_comment'></div>初，州之东，其城因大丘，其隍因大溪，其隅因客土以出溪上，其外连山高陵，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173291", 1173291, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>野林</span>荒墟，远近高下，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173291", 1173291, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>壮大</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173291", 1173291, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>闳廓</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173291_comment'></div>怪奇可喜之观，环抚之东南者，可坐而见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173291_comment'></div>然而雨隳潦毁，盖藏弃委于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173291", 1173291, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>榛丛</span>茀草之间，未有即而爱之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173291_comment'></div>君得之而喜，增甓与土，易其破缺，去榛与草，发其亢爽，缭以横槛，覆以高甍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173291_comment'></div>因而为台，以脱埃氛，绝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173291", 1173291, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>烦嚣</span>，出云气而临风雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173291_comment'></div>然后溪之平沙漫流，微风远响，与夫波浪汹涌，破山拔木之奔放，至于高桅劲橹，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173291", 1173291, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>沙禽</span>水兽，下上而浮沉者，皆出乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173291", 1173291, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>履舄</span>之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173291_comment'></div>山之苍颜秀壁，巅崖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173291", 1173291, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>拔出</span>，挟光景而薄星辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173291_comment'></div>至于平冈长陆，虎豹踞而龙蛇走，与夫荒蹊聚落，树阴晻暧，游人行旅，隐见而断续者，皆出乎衽席之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173291_comment'></div>若夫烟云开歛，日光出没，四时朝暮，雨旸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173291", 1173291, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>明晦</span>，变化不同，则虽览之不厌，而虽有智者，亦不能穷其状也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173291_comment'></div>或饮者淋漓，歌者激烈，或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173291", 1173291, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>靓观</span>微步，旁皇徙倚，则得于耳目与得之于心者，虽所寓之乐有殊，而亦各适其适也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173291_comment'></div>抚非通道，故贵人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173291", 1173291, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>蓄贾</span>之游不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173291_comment'></div>多良田，故水旱螟螣之灾少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173291_comment'></div>其民乐于耕桑以自足，故牛马之牧于山谷者不收，五谷之积于郊野者不垣，而晏然不知枹鼓之警，发召之役也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173291_comment'></div>君既因其土俗，而治以简静，故得以休其暇日，而寓其乐于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173291_comment'></div>州人士女，乐其安且治，而又得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173291", 1173291, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>游观</span>之美，亦将同其乐也，故予为之记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173291_comment'></div>其成之年月日，嘉祐二年之九月九日也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1173291_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩撰《司封员外郎蔡公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173336' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173336' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173336?labeling=true' target='_blank'>司封员外郎蔡公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173336")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173336_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173336'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173336'>公讳充，字公度，天圣二年进士及第，为邵武军之邵武尉，又为应天府之下邑尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173336_comment'></div>丁母夫人河间县太君周氏忧，服除，为越州司理参军，天平军节度掌书记，迁秘书省著作佐郎，知洪州奉新县，秘书丞，知遂州小溪县，改通判戎州，累迁太常博士、尚书屯田度支司封员外郎，历监在京都进奏院，群牧判官，知绛州，又为提点荆湖北路刑狱公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173336_comment'></div>至和三年七月二十三日，以疾卒于澧州之官舍，享年七十有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173336_comment'></div>嘉祐二年十一月十三日葬于建昌军南城县太平乡之西原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173336_comment'></div>公为人好自洁清，平居衣冠容貌肃然，及其临事，以沉默<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173336", 1173336, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>慎静</span>为主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173336_comment'></div>故自起家至于其终，凡三十馀年，历内外官，无纤介之失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173336_comment'></div>其与人游，始若淡然，无足动其意者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173336_comment'></div>及其久，人人皆退自喜，谓公真长者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173336_comment'></div>其为尉、参军、掌书记，人始以廉节知公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173336_comment'></div>及为奉新、小溪、绛州，其政又以平恕不扰闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173336_comment'></div>至其在群牧、荆湖，数更置诸事，人皆服其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173336_comment'></div>其于越州，属将佐交恶，府中多向背，公独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173336", 1173336, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>挺立</span>无所与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173336_comment'></div>后将又以贪坐法，官属多不能自全，事亦卒无污公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173336_comment'></div>于戎州，属泸州叛蛮攻淯井监，转运使用公调兵食御之，兵遂以济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173336_comment'></div>于绛州，州岁市羊数万供京师，公奏减之，至今赖其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173336_comment'></div>于荆湖，既周知官属善恶，于善人多荐籍成就之，而于恶人无所贷其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173336_comment'></div>公既能自彰显其材，故荐公者尤多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173336_comment'></div>盖王沂公曾、王邓公诒永与今富丞相弼之居郓也，皆荐之，而邓公之为枢密使兼群牧制置使也，又奏公为其判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173336_comment'></div>其为当世之大臣所知如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173336_comment'></div>初，公年十三丧父，家贫，尤自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173336", 1173336, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>克苦</span>，养其母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173336_comment'></div>及仕，未尝广田宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173336_comment'></div>丧归，借屋以居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173336_comment'></div>曾祖讳恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173336_comment'></div>祖讳道隆。<div
