class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173336_comment'></div>父讳旦，以公恩赠尚书屯田员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173336_comment'></div>世家南城，故为南城人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173336_comment'></div>娶郑氏，累封宋城县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173336_comment'></div>子八人：曰冠卿，秘书省著作佐郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173336_comment'></div>曰端卿，郑州原武尉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173336_comment'></div>曰文卿，曰徽卿，曰宋卿，曰秀卿，曰子卿，曰孺卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173336_comment'></div>公殁，诏官其一子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173336_comment'></div>盖公不独能以其有施于身，又能力以其馀教于家，故公之殁也，冠卿以材尤知名，端卿而下，皆谨严能世其家者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173336_comment'></div>女二人，嫁邵武尉陈涉、进士陈之邵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173336_comment'></div>冠卿等将葬公，以铭属公故人子曾巩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173336_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1173336'>司封抱能屈初龄，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1173336", 1173336, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>秉旄</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1173336", 1173336, "Clauses/112/Comments/1")'>怀绂</span>晚始亨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173336_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1173336", 1173336, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>沙墟</span>莽崖肆经营，马羊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1173336", 1173336, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>茁肥</span>狱讼平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173336_comment'></div>凛然气志洁以清，自微讫隆用兢兢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173336_comment'></div>风流馀美被家庭，子多以才后方兴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1173336_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩撰《太子右司御率府副率致仕沈君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173350' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173350' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173350?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太子右司御率府副率致仕沈君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173350")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173350_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173350'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173350'>君讳某，字某，姓沈氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173350_comment'></div>沈氏自齐太子家令约家于吴兴，故世为吴兴人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173350_comment'></div>至君之大父讳某、考讳某，始自吴兴之东林徙家于钱塘，故今为钱塘人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173350_comment'></div>君以宗室、密州观察使宗旦恩即其家，得为太子右清道率府副率致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173350_comment'></div>又以祀明堂恩，迁太子右司御率府副率，兼官检校国子祭酒，兼监察御史，阶银青光禄大夫，勋武骑尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173350_comment'></div>盖密州观察使宗旦者，今天子之侄、潞王之孙，而其母夫人，盖君之侄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173350_comment'></div>君为人质朴无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173350", 1173350, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>外饰</span>，其居乡闾，宽然长者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173350_comment'></div>其事父兄能力以严，视族人能爱以均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173350_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173350", 1173350, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>饶财</span>为大家，而衣服饮食，自与尤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173350", 1173350, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>寡约</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173350_comment'></div>至人有急归我，则推财赴之，无锱铢顾惜意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173350_comment'></div>邻里岁饥，辄发仓以救人，有欺其财者皆不校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173350_comment'></div>既老，治其家事不肯懈，曰：「吾先人之所以付我也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173350_comment'></div>处其子孙不以逸，曰：「所以使汝守吾先人之法也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173350_comment'></div>嘉祐二年三月一日以疾卒于家，享年七十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173350_comment'></div>其年十一月十五日葬钱塘之西城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173350_comment'></div>初娶吴氏，再娶车氏，某县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173350_comment'></div>其葬也，吴氏实从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173350_comment'></div>子三人，曰晔，曰晼，曰时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173350_comment'></div>孙八人，曰沔，曰溱，曰沂，曰淑，曰灌，曰湜，曰渐，曰渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173350_comment'></div>曾孙三人，曰师扬，曰师荀，曰师轲，时沔、沂皆举进士，馀亦皆有学行，盖君之教也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173350_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1173350'>赫赫宗子，保藩于密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173350_comment'></div>天子曰嘻，汝惟沈出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173350_comment'></div>予假汝宠，锡其外亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173350_comment'></div>东宫之属，有长卫军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173350_comment'></div>命君于家，俾休其老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173350_comment'></div>以偃以侧，服章华好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173350_comment'></div>天子命我，匪我有求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173350_comment'></div>隤然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1173350", 1173350, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>顺退</span>，媚于林丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173350_comment'></div>不蕴为机，不阻为畦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173350_comment'></div>曰远无仇，曰近无疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173350_comment'></div>里巷之依，惟此令人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173350_comment'></div>流闻馀泽，化其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173350_comment'></div>惟身之祥，既寿而康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173350_comment'></div>惟后之祥，宜炽而昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173350_comment'></div>惟墓有域，其藏有石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173350_comment'></div>刻此铭诗，昭示无极。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1173350_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩撰《抚州金溪县主簿徐洪墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173349' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173349' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173349?labeling=true' target='_blank'>抚州金溪县主簿徐洪墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173349")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173349_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173349'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173349'>嘉祐元年，虔州安远阙县令，建安徐洪以抚州金溪主簿摄安远事，明年八月十一日死安远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173349_comment'></div>十二月，其父尚书屯田郎中举以书告君之故人南丰曾巩曰：「子为我铭洪之墓」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173349_comment'></div>遂考次君世序、行己、历官、卒葬之终始，铭于其墓曰：君曾大父某，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173349_comment'></div>大父某，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173349_comment'></div>君字孺兴，为人有大志，读书好其治乱得失之大旨，为文长于辨说，其奔放驰骋、上下反复之际，有足壮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173349_comment'></div>未冠，声号闻四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173349_comment'></div>初中进士，除洪州司户参军，不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173349_comment'></div>退居大江之南，好倜傥非常之奇节，不肯少屈于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173349_comment'></div>居八年，以父命始强出为主簿，非其好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173349_comment'></div>君居家，遇人无亲疏，豁如也，乐赴人之急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173349_comment'></div>为主簿，不以非其好故怠其意，其治能有爱于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173349_comment'></div>金溪富人锢山林之利数十年，君始夺之，而县之贫人赖其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173349_comment'></div>盖君之所试者小，其为日又近，而其所既立如是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173349_comment'></div>享年三十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173349_comment'></div>死之若干日，葬饶州鄱阳东门外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173349_comment'></div>母某氏，某县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173349_comment'></div>妻凌氏、黄氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173349_comment'></div>男一人，曰还孙，始二岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173349_comment'></div>女四人，尚幼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173349_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1173349'>呜呼孺兴，志果而大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173349_comment'></div>不胜于柔，以窒其外；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173349_comment'></div>不陨其刚，以亨于内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173349_comment'></div>胡短其施，而多其与！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173349_comment'></div>父老失子，儿婴失父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173349_comment'></div>维铭告哀，以纳于墓。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1173349_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩撰《卫尉寺丞致仕金君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173348' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173348' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173348?labeling=true' target='_blank'>卫尉寺丞致仕金君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173348")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173348_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173348'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173348'>今上皇祐二年，祀明堂，推恩群臣，秘书丞金君得以其父为大理评事致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173348_comment'></div>五年，郊，金君为太常博士，又得以其父为卫尉寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173348_comment'></div>惟卫尉府君讳某，字温叟，浮梁人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173348_comment'></div>初，君之考赠大理评事讳某有三子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173348_comment'></div>伯曰鼎臣，为某军节度掌书记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173348_comment'></div>仲曰汝臣，为太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173348_comment'></div>季即君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173348_comment'></div>兄弟俱举进士，书记与仲既起家，君因不复肯就举，曰：「吾兄弟不可俱去吾亲也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173348_comment'></div>后三十馀年卒，以有子为丞云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173348_comment'></div>君有四子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173348_comment'></div>曰君著；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173348_comment'></div>曰君佐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173348_comment'></div>曰君卿，博士也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173348_comment'></div>曰君佑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173348_comment'></div>兄弟又皆举进士，博士既有名秩于朝，三子皆复养于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173348_comment'></div>盖其父子兄弟之出处如此，何其相似也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173348_comment'></div>当是时，宋兴已百年，博士方以材自起于贱贫，欲以其所为为天下，慨然有志者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173348_comment'></div>君独自得于大山长谷之间，日从子孙，来四方之客，与夫乡人之老，《诗》《书》尊席之侧，啸歌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173348", 1173348, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>息偃</span>，以忘其年，隤然遂其志者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173348_comment'></div>遭天子既宗祀明堂，顾朝士大夫皆褒崇其亲，欲以风示天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173348_comment'></div>命书宠章，降于其家，显荣一时，寿考康宁，有孙有曾，以承以翼，何其祥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173348_comment'></div>君为人简易无町畦，能事父兄，衣食奉养，自与者尝取其薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173348_comment'></div>尝有盗其牛羊，已又盗其所乘马者，君知之，皆不校，盗卒自悔以伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173348_comment'></div>盖君之质与其恕，又有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173348", 1173348, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>足多</span>者如是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173348_comment'></div>生于淳化之庚寅，卒于嘉祐之丁酉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173348_comment'></div>遗命三月而葬，从薄，遂以其年十二月四日葬于饶州浮梁县万户山之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173348_comment'></div>夫人徐氏，累赠寿安县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173348_comment'></div>君之殁也，有子四人，女六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173348_comment'></div>孙男九人，女十二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173348_comment'></div>曾孙男三人，女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173348_comment'></div>金氏，或曰出少昊金天氏，或曰出汉侍中秺侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173348_comment'></div>秺侯传至孙则亡，至曾孙复侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173348_comment'></div>而秺侯有弟伦，伦子若孙，四世六人，皆侍中，以忠孝名尊显于世，世称金氏云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173348_comment'></div>至君之先，皆家京兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173348_comment'></div>唐僖宗时，有令浮梁者，遭黄巢乱，徙人筑险自保，所活人以数万，因留治之，凡十有七年，遂家浮梁，以功至检校尚书、右仆射、昭信军节度使，讳某，君曾祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173348_comment'></div>子讳某，君祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173348_comment'></div>博士以君之外孙、尚书屯田员外郎臧论道之状来属，曰：「子为我铭吾亲，吾死足矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173348_comment'></div>巩不敢辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173348_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1173348'>卑少恭老，惟物之常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173348_comment'></div>即强弃艾，乃理之亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173348_comment'></div>帝用慨然，尊祀明堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173348_comment'></div>顾褒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1173348", 1173348, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>耋寿</span>，风示九有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173348_comment'></div>君势之亨，与享其荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173348_comment'></div>拥笏巍巾，于家以息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173348_comment'></div>有子有孙，严严我侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173348_comment'></div>志无不得，君子之祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173348_comment'></div>铭以发之，君子之光。</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1173348_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　曾巩撰《永兴尉章佐妻夫人张氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173366' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173366' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173366?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永兴尉章佑妻夫人张氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173366")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173366_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173366'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173366'>夫人姓张氏，建安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173366_comment'></div>父讳士龙，举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173366_comment'></div>嫁同郡章氏，为永兴尉佑之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173366_comment'></div>所出三男四女，曰造、适、述，皆举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173366_comment'></div>造及第，为清海军节度掌书记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173366_comment'></div>女嫁俞瑾、徐立之、陈震，亦皆举进士，其一蚤死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173366_comment'></div>初，永兴府君起家二十年，止于为尉，及死，三男尚幼，造既起，又蚤死，已而适亦死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173366_comment'></div>夫人维能忘其贫，所以使其夫能屈于小官而说；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173366_comment'></div>维能务其生，所以使其子能安于幼学而成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173366_comment'></div>维能顺其性，所以居流离<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173366", 1173366, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>颠顿</span>之间，而不为悲哀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173366", 1173366, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>愁忧</span>乱其志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173366_comment'></div>其为人卑，极于顺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173366_comment'></div>其为人尊，极于慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173366_comment'></div>推于其疏宗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173366", 1173366, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>远属</span>之间，极于爱，男之有不能葬者，为葬之，女之有不能嫁者，为嫁之，忘其力之匮而为之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173366_comment'></div>此皆古今学士儒者所难，而女子之善能如此，此非可铭者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173366_comment'></div>嘉祐二年十一月三十日卒于洪州之私第，即以其年十二月十八日葬于洪州某县之某乡某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173366_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1173366'>彼以吾穷，我以吾仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173366_comment'></div>二者皆天，吾乐其因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173366_comment'></div>寿止七十，岂不得年？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173366_comment'></div>维其有之，愈远弥传。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1173366_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年春</a>　曾巩调太平州司法参军，自江西赴任。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='14b16c3a58db443eaf7a49ff83c26985_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("14b16c3a58db443eaf7a49ff83c26985");'><span id='14b16c3a58db443eaf7a49ff83c26985_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>，60岁</div><div id='14b16c3a58db443eaf7a49ff83c26985' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　吕南公谒见曾巩。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年10月</a>　曾巩便道之南丰，展墓，作《戊午十月展墓文》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　曾巩作《自福州召判太常寺上殿札子》<div id='poem_1172986' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172986' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172986?labeling=true' target='_blank'>自福州召判太常寺上殿劄子<span class='inlineComment2'>（改明州不果上）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172986")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172986_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172986'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172986'>伏以陛下聪明睿知，天性自然，可谓有不世出之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172986_comment'></div>自在籓邸，入承颜色，出奉朝请，怡怡翼翼，不自暇豫，至恭极孝，闻于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172986_comment'></div>及践大位，内事两宫，外严七庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172986_comment'></div>仁被公族，德形闺门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172986_comment'></div>嫔御备官，不淫于色；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172986_comment'></div>音乐备数，不溺于声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172986_comment'></div>食菲衣绨，务遵节俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172986_comment'></div>台卑囿小，无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1172986", 1172986, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>增饰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172986_comment'></div>近习无便嬖，左右无私谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172986_comment'></div>未尝出游幸，未尝从畋渔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172986_comment'></div>其于忧悯元元，勤劳庶政，则念虑先于兆朕，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1172986", 1172986, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>祗慎</span>尽于纤芥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172986_comment'></div>昼而访问，至于日昃；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172986_comment'></div>夕而省览，至于夜分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172986_comment'></div>每群臣进见，接之礼笃而情通；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172986_comment'></div>凡四方奉事，莫不朝入而暮报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172986_comment'></div>虽大禹之勤于邦，文王之不暇食，无以加此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172986_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1172986", 1172986, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>渊谋远略</span>，必中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1172986", 1172986, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>事几</span>，善训嘉谟，可为世则者，传闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1172986", 1172986, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>下土</span>，虽仅得其一二，已足以度越众虑，非可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1172986", 1172986, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>窥测</span>，可谓有君人之大德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172986_comment'></div>其高深宏远，则悯自晚周秦汉以来，世主不能独见于众人之表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172986_comment'></div>其政治所出，大抵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1172986", 1172986, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>踵袭</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1172986", 1172986, "Clauses/55/Comments/1")'>卑陋</span>，因于世俗而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172986_comment'></div>于是慨然以上追唐虞三代荒绝之迹，修列先王法度之政，为其任在己，可谓有出于数千载之大志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172986_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1172986", 1172986, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>变革</span>因循，号令必信，使海内<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1172986", 1172986, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>观听</span>莫不震动，群下遵职惟恐在后，可谓有能行之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172986_comment'></div>盖刻意尚行，不差毫发，缙绅之士，有所不能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172986_comment'></div>忧劳惕励，无懈须臾，又非群臣之所能望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172986_comment'></div>可谓特起于三代之后非常之主也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172986_comment'></div>愚臣孤陋，熙宁二年，出通判越州，因转对幸得论事，敢据经之说，以诚意正心修身治国家天下之道必本于学为献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1172986_comment'></div>逮今十有一年，始得望穆穆之清光，敢别白前说而终之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1172986_comment'></div>臣以谓陛下有不世出之姿，有君人之大德，与出于数千载之大志，又有能行之效，特起于三代之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1172986_comment'></div>然顾以治国家天下之道必本于学为献于陛下，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1172986_comment'></div>盖古之圣人，虽出乎其类，拔乎其萃，然至其成德，莫不由学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1172986_comment'></div>故尧舜性之也，而见于传记，则皆有师，其史官识其行事，则皆曰「若稽古」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1172986_comment'></div>至于汤武身之也，则汤学于伊尹，武王学于太公，见于《诗》、《礼》、《孟子》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1172986_comment'></div>在商，高宗得傅说作相，其命说之辞曰：「予小子旧学于甘盘」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1172986_comment'></div>而傅说告之，则曰：「学于古训乃有获」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1172986_comment'></div>又曰：「惟学逊志，务时敏，厥修乃来」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1172986_comment'></div>又曰：「惟敩学半，念终始典于学」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1172986_comment'></div>盖高宗既已学于甘盘矣，及傅说相之，乃更丁宁反复，勉之以学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1172986_comment'></div>其要归，则以谓当终始常念于学，明学盖不可一日而废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1172986_comment'></div>至于孔子之自叙，则自十有五而志于学，至于七十而从心所欲不逾矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1172986_comment'></div>夫以孔子之圣，必志于学，其学之渐，每十年而一进，至于七十矣，其从心也，盖不逾矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1172986_comment'></div>则傅说所称当终始常念于学者，虽孔子之圣，不能易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1172986_comment'></div>故扬子曰：「学之为王者事久矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1172986_comment'></div>尧、舜、禹、汤、文、武汲汲，仲尼皇皇，其已久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1172986_comment'></div>圣贤之笃于学至于如此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1172986_comment'></div>盖乐而不乱，复而不厌者，道也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1172986_comment'></div>测之而益深，穷之而益远者，圣人之言也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1172986_comment'></div>知不足与困者，学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1172986_comment'></div>方其始也，求之贵博，畜之贵多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1172986_comment'></div>及其得之，则于言也在知其要，于德也在知其奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1172986_comment'></div>能至于是矣，则求之博、畜之多者，乃筌蹄而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1172986_comment'></div>所谓多闻则守之以约，多见则守之以卓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1172986_comment'></div>如求之不博，畜之不多，则未有于言也能知其要，未有于德也能知其奥，所谓寡闻则无约，寡见则无卓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1172986_comment'></div>子贡称孔子之学，识其远者大者，则于言也能知其要，于德也能知其奥，然后能当于孔子之所谓学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1172986_comment'></div>审能是，则存于心者，有以为主于内，天下之事，虽其变无穷，而吾所以待之者，其应<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1172986", 1172986, "Clauses/180/Comments/0")'>无方</span>，古之大有为于天下者，未有不出于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1172986_comment'></div>尧、舜、汤、武所以为盛德之至，孔子所以从心而不逾矩，或得其行者，未得其所以行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1172986_comment'></div>得其言者，未得其所以言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1172986_comment'></div>孟子之所谓圣而不可知之谓神，在是而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1172986_comment'></div>陛下万几之馀，日引天下之士，推原道德而讲明其意，陈六艺载籍之文而䌷绎其说，博考深思，无有懈倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1172986_comment'></div>其折衷是非，独见之明，老师宿儒所不能到，此臣之所闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1172986_comment'></div>有不世出之姿与君人之大德，又有出于数千载之大志，特起于三代之后，此臣之所知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1172986_comment'></div>则陛下之学，已可谓至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1172986_comment'></div>然臣区区敢诵经之陈言以进于左右者，诚将顺陛下之圣志，采傅说始终典学之言，观孔子少长进学之渐，以陛下之明智，知言之要，知德之奥，皆陛下之所素畜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1172986_comment'></div>诚以陛下之乐道，而继之以不倦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1172986_comment'></div>以陛下之稽古，而加之以不已，使天性之睿智所造者益深，所稽者益厚，日日新，又日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1172986_comment'></div>其于自得之者，非徒足以待万事无穷之变而应之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1172986", 1172986, "Clauses/224/Comments/0")'>无方</span>，天下之人，必将得陛下之行者，不得其所以行，得陛下之言者，不得其所以言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1172986_comment'></div>尧、舜、汤、武所以为盛德之至，孔子所以从心而不逾矩，孟子所谓圣而不可知之谓神，不在于陛下，而孰在哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1172986_comment'></div>由是歛五福之庆以大赉庶民，享万年之休以永绥方夏，德厚于天地，名昭于日月，惟圣意之所在而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1172986_comment'></div>臣愚不敏，蒙恩<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1172986", 1172986, "Clauses/241/Comments/0")'>赐对</span>，不敢毛举丛细之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1172986", 1172986, "Clauses/242/Comments/0")'>常务</span>，而于国家之体，冒言其远且大者，此臣所以爱君区区之分也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1172986_comment'></div>伏惟留神省察。</div><div id='poem_sentence_67_1172986_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
仪征
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='61092368bb824f1785c362b53bccbe41_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("61092368bb824f1785c362b53bccbe41");'><span id='61092368bb824f1785c362b53bccbe41_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年秋</a>　秋，曾巩至秦淮，逢梅圣俞。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='022e5cba7048445589a7cfe6be8d9b8a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("022e5cba7048445589a7cfe6be8d9b8a");'><span id='022e5cba7048445589a7cfe6be8d9b8a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>，39岁</div><div id='022e5cba7048445589a7cfe6be8d9b8a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年6月</a>　六月，曾巩与二弟从水路南归，长妹及妹婿景晖视曾巩于淮南。至真州，长妹得疾，卒于曾巩舟中。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年8月</a>　曾巩归南丰。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='cc32c84df3984e9c98b63b0e525d2a8a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("cc32c84df3984e9c98b63b0e525d2a8a");'><span id='cc32c84df3984e9c98b63b0e525d2a8a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>，60岁</div><div id='cc32c84df3984e9c98b63b0e525d2a8a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年12月28日</a>　十二月十八日，曾巩至真州，拟至京师迎侍老母赴任，作《移明州乞至京迎侍赴任状》<div id='poem_1173023' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173023' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173023?labeling=true' target='_blank'>移明州乞至京迎侍赴任状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年12月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173023")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173023_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173023'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173023'>右，臣昨以老母在京，而臣知福州，臣弟布知广州，相去各数千里，幸臣所部之内，盗贼殄除，年谷丰稔，臣于守官，既无可驱驰之事，而臣到任已及一年，远去庭闱，为日已久，奏乞圣慈哀怜，以臣老母见在京师，与臣一在京主判閒慢曹局差遣，或移臣近京一便郡，庶便亲养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173023_comment'></div>寻准中书劄子，已降敕命，差臣权判太常寺兼礼仪事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173023_comment'></div>奉圣旨，仰臣交割职分公事讫，发来赴阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173023_comment'></div>臣遂起离前来，至洪州，睹进奏院报，已差臣知明州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173023_comment'></div>伏念臣已奔驰在路，屈指计日，望至亲侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173023_comment'></div>窃计臣老母之心，闻臣之来，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173023", 1173023, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>倚门</span>之望，固已深切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173023_comment'></div>今母子垂欲相见，而臣忽他改差遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173023_comment'></div>晨昏之恋，既未得伸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173023_comment'></div>迫急之诚，惟知涕泗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173023_comment'></div>且臣母子各已白首，臣母近岁多病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173023_comment'></div>臣弟布又知桂州，私门之内，长子二人皆违左右，而臣于兄弟之内，又最居长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173023_comment'></div>犬马之志，岂敢苟安？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173023_comment'></div>况今所得明州，足可迎侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173023_comment'></div>臣不敢别有陈乞，欲望出自圣恩，特赐矜悯，许臣径马暂至京师，迎侍老母赴任，不敢别有住滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173023_comment'></div>伏惟天地之德，哀而怜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173023_comment'></div>臣欲候授敕后，陈此恳诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173023_comment'></div>臣见在道路，恐虑敕命附递前来，或致迟延，须至便具奏请，所贵早得指挥，不致别有留滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173023_comment'></div>臣见水路前去，所有朝旨，乞降至真州，以来付臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173023_comment'></div>谨具状奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1173023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173023'><span class='label'>按：</span>《读书记》、章校本云「径马未详，疑是仆字」。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173023_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

-----title
当涂
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='fbe0fc4b32364527a03a4248161d736b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("fbe0fc4b32364527a03a4248161d736b");'><span id='fbe0fc4b32364527a03a4248161d736b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>，40岁</div><div id='fbe0fc4b32364527a03a4248161d736b' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>曾巩作《太平州回转运状》<div id='poem_1173110' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173110' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173110?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太平州回转运状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173110")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173110_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173110'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173110'>右巩启：伏念巩夙惟孤质，最荷误知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173110_comment'></div>属仗节以来思，得通名而觏止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173110_comment'></div>辱为殊礼，尤出过恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173110_comment'></div>委曲拊循，丁宁顾访。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173110_comment'></div>轸艰难于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173110", 1173110, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>即路</span>，则许之假宠于舟艎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173110_comment'></div>悯匮乏于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173110", 1173110, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>腾装</span>，则期以致怜于教墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173110_comment'></div>侧思寒陋，何用克堪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173110_comment'></div>聚集感惭，岂胜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173110", 1173110, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>指数</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173110_comment'></div>去违<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173110", 1173110, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>再宿</span>，怀向<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173110", 1173110, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>兼年</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173110_comment'></div>伏惟通久祷于万灵，享洪休于百顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173110_comment'></div>窃以运使郎中受材闳廓，经德粹冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173110_comment'></div>布盛府之诏条，树外台之风绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173110_comment'></div>洽于人望，简在天心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173110_comment'></div>行被命书，即膺远用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173110_comment'></div>伏惟顺遵气节，安养寝兴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1173110_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>曾巩作《太平州与本路转运状》<div id='poem_1173111' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173111' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173111?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太平州与本路转运状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173111")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173111_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173111'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173111'>右巩启：伏念<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173111", 1173111, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>更移</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173111", 1173111, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>岁序</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173111", 1173111, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>阻越</span>道途，音尘莫及于宾阶，书问不通于记室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173111_comment'></div>飞驰精思，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173111", 1173111, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>徯仰</span>风威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173111_comment'></div>伏惟顺履川流，安行舟御，享神明之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173111", 1173111, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>协相</span>，具福禄之来成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173111_comment'></div>伏以运使郎中德绍家声，材周世用，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173111", 1173111, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>隽望</span>倾乎天下，壮猷蔼于朝端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173111_comment'></div>建使者之节旄，宣扬惠泽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173111_comment'></div>佐大农之计策，蕃长货财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173111_comment'></div>拊劳烈以甚隆，席宠灵而宜厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173111_comment'></div>伫膺诏召，以协舆言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173111_comment'></div>伏惟上为朝廷，善绥寝餗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173111_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1173111'>精：《读书记》、章校本作「积」；<div class='inline' id='poem_1172982' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172982' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172982?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代太平州知州谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172982")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172982_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172982'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172982'>伏奉敕命，差知太平州军州事，已于某月某日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172982_comment'></div>惟此方彫瘵之旧，属比岁凶饥之馀，任在拊循，惧无称效<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172982_comment'></div>窃念臣受材不敏，托势甚微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172982_comment'></div>窃郎位之宠名，滥宪台之优选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172982_comment'></div>因蒙中诏，获备外邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172982_comment'></div>方喜便于庭闱，遽已罹于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1172982", 1172982, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>家祸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172982_comment'></div>茍全<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1172982", 1172982, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>生理</span>，复齿班荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172982_comment'></div>用久次而得州，以亲嫌而易地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172982_comment'></div>低回积日，黾勉至官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172982_comment'></div>忽被新恩，复还旧印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172982_comment'></div>江湖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1172982", 1172982, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>孤蹇</span>之迹，道路奔驰之劳，甫兹即安，敢忘尽瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172982_comment'></div>自惟蕞尔，何以及兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172982_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇尊号皇帝陛下日月之光，旁照万物；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172982_comment'></div>天地之德，平施四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172982_comment'></div>猥致妄庸，误蒙器使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172982_comment'></div>当力行于宽惠，上副至仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172982_comment'></div>惟少假于宠灵，庶成薄效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172982_comment'></div>臣不任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1172982_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>曾巩作《代太平州知州谢赐钦恤刑狱敕书表》<div id='poem_1172983' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172983' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172983?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代太平州知州谢赐钦恤刑狱敕书表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172983")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172983_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172983'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172983'>进奏院递到敕一道，赐臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1172983", 1172983, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>钦恤</span>刑狱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172983_comment'></div>属在烦暑，圣躬无倦于焦劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172983_comment'></div>言念系囚，恩旨遂加于恻悯<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172983_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下继祖宗之功德，体天地之生成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172983_comment'></div>发政施仁，恐遗于一物；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172983_comment'></div>胜残去杀，思措于五刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172983_comment'></div>谦不自专，动遵故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172983_comment'></div>眷幅员之至广，轸囹圄之未空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172983_comment'></div>申明诏以丁宁，饬守臣之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1172983", 1172983, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>抚视</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172983_comment'></div>岂止奉行于时令，固足感召于人和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172983_comment'></div>臣与被德音，当宣上意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172983_comment'></div>惟尽哀矜之理，庶符<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1172983", 1172983, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>钦恤</span>之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172983_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1172983_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>曾巩作《代太平州知州谒廊文》<div id='poem_1173418' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173418' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173398' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173398?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代人祭李白文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173398_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173398'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173398'>子之文章，杰立人上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173398_comment'></div>地辟天开，云蒸雨降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173398_comment'></div>播产万物，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173398", 1173398, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>玮丽</span>瑰奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173398_comment'></div>大巧自然，人力何施？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173398_comment'></div>万里一泻，末势犹壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173398_comment'></div>大骋厥辞，至于如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173398_comment'></div>意气飘然，<span class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173109' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173109?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺提刑状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173109")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173109_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173109'><div class='articleSentence' gray;'>▪</span>曾巩作《与王介甫第二书》<div id='poem_1173054' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173054' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173054?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与王介甫第二书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173054")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173054_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173054'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173054'>巩顿首介甫足下：比辱书，以谓时时小有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173054", 1173054, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>案举</span>，而谤议已纷然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173054_comment'></div>足下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173054", 1173054, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>无怪</span>其如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173054_comment'></div>夫我之得行其志而有为于世，则必先之以教化，而待之以久，然后乃可以为治，此不易之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173054_comment'></div>盖先之以教化，则人不知其所以然，而至于迁善而远罪，虽有不肖，不能违也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173054_comment'></div>待之以久，则人之功罪善恶之实自见，虽有幽隐，不能掩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173054_comment'></div>故有渐磨陶冶之易，而无按致操切之难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173054_comment'></div>有恺悌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173054", 1173054, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>忠笃</span>之纯，而无偏听<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173054", 1173054, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>摘抉</span>之苛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173054_comment'></div>己之用力也简，而人之从化也博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173054_comment'></div>虽有不从而俟之以刑者，固少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173054_comment'></div>古之人有行此者，人皆悦而恐不得归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173054_comment'></div>其政已熄而人皆思，而恨不得见之，而岂至于谤且怒哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173054_comment'></div>今为吏于此，欲遵古人之治，守不易之道，先之以教化，而待之以久，诚有所不得为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173054_comment'></div>以吾之无所于归，而不得不有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173054", 1173054, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>负冒</span>于此，则姑汲汲乎于其厚者，徐徐乎于其薄者，其亦庶几乎其可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173054_comment'></div>顾反不然，不先之以教化，而遽欲责善于人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173054_comment'></div>不待之以久，而遽欲人之功罪善恶之必见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173054_comment'></div>故按致操切之法用，而怨忿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173054", 1173054, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>违倍</span>之情生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173054_comment'></div>偏听<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173054", 1173054, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>摘抉</span>之势行，而谮诉告讦之害集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173054_comment'></div>己之用力也愈烦，而人之违己也愈甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173054_comment'></div>况今之士非有素厉之行，而为吏者又非素择之材也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173054_comment'></div>一日卒然除去，遂欲齐之以法，岂非左右者之误而不为无害也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173054_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173054", 1173054, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>谤怒</span>之来，诚有以召之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173054_comment'></div>故曰足下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173054", 1173054, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>无怪</span>其如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173054_comment'></div>虽然，致此者岂有他哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173054_comment'></div>思之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1173054", 1173054, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>不审</span>而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173054_comment'></div>顾吾之职而急于奉法，则志在于去恶，务于达人言而广视听，以谓为治者当如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173054_comment'></div>故事至于已察，曾不思夫志于去恶者，俟之之道已尽矣，则为恶者不得不去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173054_comment'></div>务于达人言而广视听者，己之治乱得失，则吾将于此而观之，人之短长之私，则吾无所任意于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173054_comment'></div>故曰思之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1173054", 1173054, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>不审</span>而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173054_comment'></div>足下于今最能取于人以为善，而比闻有相晓者，足下皆不受之，必其理未有以夺足下之见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173054_comment'></div>巩比懒作书，既离南康，相见尚远，故因书及此，足下以为如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173054_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173054_comment'></div>巩顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1173054_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>曾巩撰《洪州新建县厅壁记》<div id='poem_1173293' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173293' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173293?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洪州新建县厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐三年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173293")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173293_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173293'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173293'>为后世之吏，得行其志者少矣，此仕之所以难也，而县为最甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173293_comment'></div>何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173293_comment'></div>凡县之政无小大，令、主簿皆独任，而民事委曲，当有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173293", 1173293, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>操纵</span>缓急，不能一断以法，举法而绳之，则其罪固易求也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173293_comment'></div>凡有所为，问可不可于州，执一而违之，则其势固易挠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173293_comment'></div>其罪易求，其势易挠，故为之者有以得于州，然后其济可几也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173293_comment'></div>不幸其一锱铢与之咈，则大者求其罪，小者挠其势，将不遗其力矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173293_comment'></div>吏之不能自安，岂足道哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173293_comment'></div>县有不与其扰者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173293_comment'></div>方是时也，而天下之能忘其势而好恶不妄者鲜矣，能忘人之势而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173293", 1173293, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>强立</span>不茍者亦鲜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173293_comment'></div>州负其强以取威，县忧其弱以求免，其习已久，其俗已成之后，而守正循理以求其得于州，其亦不可以必也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173293_comment'></div>则仕于此者，欲行其志，岂非难也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173293_comment'></div>君子者虽无所处而不安，然其于自处也，未尝不择，仕而得择其自处，则县之事有不敢任者，岂可谓过也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173293_comment'></div>洪州新建，自太平兴国六年，分南昌为县，至嘉祐三年，凡若干年，为令者凡三十有九人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173293_comment'></div>而秘书省著作佐郎黄巽公权来为其令，抑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173293", 1173293, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>豪纵</span>，惠下穷，守正循理，而得济其志者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173293_comment'></div>公权亦喜其职之行，因考次凡为令者名氏，将伐石以书，而列置于壁间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173293_comment'></div>故予为之载其行治，而因著其为县之难，使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173293", 1173293, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>来者</span>得览焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1173293_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>曾巩撰《秘书少监赠吏部尚书陈公神道碑铭》<div id='poem_1173322' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173322' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173322?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秘书少监赠吏部尚书陈公神道碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173322")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173322_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173322'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173322'>祥符九年九月甲辰，秘书少监、知广州陈公卒于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173322_comment'></div>以闻天子，官其二子，以慰宠其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173322_comment'></div>天圣中，今天子修先帝功臣，记之于史，而太史考公之谋议劳烈于朝，访公之世族、州里、官次、行治之本末于家，以书于册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173322_comment'></div>已，又有诏次其功，著之令典，布之天下，曰：维所以宠嘉陈氏之子孙者，其世世无绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173322_comment'></div>嘉祐三年，公子三人谋曰：吾先人之所既立，记德之史藏于有司，褒功之诏传于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173322_comment'></div>维墓有碑，后嗣所以载吾先人之休声美实，而久废不立，惧无以饬其子孙于千万世，以为己羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173322_comment'></div>则相与来乞铭文，以刻于石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173322_comment'></div>其叙曰：维陈氏，其先远出于舜，至周武王之时，陈为舜后妫满之封国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173322_comment'></div>至春秋之际，楚灭陈，而子孙之散亡者，因为氏族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173322_comment'></div>其后居长葛者，出于汉太丘令寔之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173322_comment'></div>唐之晚，长葛之陈氏徙南剑州之沙县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173322_comment'></div>公讳世卿，字光远，南剑州沙县人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173322_comment'></div>曾太父昶，太父昂，父文馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173322_comment'></div>公贵，赠其父尚书驾部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173322_comment'></div>公为儿时，书木叶为诗，其父见之大惊，遂使书学，以笃志闻于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173322_comment'></div>中雍熙二年进士，为衡州军事推官，改静安军节度推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173322_comment'></div>王小波、李顺盗蜀，州县多不能保，东围静安，公应变，为箭笴兵械城守之具百馀万，约其属分城守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173322_comment'></div>围既久不解，分城者疑惧意懈，出语动公，公以义谯数勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173322_comment'></div>而间谓州长张雍曰：「此属留之则溃人心，纵之使求外兵，则两全」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173322_comment'></div>雍听其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173322_comment'></div>盗数万人围静安八十日，公奋励距敌，射其裨将一人，应手死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173322_comment'></div>又射至数百人，无不辄死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173322_comment'></div>盗以故不敢迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173322_comment'></div>而外兵来救，乃卒解静安之围。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173322_comment'></div>事闻，即其军以公为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173322", 1173322, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>掌书记</span>，父丧不许去官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173322_comment'></div>自宋兴小吏势弱，盗起往往转掠数百千里，吏辄弃城走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173322_comment'></div>及公之保静安，则若吏力皆可以有为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173322_comment'></div>然公之于此时，盖亦以无为有，以少胜众，此材智烈丈夫之所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173322_comment'></div>小拘常见之人，亦安能责其此出哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173322_comment'></div>公在静安七年，还为秘书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173322_comment'></div>真宗即位，召公欲以补御史，而张鉴守广州，乞公自助，乃以公与鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173322_comment'></div>累迁尚书度支员外郎，赐绯衣银鱼，历知河南府新安县，通判广州，知建州，改福建路转运使，又改两浙，入判三司勾院，复为荆湖北路转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173322_comment'></div>澧州诸蛮夺澧旁地耕守，数纵兵入盗，积十馀岁莫能却。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173322_comment'></div>至公，诸蛮畏悦，皆还就溪洞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173322_comment'></div>而归故所掠地与人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173322_comment'></div>公因筑武陵澧州三塞以备蛮，诏书嘉奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173322_comment'></div>公去久之，而后吏不能善蛮，蛮亦辄复入盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173322_comment'></div>天子问公前所以服蛮者何为，而今将治之者何出，公具对而刊其稿，世故莫知其何术也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173322_comment'></div>公在荆湖岁馀，擢为秘书少监、知广州，赐金紫服，至则罢计口鬻盐，人以休息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173322_comment'></div>海外国来献，多人徒以食县官，而往往皆射利于中国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173322_comment'></div>天子问公所以纲理之者，公以谓以国之小大，裁其使员，授官之多少，通其公献，而征其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1173322", 1173322, "Clauses/142/Comments/0")'>私货</span>，可以息弊止烦，从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173322_comment'></div>居南海四年，未及召而得疾卒，享年六十有四，某年某月某甲子葬于沙县之龙山乡崇仁里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173322_comment'></div>母夫人某氏，某县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173322_comment'></div>继母夫人萧氏，某县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173322_comment'></div>夫人罗氏，某县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173322_comment'></div>子五人：曰俨，尚书比部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173322_comment'></div>曰侃，福州古田县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173322_comment'></div>曰佩，卫尉寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173322_comment'></div>曰伟，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1173322", 1173322, "Clauses/163/Comments/0")'>同学究出身</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173322_comment'></div>曰称，殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173322_comment'></div>侃、伟皆早世，而俨、称之进于朝，累赠公吏部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173322_comment'></div>公事继母行纯笃，其进膳饮药物必经手，其执丧，人恐其不胜哀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173322_comment'></div>遗戒诸子，皆人之大节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173322_comment'></div>好振人之穷，乐奖人之善，所荐士后多至大官，宰相张士逊，公所荐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173322_comment'></div>公常以谓：我之所以自著者在行事，故不必见于文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173322_comment'></div>所以事上者，不求人知，故其于谋议尤多，而人罕得而知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1173322_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1173322_comment'></div>其可谓自信特立也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1173322_comment'></div>其铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_1173322'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1173322", 1173322, "Clauses/190/Comments/0")'>允淑</span>陈公，生知书学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1173322_comment'></div>人就其华，我居以朴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1173322_comment'></div>盗惊西土，公在围城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1173322_comment'></div>邻有破亡，公守不倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1173322_comment'></div>往视蛮荆，其得孰窥？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1173322_comment'></div>蛮来受职，若与为期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1173322_comment'></div>翼翼蜀州，士全纯白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1173322_comment'></div>茫茫楚野，人复耕织。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1173322_comment'></div>原念累功，进位南伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1173322_comment'></div>内治何为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1173322_comment'></div>与人休息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1173322_comment'></div>外治何为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1173322_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1173322", 1173322, "Clauses/211/Comments/0")'>宾柔</span>荒国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1173322_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1173322", 1173322, "Clauses/212/Comments/0")'>允淑</span>陈公，文武之特。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1173322_comment'></div>声戴于人，实告于册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1173322_comment'></div>又慰尔后，刻铭墓石。</div><div id='poem_sentence_73_1173322_comment'></div></div></div><br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　次妹卒，曾巩撰《江都县主簿王君夫人曾氏墓志》<div id='poem_1173372' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173372' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173372?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江都县主簿王君夫人曾氏墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐四年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173372")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173372_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173372'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173372'>试校书郎、扬州江都县主簿王无咎妻曾氏，建昌南丰人，先君博士第二女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173372_comment'></div>孝爱聪明，能读书言古今，知妇人法度之事，巧针缕刀尺，经手皆绝伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173372_comment'></div>先君选其婿于里中，以归王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173372_comment'></div>王氏家故贫，曾氏为冢妇，而其姑蚤世，独任家政，能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173372", 1173372, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>精力</span>，躬劳苦，理细微，随先后缓急为樽节，各有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173372", 1173372, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>条序</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173372_comment'></div>有事于时节，朝夕共宾祭奉养，抚其门内，皆不失所时，将以恭严诚顺，能得其属人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173372_comment'></div>其舅喜曰：「吾不以家为恤矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173372_comment'></div>其夫叹曰：「我能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173372", 1173372, "Clauses/28/Comments/1")'>一意</span>自肆于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173372", 1173372, "Clauses/28/Comments/2")'>官学</span>，不以私累其志，曾氏助我也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173372_comment'></div>生二女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173372_comment'></div>年三十有三，嘉祐四年五月三日以疾卒，十二月葬建昌南城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173372_comment'></div>曾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173372", 1173372, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>大考</span>尚书水部员外郎，讳仁旺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173372_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173372", 1173372, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>大考</span>右谏议大夫，讳致尧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173372_comment'></div>先君太常博士，讳易占。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173372_comment'></div>将葬江都，告其兄巩，使志其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173372_comment'></div>天乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173372_comment'></div>吾哭伯姊始<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173372", 1173372, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>逾期</span>，又哭吾妹而志之，其可哀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173372", 1173372, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>也已</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173372_comment'></div>其可哀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173372", 1173372, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>也已</span>！</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1173372_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　曾巩女庆老生。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　曾巩作《明妃曲二首》<div class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220420")'>曾巩</a></span><br
