id='poem_sentence_0_220420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220420'>何况一身辞汉地，驱令万里嫁胡儿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220420'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_220420", 220420, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>喧喧</span>杂虏方满眼，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_220420", 220420, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>皎皎</span>丹心欲语谁？<div id='poem_sentence_2_220420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220420'>延寿尔能私好恶，令人不自保妍媸。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220420'>丹青有迹尚如此，何况无形论是非。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220420'>穷通岂不各有命，南北由来非尔为。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220420'>黄云塞路乡国远，鸿雁在天音信稀。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220420'>度成新曲无人听，弹向东风空泪垂。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220420'>若道人情无感慨，何故卫女苦思归？<div id='poem_sentence_8_220420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220420'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_220420_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_220322' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220322' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220322?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_220322_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220322'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220322'>蛾眉绝世不可寻，能使花羞在上林。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220322_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220322'>自信无由污白玉，向人不肯用黄金。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220322_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220322'>一辞椒屋风尘远，去托<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_220322", 220322, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>毡庐</span>沙碛深。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220322_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220322'>汉姬尚自有妒色，胡女岂能无忌心？<div id='poem_sentence_3_220322_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220322'>直欲论情通汉地，独能将恨寄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_220322", 220322, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>胡琴</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220322_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220322'>但取当时能托意，不论何代有知音。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220322_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220322'>长安美人誇富贵，未央宫殿竞光阴。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220322_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220322'>岂知泯泯沉烟雾，独有明妃传至今。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220322_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220322'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_220322_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　曾巩作《叙盗》<div id='poem_1173275' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173275' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173275?labeling=true' target='_blank'>叙盗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173275")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173275_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173275'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173275'>盗三十人，凡十五发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173275_comment'></div>繇孙仙而下，盗吴庆船者，杀人皆应斩，盗朱缟船者，赃重皆应绞，凡应死者十有八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173275_comment'></div>繇汤庆而下，或赃轻，或窃盗，或常自言，凡应徒者，十有二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173275_comment'></div>此有司之法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173275_comment'></div>今图之所见者，其名氏、税等、械器，与其发之日月，所盗之家、所取之财，至于人各别其凡若干发，皆旁行以见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173275_comment'></div>人各别其凡若干发者，又别之以朱，欲览者之易晓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173275_comment'></div>吴庆之船，赃分为三，与吴庆、吴道之属有亲疏，居有异同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173275_comment'></div>至于孙仙、汤庆之族属，以及十二人之所以得不死者，皆别见于图之上下，而狱之轻重详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173275_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173275", 1173275, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>创作</span>兵仗，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173275", 1173275, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>合众</span>以转劫数百里之间，至于贼杀良民，此情状之尤可嫉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173275_comment'></div>方五六月之时，水之害甚矣，田畴既以荡溺矣，屋庐既以漂流矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173275_comment'></div>城郭之内，籴官粟以赈民，而犹有不得食者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173275_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173275", 1173275, "Clauses/43/Comments/1")'>穷乡僻壤</span>、大川长谷之间，自中家以上，日昃持钱，无告籴之所，况于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173275", 1173275, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>蹑短</span>素困之人乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173275_comment'></div>方且结草苇以自托于坏堤毁垾之上，有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173275", 1173275, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>饥饿</span>之迫，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173275", 1173275, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>乐生</span>之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173275_comment'></div>其屡发而为盗，亦情状之有可哀者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173275_comment'></div>《康诰》曰：杀越人于货，悯不畏死，凡民罔不憝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173275_comment'></div>孟子以谓不待教而诛者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173275_comment'></div>是则杀人之盗，不待教而诛，此百王之所同，而未有知其所始者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173275_comment'></div>然而孔子曰：「天下有道，盗其先变乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173275_comment'></div>此谓养之既足，导之既明，则为盗者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173275", 1173275, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>知耻</span>而自新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173275_comment'></div>则非杀人之盗，有待教而诛者，此亦百王之所同，而未有知其所始者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173275_comment'></div>不待教而诛者，天下之所不得容也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173275_comment'></div>待教而诛者，俟之之道既尽矣，然后可以责之备也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173275_comment'></div>茍为养之既有不足，导之既有不明，俟之之道既有不尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173275_comment'></div>故凶年人食不足，而有起为盗贼者，天子尝密下宽大之令，许降其罪，而此非有司之法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173275_comment'></div>至杀人与赃重者亦不降，有司之法存焉，亦《康诰》之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173275_comment'></div>余当阅是狱，故具列其本末情状以览观焉，以明余之于是尽心矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1173275_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　曾巩作《太平州祈晴文》<div id='poem_1173419' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173419' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173419?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太平州祈晴文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173419")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173419_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173419'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173419'>去岁之水，其为害大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173419_comment'></div>民之免于死亡而不为盗贼，亦幸而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173419_comment'></div>水之既去，民于完堤防、修<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173419", 1173419, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>疆陇</span>，以从事于田，其艰且劳亦甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173419_comment'></div>使今岁大穰，恐未足以复其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173419_comment'></div>今苗始莳而雨不止，若将又病之，民有转死之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173419_comment'></div>吏之不能事神治民，以降兹沴，不敢逃其责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173419_comment'></div>然沴之既降，非吏之所能捍而止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173419_comment'></div>惟神旧依吾民，而食于此土，捍患除灾，固神之职，敢不以告？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173419_comment'></div>使雨速止，而岁有成，亦惟神于此土，永有依归，惟神其图之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1173419_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　曾巩作《延庆寺会景纯正仲希道介夫明叟纳凉同观建邺宫中画像翰林墨迹延庆寺者刘裕故宅中有寿丘山》作品：《延庆寺会凉景纯正仲希道介夫明叟纳凉同观建邺宫中画像翰林墨迹延庆寺者刘裕故宅中有寿丘山》<div id='poem_220372' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220372' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220372?labeling=true' target='_blank'>延庆寺会景纯正仲希道介夫明叟纳凉同观建邺宫中画象翰林墨迹延庆寺者刘裕故宅中有寿丘山</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220372")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_220372_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220372'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220372'>禅方寿丘山，平昔宋公宅。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220372'>好风吹雨来，暑气一<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220372", 220372, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>荡涤</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220372'>我与二三友，欢言同几席。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220372'>神清轶埃壒，趣合尽肝膈。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220372'>岭竹翠尚新，水花红可摘。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220372'>以此侑樽酒，隤然岸巾帻。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220372'>建邺旧丹青，金銮馀翰墨。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220372'>绰约桃李颜，超遥龙虎迹。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220372'>𥾝矣霸王邺，信哉文章伯。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220372'>感古已踌躇，慕奇复叹息。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220372'>泊无势利心，自觉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_220372", 220372, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>衿虑</span>适。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220372'>起坐相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_220372", 220372, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>扳牵</span>，迟留日将夕。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220372'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_220372_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　曾巩作《阆州张侯廊记》<div id='poem_1173295' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173295' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173295?labeling=true' target='_blank'>阆州张侯庙记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173295")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173295_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173295'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173295'>事常蔽于其智之不周，而辨常过于所惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173295_comment'></div>智足以周于事，而辨至于不惑，则理之微妙皆足以尽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173295_comment'></div>今夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173295", 1173295, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>推策</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173295", 1173295, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>灼龟</span>，审于梦寐，其为事至浅，世常尊而用之，未之有改也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173295_comment'></div>坊墉道路、马蚕猫虎之灵，其为类至细，世常严而事之，未之有废也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173295_comment'></div>水旱之灾，日月之变，与夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173295", 1173295, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>兵师</span>疾疠、昆虫鼠豕之害，凡一慝之作，世常有祈有报，未之有止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173295_comment'></div>《金縢》之书，《云汉》之诗，其意可谓至，而其辞可谓尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173295_comment'></div>夫精神之极，其叩之无端，其测之甚难，而尊而信之，如此其备者，皆圣人之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173295_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173295_comment'></div>彼有接于物者，存乎自然，世既不得而无，则圣人固不得而废之，亦理之自然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173295_comment'></div>圣人者，岂用其聪明哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173295_comment'></div>善因于理之自然而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173295_comment'></div>其智足以周于事，而其辨足以不惑，则理之微妙，皆足以尽之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173295_comment'></div>故古之有为于天下者，尽己之智，而听于人，尽人之智，而听于神，未有能废其一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173295_comment'></div>《书》曰：「朕志先定，询谋佥同，鬼神其依，龟筮协从」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173295_comment'></div>所谓尽己之智而听于人，尽人之智而听于神也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173295_comment'></div>繇是观之，则荀卿之言，以谓雩筮救日，小人以为神者，以疾夫世之不尽在乎己者而听于人，不尽在乎人者而听于神，其可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173295_comment'></div>谓神之为理者信然，则过矣，蔽生于其智之不周，而过生于其所惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173295_comment'></div>阆州于蜀为巴西郡，蜀车骑将军领司隶校尉西乡张侯，名飞字益德，尝守是州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173295_comment'></div>州之东有张侯之冢，至今千有馀年，而庙祀不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173295_comment'></div>每岁大旱，祷雨辄应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173295_comment'></div>嘉祐中，比数岁连熟，阆人以谓张侯之赐也，乃相与率钱治其庙舍，大而新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173295_comment'></div>侯以智勇为将，号万人敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173295_comment'></div>当蜀之初，与魏将张合<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1173295", 1173295, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>相距</span>于此，能破合军，以安此土，可谓功施于人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173295_comment'></div>其殁也，又能泽而赐之，则其食于阆人不得而废也，岂非宜哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173295_comment'></div>知州事尚书职方员外郎李君献卿字材叔，以书来曰：「其为我书之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173295_comment'></div>材叔好古君子也，乃为之书，而以予之所闻于古者告之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1173295_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年冬</a>　曾巩作《与王深父书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（z。）</span><div id='poem_1173062' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173062' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173062?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与王深父书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173062")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173062_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173062'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173062'>巩再拜：与深父别四年矣，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>向往</span>之心，固不可以书道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173062_comment'></div>而比得深父书，辄反覆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>累纸</span>示谕，相存之勤，相语之深，无不尽者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173062_comment'></div>读之累日，不能释手，故亦欲委曲自叙己意以报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173062_comment'></div>而怠惰因循，经涉岁月，遂使其意欲周而反略，其好欲密而反疏，以迄于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173062_comment'></div>顾深父所相与者，诚不在于书之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>疏数</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173062_comment'></div>然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>向往</span>之心，非书则无以自解，而乖谬若此，不能不欿然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173062_comment'></div>不审幸见察否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173062_comment'></div>比得介甫书，知数到京师，比已还亳，即日不审动止如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173062_comment'></div>计太夫人在颍，子直代归，与诸令弟应举，皆在京师，各万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173062_comment'></div>巩此侍亲幸无恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173062_comment'></div>宜和日得书，四弟应举，今亦在京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173062_comment'></div>去年第二妹嫁王补之者，不幸疾不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173062_comment'></div>以二女甥之失其所依，而补之欲继旧好，遂以第七妹归之，此月初亦已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>成姻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173062_comment'></div>巩质薄，去朋友远且久，其过失日积，而思虑日昏，其不免于小人之归者，将若之何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173062_comment'></div>在官折节于奔走，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>悉力</span>于米盐之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/50/Comments/1")'>末务</span>，此固任小者之常，无不自安之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173062_comment'></div>顾初至时，遇在势者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>横逆</span>，又议<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>法数</span>不合，常恐不免于构陷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173062_comment'></div>方其险阻艰难之时，常欲求脱去，而卒无由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173062_comment'></div>今于势者已更，幸自免于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>悔咎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173062_comment'></div>而巩至此，亦已二年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173062_comment'></div>比承谕及介甫所作王令志文，以为扬子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>不过</span>，恐不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173062_comment'></div>夫学者，其心笃于仁，其视听言动由于礼，则无常产而有常心，乃所履之一事耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173062_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173062_comment'></div>使其心笃于仁，其视听言动由于礼，然而无常产也，则其于亲也，生事之以礼，故啜菽饮水之养，与养以天下一也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173062_comment'></div>死葬之以礼，故敛手足形旋葬之葬，与葬以天下一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173062_comment'></div>而况于身乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173062_comment'></div>况于妻子乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173062_comment'></div>然其心笃于仁，其视听言动由于礼者，非尽于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173062_comment'></div>故曰乃所履之一事耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173062_comment'></div>而孟子亦以谓无常产而有常心者，唯士为然，则为圣贤者不止于然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173062_comment'></div>介甫又谓士诚有常心，以操群圣人之说而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>力行</span>之，此孔、孟以下，所以有功于世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173062_comment'></div>夫学者茍不能其心笃于仁，其视听言动由于礼，则必不能不失其常心，此后之学者之患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173062_comment'></div>茍能其心笃于仁，其视听言动由于礼，则必不失其常心，且既已皆中于礼矣，而复操何说而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>力行</span>之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173062_comment'></div>此学者治心修身，本末先后自然之理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173062_comment'></div>所以始乎为士，而终乎为圣人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173062_comment'></div>颜子三月不违仁，盖谓此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173062_comment'></div>人不堪其忧而不改其乐，盖乐此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173062_comment'></div>凡介甫之所言，似不与孔子之所言者合，故曰以为扬子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>不过</span>，恐不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173062_comment'></div>此吾徒所学之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1173062", 1173062, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>要义</span>，以相去远，故略及之，不审以为如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173062_comment'></div>其他未及子细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173062_comment'></div>剧寒自重，书至幸报答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173062_comment'></div>不宣，巩再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1173062_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　曾巩撰《库部员外郎知临江军范君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173338' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173338' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173338?labeling=true' target='_blank'>库部员外郎知临江军范君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐五年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173338")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173338_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173338'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173338'>嘉祐五年六月辛巳，尚书库部员外郎、知临江军事范君卒于位，年五十有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173338_comment'></div>其年十月辛酉，葬于江州德化县之仁贵乡万家山前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173338_comment'></div>将葬，其孤属君之故人李中考次君之官氏邑里，与其功行之实为状，授使者，使告于巩曰：「先君葬既得日月，宜有铭，孤安期也，敢请」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173338_comment'></div>巩曰：「君之行宜有述」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173338_comment'></div>乃为之志其墓而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173338_comment'></div>其叙曰：惟范氏传叙受姓，自刘累以来，其后居江州者，出于晋豫章太守宁之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173338_comment'></div>君讳端，字思道，江州德化人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173338_comment'></div>祖秘书省著作佐郎，赠太常少卿，讳成象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173338_comment'></div>父尚书都官员外郎，赠光禄卿，讳应辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173338_comment'></div>君始以父任为太庙斋郎，累转至尚书库部员外郎，历德化尉、江宁主簿、江都令，知南昌、飞乌、彭山三县，通判通州，徙泰州，又为勾当开治畿内沟洫，提举陕西河北路，便籴粮草，至知临江军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173338_comment'></div>而飞乌，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173338", 1173338, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>乞养</span>太夫人，得监江宁府盐税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173338_comment'></div>彭山，用荐者得监云安军盐井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173338_comment'></div>二县皆不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173338_comment'></div>君聚书万馀卷，强力笃学，为人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173338", 1173338, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>恭逊</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173338", 1173338, "Clauses/49/Comments/1")'>质俭</span>，能自修饬，门内之治<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173338", 1173338, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>肃如</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173338_comment'></div>及施于为政，以谨法能持廉名于世，而世之能观其内者亦少也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173338_comment'></div>始为江都，会岁旱，张若谷为扬州，遣吏数人，与君皆出视民田，他吏还者白岁善，君还独白田实旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173338_comment'></div>若谷初不是之也，君持旱苗力争，乃卒是君所白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173338_comment'></div>吴遵路、蒋堂为淮南转运使，使君护河役，君往视之，还言河不可为，遂罢君，用他吏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173338", 1173338, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>护役</span>，而河果不可为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173338_comment'></div>三人者，其初皆怒，已乃感寤，共荐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173338_comment'></div>而当是之时，天下之主财利者，方务于急聚歛，治民者以立<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173338", 1173338, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>声威</span>为贤，交四方之宾客者，又往往<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173338", 1173338, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>向意</span>于卑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173338", 1173338, "Clauses/81/Comments/1")'>辞貌</span>烦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173338", 1173338, "Clauses/81/Comments/2")'>飨燕</span>赠送之礼，以其故能倾士大夫，以干天下之誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173338_comment'></div>君乃独推息民教化之意，以简易自守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173338_comment'></div>故为云安主盐利，而议蠲盐课以数万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173338_comment'></div>为临江，以兴学教人为先，而厨传宾客之奉，十去其七八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173338_comment'></div>四方之往来者，或出语讪君，君不为之动也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173338_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173338", 1173338, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>正行</span>直道如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173338_comment'></div>太夫人李氏，赞皇县太君，父尚书工部侍郎虚己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173338_comment'></div>元配郑氏，父龙图阁直学士向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173338_comment'></div>次配周氏，清河县君，父尚书司封员外郎陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173338_comment'></div>子男六人：安期、安仁、安之、安世、安寿、安礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173338_comment'></div>女五人，长适和州司户参军郑夷中，次适都昌主簿周咏，次适郊社斋郎周佺期，馀尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173338_comment'></div>孙男六人：萃叟、岩叟、渭叟、商叟、蒙叟、真叟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173338_comment'></div>太夫人之丧，君哀感疾，四年乃能起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173338_comment'></div>凡君之所既立，可谓有士君子之行非邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173338_comment'></div>自不遵先王养士用人之法，而士在闾巷之间者，用力于空文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173338_comment'></div>居朝廷者，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1173338", 1173338, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>驰骋</span>于虚名，以哗世取宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173338_comment'></div>士之能修其内、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1173338", 1173338, "Clauses/124/Comments/1")'>洁身累行</span>者，非自好之笃莫能至，而世亦罕能知之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173338_comment'></div>故君之事，予喜为之见于文，使后之君子得览焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173338_comment'></div>君于文章，尤长于诗，有集三卷，藏于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173338_comment'></div>其铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1173338'>君性温温，好退持卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173338_comment'></div>及其临事，择义而为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173338_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1173338", 1173338, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>一世</span>之弃，君独从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173338_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1173338", 1173338, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>一世</span>之慕，君独违之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173338_comment'></div>行己有常，在官无疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173338_comment'></div>曷以知之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173338_comment'></div>视此铭诗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1173338_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年冬</a>　曾巩被召编校史馆书籍。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
池州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='baf12ca957a44fb09393c0675f09bd97_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("baf12ca957a44fb09393c0675f09bd97");'><span id='baf12ca957a44fb09393c0675f09bd97_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>，40岁</div><div id='baf12ca957a44fb09393c0675f09bd97' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年冬</a>　冬，曾巩过池州，作《思政堂记》<div id='poem_1173288' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173288' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173288?labeling=true' target='_blank'>思政堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐三年冬至）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173288")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173288_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173288'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173288'>尚书祠部员外郎、集贤校理太原王君为池州之明年，治其后堂北向，而命之曰思政之堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173288_comment'></div>谓其出政于南向之堂，而思之于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173288_comment'></div>其冬，予客过池，而属予记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173288_comment'></div>初，君之治此堂，得公之馀钱，以易其旧腐坏断，既完以固，不窘寒暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173288_comment'></div>辟而即之，则旧圃之胜，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173288", 1173288, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>凉台</span>清池，游息之亭，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173288", 1173288, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>微步</span>之径，皆在其前；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173288_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173288", 1173288, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>平畦</span>浅槛，佳花美木、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173288", 1173288, "Clauses/21/Comments/1")'>竹林</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173288", 1173288, "Clauses/21/Comments/2")'>香草</span>之植，皆在其左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173288_comment'></div>君于是退处其中，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173288", 1173288, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>并心</span>一意，用其日夜之思者，不敢忘其政，则君之治民之意勤矣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173288_comment'></div>夫接于人无穷，而使人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173288", 1173288, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>善惑</span>者，事也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173288_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173288", 1173288, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>推移</span>无常，而不可以拘者，时也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173288_comment'></div>其应无方，而不可以易者，理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173288_comment'></div>知时之变而因之，见必然之理而循之，则事者虽无穷而易应也，虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173288", 1173288, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>善惑</span>而易治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173288_comment'></div>故所与由之，必人之所安也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173288_comment'></div>所与违之，必人之所厌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173288_comment'></div>如此者，未有不始于思，然后得于己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173288_comment'></div>得于己，故谓之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173288_comment'></div>正己而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173288", 1173288, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>治人</span>，故谓之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173288_comment'></div>政者，岂止于治文书、督赋歛、断狱讼而已乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173288_comment'></div>然及其已得矣，则无思也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173288_comment'></div>已化矣，则亦岂止于政哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173288_comment'></div>古君子之治，未尝有易此者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173288_comment'></div>今君之学，于书无所不读，而尤深于《春秋》，其挺然独见，破去前惑，人有所不及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173288_comment'></div>来为是邦，施用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173288", 1173288, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>素学</span>，以修其政，既得以休其暇日，乃自以为不足，而思之于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173288_comment'></div>虽今之吏不得以尽行其志，然迹君之勤如此，则池之人，其不有蒙其泽者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173288_comment'></div>故予为之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173288_comment'></div>嘉祐三年冬至日，南丰曾巩记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1173288_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

-----title
宁波
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ce8205b146d649f688b65cf08a19316a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ce8205b146d649f688b65cf08a19316a");'><span id='ce8205b146d649f688b65cf08a19316a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>，51岁</div><div id='ce8205b146d649f688b65cf08a19316a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　曾巩作《广德湖记》<div id='poem_1173301' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173301' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173301?labeling=true' target='_blank'>广德湖记<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁二年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173301")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173301_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173301'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173301'>鄞县张侯图其县之广德湖，而以书并古刻石之文遗予曰：「愿有纪」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173301_comment'></div>盖湖之大五十里，而在鄞之西十二里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173301_comment'></div>其源出于四明山，而引其北为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173301", 1173301, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>漕渠</span>，泄其东北入江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173301_comment'></div>凡鄞之乡十有四，其东七乡之田，钱湖溉之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173301_comment'></div>其西七乡之田，水注之者，则此湖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173301_comment'></div>舟之通越者皆由此湖，而湖之产，有凫雁鱼鳖、茭蒲葭菼、葵莼莲芡之饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173301_comment'></div>其旧名曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173301", 1173301, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>莺脰湖</span>，而今名，大历八年令储仙舟之所更也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173301_comment'></div>贞元元年，刺史任侗又治而大之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173301_comment'></div>大中元年，民或上书请废湖为田，任事者左右之，为出御史李后素验视，后素不为挠民以得罪，而湖卒不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173301_comment'></div>刺史李敬方与后素皆赋诗刻石以见其事，其说以谓当是时湖成三百年矣，则湖之兴，其在梁齐之际欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173301_comment'></div>宋兴，淳化二年，民始与州县强吏盗湖为田，久不能正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173301_comment'></div>至道二年，知州事丘崇元躬按治之，而湖始复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173301_comment'></div>转运使言其事，诏禁民敢田者，至其后，遂著之于一州敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173301_comment'></div>咸平中，赐官吏职田，取湖之西山足之地百顷为之，既而务益取湖以自广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173301_comment'></div>天禧二年，知州事李夷庚始正湖界，起堤十有八里以限之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173301_comment'></div>湖之滨，有地曰林村砂末，曰高桥腊台，而其中有山曰白鹤，曰望春，自太平兴国以来，民冒取之，夷庚又命禁绝，而湖始复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173301_comment'></div>天圣、景祐之间，民复相率请湖为田，州从事张大有案行止之，而知州事李照又言其事，报如至道诏书，照以刻之石，自此言请湖为田者始息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173301_comment'></div>而康定某年，县主簿曾公望又益治湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173301_comment'></div>至张侯之为鄞，则湖久不治，西七乡之农以旱告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173301_comment'></div>张侯为出营度，民田湖旁者皆喜，愿致其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173301_comment'></div>张侯计工赋材，择民之为人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173301", 1173301, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>信服</span>有知计者，使督役而自主之，一不以属吏，人以不扰，而咸劝趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173301_comment'></div>于是筑环湖之堤，凡九千一百三十四丈，其广一丈八尺，而其高八尺，广倍于旧，而高倍于旧三之二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173301_comment'></div>鄞人累石堙水，阙其间而扃以木，视水之小大而闭纵之，谓之碶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173301_comment'></div>于是又为之益旧，总为碶九，为埭二十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173301_comment'></div>堤之上植榆柳，益旧总为三万一百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173301_comment'></div>又因其馀材为二亭于堤上以休，而与望春、白鹤之山相直，因以其山名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173301_comment'></div>山之上为庙，一以祠神之主此湖者，一以祠吏之有功于此湖者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173301_comment'></div>以熙宁元年十一月始役，而以明年二月卒事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173301_comment'></div>其用民之力八万二千七百九十有二工，而其材出于工之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173301_comment'></div>既成，而田不病旱，舟不病涸，鱼雁茭苇、果蔬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1173301", 1173301, "Clauses/108/Comments/1")'>水产</span>之良皆复其旧，而其馀及于比县旁州，张侯于是可谓有劳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173301_comment'></div>是年予通判越州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173301_comment'></div>越之南湖，久废不治，盖出于吏之因循，而至于不知所以为力，予方患之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173301_comment'></div>观广德之兴，以数百年，危于废者数矣，繇屡有人，故益以治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173301_comment'></div>盖大历之间，溉田四百顷，大中八百顷，而今二千顷矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173301_comment'></div>则人之存亡，政之废举，为民之幸不幸，其岂细也欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173301_comment'></div>故为之书，尚俾来者知毋废前人之功，以永为此邦之利，而又将与越之人图其废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173301_comment'></div>张侯名峋，字子坚，以材闻，去而为提举两浙路常平广惠仓，兼管勾农田差役水利事，方且用于时云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1173301_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='9a18de068f694607af894ae00baf03d8_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9a18de068f694607af894ae00baf03d8");'><span id='9a18de068f694607af894ae00baf03d8_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>，61岁</div><div id='9a18de068f694607af894ae00baf03d8' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年1月25日</a>　曾巩知明州军州事，是年正月二十五日到任，作《明州谢到任表》<div id='poem_1172956' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172956' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172956?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明州谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年1月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172956")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172956_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172956'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172956'>臣于去年十二月，于江宁府准福州公文送到敕牒一道，就差臣权知明州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172956_comment'></div>当月十八日，于真州据进奏官状准中书孔目房帖子，臣乞迎侍老母赴任不行，已于今年正月二十五日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172956_comment'></div>预于分土，愧在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1172956", 1172956, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>假人</span>，窃自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1172956", 1172956, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>省循</span>，惧无报称<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172956_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下有聪明睿智固天纵之高姿，有恭俭慈仁不世出之琦行，上嘉尧、舜之际，下悼汉、唐之间，以超旷之迹为可追，以茍简之治为无取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172956_comment'></div>甚盛德之事，敏于绝伦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172956_comment'></div>大有为之君，审于在己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172956_comment'></div>所以更张庶政，忧悯百姓之心，至于推广大恩，镇抚四夷之略，无忘夙夜，匪懈斯须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172956_comment'></div>其志之所存，则有孔之卓；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172956_comment'></div>其行之以力，则有禹之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172956_comment'></div>若夫甄序群材，蒐扬众论，偏长一曲之善，半辞片说之工，远自岩穴之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1172956", 1172956, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>幽深</span>，旁暨草莱之疏贱，莫不从容赐对以尽其情，委曲因能以收其用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172956_comment'></div>可谓三代以后特起之盛时，千载以来几希之嘉会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172956_comment'></div>而臣滥中台之优秩，玷内阁之美名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172956_comment'></div>然而荏苒十年，周流六郡，当陛下辟四门以延天下之士，而臣未得一望于清光；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172956_comment'></div>遇陛下开数路以来天下之言，而臣未得少陪于末议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172956_comment'></div>盖兹远迹，最为多奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172956_comment'></div>故虽抱于愚忠，每自安于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1172956", 1172956, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>静晦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172956_comment'></div>窃恃皇明之必照，终期<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1172956", 1172956, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>素蓄</span>之获伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172956_comment'></div>昨者爰自江吴，就更闽粤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172956_comment'></div>唶有畏涂之阻，藐无将母之因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172956_comment'></div>赖上威灵，致<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1172956", 1172956, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>寇攘</span>之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1172956", 1172956, "Clauses/60/Comments/1")'>熄灭</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172956_comment'></div>属时休庆，获稼穑之丰登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172956_comment'></div>既此蒙成，且将满岁，辄露由衷之请，果纡及远之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172956_comment'></div>召自天涯，还之阙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172956_comment'></div>已慰循垓之念，更谐拱极之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172956_comment'></div>方揽辔以在行，复分符而补外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1172956_comment'></div>维鄞江之列壤，实浙右之名邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1172956_comment'></div>素号宽閒，可容尸素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1172956_comment'></div>寻敷陈于奏牍，冀迎奉于轻舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1172956_comment'></div>󵧯是微情，未回洪造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1172956_comment'></div>已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1172956", 1172956, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>宵行</span>而祗命，甫夕惕以当官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1172956_comment'></div>眷是遐陬，遘此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1172956", 1172956, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>昭旦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1172956_comment'></div>来廷之国，实为出入之途；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1172956_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1172956", 1172956, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>表海</span>之城，方始经营之绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1172956_comment'></div>仰荷选抡之寄，敢忘策励之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1172956_comment'></div>矧皆禀于成规，庶可图于薄效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1172956_comment'></div>再念臣比更远守，久去偏亲，出自推恩，幸兹易地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1172956_comment'></div>环走已临于新部，相望犹迩于旧封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1172956_comment'></div>仰睎天日之光，未亲户牖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1172956_comment'></div>俯计晨昏之慈，尚隔庭闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1172956_comment'></div>眇是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1172956", 1172956, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>羁单</span>，了无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1172956", 1172956, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>党助</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1172956_comment'></div>每益坚于己志，独有待于主知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1172956_comment'></div>自效驱驰，敢废<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1172956", 1172956, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>资忠</span>之义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1172956_comment'></div>庶依长育，未愆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1172956", 1172956, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>致养</span>之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1172956_comment'></div>倾葵藿之一心，极蓬茅之丹恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1172956_comment'></div>论畴者在，之死无渝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1172956_comment'></div>仰望冕旒，臣不任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1172956_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_content_1173097'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173097'>右巩启：伏奉敕命，授前件差遣，已于正月二十五日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173097_comment'></div>伏念巩才无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173097", 1173097, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>远用</span>，学殆小知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173097_comment'></div>误蒙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173097", 1173097, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>假器</span>之恩，愧乏当官之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173097_comment'></div>属时泰豫，遇上休明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173097_comment'></div>欲治之心，夐追于三代；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173097_comment'></div>非常之旦，特起于千龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173097_comment'></div>顾是孤生，最为远迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173097_comment'></div>虽逢辰之难得，独揣己之无堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173097_comment'></div>故群材衒鬻之初，未始自陈于薄技；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173097_comment'></div>而众论骋驰之际，何尝辄预于半辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173097_comment'></div>锱铢动谨于成规，毫发敢萌于私见？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173097_comment'></div>以兹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173097", 1173097, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>循分</span>，庶获寡尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173097_comment'></div>然而一去本朝，六祗外服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173097_comment'></div>十年荏苒，未谐拱极之诚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173097_comment'></div>万里周流，尚负循陔之念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173097_comment'></div>当至仁之平施，亦微物之可哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173097_comment'></div>兹者方祗诏以在涂，复析符而假守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173097_comment'></div>惟四明之穷裔，处百奥之东偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173097_comment'></div>浮海之航，鼎来于远国；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173097_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173097", 1173097, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>践山</span>之筑，益起于坚城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173097_comment'></div>猥出选抡，冒膺寄属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173097_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官辅成世教，乐育士伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173097_comment'></div>阴推覆护之私，每借吹嘘之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173097_comment'></div>致兹顽钝，与在甄收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173097_comment'></div>然而察无他恶之肠，方赖兼容之度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173097_comment'></div>草茅之质，使遂于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173097", 1173097, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>向阳</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173097_comment'></div>菽水之欢，许伸于反哺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173097_comment'></div>尽待曲成之赐，俯厌难止之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173097_comment'></div>誓在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173097",
