href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　曾巩作《明州拟辞高丽送遗状》<div id='poem_1173036' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173036' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173036?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明州拟辞高丽送遗状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173036")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173036_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173036'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173036'>窃见接送高丽使副仪内一项，高丽国进奉使副，经过州军，送知州、通判土物，并无答谢书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173036_comment'></div>候进奉使回日，依例估价，以系官<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173036", 1173036, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>生帛</span>，就整数量加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173036", 1173036, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>回答</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173036_comment'></div>检会熙宁六年高丽国进奉有使副，送明州知州、通判土物，共估钱二百贯以上九十九陌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173036_comment'></div>熙宁五年及九年，有进奉使，无副使，送明州知州、通判土物，共估计价钱一百贯以上九十九陌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173036_comment'></div>其土物，奉圣旨并依例令收，估价<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173036", 1173036, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>回答</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173036_comment'></div>臣今有愚见合具奏闻者，右谨具如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173036_comment'></div>窃以高丽于蛮夷中为通于文学，颇有知识，可以德怀，难以力服也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173036_comment'></div>故以隋之全盛，炀帝之世，大兵三出，天下骚然，而不能朝其君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173036_comment'></div>及至唐室，以太宗之英武，李绩之善将，至于君臣皆东向，以身<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173036", 1173036, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>督战</span>，而不能拔其一城，此臣之所谓难以力服也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173036_comment'></div>宋兴，自建隆以来，其王王昭以降，六王继修贡职，使者相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173036_comment'></div>其中间压于强虏，自天圣以后，始不能自通于中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173036_comment'></div>陛下即祚，声教四塞，其国闻风，不敢宁息，不忌强胡之难，不虞大海之阻，效其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173036", 1173036, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>土实</span>，五岁三至，如东西州，唯恐在后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173036_comment'></div>其所以致之者，不以兵威，此臣之所谓可以德怀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173036_comment'></div>陛下亦怜其万里惓惓，归心有德，收而抚之，恩礼甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173036_comment'></div>州郡当其道途所出，迎劳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173036", 1173036, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>燕饯</span>，所以宣达陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173036", 1173036, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>宠锡</span>待遇之意，此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173036", 1173036, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>守臣</span>之职分也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173036_comment'></div>其使者所历之州，贽其所有，以为好于邦域之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173036_comment'></div>陛下加恩，皆许受之，而资以官用，为其酬币。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173036_comment'></div>其使一再至之间，许其如此，不为常制可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173036_comment'></div>今其使数来，邦域之臣受其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173036", 1173036, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>贽遗</span>，著于科条，以为常制，则臣窃有疑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173036_comment'></div>盖古者相聘，贽有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173036", 1173036, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>圭璋</span>，及其卒事，则皆还之，以明轻财重礼之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173036_comment'></div>今蛮夷使来，邦域之臣与之相接，示之以轻财重礼之义，使知中国之所以为贵，此人事之所宜先，则当还其贽，如古之聘礼，还其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173036", 1173036, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>圭璋</span>，此谊之所不可已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173036_comment'></div>又古之以贽见君者，国君于其臣则受之，非其臣则还之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173036_comment'></div>今蛮夷向化，来献其方物，以致其为臣之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173036_comment'></div>天子受之，以明天下一尊，有臣而畜之之义，此不易之制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173036_comment'></div>邦域之臣与其使接，以非其臣之义，还其贽，以明守礼而不敢逾，亦不易之制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173036_comment'></div>以此相属，以明天子之尊，中国之贵，所重者礼义，所轻者货财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173036_comment'></div>其于待遇蛮夷之道，未有当先于此者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173036_comment'></div>且彼贽其所有，以明州一州计之，知州、通判所受，为钱三十万，受之者既于义未安，其使自明而西，以达京师，历者尚十馀州，当皆有贽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173036_comment'></div>以彼之力度之，蛮夷小国，于其货财，恐未必有馀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173036_comment'></div>使其有亲附中国之心，而或忧于货财之不足，臣窃恐有伤中国之义，而非陛下所以畜之幸之之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173036_comment'></div>臣愚窃欲自今高丽使来，贽其所有以为好于邦域之臣者，许皆以诏旨还之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173036_comment'></div>其资于官用以为酬币已有故事者，许皆以诏旨与之如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173036_comment'></div>惟陛下详择之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173036_comment'></div>如可推行，愿更著于令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173036_comment'></div>盖复其贽以及于恐其力之不足，厚其与以及于察其来之不易，所谓尚之以义，绥之以仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173036_comment'></div>中国之所以待蛮夷，未有可以易此者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173036_comment'></div>其国粗为有知，归相告语，必皆心服诚悦，慕义于无穷，此不论而可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173036_comment'></div>臣愚非敢以是为廉，诚以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1173036", 1173036, "Clauses/155/Comments/0")'>拊接</span>蛮夷，示之以轻财重礼之义，不可不先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173036_comment'></div>庶几万分之一，无累于陛下以德怀远人之体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173036_comment'></div>是以不敢不言，惟陛下裁择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173036_comment'></div>谨具状奏闻，伏候敕旨<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173036_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_1173036'>无：元刻本、正统本、《读书记》、顾校本、吴校本、傅校本作「先」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1173036_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173036'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_40_1173036_0'>⑴ 《元丰类稿》卷三五。又见《曾文定公集》卷二。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1173036_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　曾巩作《寿圣院昌山主静轩》<div id='poem_220201' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220201' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220201?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寿圣院昌山主静轩</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220201")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220201_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220201'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220201'>一峰潇洒背成阴，碧瓦新堂地布金。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220201_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220201'>花落禅衣松砌冷，日临<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220201", 220201, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>经帙</span>纸窗深。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220201_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220201'>幽栖鸟得林中乐，燕坐人存世外心。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220201_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220201'>应似白莲香火社，不妨篮舆客追寻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220201_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220201'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220201_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　曾巩作《明州奏乞回避朱明之状》<div id='poem_1173024' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173024' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173024?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明州奏乞回避朱明之状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173024")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173024_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173024'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173024'>伏为本路提点刑狱朱明之，是臣母之亲堂弟，牒明州检到敕条，窃虑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173024", 1173024, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>合该</span>回避，须至奏闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173024_comment'></div>右谨具如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173024_comment'></div>乞赐检会，如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173024", 1173024, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>合该</span>回避，欲望圣慈，念臣在外十有一年，已更六任，幸遇非常之主，职与内朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173024_comment'></div>而自陛下即祚以来，未得一亲玉色，人臣爱君惓惓希慕之心，未能自弃，为日已久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173024_comment'></div>兼臣昨任福州，已系远地，迎侍不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173024_comment'></div>即今老母多病，见在京师，人子之义，晨昏之恋，固难茍止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173024_comment'></div>二者于臣之心，实为迫切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173024_comment'></div>如臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173024", 1173024, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>合当</span>避亲，臣不敢陈乞在京差遣，只乞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173024", 1173024, "Clauses/30/Comments/1")'>对移</span>陈、蔡一郡，许臣暂至京师，迎侍老母赴任，使臣仰得就日月之光，俯得伸犬马之养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173024_comment'></div>臣至孤至远之迹，抱此微诚，如不自言，谁当为臣言者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173024_comment'></div>伏惟陛下天地父母哀而怜之，出自圣慈，特赐矜许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173024_comment'></div>臣不任母子区区激切之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173024_comment'></div>谨具状奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1173024_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　元積中遣人至明州，继请为修洪州东门作记，曾巩作《洪州东门记》<div id='poem_1173307' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173307' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173307?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洪州东门记<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰二年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173307")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173307_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173307'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173307'>南昌于《禹贡》为扬州之野，于地志为吴分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173307_comment'></div>其部所领八州，其境属于荆闽南粤，方数千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173307_comment'></div>其田宜粳稌，其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>赋粟</span>输于京师，为天下最，在江湖之间，东南一都会也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173307_comment'></div>其城之西为大江，江之外为西山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173307_comment'></div>州治所，因城之面势，为门东西出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173307_comment'></div>其西门既新，而东门独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>故弊</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173307_comment'></div>熙宁九年，余为是州，将易而新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173307_comment'></div>明年，会移福州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173307_comment'></div>又明年，自福州被召还京师，过南昌，视其东门，则今守元侯既撤而易之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173307_comment'></div>元侯以余为有旧于是州，来请曰：「愿有识」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173307_comment'></div>余<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>辞谢</span>不能，而其请不懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173307_comment'></div>盖天子诸侯之门制，见于经者不明，学礼者以谓诸侯之制，有皋、应、路门，天子之门加库、雉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173307_comment'></div>然见于《春秋》者，鲁有库门，有雉门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173307_comment'></div>见于《孔子家语》者，卫有库门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173307_comment'></div>或以谓褒周公、康叔，非诸侯常制，其果然欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173307_comment'></div>盖莫得而考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173307_comment'></div>在《雅》之《绵》，古公亶父徙宅于岐，作为宫室，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>门墉</span>得宜应礼，后世原大推功，述而歌之，其辞曰：「乃立皋门，皋门有伉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173307_comment'></div>释者曰：伉，言其高也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173307_comment'></div>又曰：「乃立应门，应门将将」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173307_comment'></div>释者曰：将将，言其严正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173307_comment'></div>则诸侯之门，维高且严，固诗人之所善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173307_comment'></div>圣人定诗，取而列之，所以为后世法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173307_comment'></div>今元侯于其东门革陋兴坏，不违于礼，是可书也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173307_comment'></div>将予之识，会予未至京师，易守明州，元侯则使人于途，于明州，速予文不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173307_comment'></div>按南昌之东门，作于淳化五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173307_comment'></div>识于其栋间者曰：皇第六子、镇南节度、洪州管内观察处置等使徐国公元偓，尚书户部郎中、知洪州军州事陈象舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173307_comment'></div>以籍考之，徐国公后封密王，太宗第六子，受命保兹南土，实留京师，则作门者盖象舆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173307_comment'></div>至门之改作，凡八十有九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173307_comment'></div>元侯之于是役，其本取于地之不在民者，其工取于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>役卒</span>之羡者，其瓦甓金石<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>髹彤</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173307", 1173307, "Clauses/95/Comments/1")'>黝垩</span>之费，取于库钱之常入者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173307_comment'></div>自七月戊子始事，至十月壬子而毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173307_comment'></div>既成，而南北之广十寻，东南之深半之，而高如其广，于以出政令，谨禁限，时启闭，通往来，称其于东南为一都会者，而役盖不及民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173307_comment'></div>元侯名积中云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173307_comment'></div>又明年，实元丰二年，尚书度支员外郎、直龙图阁曾巩记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1173307_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　曾巩作《道山亭记》<div id='poem_1173308' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173308' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173308?labeling=true' target='_blank'>道山亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173308")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173308_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173308'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173308'>闽故隶周者也，至秦开其地列于中国，始并为闽中郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173308_comment'></div>自粤之太末，与吴之豫章，为其通路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173308_comment'></div>其路在闽者，陆出则阸于两山之间，山相属无间断，累数驿乃一得平地，小为县，大为州，然其四顾亦山也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173308_comment'></div>其途或逆坂如缘絙，或垂崖如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>一发</span>，或侧径钩出于不测之溪上，皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>石芒</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>峭发</span>，择然后可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>投步</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173308_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>负戴</span>者虽其土人，犹侧足然后能进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173308_comment'></div>非其土人，罕不踬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173308_comment'></div>其溪行，则水皆自高泻下，石错出其间，如林立，如士骑满野，千里上下，不见首尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173308_comment'></div>水行其隙间，或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>衡缩</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/30/Comments/1")'>蟉糅</span>，或逆走旁射，其状若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>蚓结</span>，若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>虫镂</span>，其旋若轮，其激若矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173308_comment'></div>舟溯沿者，投便利，失毫分，辄破溺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173308_comment'></div>虽其土长川居之人，非生而习水事者，不敢以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>舟楫</span>自任也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173308_comment'></div>其水陆之险如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173308_comment'></div>汉尝处其众江淮之间而虚其地，盖以其狭多阻，岂虚也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173308_comment'></div>福州治侯官，于闽为土中，所谓闽中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173308_comment'></div>其地于闽为最平以广，四出之山皆远，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>长江</span>在其南，大海在其东，其城之内外皆涂，旁有沟，沟通潮汐，舟载者昼夜属于门庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173308_comment'></div>麓多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>桀木</span>，而匠多良能，人以屋室<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>钜丽</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/60/Comments/1")'>相矜</span>，虽下贫必丰其居，而佛、老子之徒，其宫又特盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173308_comment'></div>城之中三山，西曰闽山，东曰九仙山，北曰粤王山，三山者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>鼎趾</span>立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173308_comment'></div>其附山，盖佛、老子之宫以数十百，其瑰诡殊绝之状，盖已尽人力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173308_comment'></div>光禄卿，直昭文馆程公为是州，得闽山嵚崟之际，为亭于其处，其山川之胜，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>城邑</span>之大，宫室之荣，不下簟席而尽于四瞩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173308_comment'></div>程公以谓在江海之上，为登览之观，可比于道家所谓蓬莱、方丈、瀛州之山，故名之曰道山之亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173308_comment'></div>闽以险且远，故仕者常惮往，程公能因其地之善，以寓其耳目之乐，非独忘其远且险，又将抗其思于埃𡏖之外，其志壮哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173308_comment'></div>程公于是州以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>治行</span>闻，既新其城，又新其学，而其馀功又及于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173308_comment'></div>盖其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173308", 1173308, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>岁满</span>就更广州，拜谏议大夫，又拜给事中、集贤殿修撰，今为越州，字公辟，名师孟云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1173308_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173308'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷一九。又见《曾文定公集》卷九，《南丰曾先生文粹》卷六，《皇朝文鉴》卷八○，《方舆胜览》卷一○，《文章正宗》续集卷一三，嘉靖《建宁府志》卷七，《八代文钞》第三二册，《古今游名山记》卷一二，《文章辨体汇选》卷五七○，《文编》卷五六，《名山胜概记》卷四一，《古今图书集成》职方典卷一○四三、考工典卷一○七。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173308_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　曾巩作《越州赵公救灾记》<div id='poem_1173309' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173309' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173309?labeling=true' target='_blank'>越州赵公救灾记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173309")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173309_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173309'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173309'>熙宁八年夏，吴越大旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173309_comment'></div>九月，资政殿大学士、右谏议大夫知越州赵公，前民之未饥，为书问属县：灾所被者几乡，民能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>自食</span>者有几，当廪于官者几人，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>沟防</span>构筑可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>僦民</span>使治之者几所，库钱仓廪可发者几何，富人可募出粟者几家，僧道士食之羡粟书于籍者其几具存，使各书以对，而谨其备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173309_comment'></div>州县吏录民之孤老疾弱、不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>自食</span>者二万一千九百馀人以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173309_comment'></div>故事，岁廪穷人，当给粟三千石而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173309_comment'></div>公敛富人所输及僧道士食之羡者，得粟四万八千馀石，佐其费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173309_comment'></div>使自十月朔，人受粟日一升，幼小半之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173309_comment'></div>忧其众相蹂也，使受粟者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>男女</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>异日</span>，而人受二日之食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173309_comment'></div>忧其且流亡也，于城市郊野为给粟之所，凡五十有七，使各以便受之，而告以去其家者勿给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173309_comment'></div>计官为不足用也，取吏之不在职而寓于境者，给其食而任以事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173309_comment'></div>不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>自食</span>者，有是具也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173309_comment'></div>能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>自食</span>者，为之告富人，无得闭粜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173309_comment'></div>又为之出官粟，得五万二千馀石，平其价予民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173309_comment'></div>为粜粟之所，凡十有八，使籴者自便，如受粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173309_comment'></div>又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>僦民</span>完城四千一百丈，为工三万八千，计其佣与钱，又与粟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>再倍</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173309_comment'></div>民取息钱者，告富人纵予之，而待熟，官为责其偿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173309_comment'></div>弃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>男女</span>者，使人得收养之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173309_comment'></div>明年春，大疫，为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>病坊</span>，处疾病之无归者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173309_comment'></div>募僧二人，属以视医药饮食，令无失所恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173309_comment'></div>凡死者，使在处随<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>收瘗</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173309_comment'></div>法，廪穷人，尽三月当止，是岁尽五月而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173309_comment'></div>事有非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>便文</span>者，公一以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>自任</span>，不以累其属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173309_comment'></div>有上请者，或便宜多辄行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173309_comment'></div>公于此时，蚤夜惫心力不少懈，事细钜必躬亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173309_comment'></div>给病者药食，多出私钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173309_comment'></div>民不幸罹旱疫，得免于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>转死</span>，虽死，得无失<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>敛埋</span>，皆公力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173309_comment'></div>是时旱疫被吴越，民饥馑疾疠，死者殆半，灾未有钜于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173309_comment'></div>天子东向忧劳，州县推布上恩，人人尽其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173309_comment'></div>公所拊循，民尤以为得其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1173309", 1173309, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>依归</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173309_comment'></div>所以经营绥辑先后终始之际，委曲纤悉，无不备者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173309_comment'></div>其施虽在越，其仁足以示天下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173309_comment'></div>其事虽行于一时，其法足以传后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173309_comment'></div>盖灾沴之行，治世不能使之无，而能为之备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173309_comment'></div>民病而后图之，与夫先事而为计者，则有閒矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173309_comment'></div>不习而有为，与夫素得之者，则有閒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173309_comment'></div>予故采于越，得公所推行，乐为之识其详，岂独以慰越人之思，将使吏之有志于民者，不幸而遇岁之灾，推公之所已试，其科条可不待顷而具，则公之泽岂小且近乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173309_comment'></div>公元丰二年以大学士加太子少保致仕，家于衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173309_comment'></div>其直道正行在于朝廷、岂弟之实在于身者，此不著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173309_comment'></div>著其荒政可师者，以为《越州赵公救灾记》云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1173309_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　曾巩作《存恤外国人请著为令札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（题后自注：不曾上。）</span><div id='poem_1173004' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173004' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173004?labeling=true' target='_blank'>存恤外国人请著为令劄子<span class='inlineComment2'>（不曾上）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173004")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173004_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173004'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173004'>臣昨任明州日，有高丽国界托罗国人崔举等，因风失船，飘流至泉州界，得捕鱼船援救全度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173004_comment'></div>从此随捕鱼船同力采捕，得食自给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173004_comment'></div>后于泉州自陈，愿来明州，候有便船，却归本国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173004_comment'></div>泉州给与沿路口券，差人押来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173004_comment'></div>臣寻为置酒食犒设，送在僧寺安泊，逐日给与食物，仍五日一次，别设酒食，具状奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173004_comment'></div>臣奏未到之闻，先据泉州奏到，奉圣旨，令于系官屋舍安泊，常切照管，则臣存恤举等，颇合朝廷之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173004_comment'></div>自后更与各置衣装，同天节日，亦令冠带，得预宴设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173004_comment'></div>窃以海外蛮夷，遭罹祸乱，漂溺流转，远失乡土，得自托于中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173004_comment'></div>中国礼义所出，宜厚加抚存，令不失所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173004_comment'></div>泉州初但给与口券，差人徒步押来，恐于朝廷矜恤之恩有所未称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173004_comment'></div>检皇祐一路编敕，亦只有给与口食指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173004_comment'></div>今来圣旨，令于系官屋舍安泊，常切照管，事理不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173004_comment'></div>缘今来所降圣旨，未有著令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173004_comment'></div>欲乞今后高丽等国人船，因风势不便，或有飘失到沿海诸州县，并令置酒食犒设，送系官屋舍安泊，逐日给与食物，仍数日一次别设酒食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173004_comment'></div>阙衣服者，官为置造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173004_comment'></div>道路随水陆给借鞍马舟船。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173004_comment'></div>具析奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173004_comment'></div>其欲归本国者，取禀朝旨，所贵远人得知朝廷仁恩待遇之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173004_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1173004_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年5月30日</a>　五月十三日，有徙曾巩知亳州之命。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　曾巩移守亳州，上书请求暂至京师，迎侍老母赴任，作《移知亳州乞至京迎侍赴任状》<div id='poem_1173025' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173025' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173025?labeling=true' target='_blank'>移知亳州乞至京迎侍赴任状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173025")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173025_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173025'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173025'>右，臣五月三十日伏奉敕命，就差知亳州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173025_comment'></div>既近辇毂，又便庭闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173025_comment'></div>仰荷天恩，俯从人欲，非臣浅薄所能报称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173025_comment'></div>伏念臣前奏中具陈在外十有一年，已更六任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173025_comment'></div>幸遇非常之主，职与内朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173025_comment'></div>而自陛下即祚以来，未得一亲玉色，人臣爱君惓惓希慕之心，未能自弃，为日已久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173025_comment'></div>兼臣昨任福州，已系远地，迎侍不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173025_comment'></div>即今老母多病，见在京师，人子之谊，晨昏之恋，固难茍止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173025_comment'></div>二者于臣之分，实为迫切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173025_comment'></div>如臣合当避亲，臣不敢陈乞在京差遣，只乞对移陈、蔡一郡，许臣暂至京师，迎侍老母赴任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173025_comment'></div>使臣仰得就日月之光，俯得伸犬马之养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173025_comment'></div>今臣幸蒙恩诏移守亳州，如臣所请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173025_comment'></div>况亳州去京不远，欲乞许臣暂至京师，迎侍老母赴任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173025_comment'></div>臣见已交割讫，发离前来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173025_comment'></div>所有回降朝旨，乞降至泗州付臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173025_comment'></div>谨具状奏闻，候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1173025_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
绍兴
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='c2b5c65ab8b0495d823408b60a38cc4b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c2b5c65ab8b0495d823408b60a38cc4b");'><span id='c2b5c65ab8b0495d823408b60a38cc4b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1071')">1069-1071年</a>，51-53岁</div><div id='c2b5c65ab8b0495d823408b60a38cc4b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年冬</a>　曾巩作《越州鉴湖图序》<div id='poem_1173161' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173161' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173161?labeling=true' target='_blank'>越州鉴湖图序<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁二年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173161")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173161_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173161'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173161'>鉴湖，一曰南湖，南并山，北属州城、漕渠，东西距江，汉顺帝永和五年，会稽太守马臻之所为也，至今九百七十有五年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173161_comment'></div>其周三百五十有八里，凡水之出于东南者皆委之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173161_comment'></div>州之东，自城至于东江，其北堤石橽二，阴沟十有九，通民田，田之南属漕渠，北东西属江者皆溉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173161_comment'></div>州之东六十里，自东城至于东江，其南堤阴沟十有四，通民田，田之北抵漕渠，南并山，西并堤，东属江者皆溉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173161_comment'></div>州之西三十里，曰柯山斗门，通民田，田之东并城，南并堤，北滨漕渠，西属江者皆溉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173161_comment'></div>总之，溉山阴、会稽两县十四乡之田九千顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173161_comment'></div>非湖能溉田九千顷而已，盖田之至江者尽于九千顷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173161_comment'></div>其东曰曹娥斗门，曰稿口斗门，水之循南堤而东者，由之以入于东江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173161_comment'></div>其西曰广陵斗门，曰新径斗门，水之循北堤而西者，由之以入于西江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173161_comment'></div>其北曰朱储斗门，去湖最远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173161_comment'></div>盖因三江之上、两山之间，疏为二门，而以时视田中之水，小溢则纵其一，大溢则尽纵之，使入于三江之口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173161_comment'></div>所谓湖高于田丈馀，田又高海丈馀，水少则泄湖溉田，水多则泄田中水入海，故无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173161", 1173161, "Clauses/56/Comments/1")'>荒废</span>之田、水旱之岁者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173161_comment'></div>繇汉以来几千载，其利未尝废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173161_comment'></div>宋兴，民始有盗湖为田者，祥符之间二十七户，庆历之间二户，为田四顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173161_comment'></div>当是时，三司转运司犹下书切责州县，使复田为湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173161_comment'></div>然自此吏益慢法，而奸民浸起，至于治平之间，盗湖为田者凡八千馀户，为田七百馀顷，而湖废几尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173161_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173161", 1173161, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>仅存</span>者，东为漕渠，自州至于东城六十里，南通若耶溪，自樵风泾至于桐坞，十里皆水，广不能十馀丈，每岁少雨，田未病而湖盖已先涸矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173161_comment'></div>自此以来，人争为计说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173161_comment'></div>蒋堂则谓宜有罚以禁侵耕，有赏以开告者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173161_comment'></div>杜杞则谓盗湖为田者，利在纵湖水，一雨则放声以动州县，而斗门辄发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173161_comment'></div>故为之立石则水，一在五云桥，水深八尺有五寸，会稽主之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173161_comment'></div>一在跨湖桥，水深四尺有五寸，山阴主之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173161_comment'></div>而斗门之钥，使皆纳于州，水溢则遣官视则，而谨其闭纵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173161_comment'></div>又以谓宜益理堤防斗门，其敢田者拔其苗，责其力以复湖，而重其罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173161_comment'></div>犹以为未也，又以谓宜加两县之长以提举之名，课其督察而为之殿最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173161_comment'></div>吴奎则谓每岁农隙，当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1173161", 1173161, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>僦人</span>浚湖，积其泥涂以为丘阜，使县主役，而州与转运使、提点刑狱督摄赏罚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173161_comment'></div>张次山则谓湖废，仅有存者，难卒复，宜益广<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1173161", 1173161, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>漕路</span>及他便利处，使可漕及注民田里，置石柱以识之，柱之内禁敢田者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173161_comment'></div>刁约则谓宜斥湖三之一与民为田，而益堤使高一丈，则湖可不开，而其利自复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173161_comment'></div>范师道、施元长则谓重侵耕之禁，犹不能使民无犯，而斥湖与民，则侵者孰御？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173161_comment'></div>又以湖水较之，高于城中之水，或三尺有六寸，或二尺有六寸，而益堤壅水使高，则水之败城郭庐舍可必也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173161_comment'></div>张伯玉则谓日役五千人浚湖，使至五尺，当十五岁毕，至三尺，当九岁毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173161_comment'></div>然恐工起之日，浮议外摇，役夫内溃，则虽有智者，犹不能必其成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173161_comment'></div>若日役五千人，益堤使高八尺，当一岁毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173161_comment'></div>其竹木之费，凡九十二万有三千，计越之户二十万有六千，赋之而复其租，其势易足，如此，则利可坐收，而人不烦弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173161_comment'></div>陈宗言、赵诚复以水势高下难之，又以谓宜修吴奎之议，以岁月复湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173161_comment'></div>当是时，都水善其言，又以谓宜增赏罚之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173161_comment'></div>其为说如此，可谓博矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173161_comment'></div>朝廷未尝不听用而著于法，故罚有自钱三百至于千，又至于五万，刑有自杖百至于徒二年，其文可谓密矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173161_comment'></div>然而田者不止而日愈多，湖不加浚而日愈废，其故何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173161_comment'></div>法令不行，而茍且之俗胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173161_comment'></div>昔谢灵运从宋文帝求会稽回踵湖为田，太守孟顗不听，又求岯崲湖为田，顗又不听，灵运至以语诋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173161_comment'></div>则利于请湖为田，越之风俗旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173161_comment'></div>然南湖繇汉历吴、晋以来，接于唐，又接于钱镠父子之有此州，其利未尝废者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173161_comment'></div>彼或以区区之地当天下，或以数州为镇，或以一国自王，内有供养禄廪之须，外有贡输问遗之奉，非得晏然而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173161_comment'></div>故强水土之政以力本利农，亦皆有数，而钱镠之法最详，至今尚多传于人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173161_comment'></div>则其利之不废，有以也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173161_comment'></div>近世则不然，天下为一，而安于承平之故，在位者重举事而乐因循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173161_comment'></div>而请湖为田者，其语言气力往往足以动人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173161_comment'></div>至于修水土之利，则又费材动众，从古所难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173161_comment'></div>故郑国之役，以谓足以疲秦，而西门豹之治邺渠，人亦以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1173161", 1173161, "Clauses/208/Comments/0")'>烦苦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173161_comment'></div>其故如此，则吾之吏孰肯任难当之怨，来易至之责，以待未然之功乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173161_comment'></div>故说虽博而未尝行，法虽密而未尝举，田者之所以日多，湖之所以日废，繇是而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173161_comment'></div>故以谓法令不行，而茍且之俗胜者，岂非然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173161_comment'></div>夫千岁之湖，废兴利害，较然易见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173161_comment'></div>然自庆历以来三十馀年，遭吏治之因循，至于既废，而世犹莫寤其所以然，况于事之隐微难得而考者，繇茍简之故而弛坏于冥冥之中，又可知其所以然乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173161_comment'></div>今谓湖不必复者，曰湖田之入既饶矣，此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1173161", 1173161, "Clauses/233/Comments/0")'>游谈</span>之士为利于侵耕者言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1173161_comment'></div>夫湖未尽废，则湖下之田旱，此方今之害，而众人之所睹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1173161_comment'></div>使湖尽废，则湖之为田亦旱矣，此将来之害，而众人之所未睹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1173161_comment'></div>故曰此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1173161", 1173161, "Clauses/242/Comments/0")'>游谈</span>之士为利于侵耕者言之，而非实知利害者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1173161_comment'></div>谓湖不必复者，曰益堤壅水而已，此好辨之士为乐闻茍简者言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1173161_comment'></div>夫以地势较之，壅水使高，必败城郭，此议者之所已言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1173161_comment'></div>以地势较之，浚湖使下，然后不失其旧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1173161_comment'></div>不失其旧，然后不失其宜，此议者之所未言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1173161_comment'></div>又山阴之石则为四尺有五寸，会稽之石则几倍之，壅水使高，则会稽得尺，山阴得半，地之洼隆不并，则益堤未为有补也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1173161_comment'></div>故曰此好辨之士为乐闻茍简者言之，而又非实知利害者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1173161_comment'></div>二者既不可用，而欲禁侵耕，开告者，则有赏罚之法矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1173161_comment'></div>欲谨水之畜泄，则有闭纵之法矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1173161_comment'></div>欲痛绝敢田者，则拔其苗，责其力以复湖，而重其罚，又有法矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1173161_comment'></div>或欲任其责于州县与转运使、提点刑狱，或欲以每岁农隙浚湖，或欲禁田石柱之内者，又皆有法矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1173161_comment'></div>欲知浚湖之浅深，用工若干，为日几何；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1173161_comment'></div>欲知增堤竹木之费几何，使之安出；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1173161_comment'></div>欲知浚湖之泥涂积之何所，又已计之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1173161_comment'></div>欲知工起之日，或浮议外摇，役夫内溃，则不可以必其成，又已论之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1173161_comment'></div>诚能收众说而考其可否，用其可者，而以在我者润泽之，令言必行，法必举，则何功之不可成，何利之不可复哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1173161_comment'></div>巩初蒙恩通判此州，问湖之废兴于人，未有能言利害之实者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1173161_comment'></div>及到官，然后问图于两县，问书于州与河渠司，至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1173161", 1173161, "Clauses/306/Comments/0")'>参核</span>之而图成，熟究之而书具，然后利害之实明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1173161_comment'></div>故为论次，庶夫计议者有考焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1173161_comment'></div>熙宁二年冬卧龙斋。</div><div id='poem_sentence_77_1173161_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　曾巩作《越州贺提刑夏倚状》<div id='poem_1173112' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173112' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173112?labeling=true' target='_blank'>越州贺提刑夏倚状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173112")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173112_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173112'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173112'>右巩启：伏审祗奉诏封，荣分使节，伏惟庆惬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173112_comment'></div>伏以提刑屯田抱材精敏，涵德粹温，文章为国之光华，治行乃时之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173112", 1173112, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>表则</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173112_comment'></div>辍于朝著，处以使台，士望蔼然，时名籍甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173112_comment'></div>官用视年之丰耗，已实仓储；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173112_comment'></div>邦刑以世而重轻，伫清<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173112", 1173112, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>狱系</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173112_comment'></div>使仁声之既洽，则嚚讼之可无，然后入奉命书，进升法从，在于公议，实允舆情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173112_comment'></div>巩于此备官，云初托庇，喜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173112", 1173112, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>趋风</span>之甚迩，谅考履之惟和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173112_comment'></div>更冀副上倚毗，顺时调护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173112_comment'></div>其为祷颂，曷究敷陈。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1173112_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　曾巩作《贺转运状》<div id='poem_1173113' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173113' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173113?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺转运状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173113")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173113_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173113'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173113'>伏审祗奉诏封，就更使节，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173113_comment'></div>伏以运使司封受材闳远，植性粹冲，风猷为世之表仪，治行乃时之轨则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173113_comment'></div>果用详刑之最，来分将漕之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173113_comment'></div>威名已动于连城，惠术行周于比户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173113_comment'></div>岂止调<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173113", 1173113, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>盈虚</span>于岁计，内足邦储；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173113_comment'></div>方且知缓急于人情，下流主泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173113_comment'></div>然后进陪侍从，入奉询谋，在公论以犹稽，实舆诚之所系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173113_comment'></div>巩备官于此，托庇云初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173113_comment'></div>将承望于馀光，但欣愉于懦思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173113_comment'></div>属祈寒之在序，谅福履之保和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173113_comment'></div>敢冀上为朝廷，善调兴寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173113_comment'></div>祷颂之至，叙述奚周。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1173113_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_0_1173357_comment'></div>曾大父讳某，大父讳某，父讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173357_comment'></div>嫁同县陈氏，为秘书省著作佐郎讳某之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173357_comment'></div>为人柔嫕静庄，在父母家至归于夫氏，本于自修，而卒于能孚于属人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173357_comment'></div>陈氏有姒妇，寡居当家事，夫人常曲意下之，于事常退避不敢与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173357_comment'></div>姒妇以其故，顾夫人甚欢，而亲疏观者莫不悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173357_comment'></div>著作有田数千亩，而爱士好施，夫人常悉力助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173357_comment'></div>以其故至不能自给，而夫人处之自若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173357_comment'></div>遇子之非己出者，与己子无毫发厚薄意，人以为过人，而夫人若有所不及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173357_comment'></div>享年三十有五，封德清县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173357_comment'></div>子曰枢，为尚书屯田员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173357_comment'></div>曰楷，曰权，未仕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173357_comment'></div>卒于庆历五年之二月辛丑，葬于熙宁三年之三月庚申，其墓在长兴县永昌乡卞山之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173357_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1173357'>嗟淑人，体明德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173357_comment'></div>外惟均，内自克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173357_comment'></div>不永年，陨嫔则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173357_comment'></div>兆亲宫，藏石刻。</div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　曾巩作《请访问高丽世次札子》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年10月</a>　曾巩撰《馆阁送钱纯老知婺州诗序》<div id='poem_1173164' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173164' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173164?labeling=true' target='_blank'>馆阁送钱纯老知婺州诗序<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁三年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173164")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173164_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173164'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173164'>熙宁三年三月，尚书司封员外郎、秘阁校理钱君纯老出为婺州，三馆秘阁同舍之士相与饮饯于城东佛舍之观音院，会者凡二十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173164_comment'></div>纯老亦重僚友之好，而欲慰处者之思也，乃为诗二十言以示坐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173164_comment'></div>于是在席人各取其一言为韵，赋诗以送之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173164_comment'></div>纯老至州，将刻之石，而以书来曰：「为我序之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173164_comment'></div>盖朝廷常引天下文学之士，聚之馆阁，所以长养其材而待上之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173164_comment'></div>有出使于外者，则其僚必相告语，择都城之中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173164", 1173164, "Clauses/18/Comments/1")'>广宇</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173164", 1173164, "Clauses/18/Comments/2")'>丰堂</span>、游观之胜，约日皆会，饮酒赋诗，以叙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173164", 1173164, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>去处</span>之情，而致绸缪之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173164_comment'></div>历世浸久，以为故常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173164_comment'></div>其从容道义之乐，盖他司所无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173164_comment'></div>而其赋诗之所称引况谕，莫不道去者之美，祝其归仕于王朝，而欲其无久于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173164_comment'></div>所以见士君子之风流习尚，笃于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173164", 1173164, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>相先</span>，非世俗之所能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173164_comment'></div>又将待上之考信于此，而以其汇进，非空文而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173164_comment'></div>纯老以明经进士制策入等，历教国子生，入馆阁为编校书籍、校理检讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173164_comment'></div>其文章学问有过人者，宜在天子左右与访问，任献纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173164_comment'></div>而顾请一州，欲自试于川穷山阻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173164", 1173164, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>僻绝</span>之地，其志节之高，又非凡材所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173164_comment'></div>此赋诗者所以推其贤，惜其去，殷勤反复而不能已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173164_comment'></div>余故为之序其大旨，以发明士大夫之公论，而与同舍视之，使知纯老之非久于外也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173164_comment'></div>十月□日序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1173164_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年11月</a>　曾巩兄曾晔之子曾觉卒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年冬</a>　曾巩作《贺杭州赵资政冬状》<div id='poem_1173114' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173114' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173114?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺杭州赵资政冬状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173114")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173114_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173114'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173114'>右巩启：窃以布律而候，气萌动于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173114", 1173114, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>黄宫</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173114_comment'></div>立表以须，景长至于南极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173114_comment'></div>伏惟知府资政受材闳廓，含德粹纯，壮经国之大猷，济格天之盛业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173114_comment'></div>履兹令序，茂集休祺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173114_comment'></div>典册衮衣，伫履三公之位；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173114_comment'></div>旂常鼎鼐，当传万世之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173114_comment'></div>巩祗服冠箴，远违门著，素积依归之望，弥深<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173114", 1173114, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>祷颂</span>之勤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1173114_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　曾巩作《过高士坊》<div id='poem_220198' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220198' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_220198'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220198'>一亩萧然绝世喧，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_220198", 220198, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>抗怀</span>那肯就笼樊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220198_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220198'>功名晚更为馀事，灾异初尝出至言。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220198_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220198'>郡阁已空徐孺榻，里人犹识郑公门。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220198_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220198_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　曾巩有《徐復传》<div id='poem_1173318' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173318' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173318?labeling=true' target='_blank'>徐复传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173318")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173318_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173318'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173318'>徐复字希颜，兴化军莆田人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173318_comment'></div>尝举进士，不中，去，不复就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173318_comment'></div>博学，于书无所不读，尤通星历五行数术之说，世罕有能及者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173318_comment'></div>为人倜傥有大志，内自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173318", 1173318, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>饬励</span>，不求当世之誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173318_comment'></div>乐其所自得，谓富贵不足慕也，贫贱不足忧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173318_comment'></div>故穷阎漏屋、敝衣粝食、或至于不能自给，未尝动其意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173318_comment'></div>遇人无少长贵贱，皆尽恭谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173318_comment'></div>其言前世因革兴坏是非之理，人少能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173318_comment'></div>然其家未尝畜书，盖其强记如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173318_comment'></div>康定中，李元昊叛，诏求有文武材可用者，参知政事宋绶、天章阁侍读林瑀皆荐复，诏赐装钱，州郡迫趣上道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173318_comment'></div>既至，仁宗见复于崇政殿，访以世务，复所为上言者，世莫得闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173318_comment'></div>仁宗因命讲《易》《乾》、《坤》、《既济》、《未济》，又问今岁直何卦？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173318_comment'></div>西兵欲出如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173318_comment'></div>复对岁直《小过》，而太一守中宫，兵宜内不宜外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173318_comment'></div>仁宗善其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173318_comment'></div>复又献所为《边防策》、《太一主客立成历》、《洪范论》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173318_comment'></div>上曰：「卿所献书，为卿留中」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173318_comment'></div>必欲官之，复固辞，乃官其子晞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173318_comment'></div>留复登闻鼓院，与林瑀同修《周易会元纪》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173318_comment'></div>岁馀，固求东归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173318_comment'></div>仁宗高其行，礼以束帛，赐号「冲晦处士」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173318_comment'></div>复久游吴，因家杭州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173318_comment'></div>州牧每至，必先加礼，然复未尝肯至公门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173318_comment'></div>范仲淹知杭州，数就复访问，甚礼重之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173318_comment'></div>仲淹尝言西兵既起，复预言罢兵岁月；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173318_comment'></div>又斗牛间尝有星变，复言吴当大疫，死者数十万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173318_comment'></div>后皆如其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173318_comment'></div>复平居以《周易》、《太玄》授学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173318_comment'></div>人或劝复著书，复曰：「古圣贤书已具，顾学者不能求，吾复何为，以徼名后世哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173318_comment'></div>晚取其所为文章尽焚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173318_comment'></div>今其家有书十馀篇，皆出于门人故旧之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173318_comment'></div>复卒时，年七十馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173318_comment'></div>既病，故人王稷居睦州，欲往省之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173318_comment'></div>复报曰：「来以五六月之交，尚及见子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173318_comment'></div>稷未及往，至期，复果已死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173318_comment'></div>其终事皆预自处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173318_comment'></div>子晞，年五十馀，亦致仕，官至国子博士，复赠尚书虞部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173318_comment'></div>复死十馀年，而沈遘知杭州，榜其居曰「高士坊」云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173318_comment'></div>赞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1173318'>复之文章，存者有《慎习赞》、《困蒙养》等篇，归于退求诸己，不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1173318", 1173318, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>矜世取宠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173318_comment'></div>余论次复事，颇采其意云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173318_comment'></div>若复自拔污浊之中，隐约于闾巷，久而不改其操，可谓乐之者已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1173318_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　柳子玉至越，曾巩与之游，相从半岁。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　晁补之随父适越，从曾巩游。<br id='poem_sentence_4_220246_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　曾巩作《送赵资政》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　曾巩有书致强至，强至复书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　曾巩岳父晁宗恪与夫人合葬于扬州江都县之广陵乡，曾巩撰《光禄少卿晁公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173376' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173376' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173376?labeling=true' target='_blank'>光禄少卿晁公墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁四年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173376")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173376_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173376'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173376'>公姓晁氏，其先家济州之钜野，今为开封祥符人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173376_comment'></div>皇考讳遘，尚书驾部员外郎，赠开府仪同三司、吏部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173376_comment'></div>皇祖讳佺，赠太傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173376_comment'></div>皇曾祖讳宪，赠某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173376_comment'></div>公讳宗恪，字世恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173376_comment'></div>少以世父太子少保、赠某官、谥文元、讳迥恩，补将作监簿，十四迁至光禄少卿，历监单州应天府酒税，知苏州之常熟、婺州之兰溪县事，通判安州、杭州事，知通州、虔州，提点广南东路刑狱公事，又知信州、泉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173376_comment'></div>享年六十有三，熙宁二年某月某甲子卒于官，四年某月某甲子，与其夫人某县君闾丘氏合葬于扬州江都县之广陵乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173376_comment'></div>公为人乐易慈恕，寡言笑，人不见其喜怒，遇事果于有为，人亦罕能及者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173376_comment'></div>其为常熟，修学校，理沟防，人赖其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173376_comment'></div>为兰溪，绳奸字穷，境内和洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173376_comment'></div>通判安州，州政待公而决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173376_comment'></div>通判杭州，州将矜己自肆，上下莫能变，公徐与之论可否，语平而气和，将畏且从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173376_comment'></div>由是，上下倚公以治，至今杭人称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173376_comment'></div>其为虔州，州近盐，多盗与讼，公至，修弛废，督奸强，威信盛行，盗不敢发，而狱无系囚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173376_comment'></div>及在广南，其用法常宽，而欲人自避，曰治有先后缓急者，谓此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173376_comment'></div>其视部吏，孜孜恐失一善，而恶人亦莫敢犯公法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173376_comment'></div>其为通判如广南，为信州、泉州如虔州，所至人皆安公之政，而去常思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173376_comment'></div>盖公之行己居官而见于事者如此，而其大抵则于仁厚最隆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173376_comment'></div>母张氏，寿安县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173376_comment'></div>子男二人，曰仲景，海州司理参军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173376_comment'></div>曰仲孺，试将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173376_comment'></div>孙男三人，曰端复，曰端俨，皆太庙斋郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173376_comment'></div>曰某，未仕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173376_comment'></div>女六人，长适太常博士、集贤校理曾巩，铭公墓者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173376_comment'></div>次适某官刘某、某官高元振、某官燕若济，今存惟燕氏妇，馀早世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173376_comment'></div>闾丘夫人为身治家皆应仪度，卒于公殁之明年某月某甲子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173376_comment'></div>公殁，家无馀财，而仲景、仲孺皆谨厚自刻厉，能世其先人，于是又知公之教行于其家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173376_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1173376'>晁世来西，大自文元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173376_comment'></div>有卿有公，继属绵绵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173376_comment'></div>曰卿谓谁？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173376_comment'></div>时维光禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173376_comment'></div>作其德音，光于外服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173376_comment'></div>其光伊何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173376_comment'></div>有善自身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173376_comment'></div>匪饰匪雕，璞玉之纯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173376_comment'></div>治有恩威，时其张弛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173376_comment'></div>彼畏此怀，吾宁一理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173376_comment'></div>于虔于泉，于岭之南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173376_comment'></div>里安户扰，罔有不咸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173376_comment'></div>宜寿而昌，胡不百龄？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173376_comment'></div>尚兹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1173376", 1173376, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>介祉</span>，维后之成。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1173376_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　曾巩撰《祭晁少卿文》<div id='poem_1173392' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173392' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173392?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭晁少卿文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173392")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173392_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173392'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173392'>巩蚤以孤，蒙与托<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173392", 1173392, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>嘉好</span>，自始迄今，逾二十载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173392_comment'></div>缱绻相与，义厚情亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173392_comment'></div>会合乖阔，则有书问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173392_comment'></div>开纸披辞，犹若际遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173392_comment'></div>不意今者，公遽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173392", 1173392, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>沦亡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173392_comment'></div>得讣歔欷，涕随声发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173392_comment'></div>海滨独哭，心与谁言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173392_comment'></div>仍闻归旐，旅次馀杭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173392_comment'></div>隔此涛江，寓陈薄奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173392_comment'></div>公乎知否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173392_comment'></div>已矣奈何！</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173392_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　曾巩为越州通判，虽政不专出，而州赖以治。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　四五月间，曾巩改知齐州军州事。<br /></div>

-----title
济南
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='11c27bc1624f4fc886c465a61fbf5261_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("11c27bc1624f4fc886c465a61fbf5261");'><span id='11c27bc1624f4fc886c465a61fbf5261_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　曾巩作《代宋敏求绛州谢到任表》<div id='poem_1172980' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172980' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172980?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代宋敏求知绛州谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172980")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172980_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172980'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172980'>伏奉敕命，差知绛州军州事，已于某月某日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172980_comment'></div>备官无效，窃宠过优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172980_comment'></div>尚联清近之班，仍获安閒之幸<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172980_comment'></div>伏念臣器非闳远，性不敏明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172980_comment'></div>徒嗜好于文章，寖推移于岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172980_comment'></div>滥名儒馆，接武朝绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172980_comment'></div>与釐坰牧之蕃，参莅神州之剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172980_comment'></div>进闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1172980", 1172980, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>邦计</span>，出假<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1172980", 1172980, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>使符</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172980_comment'></div>会仁祖之升遐，图信书之示后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172980_comment'></div>起于衰病，寄以讨论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172980_comment'></div>旋跻右史之华，遂冒西垣之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172980_comment'></div>惟兹典礼，属在奉常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172980_comment'></div>猥用滞蒙，首当总领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172980_comment'></div>悉心谋虑，虽务竭于愚忠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172980_comment'></div>妄意变通，遂自乖于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1172980", 1172980, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>素论</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172980_comment'></div>实干昭宪，奚逭严科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172980_comment'></div>荷屈法以申恩，止夺官而补外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172980_comment'></div>罪浮于罚，惭溢于颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172980_comment'></div>何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1172980", 1172980, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>侥冒</span>之使然，实<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1172980", 1172980, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>矜全</span>之有自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172980_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下乾刚独断，坤厚兼容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172980_comment'></div>躬亲庶政，而炤之以明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172980_comment'></div>付用群材，而养之以恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172980_comment'></div>故俾兼荣于近侍，尚容窃食于外邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172980_comment'></div>仰戴生成，将安补报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172980_comment'></div>敢不服勤夙夜，期练达于政经；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1172980_comment'></div>延见吏民，以布宣于上德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1172980_comment'></div>庶收来效，少答鸿私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1172980_comment'></div>仰望阙庭，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1172980_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年6月</a>　曾巩作《齐州谢到任表》<div id='poem_1172951' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172951' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172951?labeling=true' target='_blank'>齐州谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172951")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172951_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172951'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172951'>伏奉敕命，就差知齐州军州事，已于今月十六日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172951_comment'></div>顾以诸生，备兹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1172951", 1172951, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>烦使</span>，据非其所，惧不克堪<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172951_comment'></div>伏念臣素乏他长，偶知好学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172951_comment'></div>议先王之制作，尝究本原；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172951_comment'></div>论夫子之文章，颇探阃奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172951_comment'></div>历事圣君于三世，与游儒馆者十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172951_comment'></div>不知苟曲以取容，但信<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1172951", 1172951, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>朴愚</span>而自守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172951_comment'></div>比缘私计，请贰外藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172951_comment'></div>嗟疾病之馀生，困米盐之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1172951", 1172951, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>细务</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172951_comment'></div>方指期于满岁，将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1172951", 1172951, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>垂翼</span>于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1172951", 1172951, "Clauses/22/Comments/1")'>故栖</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172951_comment'></div>遽此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1172951", 1172951, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>外迁</span>，处之剧郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172951_comment'></div>维般阳之列壤，实季崱之遗区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172951_comment'></div>习诈而夸，著流风于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1172951", 1172951, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>在昔</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172951_comment'></div>多盗与讼，号难治于当今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172951_comment'></div>比试用于此邦，必咨求于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1172951", 1172951, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>强吏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172951_comment'></div>盖因能而任官者不违其分，则量力而受位者得竭其材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172951_comment'></div>岂伊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1172951", 1172951, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>儒懦</span>之资，可副<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1172951", 1172951, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>浩烦</span>之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172951_comment'></div>恐殚精思，无补<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1172951", 1172951, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>毫分</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172951_comment'></div>然而由积累以冒恩，实养成之有自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172951_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下智周万物，明照四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172951_comment'></div>在疏远污贱之中，而察其所守；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172951_comment'></div>无左右游谈之助，而知其所长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172951_comment'></div>故令覆露之仁，及此滞蒙之质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172951_comment'></div>敢不无忘夙夜，勉尽疲驽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172951_comment'></div>行归于周，久自安于直道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1172951_comment'></div>老当益壮，誓无易于初心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1172951_comment'></div>仰望阙庭，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1172951_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1172951'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷二七。又见《曾文定公集》卷一○，清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷二八，道光《济南府志》卷六五。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1172951_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　曾巩作《进奉熙宁四年明堂绢状》<div id='poem_1173009' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173009' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173009?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进奉熙宁四年明堂绢状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173009")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173009_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173009'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173009'>祀而严配，王国之上仪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173009_comment'></div>助者骏奔，人臣之常奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173009_comment'></div>前件物，实之用篚，旅以造庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173009_comment'></div>阻就列以陪祠，庶将心于拱极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173009_comment'></div>载循僭冒，伏积震惶。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1173009_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　曾巩作《贺熙宁四年明堂礼毕大赦表》<div id='poem_1172958' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172958' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172958?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺熙宁四年明堂礼毕大赦表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172958'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172958'>今月十三日，枢密院递到赦书一道，以宗祀明堂礼毕，大赦天下者，臣已即时集军州官吏将校等宣布讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172958_comment'></div>伏以奉承圣考，升配上天，秩盛礼于法宫，推大恩于率土<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172958_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下有聪明好古之质，有恭俭爱人之诚，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1172958", 1172958, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>兢畏</span>万几，仔肩一德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172958_comment'></div>燔柴<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1172958", 1172958, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>展报</span>，既昭告于元功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172958_comment'></div>严父致隆，又推明于极孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172958_comment'></div>越成釐事，均布鸿休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172958_comment'></div>草木昆虫，皆令受赐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172958_comment'></div>华夏蛮貊，莫不归仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172958_comment'></div>臣心系北辰，身縻东土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172958_comment'></div>永怀故事，难求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1172958", 1172958, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>汶上</span>之图；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172958_comment'></div>独远清尘，方叹《<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1172958", 1172958, "Clauses/28/Comments/2")'>周南</span>》之滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172958_comment'></div>想望旒扆，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1172958_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　曾巩兄曾晔之子曾觉葬于南丰龙池乡之源头，曾巩撰《亡侄韶州军事判官墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173375' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173375' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173375?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亡侄韶州军事判官墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁四年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173375")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173375_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173375'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173375'>觉姓曾氏，吾兄之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173375_comment'></div>吾先人六子，吾兄讳晔为最长，有材而不试以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173375_comment'></div>觉自少则励志，力学问，知道理，善于属文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173375_comment'></div>及长，慨然慕有为于世，不肯碌碌，为人恭谨，循循寡言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173375_comment'></div>治平二年及进士第，为吉州司法参军，有能吏名，用荐者为韶州军事判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173375_comment'></div>行至虔州得疾，卒于驿舍，熙宁三年十一月己丑日也，年三十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173375_comment'></div>觉字道济，建昌军南丰人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173375_comment'></div>王考讳易占，太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173375_comment'></div>曾王考讳致尧，尚书户部郎中直史馆，赠右谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173375_comment'></div>觉母李氏，妻邓氏、夏氏、范氏，有子修偃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173375_comment'></div>熙宁四年八月壬申葬于南丰龙池乡之源头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173375_comment'></div>吾哀其若将有成也，而止于斯，故为铭其墓曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1173375'>德累则厚，方济而陨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173375_comment'></div>材引则达，未试而泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173375_comment'></div>志弃不获，谁云非闵？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173375_comment'></div>墓石有文，尚永来信。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1173375'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1173375_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　二月作州北水门，三月完工，曾巩作《齐州北水门记》<div id='poem_1173303' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173303' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173303?labeling=true' target='_blank'>齐州北水门记<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁五年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173303")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173303_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173303'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173303'>济南多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173303", 1173303, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>甘泉</span>，名闻者以十数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173303_comment'></div>其酾而为渠，布道路民庐官寺，无所不至，潏潏分流，如深山长谷之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173303_comment'></div>其汇而为渠，环城之西北，故北城之下疏为门以泄之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173303_comment'></div>若岁水溢，城之外流潦暴集，则常取荆苇为蔽，纳土于门，以防外水之入，既弗坚完，又劳且费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173303_comment'></div>至是始以库钱买石，僦民为工，因其故门，累石为两涯，其深八十尺，广三十尺，中置<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173303", 1173303, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>石楗</span>，析为二门，扃皆用木，视水之高下而闭纵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173303_comment'></div>于是内外之水，禁障<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173303", 1173303, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>宣通</span>，皆得其节，人无后虞，劳费以熄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173303_comment'></div>其用工始于二月庚午，而成于三月丙戌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173303_comment'></div>董役者，供备库副使、驻泊都监张如纶，右侍禁、兵马监押伸怀德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173303_comment'></div>二人者，欲后之人知作之自吾三人者始也，来请书，故为之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173303_comment'></div>是时熙宁五年壬子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173303_comment'></div>太常博士充集贤校理、知齐州军事曾巩记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173303_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　曾巩作《谢熙宁五年历日表》<div id='poem_1172964' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172964' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172964?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢熙宁五年历日表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172964")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172964_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172964'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172964'>进奏院递到宣头一道，伏蒙圣恩，赐臣熙宁五年历日一卷者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172964_comment'></div>窃以振举旧章，推明新历，欲谨天时之正，俾谐人事之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172964_comment'></div>藐是孤生，与均宠锡<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172964_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下力行大道，惇叙彝伦，赞天地而平四时，理阴阳而成万物，爰兹颁朔，咸暨有邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172964_comment'></div>臣敢不深究土风，详求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1172964", 1172964, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>气序</span>，躬劝耕桑之业，辅成<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1172964", 1172964, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>坯冶</span>之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172964_comment'></div>仰望阙庭，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1172964_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　孔武仲(字常父）从曾巩学。<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_title_1173422' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173422?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泰山谢雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span
