id='poem_title_1173422_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173422'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173422'>臣愚行为时之所背，言为时之所轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173422_comment'></div>寡俦少和，𦕈𦕈茕茕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173422_comment'></div>奇于人而如此，敢望信于冥冥？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173422_comment'></div>属东辕而进谒，托斯文而荐诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173422_comment'></div>眷齐鲁之旧邦，依大镇之峥嵘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173422_comment'></div>苦旱魃之方骄，忧岁事之不登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173422_comment'></div>民且瘠于沟壑，或椎埋而死兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173422_comment'></div>冀聪明之响答，霈膏雨之宵零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173422_comment'></div>言丁宁而上诉，心𢠵恍而潜惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173422_comment'></div>顾不能以谐世，将何动夫威灵！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173422_comment'></div>乃不知夫神与道而为徒，虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173422", 1173422, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>窅默</span>而难明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173422_comment'></div>其虚心也，物有来而必应；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173422_comment'></div>其公听也，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173422", 1173422, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>憎爱</span>之常情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173422_comment'></div>彼大虽自大，小虽谓小，吾与善而已矣，常一视而持平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173422_comment'></div>故微衷得以上彻，利泽为之旁行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173422_comment'></div>或噫为风，或震为霆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173422_comment'></div>隐然雷出，霭然云蒸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173422_comment'></div>洒甘霪以兼夕，灭害气于无形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173422_comment'></div>盖西极于甸服，东属乎沧溟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173422_comment'></div>人盈其望，物遂其生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173422_comment'></div>黍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1173422", 1173422, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>芃芃</span>而擢秀，粟薿薿而敷荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173422_comment'></div>使时沴遂熄，年功可成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173422_comment'></div>人食丰乎钟釜，神祀衍乎粢盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173422_comment'></div>民相安于田里，吏无用于威刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173422_comment'></div>信大恩之莫报，而至德之难名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173422_comment'></div>愚所以意激而感深者，方涉世之零丁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173422_comment'></div>荷降鉴之不昧，知忠信之可凭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173422_comment'></div>敢因辞以进谢，愧抽思之非精。</div><div href='/Writing/1173385?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭欧阳少师文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1173385'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173385'>惟公学为儒宗，材不世出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173385_comment'></div>文章逸发，醇深炳蔚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173385_comment'></div>体备<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173385", 1173385, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>韩马</span>，思兼庄屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173385_comment'></div>垂光简编，焯若星日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173385_comment'></div>绝去刀尺，浑然天质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173385_comment'></div>辞穷卷尽，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173385", 1173385, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>含意</span>未卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173385_comment'></div>读者心醒，开蒙愈疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173385_comment'></div>当代一人，顾无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173385", 1173385, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>俦匹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173385_comment'></div>谏垣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173385", 1173385, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>抗议</span>，气震<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173385", 1173385, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>回遹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173385_comment'></div>鼓行无前，跋疐非恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173385_comment'></div>世伪难胜，孤坚竟窒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173385_comment'></div>紫微玉堂，独当大笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173385_comment'></div>二典三谟，生明藏室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173385_comment'></div>顿挫弥厉，诚纯志壹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173385_comment'></div>斟酌损益，论思得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173385_comment'></div>经体虑萌，沃心造膝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173385_comment'></div>帝曰汝贤，引登辅弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173385_comment'></div>公在庙堂，尊明道术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173385_comment'></div>清静简易，仁民爱物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173385_comment'></div>敛不烦苛，令无迫猝，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173385", 1173385, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>栖置</span>木索，里安户逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173385_comment'></div>椟敛兵革，天清地谧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173385_comment'></div>日进昌言，从容<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173385", 1173385, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>密勿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173385_comment'></div>开建国本，情忠力悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173385_comment'></div>卯未之岁，龙驾飙𣤛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173385_comment'></div>再拯大艰，垂绅秉笏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173385_comment'></div>乾坤正位，上下有秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173385_comment'></div>功被社稷，等夷召毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173385_comment'></div>公在庙堂，总持<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1173385", 1173385, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>纪律</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173385_comment'></div>一用公直，两忘猜昵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173385_comment'></div>不挟朋比，不虞讪嫉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173385_comment'></div>独立不回，其刚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1173385", 1173385, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>仡仡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173385_comment'></div>爱养人材，奖成诱掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173385_comment'></div><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_32_1173385_comment'></div>以为己任，无有废咈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173385_comment'></div>维公平生，恺悌忠实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173385_comment'></div>内外<span "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>初终</span>若一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173385_comment'></div>年始六十，恳辞冕黻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173385_comment'></div>连章累岁，乃俞所乞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173385_comment'></div>放意丘樊，脱遗羁絷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173385_comment'></div>沉浸图史，左右琴瑟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173385_comment'></div>气志浩然，不陋蓬荜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173385_comment'></div>意谓百龄，重休累吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173385_comment'></div>还斡鼎轴，赞微计密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173385_comment'></div>云胡倾殂，憖遗则弗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173385_comment'></div>闻讣失声，眦泪横溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173385_comment'></div>戆冥不敏，早蒙振拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173385_comment'></div>言由公诲，行由公率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173385_comment'></div>戴德不酬，怀情独郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173385_comment'></div>西望轜车，莫持纼绋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173385_comment'></div>维公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1173385", 1173385, ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　曾巩作《丰年有高廪》<div id='poem_220319' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220319' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_220284'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220284'>沙草正黄濒海意，江梅还白故园情。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220284_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220284'>循除远水春前急，绕郭空山雪后明。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220284_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220284'>林影易斜寒日短，角声吹去暮云平。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220284_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220284'>最惭佳客忘形契，肯伴衰翁著屐行。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220284_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='/Writing/220176?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冬夜即事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220176")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220176_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220176'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220176'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_220176", 220176, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>印奁</span>封罢阁铃闲，喜有秋毫免素餐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220176'>市粟易求仓廪实，邑狵无警里闾安。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220176'>香清一榻氍毹暖，月淡千门霿凇寒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220176'>闻说丰年从此始，更回<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_220176", 220176, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>笼烛</span>卷帘看<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220176'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_220176'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_220176_0'>⑴ 齐寒甚，夜气如雾，凝于木上，旦起视之如雪，日出飘满阶庭，尤为可爱，齐人谓之霿凇。谚曰：“霿凇重霿凇，穷汉置饭瓮。”以为丰年之兆。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_220176_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　曾巩作《雾淞》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　曾巩撰《刑部郎中致仕王公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173329' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173329' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173329?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刑部郎中致仕王公墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁五年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173329")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173329_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173329'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173329'>君讳逵，字仲达，家晋阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173329_comment'></div>其谱云：隋文中子通之后，唐季避乱家濮阳，故今为濮阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173329_comment'></div>曾祖考温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173329_comment'></div>祖考名犯濮王讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173329_comment'></div>考翰，赠尚书工部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173329_comment'></div>君幼学于母史氏，聪警绝人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173329_comment'></div>及长，学于侍御史高弁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173329_comment'></div>天禧三年及进士第，为广济军司理参军，母丧去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173329_comment'></div>姜遵知永兴军府事，取君主万年簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173329_comment'></div>万年令免官，君行令事，大去旧弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173329_comment'></div>王文康公代遵，与安抚使王沿、转运使李纮皆荐君宜令万年，诏特以为试秘书省校书郎知县事，后不得为例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173329_comment'></div>晏殊为三司使，奏君为三司检法官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173329_comment'></div>李咨代殊，会天圣十年掖庭火，咨任公具材用治宫室，五日而用足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173329_comment'></div>仁宗闻而嘉之，迁秘书省著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173329_comment'></div>王鬷知益州，取君佥书节度判官厅公事，迁秘书丞，通判益州事，迁太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173329_comment'></div>新都里胥捕罪人杀之，狱具当死，君求得其情，为奏谳，里胥得不死，蜀人以为德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173329_comment'></div>入为开封府推官，赐绯衣银鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173329_comment'></div>府史冯士元家富，善阴谋，广市邸舍女妓，以啖诸贵人，一时多与之亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173329_comment'></div>会士元有罪系狱，君治之，竟其事，及诸贵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173329_comment'></div>以其故多得罪去者，或谓君祸始此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173329_comment'></div>君笑曰：「吾知去恶人耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173329_comment'></div>出为湖南路转运使，蛮人归附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173329_comment'></div>迁尚书祠部员外郎，坐小法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173329_comment'></div>知虔州、池州、福州、扬州、江南西路转运按察使，迁尚书刑部员外郎，按知洪州卞咸抵其罪，改荆湖北路转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173329_comment'></div>初，谏官李京尝奏君某事，及是，京以言事斥监鄂州税，闻君至，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1173329", 1173329, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>移病</span>不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173329_comment'></div>君要谕之曰：「前事君职也，于吾何负哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173329_comment'></div>卒与之欢甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173329_comment'></div>京死，又力赒京家，而奏官其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173329_comment'></div>改河东转运使，赐紫衣金鱼，坐小法，知光州，逾月迁尚书兵部员外郎，知徐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173329_comment'></div>是时山东大饥，君所活数万人，收遗骸为十二冢葬之，亦数万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173329_comment'></div>是时富丞相弼为京东东路安抚使，自为文祭其冢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173329_comment'></div>明年，迁尚书工部郎中、淮南转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173329_comment'></div>岁饥，又多所全活。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173329_comment'></div>就加直昭文馆，知越州、浙东兵马钤辖，迁尚书刑部郎中，判刑部，加直龙图阁、知荆南府荆湖北路兵马钤辖，浚渠为水利，又开新河通漕，公私便之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173329_comment'></div>请知兖州，坐法免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173329_comment'></div>起知金州，提举兖州景灵宫，知莱州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173329_comment'></div>迁尚书兵部郎中，知西京留司御史台，提举崇福宫，皆不赴，遂乞致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173329_comment'></div>居郓州，熙宁五年四月癸亥终于郓州昭庆坊之私第，享年八十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173329_comment'></div>有文集五十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173329_comment'></div>君娶朱氏、贾氏、高氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173329_comment'></div>高氏封长安县君，其父弁，君所从学者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173329_comment'></div>皆先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173329_comment'></div>有子五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173329_comment'></div>子骏，卫尉寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173329_comment'></div>子渊，郓州寿张主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173329_comment'></div>子建，河南伊阙尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173329_comment'></div>子皋、子英，未仕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173329_comment'></div>女七人，适蕲州黄梅令李纲、尚书职方员外郎马渊、右班殿直侍其圭、进士程行、大理寺丞刘士邵、邓州穰县主簿李毅、进士张伉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173329_comment'></div>君为人志意<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1173329", 1173329, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>广博</span>，好智谋奇计，欲以功名自显，不肯碌碌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173329_comment'></div>所至威令大行，远近皆震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173329_comment'></div>然当是时，天下久平，世方谨绳墨，蹈规矩，故其材不得尽见于事，而以其故，亦多龃龉，至老益穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173329_comment'></div>然君在撼顿颠疐之中，志气弥厉，未尝有忧戚不堪之色，盖人所不能及者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173329_comment'></div>君尤笃于好善，一时与之游者，皆当世豪杰、知名之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173329_comment'></div>若予者，亦君之所厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173329_comment'></div>故君之葬，其子来属以铭，而予不得辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173329_comment'></div>君葬于其卒之岁某月某甲子，而墓在郓州之某乡某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1173329_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_1173329'>维特材，志横出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1173329_comment'></div>世拘牵，困羁絷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1173329_comment'></div>见事为，万之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1173329_comment'></div>形则潜，名不没<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1173329_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_60_1173329'>原无「弼」字，据元刻本、《读书记》、顾校本、章校本、吴校本、傅校本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1173329_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173329'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_59_1173329_0'>⑴ 《元丰类稿》卷四二。又见《曾文定公集》卷一三，《文章正宗》续集卷九。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1173329_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　曾巩作《祭王逵龙图文》<div id='poem_1173386' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173386' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173386?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭王逵龙图文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173386")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173386_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173386'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173386'>惟公有独立之志，不羁之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173386_comment'></div>扬旌闽楚，按节江淮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173386_comment'></div>止如山渊，动若风雷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173386_comment'></div>众皆异其施设，曾孰测其津涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173386_comment'></div>若夫拯急难于水火，下隽杰于蒿莱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173386_comment'></div>越拘挛而不惑，岂浅狭之能偕？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173386_comment'></div>至于称物引类，兴言寓怀，远参骚雅，近杂嘲谐，丽兼组藻，美轶琼瑰，皆足以声驾多士，望隆九陔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173386_comment'></div>然而位不过郎中，名不过直阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173386_comment'></div>流落白头，委蛇一壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173386_comment'></div>岂人事之当然，信命存于冥漠？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173386_comment'></div>昏愚不肖，早辱公知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173386_comment'></div>拊循爱勉，施及其私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173386_comment'></div>闻公之逝，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173386", 1173386, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>恻楚</span>歔欷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173386_comment'></div>戴德莫酬，寓荐以辞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1173386_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　曾巩撰《殿中丞致仕王君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173341' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173341' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173341?labeling=true' target='_blank'>殿中丞致仕王君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173341")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173341_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173341'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173341'>君讳某，字某，其先琅邪人，尝徙家于蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173341_comment'></div>至君之考，又徙家于扬，故今为扬之江都人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173341_comment'></div>曾祖讳锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173341_comment'></div>祖讳得中，为真定府获鹿县令，赠尚书刑部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173341_comment'></div>考讳汝能，为尚书都官郎中，赠尚书工部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173341_comment'></div>君少以父任为太庙斋郎，养其父，不忍一日去左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173341_comment'></div>至<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173341", 1173341, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>卒丧</span>，年已四十馀，始出为南剑州司户参军，历监剑州银铜场、和州司户参军，用荐者监颍州税，去为越州山阴县尉、滑州录事参军、随州唐城县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173341_comment'></div>其为银铜场，冶者复业，而岁课大溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173341_comment'></div>为尉能发<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173341", 1173341, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>奸偷</span>，为录事能治狱不挠，为令能有惠爱于人，其试于事者如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173341_comment'></div>其为人，居家孝友，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173341", 1173341, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>遇人</span>和易质厚，不为聪明机巧以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173341", 1173341, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>哗世动俗</span>，故知之者少，而君亦自若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173341_comment'></div>至年七十，遂上书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173341", 1173341, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>还政</span>，迁太子中舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173341_comment'></div>今上即位，恩迁殿中丞，赐绯衣银鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173341_comment'></div>卒于熙宁五年之五月甲辰，年七十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173341_comment'></div>以其年十月乙酉葬于江都之东兴宁乡马坊里，以其配永嘉县君周氏祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173341_comment'></div>有子二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173341_comment'></div>曰几，大理寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173341_comment'></div>曰深，润州丹徒县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173341_comment'></div>皆有文行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173341_comment'></div>能世其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173341_comment'></div>有女一人，嫁陆氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173341_comment'></div>有孙男二人，孙女二人，尚幼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173341_comment'></div>寺丞娶余之仲妹，以书来乞君之墓铭，余不能辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173341_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1173341'>养心以和，动己以直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173341_comment'></div>不为世巧，安于自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173341_comment'></div>显不在躬，实诒尔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173341_comment'></div>欲鸿厥声，勒铭于此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1173341_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　曾巩作《与北京韩侍中启二首》<div id='poem_1173088' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173088' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173088?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与北京韩侍中启<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173088")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173088_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173088'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173088'>右巩启：伏念巩顾以诸生，守兹剧郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173088_comment'></div>抚敝封之云始，望仁境以非遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173088_comment'></div>恨无羽翼之飞驰，与操几杖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173088_comment'></div>欲以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173088", 1173088, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>缄縢</span>之托寓，聊布腹心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173088_comment'></div>然而治狱讼之浩烦，振纪纲之弛坏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173088_comment'></div>觉形劳而少暇，信材短以难周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173088_comment'></div>致是恳诚，稽于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173088", 1173088, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>进达</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173088_comment'></div>属高秋之在序，惟坐镇之多馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173088_comment'></div>必有祯祺，来宁动履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173088_comment'></div>伏以留守司徒太师侍中蓍龟四海，柱石三朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173088_comment'></div>有太平之功，周公之所以勤王室；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173088_comment'></div>有纯一之德，伊尹之所以格皇天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173088_comment'></div>固已书在宗彝，藏之盟府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173088_comment'></div>而乃以退为进，处上用谦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173088_comment'></div>自避远于烦机，久淹回于外服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173088_comment'></div>宜从<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173088", 1173088, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>岩石</span>之望，趣正衮衣之归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173088_comment'></div>敢冀上为宗祊，善绥寝餗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1173088_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1173089' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173089' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173089?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173089_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173089'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173089'>巩启：伏念巩习吏非长，得州最剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173089_comment'></div>耗神明于簿领，疲精思于追胥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173089_comment'></div>尚恃馀庥，幸无旷事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173089_comment'></div>然而塞茅心而已甚，饰竿牍以未遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173089_comment'></div>故魂爽虽骛于门闳，而候问不通于幕府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173089_comment'></div>仰繄明恕，终赐矜容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173089_comment'></div>今者北土早霜，晏阴始肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173089_comment'></div>伏惟顺天时之常序，养浩气之至和，神明所依，福禄来萃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173089_comment'></div>恭以司徒太师侍中股肱三世，龟鉴四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173089_comment'></div>勤劳著于邦家，功德施于社稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173089_comment'></div>方且敛嘉谋于一面，郁群望者五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173089_comment'></div>郭令之系安危，素形公论；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173089_comment'></div>周公之为左右，宜冠本朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173089_comment'></div>华夏蛮貊之倾心，昆虫草木之望赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173089_comment'></div>岂伊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173089", 1173089, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>蕞质</span>，独注微诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173089_comment'></div>伏惟上为宗祊，善调寝餗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1173089_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年11月</a>　会朝廷变法，曾巩于齐州推行有方，民用不扰。为州去民疾苦，急奸强盗贼而宽贫弱。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《贺北京留守韩侍中正旦状》<div id='poem_1173115' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173115' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173115?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺北京留守韩侍中正旦状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173115")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173115_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173115'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173115'>右巩启：伏以岁起于东，茂对三阳之盛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173115_comment'></div>物生于震，聿开万化之端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173115_comment'></div>伏惟某官行应中和，道含纯粹，属四方之系望，简三后之眷怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173115_comment'></div>德为民彝，故称宗庙之器；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173115_comment'></div>功在王室，是为社稷之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173115_comment'></div>顺履昌期，具膺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173115", 1173115, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>繁祉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173115_comment'></div>伫奉承于典册，复登翊于岩廊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173115_comment'></div>巩限守印章，阻趋墙屏，仰望威重，不任祷颂之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1173115_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年春</a>　春，集役浚黄河，齐州当出役二万，曾巩以组织有方，省费数倍。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《正月六日雪霁》作品：《正月六日雪雾》<div id='poem_220105' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220105' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220105?labeling=true' target='_blank'>正月六日雪霁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_220105'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220105'>雪消山水见精神，满眼东风送早春。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220105_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220105'>明日杏园应烂熳，便须期约看花人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220105_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220105'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_220105_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《雪后》<div id='poem_220283' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220283' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220283?labeling=true' target='_blank'>雪后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220283")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220283_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220283'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220283'>雪景鲜妍犹弄色，柳条葱茜已抽萌。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220283_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220283'>风光苒苒流双毂，人事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220283", 220283, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>悠悠</span>寄一枰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220283_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220283'>射羿未应今独有，嘲雄何必史能评？<div id='poem_sentence_2_220283_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220283'>且将画诺供谈笑，更选名园载酒行。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220283_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220283'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220283_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《席上》<div id='poem_220140' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220140' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220140?labeling=true' target='_blank'>席上</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220140")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_220140_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220140'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220140'>市井萧条烟火微，两衙散后雪深时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220140'>若无一曲传金盏，争奈衰翁两鬓丝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220140'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_220140_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《和陈郎中》<div id='poem_220215' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220215' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220215?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和陈郎中</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220215")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220215_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220215'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220215'>材薄安时甘寂寞，身闲乘兴喜登临。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220215_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220215'>每寻香草牵狂思，曾向幽兰费苦吟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220215_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220215'>明月几人非按剑，高山从古少知音。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220215_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220215'>数篇清绝赓歌意，默见冯唐异俗心。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220215_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220215'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220215_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《寄顾子敦》<div id='poem_220277' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220277' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220277?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄顾子敦</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220277")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220277_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220277'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220277'>清旷亭边雁欲回，南湖分浪入城来。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220277'>空山过腊犹藏雪，野岸先春已放梅。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220277'>三径未归聊自适，一尊寻胜每同开。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220277'>如今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_220277", 220277, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>试想</span>长松下，玉麈高谈岂易陪？<div id='poem_sentence_3_220277_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220277'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220277_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年2月</a>　曾巩作《齐州杂诗序》<div id='poem_1173165' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173165' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173165?labeling=true' target='_blank'>齐州杂诗序<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁六年二月己丑）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173165")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173165_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173165'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173165'>齐故为文学之国，然亦以朋比誇诈见于习俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173165_comment'></div>今其地富饶，而介于河岱之间，故又多狱讼，而豪猾群党亦往往喜相攻剽贼杀，于时号难治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173165_comment'></div>余之疲驽，来为是州，除其奸强而振其弛坏，去其疾苦而抚其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173165", 1173165, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>善良</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173165_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173165", 1173165, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>未期</span>囹圄多空，而枹鼓几熄，岁又连熟，州以无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173165_comment'></div>故得与其士大夫及四方之宾客，以其暇日，时游后园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173165_comment'></div>或长轩峣榭，登览之观，属思千里；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173165_comment'></div>或芙蕖芰荷，湖波渺然，纵舟上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173165_comment'></div>虽病不饮酒，而閒为小诗，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173165", 1173165, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>娱情</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173165", 1173165, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>写物</span>，亦拙者之适也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173165_comment'></div>通儒大人，或与余有旧，欲取而视之，亦不能隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173165_comment'></div>而青、郓二学士又从而和之，士之喜文辞者，亦继为此作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173165_comment'></div>总之凡若干篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173165_comment'></div>岂得以余文之陋，而使夫宗工<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173165", 1173165, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>秀人</span>雄放<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173165", 1173165, "Clauses/37/Comments/1")'>瑰绝</span>可喜之辞不大传于此邦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173165_comment'></div>故刻之石而并序之，使览者得详焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173165_comment'></div>熙宁六年二月己丑序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1173165_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年2月</a>　曾巩作《齐州二堂记》<div id='poem_1173302' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173302' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173302?labeling=true' target='_blank'>齐州二堂记<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁六年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173302")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173302_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173302'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173302'>齐滨泺水，而初无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>使客</span>之馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173302_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>使客</span>至，则常发民调林木为舍以寓，去则撤之，既费且陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173302_comment'></div>乃为之徙官之废屋，为二堂于泺水之上以舍客，因考其山川而名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173302_comment'></div>盖《史记·五帝纪》谓：「舜耕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/10/Comments/1")'>历山</span>，渔雷泽，陶河滨，作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>什器</span>于寿丘，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/14/Comments/1")'>就时</span>于负夏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173302_comment'></div>郑康成释：「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>历山</span>在河东，雷泽在济阴，负夏，卫地」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173302_comment'></div>皇甫谧释：「寿丘在鲁东门之北」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173302_comment'></div>「河滨，济阴定陶西南陶丘亭是也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173302_comment'></div>以予考之，耕稼陶渔，皆舜之初，宜同时，则其地<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>不宜</span>相远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173302_comment'></div>二家所释雷泽、河滨、寿丘、负夏，皆在鲁、卫之间，地相望，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>历山</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/32/Comments/1")'>不宜</span>独在河东也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173302_comment'></div>《孟子》又谓舜东夷之人，则陶、渔在济阴，作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>什器</span>在鲁东门，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>就时</span>在卫，耕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>历山</span>在齐，皆东方之地，合于《孟子》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173302_comment'></div>按图记，皆谓《禹贡》所称雷首山在河东，妫水出焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173302_comment'></div>而此山有九号，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>历山</span>其一号也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173302_comment'></div>予观《虞书》及《五帝纪》，盖舜娶尧之二女乃居妫汭，则耕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>历山</span>盖不同时，而地亦当异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173302_comment'></div>世之好事者，乃因妫水出于雷首，迁就附益，谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>历山</span>为雷首之别号，不考其实矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173302_comment'></div>由是言之，则图记皆谓齐之南山为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>历山</span>，舜所耕处，故其城名历城，为信然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173302_comment'></div>今泺上之北堂，其南则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>历山</span>也，故名之曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>历山</span>之堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173302_comment'></div>按图，泰山之北，与齐之东南诸谷之水，西北汇于黑水之湾，又西北汇于柏崖之湾，而至于渴马之崖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173302_comment'></div>盖水之来也众，其北折而西也，悍疾尤甚，及至于崖下，则泊然而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173302_comment'></div>而自崖以北，至于历城之西，盖五十里，而有泉涌出，高或至数尺，其旁之人名之曰趵突之泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173302_comment'></div>齐人皆谓尝有弃糠于黑水之湾者，而见之于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173302_comment'></div>盖泉自渴马之崖，潜流地中，而至此复出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173302_comment'></div>趵突之泉冬温，泉旁之蔬甲经冬常荣，故又谓之温泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173302_comment'></div>其注而北，则谓之泺水，达于清河，以入于海，舟之通于齐者皆于是乎出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173302_comment'></div>齐多甘泉，冠于天下，其显名者以十数，而色味皆同，以予验之，盖皆泺水之旁出者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173302_comment'></div>泺水尝见于《春秋》，鲁桓公十有八年，公及齐侯会于泺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173302_comment'></div>杜预释：在历城西北，入济水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173302_comment'></div>然济水自王莽时不能被河南，而泺水之所入者清河也，预盖失之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173302_comment'></div>今泺上之南堂，其西南则泺水之所出也，故名之曰泺源之堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173302_comment'></div>夫理<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173302", 1173302, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>使客</span>之馆，而辨其山川者，皆太守之事也，故为之识，使此邦之人尚有考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173302_comment'></div>熙宁六年二月己丑记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1173302_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173302'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷一九。又见《曾文定公集》卷八，安刻《南丰曾先生文粹》卷六，《皇朝文鉴》卷八○，《文章正宗》续集卷一二，《齐乘》卷一、二，《文章辨体汇选》卷六○六，《八代文钞》第三二册，《名山胜概记》卷三四、三五，《明一统志》卷二二，《古今图书集成》坤舆典卷三四、职方典卷二○五、职方典卷二六九、山川典卷二○五、考工典卷七○，雍正《山东通志》卷三五之一九，雍正《山西通志》卷二四，乾隆《蒲州府志》卷二，道光《济南府志》卷六五（以上部份书题《趵突泉记》）。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173302_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年2月</a>　曾巩作《谢熙宁六年历日表》<div id='poem_1172965' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172965' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172965?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢熙宁六年历日表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172965")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172965_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172965'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172965'>进奏院递到宣头一道，熙宁六年历日一卷赐臣收管者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172965_comment'></div>一与外符之寄，再蒙班历之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172965_comment'></div>久矣去朝，幸兹拜赐<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172965_comment'></div>窃以天地阴阳之动，不得违时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172965_comment'></div>虫鱼草木之生，必皆有政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172965_comment'></div>故兹告朔，宜布有邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172965_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下兢慎万几，协谐五纪，式谨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1172965", 1172965, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>王正</span>之授，俾知民事之常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172965_comment'></div>臣敢不动静详观，夙宵祗奉，庶召和平之气，用裨化育之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172965_comment'></div>臣不任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1172965_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《咏柳》<div id='poem_220122' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220122' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220122?labeling=true' target='_blank'>咏柳</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220122")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_220122_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220122'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220122'>乱条犹未变初黄，倚得东风势便狂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220122'>解把飞花蒙日月，不知天地有清霜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220122'></div><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173426_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173426'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173426'>去岁之旱，有请于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173426_comment'></div>蒙畀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173426", 1173426, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>嘉泽</span>，田则大稔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173426_comment'></div>今春河役，发民二万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173426_comment'></div>更迭赍送，众又倍之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173426_comment'></div>盖此齐人，出者几半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173426_comment'></div>迨其反室，维夏之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173426_comment'></div>劳费既深，又违穑事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173426_comment'></div>夫民数载，乃遇一稔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173426_comment'></div>敝之如此，其几尚完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173426_comment'></div>今二麦方包，而亢阳为虐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173426_comment'></div>吏任其咎，所不敢逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173426_comment'></div>惟民何辜，赖神终惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173426_comment'></div>能致云雨，则实在神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173426_comment'></div>尚其念之，故敢以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173426_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1173426_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《祭张唐公文》<div id='poem_1173387' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173387' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173387?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭张唐公文<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁六年六月一日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173387")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173387_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173387'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173387'>维公作德于躬，实方实厚，实夷实吁，实坚实茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173387_comment'></div>彼嗜而争，我有不惑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173387_comment'></div>彼妩为朋，我肆而特。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173387_comment'></div>我抗其辞，维彼之默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173387_comment'></div>始烨其华，儒林礼官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173387_comment'></div>乃硕其实，侍从之班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173387_comment'></div>维帝时咨，维士时附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173387_comment'></div>尚其昌言，式久在序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173387_comment'></div>告疾于朝，乃长南服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173387_comment'></div>里无叹声，士女辑穆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173387_comment'></div>以老得谢，俶其归装。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173387_comment'></div>车御未驱，讣闻四方，维余先人，公同年友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173387_comment'></div>公子我侄，又托婚媾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173387_comment'></div>实肴于豆，实酒于觞，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173387", 1173387, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>驰辞</span>告诚，维以永伤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1173387_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　舅朱延之卒，曾巩撰《天长朱君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173378' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173378' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173378?labeling=true' target='_blank'>天长朱君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173378")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173378_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173378'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173378'>君姓朱氏，讳延之，字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173378_comment'></div>其先彭城人，今家于扬州之天长县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173378_comment'></div>曾祖某，赠尚书右仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173378_comment'></div>祖某，赠尚书工部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173378_comment'></div>考某，赠太子中舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173378_comment'></div>母贾氏，某县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173378_comment'></div>君年若干，卒于熙宁六年六月之丙申，葬于某年某月之某甲子，其墓在天长之同人乡秦兰里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173378_comment'></div>君聪明敏悟，少力学问，为文章，数就进士试，不合，乃叹曰：「与其屈于人，孰若肆吾志哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173378_comment'></div>因不复言仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173378_comment'></div>方是时，朱氏世以仕宦显于淮南，君居其家，尤孝谨慈良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173378_comment'></div>然与人，非其意不肯苟合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173378_comment'></div>既果于自为，而其治见于家者，规画<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173378", 1173378, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>纤悉</span>备具，推之知其可任以事，然卒于无所遇，君亦未尝不自得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173378_comment'></div>君少孤，养母母之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173378_comment'></div>父死岁久，其丧寓于远，贫不能归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173378_comment'></div>君居穷经营，卒能使之返葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173378_comment'></div>及晚而饶财，又能乐赈施，人以此多君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173378_comment'></div>君娶沈氏，谏议大夫立之女，早卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173378_comment'></div>再妻王氏，殿中丞鼎臣之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173378_comment'></div>子男四人，寅、万、广、寓，皆有学行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173378_comment'></div>女五人，许嫁进士满希远、太庙斋郎马某，馀尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173378_comment'></div>君，余舅也，故为之铭其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173378_comment'></div>其辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1173378'>势不云泰，志则非屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173378_comment'></div>彼毂之丹，岂易吾仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173378_comment'></div>廪有馀粟，及里与邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173378_comment'></div>藏有图书，遗其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173378_comment'></div>己则无憾，尚畀后人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173378_comment'></div>识美幽堂，日远弥新。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1173378_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年9月</a>　九月，曾巩去齐，州人遮留，夜乘间乃得去。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　吕升卿求曾巩过失，无所得。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩徙知襄州军州事，作《离齐州后五首》<div -----title
襄阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='21d9a512b766493d8601890db926f3ad_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("21d9a512b766493d8601890db926f3ad");'><span id='21d9a512b766493d8601890db926f3ad_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1075')">1073-1075年</a>，55-57岁</div><div id='21d9a512b766493d8601890db926f3ad' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《襄州谢到任表》<div id='poem_1172952' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172952' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172952?labeling=true' target='_blank'>襄州谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172952")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172952_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172952'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172952'>伏奉敕命，就差权知襄州，已于今月二十七日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172952_comment'></div>缘同气之私恩，陈便亲之微志，就更善郡，得侍安舆<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172952_comment'></div>伏念臣素坚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>向学</span>之心，幸遇好文之主，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>备名</span>儒馆，十有三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172952_comment'></div>然而三易<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>外邦</span>，五回星岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172952_comment'></div>比亦再过于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>双阙</span>，未尝一对于清光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172952_comment'></div>常存<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>倾藿</span>之诚，虽知向日；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172952_comment'></div>居有戴盆之势，何以望天？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172952_comment'></div>而臣昨治济南，最为烦剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172952_comment'></div>野有群行之盗，里多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>武断</span>之豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172952_comment'></div>驯致<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>肃清</span>，始熄凶残之害；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172952_comment'></div>自强柔懦，颇殚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>竭蹙</span>之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172952_comment'></div>今者获就安閒，少休<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>疲钝</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172952_comment'></div>出观美俗，尤多《汉广》之高；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172952_comment'></div>入奉慈颜，不悯《汝坟》之瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172952_comment'></div>兹为窃冒，厥有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>端原</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172952_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>奖引</span>士伦，推崇世教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172952_comment'></div>小艺片言之善，偏长<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>一曲</span>之材，皆欲养成，未尝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>弃废</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172952_comment'></div>故令<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>优佚</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1172952", 1172952, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>宣明</span>上德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172952_comment'></div>永念沉碑之旧，自顾何功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172952_comment'></div>未忘投博之勤，庶几小补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172952_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1172952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩知襄，能出观美俗，入奉慈颜。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《回枢密侍郎状》<div id='poem_1173118' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173118' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173118?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回枢密侍郎状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173118'>右巩启：伏念巩久兹外补，利在退藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173118_comment'></div>一切不为京师之书，以此亦疏左右之问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173118_comment'></div>分当弃置，理绝收怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173118_comment'></div>岂期尚记于姓名，特赐亲纡于翰墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173118_comment'></div>处大寒而不变，乃知松柏之坚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173118_comment'></div>兼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173118", 1173118, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>庶类</span>而并容，则维江汉之广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173118_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173118", 1173118, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>孤怀</span>易感，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173118", 1173118, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>重谊</span>难忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173118_comment'></div>但<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173118", 1173118, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>注仰</span>于门阑，实镂铭于肺腑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173118_comment'></div>今者景风扇物，畏日御躔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173118_comment'></div>伏惟襄赞万机，顺膺百福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173118_comment'></div>敢觊上为邦国，善保寝兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173118_comment'></div>祷颂之诚，指陈难既。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1173118_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《回亳州知府谏议状》<div id='poem_1173119' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173119' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173119'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173119'>右巩启：伏念自违墙屏，浸易岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173119_comment'></div>比潜伏于外邦，久弃捐于人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173119_comment'></div>虽向往之意不暂弭忘，而参候之勤至于旷绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173119_comment'></div>敢谓曲敦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173119", 1173119, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>雅旧</span>，尚记庸虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173119_comment'></div>赐劳问于华笺，致<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173119", 1173119, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>恩勤</span>于亲笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173119_comment'></div>文如黼藻，加一字以为荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173119_comment'></div>操若松筠，贯四时而不改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173119_comment'></div>以惭且感，欲报奚言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173119_comment'></div>今者窃审固避机衡，出临屏翰，始敢沥茅心之至恳，具竿牍之常仪，少赎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173119", 1173119, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>旷疏</span>，觊蒙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173119", 1173119, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>开察</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173119_comment'></div>盖天时之迭运，属眷令之方行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173119_comment'></div>伏惟开阁之初，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173119", 1173119, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>偃藩</span>甚乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173119_comment'></div>休有神明之助，茂臻福履之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173119_comment'></div>镇抚名城，暂屈承流之寄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173119_comment'></div>旋归宰路，伫膺图旧之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173119_comment'></div>更惟上为宗祊，善调寝餗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173119_comment'></div>祷颂之至，但切下情。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1173119_comment'></div></div></div><br class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173120_comment'></div>文辞烂然，意气勤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173120_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173120", 1173120, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>德心</span>之大，遗名秩以自谦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173120_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173120", 1173120, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>士品</span>之微，顾材资而安称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173120_comment'></div>其为佩服，曷罄指陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173120_comment'></div>急景云初，祈寒将盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173120_comment'></div>伏惟遵道途之易，询采于风谣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173120_comment'></div>恭以运使郎中材足兼人，志存及物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173120_comment'></div>出高明之庆族，接熙洽之盛期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173120_comment'></div>通班于朝，揭节而使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173120_comment'></div>自簿书期会之纤悉，莫不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173120", 1173120, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>注心</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173120_comment'></div>至山岩窟穴之幽深，举皆受赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173120_comment'></div>足以救一时之敝，故能得万事之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173120_comment'></div>休声所归，远用行及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173120_comment'></div>伏惟遵时之顺，养气以恬，庶允舆人之情，不违拙者之望。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1173120_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩在襄，以长渠约束上司农，曾巩撰《襄州宜城县长渠记》<div id='poem_1173304' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173304' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173304?labeling=true' target='_blank'>襄州宜城县长渠记<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁八年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173304")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173304_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173304'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173304'>荆及康狼，楚之西山也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173304_comment'></div>水出二山之间，东南而流，春秋之世曰鄢水，左丘明《传》，鲁桓公十有三年，楚屈瑕伐罗，及鄢，乱次以济是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173304_comment'></div>其后曰夷水，《水经》所谓汉水又南过宜城县东，夷水注之是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173304_comment'></div>又其后曰蛮水，郦道元所谓夷水避桓温父名，改曰蛮水是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173304_comment'></div>秦昭王二十八年，使白起将，攻楚，去鄢百里，立堨，壅是水为渠以灌鄢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173304_comment'></div>鄢，楚都也，遂拔之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173304_comment'></div>秦既得鄢，以为县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173304_comment'></div>汉惠帝三年，改曰宜城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173304_comment'></div>宋孝武帝永初元年，筑宜城之大堤为城，今县治是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173304_comment'></div>而更谓鄢曰故城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173304_comment'></div>鄢入秦，而白起所为渠因不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173304_comment'></div>引鄢水以灌田，田皆为沃壤，今长渠是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173304_comment'></div>长渠至宋至和二年，久隳不治，而田数苦旱，川饮者无所取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173304_comment'></div>令孙永曼叔率民田渠下者，理渠之坏塞，而去其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173304", 1173304, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>浅隘</span>，遂完故堨，使水还渠中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173304_comment'></div>自二月丙午始作，至三月癸未而毕，田之受渠水者，皆复其旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173304_comment'></div>曼叔又与民为约束，时其蓄泄，而止其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173304", 1173304, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>侵争</span>，民皆以为宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173304_comment'></div>盖鄢水之出西山，初弃于无用，及白起资以祸楚，而后世顾赖其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173304_comment'></div>郦道元以谓溉田三千馀顷，至今千有馀年，而曼叔又举众力而复之，使并渠之民，足食而甘饮，其馀粟散于四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173304_comment'></div>盖水出于西山诸谷者其源广，而流于东南者其势下，至今千有馀年，而山川高下之形势无改，故曼叔得因其故迹，兴于既废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173304_comment'></div>使水之源流与地之高下，一有易于古，则曼叔虽力，亦莫能复也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173304_comment'></div>夫水莫大于四渎，而河盖数徙，失禹之故道，至于济水，又王莽时而绝，况于众流之细，其通塞岂得而常？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173304_comment'></div>而后世欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173304", 1173304, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>行水</span>溉田者，往往务蹑古人之遗迹，不考夫山川形势古今之同异，故用力多而收功少，是亦其不思也欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173304_comment'></div>初，曼叔之复此渠，白其事于知襄州事张瑰唐公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173304_comment'></div>公听之不疑，沮止者不用，故曼叔能以有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173304_comment'></div>则渠之复，自夫二人者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173304_comment'></div>方二人者之有为，盖将任其职，非有求于世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173304_comment'></div>及其后言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1173304", 1173304, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>渠堨</span>者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1173304", 1173304, "Clauses/98/Comments/1")'>蜂出</span>，然其心盖或有求，故多诡而少实，独长渠之利较然，而二人者之志愈明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173304_comment'></div>熙宁六年，余为襄州，过京师，曼叔时为开封，访余于东门，为余道长渠之事，而诿余以考其约束之废举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173304_comment'></div>予至而问焉，民皆以谓贤君之约束，相与守之，传数十年如其初也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173304_comment'></div>予为之定著令，上司农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173304_comment'></div>八年，曼叔去开封，为汝阴，始以书告之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173304_comment'></div>而是秋大旱，独长渠之田无害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173304_comment'></div>夫宜知其山川与民之利害者，皆为州者之任，故予不得不书以告后之人，而又使之知夫作之所以始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173304_comment'></div>曼叔今为尚书兵部郎中，龙图阁直学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173304_comment'></div>八月丁丑曾巩记。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1173304'></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1173304_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《高邮逢人约襄阳之游》诗。<div id='poem_220478' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220478' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220478?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高邮逢人约襄阳之游</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220478")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_220478_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220478'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220478'>一川风月高邮夜，玉麈清谈画鹢舟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220478_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220478'>未把迂疏笑山简，更须同上习池游。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220478_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220478'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_220478_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　秋冬不雨，曾巩作《襄州岳庙祈雨文》<div id='poem_1173431' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173431' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173431?labeling=true' target='_blank'>襄州岳庙祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173431")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173431_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173431'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173431'>自秋不雨，方冬尚温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173431_comment'></div>麦田苦于旱乾，民室忧于病疠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173431_comment'></div>永惟责任，内集<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173431", 1173431, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>兢惭</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173431_comment'></div>惟神作镇岱宗，著灵南夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173431_comment'></div>敢沥由衷之恳，冀回降鉴之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173431_comment'></div>遂俾膏泽以时，祁寒式序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173431_comment'></div>畎亩克诸于丰富，里闾皆保于靖康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173431_comment'></div>尚其垂训，副此群望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173431_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1173431_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《大悲祈雨文》<div id='poem_1173430' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173430' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173430?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大悲祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173430")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173430_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173430'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173430'>惟岁孟冬，盛阳犹亢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173430_comment'></div>旱暵兹久，阴寒未兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173430_comment'></div>吏非循良，敢不任咎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173430_comment'></div>佛有慈惠，则宜降祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173430_comment'></div>是敢躬沥恳诚，虔祈觉荫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173430_comment'></div>俾风云之奋作，致雨雪之渐涵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173430_comment'></div>田亩顺成，里闾安辑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173430_comment'></div>仰期真理，俯徇舆情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173430_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1173430_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《襄州诸庙祈雨文》<div id='poem_1173429' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173429' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173429?labeling=true' target='_blank'>襄州诸庙祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173429")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173429_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173429'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173429'>今麦苗方出，而时泽尚愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173429_comment'></div>冬令以行，而寒气未应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173429_comment'></div>嗟吏治之不善，以奸阴阳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173429_comment'></div>惟神理之无方，能兴云雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173429_comment'></div>是用兢惭以任咎，蠲祓以乞灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173429_comment'></div>尚期降休，以答人望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173429_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1173429_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩撰《夫人曾氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173377' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173377' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173377?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夫人曾氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173377")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173377_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173377'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173377'>夫人，吾从女兄也，姓曾氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173377_comment'></div>沉静谨约，不妄笑言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173377_comment'></div>遇人一以恕，于其内外属之间，孝友慈顺，无不当于理，故与之处者皆爱，哭其死者皆哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173377_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173377_comment'></div>为女如是，足以知其贤，又足以知吾之祖考以来，教行于其家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173377_comment'></div>夫人考讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173377_comment'></div>王考讳某，尚书户部郎中、直史馆，赠右谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173377_comment'></div>曾王考讳某，尚书水部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173377_comment'></div>建昌军南丰人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173377_comment'></div>夫人嫁为同县朱君某之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173377_comment'></div>有子曰某，曰轼，以文行称于乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173377_comment'></div>有孙曰京，曰彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173377_comment'></div>京为真州司法参军、亳州教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173377_comment'></div>夫人享年若干，某年某月某甲子卒于寝，某年某月某甲子葬于南丰之某乡某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173377_comment'></div>将葬，轼以书来请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173377_comment'></div>余曰：「铭莫如余宜为」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173377_comment'></div>乃为其辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1173377'>女德在幽，而始人伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173377_comment'></div>《诗》有显扬，以立生民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173377_comment'></div>尚类于古，淑为夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173377_comment'></div>壸有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1173377", 1173377, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>彝则</span>，仔肩以身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173377_comment'></div>曾不蕃宠，畀其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173377_comment'></div>曾不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173377", 1173377, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>遐年</span>，善则长存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173377_comment'></div>维仲荐美，列辞墓门。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1173377_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　曾巩作《范贯之奏议集序》<div id='poem_1173157' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173157' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173157?labeling=true' target='_blank'>范贯之奏议集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173157")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173157_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173157'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173157'>尚书户部郎中、直龙图阁范公贯之之奏议，凡若干篇，其子世京集为十卷，而属予序之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173157_comment'></div>盖自至和已后十馀年间，公常以言事任职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173157_comment'></div>自天子、大臣至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173157", 1173157, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>群下</span>，自掖庭至于四方幽隐，一有得失善恶，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173157", 1173157, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>关于</span>政理，公无不极意反复，为上力言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173157_comment'></div>或矫拂情欲，或切劘计虑，或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173157", 1173157, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>辨别</span>忠佞而处其进退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173157_comment'></div>章有一再或至于十馀上，事有阴争独陈，或悉引谏官御史合议肆言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173157_comment'></div>仁宗常虚心采纳，为之变命令，更废举，近或立从，远或越月逾时，或至于其后，卒皆听用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173157_comment'></div>盖当是时，仁宗在位岁久，熟于人事之情伪与群臣之能否，方以仁厚清静<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173157", 1173157, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>休养</span>元元，至于是非与夺，则一归之公议，而不自用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173157_comment'></div>其所引拔以言为职者如公，皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173157", 1173157, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>一时之选</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173157_comment'></div>而公与同时之士，亦皆乐得其言，不曲从茍止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173157_comment'></div>故天下之情因得毕闻于上，而事之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173157", 1173157, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>害理</span>者常不果行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173157_comment'></div>至于奇邪恣睢，有为之者，亦辄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173157", 1173157, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>败悔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173157_comment'></div>故当此之时，常委事七八大臣，而朝政无大<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173157", 1173157, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>阙失</span>，群臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173157", 1173157, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>奉法</span>遵职，海内乂安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173157_comment'></div>夫因人而不自用者，天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173157_comment'></div>仁宗之所以其仁如天，至于享国四十馀年，能承太平之业者，繇是而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173157_comment'></div>后世得公之遗文，而论其本，见其上下之际相成如此，必将低回感慕，有不可及之叹，然后知其时之难得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173157_comment'></div>则公言之不没，岂独见其志，所以明先帝之盛德于无穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173157_comment'></div>公为人温良<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173157", 1173157, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>慈恕</span>，其从政<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1173157", 1173157, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>宽易</span>爱人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173157_comment'></div>及在朝廷，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173157", 1173157, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>危言正色</span>，人有所不能及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173157_comment'></div>凡同时与公有言责者，后多至大官，而公独早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173157_comment'></div>公讳师道，其世次、州里、历官、行事，有今资政殿学士赵公抃为公之墓铭云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1173157_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_sentence_3_1173388_comment'></div>兴其士友，跂我淳则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173388_comment'></div>微独考古，载辞于策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173388_comment'></div>亦从尔知，有婉军画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173388_comment'></div>为长以舒，为将不亟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173388_comment'></div>乃使荆粤，铨材著职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173388_comment'></div>灭熄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173388", 1173388, id='poem_sentence_13_1173388_comment'></div>孰云不幸，奄与生隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173388_comment'></div>有亲九十，世为楚恻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173388_comment'></div>维其笃行，匪矜匪饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173388_comment'></div>其彪为文，其霈为泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173388_comment'></div>天与厥后，贤能交蹠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173388_comment'></div>有实有华，光长誉白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173388_comment'></div>善岂无劝，庆焉兹得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173388_comment'></div>维我与公，绸缪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173388", 1173388, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>平昔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173388_comment'></div>诗书讨论，相求以益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173388_comment'></div>我试于乡，自公考择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173388_comment'></div>弥久弥亲，情隆意获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173388_comment'></div>闻公之讣，泫然心衋。<div class='inline' id='poem_content_1173168'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173168'>《茅君碑》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173168_comment'></div>三茅者，盈，太元真君；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173168_comment'></div>固，定录真君；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173168_comment'></div>衷，保命仙君，皆汉景帝中元间人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173168_comment'></div>盈天汉四年道成，至元帝初元五年来江左句曲之山，哀帝元寿二年乘云而去，至梁普通三年，五百四十四年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173168_comment'></div>固至孝元时拜执金吾卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173168_comment'></div>衷宣帝地节四年拜上郡太守、五更大夫，并解任还家修学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173168_comment'></div>成帝永始三年，固为定录真君，衷为保命仙君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173168_comment'></div>梁普通三年，道士张绎建此碑，孙文韬书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1173168_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript:
