id='poem_sentence_0_1173171_comment'></div>记一，参谋太子舍人甄济撰，判官彭朝议书，云「上元二年，山南东道节度使来瑱移井栏，置于襄州刺史官舍，故为记」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173171_comment'></div>甄济者，韩愈所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173171", 1173171, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>阳瘖</span>避职，卒不污禄山父子事者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173171_comment'></div>其文得之为可喜，而朝议书尤善，皆可爱者也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1173171_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　曾巩作《襄州遍学寺禅院碑》<div id='poem_1173172' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173172' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173172?labeling=true' target='_blank'>襄州遍学寺禅院碑跋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173172")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173172_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173172'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173172'>《襄州遍学寺禅院碑》，黄门侍郡、修国史韦承庆撰，太子少詹事钟绍京书，开元二年立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173172_comment'></div>其文云「襄州人将仕郎阮弘静与其属人建遍学寺禅院，故立此碑」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173172_comment'></div>承庆有辞学，张易之败时，承庆以附托方待罪，众推令草赦书，承庆援笔而成，众壮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173172_comment'></div>绍京，景龙中以苑总监从讨韦氏有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173172_comment'></div>惟嗜书，家藏王羲之、献之、褚遂良书至数十百卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173172_comment'></div>以善书直凤阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173172_comment'></div>武后时，榜诸宫殿明堂及铭九鼎，皆绍京书也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173172_comment'></div>其字画<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173172", 1173172, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>妍媚</span>，遒劲有法，诚少与为比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173172_comment'></div>然今所见，特此碑尚完，尤为可爱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173172_comment'></div>遍学寺于宇文周为常乐寺，于今为开元寺。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1173172_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　春旱，曾巩作《又诸庙祈雨文》<div id='poem_1173432' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173432' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173432?labeling=true' target='_blank'>又谐庙祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173432")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173432_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173432'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173432'>去岁经冬，时雪不厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173432_comment'></div>今兹春晚，膏泽尚微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173432_comment'></div>农于稻田，待水而种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173432_comment'></div>苦兹旱涸，人用焦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173432_comment'></div>吏不能有惠于民，而惟岁之善，则刑清事简，尚有望焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173432_comment'></div>是用沥恳，有祷于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173432_comment'></div>惟神依人，尚其降鉴，使霈然下雨，以大济于此邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173432_comment'></div>则人于事神，亦曷不尽？</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1173432_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　曾巩作《薤山祈雨文》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　曾巩作《邪溪祈雨文》<div id='poem_1173436' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173436' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173436?labeling=true' target='_blank'>邪溪祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173436")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173436_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173436'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173436'>自去秋至今，雨常不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173436_comment'></div>今麦苗将槁，稻种未布，而春既尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173436_comment'></div>若又不雨，至于十日，则麦必尽何死，稻不可种，民将安所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173436", 1173436, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>寄命</span>乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173436_comment'></div>吏知其急，而不知其所以为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173436_comment'></div>神知其急，而力能为雨者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173436_comment'></div>其亦惜数尺之泽，救民于无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173436", 1173436, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>寄命</span>之急乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173436_comment'></div>故敢以请，神其鉴之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1173436_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　曾巩作《襄州回相州韩侍中状》<div id='poem_1173117' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173117' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173117?labeling=true' target='_blank'>襄州回相州韩侍中状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173117")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173117_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173117'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173117'>右巩启：僻守陋邦，远违严屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173117_comment'></div>永言向慕，但倾茅塞之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173117_comment'></div>自便退藏，莫驰竿牍之问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173117_comment'></div>敢期赐教，出自过恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173117_comment'></div>形意爱之拊循，枉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173117", 1173117, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>题评</span>之奖引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173117_comment'></div>譬如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173117", 1173117, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>寒谷</span>，幸蒙六律之吹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173117_comment'></div>有若秋毫，遂借千钧之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173117_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173117", 1173117, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>秘藏</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173117", 1173117, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>巾衍</span>，铭镂肺肝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173117_comment'></div>惟偃息于便藩，素充盈于浩气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173117_comment'></div>百神所相，万福来绥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173117_comment'></div>伏以司徒侍中行应准绳，言为蓍蔡，肩一心之忠谊，弼三后之谋谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173117_comment'></div>安社稷之元功，传于竹帛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173117_comment'></div>被华夷之盛德，布在管弦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173117_comment'></div>方且辞钧轴于庙堂，拥旌幢于乡国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173117_comment'></div>然而人咏方叔，克壮元老之猷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173117_comment'></div>时思谢安，出慰苍生之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173117_comment'></div>宜就赞书之拜，伫谐华衮之归。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1173117_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年4月</a>　四月得雨，曾巩作《诸寺观谢雨文》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　曾巩作《邪溪谢雨文》<div id='poem_1173437' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173437' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173437?labeling=true' target='_blank'>邪溪谢雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173437")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173437_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173437'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173437'>吏能奉法令，治狱讼，督赋敛而已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173437_comment'></div>导和气，致丰年，则力不能，德不及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173437_comment'></div>故一有水旱，则奔祷于鬼神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173437_comment'></div>幸蒙降答，则自恕以窃食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173437_comment'></div>此巩之所不敢不自讼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173437_comment'></div>今兹请雨，不能异此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173437_comment'></div>获神之赐，敢不虔报？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173437_comment'></div>惟神之灵德，既足以惊动，泽施于此民，尚终畀之有年，则神之依人，亦有永赖。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1173437_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　曾巩作《薤山谢雨文》<div id='poem_1173435' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173435' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173435?labeling=true' target='_blank'>薤山谢雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173435")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173435_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173435'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173435'>乃故秋至今，雨不沾足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173435_comment'></div>麦苗将槁，稻不可种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173435_comment'></div>民将无以为命，吏不知其所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173435_comment'></div>维神能出云致雨，记于古经，信于百姓之耳目，是用奔告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173435_comment'></div>果蒙降答，乃戊辰云起西北，至夕大雨，达于甲戌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173435_comment'></div>四境告足，麦则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173435", 1173435, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>滋荣</span>，稻可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173435", 1173435, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>播种</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173435_comment'></div>民得以托命，吏得以窃食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173435_comment'></div>维神之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173435", 1173435, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>威灵</span>大显于此土，泽施大及于斯民，敢不严报？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173435_comment'></div>尚其终惠，俾岁大穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173435_comment'></div>则人于事神，永永其不敢怠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1173435_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　曾巩作《诸庙谢雨文》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年5月</a>　五月復旱，曾巩作《五龙堂祈雨文》<div id='poem_1173438' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173438' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>邪溪</span>薤山，应时得雨，麦以丰成，稻可播种，独异于他境，实维其赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173438_comment'></div>今稻田又乾矣，此邦之人，皆谓龙虎之河，五龙之神，祷雨辄应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173438_comment'></div>余敢不告？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173438_comment'></div>神其降鉴，大施泽于斯民，使获有年，则人于报神，亦维无斁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173438_comment'></div>无俾薤山<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173438", 1173438, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>邪溪</span>专美于此邦，以作神羞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1173438_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　曾巩作《灵溪洞祈雨文》<div id='poem_1173439' id='poem_content_1173091'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173091'>右巩启：伏审入膺典册，首秉钧衡，凡在生灵，孰不庆幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173091_comment'></div>伏以史馆相公言为蓍蔡，行应准绳，仔肩一德之纯，弼亮三朝之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173091_comment'></div>君牙之缵旧服，世济忠劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173091_comment'></div>吉甫之宪万邦，身兼文武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173091_comment'></div>果还柄用，复冠中台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173091_comment'></div>茂惟拔出之材，素蕴非常之略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173091_comment'></div>方且谊形王室，尽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173091", id='poem_sentence_7_1173091_comment'></div>遂常生于百姓，付众职于群能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173091_comment'></div>跻世太和，与人休息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173091_comment'></div>使雨旸寒燠，罔不从时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173091_comment'></div>草木虫鱼，皆当蒙惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173091_comment'></div>声教可加于异俗，功名必纪于无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173091_comment'></div>巩一去朝行，六更岁序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173091_comment'></div>顾兹旧物，自惭簪履之微；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173091_comment'></div>保是孤生，方赖陶钧之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173091_comment'></div>其为欣忭，实倍等伦。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1173091_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173173")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173173_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173173_comment'></div>兴国寺今为延庆寺，在望楚山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173173_comment'></div>欧阳永叔云：「兴国寺碑不知所在，特见其模本于太学官杨󵩪家」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173173_comment'></div>而此碑阴又有道护书襄州镇副总管府长史柳止戈而下十八官号姓名，其字尤可喜，得之自余始，世盖未有传之者也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1173173_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　曾巩作《韩公井记》<div id='poem_1173174' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173174' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173174?labeling=true' target='_blank'>韩公井记跋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173174")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173174_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173174'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173174'>《韩公井记》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173174_comment'></div>开元二十二年初置十道采访使，韩朝宗以襄州刺史兼山南东道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173174_comment'></div>襄州南楚故城，有昭王井，传言汲者死，行人虽暍困不敢视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173174_comment'></div>朝宗移书谕神，自是饮者亡恙，人更号「韩公井」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173174_comment'></div>楚故城今谓之故墙，即鄢也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173174_comment'></div>此记今移在郡廨中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173174_comment'></div>故城改为「墙」者，由梁太祖父烈祖名诚，当时避之，故至今犹然。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1173174_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　曾巩作《唐安乡开元寺卧禅师净土堂碑铭》<div id='poem_1173178' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173178' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173178?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐安乡开元寺卧禅师净土堂碑铭跋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173178")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173178_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173178'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173178'>《唐安乡郡开元寺卧禅师净土堂碑铭》，监察御史张鼎撰，雍县尉吴郁书，天宝九载庚寅立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173178_comment'></div>称卧禅俗姓辛氏，名顺忠，陇西狄道人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173178_comment'></div>陇右按察使崔升进奏，住河州开元寺，右胁而卧，诸漏已无，开元中诏陇右节度使张守圭为就寺造净土堂，故为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173178_comment'></div>自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173178", 1173178, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>河陇</span>没于羌夷，州县城郭、官寺民庐莫不毁废，唯佛寺与碑铭文字载佛寺者往往多在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173178_comment'></div>世皆以为四方幽远，殊类异俗，不知礼义，出于天性，故夷之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173178_comment'></div>然其于佛知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173178", 1173178, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>信慕</span>，以其有罪福报应之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173178_comment'></div>余以谓四夷虽恣睢甚者，及晓之以曲直是非，悦且从也，固不可谓其天性无欲善之端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173178_comment'></div>是以虞夏之世，东渐于海，西被于流沙，朔南暨，声教则能令其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173178", 1173178, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>信慕</span>者，亦非特有佛而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173178_comment'></div>彼以罪福报应之说动之，未若不动之以利害而使之心化，此先王之德所以为盛也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1173178_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　曾巩作《桂阳周府君碑并碑阴》<div id='poem_1173177' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173177' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1173177'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173177'>《桂阳周府君碑》并碑阴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1173177_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　曾巩作《晋陆袆碑》<div id='poem_1173175' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173175' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173175?labeling=true' target='_blank'>晋陆祎碑跋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173175")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173175_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173175'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173175'>《晋陆祎碑》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173175_comment'></div>此碑云：「祎字元容，吴郡吴人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173175_comment'></div>其先家于陆乡，因氏姓焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173175_comment'></div>显考吴故左丞相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173175_comment'></div>祎赤乌六年召宿卫郎中，转右郎中、左郎中、治书执法、平中校尉、平义都尉、五官郎中、骑都尉，迁黄门侍郎，封海盐县侯，加裨将军，行左丞相、镇西大将军事」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173175_comment'></div>又云：「委戈执笏，入宾皇储」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173175_comment'></div>而《吴志》云孙皓宝鼎元年以陆凯为左丞相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173175_comment'></div>又云，凯子祎，初为黄门侍郎，出领部曲，拜偏将军，凯亡后，入为太子中庶子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173175_comment'></div>皆与此碑合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173175_comment'></div>而此碑晋太宁三年立也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1173175_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　曾巩作《尚书省郎官石记序》<div id='poem_1173176' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173176' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173176?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书省郎官石记序跋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173176")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173176_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173176'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173176'>《尚书省郎官石记序》，陈九言撰，张颠书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173176_comment'></div>记自开元二十九年郎官石名氏为此序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173176_comment'></div>张颠草书见于世者，其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173176", 1173176, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>纵放</span>可怪，近世未有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173176_comment'></div>而此序独楷字，精劲严重，出于自然，如动容周旋中礼，非强为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173176_comment'></div>书一艺耳，至于极者乃能如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173176_comment'></div>其楷字盖罕见于世，则此序尤为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173176", 1173176, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>可贵</span>也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1173176_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　曾巩作《韩魏公挽歌词二首》<div id='poem_220294' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220294' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220294?labeling=true' target='_blank'>韩魏公挽歌词二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220294")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220294_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220294'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220294'>堂堂风骨气如春，衮服貂冠社稷臣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220294_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220294'>天上立谈迎白日，握中随物转洪钧。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220294_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220294'>忽骑箕尾精灵远，长誓山河宠数新。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220294_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220294'>万里耕桑无一事，三朝功德在生民。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220294_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220294'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220294_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_220293' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220293' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220293?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220293_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220293'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220293'>锱铢赤舄无骄志，咳唾黄金有古风。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220293'>覆冒荒遐知大度，委蛇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220293", 220293, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>艰急</span>见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220293", 220293, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>孤忠</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220293'>谋谟邴魏丹青力，拥立昭宣柱石功。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220293'>御笔新诗在新陇，哀荣谁得似初终？<div id='poem_sentence_3_220293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220293'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220293_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年8月</a>　曾巩作《襄州宜城县长渠记》<div id='poem_1173304' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173304' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173304?labeling=true' target='_blank'>襄州宜城县长渠记<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁八年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173304")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173304_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173304'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173304'>荆及康狼，楚之西山也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173304_comment'></div>水出二山之间，东南而流，春秋之世曰鄢水，左丘明《传》，鲁桓公十有三年，楚屈瑕伐罗，及鄢，乱次以济是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173304_comment'></div>其后曰夷水，《水经》所谓汉水又南过宜城县东，夷水注之是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173304_comment'></div>又其后曰蛮水，郦道元所谓夷水避桓温父名，改曰蛮水是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173304_comment'></div>秦昭王二十八年，使白起将，攻楚，去鄢百里，立堨，壅是水为渠以灌鄢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173304_comment'></div>鄢，楚都也，遂拔之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173304_comment'></div>秦既得鄢，以为县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173304_comment'></div>汉惠帝三年，改曰宜城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173304_comment'></div>宋孝武帝永初元年，筑宜城之大堤为城，今县治是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173304_comment'></div>而更谓鄢曰故城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173304_comment'></div>鄢入秦，而白起所为渠因不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173304_comment'></div>引鄢水以灌田，田皆为沃壤，今长渠是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173304_comment'></div>长渠至宋至和二年，久隳不治，而田数苦旱，川饮者无所取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173304_comment'></div>令孙永曼叔率民田渠下者，理渠之坏塞，而去其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173304", 1173304, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>浅隘</span>，遂完故堨，使水还渠中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173304_comment'></div>自二月丙午始作，至三月癸未而毕，田之受渠水者，皆复其旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173304_comment'></div>曼叔又与民为约束，时其蓄泄，而止其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173304", 1173304, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>侵争</span>，民皆以为宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173304_comment'></div>盖鄢水之出西山，初弃于无用，及白起资以祸楚，而后世顾赖其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173304_comment'></div>郦道元以谓溉田三千馀顷，至今千有馀年，而曼叔又举众力而复之，使并渠之民，足食而甘饮，其馀粟散于四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173304_comment'></div>盖水出于西山诸谷者其源广，而流于东南者其势下，至今千有馀年，而山川高下之形势无改，故曼叔得因其故迹，兴于既废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173304_comment'></div>使水之源流与地之高下，一有易于古，则曼叔虽力，亦莫能复也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173304_comment'></div>夫水莫大于四渎，而河盖数徙，失禹之故道，至于济水，又王莽时而绝，况于众流之细，其通塞岂得而常？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173304_comment'></div>而后世欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173304", 1173304, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>行水</span>溉田者，往往务蹑古人之遗迹，不考夫山川形势古今之同异，故用力多而收功少，是亦其不思也欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173304_comment'></div>初，曼叔之复此渠，白其事于知襄州事张瑰唐公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173304_comment'></div>公听之不疑，沮止者不用，故曼叔能以有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173304_comment'></div>则渠之复，自夫二人者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173304_comment'></div>方二人者之有为，盖将任其职，非有求于世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173304_comment'></div>及其后言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1173304", 1173304, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>渠堨</span>者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1173304", 1173304, "Clauses/98/Comments/1")'>蜂出</span>，然其心盖或有求，故多诡而少实，独长渠之利较然，而二人者之志愈明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173304_comment'></div>熙宁六年，余为襄州，过京师，曼叔时为开封，访余于东门，为余道长渠之事，而诿余以考其约束之废举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173304_comment'></div>予至而问焉，民皆以谓贤君之约束，相与守之，传数十年如其初也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173304_comment'></div>予为之定著令，上司农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173304_comment'></div>八年，曼叔去开封，为汝阴，始以书告之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173304_comment'></div>而是秋大旱，独长渠之田无害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173304_comment'></div>夫宜知其山川与民之利害者，皆为州者之任，故予不得不书以告后之人，而又使之知夫作之所以始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173304_comment'></div>曼叔今为尚书兵部郎中，龙图阁直学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173304_comment'></div>八月丁丑曾巩记。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1173304'></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1173304_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年8月</a>　曾巩作《贺韩相公赴许州启》<div id='poem_1173103' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173103' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173103?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺韩相公赴许州启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173103")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173103_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173103'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173103'>右巩启：伏审远持<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173103", 1173103, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>信瑞</span>，入奉清闲，假<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173103", 1173103, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>泰筮</span>以诹辰，命馆人而饬驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173103_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173103", 1173103, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>百灵</span>奔卫，宜无陟降之劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173103_comment'></div>六气节宣，当遂神明之适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173103_comment'></div>伏以判府相公材为人杰，行备天常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173103_comment'></div>出尧舜之盛时，绍韦平之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173103", 1173103, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>庆阀</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173103_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173103", 1173103, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>忠纯</span>之操，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173103", 1173103, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>简注</span>于三朝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173103_comment'></div>恺悌之风，仪刑于四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173103_comment'></div>比辍庙堂之任，少留藩辅之雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173103_comment'></div>力抗至言，屡辞于荣禄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173103_comment'></div>眷求旧德，方属于上心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173103_comment'></div>用均边阃之勤，就易乡邦之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173103_comment'></div>鞗革金厄，已严<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173103", 1173103, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>入觐</span>之装；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173103_comment'></div>衮衣绣裳，行允公归之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173103_comment'></div>伫膺典册，首秉钧衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173103_comment'></div>巩处世多奇，误知最久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173103_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173103", 1173103, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>持心</span>素厚，未忘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173103", 1173103, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>坠屦</span>之微；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173103_comment'></div>引脰永怀，已动扫门之喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173103_comment'></div>更冀上为宗社，善保寝兴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1173103_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　曾巩撰《赠大理寺丞致仕杜君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173342' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173342' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173342?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠大理寺丞致仕杜君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁八年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173342")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173342_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173342'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173342'>君姓杜氏，澶州濮阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173342_comment'></div>卒于皇祐元年十月庚申，葬于熙宁八年十月丁酉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173342_comment'></div>其墓在濮阳县桂枝里之栾村，以夫人仙居县太君潘氏祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173342_comment'></div>君曾王考佑，王考延嗣，考珣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173342_comment'></div>子男三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173342_comment'></div>曰言，曰宗谏，皆蚤世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173342_comment'></div>曰宗诲，殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173342_comment'></div>女二人，嫁马氏、栾氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173342_comment'></div>孙男二人，曰良辅，馀未名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173342_comment'></div>君讳莹，字德温，赠大理评事，又赠大理寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173342_comment'></div>为人孝友温良，以清静为学，而以淡泊自足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173342_comment'></div>行修于家而誉闻于乡，其自得者寿考见于身，其有馀者流泽见于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173342_comment'></div>故其年至于八十，而有子能大其门，言理之士，以此多君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173342_comment'></div>宗诲为人，质厚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173342", 1173342, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>恬夷</span>，世俗之所为有不为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173342_comment'></div>余为襄阳，宗诲实佥书节度判官公事，爱其所守，而知其有所受也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173342_comment'></div>其以君之铭乞于余，故不辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173342_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1173342'>有以养其内，克遐者寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173342_comment'></div>有以行于远，克昌者后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173342_comment'></div>帝原厥初，追锡命书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173342_comment'></div>余与此铭，贲于幽墟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1173342_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　曾巩作《司封郎中孔君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173330' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173330' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173330?labeling=true' target='_blank'>司封郎中孔君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁八年九月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173330")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173330_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173330'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173330'>君姓孔氏，讳延之，字长源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173330_comment'></div>幼孤，自感厉，昼耕读书陇上，夜燃松明继之，学艺大成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173330_comment'></div>乡举进士第一，遂中其科，授钦州军事推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173330_comment'></div>杜杞之使南方，诛欧希范、蒙赶，君策画居多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173330_comment'></div>其书奏谋议，皆君为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173330", 1173330, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>属草稿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173330_comment'></div>监杭州龙山税，知洪州新建县，又知筠州新昌县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173330_comment'></div>还朝，会开封界中治孟阳河，中作而开封奏可罢，御史与开封争不决，诏君按视，君言费已巨，成之犹有小利，遂从君言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173330_comment'></div>知封州，即用为广南西路相度宽恤民力，所更置五十五事，弛役二千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173330_comment'></div>使者欲城封州，君争以谓无益，乃不果城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173330_comment'></div>迁为广南西路转运判官，辞母老，不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173330_comment'></div>广西人稀，耕者少，而赋籴于民，岁有至六百万石，程督与租税等，然不过能致数十万石而止，君计岁籴二十万石而足，高其估以募商贩，不赋籴于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173330_comment'></div>初，侬智高平，推恩南方，补虚名之官者八百人，多中户以上，皆弛役，役归下穷，君使复其故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173330_comment'></div>钦、廉、雷三州蜑户，以采珠为富人所役属，君夺使自为业者六百家，皆定著令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173330_comment'></div>交阯使来桂州，阴赍货为市，须负重者三千人，君止不与，使由此不数至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173330_comment'></div>雷州并海，守方倪为不善，官属共告之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173330_comment'></div>倪要夺其书，悉收官属并其孥系狱，昼夜榜笞，军事推官吕潜以庾死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173330_comment'></div>君驰至，取倪属吏，纵系逮者七百馀人，倪坐法当斩，亦以庾死，人欢叫感泣，声动海上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173330_comment'></div>改荆湖北路提点刑狱，即本路为转运使，罢鼎州六寨，岁戍土丁千馀人，提点刑狱言溪洞南江宜麻稻，有黄金丹砂之产，遣人谕祸福，以兵势随之，可坐而取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173330_comment'></div>君奏以为不可，乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173330_comment'></div>召为开封府判官，以母老辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173330_comment'></div>知越州，移知泉州，以母老辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173330_comment'></div>改知宣州，未至，言者奏越州盐法不行，故课负，坐罢宣州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173330_comment'></div>而课法以满岁为率，岁终，越之盐课应法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173330_comment'></div>乃以君为权管勾三司都理欠凭由司，出知润州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173330_comment'></div>未行，暴得疾卒京师，熙宁七年二月癸未也，年六十有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173330_comment'></div>自钦州九迁至尚书司封郎中，赐服绯鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173330_comment'></div>君之得见于用，掇其大者如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173330_comment'></div>君气仁色温，寡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1173330", 1173330, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>笑言</span>，言若不能出口，及见义慷慨，辩且强也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173330_comment'></div>方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173330", 1173330, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>微时</span>，已数<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1173330", 1173330, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>劘切</span>上官，无顾避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173330_comment'></div>及老，益自强，守所闻于古，不肯茍随，以故龃龉，一不以易意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173330_comment'></div>君事母孝，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1173330", 1173330, "Clauses/126/Comments/0")'>持己</span>约，与人交，尽其义，其于恩尤至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173330_comment'></div>治人居官，一以忠厚，不矜智饰名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173330_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173330_comment'></div>可谓笃行君子矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173330_comment'></div>其家食不足，而俸钱常以聚书，至老，读书未尝一日废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173330_comment'></div>工于为文，诸子皆自教以学，子多而贤，天下以为盛云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173330_comment'></div>君临江军新淦县人，孔子之后四十六世孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173330_comment'></div>曾大父令倩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173330_comment'></div>大父文质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173330_comment'></div>考中正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173330_comment'></div>母刘氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173330_comment'></div>君登朝，考赠光禄卿，母封仁寿县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173330_comment'></div>娶杨氏，封仁和县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173330_comment'></div>有子七人：文仲，台州军事推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173330_comment'></div>武仲，江州军事推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173330_comment'></div>平仲，衢州军事判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173330_comment'></div>和仲，进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173330_comment'></div>羲仲，太庙斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173330_comment'></div>馀早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173330_comment'></div>女三人，嫁袭庆军节度推官曾准、吉州吉水县主簿应昭式、进士蔡公彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173330_comment'></div>孙男女八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173330_comment'></div>初，君乐江州之佳山水，买宅将居之，故其子以八年九月乙酉葬君于江州之德化县仁贵乡龙泉原，以杨氏祔君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173330_comment'></div>有文集二十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173330_comment'></div>其子以余与君为最旧，来乞铭，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_1173330'>有绰厥政，流播在民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173330_comment'></div>有蔚斯文，荐美于身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173330_comment'></div>孰委于外，不源于内？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1173330_comment'></div>于内曷以？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1173330_comment'></div>以其岂弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1173330_comment'></div>其立桓桓，不回不倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1173330_comment'></div>施不尽有，子则多贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1173330_comment'></div>曷久厥问？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1173330_comment'></div>閟辞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1173330", 1173330, "Clauses/191/Comments/0")'>幽阡</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_61_1173330_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年9月</a>　九月，以孙颀替知襄州，曾巩作《襄州乞宣洪二郡状》<div id='poem_1173016' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173016' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173016?labeling=true' target='_blank'>襄州乞宣洪二郡状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173016")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173016_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173016'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173016'>右，臣今任至今年九月<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173016", 1173016, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>成资</span>，已蒙差太常少卿孙颀替臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173016", 1173016, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>成资</span>阙，今臣去替祇有数月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173016_comment'></div>窃念臣为有私便，欲乞就移洪州或宣州一任，情愿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173016", 1173016, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>守待</span>远阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173016_comment'></div>谨具状奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1173016_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　曾巩作《襄州与交代孙颀启》<div id='poem_1173092' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173092' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173092?labeling=true' target='_blank'>襄州与交代孙颀启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173092")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173092_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173092'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173092'>右巩启：伏念讲闻誉望，积有岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173092_comment'></div>历下分符，已出吏师之后；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173092_comment'></div>汉南守土，又居仁政之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173092_comment'></div>惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173092", 1173092, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>事契</span>之稠重，实愚冥之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173092", 1173092, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>幸会</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173092_comment'></div>比于道路，始接光仪，蒙特异于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173092", 1173092, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>眷存</span>，仍曲加于燕劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173092_comment'></div>论情至厚，曾何谢于古人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173092_comment'></div>处义甚高，固可敦于薄俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173092_comment'></div>违离未久，感恋交深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173092_comment'></div>谅惟得日之良，甫及下车之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173092_comment'></div>颁条多预，纳福甚隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173092_comment'></div>伏惟知府少卿积学内充，怀材间出，久更当世之用，自结明主之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173092_comment'></div>高冠两梁，入缀班于九列；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173092_comment'></div>轻车驷马，出按部于百城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173092_comment'></div>方图间燕之宜，自请<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173092", 1173092, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>蕃宣</span>之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173092_comment'></div>伫膺诏召，不待岁成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173092_comment'></div>更惟上为庙朝，善绥寝餗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173092_comment'></div>祷颂之至，序述宁殚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1173092_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: -----title
福州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='f92f553f0ca24a9881d5c98da382423c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f92f553f0ca24a9881d5c98da382423c");'><span id='f92f553f0ca24a9881d5c98da382423c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1078')">1077-1078年</a>，59-60岁</div><div id='f92f553f0ca24a9881d5c98da382423c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年8月9日</a>　曾巩状上不允，遂以八月九日到任。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《福州谢到任表》<div id='poem_1172954' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172954' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172954?labeling=true' target='_blank'>福州谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172954")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172954_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172954'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172954'>伏奉敕命，授臣守本官直龙图阁，就差权知福州，已于今月初九日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172954_comment'></div>列职内朝，分符督府，荷收怜之俯及，省孤陋以何堪<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172954_comment'></div>伏念臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1172954", 1172954, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>蹇薄</span>多艰，戆愚少与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172954_comment'></div>遇继承于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1172954", 1172954, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>兴运</span>，未进望于清光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172954_comment'></div>至于九换岁期，常从外徙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172954_comment'></div>四临州部，曾未代还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172954_comment'></div>兹者备延阁之美名，假东瓯之剧郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172954_comment'></div>顾惟同气，亦预改藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172954_comment'></div>但虞人品之轻，莫称主恩之厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172954_comment'></div>然臣最为寒族，实奉偏亲，臣弟既适于遐陬，臣愚固难于远役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172954_comment'></div>理当恳请，辄用冒闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172954_comment'></div>虽未赐于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1172954", 1172954, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>矜从</span>，亦终宽于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1172954", 1172954, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>僭黩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172954_comment'></div>颇识事君之义，敢忘奔命之恭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172954_comment'></div>惟皓首之慈闱，抱累年之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1172954", 1172954, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>宿疹</span>，牵衣辞诀，泣涕分驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172954_comment'></div>计音信之往来，殆将万里；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172954_comment'></div>阻晨昏之定省，各在一涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172954_comment'></div>足感动于人情，况亲逢于孝治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172954_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1172954", 1172954, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>草茅</span>弱质，素依及物之仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172954_comment'></div>犬马微诚，终冀因心之恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172954_comment'></div>再念臣抚临城邑，劳问士民，皆狎处于太宁，但遵行于明诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172954_comment'></div>则臣实惭尸于廪食，曷补报于宠灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172954_comment'></div>皆出误知，致斯冒处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172954_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下多能天纵，盛德日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172954_comment'></div>躬神圣之姿，而兼容小善；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172954_comment'></div>履富贵之极，而深达下情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1172954_comment'></div>在于隐恤之心，岂閒么微之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1172954_comment'></div>敢不誓殚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1172954", 1172954, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>勤瘁</span>，匪懈夙宵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1172954_comment'></div>慰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1172954", 1172954, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>海徼</span>之幽荒，布德音之宽大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1172954_comment'></div>承流宠寄，方自效于驱驰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1172954_comment'></div>反哺愚情，冀尚蒙于悯恻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1172954_comment'></div>仰望旒扆，臣不任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1172954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1172954'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷二七。又见《曾文定公集》卷一○，清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷二八。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1172954_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《寄留交代元子发》<div id='poem_220276' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220276' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220276?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄留交代元子发</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span
