id='poem_title_220276_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220276'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220276'>青云宝构虽同直，白发鱼符各未归。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220276'>倚玉讵应公论许，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_220276", 220276, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>续貂</span>还恐邑人非。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220276'>莫辞海畔留连久，须惜天涯故旧稀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220276'>预想明年双节召，九霄鹏翼看横飞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220276'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220276_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《福州谒夫子庙文》<div id='poem_1173454' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173454' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173454?labeling=true' target='_blank'>福州谒夫子庙文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173454")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173454_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173454'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173454'>惟夫子之德，仰之弥高；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173454_comment'></div>夫子之言，穷之益远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173454_comment'></div>学者潜心，庶几仿佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173454_comment'></div>某守邦之始，躬即学宫，敢修礼谒，尚其降鉴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1173454_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《福州谒诸庙文》<div id='poem_1173455' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173455' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173455?labeling=true' target='_blank'>福州谒诸庙文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173455")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173455_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173455'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173455'>惟神作德自幽，信于兹土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173455_comment'></div>人用报事，秩祭有常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173455_comment'></div>巩甫此守邦，敢修礼谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173455_comment'></div>尚其降福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173455_comment'></div>终赉斯民。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1173455_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《薛老亭晚归》<div id='poem_220529' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220529' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220529?labeling=true' target='_blank'>薛老亭晚归</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220529")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220529_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220529'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220529'>终日行山不出城，城中山势与云平。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220529_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220529'>万家市井鱼盐合，千里川原彩错明。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220529_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220529'>座上潮风醒酒力，晚来岩雾盖钟声。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220529_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220529'>归时休得燃官烛，在处林灯夹道迎<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220529_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220529'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220529_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_220529'><span class='label'>按：</span>清郭柏苍道光《乌石山志》卷二<br /><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_220529_0'>⑴ 原注：宋时七塔万枝灯，故云林灯。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_220529_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《福州谢上》<div id='poem_1172955' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172955' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172955?labeling=true' target='_blank'>福州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172955")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172955_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172955'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172955'>列职内朝，分符督府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172955_comment'></div>荷收怜之俯及，𢜽昏塞以何堪<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172955_comment'></div>伏念臣自守拙愚，常存静退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172955_comment'></div>方群能竞爽，未尝饰薄艺以动人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172955_comment'></div>当众议争先，未尝出斥言而󵩫辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172955_comment'></div>每自甘于驽钝，已难合于要权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172955_comment'></div>累换岁期，常从外徙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172955_comment'></div>四临州部，曾未代还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172955_comment'></div>兹者甫自书林，进登内阁，守福唐之刲略，总欧越之师徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172955_comment'></div>乃眷天伦，亦更藩服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172955_comment'></div>退省弟兄之陋，最居疏贱之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172955_comment'></div>蒙误宠之逾涯，岂捐躯之可报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172955_comment'></div>然臣幸叨薄禄，获奉偏亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172955_comment'></div>盖臣弟既适于遐陬，则臣愚当辞于远役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172955_comment'></div>在人情之可念，况著令之久行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172955_comment'></div>辄露恳悰，未回恩旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172955_comment'></div>颇识事君之义，敢忘奔命之恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172955_comment'></div>候吏甫来，轻车遄迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172955_comment'></div>白头老母，婴宿疹以北归；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172955_comment'></div>多难馀生，割私恩而南向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172955_comment'></div>牵衣辞诀，泣涕分驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172955_comment'></div>计音信之往来，殆将万里；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172955_comment'></div>阻晨昏之定省，各在一涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172955_comment'></div>足感动于旁人，况亲逢于孝治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172955_comment'></div>草茅弱质，常依乐育之仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1172955_comment'></div>犬马微情，终冀曲成之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1172955_comment'></div>惟憃冥之寡偶，绝先后之为客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1172955_comment'></div>如臣不自上闻，谁肯为臣言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1172955_comment'></div>再念抚临境内，劳问民间，皆狎处于太宁，但遵行于明诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1172955_comment'></div>则臣固惭尸于廪食，难报称于宠灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1172955_comment'></div>皆出过恩，致斯冒处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1172955_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下多能天纵，盛德日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1172955_comment'></div>恭圣神之姿，而兼容小善；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1172955_comment'></div>履四海之极，而兼达下情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1172955_comment'></div>在于隐恤之心，岂间孤平之迹？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1172955_comment'></div>敢不誓殚勤瘁，匪懈夙宵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1172955_comment'></div>慰海徼之幽荒，布德音之宽大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1172955_comment'></div>承流宠任，方自效于驱驰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1172955_comment'></div>反哺愚诚，冀尚蒙于悯恻<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云。　《曾子固集》卷一四。）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1172955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1172955'><span class='label'>按：</span>本篇与《福州谢到任表》意同文异，不知当初即有两篇并存，还是流传中出现异文，姑两存之。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1172955_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　福建路饥民数反，屡遣兵将镇压。义军首领廖恩归降。御史中丞邓润甫上疏力主乘势戮灭，及曾巩至任上，改行招安而辅之以翦除，福建路遂平。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　妹夫王平甫卒，曾巩作《祭王平甫文》<div id='poem_1173389' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173389' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173389?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭王平甫文<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁十年十月二十一日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173389")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173389_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173389'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173389'>呜呼平甫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173389_comment'></div>决江河不足以为子之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173389", 1173389, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>高谈雄辩</span>，吞云梦不足以为子之博闻强记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173389_comment'></div>至若操纸为文，落笔千字，徜徉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173389", 1173389, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>恣肆</span>，如不可穷，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173389", 1173389, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>秘怪</span>恍惚，亦莫之系，皆足以高视古今，杰出伦类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173389_comment'></div>而况好学不倦，垂老愈专，自信独立，在约弥厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173389_comment'></div>而志屈于不申，材穷于不试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173389_comment'></div>人皆待子以将昌，神胡速子于长逝！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173389_comment'></div>呜呼平甫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173389_comment'></div>念昔相逢，我壮子稚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173389_comment'></div>问托婚姻，相期道义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173389_comment'></div>每心服于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173389", 1173389, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>超轶</span>，亦情亲于乐易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173389_comment'></div>何堂堂而山立，忽泯泯而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173389", 1173389, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>飙驶</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173389_comment'></div>讣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173389", 1173389, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>皎皎</span>而犹疑，泪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173389", 1173389, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>汍汍</span>而莫制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173389_comment'></div>聊寓荐于一觞，纂斯言而见意。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1173389_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩撰《都官员外郎曾君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173331' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173331' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173331?labeling=true' target='_blank'>都官员外郎曾君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173331")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173331_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173331'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173331'>君曾氏，讳谊，字子常，建昌军南城人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173331_comment'></div>曾祖暹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173331_comment'></div>祖士宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173331_comment'></div>考充，赠殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173331_comment'></div>君进士及第，补洪州新建县主簿、循州龙川令，知筠州之上高、临江军之新淦、舒州之桐城三县，提举江南东路常平仓，兼农田水利差役事，权知楚州，历秘书省著作佐郎，至尚书都官员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173331_comment'></div>君生而好学，其家学者自君始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173331_comment'></div>博闻强志，明于大体，善属文，一时名出众右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173331_comment'></div>其家故贫，然君为人，节廉自重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173331_comment'></div>罢吏归，常阖门居，不与人事，或日昃不得食，晏如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173331_comment'></div>为吏平恕质悫，务在爱人，不为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173331", 1173331, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>刻察</span>，所历县称治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173331_comment'></div>江东同职欲增赋役钱于民，君争不能得，则自请罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173331_comment'></div>遂知楚州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173331_comment'></div>楚饥，四方之船粟至者，市易吏定取价贱，予价贵，计其赢取于民，而粟未尝出纳也，贩者为不行，人以乏食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173331_comment'></div>又取民之食其技者锢于官禁，不得私鬻，市里骚然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173331_comment'></div>君初止之，不变，则按致之法，朝廷遣他吏覆视，不能易君言，市易吏得罪免，君益不合，卒以他法罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173331_comment'></div>既去而楚人思之，既死而楚人迎哭其丧甚恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173331_comment'></div>至今言治楚者，以君为不可及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173331_comment'></div>君平居恂恂持卑，及遇事不可夺其守如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173331_comment'></div>君熙宁九年四月癸巳卒于开封府咸平之驿舍，年五十有一，明年某月某甲子葬于南城之某乡某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173331_comment'></div>子景初、景倩、景融、景裔、景献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173331_comment'></div>景初蚤世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173331_comment'></div>女嫁袁州万载令董沂、进士夏时中、陈卞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173331_comment'></div>母郑氏，崇德县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173331_comment'></div>妻傅氏，仁寿县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173331_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1173331'>江东之议，不俯而随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173331_comment'></div>山阳之治，违世所驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173331_comment'></div>有挟之强，以弱犯之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173331_comment'></div>有丑之正，以独守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173331_comment'></div>彼不我与，我不尔欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173331_comment'></div>尚告厥忘，作此铭诗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1173331_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《贺正字启》<div id='poem_1173106' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173106' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173106?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺方正字启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173106")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173106_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173106'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173106'>赐对中宸，升华内阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173106_comment'></div>上恩优异，贤业光亨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173106_comment'></div>国家宪奎壁以右文，敞蓬瀛而吁俊，匪独图书之寄，实为公辅之储。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173106_comment'></div>任惟系于才能，官不拘于阶陛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173106_comment'></div>凡膺妙选，允谓清流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173106_comment'></div>伏以某官蚤擅英声，素推奥学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173106_comment'></div>金门射策，风采动于诸公；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173106_comment'></div>玉殿昌言，论议开乎明主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173106_comment'></div>墨未乾于黄甲，身已出于青云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173106_comment'></div>岂稽古之无功，宜致君之有术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173106_comment'></div>侧闻新命，远慰私诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173106_comment'></div>未修赞喜之仪，遽枉相先之问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173106_comment'></div>谦勤滋至，佩荷奚胜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1173106_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《贺方正字启》<div id='poem_1173106' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173106' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173106?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺方正字启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173106")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173106_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173106'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173106'>赐对中宸，升华内阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173106_comment'></div>上恩优异，贤业光亨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173106_comment'></div>国家宪奎壁以右文，敞蓬瀛而吁俊，匪独图书之寄，实为公辅之储。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173106_comment'></div>任惟系于才能，官不拘于阶陛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173106_comment'></div>凡膺妙选，允谓清流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173106_comment'></div>伏以某官蚤擅英声，素推奥学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173106_comment'></div>金门射策，风采动于诸公；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173106_comment'></div>玉殿昌言，论议开乎明主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173106_comment'></div>墨未乾于黄甲，身已出于青云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173106_comment'></div>岂稽古之无功，宜致君之有术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173106_comment'></div>侧闻新命，远慰私诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173106_comment'></div>未修赞喜之仪，遽枉相先之问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173106_comment'></div>谦勤滋至，佩荷奚胜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1173106_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《洪范传》<div id='poem_1173192' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173192' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173192?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洪范传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173192")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173192_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173192'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173192'>「惟十有三祀，王访于箕子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173192_comment'></div>王乃言曰：『呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173192_comment'></div>箕子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173192_comment'></div>惟天<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>阴骘</span>下民，相协厥居，我不知其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>彝伦</span>攸叙』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173192_comment'></div>箕子乃言曰：『我闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>在昔</span>，鲧堙洪水，汩陈其五行，帝乃震怒，不畀洪范九畴，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>彝伦</span>攸斁，鲧则殛死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173192_comment'></div>禹乃嗣兴，天乃锡禹洪范九畴，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/18/Comments/1")'>彝伦</span>攸叙』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173192_comment'></div>武王叹而谓箕子：「天不言而默定下民相助协顺其所居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173192_comment'></div>居，谓所以安者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173192_comment'></div>而我不知其常理所次叙」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173192_comment'></div>箕子乃言：「我闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>在昔</span>，鲧之治水也，至于五行皆乱其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>陈列</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173192_comment'></div>故上帝震怒，不与之以洪范九畴，而常理所以败，鲧则殛死，及禹继而起，天乃与之以洪范九畴，而常理所以叙」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173192_comment'></div>盖水之性润下，而其为利害也尤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173192_comment'></div>故鲧之治水也堙之，则失其性，而至于五行皆乱其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>陈列</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173192_comment'></div>及禹之治水也导之，则得其性，而至于常伦所以叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173192_comment'></div>常伦之叙者，则舜称禹「地平天成，六府三事允治，万世永赖，时乃功」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173192_comment'></div>其曰「天乃锡禹洪范九畴」，盖《易》亦曰「洛出书」，然而世或以为不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173192_comment'></div>原其说之所以如此者，以非其耳目之所习见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173192_comment'></div>天地之大，万物之众，不待非常之智而知其变之不可尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173192_comment'></div>人之耳目之所及，亦不待非常之智而知其不能远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173192_comment'></div>彼以非其所习见，则果于以为不然，是以天地万物之变为可尽于耳目之所及，亦可谓过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173192_comment'></div>为是说者，不独蔽于洪范之锡禹，至凤凰、麒麟、玄鸟、生民之见于经者，亦且以为不然，执小而量大，用一而齐万，信<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>臆决</span>而疑经，不知其不可，亦可谓惑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173192_comment'></div>五行五者，行乎三材万物之间也，故「初一曰五行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173192_comment'></div>其在人为五事，故「次二曰敬用五事」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173192_comment'></div>五事敬则身修矣，身修然后可以出政，故「次三曰农用八政」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173192_comment'></div>政必协天时，故「次四曰协用五纪」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173192_comment'></div>修身出政协天时，不可以不有常也，常者大中而已矣，故「次五曰建用皇极」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173192_comment'></div>立中以为常，而未能适变，则犹之执一也，故「次六曰乂用三德」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173192_comment'></div>三德所以适变，而人治极矣，极人治而不敢绝天下之疑，故「次七曰明用稽疑」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173192_comment'></div>稽疑者，尽之于人神也，人治而通于神明者尽，然犹未敢以自信也，必考己之得失于天，故「次八曰念用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/99/Comments/2")'>庶徵</span>」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173192_comment'></div>徵有休咎，则得失之应于天者可知矣，犹以为未尽也，故「次九曰向用五福，威用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/104/Comments/1")'>六极</span>」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173192_comment'></div>福极之在民者，皆吾所以致之，故又以考己之得失于民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173192_comment'></div>敬，本诸心而见诸外，故五事曰敬用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173192_comment'></div>用其厚者，固治人之道也，故八政曰农用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173192_comment'></div>农，厚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173192_comment'></div>天时协，则人事得，故五纪曰协用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173192_comment'></div>谨其常，则中不可不立也，故皇极曰建用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173192_comment'></div>建，立也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173192_comment'></div>乂者所以救其过、持其常也，故三德曰乂用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173192_comment'></div>明则疑释，故稽疑曰明用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173192_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>庶徵</span>之见于天，不可以不念，故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>庶徵</span>曰念用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173192_comment'></div>福之在于民，则宜向之，故五福曰向用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173192_comment'></div>极之在于民，则宜畏之，故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>六极</span>曰威用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173192_comment'></div>威，畏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173192_comment'></div>凡此者，皆人君之道，其言不可杂，而其序不可乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173192_comment'></div>推其为类则有九，要其始终则犹之一言而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173192_comment'></div>学者知此，则可以知《洪范》矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173192_comment'></div>「一、五行：曰水，曰火，曰木，曰金，曰土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173192_comment'></div>水曰润下，火曰炎上，木曰曲直，金曰从革，土爰稼穑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173192_comment'></div>润下作咸，炎上作苦，曲直<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/160/Comments/0")'>作酸</span>，从革作辛，稼穑作甘」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173192_comment'></div>盖爰者，于也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173192_comment'></div>润下炎上者，言其所性之成于天者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173192_comment'></div>曲直从革者，言其所化之因于人者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173192_comment'></div>于之稼穑而不及其他者，于之稼穑亦言其所化之因于人者也，不及其他者，莫大乎于之稼穑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173192_comment'></div>夫润下炎上，言其所性之成于天者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1173192_comment'></div>然水导之则行，潴之则聚，火燃之则炽，宿之则壮，则其所化亦未尝不因之于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1173192_comment'></div>或曲直之，或从革之，或稼穑之，言其所化之因于人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1173192_comment'></div>然可以曲直，可以从革，可以稼穑，则其所性亦未尝不成之于天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1173192_comment'></div>所谓天不人不因，人不天不成者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1173192_comment'></div>其文所以不同者，非固相反，所以互相明而欲学者之自得之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1173192_comment'></div>润下者水也，故水曰润下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1173192_comment'></div>炎上者火也，故火曰炎上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1173192_comment'></div>木金亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1173192_comment'></div>惟稼穑则非土也，故言其于之稼穑而已者，辞不得不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1173192_comment'></div>又言润下所以起咸，炎上所以起苦，曲直所以起酸，从革所以起辛，稼穑所以起甘者，凡为味五，或言其性，或言其化，或言其味者，皆养人之所最大者也，非养人之所最大者，则不言，此所以为要言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1173192_comment'></div>《虞书》：禹告舜曰政在养民，而陈养民之事，则曰水火金木土谷惟修，与此意同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1173192_comment'></div>「二、五事：曰貌、曰言，曰视，曰听，曰思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1173192_comment'></div>貌曰恭，言曰从，视曰明，听曰聪，思曰睿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1173192_comment'></div>恭作肃，从作乂，明作哲，聪作谋，睿作圣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1173192_comment'></div>盖自外而言之，则貌外于言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1173192_comment'></div>自内而言之，则听内于视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1173192_comment'></div>自貌言视听而言之，则思所以为主于内，故曰貌，曰言，曰视，曰听，曰思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1173192_comment'></div>弥远者弥外，弥近者弥内，此其所以为次叙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1173192_comment'></div>五者，思所以为主于内，而用四事于外者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1173192_comment'></div>至于四者，则皆自为用而不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/254/Comments/0")'>相因</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1173192_comment'></div>故貌不恭者不害于言从，视不明者不害于听聪，非貌恭言从然后能哲，能哲然后能谋，能谋然后能思，而至于圣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1173192_comment'></div>曰思曰睿，睿作圣者，盖思者所以充人之材以至于其极，圣者人之极也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1173192_comment'></div>孟子曰：人之性或相倍蓰而无算者，不能尽其材，不能尽其材者，弗思耳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1173192_comment'></div>盖思之于人也如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1173192_comment'></div>然而或曰「不思而得」，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1173192_comment'></div>盖人有自诚明者，不思而得，尧舜性之是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1173192_comment'></div>所谓诚者，天之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1173192_comment'></div>有自明诚者，思之弗得弗措也，汤武身之是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1173192_comment'></div>所谓思诚者，人之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1173192_comment'></div>然而尧舜汤武之德及其至，皆足以动容周旋中礼，则身之者终亦不思而得之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1173192_comment'></div>尧舜性之矣，然尧之德曰聪明文思，盖尧之所以与人同者法也，则性之者亦未尝不思也，故曰诚则明矣，明则诚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1173192_comment'></div>而性之身之者及其成，孟子皆以谓盛德之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1173192_comment'></div>箕子言思所以作圣，孟子言弗思故相倍蓰而无算，其所言者皆法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1173192_comment'></div>曰视曰明、明作哲、听曰聪、聪作谋者，视之明，无所不照，所以作哲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1173192_comment'></div>听之聪，无所不闻，所以作谋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1173192_comment'></div>人之于视听，有能察于闾巷之间、米盐之细，而不知蔽于堂阼之上、治乱之几者，用其聪明于小且近，故不能无蔽于大且远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1173192_comment'></div>古之人知其如此，故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_93_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/310/Comments/0")'>前旒</span>蔽明，黈纩塞聪，又以作聪明为戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1173192_comment'></div>夫如是者，非涂其耳目也，亦不用之于小且近而已矣，所以养其聪明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1173192_comment'></div>养其聪明者，故将用之于大且远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1173192_comment'></div>夫天下至广，不可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/320/Comments/0")'>家至户察</span>，而能用其聪明于大且远者，盖得其要也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1173192_comment'></div>昔舜治天下，以诸侯百官，而总之以四岳，舜于视听，欲无蔽于诸侯百官，则询于四岳，欲无蔽于四岳，则辟四门，欲无蔽于四门，则明四目，达四聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1173192_comment'></div>夫然故舜在士民之上，非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/335/Comments/0")'>家至户察</span>而能立于无蔽之地，得其要而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1173192_comment'></div>其曰明四目、达四聪者，舜不自任其视听，而因人之视听以为聪明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1173192_comment'></div>不自任其聪明而因之于人者，固君道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1173192_comment'></div>非君道独然也，不自任其聪明而因之于人者，固天道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1173192_comment'></div>故曰「天聪明，自我民聪明」，又曰「惟天聪明，惟圣时宪」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1173192_comment'></div>舜于聪明，下尽人，上参天，斯其所以为舜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1173192_comment'></div>舜之时，至治之极也，人岂有欺舜者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1173192_comment'></div>舜于待人，亦岂疑其欺己也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1173192_comment'></div>然而访问反复，相参以考察，又推之于四面，若唯恐不能无所蔽者，盖君天下之体，固不得不立于无蔽之地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1173192_comment'></div>立于无蔽之地者，其于视听如此，亦不用之于小且近矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1173192_comment'></div>夫然故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_108_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/367/Comments/0")'>蔽明塞聪</span>，而天下之情可坐而尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1173192_comment'></div>言曰从、从作乂者，《易》曰：「出其言善，则千里之外应之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1173192_comment'></div>出其言不善，则千里之外违之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1173192_comment'></div>则言之要为可从而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1173192_comment'></div>言为可从也，则其施于用，治道之所由出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1173192_comment'></div>古之君人者知其如此，故其戒曰：「慎乃出令，令出惟行，弗惟反」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1173192_comment'></div>又曰：「其惟不言，言乃雍」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1173192_comment'></div>而舜以命龙亦曰：「夙夜出纳朕命，惟允」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1173192_comment'></div>言之不可违如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1173192_comment'></div>貌曰恭、恭作肃者，孟子曰：「今夫蹶者趋者，是气也，而反动其心」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1173192_comment'></div>故曰「持其志，无暴其气」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1173192_comment'></div>盖威仪动作见于外者无不恭，则生于心者无不肃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1173192_comment'></div>传曰，人受天地之中以生，所谓命也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1173192_comment'></div>礼义威仪之则，所以定命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1173192_comment'></div>故颜渊问仁，孔子告之以视听言动以礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1173192_comment'></div>而卫之君子所以称仁者，亦曰「威仪棣棣，不可选也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1173192_comment'></div>貌之不可慢如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1173192_comment'></div>存其思，养其聪明，而不失之于言貌，故尧之德曰聪明文思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1173192_comment'></div>言貌者，盖尧之所谓文，则虽尧之圣，未有不先于谨五事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1173192_comment'></div>「三、八政：曰食，曰货，曰祀，曰司空，曰司徒，曰司寇，曰宾，曰师」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1173192_comment'></div>曰食、曰货、曰祀、曰宾、曰师，称其事者，达乎下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1173192_comment'></div>曰司空、曰司徒、曰司寇，称其官者，任乎上也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1173192_comment'></div>人道莫急于养生，莫大于事死，莫重于安土，故曰食，曰货，曰祀，曰司空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1173192_comment'></div>孟子以使民养生送死无憾为王道之始，此四者所以不得不先也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1173192_comment'></div>使民足于养生送死之具，然后教之，教之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_132_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/445/Comments/0")'>不率</span>，然后刑之，故曰司徒，曰司寇，此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_132_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/449/Comments/0")'>彝伦</span>之序也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1173192_comment'></div>其教之也，固又有叙可得而考者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1173192_comment'></div>古之欲明明德于天下者，必始于知至意诚，心正然后身修，身修然后国家天下治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1173192_comment'></div>以是为大学之道，百王莫不同然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1173192_comment'></div>而见于经者，莫详于尧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1173192_comment'></div>盖聪明文思，尧之得于其心者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1173192_comment'></div>克明俊德，有诸心，故能求诸身也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1173192_comment'></div>以亲九族，九族既睦，有诸身，故能求诸家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1173192_comment'></div>平章百姓，百姓昭明，有诸家，故能求诸国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1173192_comment'></div>协和万邦，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_141_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/474/Comments/0")'>黎民</span>于变时雍，有诸国，故能求诸天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1173192_comment'></div>积于其心以至于身修，此尧之所以先觉，非求之于外也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1173192_comment'></div>积于其家以至于天下治，此尧之所以觉斯民，非强之于耳目也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1173192_comment'></div>夫然，故尧之治何为也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1173192_comment'></div>民之从之也，岂识其所以从之者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1173192_comment'></div>此先王之化也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1173192_comment'></div>然以是为无法，立司徒之官以教之者法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1173192_comment'></div>教之者，导之以效上之所为而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1173192_comment'></div>养之于学，所以使之讲明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1173192_comment'></div>文之以礼乐，所以使之服习，皆教之之具也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1173192_comment'></div>使之讲明者，所以达上之所为，使之服习者，所以顺上之所为，所谓效之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1173192_comment'></div>上之所有，故下得而效之，未有上之所无，下得而效之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1173192_comment'></div>当尧之时，万邦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_153_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/507/Comments/0")'>黎民</span>之所效者，尧之百官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1173192_comment'></div>百官之所效者，尧之九族；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1173192_comment'></div>九族之所效者，尧之身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1173192_comment'></div>而导之以效上之所为者，舜为司徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1173192_comment'></div>舜于其官，则又慎徽五典，身先之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1173192_comment'></div>然后至于五典克从，民效之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1173192_comment'></div>及舜之时，舜之导民者固有素矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1173192_comment'></div>然水害之后，其命契为司徒，则犹曰：「百姓不亲，五品不逊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1173192_comment'></div>敬敷五教，在宽」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1173192_comment'></div>盖忧民之不亲，而念其不顺上之化，命之以谨布其教，而终戒之以在宽，岂迫蹴之也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1173192_comment'></div>其上下之际，导民者如此，此先王之教也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1173192_comment'></div>为之命令，为之典章，为之官守，以致于民，此先王之政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1173192_comment'></div>盖化者所以觉之也，教者所以导之也，政者所以率之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1173192_comment'></div>觉之无可言，未有可以导之者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1173192_comment'></div>导之无可言，未有可以率之者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1173192_comment'></div>而况于率之无可言，而欲一断之以刑乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1173192_comment'></div>孟子曰：「徒善不足以为政，徒法不能以自行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1173192_comment'></div>其所谓善，觉之者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1173192_comment'></div>其所谓法，导之者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1173192_comment'></div>其所谓政，率之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1173192_comment'></div>其相须以成，未有去其一而可以言王道之备者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1173192_comment'></div>先王之养民而迪之以教化，如此其详且尽矣，而民犹有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_174_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/564/Comments/0")'>不率</span>者，故不得不加之以刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1173192_comment'></div>加之以刑者，非可已而不已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1173192_comment'></div>然先王之刑，固又有叙矣，民之有罪也，必察焉，眚也，过也，非终也，虽厥罪大，未加之以刑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1173192_comment'></div>民之有罪也，必察焉，非眚也，非过也，终也，其养之有所不足，其教之有所不至，则必责己而恕人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1173192_comment'></div>故《汤诰》曰：「惟尔万方有罪，在予一人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1173192_comment'></div>予一人有罪，无以尔万方」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1173192_comment'></div>如是，故以民之罪为自我致之，未加之以刑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1173192_comment'></div>民之有罪必察焉，其养之无所不足，教之无所不至，不若我政人有罪矣，民之罪自作也，然犹有渐于恶者久，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_181_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/599/Comments/0")'>蒙化</span>之日浅者，则又曰勿庸杀之，姑惟教之，未加之以刑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1173192_comment'></div>民之有罪，非眚也，非过也，终也，自作也，教之而犹不典式我也，则是其终无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_182_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/609/Comments/0")'>悛心</span>，众之所弃，而天之所讨也，然后加之以刑，《多方》之所谓「至于再、至于三」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1173192_comment'></div>故有虽厥罪小，乃不可以不杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1173192_comment'></div>用刑如此其详且慎，故先王之刑刑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1173192_comment'></div>其养民之具、教民之方，不如先王之详且尽，未有可以先王之刑刑民者也，矧曰其以非先王之刑刑民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1173192_comment'></div>昔唐虞之际，相继百年，天下之人，四罪而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1173192_comment'></div>及至于周，成康之世，刑之不用，亦四十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1173192_comment'></div>则先王之民，加之以刑者，殆亦无矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1173192_comment'></div>先王之治，使百姓足于衣食，迁善而远罪矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1173192_comment'></div>人之所以相交接者不可以废，故曰宾，宾者非独施于来诸侯、通四夷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1173192_comment'></div>人之所以相保聚者不可以废，故曰师，师者非独施于征不庭、伐不惠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1173192_comment'></div>八政之所先后如此，所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_192_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/643/Comments/0")'>彝伦</span>之叙也，不然则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_192_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/644/Comments/0")'>彝伦</span>之斁而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1173192_comment'></div>「四、五纪：曰岁，曰月，曰日，曰星辰，曰历数」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1173192_comment'></div>盖协之以岁，协之以月，协之以日者，所以正时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1173192_comment'></div>而协之以星辰者，所以考其验于显也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1173192_comment'></div>协之以历数者，所以考其验于微也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1173192_comment'></div>正时，然后万事得其叙，所谓历象日月星辰，期三百六旬有六日，以闰月定四时成岁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1173192_comment'></div>「五、皇极：皇建其有极，敛时五福，用敷锡厥庶民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1173192_comment'></div>惟时厥庶民于汝极，锡汝保极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1173192_comment'></div>凡厥庶民，无有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_200_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/671/Comments/0")'>淫朋</span>，人无有比德，惟皇作极」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1173192_comment'></div>言大建其有中，故能聚是五福，以布与众民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1173192_comment'></div>而惟时厥众民，皆于汝中，与汝保中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1173192_comment'></div>盖中者民所受以生，而保中者不失其性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1173192_comment'></div>凡厥众民，无有以淫为朋，人无有以比为德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1173192_comment'></div>盖淫者有所过也，比者有所附也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1173192_comment'></div>无所过，无所附，故能惟大作中也，人谓学士大夫别于民者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1173192_comment'></div>「凡厥庶民，有猷有为有守，汝则念之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1173192_comment'></div>不协于极，不罹于咎，皇则受之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1173192_comment'></div>而康而色，曰：『予攸好德』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1173192_comment'></div>汝则锡之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1173192_comment'></div>时人斯其惟皇之极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1173192_comment'></div>无虐茕独；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1173192_comment'></div>而畏高明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1173192_comment'></div>人之有能有为，使羞其行，而邦其昌」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1173192_comment'></div>言厥庶民有猷有为有守者，汝则念其中不中，其不协于中，不罹于咎，若狂也肆、矜也廉、愚也直之类，大则受之，言大者非小者之所能受也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1173192_comment'></div>而安汝颜色，而谓之曰：「予攸好德」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1173192_comment'></div>所以教之使协于中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1173192_comment'></div>有猷有为有守而不罹于咎者，民之有志而无恶者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1173192_comment'></div>不协于极者，不能无所过而已，教之则其从可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1173192_comment'></div>如是而汝则与之以福，富之以禄，贵之以位，所以示天下之人，而使之劝也，如此则是人斯其惟大之中矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1173192_comment'></div>夫刚不中者至于虐茕独；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1173192_comment'></div>柔不中者至于畏高明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1173192_comment'></div>今也惟大之中，故刚无虐茕独，柔无畏高明，所谓刚而无虐，柔而立也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1173192_comment'></div>盖刚至于虐茕独，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_226_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/739/Comments/0")'>六极</span>恶之事也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1173192_comment'></div>柔至于畏高明，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_227_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/741/Comments/0")'>六极</span>弱之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1173192_comment'></div>惟皇之极，则五福攸好德之事也，所以言之者不同，至其可以推而明之也，则犹一言而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1173192_comment'></div>洪范于皇极，于三德，于五福、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_229_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/749/Comments/1")'>六极</span>，言人之性，或刚柔之中，或刚柔有过与不及，故或得或失，而其要未尝不欲去其偏，与夔之教胄子、皋陶之陈九德者无以异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1173192_comment'></div>盖人性之得失不易乎此，而所以教与所以察之者，亦不易乎此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1173192_comment'></div>教之、福之，而民之协于中者如此，又使有能有为者进其行而不已，则久而后能积，积而后能大，大而后能著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1173192_comment'></div>人材之盛如此，而国其有不兴者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1173192_comment'></div>故曰「人之有能有为，使羞其行，而邦其昌」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1173192_comment'></div>「凡厥正人，既富方谷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1173192_comment'></div>汝弗能使有好于而家，时人斯其辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1173192_comment'></div>于其无好德，汝虽锡之福，其作汝用咎」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1173192_comment'></div>言凡正人之道，既富之，然后可以责善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1173192_comment'></div>责善者，必始于汝家，使无所好于汝家，则是人斯其辜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1173192_comment'></div>既言不能正家以率之，则陷人于罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1173192_comment'></div>又言不好德之人而汝与之福，其起汝为咎而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1173192_comment'></div>故曰「于其无好德，汝虽锡之福，其作汝用咎」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1173192_comment'></div>自「皇建其有极」至「使羞其行」，皆所以教也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1173192_comment'></div>而于此乃曰「凡厥正人，既富方谷」，又曰使无好于而家，时人斯其辜者，明教之必本于富，行之必始于家，其先后次序然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1173192_comment'></div>「无偏无陂，遵王之义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1173192_comment'></div>无有作好，遵王之道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1173192_comment'></div>无有作恶，遵王之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1173192_comment'></div>无偏无党，王道荡荡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1173192_comment'></div>无党无偏，王道平平；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1173192_comment'></div>无反无侧，王道正直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1173192_comment'></div>会其有极，归其有极」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1173192_comment'></div>「无偏无陂，遵王之义」者，无过与不及，无偏也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1173192_comment'></div>无不平，无陂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1173192_comment'></div>所循者惟其宜而无适莫，遵王之义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1173192_comment'></div>「无有作好，遵王之道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1173192_comment'></div>无有作恶，遵王之路」者，作好作恶，偏于己之所好恶者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1173192_comment'></div>好恶以理，不偏于己之所好恶，无作好作恶也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1173192_comment'></div>所循者通道大路而不由径，遵王之道路也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1173192_comment'></div>道路云者，异辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1173192_comment'></div>「无偏无党，王道荡荡」者，存于己者无偏，则施于人者无党，无偏无党也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1173192_comment'></div>其为道也，广大而不狭吝，王道荡荡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1173192_comment'></div>「无党无偏，王道平平」者，施于人者无党，则存于己者无偏，无党无偏也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1173192_comment'></div>其为道也，夷易而无阻艰，王道平平也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1173192_comment'></div>「无反无侧，王道正直」者，无所背，无反也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1173192_comment'></div>非在左而不得乎右，在右而不得乎左，无侧也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1173192_comment'></div>其为道也，所止者不邪，所由者不曲，王道正直也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1173192_comment'></div>如是，所以为王之义、为王之道、为王之路，明王天下者，未有不如是而可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1173192_comment'></div>「会于有极」者，来而赴乎中也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1173192_comment'></div>「归于有极」者，往而反乎中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_270_1173192_comment'></div>由「无偏」以至于「无侧」，所知者非一曲，所守者非一方，推天下之理，达天下之故，能大而不遗小，能远而不遗近，能显而不遗微，所谓天下之通道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1173192_comment'></div>来者之所赴，归者之所反，中者居其要，而宗之者如此，所应者弥广，所操者弥约，所谓天下之大本也，君人者未有不由此而国家天下可为者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1173192_comment'></div>其可考于经，则《易》之智周乎万物，道济乎天下，故不过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1173192_comment'></div>其可考于行事，则舜之执其两端而用中于民；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1173192_comment'></div>汤之执中立贤无方，能推其无偏陂、无作好恶、无偏党、无反侧之理，而用其无适莫、无由径、无狭吝、无阻艰、无所背、无在左而不得乎右、在右而不得乎左者，以通天下之故而不泥，执其所会所归之中以为本，故能定也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1173192_comment'></div>夫然，故《易》之道为圣人之要道，非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_276_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/903/Comments/0")'>穷技</span>曲学之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1173192_comment'></div>舜之治民，为皇建其有极，用敷锡厥庶民，非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_277_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/907/Comments/0")'>偏政</span>逸德之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1173192_comment'></div>汤之用贤，为翕受敷施，九德咸事，非私好独恶之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_278_1173192_comment'></div>《洪范》之为类虽九，然充人之材，以至于其极者，则在于思；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_279_1173192_comment'></div>通天下之故，而能定者，则在于中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_280_1173192_comment'></div>其要未有易此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_281_1173192_comment'></div>「曰，皇极之敷言，是彝是训，于帝其训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_282_1173192_comment'></div>凡厥庶民，极之敷言，是训是行，以近天子之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_283_1173192_comment'></div>曰，天子作民父母，为天下王」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_284_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_285_1173192_comment'></div>曰者，其辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_286_1173192_comment'></div>其辞以谓人君之于大中，既成之以德，又布之以言，是以为常，是以为顺，于帝其顺而已，人君之为言，顺天而致之于民，故凡其众民，亦于极之布言，是顺是行，以亲附天子之辉光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_287_1173192_comment'></div>而「曰，天子作民父母，为天下王」，曰父母者，亲之辞也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_288_1173192_comment'></div>曰王者，往之辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_289_1173192_comment'></div>上之人于「遵王之义」至「王道正直」，能繇前之说，则下之人于顺上之所行所言，而相与附之，其爱之曰父母，而戴之曰天下王，必繇后之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_290_1173192_comment'></div>经所以始其义于彼，而终其效于此者，以明上之所以王者如是，则下之所以王之者如是，非虚致也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_291_1173192_comment'></div>「六、三德：一曰正直，二曰刚克，三曰柔克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_292_1173192_comment'></div>平康正直，强弗友刚克，燮友柔克」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_293_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_294_1173192_comment'></div>正直者，常德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_295_1173192_comment'></div>刚克者，刚胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_296_1173192_comment'></div>柔克者，柔胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_297_1173192_comment'></div>「平康正直，强弗友刚克，燮友柔克」者，所遇之变殊，故所乂之德异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_298_1173192_comment'></div>凡此者，所以治人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_299_1173192_comment'></div>「高明柔克，沉潜刚克」，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_300_1173192_comment'></div>人之为德<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_301_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/989/Comments/0")'>高亢</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_301_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/989/Comments/1")'>明爽</span>者，本于刚，而柔有不足也，故济之以柔克，所以救其偏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_301_1173192_comment'></div>沉深潜晦者，本于柔，而刚有不足也，故济之以刚克，所以救其偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_302_1173192_comment'></div>正直则无所偏，故无所救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_303_1173192_comment'></div>凡此者，所以治己与人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_304_1173192_comment'></div>「惟辟作福作威玉食，臣无有作福作威玉食，臣之有作福作威玉食，其害于而家，凶于而国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_305_1173192_comment'></div>人用侧颇僻，民用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_306_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1009/Comments/1")'>僭忒</span>」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_306_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_307_1173192_comment'></div>作福者，柔克之所有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_308_1173192_comment'></div>作威者，刚克之所有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_309_1173192_comment'></div>惟辟作福作威玉食，臣无有作福作威玉食者，正直之所有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_310_1173192_comment'></div>以其卒曰，臣之有作福作威玉食，则人用侧颇僻，民用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_311_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1021/Comments/0")'>僭忒</span>，是以知惟辟作福作威玉食，臣无有作福作威玉食者，正直之所有也明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_311_1173192_comment'></div>箕子之言者，皆九畴之所有；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_312_1173192_comment'></div>九畴之所无者，箕子盖不得而言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_313_1173192_comment'></div>知此，则知九畴之为九矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_314_1173192_comment'></div>人君于五事，思无所不通，聪明无所不达，言之出纳无所不允，于皇极所遵者正直，所不可入者偏陂反侧、作好作恶、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_315_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1036/Comments/2")'>淫朋</span>比德之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_315_1173192_comment'></div>人臣虽有小人之桀者，未有能蔽其上而作福作威玉食者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_316_1173192_comment'></div>人臣虽作福作威玉食者，必窥其间，缘其有可蔽之端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_317_1173192_comment'></div>故虽小人之庸者，犹得以无忌惮而放其邪心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_318_1173192_comment'></div>《洪范》以作福柔克之所有，作威刚克之所有，惟辟作福作威玉食，正直之所有，臣而作福，则僭君之柔克，臣而作威，则僭君之刚克，臣而作福作威玉食，则为侧颇僻，无所不僭矣，故于三德详言之，至若杜其间，使无可蔽之端，虽有邪臣不得萌其僭者，则在于五事修、皇极建而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_319_1173192_comment'></div>「七、稽疑：择建立卜筮人，乃命卜筮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_320_1173192_comment'></div>曰雨，曰霁，曰蒙，曰驿，曰克，曰贞，曰悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_321_1173192_comment'></div>凡七，卜五，占用二，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_322_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1073/Comments/0")'>衍忒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_322_1173192_comment'></div>立时人作卜筮，三人占，则从二人之言」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_323_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_324_1173192_comment'></div>言选择知卜筮之人而建立之，乃命之以其职，曰雨、霁、蒙、驿、克之五兆，所以卜，所谓卜五者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_325_1173192_comment'></div>曰贞曰悔之二卦，所以筮，所谓凡七者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_326_1173192_comment'></div>已命之以其职矣，乃立是人，使作卜筮之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_327_1173192_comment'></div>三人占，则从二人之言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_328_1173192_comment'></div>卜不同，则从多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_329_1173192_comment'></div>「汝则有大疑，谋及乃心，谋及卿士，谋及庶人，谋及卜筮」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_330_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_331_1173192_comment'></div>谋及乃心，揆诸己也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_332_1173192_comment'></div>谋及卿士，谋及庶人，质诸人也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_333_1173192_comment'></div>谋及龟筮，参诸鬼神也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_334_1173192_comment'></div>《舜典》曰：「朕志先定，询谋佥同，鬼神其依，龟筮协从」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_335_1173192_comment'></div>谓此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_336_1173192_comment'></div>「汝则从，龟从，筮从，卿士从，庶民从，是之谓大同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_337_1173192_comment'></div>身其康强，子孙其逢吉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_338_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_339_1173192_comment'></div>从于心而人神之所共与也，故谓之大同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_340_1173192_comment'></div>则身其康强，子孙其逢吉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_341_1173192_comment'></div>「汝则从，龟从，筮从，卿士逆，庶民逆：吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_342_1173192_comment'></div>卿士从，龟从，筮从，汝则逆，庶民逆：吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_343_1173192_comment'></div>庶民从，龟从，筮从，汝则逆，卿士逆：吉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_344_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_345_1173192_comment'></div>所从者多，则吉可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_346_1173192_comment'></div>「汝则从，龟从，筮逆，卿士逆，庶民逆：作内吉，作外凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_347_1173192_comment'></div>龟筮共违于人：用静吉，用作凶」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_348_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_349_1173192_comment'></div>心与龟之所从，则作内吉而已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_350_1173192_comment'></div>龟筮之所共违，则不可以有作矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_351_1173192_comment'></div>凡谋先人者，尽人事也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_352_1173192_comment'></div>从逆先卜筮者，钦鬼神也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_353_1173192_comment'></div>吉有三：有卿士逆、庶民逆者矣，有汝则逆、庶民逆者矣，有汝则逆、卿士逆者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_354_1173192_comment'></div>若龟从、筮从，则皆不害其为吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_355_1173192_comment'></div>又至于龟从、筮逆，则可以作内而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_356_1173192_comment'></div>龟筮共违，则皆不可以有作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_357_1173192_comment'></div>盖疑故卜筮，卜筮者，吾以谓通诸神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_358_1173192_comment'></div>神明之所从，则吾必其吉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_359_1173192_comment'></div>神明之所违，则吾必其凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_360_1173192_comment'></div>诚之至，谨之尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_361_1173192_comment'></div>「八、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_362_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1184/Comments/2")'>庶徵</span>：曰雨，曰旸，曰燠，曰寒，曰风，曰时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_362_1173192_comment'></div>五者来备，各以其叙，庶草<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_363_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1193/Comments/0")'>蕃庑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_363_1173192_comment'></div>一极备凶，一极无凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_364_1173192_comment'></div>曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_365_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1196/Comments/0")'>休徵</span>：曰肃，时雨若；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_365_1173192_comment'></div>曰乂，时旸若；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_366_1173192_comment'></div>曰哲，时燠若；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_367_1173192_comment'></div>曰谋，时寒若；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_368_1173192_comment'></div>曰圣，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_369_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1206/Comments/0")'>时风</span>若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_369_1173192_comment'></div>曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_370_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1207/Comments/0")'>咎徵</span>：曰狂，恒雨若；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_370_1173192_comment'></div>曰僭，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_371_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1211/Comments/0")'>恒旸</span>若；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_371_1173192_comment'></div>曰豫，恒燠若；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_372_1173192_comment'></div>曰急，恒寒若；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_373_1173192_comment'></div>曰蒙，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_374_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1217/Comments/1")'>恒风</span>若」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_374_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_375_1173192_comment'></div>曰雨、曰旸、曰燠、曰寒、曰风，所谓五者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_376_1173192_comment'></div>曰时，则五者之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_377_1173192_comment'></div>五者无不至，则所谓五者来备也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_378_1173192_comment'></div>无不时，则所谓各以其叙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_379_1173192_comment'></div>五者无不至，无不时，则至于庶草莫不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_380_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1229/Comments/0")'>蕃庑</span>，言阴阳和，则万物莫不茂盛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_380_1173192_comment'></div>五者有所甚，则为侧，所谓一极备凶也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_381_1173192_comment'></div>有所不至亦为沴，所谓一极无凶也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_382_1173192_comment'></div>于五事，貌足以作肃，则时雨顺之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_383_1173192_comment'></div>其咎狂，则常雨顺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_384_1173192_comment'></div>言足以作乂，则时旸顺之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_385_1173192_comment'></div>其咎僭，则常旸顺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_386_1173192_comment'></div>视足以作哲，则时燠顺之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_387_1173192_comment'></div>其咎豫，则常燠顺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_388_1173192_comment'></div>听足以作谋，则时寒顺之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_389_1173192_comment'></div>其咎急，则常寒顺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_390_1173192_comment'></div>思足以作圣，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_391_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1255/Comments/0")'>时风</span>顺之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_391_1173192_comment'></div>其咎蒙，则常风顺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_392_1173192_comment'></div>凡言时者皆休之徵，凡言常者皆咎之徵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_393_1173192_comment'></div>五事之当否在于此，而五徵之休咎应于彼，为人君者所以不敢不念，而考己之得失于天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_394_1173192_comment'></div>「曰，王省惟岁，卿士惟月，师尹惟日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_395_1173192_comment'></div>岁月日时无易，百谷用成，乂用明，俊民用章，家用平康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_396_1173192_comment'></div>日月岁时既易，百谷用不成，乂用昏不明，俊民用微，家用不宁」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_397_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_398_1173192_comment'></div>此章之所言者，皆念用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_399_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1280/Comments/0")'>庶徵</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_399_1173192_comment'></div>休咎之徵，各象其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_400_1173192_comment'></div>任其事者，王也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_401_1173192_comment'></div>与王共其任者，卿士、师尹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_402_1173192_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_403_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1287/Comments/0")'>庶徵</span>之来，王与卿士、师尹之所当省，其所以致之者，所谓念用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_403_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1290/Comments/0")'>庶徵</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_403_1173192_comment'></div>王计一岁之徵而省之，卿士计一月之徵而省之，师尹计一日之徵而省之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_404_1173192_comment'></div>所省多者，其任责重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_405_1173192_comment'></div>所省少者，其任责轻，其所处之分然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_406_1173192_comment'></div>王与卿士、师尹之所省，岁月日三者之时无易，言各顺其任，则百谷用成，乂用明，俊民用章，家用平康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_407_1173192_comment'></div>王与卿士、师尹之所省，日月岁三者之时既易，言各违其任，则百谷用不成，乂用昏不明，俊民用微，家用不宁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_408_1173192_comment'></div>「庶民惟星，星有好风，星有好雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_409_1173192_comment'></div>日月之行，则有冬有夏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_410_1173192_comment'></div>月之从星，则以风雨」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_411_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_412_1173192_comment'></div>言星之所好不同，而日月之行则有常度，有常度者不妄从，则星不得作其好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_413_1173192_comment'></div>如民之好不同，而王与卿士、师尹之动则有常理，有常理者不妄从，则民不能作其好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_414_1173192_comment'></div>故月行失其道，而从星之所好，则以风雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_415_1173192_comment'></div>犹王政失其常，而从民之所好，则以非僻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_416_1173192_comment'></div>言此者以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_417_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1335/Comments/0")'>庶徵</span>之来，王与卿士、师尹则能自省，而民则不能自省者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_417_1173192_comment'></div>民不能自省，则王与卿士、师尹当省民之得失，而知己之所以致之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_418_1173192_comment'></div>己之所致者，民得其性，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_419_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1343/Comments/0")'>休徵</span>之所集也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_419_1173192_comment'></div>己之所致者，民失其性，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_420_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1346/Comments/0")'>咎徵</span>之所集也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_420_1173192_comment'></div>故省民者，乃所以自省也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_421_1173192_comment'></div>其反复如此者，所以畏天变、尽人事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_422_1173192_comment'></div>知王与卿士、师尹之所省者如此，则知此章之所言，非念用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_423_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1353/Comments/0")'>庶徵</span>则不言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_423_1173192_comment'></div>不知王与卿士、师尹之所省者如此，则于念用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_424_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1355/Comments/0")'>庶徵</span>无所当，而于言为赘矣，是不知九畴之为九也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_424_1173192_comment'></div>「九、五福：一曰寿，二曰富，三曰康宁，四曰攸好德，五曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_425_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1363/Comments/0")'>考终命</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_425_1173192_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_426_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1364/Comments/0")'>六极</span>：一曰凶短折，二曰疾，三曰忧，四曰贫，五曰恶，六曰弱」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_426_1173192_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_427_1173192_comment'></div>民能保极，则不为外物戕其生理，故寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_428_1173192_comment'></div>食货足，故富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_429_1173192_comment'></div>无疾忧，故康宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_430_1173192_comment'></div>于汝极，故攸好德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_431_1173192_comment'></div>无不得其死者，故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_432_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1382/Comments/0")'>考终命</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_432_1173192_comment'></div>人君之道失，则有不得其死者，有戕其生理者，故凶短折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_433_1173192_comment'></div>不康，故疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_434_1173192_comment'></div>不宁，故忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_435_1173192_comment'></div>食货不足，故贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_436_1173192_comment'></div>不能使之于汝极，则刚者至于暴，故恶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_437_1173192_comment'></div>柔者不能立，故弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_438_1173192_comment'></div>此人君所以考己之得失于民者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_439_1173192_comment'></div>或曰：福极之言如此，而不及贵贱，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_440_1173192_comment'></div>曰：九畴者，皆人君之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_441_1173192_comment'></div>福极者，人君所以考己之得失于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_442_1173192_comment'></div>福之在于民，则人君之所当向，极之在于民，则人君之所当畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_443_1173192_comment'></div>福言攸好德，则致民于善可知也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_444_1173192_comment'></div>极言恶弱，则致民于不善可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_445_1173192_comment'></div>视此以向畏者，人君之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_446_1173192_comment'></div>未有攸好德而非可贵者也，未有恶弱而非可贱者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_447_1173192_comment'></div>故攸好德则锡之福，谓贵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_448_1173192_comment'></div>所以劝天下之人，使协于中，固已见之皇极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_449_1173192_comment'></div>于皇极言之者，固所以勉人，于福极不言之者，攸好德与恶弱之在乎民，则考吾之得失者尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_450_1173192_comment'></div>贵贱非考吾之得失者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_451_1173192_comment'></div>人君之于五行，始之以五事，修其性于己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_452_1173192_comment'></div>次之以八政，推其用于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_453_1173192_comment'></div>次之以五纪，协其时于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_454_1173192_comment'></div>次之以皇极，谨其常以应天下之故，而率天下之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_455_1173192_comment'></div>次之以三德，治其中不中，以适天下之变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_456_1173192_comment'></div>次之以稽疑，以审其吉凶于人神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_457_1173192_comment'></div>次之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_458_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1446/Comments/0")'>庶徵</span>，以考其得失于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_458_1173192_comment'></div>终之以福极，以考其得失于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_459_1173192_comment'></div>其始终先后与夫粗精小大之际，可谓尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_460_1173192_comment'></div>自五事至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_461_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1452/Comments/0")'>六极</span>皆言用，而五行不言用者，自五事至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_461_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1454/Comments/0")'>六极</span>皆以顺五行，则五行之用可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_461_1173192_comment'></div>《虞书》于六府言修，则箕子于五行，言其所化之因于人者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_462_1173192_comment'></div>《虞书》于六府，次之以三事，则箕子于五行，次之以五事而下是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_463_1173192_comment'></div>《虞书》于九功，言戒之用休，董之用威，则箕子于九畴，言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_464_1173192", 1173192, "Clauses/1467/Comments/0")'>庶徵</span>之与福极是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_464_1173192_comment'></div>则知二帝三王之治天下，其道未尝不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_465_1173192_comment'></div>其道未尝不同者，万世之所不能易，此九畴之所以为大法也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_466_1173192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173192'><span class='label'>按：</span>《读书记》、顾校本、章校本、吴校本、傅校本注「此句疑有讹字」。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1173192_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　曾巩作《祭寿阳县君文》<div id='poem_1173409' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173409' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_0_1173094_comment'></div>伏惟史馆相公言为蓍蔡，行应准绳，兼文武之闳材，富天人之奥学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173094_comment'></div>神祇幽赞，遭圣贤相得之时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173094_comment'></div>夷夏耸观，备君臣咸有之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173094_comment'></div>果由枢轴，首秉钧衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173094_comment'></div>窃惟不世之姿，深达当今之务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173094_comment'></div>必且开公平之路，以序进群能；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173094_comment'></div>销壅蔽之萌，以广延众论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173094_comment'></div>以宽大为拯救疮痍之要，以安静为休息疲瘵之端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173094_comment'></div>绌聚敛之无名，偃甲兵而不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173094_comment'></div>果推此道，以泽吾民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173094_comment'></div>食味别声之伦，举皆受赐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173094_comment'></div>殊邻绝党之俗，孰不向风？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173094_comment'></div>福禄可等于丘山，功名必永于金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173094_comment'></div>巩蚤游<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173094", onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1172961", 1172961, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>自投</span>必死；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172961_comment'></div>乾坤之大，终许更生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172961_comment'></div>雕题交阯，心服于威灵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172961_comment'></div>大赂南金，岁遵于贡职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172961_comment'></div>允出止戈之武，是称无敌之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172961_comment'></div>臣远守藩维，获闻捷奏，永怀窃抃，实倍常情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172961_comment'></div>臣伏恨职守所拘，不获称庆阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172961_comment'></div>臣不任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1172961_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1172961'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷二七。又见《曾文定公集》卷一○，清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷八。<br /></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　入夏不雨，曾巩率吏士祈雨，作《福州鳝溪祷雨文》<div id='poem_1173456' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173456' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173456?labeling=true' target='_blank'>福州鳝溪祷雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173456")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173456_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173456'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173456'>曰嗟乎旱也，谁则为之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173456_comment'></div>芃芃之稼，将槁而萎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173456_comment'></div>嗷嗷之众，曷望而依？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173456_comment'></div>维闽属者，寇贼之罹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173456_comment'></div>逮其既附，我士已疲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173456_comment'></div>馀丑成群，百十<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173456", 1173456, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>睢睢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173456_comment'></div>跳踉出没，负力乘巇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173456_comment'></div>亦有为渠，诸偷所推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173456_comment'></div>相望棋布，未受絷羁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173456_comment'></div>室家莫宁，远近并疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173456_comment'></div>我畜以柔，亦震以威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173456_comment'></div>从有法赏，不从系累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173456_comment'></div>或扰而序，或就缠徽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173456_comment'></div>逮岁朔易，荡定无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173456_comment'></div>山林夜行，笑语追随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173456_comment'></div>吾人即安，含糗而嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173456_comment'></div>士马亦奋，桓桓骙骙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173456_comment'></div>天子圣德，海邦是绥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173456_comment'></div>维此海邦，初亦难饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173456_comment'></div>今宁宇矣，师征始归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173456_comment'></div>今食足矣，廪实尚微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173456_comment'></div>若岁大熟，如梁如茨，如京如坻，自公及私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173456_comment'></div>狱无讼系，里无盗窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173456_comment'></div>式于永世，方始在兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173456_comment'></div>今此大田，既硕而齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173456_comment'></div>俾不卒成，孰忍为斯？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173456_comment'></div>神有灵迹，国人所祗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173456_comment'></div>神有显号，天子所跻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173456_comment'></div>萎能起之，槁能泽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173456_comment'></div>胡宁有馀，敛而不施？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173456_comment'></div>我用卜日，早驾以驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173456_comment'></div>即告潭侧，尚其听之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173456_comment'></div>攘除骄阳，腾云彍霓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173456_comment'></div>播为甘液，霈洒淋漓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173456_comment'></div>俾农有秋，百物具宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173456_comment'></div>熄偷与争，长置刑笞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173456_comment'></div>人于报事，岂有斁思。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1173456_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript:
