ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　曾巩作《谢雨文》<div id='poem_1173458' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173458' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173458?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173458")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173458_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173458'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173458'>维闽之人，前岁苦饥，去岁苦盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173458_comment'></div>足食而安，期自今始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173458_comment'></div>而方夏旱暵，惧害穑事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173458_comment'></div>兹余用稽于众，盖可以徼福于民者，罔不驰告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173458_comment'></div>不敢爱力，不敢宁居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173458_comment'></div>赖神之仁，畀以膏泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173458_comment'></div>自未至酉，远近<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173458", 1173458, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>周浃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173458_comment'></div>维岁大熟，可立而需。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173458_comment'></div>敢饬豆笾，报用典礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173458_comment'></div>吏无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173458", 1173458, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>明德</span>，而但知告其困急于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173458_comment'></div>神既赐之，其尚终惠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1173458_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　曾巩作《题祷雨文后》<div id='poem_1173167' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173167' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173167?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题祷雨文后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173167")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173167_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173167'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173167'>福州元丰元年戊午，自四月甲子，至五月辛巳，凡十有八日不雨，田已忧旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173167_comment'></div>太守率属吏士，分祷诸佛祠，迎像能致雨者陈之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173167", 1173167, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>通路</span>，用浮屠法为道场，率属吏士罗拜以请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173167_comment'></div>丁亥夜五鼓，出祷鳝溪，属吏士分祷群望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173167_comment'></div>己丑，率属吏士蔬食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173167_comment'></div>夜四鼓，就城南近水祭告后土，将为坛祭龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173167_comment'></div>庚寅蔬食如己丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173167_comment'></div>夜三鼓，就<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173167", 1173167, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>坛壝</span>，刲鹅祭龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173167_comment'></div>辛卯夜五鼓，就视牲血，以法推之，当得雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173167_comment'></div>壬辰，就紫极宫坛，用青童二十有八人，更咒蜥蜴如古法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173167_comment'></div>癸巳，分祷诸祠未遍者，取黄檗山龙潭水置道场，率属吏士往请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173167_comment'></div>甲午，又往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173167_comment'></div>乙未夜二更得雨，连三日夜，远近皆有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173167_comment'></div>盖自辛巳至丙申，凡十有六日，无日不致祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173167_comment'></div>自丙戌至甲午，四境多得雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173167_comment'></div>至丁酉，乃皆有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173167_comment'></div>是日，罢道场，还所迎佛及水，送蜥蜴南涧之滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173167_comment'></div>庚子，遍祭谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173167_comment'></div>欲知闽粤之间，兼旬不雨，则已忧旱，而请祷之为不诬也，故刻其祝词于石，而并识之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1173167_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　曾巩作《福州拟贡荔枝状并荔枝录》<div id='poem_1173035' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173035' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173035?labeling=true' target='_blank'>福州拟贡荔枝状 荔枝录</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173035")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173035_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173035'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173035'>陈紫，出兴化军秘书省著作佐郎陈琦家，于品为第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173035_comment'></div>江绿，出福州，类陈紫差大，而香味盖为其次也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173035_comment'></div>方红，径可二寸，色味俱美，荔枝之大，无出此者，岁生二百颗而已，出兴化军尚书屯田郎中方蓁家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173035_comment'></div>游家紫，种自陈紫，实大过之，出兴化军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173035_comment'></div>小陈紫，实差小，出兴化军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173035_comment'></div>宋公荔枝，实如陈紫而小，甘美亦如之，出兴化军宋氏，世传其木已三百岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173035_comment'></div>蓝家红，泉州第一，出尚书都官员外郎蓝丞家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173035_comment'></div>周家红，初于兴化军为第一，及陈紫、方红出，而周家红为次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173035_comment'></div>何家红，出漳州何氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173035_comment'></div>法石白，出泉州法石院，色青白，其大次于蓝家红。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173035_comment'></div>绿核，出福州，荔枝核紫，而此独核绿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173035_comment'></div>圆丁香，丁香荔枝皆旁蒂大而下锐，此独圆而味尤胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173035_comment'></div>右十四种，皆以次第著于录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173035_comment'></div>虎皮，色红而有青斑，类虎皮，出福州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173035_comment'></div>牛心，以状名之，长二寸馀，皮厚肉涩，出福州，惟一本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173035_comment'></div>玳瑁红，色红而又有黑点，类玳瑁，出福州城东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173035_comment'></div>琉黄，以色类琉黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173035_comment'></div>朱柿，色朱如柿，出福州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173035_comment'></div>蒲桃荔枝，穗生，一穗之实至三百，然其品殊下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173035_comment'></div>蚶壳，以状名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173035_comment'></div>龙牙，长可三四寸，弯曲如爪牙，而无瓤核，出兴化军，然不常有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173035_comment'></div>水荔枝，浆多而淡，出兴化军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173035_comment'></div>蜜荔枝，以甘为名，然过于甘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173035_comment'></div>丁香荔枝，核小如丁香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173035_comment'></div>大丁香，壳厚色紫，味微涩，出福州天庆观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173035_comment'></div>双髻小荔枝，每朵数十，皆并蒂双实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173035_comment'></div>真珠荔枝，圆白如珠，无核，荔枝之最小者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173035_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1173035", 1173035, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>十八娘</span>荔枝，色深红而细长，闽王王氏有女第十八，好食此，因而得名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173035_comment'></div>女冢在福州城东报国院，冢旁犹有此木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173035_comment'></div>或云：谓物之美少者为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1173035", 1173035, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>十八娘</span>，闽人语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173035_comment'></div>将军荔枝，五代时有此官者种之，因以得名，出福州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173035_comment'></div>钗头颗荔枝，颗红而小，可施钗头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173035_comment'></div>粉红荔枝，荔枝多深红，而此以色浅为异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173035_comment'></div>中元红，实时最晚，因以得名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173035_comment'></div>火山荔枝，本出南越，四月熟，穗生，味甘酸，肉薄，闽中近年有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173035_comment'></div>右二十种，无次第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173035_comment'></div>荔枝三十四种，或言姓氏，或言州郡，或皆识其所出，或不言姓氏州郡，则福、泉、漳州、兴化军盖皆有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173035_comment'></div>一品红，言于荔枝为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1173035", 1173035, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>极品</span>也，出近岁，在福州州宅堂前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173035_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1173035", 1173035, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>状元红</span>，言于荔枝为第一，出近岁，在福州报国院<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173035_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1173035'>三十四：亦疑作「三十二」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1173035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1173035'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_38_1173035_0'>⑴ 《元丰类稿》卷三五。又见《曾文定公集》卷二，《黄氏日钞》卷六三，《古今图书集成》草木典卷二七五。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1173035_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　曾巩作《福州举知泉州陈枢久不磨勘特与转官状》<div id='poem_1173021' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173021")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173021_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173021'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173021'>右，臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173021", 1173021, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>体访</span>得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173021", 1173021, "Clauses/1/Comments/2")'>辖下</span>知泉州、尚书屯田员外郎陈枢，不下磨勘文字已十五年，中间曾遇覃恩改官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173021_comment'></div>其于绵历岁月，积累劳能，则考课常法，盖未及之，列于郎曹，为日已久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173021_comment'></div>方当朝廷崇尚廉素、诫抑浮竞之时，枢独安于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173021", 1173021, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>冲静</span>，所守如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173021_comment'></div>况枢操履纯笃，出自天资；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173021_comment'></div>治行循良，见于众论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173021_comment'></div>自历州县，及任淮南提点刑狱，与今来再任泉州，所至风绩，皆可称纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173021_comment'></div>伏乞特降指挥，下审官东院，检会枢合该磨勘月日，采其久不自陈，特与优转名曹，以奖恬退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173021_comment'></div>臣忝备寄任，不敢不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173021_comment'></div>谨具状奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1173021_comment'></div></div></div><br "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>艰拙</span>，利在退藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173122_comment'></div>虽有心诚向往之勤，而无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1173122", 1173122, id='poem_sentence_3_1173122_comment'></div>其为感激，但切铭藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173122_comment'></div>属凝冱之在辰，惟燕閒之均福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173122_comment'></div>伏以致政太傅侍中素推人杰，蚤代天工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173122_comment'></div>意诚心正而家齐，已仪刑于王室；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173122_comment'></div>功成名遂而身退，遂表则于士伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173122_comment'></div>聊曼衍以穷年，坐优游而进道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173122_comment'></div>矧臧孙之有后，继周公之拜前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173122_comment'></div>阿衡之格于天，《书》载君臣之德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173122_comment'></div>司徒之善其职，《诗》称父子之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173122_comment'></div>方赖壮猷，阴裨至治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173122_comment'></div>更冀上为邦国，善保寝兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173122_comment'></div>祷颂之诚，不胜恳悃。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1173122_comment'></div></div></div><br href='/Writing/1173022?labeling=true' target='_blank'>福州奏乞在京主判閒慢曹局或近京一便郡状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173022")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173022_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173022'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173022'>右，臣辄露悃愊，仰干旒扆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173022_comment'></div>臣母老多病，见居京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173022_comment'></div>臣任福州，臣弟布任广州，相去皆数千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173022_comment'></div>臣犬马之志，实不遑宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173022_comment'></div>臣昨移福州之日，曾乞哀怜，改授近地，寻奉圣旨不允，不敢再请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173022_comment'></div>臣既到任，属所部之内，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173022", 1173022, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>寇孽</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173022", 1173022, "Clauses/17/Comments/1")'>遗类</span>往往尚聚山谷，居人未宁，远近<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1173022", 1173022, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>疑骇</span>，而州之属邑，又有出于旱饥之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173022_comment'></div>臣于此时，正当竭其驽钝，复不敢以私计自陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173022_comment'></div>自去冬及今春以来，上赖朝廷威德，蚁聚馀寇，悉又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173022", 1173022, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>殄除</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173022_comment'></div>田畴之间，连获<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173022", 1173022, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>登稔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173022_comment'></div>今山海<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173022", 1173022, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>清谧</span>，千里宴然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173022_comment'></div>里闾相安，粟米丰羡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173022_comment'></div>臣于所部，乃无一事可以自效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173022_comment'></div>况臣到任，今年八月已及一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173022_comment'></div>远去庭闱，为日已久，晨昏之恋，谊难茍止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173022_comment'></div>则臣可以乞恩，实在今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173022_comment'></div>伏见朝廷至仁，比来群臣之中，有欲便于养亲者，并蒙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1173022", 1173022, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>听许</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173022_comment'></div>况臣母子各已白头，兄弟二人皆任远地，今臣于官守，又无可以驱驰之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173022_comment'></div>伏望圣慈悯恻，以臣老母见在京师，与臣一在京<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173022", 1173022, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>主判</span>閒慢曹局差遣，或就移近京一便郡，庶便亲养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173022_comment'></div>臣虽糜殒，曷报圣恩？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173022_comment'></div>臣不任惶惧战汗激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1173022_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>史观</span>，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173095_comment'></div>窃以安抚运使学士，材资秀特，识度淹冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173095_comment'></div>富华国之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173095", 1173095, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>懿文</span>，抱据经之宿学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173095_comment'></div>一人嗟异，欲相如之同时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173095_comment'></div>多士推先，服桓荣之稽古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173095_comment'></div>果由时望，特被朝恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173095_comment'></div>窃惟宠数之行，兹实要涂之渐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173095_comment'></div>伫跻法从，用协佥言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173095_comment'></div>巩获在下风，侧闻成命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173095_comment'></div>分符海徼，幸依<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173095", 1173095, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>德庇</span>之馀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173095_comment'></div>寓直书林，更托<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173095", 1173095, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>隽游</span>之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173095_comment'></div>其为欣庆，曷可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1173095", 1173095, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>缕陈</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1173095_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_content_1173096'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173096'>右巩启：窃审祇奉茂恩，进升宠秩，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173096_comment'></div>窃以知府都官周材经务，令德镇浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173096_comment'></div>席膴仕以弥优，简清衷而有素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173096_comment'></div>循良之政，已洽于民谣；<div class='inline' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　曾巩有《与俞叔通教授》<div id='poem_1173107' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173107' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_0_1173107_comment'></div>迫行不得迎接，谨奉启陈谢。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1173107_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　曾巩有《福州上执政书》<div id='poem_1173066' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173066' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173066")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173066_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173066'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173066'>巩顿首再拜上书某官：窃以先王之迹，去今远矣，其可概见者，尚存于《诗》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173066_comment'></div>《诗》存先王养士之法，所以抚循待遇之者，恩意可谓备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173066_comment'></div>故其长育天下之材，使之成就，则如萝蒿之在大陵，无有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>不遂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173066_comment'></div>其宾而接之，出于恳诚，则如《鹿鸣》之相呼召，其声音非自外至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173066_comment'></div>其燕之，则有饮食之具；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173066_comment'></div>乐之，则有琴瑟之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173066_comment'></div>将其厚意，则有币帛箱篚之赠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173066_comment'></div>要其大旨，则未尝不在于得其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>欢心</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173066_comment'></div>其人材既众，列于庶位，则如《棫朴》之盛，得而薪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173066_comment'></div>其以为使臣，则宠其往也，必以礼乐，使其光华皇皇于远近；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173066_comment'></div>劳其来也，则既知其功，又本其情而叙其勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173066_comment'></div>其以为将率，则于其行也，既送遣之，又识薇蕨之始生，而恐其归时之晚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173066_comment'></div>及其还也，既休息之，又追念其悄悄之忧，而及于仆夫之瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173066_comment'></div>当此之时，后妃之于内助，又知臣下之勤劳，其忧思之深，至于山脊、石砠、仆马之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173066_comment'></div>而志意之一，至于虽采卷耳，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>心不在焉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173066_comment'></div>盖先王之世，待天下士，其勤且详如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173066_comment'></div>故称周之士也贵，又称周之士也肆，而《天保》亦称「君能下下，以成其政；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173066_comment'></div>臣能归美，以报其上」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173066_comment'></div>其君臣上下相与之际如此，可谓至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173066_comment'></div>所谓必本其情而叙其勤者，在《四牡》之三章曰：「王事靡盬，不遑将父」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173066_comment'></div>四章曰：「王事靡盬，不遑将母」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173066_comment'></div>而其卒章则曰：「岂不怀归？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173066_comment'></div>是用作歌，将母来谂」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173066_comment'></div>释者以谓：「谂，告也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173066_comment'></div>君劳使臣，叙述其情，曰：女岂不诚思归乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173066_comment'></div>故作此诗之歌，以养父母之志，来告于君也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173066_comment'></div>既休息之，而又追叙其情如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173066_comment'></div>繇是观之，上之所以接下，未尝不恐失其养父母之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173066_comment'></div>下之所以事上，有养父母之心，未尝不以告也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173066_comment'></div>其劳使臣之辞则然，而推至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>戍役</span>之人，亦劳之以「王事靡盬，忧我父母」，则先王之政，即人之心，莫大于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173066_comment'></div>及其后世，或任使不均，或苦于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>征役</span>，而不得养其父母，则有《北山》之感，《鸨羽》之嗟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173066_comment'></div>或行役不已，而父母兄弟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>离散</span>，则有《陟岵》之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173066_comment'></div>诗人皆推其意，见于《国风》，所谓「发乎情，止乎礼义」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173066_comment'></div>伏惟吾君有出于数千载之大志，方兴先王之治，以上继三代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173066_comment'></div>吾相于时，皆同德合谋，则所以待天下之士者，岂异于古？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173066_comment'></div>士之出于是时者，岂有不得尽其志邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173066_comment'></div>巩独何人，幸遇兹日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173066_comment'></div>巩少之时，尚不敢饰其固陋之质，以干当世之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173066_comment'></div>今齿发日衰，聪明日耗，令其至愚，固不敢有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>徼进</span>之心，况其少有知邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173066_comment'></div>转走五郡，盖十年矣，未尝敢有半言片辞，求去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>邦域</span>之任，而冀陪朝廷之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173066_comment'></div>此巩之所以自处，窃计已在听察之日久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173066_comment'></div>今辄以其区区之腹心，敢布于下执事者，诚以巩年六十，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>老母</span>年八十有八，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/142/Comments/0")'>老母</span>寓食京师，而巩守闽越，仲弟守南越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173066_comment'></div>二越者，天下之远处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173066_comment'></div>于著令，有一人仕于此二邦者，同居之亲当远仕者，皆得不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173066_comment'></div>巩固不敢为不肖之身，求自比于是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173066_comment'></div>顾以道里之阻，既不可御<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/154/Comments/0")'>老母</span>而南，则非独省晨昏，承颜色，不得效其犬马之愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173066_comment'></div>至于书问往还，盖以万里，非累月逾时不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173066_comment'></div>此白首之母子，所以义不可以茍安，恩不可以茍止者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173066_comment'></div>方去岁之春，有此邦之命，巩敢以情告于朝，而诏报不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173066_comment'></div>属闽有盗贼之事，因不敢继请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173066_comment'></div>及去秋到职，闽之馀盗，或数十百为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/172/Comments/0")'>曹伍</span>者，往往蚁聚于山谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173066_comment'></div>桀黠能动众为魁首者，又以十数，相望于州县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173066_comment'></div>闽之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/177/Comments/0")'>室闾</span>莫能宁，而远近闻者，亦莫不疑且骇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173066_comment'></div>州之属邑，又有出于饥旱之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173066_comment'></div>巩于此时，又不敢以私计自陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173066_comment'></div>其于寇孽，属前日之屡败，士气既夺，而吏亦无可属者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1173066_comment'></div>其于经营，既不敢以轻动迫之，又不敢以少纵玩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1173066_comment'></div>一则谕以招纳，一则戒以剪除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1173066_comment'></div>既而其悔悟者自相执拘以归，其不变者亦为吏士之所系获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1173066_comment'></div>其魁首则或縻而致之，或歼而去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1173066_comment'></div>自冬至春，远近皆定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1173066_comment'></div>亭无枹鼓之警，里有室家之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1173066_comment'></div>士气始奋，而人和始洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1173066_comment'></div>至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/203/Comments/0")'>风雨时若</span>，田出自倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1173066_comment'></div>今野行海涉，不待朋俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1173066_comment'></div>市粟四来，价减什七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1173066_comment'></div>此皆吾君吾相至仁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/209/Comments/0")'>元泽</span>覆冒所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1173066_comment'></div>故寇旱之馀，曾未期岁，既安且富，至于如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1173066_comment'></div>巩与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/214/Comments/0")'>斯民</span>，与蒙其幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1173066_comment'></div>方地数千里，既无一事，系官于此，又已弥年，则可以将母之心，告于吾君吾相，未有易于此时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1173066_comment'></div>伏惟推古之所以待士之详，思劳归之诗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1173066_comment'></div>本士大夫之情，而及于其亲，逮之以即乎人心之政，或还之阙下，或处以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/229/Comments/0")'>闲曹</span>，或引之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1173066", 1173066, "Clauses/230/Comments/0")'>近畿</span>，属以一郡，使得谐其就养之心，慰其高年之母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1173066_comment'></div>则仁治之行，岂独昏愚得蒙赐于今日，其流风馀法，传之永久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1173066_comment'></div>后世之士，且将赖此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1173066_comment'></div>其无《北山》之怨，《鸨羽》之讥，《陟岵》之叹，盖行之甚易，而为德于士类者甚广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1173066_comment'></div>惟留意而图之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1173066_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1173066_comment'></div>巩顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_77_1173066_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年9月</a>　九月，召判太常寺，曾巩去闽，作《北归三首》<div id='poem_220101' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220101' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220101?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北归三首<span class='inlineComment2'>（召判太常）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220101")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_220101_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220101'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220101'>终日思归今日归，著鞭鞭马尚嫌迟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220101_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220101'>曲台殿里官虽冷，须胜天涯海角时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220101_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220101'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_220101_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_220100' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220100' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220100?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年9月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_220100_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220100'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220100'>拜捧恩书喜满颜，马蹄遥望斗杓还。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220100_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220100'>从今步步行平地，出得千山与万山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220100_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220100'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_220100_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_220099' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220099' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220099?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年9月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_220099_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220099'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220099'>江海多年似转蓬，白头归拜未央宫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220099_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220099'>堵墙学士惊相问，何处尘埃瘦老翁？<div id='poem_sentence_1_220099_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220099'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_220099_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
扬州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='20d77982fd1b4430b4fa9a7cfed9bf01_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("20d77982fd1b4430b4fa9a7cfed9bf01");'><span id='20d77982fd1b4430b4fa9a7cfed9bf01_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>，60岁</div><div id='20d77982fd1b4430b4fa9a7cfed9bf01' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>曾巩作《和酬孙少述》<div id='poem_220219' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220219' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220219?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和酬孙少述</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220219")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220219_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220219'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220219'>自信箪瓢乐，宁羞猿鹤惊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220219_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220219'>论高知峻节，交淡见纯诚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220219_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220219'>自昔心无间，相逢眼更明。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220219_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220219'>何当荐有道？坐想<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_220219", 220219, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>软轮</span>迎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220219_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220219'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220219_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>曾巩作《和孙少述侯职方同燕席》<div id='poem_220211' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220211' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220211?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和孙少述侯职方同燕席</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220211")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220211_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220211'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220211'>两翁头白喜追陪，好事铃斋燕席开。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220211'>腊在未消盈尺雪，春归先放一枝梅。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220211'>况无庭下书投缿，更尽筵中酒满杯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220211'>周召二南皆绝唱，抑扬赓和愧非材。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220211'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220211_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
杭州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='82a01f1b9995412db44faa913876fd99_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("82a01f1b9995412db44faa913876fd99");'><span id='82a01f1b9995412db44faa913876fd99_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>，61岁</div><div id='82a01f1b9995412db44faa913876fd99' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>曾巩作《和赵宫保别杭州》<div id='poem_220121' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220121' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220121?labeling=true' "poem_title_220121")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_220121_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220121'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220121'>紞鼓留公岂是催<span class='inlineComment2'>（公诗云：“潮过鱼船叠鼓催。”）</span>，湖山得意且徘徊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220121_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220121'>更应准拟须乘兴，范蠡扁舟去却来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220121_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220121'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_220121_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>曾巩作《贺赵大资政致政启》<div id='poem_1173098' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173098' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173098?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺赵大资致政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173098")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173098_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173098'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173098'>右巩启：窃审进秩宫朝，归荣里闬，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173098_comment'></div>恭以致政宫保大资言为蓍蔡，行应准绳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173098_comment'></div>肩一德以在躬，历三朝而遇主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173098_comment'></div>谠言大论，著在朝堂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173098_comment'></div>善政流风，被于藩服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173098_comment'></div>引年求谢，抗疏弥坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173098_comment'></div>屡降德音，方倚老成之重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173098_comment'></div>难回壮节，闵有官职之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173098_comment'></div>躐升储寀之华，退遂家居之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173098_comment'></div>门开祖帐，众叹大夫之贤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173098_comment'></div>庭列赐车，自知稽古之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173098_comment'></div>惟能谐于素志，实何愧于昔人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173098_comment'></div>巩蚤荷陶钧，与游门馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173098_comment'></div>观大贤出处之迹，足劝士伦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173098_comment'></div>知儒者进退之宜，敢忘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1173098", 1173098, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>师慕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173098_comment'></div>其为欣跃，倍万等俦。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1173098'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1173098_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

-----title
亳州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='d4efbe5b343347bbab5e39b420ab4a4f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d4efbe5b343347bbab5e39b420ab4a4f");'><span id='d4efbe5b343347bbab5e39b420ab4a4f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1080')">1079-1080年</a>，61-62岁</div><div id='d4efbe5b343347bbab5e39b420ab4a4f' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年7月16日</a>　七月十六日，曾巩到亳州就任，作《亳州谢到任表》<div id='poem_1172957' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1172957' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1172957?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亳州谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年7月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1172957")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1172957_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1172957'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172957'>伏奉敕命，就差权知亳州军州事，已于今月十六日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172957_comment'></div>比从闽粤，中易句章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172957_comment'></div>益起坚城，以强表海之势；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172957_comment'></div>闳开<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>列馆</span>，以待<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>来廷</span>之宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172957_comment'></div>皆承规画之馀，方始经营之绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172957_comment'></div>程工省费，俾无靡敝之材；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172957_comment'></div>计力与庸，俾无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>发召</span>之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172957_comment'></div>以至属材能而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>董事</span>，分什伍以庀徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172957_comment'></div>已略具于科条，可粗施于士吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172957_comment'></div>身方督作，匪懈于服劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172957_comment'></div>法有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>避亲</span>，遽蒙于易地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172957_comment'></div>窃陪京之宠寄，申将母之微情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172957_comment'></div>辄冒恩荣，何堪报称<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172957_comment'></div>臣窃观前籍所载，千载以来，大道郁而未彰，莫承于古；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172957_comment'></div>王者疏而不作，无甚兹时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172957_comment'></div>在理可推，久衰必复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172957_comment'></div>去五代八姓寖微之弊，肇自宋兴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172957_comment'></div>承一祖四宗丕显之谟，实在陛下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172957_comment'></div>盖由体粹精之睿质，执刚健之纯诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172957_comment'></div>运独断之明，则天清水止；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172957_comment'></div>昭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>不杀</span>之武，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>雷厉风行</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172957_comment'></div>故能并起百工，越熙庶绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172957_comment'></div>追二帝三代之甚盛，行两汉有唐之所难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172957_comment'></div>使天地人神，莫不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>顺序</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172957_comment'></div>雨旸寒燠，罔或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>违时</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1172957_comment'></div>厥戴德者，田耕井饮之伦，盖游泳于遐迩之内；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1172957_comment'></div>其蒙泽者，蛰潜妪伏之类，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>殰殈</span>于胎卵之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1172957_comment'></div>宝鼎灵芝，声流于乐府；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1172957_comment'></div>来麰嘉谷，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>实牣</span>于太仓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1172957_comment'></div>至于武库歛藏之兵，羽林阅习之伎，匠尽其巧，而工妙擅于一时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1172957_comment'></div>士尽其材，而精锐轶于近代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1172957_comment'></div>威灵所覆，夷貉允怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1172957_comment'></div>是以扶桑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>戴斗</span>之区，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>度索</span>寻橦之国，来于四海之外，曾无一岁之虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1172957_comment'></div>盖令不待期，而万里奔走；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1172957_comment'></div>治非有迹，而九域阜安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1172957_comment'></div>可谓不世之宏休，难名之盛烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1172957_comment'></div>夫应之福者既极其厚，则报其贶者必尽其隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1172957_comment'></div>方当秩盛礼大乐之文，荐诸清庙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1172957_comment'></div>采增封广禅之义，类于名山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1172957_comment'></div>于以较著日新拔出之显庸，阐布天锡永昌之大业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1172957_comment'></div>臣性姿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>固塞</span>，人品<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>眇微</span>，独于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1172957", 1172957, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>辈流</span>，素嗜文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1172957_comment'></div>如得镂诸金玉，述陛下赫赫之功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1172957_comment'></div>播在管弦，纪陛下巍巍之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1172957_comment'></div>措之六艺而无愧，告诸百世而无疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1172957_comment'></div>庶几不后古人，可以昭示来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1172957_comment'></div>存于肺腑，积有岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1172957_comment'></div>然臣籍虽预于内朝，身屡更于外服，已彫零于齿发，久转走于东南，曾未得厕望尘于清跸之间，参第颂于从官之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1172957_comment'></div>惟坚悃愊，欲效毫分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1172957_comment'></div>今者获便养于亲闱，预分忧于辅郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1172957_comment'></div>上体焦劳之意，敢忘夙夜之勤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1172957_comment'></div>宣化承流，方尽驽骀之力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1172957_comment'></div>望云就日，但倾葵藿之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1172957_comment'></div>注仰冕旒，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1172957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1172957'><span class='label'>按：</span>《元丰类稿》卷二七。又见《曾文定公集》卷一○，清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷二八。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1172957_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　曾巩作《亳州到任谢两府启》<div id='poem_1173099' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173099' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173099?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亳州到任谢两府启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173099")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173099_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173099'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173099'>右巩启：蒙恩授上件差遣，已于今月十六日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173099_comment'></div>伏念巩少虽好学，长乏异能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173099_comment'></div>烛理甚疏，盖聪明之难强；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173099_comment'></div>受材素薄，顾齿发之已衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173099_comment'></div>误窃宠灵，叨尘器使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173099_comment'></div>兹者缘避亲之著令，蒙易地之推恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173099_comment'></div>距畿甸以非遥，就庭闱而甚便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173099_comment'></div>夫何蕞质，乃尔冒居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173099_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官，以广爱之心而辅成世教，以并容之度而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173099", 1173099, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>奖育</span>士伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173099_comment'></div>致是颛愚，及于推齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173099_comment'></div>慰倚门之望，已出于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173099", 1173099, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>埏镕</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173099_comment'></div>谢推毂之言，敢忘于策励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173099_comment'></div>庶收薄效，仰答误知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173099_comment'></div>过此以还，未知所措。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1173099_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年10月</a>　曾巩作《慈圣光献皇太后挽词二首并进状》<div id='poem_220296' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220296' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220296?labeling=true' target='_blank'>慈圣光献皇太后挽词二首并进状<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220296")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_220296_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_220296'>右，臣伏以大行皇太后在位四十有七年，身处宫闱，聪明慈恕恭俭之德见于天下，洽于众论。在仁宗时，有辅佐相成之道，在先帝及陛下之日，非特始终孝爱两义俱隆，实有援立镇抚之大功。在先帝之世，从权当国，既而还政以时，明识独见，出处应理。自二帝三代秦汉以来，母后功德未有巍巍如此。奄尽大期，群情痛怛。陛下执丧哀慕，外虽易月，内尽至性，报复大恩，诚礼备极，盖从古所未闻。今山陵有日，臣愚浅薄，无以自效，谨撰成大行皇太后挽词二首，缮写上进。臣无任悲哀感咽之至，谨具状奏闻，谨状。</div><div id='poem_preface_220296_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220296'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220296'>祖烈鹰扬终食冀，家声泉涌旧兴谯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220296_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220296'>人伦风化归三世，王室功劳属两朝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220296_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220296'>长信深严馀羽卫，閟宫崇大列宗祧。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220296_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220296'>衣冠藉藉谈遗事，不尽鸿名对永昭。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220296_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220296'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_220296_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_220295' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220295' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220295?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span id='poem_content_1172962'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1172962'>今月二十日，太皇太后遗诰奄弃宫闱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1172962_comment'></div>承问震惊，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1172962", 1172962, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>失容</span>号恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1172962_comment'></div>臣某诚悲诚感，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1172962_comment'></div>伏以太皇太后表仪三世，德首于人伦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172962_comment'></div>保佑两朝，功存于王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172962_comment'></div>遽违孝养，未究遐龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172962_comment'></div>无间近疏，实均欷慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172962_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下痛贯宸极，圣情难居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172962_comment'></div>臣伏恨方守印章，不获躬诣阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172962_comment'></div>臣无任/《<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>播芳大全》题作「慰国哀上皇帝表」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1172962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1172962'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_1172962_0'>⑴ 云云。　《元丰类稿》卷二七。又见《曾文定公集》卷一○，宋刻本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷二上。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1172962_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　曾巩作《与定州韩相公启》<div id='poem_1173102' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173102' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173102?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与定州韩公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173102")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173102_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173102'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173102'>右巩启：伏念巩转走江湖，推移岁月，望门墙而既远，通书问以无缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173102_comment'></div>兹者蒙易近藩，匪遥台席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173102_comment'></div>虽未得就诸生之列，请益于诗书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173102_comment'></div>犹足以闻长者之风，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173102", 1173102, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>仰高</span>于道谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173102_comment'></div>始敢修笺记参候之礼，庶几将心诚饥渴之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173102_comment'></div>载省孤蒙，实为幸会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173102_comment'></div>属<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173102", 1173102, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>晏阴</span>之在序，当严气之方升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173102_comment'></div>仰惟吐纳之宜，无爽燕閒之喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173102_comment'></div>伏惟判府相公言为蓍蔡，行应准绳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173102_comment'></div>茂劳烈于三朝，耸仪刑于四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173102_comment'></div>韩侯之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173102", 1173102, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>鞗革</span>金厄，暂殿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173102", 1173102, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>方维</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173102_comment'></div>周公之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173102", 1173102, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>衮衣绣裳</span>，伫还钧轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173102_comment'></div>更冀上为邦国，善保寝兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173102_comment'></div>祷颂之诚，叙陈罔既。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1173102_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　曾巩作《雪亳州》<div id='poem_220328' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_220328' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/220328?labeling=true' target='_blank'>雪亳州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_220328")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_220328_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_220328'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_220328'>欲下苍凉日，全低黯霮天。<div id='poem_sentence_0_220328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_220328'>飘飖投夜急，琐碎得风儇。<div id='poem_sentence_1_220328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_220328'>秽壤弥缝遍，枯荄点缀妍。<div id='poem_sentence_2_220328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_220328'>繁英飞面旋，艳舞起翩跹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_220328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_220328'>已压穿林竹，还冰落涧泉。<div id='poem_sentence_4_220328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_220328'>抵巇轻自肆，乘隙巧争先。<div id='poem_sentence_5_220328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_220328'>壅隔书邮断，侵凌客屐穿。<div id='poem_sentence_6_220328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_220328'>恐倾贫巷屋，觉重溯溪船。<div id='poem_sentence_7_220328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_220328'>唶有颜空姣，洵无质可镌。<div id='poem_sentence_8_220328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_220328'>包藏兼海岳，蒙蔽匝坤乾。<div id='poem_sentence_9_220328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_220328'>枚叟招何晚？袁安卧正坚。<div id='poem_sentence_10_220328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_220328'>会须逢见睍，万里豁晴川。<div id='poem_sentence_11_220328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_220328'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_220328_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　曾巩撰《金华县君曾氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173352' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173352' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173352?labeling=true' target='_blank'>金华县君曾氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰二年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173352")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173352_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173352'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173352'>夫人嫁王氏，为侍御史讳平妻，姓曾氏，泉州晋江人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173352_comment'></div>祖讳穆，殿中丞，追封魏国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173352_comment'></div>考讳会，尚书刑部郎中、集贤殿修撰，追封楚国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173352_comment'></div>皆累赠太师、中书令兼尚书令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173352_comment'></div>妣黄氏，楚国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173352_comment'></div>未嫁，承顺父母尽子道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173352_comment'></div>既嫁，夫家贫，养姑尽妇道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173352_comment'></div>辅其夫尽妻道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173352_comment'></div>夫死，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173352", 1173352, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>寓食</span>于颍，以勤俭积日大其家，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1173352", 1173352, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>诱教</span>不倦成其子，又可谓尽母道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173352_comment'></div>盖其子五人，回、向、固、同、囧，皆有学行，回有道，为儒宗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173352_comment'></div>向、囧尤有文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173352_comment'></div>三人皆身在隐约，而声震天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173352_comment'></div>于是时，夫人兄鲁公公亮实为宰相当国，然夫人处里舍弥约，未尝以为泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173352_comment'></div>及其后，回、向、同、囧皆蚤世，人以为难处，夫人能自广以理，未尝乱其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173352_comment'></div>教养其孙，至男有立，女有归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173352_comment'></div>熙宁之间，鲁公告老，以太傅、侍中就第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173352_comment'></div>夫人少鲁公一岁，食其子禄，皆居京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173352_comment'></div>二人白首，相顾怡然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173352_comment'></div>元丰元年春，鲁公薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173352_comment'></div>四月丁卯，夫人亦以疾终，春秋七十有九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173352_comment'></div>夫人以夫恩封金华县君，以鲁公恩赐冠帔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173352_comment'></div>子回，忠武军节度推官，知陈州南顿县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173352_comment'></div>向，峡州硖石县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173352_comment'></div>固，大名府军巡判官，国子监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173352_comment'></div>同，陈州宛丘县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173352_comment'></div>囧，蔡州新蔡县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173352_comment'></div>女嫁太子右赞善大夫陈臻古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173352_comment'></div>孙五人，泌、汾、汶、沂、澺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173352_comment'></div>汾，郊社斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173352_comment'></div>汶，试将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173352_comment'></div>夫人既卒之明年，某月某甲子，葬颍之汝阴县怀音乡南高村，祔御史之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173352_comment'></div>其将葬也，固以状来乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173352_comment'></div>惟夫人为子若妇，为妻若母，皆尽其道，于艰厄流寄之中，能立其家，成就其子，所以自处于通塞之际者，无不当于理，是其智术德性过人远甚，宜得铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173352_comment'></div>且余实与其子游最旧，乃不辞而为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1173352'>曾禹之苗，氏自鄫子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173352_comment'></div>或言厥志，有称阙里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173352_comment'></div>或以孝显，于经实纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173352_comment'></div>或守所闻，羞践霸轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173352_comment'></div>遥遥千载，历世有闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173352_comment'></div>自荆徂粤，笃生夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173352_comment'></div>楚公之子，魏公之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173352_comment'></div>鲁公维伯，御史是嫔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173352_comment'></div>乃立厥家，自坠而兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173352_comment'></div>乃教厥子，自幼而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173352_comment'></div>卷服貂冠，伯也在廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173352_comment'></div>子也在幽，硕实洪声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173352_comment'></div>莫亲己宗，莫重夫氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173352_comment'></div>两有其盛，世谁与媲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173352_comment'></div>维能既试，维德实孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173352_comment'></div>尚宠尔后，列铭阴墟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1173352_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　曾巩撰《祭宋龙图文》<div id='poem_1173390' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173390' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173390?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭宋龙图文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173390")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173390_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173390'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173390'>嗟乎次道！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173390_comment'></div>公之于古今典章沿革，得之于心，山藏海积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173390_comment'></div>又于旧闻，隐显纤悉，析之以口，天高日白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173390_comment'></div>公在朝廷，群公百司，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173390", 1173390, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>解惑</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173390", 1173390, "Clauses/10/Comments/1")'>释疑</span>，公为蓍龟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173390_comment'></div>公在太史，维僚与属，正缪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173390", 1173390, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>辨讹</span>，公为耳目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173390_comment'></div>今公亡矣，廷有大议，问故事者，众失其归；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173390_comment'></div>国有大典，考前载者，人失其师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173390_comment'></div>况公行不绝俗，而动有常度；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173390_comment'></div>言不忤物，而辞无可疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173390_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173390", 1173390, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>靖退</span>之风，愈老而弥邵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173390_comment'></div>方直之操，自信而不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173390_comment'></div>至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173390", 1173390, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>笃友</span>尚旧，比义亲仁，追往烈而竞逐，岂庸态之能邻？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173390_comment'></div>然而蚤蹈厉于儒馆，晚委蛇于从臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173390_comment'></div>曾未得历禁林之献纳，任廊庙之弥纶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173390_comment'></div>何鸾仪而鹄峙，忽飙逝而星沦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173390_comment'></div>哭公之丧者，客不绝于门庭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173390_comment'></div>吊公之家者，使相望于道路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173390_comment'></div>维<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1173390", 1173390, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>昏钝</span>之少与，独绸缪而有素，泪淋浪而莫收，情忉怛而奚愬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173390_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173390_comment'></div>唐季五君，史旷其录，公蒐亡而集霣，盖旁罗而远属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173390_comment'></div>至于帝宅神州，祖功宗德，咸在笔削，具存方册，争日月之光辉，与天地而终极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173390_comment'></div>则公位虽屈而未尽，名益久而逾章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173390_comment'></div>彼富贵而磨灭，岂得公之毫芒？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173390_comment'></div>纂馀哀而以此，聊寓荐于一觞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1173390_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　刘伯声之子刘之美至亳，为其父请铭，曾巩撰《刘伯声墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173334' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173334' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173334?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刘伯声墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰三年十一月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173334")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173334_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173334'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173334'>庆历之间，余家抚州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173334_comment'></div>州掾张文叔与其内弟刘伯声从予游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173334_comment'></div>余与伯声皆罕与人接，得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173334", 1173334, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>颛意</span>以学问<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1173334", 1173334, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>磨砻浸灌</span>为事，居三年乃别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173334_comment'></div>后数年，余以贫而仕，见伯声于京师，年益壮，学日以益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173334_comment'></div>又数年，余校书史馆，伯声数过余，饮酒谈笑，道<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1173334", 1173334, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>旧故</span>相乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173334_comment'></div>伯声未老，然以疾故，亦衰矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173334_comment'></div>既而余去京师而东，更七州，至于亳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173334_comment'></div>伯声子之美来告曰，伯声死八年矣，将死时，命之美属余铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173334_comment'></div>其言曰，葬而不得余铭，如不葬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173334_comment'></div>余惟伯声始从余游，至今三十年，见其少壮，至于有疾而衰，与之故最久，于其死而托铭于余，故不得而辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173334_comment'></div>伯声讳震，为人质厚沉深，寡言笑，恂恂蹈规矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173334_comment'></div>与人接，见其一善，若恐不能及；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173334_comment'></div>见其一失，若恐不能拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173334_comment'></div>其笃于谊如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173334_comment'></div>读书有大志，慨然欲有为者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173334_comment'></div>少孤能自立，尤贫，然营疏属之葬、孤侄之嫁娶，忘其力之不足也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173334_comment'></div>数以进士荐于乡，卒不合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173334_comment'></div>晚乃得试将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173334_comment'></div>曾大父泽，左补阙，赠吏部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173334_comment'></div>大父居仁，单州单父县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173334_comment'></div>考纮，济州司理参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173334_comment'></div>其先清河人，自吏部葬开封府之东明，今为东明人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173334_comment'></div>伯声卒于熙宁五年二月戊戌，年五十有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173334_comment'></div>葬于东明之阳山乡白驹里，以元丰三年十一月某甲子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173334_comment'></div>妻贾氏，尚书比部员外郎式之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173334_comment'></div>子四人，曰之美、之纯、之奇、之邵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173334_comment'></div>二女，嫁倪良器、李日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173334_comment'></div>张文叔名彦博，余为之叙其文者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173334_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1173334'>敏于求己，尚行寡言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173334_comment'></div>笃于求古，广见多闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173334_comment'></div>有既畀之，而施则屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173334_comment'></div>维旧则信，以谂后人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1173334_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript:
