id='poem_sentence_2_1172960_comment'></div>维总章之正位，秩宗祀之鸿仪，可荐至诚，用伸昭报<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1172960_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下躬夙成之圣质，而博古多闻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1172960_comment'></div>经特起之大猷，而虚心广览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1172960_comment'></div>振千龄之坠绪，绍三代之遐踪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1172960_comment'></div>霈泽之所涵濡，太和之所煦妪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1172960_comment'></div>华夏蛮貊，无一夫不获其宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1172960_comment'></div>草木虫鱼，无一物不遂其性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1172960_comment'></div>爰求祭典，用告王功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1172960_comment'></div>盖诸儒之说为不经，则折衷于孔子；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1172960_comment'></div>而近世之事为非古，则取法于周公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1172960_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1172960", 1172960, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>罢黜</span>异端，推明极孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1172960_comment'></div>以尊莫大于祖，故郊于吉土以配天；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1172960_comment'></div>以本莫重于亲，故享于合宫以配帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1172960_comment'></div>恩义两得其当，情文皆尽其详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1172960_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1172960", 1172960, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>彻俎</span>云初，均釐甚广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1172960_comment'></div>君哉皇矣，实难偶之昌期；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1172960_comment'></div>巍乎焕焉，信非常之盛礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1172960_comment'></div>臣幸逢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1172960", 1172960, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>熙洽</span>，未奉燕间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1172960_comment'></div>一违前跸之音，四遇亲祠之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1172960_comment'></div>青云多士，皆预<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1172960", 1172960, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>桥门</span>之听观；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1172960_comment'></div>黄发孤生，独叹《周南》之留滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1172960_comment'></div>仰望旒宸，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1172960_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>　曾巩治亳，行保甲法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年7月5日</a>　曾巩作《强几圣文集序》<div id='poem_1173159' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173159' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173159?labeling=true' target='_blank'>强几圣文集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年7月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173159")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173159_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173159'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173159'>几圣讳至，姓强氏，钱塘人，几圣字也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173159_comment'></div>为三司户部判官、尚书祠部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173159_comment'></div>既没，其子浚明集其遗文为二十卷，属予序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173159_comment'></div>几圣少贫，能自谋学，为进士，材拔出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1173159", 1173159, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>辈类</span>，出辄收其科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173159_comment'></div>其文词大传于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173159_comment'></div>及为吏，未尝不以其閒益读书为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173159_comment'></div>尤工于诗，句出惊人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173159_comment'></div>世皆推其能，然最为相国韩魏公所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173159_comment'></div>魏公既罢政事，镇京兆，及徙镇相魏，常引几圣自助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173159_comment'></div>魏公喜为诗，每合属士大夫、宾客与游，多赋诗以自见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173159_comment'></div>其属而和之者，几圣独思致逸发，若不可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1173159", 1173159, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>追蹑</span>，魏公未尝不叹得之晚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173159_comment'></div>其在幕府，魏公每上奏天子，以岁时庆贺候问，及为书记通四方之好，几圣为属稿草，必声比字属，曲当绳墨，然气质浑浑，不见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173159", 1173159, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>刻画</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173159", 1173159, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>远近</span>多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1173159", 1173159, "Clauses/40/Comments/1")'>称诵</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173159_comment'></div>及为他文，若志铭序记、策问学士大夫，则简古典则，不少贬以就俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173159_comment'></div>其所长兼人，以此魏公数荐之朝廷，以谓宜在馆阁，然未及用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173159_comment'></div>魏公既薨之明年，几圣亦以疾卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173159_comment'></div>几圣之遗文，在魏公幕府者为最多，故序亦特反复见之，览者可推而考之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173159_comment'></div>其行治官世，已著于志几圣之葬者，故此不著。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1173159_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年8月</a>　曾巩撰《尚书都官员外郎陈君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1173327' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173327' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173327?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书都官员外郎陈君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰三年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173327")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173327_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173327'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173327'>尚书都官员外郎、权知泉州事陈君讳枢卒于位，其孤敩以君之丧归葬于湖州长兴县尚吴乡雉山原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173327_comment'></div>前葬，其弟杞以书之亳州，乞铭于南丰曾巩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173327_comment'></div>盖元丰元年，巩为福州，充福建路兵马钤辖，奏疏曰：「臣所领内，知泉州事、尚书屯田员外郎陈枢，质性纯笃，治民为循吏，积十有五年，不上于课，故为郎久不迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173327_comment'></div>方朝廷抑浮竞、尚廉素之时，宜蒙特诏有司奏枢课，优进其官，以奖恬退」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173327_comment'></div>其是天子特迁君尚书都官员外郎，诰曰：「吾宠枢也，所以戒奔竞」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173327_comment'></div>明年六月甲子，君以疾卒，享年若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173327_comment'></div>又明年八月甲寅乃葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173327_comment'></div>君事亲以孝闻，为人恂恂蹈规矩，有善不自伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173327_comment'></div>于势与利无秋毫顾计心，于义所在，侃然自任，人莫能及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173327_comment'></div>为吏去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173327", 1173327, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>觚角</span>，绌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1173327", 1173327, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>雕琢</span>，以平易敦朴为务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173327_comment'></div>于刑宁失有罪，惟恐伤人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173327_comment'></div>于赋役，度所不可蠲除者，然后调发，与民为期会，未尝取疾争先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173327_comment'></div>其为民去害兴利，若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1173327", 1173327, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>疾痛</span>嗜欲在己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173327_comment'></div>所至必兴学校，以教化为先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173327_comment'></div>初尉鄱阳，令得盗五人，属尉使为功，君辞不受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173327_comment'></div>及令宜黄，宜黄在穷绝山谷之间，旧令无显者，至君为之，名常出众上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173327_comment'></div>令旌德亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1173327_comment'></div>旌德之民，岁输米于太平州芜湖县仓，路回远，费甚，君请输钱以便民，谯县民输麦于酂阳仓，以供漕，输豆于会亭仓，以给驿行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1173327_comment'></div>君复请输钱，以籴供漕，以直给驿行者，各得其所便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1173327_comment'></div>罢县，民绝桥闭门留君，以间乃得去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1173327_comment'></div>泉州岁凶，君筑室止穷民，饥者给食，病者给医，人忘其穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1173327_comment'></div>使者蒐兵于闽，以益戍广西，君建言兵当蒐者，父母老或疾，至无他子，皆可听免，诏定著于令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1173327_comment'></div>余尝闻繁昌有大姓杀人，州县不能正其罪，君时令旌德，或徙其狱属君，君验治僮客，尽得其隐伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1173327_comment'></div>杀人者论死，人以为尽其情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1173327_comment'></div>又闻君之令旌德也，州有所赋调，他县皆奉行，至旌德，令独计曰：「非吾土之所有也，非吾人之所堪也，不敢以赋民」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1173327_comment'></div>争或至十反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1173327_comment'></div>守恚，出语诋君，君益争，州听然后止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1173327_comment'></div>最后闻泉州旱，君图所以赈民者，欲预为具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1173327_comment'></div>或讥君近名，君不为动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1173327_comment'></div>此君之事，余得之于耳目者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1173327_comment'></div>昔司马迁记前世循吏，上下数千载，所列叙者五人，详者人数事，略者一二事而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1173327_comment'></div>今余所论次君事，与迁所记五人者相似否，必有能识之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1173327_comment'></div>君之事多矣，然犹为所试者小也，令所试者大，则其事可胜传邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1173327_comment'></div>君字慎之，湖州长兴人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1173327_comment'></div>曾祖彦夔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1173327_comment'></div>祖文倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1173327_comment'></div>考迪，赠尚书屯田员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1173327_comment'></div>君进士及第，初尉饶之鄱阳，用荐者令抚之宜黄，避亲嫌，令宣之旌德，用荐者迁秘书省著作佐郎，知亳之谯县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1173327_comment'></div>英宗即位，恩迁秘书丞，徙签书资州判官厅公事，迁太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1173327_comment'></div>今上即位，恩迁尚书屯田员外郎，用荐者知越州司录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1173327_comment'></div>未至，丁父忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1173327_comment'></div>服除，授三司盐铁判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1173327_comment'></div>未至，丁母忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1173327_comment'></div>服除，驿召对崇政殿，以为提点淮西刑狱公事，愿得治一州，徙权发遣明州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1173327_comment'></div>未至，又徙泉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1173327_comment'></div>留再任，以疾请致仕，未报而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1173327_comment'></div>母某氏，某县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1173327_comment'></div>娶赵氏，某县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1173327_comment'></div>又娶刘氏，吏部员外郎述之女，某县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1173327_comment'></div>又娶石氏，某县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1173327_comment'></div>一子敩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1173327_comment'></div>君既行治高，世皆以谓宜不次用，而任事者亦意向君为尤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1173327_comment'></div>然卒不得至中寿，而用止于此，其非命也夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1173327_comment'></div>余与君好为最久，故不辞而铭君墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1173327_comment'></div>辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_1173327'>人孰宜之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1173327_comment'></div>以夷易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1173327_comment'></div>物孰诚之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1173327_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1173327", 1173327, "Clauses/185/Comments/0")'>朴质</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1173327_comment'></div>所处而安，绌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1173327", 1173327, "Clauses/187/Comments/0")'>外累</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1173327_comment'></div>所守而固，笃自强也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1173327_comment'></div>古有循吏，其尚似也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1173327_comment'></div>诗以铭之，其常存也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_61_1173327_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年9月</a>　曾巩作《亳州明堂后祭庙文》<div id='poem_1173469' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173469' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173469?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亳州明堂后祭庙文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173469")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173469_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173469'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173469'>维季秋辛巳，天子宗祀英宗皇帝于明堂，以配上帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173469_comment'></div>既成礼，乃诏天下遍祭于群神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173469_comment'></div>故州得以众羞醪酒祗荐祠下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173469_comment'></div>神其诞降嘉福，无有不暨，以称天子所以事神爱民之意。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1173469_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>　自亳州移知沧州，曾巩作《授沧州乞朝见状》<div id='poem_1173027' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173027' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173027?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授沧州乞朝见状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173027")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173027_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173027'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173027'>右，臣伏奉敕命，就差知沧州，已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1173027", 1173027, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>起离</span>前来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173027_comment'></div>窃念臣远违班列十有二年，伏遇陛下神圣文武，当天受命，制作法度，以集太平之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173027_comment'></div>群情颙颙，孰不自愿为能，以托名于万世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173027_comment'></div>而臣曾未得须臾之间，进望清光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173027_comment'></div>窃不自揆，愿奉德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173027_comment'></div>犬马之情，固非一日之积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173027_comment'></div>今将至京师，伏望圣慈，许臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1173027", 1173027, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>朝见</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173027_comment'></div>臣不任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1173027_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
沧州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='4ad5c3df4a9b4a9eaa1ee85b8311608b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4ad5c3df4a9b4a9eaa1ee85b8311608b");'><span id='4ad5c3df4a9b4a9eaa1ee85b8311608b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>，62岁</div><div id='4ad5c3df4a9b4a9eaa1ee85b8311608b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年秋</a>　秋，曾巩游双源，作《游双源》<div id='poem_1173316' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1173316' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1173316?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游双源记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27305, "北宋", "曾巩", "poem_title_1173316")'>曾巩</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1173316_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1173316'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1173316'>县郊之东北，有山支为三峰，下会于平阪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1173316_comment'></div>两腋之间，修竹重莲，桃花流水，随人耳目之所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1173316_comment'></div>三峰之前，断流为池，凡五十丈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1173316_comment'></div>揖中一峰为澄心堂，于堂之背为濯缨轩，去轩之西为日亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1173316_comment'></div>引流而下，左右方沼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1173316_comment'></div>峻宇画阁，置于峰之麓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1173316_comment'></div>飞桥走阶，雕栏曲槛，帘隅翼翼，红绿相照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1173316_comment'></div>双源之会，澄心堂为矶以钓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1173316_comment'></div>相望之间，仰有翠阴，俯有清浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1173316_comment'></div>风色动静，禽声语默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1173316_comment'></div>水涵太虚，形影上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1173316_comment'></div>忘机之鳞，一游一濯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1173316_comment'></div>庚申之秋，予来尤川，因拜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1173316_comment'></div>辱才华物象适然而相值，且叹迷误之流，役为年之期，而致千岁之忧，忘不可过之分，而徇不可必之物，以贫作忧，而以理养心，以忧作老，而不以时受形，心与形化，共还尘壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1173316_comment'></div>虽然，我庾如坻，黄金满赢，泉石之间，松云之下，不能笑歌自若，以为劳生之梦幻，予尝悲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1173316_comment'></div>君不然，宾客至，正捕鱼于池，摘果于林，破谷于场，趣雉于野，盘有嘉肴，樽有旨酒，诗笺棋局，为宾客欢涟猗之上，尽日而后去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1173316_comment'></div>分内之物，外之亦足洼者，故予乐为君记之，又为数诗以次其后，孜孜为利发皓而情淡者，得予之言而有感焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1173316_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end
